11.title: Lets be specific...

choices: one day in the office
on her way to work
111.content:
Jenna sat down at her desk and started typing away at the keyboard. She was feeling a little uncomfortable for her belly was pressing against her shirt buttons. She was still stuffed from the breakfast she got at McDonald's.

Jen had only had her job for a couple months. She was reluctant to get a job right out of college. Her new job required little work (just a little paperwork), and paid well. She was always curvy in high school, but gained at least 40 pounds in college, weighing about 180 pounds at her heaviest. She gave some effort to lose some weight during college but had little success. After college she lost the motivation and desire to stay fit, opting to just not face her weight issue. 'It's not like I'm huge, I'm just a little 'thick,' which isn't a big deal,' Jen thought to herself. Since starting her job she had gained almost 10 pounds in two months.
111.title: Jenna

choices: later on...
1111.content:
As she sat in her cubicle she reached into a drawer in her desk and pulled out a big bag of doritos, and started munching away. She went through the bag just in time for the morning meeting. Every morning the staff got together for a daily rundown of their branches tasks, they were just a one small branch of the nationwide company. Jen spent these meetings munching on doughnuts and sipping coffee. She said vary little, devoting most of her attention to the doughnuts. At the end of the meeting she took the extra box of donuts to her desk, there was always an extra box left over for some reason. She munched throughout the rest of the morning to lunch time. She got an hour and a half for lunch, which she spent at the large food court in her business complex. After lunch she went back to her cubicle to finish the days tasks. At the end of the day she drove back to her apartment.

As she continued to work, the pounds piled on. She had to get new work clothes as her expanding stomach and bottom ripped her old clothes. The more she ate the bigger her appetite became. She avoided any chance of exertion. She parked as close to the lobby as possible and always took the elevator instead of the stairs. She was devoting more attention to eating than working.
1111.title: average day in the office

choices: at the meeting...
skip to later!
11111.content: Jen struggled to button her shirt over her fat belly. “Damn this thing. Did I shrink my clothes again?” She just managed to button it up. Her pants weren’t very cooperative either. “I haven’t put on that much weight, I must have shrunk my clothes.” She had definitely not shrunk her clothes, she had just gotten incredibly fat. She got into her car to go to work. “Why are these cars made so small?” She barely fit into the sedan. The first thing she did was got to the McDonald's drive through which was right next to her apartment building. She spatted out her large breakfast order, “can I get 20 hash browns, 3 egg mcmuffins, 2 mcgriddles, a breakfast burrito, and a large mcflurrie, please?” Jen’s stomach started to make noises, she was so hungry. She received the huge meal and went continued on her way to work. She demolished the food in the half an hour it took for her to arrive. She licked her fingers as she pulled into the taco bell drive through. Jen’s routine now was to order another meal at the taco bell right next to her office for her to eat at her desk. She loosened her belt another notch before leaving her car. The walk from her car to the lobby elevator was tiring for Jen since she was so out of shape and had a considerable amount of weight to move. She had already started eating the Taco Bell by the time she got to her desk. Her wide and round butt bounced as she stepped. As she lowered her shifting bulk into her desk chair she realized that her wide hips barely squeezed past the armrests. She would need a new chair. She resumed eating when she sat down. When she finished her second breakfast, she reached into her desk and pulled a twinkie out of a drawer stashed with twinkies and ding-dongs. She moaned at the taste of her third twinkie, her gut pushing the limits of her shirt buttons, of course Jen could only feel this, she couldn’t see anything past her large jiggling cleavage. Her gluttonous bliss was interrupted by the morning meeting. As she waddled down the hallway she cradled her swollen midsection which could be seen in between the buttons of her shirt.

1111111.content:
Finally, it was 4:00 PM, and right before these "food deliveries" were made, that Jenna then saw a very skinny yet slightly muscular and brown-and-dark-haired-and-male-gendered co-worker of Jenna named Jack come by to her office cubicle room desk with one last piece of paperwork, of the usual types for Jenna, as Jack had confirmed, leaving Jenna to attend to it and give it back to Jack, who then brought it back to those who tasked him to bring it to Jenna. By the time Jack came back, the last of Jenna's ordered food deliveries had been brought to her.

Jack had a part-time paid position like Jenna. He was very good-hearted as far as his reputation goes.
But he was especially so to Jenna. The reason was that Jenna had once stood up for him in the last of their high school years, something Jack would never forget for complex reasons.

He decided to wait for it all to end after noticing that Jenna was eating. It didn't take long, but despite her appetite increasing some more, it happened to be that before she finished it all up, Jenna felt like really full.

She thus also took into account that she had a really round belly that was still struggling to contain itself behind her shirt, and yet despite her shirts struggled success, her belly not only could still be seen between its buttons, but also had gotten fatter than beyond comprehension.

"Please, shirt, don't burst off on me before I leave." She mumbled in a tone of voice that made it sound like she begged it despite the quiet tone of voice she used as she mumbled these words.

She then proceeded to literally eat up all these foods, but by the time she finished, not only was it a few minutes right in time for her to "clock out", but also, Jack was standing there with it being that luckily for Jenna, her "shirt buttons" didn't "pop off", yet Jenna's belly had gotten several times bigger.

After which, she went to a nearby device on her table to "clock out" while in her at that point increasingly getting strained wheeled-and-four-legged-and-armed office cubicle room chair.

"*phew* Thank goodness you haven't bursted off on me, shirt, but despite this: -
"OH MY STINKING GOODNESS!" Mumbled Jenna quietly.

She then patted her round belly gently but also slightly sleepily.

"Hi, Jenna." Jack then said as he entered the room, his part time shift ending earlier than Jenna's and as such having "clocked out" earlier than Jenna.

She gasped quietly again, then turning to see Jack.

"Oh my goodness, you surprised me, Jack!" She said.

"Sorry about that. As for why I haven't left yet: -

"Well, there is that science fiction/fantasy fiction genre movie that just came out, it's available in a 6:00 PM showtime at a movie theater nearby where we both live-as I understand it-and as such-I was just curious if maybe you would like to see it with me, after which we could then head to that inexpensive price-requiring-yet-still-fancy-all-that-anyone-can-eat buffet restaurant that I would just like to know if maybe you'd like to then head to with me. As a friend, of course." Jack said, with a slightly nervous tone to his voice combined with a slight red-colored blush to his voice. Despite his last few words, Jack found himself attracted to Jenna, secretly, of course. Also, both he and Jenna enjoyed things like "sci-if" and "fantasy" and others that didn't include "horror and gore" or ANY of that infernal nonsense.

Jenna also had a slight red-colored blush to her face as she responded with the following words in an equally nervous tone of voice as she did and then asked the following question: -

"Uh, sure, Jack. I don't see why not. Although, if you do drive, do you think you could pick me up for when we go to that movie and to dinner and then bring me back home afterwards?"

Jenna was nervous because of what might happen if she were to have a "clothing "function" "problem""-which she found herself feeling embarrassed by the idea of happening in front of Jack-even though-unbeknownst to Jenna-Jack didn't really mind-due to his attraction to Jenna being from her kindness to him.

Down further the tight leggings that Jenna painted on every day left nothing to the imagination. Her large globes behind her were on display for all to see which led down to her tree trunk legs.

Jenna had a massive appetite, one of the reasons she had gone from 180 chunky pound out of college to a 385lb office worker. Paired with a sweet tooth she had gained over 200lbs in the past two to three years. Although she had a resolve to turn her weight around she knew cutting back on the food right now was not the way to go. Jenna's current goal was to add some extra walking to her life and hope that it would help the onslaught of pounds gathering on her frame. If anything maybe just to stop them from accumulating if not drop a few.

Her first task, take the stairs to her car. Jenna had gotten accustomed to taking the elevator in her apartment building down the four floors to the parking lot, that let her off just a few paces away from her car. Now the stairs were going to become her new best friend, or in her eyes, a mortal enemy. Not only were there four set of stairs, but the dropped her off on the other side of the parking lot, that she needed to traverse in the open air. Jenna approached the stairs with caution, not looking forward to her journey. Jenna had even eaten a few extra sticky buns this morning just to give her that extra push to make the walk happen. She waddled down the first few stairs, and started to realize that is wasn't going to be as bad as she thought. After a few more she had reached the first landing. "See walking is a breeze!" She told herself as she looked at her wrist band that was tracking all her new steps. After another short set of stairs Jenna had cleared on floor. She moved on to the next with determination but also some weakening ankles. She wasn't used to standing this long. Even in the elevator she just leaned on the walls and the ride was quite short. After the next set of stairs Jenna was starting to lose her resolve. "Omh I'm not sure my legs can handle this for much longer." Jenna decided to take the elevator the rest of the way to save her legs the pain, she didn't want to go and injure herself after all. All that time with her buns planted on the couch mowing down on food had really weakened her ability to get up and go. No bother it was just the first day.

Now at the office her goal was to park in the back of the parking lot and trek across the lot and get in some extra steps. Jenna had just grabbed her taco order and was enjoying a few items from the bag before going in. She pulled into the parking structure and looked at how far of a walk she was about to take. Before turning her car off she had second thoughts and decided to park a little closer. After all that strain she put on her legs at home she didn't want to over do it here at work. Jenna waddled a moderate distance through the parking garage, carrying her greasy take out bags with her.

By the time she plunked down at her desk she was famished. She polished off her grub and went about her normal routine, aka donuts, twinkies and other snacks that were within reach. She tried to get up from her desk as little as possible, she just let her massive gut rest in her lap, and take the weight off her aching calves.

By days end Jenna was back up to 100% and ready to take on the next step of her journey. The walk to the car wasn't bad, and she made it all better by stopping for some snacks on the way home. Back at home she looked at her next struggle, going up the stairs. Coming down them had been kinda easy, except on her weak leg muscles, but going up was going to be quite taxing on our beautiful bombshell. Just heaving her bulk up one step proved to be a challenge for her. After one flight of stairs she called it quits and hopped in the elevator.

Jenna had arrived home in one piece and plopped herself down on the couch for some recovery. Day one was in the books.
1111121111121111.title: Now the real challenge, exercising

choices: It's almost a 50% increase! Jenna is pleased.

11111211111211111.content:
Jenna raised another snack bar to her mouth as she got comfortable on the couch. She hadn't gotten as much exercise in as she had planned, but still, she had started today. And she definitely deserved a snack or five for the effort. Jenna leaned back as she enjoyed her snack, feeling her shirt stretching tightly and a little uncomfortably across her meaty middle, her thick bottom belly roll escaping the fabric entirely.

She adjusted her position a little, a slight movement of the hips resulting in chaotic jiggling and rolls smacking against each other all across her torso. Her massive rear pressed against the couch, but her bountiful softness made her extra comfortable. It was a welcome relief after her attempt at a more physically active work day. Jenna was proud of the extra steps she had been walking today, and that made it so easy for her to just relax and eat.

Jenna hadn't watched her step counter since she arrived at home, but it was about time she saw what kind of number it had all added up to today. Jenna couldn't help but feel really excited as she held up her wrist band so that she could actually see it over her boobs.
"1434 in total", she read out loud.
11111211111211111.title: Jenna checks on her results

choices: She tries to follow the plan but keeps eating. What are the results?
She attempts to get more steps over the weekend
111112111112111112.content:
Jenna shuffled her frame out of her apartment, her sides and rear brushing against the doorway on the way out. Making it outside successfully, she closed the door. It was time for another workday and another attempt at exercising, and this time she was going to do it right. Jenna was wearing her usual outfit; a shirt that could barely contain her huge melons and her sizeable rolls of fat, and leggings that couldn't conceal any of the unchecked corpulence of her curvy, flabby lower body.

The 385-pound beauty started down the stairs, her boobs and mound of a stomach bouncing with every step. Behind her, her enormous ass cheeks jiggled vigorously as Jenna kept moving down the stairs. She lasted down the first and second set but started to feel her muscles complain of the effort. She stopped, her pudge continuing to ripple for a moment before settling. Considering the elevator for a moment, Jenna decided to stay determined and keep going another floor.
"It won't be so hard if I just keep going, I'll be at the car in no time", Jenna told herself. The effort was almost too much for her, she was panting and the room felt impossibly warm when she finally reached the end of the final set of stairs. Opening the door outside, Jenna waddled out to the parking lot.

Putting her hands on her slightly sticky shirt which had ridden up during her effort, Jenna sighed when she realized that she would have to go across the parking lot to reach her car.
"This is too much at once, why did this seem like a smart plan before?" she complained. She reached into a pocket for a snack bar, opening the wrapper and bringing it to her mouth.
"I just need a few minutes to recharge. Then I can get to the car and sit my fat butt down as long as I need to", she said as she started to chew on her snack. Her legs didn't feel any less tired when she had finished eating, but she had to get to work so she started off anyway, waddling past cars and parking spaces before finally reaching her own ride.

Making it to the office with her usual breakfast, Jenna had to decide where to park again. She didn't feel ready to park any further away than last time, not after the walk she had just been through, and she ended up pretty close to the entrance. Still, she felt great as she approached her desk, putting down her large bags of food and getting ready for the day. She was getting (a little) exercise and it made her both hungry and content enough to feast without thinking much of it. During the day she gorged on the greasy fast food as well as countless amounts of snacks. She almost didn't get up from her overworked office chair at all while at work, but she was still happy with her progress so far. She heaved her heavy girth off the seat at the end of the workday, her immense flab jiggling characteristically as she started off towards her home.

The trip back to her apartment was largely uneventful. Jenna had to walk a small distance to reach her car at the parking lot. She didn't even consider trying to take the stairs to her apartment again, though. Jenna took the elevator, in total reaching only a slightly higher amount of steps than yesterday. She rewarded her efforts with a mountain of snacks, even though she had not done much better than yesterday. Jenna's enormous intake was undoubtedly working against her efforts at losing weight.
111112111112111112.title: Jenna decides to do better tomorrow

choices: To the office!
The car won't start
1111121111121111121.content:
"Why... Won't... You... Close!"

Jenna pulled at the car door again, the door again hitting her meaty side and refusing to close. Jenna whined at the sound and feeling of the door hitting the side of her ass and thigh. It was starting to hurt now, and Jenna couldn't shuffle much further to the side, it felt as if half of her butt was pretty much off the driver's seat already, but still Jenna's flab was bulging out the other way as well. As she forced her blubber to scoot over some more, her incredibly soft and sizeable belly blobbed it's way out of her top, its rolls constantly bouncing and rippling. Her corpulent front was pressed against the steering wheel and Jenna was just happy it was her habit to eat breakfast after her drive to work.

"And now we close it... No problem, just closing the car door as usual...", Jenna mumbled to herself and pulled at the door again. Another thud, as the door didn't quite close.
"Geez, this car and me, we just don't go together anymore!", she continued to say to herself. One more time, she pulled at the door. A thud, but not the same kind- Did it actually close? Jenna had almost expected to be trying and trying, all morning. It's not like she hadn't had to before. She couldn't keep from snickering a little.

"Like I said, no problem, right!", Jenna told herself and patted her side. Not the side that was tightly pressed against the door, naturally. Her top had ridden up so much it practically only covered her melons, and Jenna found herself caressing one of her incredibly meaty rolls for a second, her hand feeling very cold against her folds. It was crazy hot outside, but Jenna had come prepared with some soda. She had already had some of it, and now she took another sip. But the whole ordeal with the car door had left her too warm for comfort and a little out of breath. Clearly, another sip of soda was needed. Okay, half of the can maybe.

Who was she kidding, of course she was going to drink the whole thing. She held up the cold can to her lips and a few gulps later, she was satisfied with her drink. Well, it couldn't tempt her anymore anyway, since there wasn't any left. She was ready to go, and she started the car.
1111121111121111121.title: A regular day, some time later...

choices: Later that day...
What is that taste? Are these new donuts??
11111211111211111211.content:
Picking up her usual double serving of double-sized breakfast on the way, the sweet double-chinned Jenna continued on to the office. For someone like her with a clearly faulty curves-to-car size ratio, it wasn't a very comfortable experience. She and her humungous rear were both relieved as she pulled up at the company parking lot. Lifting herself out of the car, thick blubbery legs first followed by her mostly uncovered torso, her slabs of fat jiggling freely, Jenna then continued on to the other side of the car and grabbed her goods.

Jen couldn't avoid hungrily licking her lips as she thought of the food and pastries and all the other things she wanted to eat as she approached her desk. The smell of her delicious breakfast only made her even hungrier. She loved to eat and loved delicious food. She was never able to keep herself from eating and that was why she had promised herself to exercise. It was just too bad she had lost her step counter somewhere, she really needed to find it so that she could get back into that whole routine. Still, she'd been active(ish) for, like, more than a week before that little thing went missing, and for now she was happy to just indulge for a few days. Well, maybe a little more than a few days. Maybe a month.

It was completely obvious that Jenna's frame was putting an almost unbearable strain on her outfit. Her overwhelming abundance jiggled within her painted-on clothes every time she took another step. Everything was close to snapping off under the onslaught of pressure from her expansive mass. Her pale skin peeked out in several places, her shirt revealing massive cleavage as well as a good part of her impressive front rolls. Her incredibly thick back rolls were mostly covered, but the shirt was stretched so thin that the curves and folds were completely visible. Her ass created quite the shelf as it was sticking out behind her, swaying and wobbling and stretching her garments to the max as she waddled along the hall.

Finally she made it to the desk. Placing down her breakfast bags, she reached inside before she even had a chance to sit down. She leaned forward slightly, her belly flopping onto the desk as Jenna grabbed everything she wanted from inside the first bag (that is, everything inside the bag). It was all heavenly, Jen simply tasted and chewed and filled herself with food. She finished half her breakfast, and still hadn't sat down at her desk. She didn't think about it, she just kept eating, gorging like there was no tomorrow. Only as she consumed the final mouthful of her breakfast did she plant her massive rear on her office chair. Smiling, she licked her lips, scooped up a few remaining crumbs and finally turned towards her desk. It wasn't long before her hands were reaching for those irresistible donuts that were always lying around...
11111211111211111211.title: To the office!

choices: Jen heads home
Something happens on the way to her car
111112111112111112111.content:
Jen tugged at her top, trying to get it to at least go over the roll of fat hanging down in front of her bellybutton. She held her breath and pulled her shirt as far down as she could before letting go. It instantly rode up a little bit as her fingers let go, and the only reason Jenna could even notice it was because there was a mirror in front of her that let her see most of her upper body as it struggled to escape her clothes.
"Oh well. Just stay there, at least", she conceded. It wasn't perfect, but it was all she could do. She made one last check that her hair was alright and then got out of the restroom.

When Jenna arrived back at her desk, she was holding a half-eaten sticky pastry in one hand, and an identical but pristine pastry in the other, both of which she had picked up somewhere on the way from the restroom. She took another bite at the half-eaten one, tiny grains of sugar spilling into her exposed cleavage from the bun and her mouth. Further down her shirt had already ridden up to just as high as it was before, letting Jenna's rolls spill out into the open.

It was just about quitting time at the office. Jenna was already done for the day and ready to head home as soon as she finished off these last pastries. The first snack slowly disappeared into Jenna's mouth piece by piece and soon she started on the second one. While one hand was busy holding up the pastry, the other moved to her side, gently rubbing against her substantial love handles. She was pretty full already, but it was so good she just kept eating anyway until there was nothing left to eat.

Finally she started to waddle towards the elevator. Every step further strained her outfit as the excessively soft flesh covering her entire frame jiggled constantly. Her chest, her rolls and the huge globes of blubber behind her wobbled up, down and to the sides as much as the garments would let them. Her top was struggling to contain even the small part of Jen's curves that it was still holding on to. Her pants were so tight they were basically only making her skin a different color. Jenna's clothes were fighting a losing battle against her mounds of fat.

"Phew! It's so hot all of a sudden, what's up with that", Jenna panted as she forced herself the last few steps up to the elevator. She could have done anything for a cool breeze and wished in vain for a soda can or two. Just as she had stepped inside and was about to press the button, another figure hurried into the elevator behind her, squeezing itself into the space remaining next to Jenna.
"Thanks", she heard the figure mutter. She looked around: It was a guy, just some office worker. Not somebody Jenna knew in particular. Anyway, Jen hadn't even seen him coming, so he really didn't have to thank her for anything. She gave him a "you're welcome" smile anyway, and pressed the elevator button to get to the parking. He didn't move to press any other one. The elevator door closed, and as they did, he looked slightly towards her. He pointed to just below her face.
"Looks like you got something, um, right there". Jenna looked down. She spotted a piece of that pastry she had just been snacking on. Awkwardly, only a little bit was on her shirt, the majority of it lying on the uncovered part of her bulging, blubbery chest. She picked it up, accidentally causing her extra-extra-large boobs as well as her equally supersized rolls flop around slightly as her arm brushed against them.
"These are so good, I hope we get more of them. Like, seriously good", Jenna said mostly to herself. She couldn't stop herself from licking her lips and placing the unexpected piece of pastry in her mouth.

1111121111121111121111.content:
Jenna was rolling into a second month long break from her attempt at more excersize. She had lost her pedometer after a week of getting it, and with losing it she had lost her will to exercise. Now she was approaching 400 lbs, a new milestone for Jenna. Her eating hadn't slowed down and her daily routine was unchanged.

Later that day, after her awkward encounter on the elevator, Jenna arrived home, holding a bag of snacks that she has picked up that would not even last through the night. She plopped her bag down and started to do what had become natural, eat.

But as she bite into her first sugary treat, the weight of all the candy, sodas, and confections caused the bag to spill over and tumble all over the ground.

Now Jenna being her size wasn't accustom to having to bend over much, having a massive belly and giant jiggly boobs makes bending over quite a challenge. But we were talking about her nightly stash of food, she had to grab every last morsal.

Jenna started to bend over from her seated position on the couch. Something's had fallen in front of the couch, other under the coffee table, and just a few things had rolled under the couch. One by one she picked them up.

While grabbing the last few things from under the couch, Jenna had discovered a lithany of things hidden under there she had been to lazy to ever find or had lost. One of these treasures was her long lost pedomiter. It must have fallen under there one night after she checked her results and then started pigging out on her nightly snacks or plentiful dinner.

"Holy cow, that's where I lost this thing. Well I guess I should put it back on that way I can track my steps again." Jenna went to go put it back on her wrist but couldn't remember which one she had it on. "Left or right?" She settled on her right wrist, that felt more normal for her. She was able to fasten it around just the last loop hole. In reality it had been on her left wrist before, but she didn't notice a difference.

Jenna went on with her night, munching away, keeping her full form stuffed. Went to bed and welcomed a new day in the morning.

They bring trays of muffins and cookies, but its just a tedious walk from my desk when I'm already dragging during the 3 O'Clock hour.'

What had really happened was that when she found her pedometer the night before she had put it on her right hand instead of her left like it used to. 11111211111211111211111111.content:
The first day of the month Jenna's company brought all the employees interested in the health contest in for a weigh in. Jenna stood there with her peers as they all waited for the process to start. A lot of the other people she was with were also female, and most of them were pretty chubby and could afford to lose a few pounds. But no one compared to Jenna, she out sized the whole lot. Her big jiggly belly swished around as she shifted her weight from foot to foot as they waited. Jenna's only thought was that she should of had a few more donuts before she came down for this, she was getting quite peckish with all the waiting around.

Finally the weighing started. One by one they stepped on the scale, and their weight was recorded. When it was Jenna's turn she stepped on and looked down to see the numbers. There was too much Jenna in the way for her to see anything, but the guy next to her scratched down her weight, "Umm excuse me sir, I can't see. Can you tell me what the number is...?" She ask.

The attendant looked a little embarrassed to have to tell this woman who was so big her weight, but he played nice and told her what it was. "430." Jenna was ready for a large number, she knew she was extremely fat, but in her mind she was at least doing something about losing it. 'Not too bad' She thought to herself. 'Only can go down from here.' She continued in her head. 'I wonder how much I can lose in a month if I really put my mind to it. I have such an advantage over these other girls here, I bet I can lose 30 or more pounds, when they don't even have that much to lose.' Jenna took her confidence back to her desk where her donuts awaited her. She immediately started finishing the box. 'Not going to be a problem at all losing weight this next month.' As she stuck another creme filled treat in her mouth.

Jenna wanted to win the office contest, but she also didn't want to change her lazy gluttonous ways too much. So during the month of the contest she still ate everything and anything she wanted, stuffing her face all day and night. She did try and get in a little extra exercise though. She went out and bought some athletic shorts, and a sports bra, and tried to walk anywhere she could. She even passed up using the drive thru a few times, and instead walked inside to place her order. Of course her pedometer tracked all her steps and her eating.

All the extra exercise made Jenna even more ravenous for meals, causing her to order larger meals and pack it away at a ferocious rate. Her pedometer was reading out record break rates everyday. Jenna was very pleased with herself over the full month. She really thought she was making progress. That was until she had to go back for her final weigh in results to the end of the month. All the girls in the room were looking a little slimmer than last time. A month wasn't a lot of time to lose a lot of weight, but at least they were starting to make progress. This was true for everybody, but not Jenna. Jenna looked even more bloated than she did a month ago.

Jenna was beaming a large smile as she stepped on the scale, excited to hear how well she did. Her fat jiggled as her anticipation built. Still she was unable to read the numbers on the scale and had to ask the guy with the clip board what it said. Now he had no clue what her starting weight was since it was a different guy this time and he was just writing the new results, so he was unaware he was about to be giving bad news to Jenna.

He looked at her with a smile and said "450"

She didn't feel like she was eating much more than normal, and she was trying to get any extra steps in she could. Even her pedometer said she was doing well, clocking in 12,000 to 15,000 steps a day.

"And can I get your pedometer results? That's smart of you to have one, a lot of the contestants are missing out on bonus points by not keeping track of their workouts." Jenna didn't care she was utterly defeated. The guy plugged into Jenna wrist band and downloaded the results on to his computer and off she went.

'20 more pounds? I can't believe it. There is no way I'm going to win that cruise now. All those other girls at least lost weight. What was I thinking eating the way I did, I'm never going to lose weight if I keep eating like this. But I can't stop, my belly is always craving food, and the good stuff too. Biting into those sugary donuts in the morning is such a sweet release. I can't start my day without them. And my morning burrito bag fills me with energy for the day. All that grease and meat just makes that emptiness in my stomach disappear. And sitting at my desk, I'd be famished if I didn't have treats to eat all day. By dinner time I'm in need of a pizza or takeout or I'll be starving by bed. And I can't help myself at the grocery store, every flavor of ice cream looks good, and all the freshly baked sweets are irresistible. My mouth just waters until I buy it all. Even now I'm craving for lunch and it's only 11 o'clock. I think I'll slip out now so I can have some extra time at McDonald's, I really need a nice large meal right now.'

The counsel of three behind the employee health contest sat in their office in a dark drab corner of the large office building. They correlated all the results in a large spreadsheet and two names rised to the top, Jenna and Kendra. Kendra was one of the over achievers in Jenna's department. It was no surprise she put her all into the company contest.

"But she is the clear winner." One of the judges said.

"But she didn't even lose any weight." Another counter argued.

"On our scale Jenna scored the most points. She may not have gotten any points for weight loss but she got 23 in the exercise catagoy, which puts her way over Kendra who only got 15 for weight loss and submitted no exercise totals." Very unlike Kendra to not submit her exercise totals.

The argument raged on between the three of them on who deserved to win. But they finally came to their verdict. The announced it later that day in an email. "Our congratulations to Jenna in finance for winning the healthiest employee of the month awarded. As token of our accomplishment you are getting two weeks paid vacation to take an all expenses paid cruise."

Jenna was shocked as she read the email. The bearclaw almost fell out of her hand. "I'm the healthiest employee of the month? Wow all that exercise really paid off." She said to herself and she took another bite of her pastry. "I guess I been on the right path all this time."

Jenna continued to read the email and saw she had to head down to HR to retrieve her prize and head out on her vacation.
1111121111121111121111111111.title: The deliberation on the winner is not easy behi...

choices: Jenna catches some rays on the ship deck
Jenna finds an interesting game room with some interesting games
11111211111211111211111111111.content:
The 450lb bombshell Jenna had arrived for her cruise. Adorned in a big floppy sun hat and a tropical blouse she was ready to hit the tropics from the seat on the deck. She rolled her bags along the long hallway to her cozy room. "This is going to be the best two weeks ever." As she made herself at home the came a knocking at her door.

When she opened it there was a young thin girl wearing a cruise employee uniform. "Hello Miss Jenna, I'm Nicky, your cruise adventure assistant. I'm here to get you anything you need. Sun block, activities schedule, or even a nice meal, anything you want just ask. It seems like all your purchases are comped so don't even worry about the price. Anything I can get for you." Jenna being a very fat woman was feeling quite peckish so decided to start with some food.

"Do you mind bringing me the desert menu?"

"Certainly!" Nicky said enthusiasticly. Nicky rushed off and Jenna went back about her business. A moment later another knock came across the door.

Jenna opened it to see Nicky pushing two large carts. "What's all this, I didn't even order anything yet." She asked as Nicky rolled the two carts into Jenna suite.

"I thought you wanted the whole desert menu? That's what you asked for." Nicky said with a puzzling look on her face.

"No no I wanted to look at the desert menu, not order the whole thing."

"Well I can't take these back..."

"Not a problem leave them here."

"Great! And if you need anything else just give me a holler." And with that Jenna was left alone with trays and trays if sweets. Jenna didn't mind she was used to eating large and especially sweets. She ate most of them before stashing a few for later and headed out for her next adventure.
11111211111211111211111111111.title: Jenna fully relaxes on the cruise

choices: Jenna eats the day away
Jenna gets drunk
111112111112111112111111111111.content:
Jenna waddled out of her posh quarters wearing a new tropical outfit she had purchased for this occasion. It fit her well despite Jenna being at her biggest of all time. The fresh sea air felt great, and the sun rays were warming.

Jenna found a nice lounge chair along the outside of the desk and began her relaxation. Jenna really wanted to relax with these two weeks she had off. Her life had been so stressful recently and a little mellowing was just what she needed. With all of her recent weight gain, attempts at exercising, her faltering on appitite control, and then this company health initiative, it was just all so stressful. Jenna just wanted to not have any worries on this trip, and that included about not worrying about a what went in her mouth. Thankfully her employer saw her as the healthiest employee so that made her feel even better about putting her eating habits on auto pilot this vacation.

Jenna sat reclined, letting the sun illuminate any of her exposed skin. Jenna's ponderous belly spilled all around her. Not only did it heave outward it popped into her lap and out above her hips. It was hard to see though over her well exposed melons. The top she had bought gave the girls plenty of room to breath and ripen in the sun. Her prize winning cans were so big they hid the true size of her belly, and they were also so wide they bounced off her ham hock sized arms.

It wasn't long though until a server came by to check on the lonely Jenna. "Anything I can get you ma'am?" Said a deck hand with a smile. "Might I suggest our bottomless frozen margarita along with an appetizer sampler?"

Jenna liked the sound of that and a moment later the boy was walking back with a huge margarita and a trolly of food. "Here you are ma'am, a frozen margarita and a sample of all 42 of our amazing appetizers."

Jenna was a little shocked again by the volume of food presented to her, but again wasn't going to let it bother her. "Wow you guys really take your grub seriously here." Jenna said as she took her first sip of the sweet margarita.

After making sure Jenna was all set the boy left to go back to work, and Jenna dug right in. Plate after plate started clearing off, and Jenna knew he said these were sample sizes, but to her they all seemed like full sized dishes. Jenna did what she did best though, eat to her hearts content. All the while washing it all down with her tasty frozen margarita.

The margarita was quite large but Jenna was making short work of it. As Jenna tipped the last of it into her mouth, and giving her large belly a satisfying short unconscious rub. As this was happening the deck boy was quickly approaching with another drink.

Handing her a nice new full drink and taking the sticky remains of the last one, all he said was, "I told you they were bottomless." He said with a wink. Jenna didn't think much of it, as a refill was going to be necessary if she needed it to wash down the rest of this food.
111112111112111112111111111111.title: Jenna catches some rays on the ship deck

choices: Jenna's dinner is much more than she expected
Jenna eats so much she gets stuck in her chair
1111121111121111121111111111111.content:
Jenna was perfectly happy to munch all day long, and so she did. There was no lack of deck hands or waitresses ready to take her order or bring her a refill. All the way until dinner Jenna had her fill. But seeing as how the hour had grown late Jenna decided she needed a real sit down meal, not just all these snacks. Slow maneuvering her bulky rolls for her deck chair, Jenna made the arduous decision to get up from her seat. Over the course of several hours she had slowly sank deeper and deeper into the stretchy material of the deck chair. Putting her soft hand on the metallic edge of the chair she slow hoisted her self up. Jenna had become accustomed to these tasks that had become more difficult in recent months, and paid no mind to the fact that it was all the calories going between her lips that was doing all this damage to her waistline.

Jenna was much happier to eat first and ask questions later. That is why she was waddling to the nearest, tastiest restaurant she could find. With a big smile on her face she walked up to the hostess, announcing she needed a table for one. The flabby vacationer looked happy as can be as the hostess went and prepared a table for her, returning only a moment later to lead her to said table. Jenna sat down on what felt like quite a roomie chair. At this point she had gotten used to her extra girth not fitting in between the lines of most chairs, but this one seemed more than well equipped her handle her ample backside and flared out thighs.

Jenna started flipping through the menu, but her waiter was quick to the table. "Good evening madam, how are you this evening? Can I get you started with a drink?"

"Yes please! I've been enjoying margaritas all day, so I'll have one of those."

"Good choice madam. And for your meal, are you ready to order?" Jenna gave the boy a blank stare as she had only just leafed through the menu and had not really even read any of the menu items. "Might I recommend our multi course dinner meal? It takes the pressure off and allows you to enjoy the finer items on the menu. First you will be treated to a trio of our favorite appetizers, then for the main course you will be served our house specials from the menu as well as a taste of the chefs special of the evening. To finish things off and cleanse the palate dessert will be served."

"Wow that sounds amazing, and easy. I'll take it!" The waiter smiled as he retrieved her menu before leaving to put the order in. Jenna rubbed her ginormous tummy underneath her taxed sundress as she eagerly awaited her meal. Jenna was such a hog couldn't even rationalize how poorly her eating habits were, or how badly the wait staff here was exploiting her endless appetite. What they didn't know is that Jenna's employer was footing the bill for all her extra amenities, so she didn't give it a second thought when ever a delicious drink or menu item was presented to her.
1111121111121111121111111111111.title: Jenna eats the day away

choices: The next day her travel assistant checks in
Jenna grows at a rapid rate during the cruise
11111211111211111211111111111111.content:
The waiter returned quickly with Jenna margarita and followed that up by bringing her three appetizers. Jenna was expecting a small plate with a trio of appetizers, but what she got was three full sized apps. Jenna never turned down a tasty plate of food though, so she went ahead and started to make quick work of the beginning of her meal.

When the appetizers were done her first entre hit the table, the house special Chicken Alfredo Fettuccine. Jenna was quick to start slurping up the cheese covered noodles, dipping the accompanying breadsticks in the left over sauce as the plate emptied. As she finished that a plate of Chicken Parmigiana was slid in front of her. The breaded chicken slid right down her throat, and the tomato sauce was to die for. She made sure to get every last spec of sauce off the plate before it was cleared away and replaced with large serving of Shrimp Scampi. Jenna was surprised that another entree was coming out, she thought her meal only came with two specials, little did she know she had only made it on to the house specials on the menu, she hadn't yet seen the nightly specials from the chef. After the Shrimp Scampi came the last house special, a piece of grilled salmon drizzled with a reduced sauce.

"Mmm." Jenna purred as her waiter came to take her finished plate. "That was so good. Thank you for the recommendation." Jenna said to her waiter as she rubbed her filling belly.

"I'm glad you are liking it so far. Next up we have the chef specials." He said as a bus boy holding a large tray came to stand beside him.

"You mean there is more?" Jenna was puzzled, and concerned as she was already feeling full after a long day of eating.

"Yes of course. First we have the chefs lobster stuffed baked haddock in lobster sauce. We also have fresh and fried scallops from the sea in a lemon ginger sauce." The bus boy was taking the plates off his tray and was putting them in a semi circle in front of Jenna on the table. "Lastly we have the chefs prime rib, with his special steak sauce with a sides of mashed potatoes and corn. Enjoy." Both boys left and Jenna could do nothing but dig in.

The rotund woman worked her way from plate to plate shoveling the calorie rich food past her lips. Her belly swelled as she filled it to capacity. Her sundress stretched to its limits as it tried to contain her enormous girth, flabby rolls looking to escape from all angles. Jenna remained the eating champ she had been all these months, lot letting a single thing go to waste that was put before her. Jenna needed to lean back in her steady chair and take a breath. She let her stomach spill as much as it needed to into her lap. The big eater was starting to get red in the face from how over full she was.

"Are we ready for dessert?" Jenna had not noticed that her waiter had returned and already cleared off her table.

"Oh no I couldn't I'm so full."

"But madam, what am I supposed to do with all these desserts?" He gestured to the two full trays propped up next to Jenna's table. "I know I'll have someone send them to your room."

Relived she didn't have to eat those desserts right now, Jenna let out a huff before answering. "That sounds good." Jenna said like she about the slip into a food coma. Jenna billed the meal to her room, and slowly started to waddle in the direction of her bed. She made it to her room, and the first thing she noticed were all the desserts had been dropped off.

Jenna collapsed on her bed, the massive belly heaving up and down and she took deep breaths. She closed her eyes for ten minutes before sitting back up and reaching for the closest dessert to her. An hour later all of the dessert trays were empty and Jenna was soundly sleeping in her bed.
11111211111211111211111111111111.title: Jenna's dinner is much more than she expected

choices: Jenna needs breakfast before starting her day, right now!
Jenna gets cleaned up, and picks out an outfit for the long day.
111112111112111112111111111111111.content:
Jenna woke up the next morning after tossing and turning for a few hours. She was on vacation, there was no rush to get up in the morning, other than her empty stomach that urged to be filled.

But rather than her stomach, it was a knock at the door that got Jenna out of bed. Opening the cabin door she was greeted by her ever cheerful travel assistant Nicky.

"Good morning Miss Jenna!" Nicky chirped in her typical positive tone. "I sure do hope you are enjoying yourself during your stay here. I wanted to stop by and see how you are doing? Anything you need?"

Jenna stood there puzzled as she had been put on the spot. The only thing that came to mind was a good meal to start the day. "What time is it? Are they still serving breakfast?" Jenna asked rubbing her eyes followed up with rubbing her belly.

"Of course. It's only 10am, but we serve breakfast at all hours of the day. Never know when you're gonna want a stack of flapjacks at three in the afternoon." Nicky said jokingly with a wink while nudging her elbow into Jenna's pillowy belly. "We also have some fun activities happening today if you're interested in hearing about those." She asked making the statement sound like a question.

"Sure!" Jenna enthusiastically replied.

"Well we are having a beach side bbq party up at the main pool starting at 11. After that there is a pie eating contest at the tree house play zone at 3. At 4 there is a mixed drink class, where you get to learn how to make, and then sample all our signature drinks. 5 o'clock kicks off chefs Antonio's cuisine around the world event at his restaurant, where you can try dishes from around the globe. 8pm is the start of our s'mores bar on the top floor deck, where you get to watch the sun set and try a variety of amore combinations. Finally the last thing, for the late night crowd is the ice cream sundae bar at 10 tonight. It's right around the corner from your room here, and it's all you can eat ice cream with every topping imaginable. Does any of that sound interesting to you?"

Jenna's frail mind was overloaded by options. She was hungry enough to eat an elephant, and all of these food based activities sounded delightful. They sounded like they were all over the ship, and how was she going to remember when and where each one was. Nicky could tell she was struggling.

"And if you are interested in all the activities, may I offer you a crew lead tour for the day? That is where a crew member leads guests from one activity to the next, keeping everyone on time, and getting them to the right places. Today's is called the food tour, and I can sign you up if you're interested."

Jenna almost begged to have Nicky sign her up, there was no way she could remember all those activities. Also it would be fun to be in a tour group and meet some other folks. "Yes, please sign me up."

"Great! Then I'll be back in 45 minutes to bring you to your first activity!" With all that sorted out, Nicky closed the door, leaving Jenna alone again.
111112111112111112111111111111111.title: The next day her travel assistant checks in

choices: Watch Jenna from throughout the tour.
Skip Jenna through this tour to its very direct aftermath.
1111121111121111121111111111111111.content:
Quickly Jenna had used a special remote on her beside table to call Ms. Nicky back in. Quickly Nicky came on back inside her room.

“Yes Jenna?” Asked Nicky.

“Well I would actually like the breakfast menu in lots of it all first before knowing about the first activities.” Answered Jenna as she had rubbed her belly eagerly.

“Alright O Miss Jenna. Quickly I shall bring it all in right away.” Said Nicky and whilst with that, she had rushed out quite quickly and like with the last time that she had been asked for something by the quite very fat woman, she had delivered huge trays of each of all the whole entire breakfast menu in quite enormous quantities of it all and all whilst with variously vastly good qualities about all of it, and this had yet again here left Miss Jenna very surprised yet considering her enormous appetite feeling all of the more hungry and very quite eager. Therefore Jenna had quickly rubbed her huge belly very all off the more eagerly. Furthermore Jenna saw that these included most especially various and quite so here literally so enormous tons of waffles and pancakes most especially including chocolate chip flavoured types. Indeed Jenna had really struggled to refrain whilst from drooling as she saw this.

“Well O Miss Jenna, please so do enjoy it all. Meanwhile I will be right back albeit again in forty five minutes to ensure you have what you need for activities etc,.” Stated Nicky.

“Thanks Nicky.” Replied Jenna as her assistant left her room.

And The Hungry Jenna has eagerly ensured to begin to dig all in.

First Jenna got to her cereals, her scrambled eggs, omelettes, her breakfast potatoes and bacon and then everything else up to her waffles and pancakes, all of which she poured lots of syrup onto all whilst in ways that surprisingly enough even for her made no messes on her bed or her clothing.

As Jenna ate them all up, her belly grew several times as big and now turned into a humongous single entity of a spare tire rather than multiple rolls, and after the last of them all she then gulped down to wash it all down gallons of milk that went with it all and again all whilst without making a mess of her bed or even her clothing for that matter.

Somehow Jenna did not feel full yet, yet not surprisingly so, considering her appetite’s so incredibly very quite seemingly insatiable nature.

Still Jenna had seen to it that she had rubbed her filling and as well as becoming quite increasingly packed and bulging belly. Afterwards Jenna, with a struggle albeit not long, got herself off of her bed. Afterwards Jenna showered and cleaned up and put on an outfit like the kind she wore upon starting up here her occurring vacation, albeit fitting around her body and quite stretchy in material yet also slightly and becoming increasingly quite super snug as well. Soon Nicky came in carrying the list of activities for Miss Jenna thus here to be a part of from throughout this day, and whilst by then, the fat woman herself thus got herself all completely ready whilst for this day.

And Jenna also right by your room’s door you can head and see an upcoming group for today’s food tour heading on up to ready for the described bbq event up at 11:00 AM, which is fifteen minutes from the current time here.” Explained Nicky who had then left the room yet again. Afterwards Jenna had held the list in her hands whilst waddling on out of her room. And Jenna clearly saw the group coming up, and she with a brief struggle considering how most of the line was thin and skinny got behind the line itself, yet she had still followed it, discreetly proceeding whilst in excitement thus so all here to have rubbed her belly as she had examined her list: -
