”

And Jenna had indeed whilst looking at this here so really struggled to refrain whilst from any drooling as she really quite eagerly rubbed her belly.
1111121111121111121111111111111111.title: Breakfast Time all for Miss Jenna...........

choices: It's full of food eating contests for big money
It's full of casino games, but you gamble with your weight.
111112111112111112111111111112.content:
Jenna lumbered down the deck of the boat, taking in all the sights. She still couldn't fathom that this was real and she had won a free paid cruise and vacation time too boot.

After walking for a bit, sorry waddling for a bit, Jenna had turned a corner and started down a hallway that looked different from anything she had seen yet. When she got to the end of the hallway there was only a set of double doors with a sign above them that read game room.

As Jenna read this she just though it would be those standard video games you find parked on the corner or a hotel usually by the laundry, so she thought she would poke her head it and just look around, like she had been doing.

Jenna opened the doors and walked in, but what she found she was not expecting.
111112111112111112111111111112.title: Jenna finds an interesting game room with some ...

choices: "Why not?" She enters the gym.
"Nah. Pizza trumps Gym." She goes on to the Pizza Place.
1111121111121111122.content:
The loud, blaring alarm buzzed noisily in her ear. Jenna awoke, shutting off her alarm clock, and she got out of bed, shuffling to her kitchen. She fried up a sausage patty, popped a waffle in her toaster, and munched down on her breakfast. The blubbery blonde finished quickly, and slid into her overly-tight Exercise apparel: Some Nike shorts that clung skin-tight to her legs and puffed out her thighs and giving her stomach a slight muffin top. She slid on her Tank Top, which was also about as skin-tight, and made her breasts hang awkwardly over her exposed belly-button. She filled her Water-Bottle and nodded to herself. "Let's go."

The blubbery, obese woman's stomach jiggled and shook as her Tank-Top rode up as she stepped down the steps. It went by like a breeze, going down. Motivation surged her brain. I can do this, the fitness thing is a breeze. Why didn't I get on this before? YOU HEAR THAT, TUMMY! You're about to DIE! She got to the bottom, and her phone pinged, she looked at it. 'Go back up.' She turned back up to the stairs, and spoke to herself. "Okay, can't be too hard."

Wrong.

Each step was a struggle, but somehow a bit less hard than before. Was she improving? This gave her a bit of hope, though she still chugged on her water bottle. She stepped up and up, as she reached the seventh floor, the sweat emerged from every orifice: Her tank-top had ridden up and become a sports bra, her whole belly on show. Her hair dripped sweat like raindrops. She felt considerably tired as she returned back to her floor, and sat for a bit. She felt relieved. This was it.

After the sweat had started chilling her body, she was barraged with pings of her phone reminding her to get back down there. After refilling her water bottle, she got going down, and emerged from her building. The outside street was bustling and hustling with businessmen, construction workers, and teens in hoodies. The skyscrapers gleamed with a special light as she walked, drawing quite a bit of attention. Out of her peripheral vision, she caught a man glancing at her butt. She got a bit of a smirk. Even when I'm a whale, I can catch some eyes. Imagine how many I'll catch when I'm thin. The end of the walk showed promise, as she remembered there was a BOMB pizza buffet at the end of her route.

Her travel brought her to a 3-story building she'd never quite noticed before, titled: 'Debbie's Gym'. It had big, blacked-out windows, on all floors but the lobby. In the lobby sat a slender, short little woman with her hair worn in a messy bun atop her head. She'd brought her wallet with her and she thought. All these years of working out alone never worked. She'd always dropped out. Would the gym work? After some pondering...
1111121111121111122.title: Progress.

choices: Picking up the knife and some veggies. She cooks herself a healthy supper.
Taking out the cold pizza from the fridge. She eats fattening foods for supper.
11111211111211111221.content:
She approached the door, still a bit timid. She'd never seen the inside of a gym, neverless worked out in one. What would happen? Would there be cameras snapping pictures of her, making fun of her? Would they turn her away for being too fat? Would she have to weigh-in on national television? It was scary until she heard the little voice in the back of her head, telling her "Go, do it." She entered.

The little electronic 'Deet-doot' alarmed as she entered, greeted by the woman. "Hi! How can I help you!" She spoke, taking a stab in the dark at the alarming, dark pool of the gym world. "Yeah, uh, how much does it cost to join this gym?" The woman replied rapidly, shooting back "Oh, normally it's about a 45 buck membership, but we're running a New Year's Special, only 20 bucks if you join now." Jenna reached into her pocket. "Uh, alright. How much for a first-time entry?" The young little thin woman lit up. "Oh, it's free for your first time visiting." Jenna nodded. "Then, I'd like to come in on a first time entry."

The young little woman spryly hopped up from her chair and strode towards the door. "Sure thing! Just follow me. You're gonna LOVE it, the people here are so nice." She opened the vast portal into the new world, and there was a symphony of sounds: The plodding of feet and the humming of treadmill belts, the loud, exerting noises of bulky bodybuilders lifting the big, black, blocky weights, and the clinking of said weights clacking against each other. "Have fun!" said the small, thin girl as she dissapeared behind the door.

Whelp, no going back now.

Jenna stood like a deer in the headlights, walking awkwardly towards a strange machine with tall handles and footpads raised from the ground. She stepped onto it and tapped at the console on it. She tapped at the big green 'Quick Start' button. Nothing in particular happened. She noticed that the screen had shut down. She hit it again, as her feet began slipping. The footpads rose and fell, and she was happy that she was holding onto one of the bars. This time, she noticed the screen was still on. She entered her weight into the console: 385. She noticed a variety of numbers, something about calories, heart rate, time spent on the machine, and how long it would take until she would have walked a mile.

She pumped it, and the dynamic actually worked rather well for her. As she pumped the handlebars, her legs were able to rest a little, and after this, her arms were able to rest. Before she knew it, the machine had hit 7 minutes and she was parched and her legs were tired. She stepped off the machine as the screen went dark. She rested on a nearby bench, with a convenient long, iron bar for a back.

Before long, she was approached by a buff man, looking rather confused. "Uh.. How long until you finish your set?" Jenna looked confusedly at the man. "Uh..Set of what?" The man chuckled a bit. "I take it you're a first-timer, then. A set's a session of time you use the bench." Jenna looked at the round black wheels with open holes down the middle sitting on racks nearby. "Ooooooh. So that's what this is, I thought it was just a place to sit." The man smiled and spoke. "What's your name?" Jenna replied slowly. "Uhhhh...Jenna, Jenna Mossberg." The man nodded. "I'm Dave. Dave Williams, nice to meet you."

The bodybuilder shook her hand briskly."So you're here to start your fitness journey?" Jenna chortled a little nervously. "Yeah, heh-heh, funny story about that, I actually got stuck in a door at work." The bodybuilder shook his head. "Man. Glad I never got that big. Well, you're doing something about it now." Jenna spoke. "Yeah, I've been trying for a bit, but nothing's been working. I just can't lose weight, no matter how hard I work out." Dave replied, rubbing his stubbled chin. "Well, have you changed your diet?" Jenna looked confusedly at him. "Does that help?" Dave laughed. "Does it help? Of course it does! It's the main way you lose weight, you can't out-exercise a bad diet." Jenna spoke inquisitively. "So, what is a good diet?" Dave spoke. "Veggies, no fast food, holding back on what you eat."

After some consideration, Jenna spoke. "Wow. That sounds hard, I'd need somebody to help." Dave smirked. "Funny you mention that. I happen to be a personal trainer. I normally charge, but you, I can see that you require some special help. I'll help you out for free for a bit." Jenna quietly thanked god that she'd made the decision to go to the gym. "Well, want to get started?" inquired Dave. Jenna nodded her head, and followed the man.

She left the gym satisfied, turning to the woman as she left, placing the 20 bucks on the counter. "I'm ready for that membership." She got her card, walked out the door, and walked home. As she climbed the stairs to her apartment, utterly spent, she noticed a gnawing hunger at her stomach. She considered Dave's words, and weighed it against her hunger. She ended up...
11111211111211111221.title: A brave new world.

choices: One month later, she's stuck with it, and made progress.
One month later, she's dropped out of it. She's backtracked.
111112111112111112211.content:
She woke up the next morning, a sunday, strangely more energized. After supper she had looked up healthy recipies for breakfast and lunch, She had a bowl of Granola cereal with fruit chopped up and sparsed inbetween, and whole-grain pancakes. She was happy about it, she felt like she would make some genuine progress today. She plowed through her breakfast, which actually felt filling, she felt stuffed. After her energizing breakfast, she got up from the table, and got down the stairs.

She walked over to the gym, swiped her card in the gym door, and entered the door. She saw the familiar figure of Dave standing near the weight benches, who turned and waved his bulky arm at her. "Jen! Good morning!" She met up with him, and hugged him. "Good morning, Dave! How've you been?" Dave waved his hands either which way. "Eeh, so and so, but Pre-Workout kicked in, so I'm ready!" Jenna nodded. "What first, today?" Dave spoke. "Get on that elliptical, and try upping the level a little bit."

Jenna hopped on the elliptical, and this time, she had a bit more pump in her step, though the difficulty was increased, she was able to get going like a professional. She didn't feel sluggish in any sense of the word. Though about 6 minutes in she started slacking, Dave spoke words of encouragement to her. "Get going! You got this! BURN that fat! You've got a new you in the carving! Go, go!" She toned in, and got going. She ignored the riding up of her shirt, and kept going, in a zen-like state of workout, it was exclusively her and the machine. They were one, brothers, of the same material. By the time her bodily limits had kicked in, and she had looked down, the time read: 20:01, and the calories burned read "100." Dave patted her on the back. "Good freakin' job, girl! I knew you could do it! You did it!"

As the two relaxed, and cooled down, Jenna spoke. "Yeah, dave, I feel like I'm doing good, but is there anything else that can help me out?" Dave spoke. "Oh, yeah, we've got all kinds of classes. Pilates, Yoga, Tae-Kwon-Do, Spin..." Jenna interrupted him. "What's spin?" Dave smiled. "It's crazy, it's like a biking class, you get on exercise bikes, do all kind of stuff on them." Jenna spoke. "How do you get in it?" "Well, pay 5 bucks per class, and make sure to bring plenty of water." Jenna took note. "And when does it happen?" "Oh, about 5:00." The two finished their session with a bit more weight-lifting, Jenna hit 50 as her benching max.

As 5:00 rolled around, Jenna had returned. She had a healthy lunch at the attached Healthy Life cafe, where members ate free. She had her water bottle filled up, and she entered the second floor. The platform was full of Exercise bikes, with a thin woman on the bike facing everyone. Each bike had a little slot on the front, each one seemed to hold water bottles. Jenna filed in with the program, and took her seat. The woman engaged the music. As jenna took a look around, she noticed a variety of women. Some seemed like seasoned bikers, but this class had a good majority of heavier women like her.

The instructor began. "Alright, so, welcome to cycling class. We've got some among us who are new here, but that's okay, everyone's got to start somewhere. We're gonna start off normal pace, so find something that works for you." Jenna began pedaling. The slots that held her feet in place were very useful, as they prevented her from slipping off. Things were rather nice, and the instructor kicked it into full gear. "Alright, everybody, sprints for 30 seconds. Get those legs MOVING! You can do this!" She felt winded as she started doing it. She resisted the temptation for reaching for her water bottle. As the 30 seconds came to an end, the instructor repeated the cycle: Intervals of rest, followed by brief, intense spots of activity.

Though hindered, Jenna found out something amazing to her. Some girls actually sounded more winded than she felt. She felt that this couldn't be. She was a whale, a blubberly tub of lard, how the hell could someone be less in shape than her? This gave her even more motivation, as she found new wind to keep going. As the intervals came to an end, the instructor spoke again. "Alright, everybody, standing up! Keep pedaling, you want that thin body! Get rid of that fat! You got this!" Jenna felt a bit winded. The instructor had them staying up. The heavier women rested for intervals. Jenna felt empowered. She wasn't the least fit person in the class. She had this.

The class descended to hell. The instructor had them squatting with their butt facing the wall, jenna sweated through it, but sweat she did. It felt like she was giving the bike a shower. But she kept going. She even heard people stopping their bikes entirely. This was incredible. As the workout powered down, and they relaxed with some easy stretches, everyone else seemed dead. But not her. She was on top of the world, nothing could stop her. As she chugged her water like she had never seen a drop of liquid, she walked out of the gym, walking towards her home. She was satisfied.
111112111112111112211.title: Noticeable progress.

choices: Her friends agree, and a year later, most have stuck with it.
Her friends disagree, and a year later, Jenna starts slacking.
1111121111121111122111.content:
Jenna awoke in the morning, another weekend. She rolled out of bed in her spry form, walking towards the bathroom, wondering how this day would be. It had been a month now. All her co-workers had viewed her rather strangely as she had cut out of the usual office routines. No more fattening sessions in the break room. No more sitting at her desk in her spare time. No more fattening girl's nights out. She was proud of herself, and she had plans to try to help her friends live a longer, healthier life with her. She stepped onto the electronic scale, as numbers flashed by.

Eventually the three dots came about, and then a number: 290. She had lost 95 pounds, she almost jumped for joy, fist-pumping in joy and in delight. She had done it, she'd made actual progress. She'd come a long way from the lethargic, morbidly obese hog she was before. She was still obese, but now she was on the road to health, to being thinner, hell, possibly, maybe, going all the way to THIN. She was so excited, she couldn't wait to tell dave. She whipped up her breakfast, ate it, and jogged down to the gym. She'd made that change a while ago. She greeted dave with nearly an embrace. "Dave, I weighed myself this morning. Guess how much I've lost?" Dave stood puzzlingly, smirking a little. "How much?" "Nine. Zero." He fist-bumped her. "Hell yeah! I You got this! All you had to do was change your diet and you did it!"

Jenna spoke. "And, for all this help..." She handed him a wad of cash. "Naw. Your success is all I need. Besides, the gym's had a boost. People noticed you getting thinner, and they want in. We're getting rediculous amounts of new members." After this, they went on to the cardio and a bit of lifting. The elliptical had now grown to know her rather well, and today she went not 7, not 20, but 45 minutes straight on it. She was a fitter fat girl than most of the thin girls in her office. She lifted, today, not 50, but 75. One month, and she'd gotten fit. But that's not all, she wanted more. She knew it.

She got a call as she finished her 2 hour sesh at the gym: It was Jessica. "Hey, Jen! I know we don't see you much anymore, but I thought we could meet up at the Pizza Parlor!" She nodded, smiling. "Sure! Meet you there!" She hung up and got walking to the Parlor. As the girls pulled up, it was obvious that they weren't on the same program. Melissa and Alice were twin blimps, seeming to fatten each day. Alice had to be at least almost 400, her stomach starting to peek over even the expansive sweater, Melissa wearing her usual T-shirt that she wore on the weekends. Lucielle and Ashley were both sneaking up on 300, swelling balloons of stomachs that were embraced tightly by green blouses. The girls sat down to a parlor table, and they ordered one big pepperoni Pizza. Jenna decided to use this as her one cheat meal.

She slowly waited as the conversation started sliding. "Yeah, oh my god, anyone else remember when the Elevator broke down the other day?" A collective groan came from the table. "Oh jesus, I hated that day. I, like, DIED that day." intoned Jessica. Melissa gave a similar nod. "Oh shit yeah, that was terrible. I had to sit in the break room for, like, an HOUR to catch my breath." Alice spoke. "Mm. Not as bad as the other day. I was visiting my Parents for christmas, and all they did was guilt me about my weight. Mom literally weighed me, took my blood pressure. She told me that I'm about to die because of it. I don't know, I might do it just to make them shut up." Jenna spoke. "Well, if you wanted to, the gym I'm at is very welcoming." Melissa spoke. "Man, I would work out, but, I don't know, I love food too much." The rest of the whales nodded in intonement. "Well, on the diet I've been on, I've been eating a crazy amount of stuff, man. Just different stuff. Like, when you eat like that, you feel SO much more energized." Alice spoke. "You know what, why not?" Melissa sighed. "Damn you alice, now I gotta go." Alice shook her head. "You don't GOT to-" Melissa cut her off. "Hell yes I do. If you're gonna suffer, I gotta suffer with you. We're friends for a reason." The girls mutually agreed: They'd all visit the gym tomorrow.

The next day they'd come in their best exercise attire. A good amount of it was horridly ill-fitting. Jessica's literally only covered her breasts, stretched tight like a drum across it. Dave spoke. "So, you're Jen's friends?" They all nodded. "Mmm-hmm." Dave spoke. "So, I'm gonna help you guys out. I'm Dave. Say Hi, Dave." They all chuckled and spoke. "Hi, Dave." They were stunned. What were they to do? Dave eventually lead them to the Treadmills. "Good thing you guys got here early, these things are usually full in the mornings." They each climbed aboard, and after some brief instruction, they got walking. Each picked a walking pace, Jenna stayed there with them. Dave encouraged them to pick up the pace, and as the 5 minute mark approached, a majority of them were done, and so they dropped off. Dave kept working with them. He gave them the same talk he gave Jenna: Fix your diet, or the exercise won't work. As her friends left, Jenna spoke to them. "Alright guys. You in this with me? Ready to change?" Her friends deliberated. Eventually...
1111121111121111122111.title: Actual loss.

choices: "Alright. I promise I'll do better." Jessica picks up her performance.
"I'm sorry, I can't." Jessica and the rest quit, Jenna has second thoughts.
11111211111211111221111.content:
"Come on! You got this!"

The instructor was leading the charge. Today, Jenna was on the front row, beside Melissa and Alice, both sweating it out beside her. Both had to have dropped to about 340 by year's end. Progress, but still a ways to go. They had stayed up to standard on their diets, for the most part. There were a few weeks where they slipped, but Jenna kept them on track by the next week. At this point it had started to grow as a habit on them. Less enjoying of it, however, was Jess. She was a problem for Jenna, always slipping off diet, and it was a struggle to keep her on board. She hadn't lost but barely 2 pounds since she had committed, mostly due to her terrible diet. And she had a bad reputation of having WEEKS where she'd skip gym. She was barely hanging on and, if Jenna didn't start getting on her, Jess would be back on track for unhealthiness.

The cycling class was kicking everyone's ass. The instructor had noticed the improvements in most of them, and had stepped up the regimen. However, it was absolute torture on poor jessica, who was barely hanging onto the bike, especially in the standing segments. Sooner or later, the class came to an end. Jessica stepped off the bike first, chugging her "water" bottle, which was orange to the point where it looked suspiciously like Orange Soda. They walked down, and Melissa spoke first and foremost, wiping her sweaty forehead. "God. That one was absolute insanity, wasn't it?" She had one rather well, surprisingly well for a woman of her gluttony. She seemed to have taken to the meal plan headily, mostly because it meant MORE eating, simply just different things. Alice had continued on a similar path, and she had stuck with the regime. "Yeah. The instructor was going CRAZY today. I dunno how I kept up." Jenna spoke. "Well, you did it, that's all that matters." Jessica was too worn out for words. She hopped into her car and drove off, Melissa and Alice went jogging away, waving a farewell at Jenna. "See ya!"

Jenna waved her farewells and jogged home. In her mind now, however, was the conundrum of how to fix Jessica. She sincerely wanted Jessica to succeed and didn't want to see her recede into her lethargic, piggy ways. She had her supper: A grilled chicken marinated in olive oil, with sauteed mushrooms, and she went to bed. Jenna awoke for work the next morning, and had a plan together. Through text co-ordination, she had planned to take Jessica to Healthy Life for lunch, instead of her usual fast-food greasepit. She took the stairs, and got to work. When lunchtime rolled around, she met up with the others, and they gathered around Jess's cubicle. As the signal was given, Jenna walked in. "Hey, Jess!" The lardy office worker turned around, speaking. "Oh, hey Jen!" Jen spoke. "Hey, uh, the girls and I wanted to take you out to lunch at Healthy life." Jess shrugged her shoulders, and complied. They walked downstairs to their cars, drove to Debbie's Gym, and walked to the Cafe. The girls had the special of the day: Turkey, Lettuce, and Tomato sandwich, with some kale chips, apple slices, and whole wheat rolls. "Look, Jess. We care about you. We want this diet plan to work for you as well as it works for us, but you got to work with me here." spoke Jenna. The group of girls nodded. Jess sighed and replied. "Look, I'm sorry, but it's so hard. So much I have to do at work, so much I have to do at home. I'm strained." Jenna replied. "Well, we go to the same place. We can do the same stuff. At break, instead of eating out of boredom, how about we do some yoga, or pilates, or just some light stretching in the hallway." Jessica wondered, pondering the points. "Yeah, and you always talk about how you're so out of breath from walking up stairs, if you follow the diet plan, and go to the gym more often, you won't have that problem." Jenna placed her hand on Jessica's mid-breast, between her boobs. "And if you abandon all this, right here's gonna suffer. We want you to live a long time, happy, healthy, with us. We don't want you to get heart disease, high blood pressure, diabetes, all that stuff. You're killin' yourself, Jess." After a long sigh, Jessica replied..
11111211111211111221111.title: One last obstruction.

choices: "Sure!" Jen becomes the Health Guru for the whole city.
"I can't, I'm sorry." Jen abandons the gym, too many memories of Dave.
111112111112111112211111.content:
"Alright. I promise I'll do better." The group of girls patted her on the shoulders. "Good, we're proud of you jess. We got you, girl.

The girls banded together over the next few years. Work preformance never suffered, and though Jessica had a few ins and outs, she was able to shed a few pounds. Melissa and Alice were actually able to get down to 180, they were almost unrecognizable compared to their former selves. Jessica was able to get down to about 350, and though the weight loss went slowly, it went on.

The gym had experienced more business than ever, especially in the January of the 6-year anniversary of Jenna beginning her membership. She had become reknowned in the office as a Fitness Guru, a consultant on all things health and workout-related. She'd experienced a boost in popularity and she'd gotten to be good friends with Dave. Which made it harder when he approached her as she surveyed her kingdom of calorie burning.

"Hey Jen! Look, there's been a new branch of Debbie's Gym opening up nationwide, and they want me to go be the manager of one a bit down south." Jen looked at him with dissapointment. "Aww! I'm gonna miss you, man!" Dave spoke with a bit of excitement in his voice. "However..That leaves a vacancy in the PT department. And they're looking at you...What do you say, Jen?
111112111112111112211111.title: "Alright. I promise I'll do better."...

1111121111121111122111111.content:
Jen had done it. She no longer needed the personal training. She was the trainer, especially for Jess, who needed an extra voice to keep her motivated. She kept Jess on track for eating and anyone who came under her wing was guaranteed to succeed. Jen's PT methods not only set the standards for trainers at Debbie's gym, but for all trainers.

She was still in contact with Dave, and he couldn't do anything but voice his pride in her. She was legendary in PT circles, being invited onto talk shows, fitness shows, online fitness workouts. She revived the nation to get moving, and get jumping. And as she wound down her career, she could feel nothing but pride as she observed that this was HER gym, that these were HER people.
1111121111121111122111111.title: 180 Degrees.

choices: It was Dave. "Hey Jenna. Would you come on down to the gym?"
It was Jessica. "Hey Jen! The girls and I are eating at the Pizza Parlor!"
1111121111121111122112.content:
Jenna awoke to another weekend. She woke up, cooked herself up a pancake with regular batter, fried up some bacon, and sat down to eat. The granola she had before sat untouched atop her fridge as she whipped out some butter and spread it atop the pancake. Ever since the month had begun, everything seemed to have gotten on her back. Not only had there been a massive influx of customers at work, she had less time to get up and do her stretches at work that she had been doing. She had less time to grab the healthier snacks, so she found herself, at her break, back with the girls, talking and, as a part of the usual ceremony, gluttonously chomping down on unhealthy, salty snacks, not to mention the usual, welcome sweets.

She bit down into the buttery pancakes. She had found some joy that she had lost in that solitary week of dieting and exercise. She wanted to TASTE her food again. She wanted to relive the lifestyle she had been living. After she finished her breakfast, she waddled back over to her couch, sitting on her cushions which squeaked and metallically wailed. She surfed her channels, searching for her Hospital Drama with her hand resting on the vast, flabby fatness that was her stomach. Ah, she thought, Life is good. She felt an itch, though: She felt like she should check something. She hadn't gone to the gym for two weeks and something felt wrong. So when her show had finished about 20 minutes later, she got up, walked over to her electronic scale, and stepped on. The numbers flashed many times, many numbers before it came up to a set of three dots, and finally, a number: 405.5. Jenna sighed. "Well this is what comes of this." She had an internal conflict as she debated this: She had slipped so far that she was now in the 400's. She needed the gym, but...This meant giving up all this comfort, all this nice food, all the sitting on the couch as opposed to cycling her way to hell, feeling like her heart's about to explode and her body's about to run out of sweat.

Amid the decision process, a phone call came up. She answered. "Hello?" Replying was a familiar voice...
1111121111121111122112.title: Regression.

choices: Call Jess back
Have a night in...with papa johns pizza!
11111211111211111221122.content:
Jen almost accepted. Almost. She knew the other girls were big, but not like her kind of big! What if the laughed and treated her like Vanessa? Not happening. "Sorry, Jess, I'm a bit tied up right now. Maybe some other time?" Questioned Jen shoveling a cookie into her mouth.
"Shame, it's papa johns and I knew how munched you loved their pizza. But it's your choice, see ya!" Jess spoke threw bites of chocolate leaving her house.
"Bye, Jessica!" And with that she hung up. And soon as she did pizza entered her mind. So warm, gooey, messy. Ohhh, she was lost in he lust of food.
She reached to the phone.
11111211111211111221122.title: It was Jessica. "Hey Jen! The girls and I a...

choices: "The whole Diet and Exercise thing just isn't for me...I'm done."
"Sorry, I still need to lose weight... And so do you." Jess diets with her.
111112111112111112211221.content:
She called back Jess in a flash. The redhead picked up her phone, and replied. "Nyello?" Jenna shot back. "Jess, it's Jenna. On second thought I'd like to join you guys, but I think we should go to Mazelli's Parlor instead. I'll pay. Jessica's tone picked up. "No problem! I've been meaning to go there but I haven't had the initiative, you know. Too far away from the office. I'll see you there!" Jess hung up and gathered the pack of other blubbery blimps that encompassed her. Alice had swollen from 340 to 380, Melissa had shot up to the 450's, and Jess was about 390, most of her fat packed away above the belt, though not to neglect her blubbery thighs.

The crowd packed into the Elantra, which was normally a large car, but the throng of Obese women weren't normal. Melissa sported a dress she'd bought with her bonus recently, for preventing an aggressive attempt to buyout the company. Her dress consisted of a gray material with a thin leather sash on the stomach. Alice wore a White Button-down blouse with frills to the side of the buttons, every roll hugged skin-tight by the blouse. She sported a black skirt, and a pink ascot, to try and hide her double-chin, which had sized up with her gains recently. Jess wasn't feeling so formal, she wore a white shirt, tucked into her worn jeans. She wore a belt to try and keep the pants from sliding off her unscalable belly, which shoved her stomach out, perking it up where it usually had some hang, showing her to be even fatter than her clothes usually let off. They all struggled a bit with the seat belt, Melissa most noticeably, as the seatbelt hit a snag just above her left thigh, on her stomach. 'Uh, jess, can you help?" Jessica turned to her, she being a little worn out from her own ordeal with it. "Uh...Sure.. Hold on, lemme catch my breath first." The redhead sat there, panting for 30 seconds, until she was ready and took on the seatbelt, and Melissa shoved too. AFter some effort for about 20 seconds, they got the seatbelt buckled, though both girls were worn out and panting. Jessica felt slightly insecure due to the expansion of her doughy, vast belly, not just due to the belt, but also her sitting down, which exaggerated her gains. She drove over to Mazelli's, and parked out front on the curb.

Jenna stood out front of Mazelli's, wearing a pair of Black Yoga Pants which accentuated her evenly fattened rear, and a tight green shirt with short sleeves, which exposed her lardy arms, with an accentuated fat fold at the elbows. She stood out in the summer heat as Jessica's car parked on the curb. The horde of Morbidly Obese Maidens shuffled out of the car and greeted Jenna with a choking hug. "Jen! Haven't seen you in forever!" Jenna replied. "Good to see you too, guys! Let's get in, it's hot out here." They shuffled and waddled into the Parlor, which was half a bar, half a pizza joint. The bar had the current Baseball series on, Cardinals versus the Brewers. It was mostly middle-aged men and preppy college kids populating the bar. They waddled through the smell of cigarette smoke into the smell of pizza in the parlor. They sat at a table, as their girth had much restricted their ability to sit in booths. They jawed on about work, "I heard that Head Management is trying to merge a smaller company into us," et cetera. Then it moved on to other problems, until the Pizza arrived, with Pepperoni Toppings and the basic features. The ladies horked down. as Melissa pulled out a pack of cigarettes. "Melissa, you smoke now?" Melissa nodded as she held the cigarette in her finger. "Mmhm. Some of the shit at work and home, I tell ya. My kids just won't shut up, my husband's a whipped little pussy, and these little sticks have really helped me cope." Alice spoke. "Ain't that a turnaround. Speaking of habits, Jenna, how's your Diet and Exercise coming?" They considered as Jessica sat, feeling the slightest twinge of envy of such a lifestyle, her earlier insecurity added on now by the fact that she realized that she is too fat to sit in a booth. Jenna replied sipmly and curtly, after the slightest bit of thought.
111112111112111112211221.title: On another front...

choices: At work...
After work...
1111121111121111122112211.content:
"Yeaaah...It's just not me. I fell off the bandwagon and it's just really hard. I mean, going to the gym's hard enough, but all the healthy eating? Man, I just can't do it." The rest of the girls nodded as they munched into their pizza, but Jessica was just getting eaten up by the guilt. She had really let herself go to the point. At that point she spoke. "Yeah.. I might take that up though, I couldn't even buckle my seatbelt on the ride over there. I'm pretty sure that's a sign that I need to calm it down. Melissa sighed. "Pfff. Longevity of life is bullshit anyways. We're all gonna die someday. Way I see it, I'd prefer for it to be faster than 80 years. You guys can do whatever. But I'm gonna be here, puffing, eating, and waiting for that last nail to go into the coffin that got made the day I was born." Nigh-instantly, Alice replied with, "God, no need to go all nihilist on us." The obese quartet finished the pizza, and then waddled out to the car.

Jenna was dropped off back at her apartment building. After a brief period, she had dinner and went to bed after a brief period on the couch. She awoke the next morning, drove to the local fast food joint, and moved on to work.
1111121111121111122112211.title: Role Reversals

choices: Got in and drove home.
Felt a hand around her neck, pulling her towards a Nissan Sentra
11111211111211111221122112.content:
The masses of blubbery women waddled out of work, among them Jenna. She huffed, not in exhaustion, but out of sheer aggravation with the day. The reports felt like years to write, everything annoyed her but her beloved usual Pepsi and Cheetos. She waddled to her car, her thighs rubbing against each other. She stuck the keys into the ignition and drove down the road. She checked her rear-view mirror as she went down the road, going about 20 MPH in the jam-packed, sluggish rush-hour traffic. She saw a black Nissan Sentra 2013, and the man in the car seemed a bit twitchy. She got annoyed and couldn't wait until she got home. We all have to go through it, asshole, she thought, Get used to it. This is Baltimore.

She finally got through the rush-hour traffic and got home about 6:03. She had a dinner date with the girls at 7:20, so she sat down on the couch for a second, and watched the news. The usual: Some crisis in the middle east, old men worrying about the economy, and some jackass doctor talking about how bad obesity was. Jenna wasn't doing too bad, though honestly she wouldn't know, she hadn't seen her doctor since she was 300 pounds. He was talking some nonsense about blood pressure, but she didn't give a rat's ass. Probably just some quack who got his medical lisence off the back of a cereal box. Then something hit the news that caught her eye.

"The case of missing girl Bethany Morrison is still gone cold, with few clues, though police have determined one thing: What car the missing girl's kidnapper drove." The camera cut to the police chief of baltimore: an older man in his 50's, with some hair, but grey streaks in his hair. "We've determined from a collection of sources that the killer drives a nissan car, we're not entirely sure yet, but we think it's a 2013 Nissan Sentra." Jenna's eyes went a little wide, she shut off the television and hurried over to get ready. She put on a rather tight skirt that was digging into the whale-like blubber of her stomach, and tried to calm herself down. "They didn't say what color it was. It might have been blue. It might have been green." She put on her foundation and went on out to La Piaca, the local italian joint.

La Piaca was a very traditional place, brick walls, with the Mediterranean roofing, and it emitted an evil, evil smell of meat smoke and the smell of baking bread. It wasn't quite the most advanced place, nor the most popular place, but it was a cult hit with the few that knew it. Jenna waddled out of the car to meet Jess and the gang. Jess was in tight-fitting jeans and a tee-shirt, Melissa was dressed rather upscale, she looked a little paler than usual, almost like a star of the 1920's. Her second chin was looking extra pronounced tonight. Alice wore a dress blouse and some dress pants, held up by a belt that shoved an extra shelf of her fat over the edge. The flock of fatties greeted each other, calling each other's names and hugging in a great collection of a hug. They then waddled inside.

Inside, they fit right in with the waitresses. They clearly had sampled the menu: Ample, fat ladies who all had to be at the absolute least, 200 pounds. Almost like the culinary version of Gordge Inc. A fat lady took them to their table in the smoking section, and Melissa lit up her first cigarette of the night while the girls struck up conversation. Orders came around. "Hey ladies, what are we drinking tonight?" Melissa spoke after a drag on her cigarette. "I'll have a regular coke." Alice followed. "Sweet tea." Jenna spoke. "Sweet tea." Then, she got around to Jessica. "Water, please." The waitress walked off. Melissa spoke. "Yeah, you're ordering water tonight." She turned to the rest of the table. "...But watch her order a regular coke next time we go out." Jessica grunted. "Go ahead and make fun while you smoke and eat yourself into an early grave. I'm sticking with it this time." Melissa rolled her eyes. "Mmm-hmm. Yeah. I'll believe it when I see it." The conversation continued until the Waitress brought drinks. Jessica spoke with a bit of anger. "Look, it's different this time, okay? I'm going to eat healthy tonight. I even bought a gym membership!" The waitress handed around the drinks, not interfering with the conversation. Alice spoke up. "Well, you're just, like, overreacting. Melissa, no need to make fun of her. If she wants to diet, let her diet." Melissa shrugged and got back to her cigarette. Jessica spoke to the table but edged her voice more towards her. "I heard JoAnne from Accounting had to go to the hospital this weekend. Something about Cardiac Arrest?" Alice spoke. "Her mom had cardiac problems, so did her grandma. It was genetic." Jenna spoke. "Though, you have to say, the pounds didn't help."

The debate took a pause, as the waitress came to take food orders. Melissa ordered the Chicken Parmesan, Jenna ordered Chicken Alfredo, ALice ordered a small 4-slice pizza, and it came around to Jessica. After a second of debate, she ordered the Eggplant Parmesan. The debate took a second and Alice looked at Melissa. "You know, I never have smoked. How does it feel?" Melissa spoke. "It's kind of a precise thing, care to try one?" Alice shrugged. "One won't kill me." Melissa handed her a cigarette. "You know how to hold it, by the filter. Kind of prepare yourself for it to taste bad." Alice fidgeted with it for a second before putting it in her mouth. She looked oddly at the cigarette, feeling odd. Melissa handed her the lighter. "Before you light it, exhale." Alice did as told. "Light it, and when you do, breathe in a bit.." She did so, and exhaled after a second. Her eyes widened. "Wow. This actually feels pretty good!" Melissa spoke. "If you want, finish it. Just try not to put the smoke right in your face. You'll cough more than usual." Alice gave her first few coughs after her next drag, and the conversation topic shifted after the fourth drag. "That's how you're gonna take over the world, Melissa, isn't it: An army of fat smokers?" quipped Jenna. Melissa chuckled. "Damn straight. Blow smoke in everyone's faces until they surrender." Alice sunk into the cigarette, smoking in a rhythmic pattern until the cigarette had burned about a quarter way down, patting it out in the tray. The food arrived soon, and the girls dug in, Alice hadn't ordered as much, and when it came time for dessert, she turned it down, as did Melissa. Jessica ordered a fruit plate, and Jenna ordered some Tiramisu cake. After that, and Alice's second cigarette, which she smoked during dessert, the girls exited the restaurant, said their goodbyes, and went out to the parking lot, Alice following after Melissa. When Jenna was about to get into her car, she...
11111211111211111221122112.title: Italian Food and Cigarettes

choices: He notices her and strikes up conversation.
He doesn't notice her... but a man in a Black Nissan does.
111112111112111112211221121.content:
The drive from La Piaca was rather dull, but Jenna kept her senses keen. She was watchful as she pulled into the apartment parking lot, looking for the Nissan, ensuring she wasn't being followed. After this, she carefully walked to the apartment, tense and nervous as she had ever been. When she got inside her apartment, she locked the door. Feeling especially careful tonight, she deadbolt-locked it. After this, she nervously sat down on the couch. No more news tonight. She watched a local improv show, and then shut off her TV. This friday was far from the usual calm friday night. Her weekend was going to need some extra relaxing. After a few laughs to calm her down and a nice, long shower, she dressed down to her underwear, and went to bed.

She awoke in the morning, had a mug of coffee, and cooked herself some breakfast: Bacon and Pancakes. As she sat down to munch, she flipped on to the news. Last night's worries had gone away, and the same old, same old was on the news. Nothing worrying today. No talk about the Nissan. Everything was okay, the problem didn't exist. She could spend some time at the pool, the weather was getting warmer. Eventually she decided to do just that. A lazy day out at the pool. She slipped into her favorite bikini, which tightly hugged at her fat shoulders, giving it the 'Baked Bread' look. She started giving working out a second thought, she liked bikinis, but this wouldn't fit her in another 20 pounds. But not today, today she'd bum it at the pool.

She drove there, her massive stomach hanging heavily over her bottom, covering it entirely. She took a second to set up her towel at a suitable spot, lounging for a bit to get her tan on. On one of her tanning cycles, she slipped a look across the pool. She saw a musclebound man with his eyes pinned on her. With her shades on, he didn't even know she was looking back. She decided not to spoil his view, as not many enjoyed the view of a 400+pound woman in a bikini, tanning. She planned it out in her head. She got up from tanning, setting her tanning oil on the table beside her, and hopped into the pool. As she paddled past the man's place on the loungers, she splashed him.

As a result of this venture...

(Note by Chapter Author: This is Fatboy, this is my alt.)

She wasn't going to be able to keep calling her mom over to help her out of bed. Jenna was lost in thought but was suddenly interrupted when her massive belly started to clench inside of her. Her breakfast had been so puny compared to what Jenna usually liked to munch on, so she was going to have to rectify that.

Jenna dressed in what ever business attire semi fit, and took off for the day. Her first stop was the local Denny's where the wait staff knew her well, and she could enjoy endless Pancakes and Coffee. Jen liked to order a few side dishes on the side the keep things interesting, but easily put away a dozen plates of pancakes to start off the day. Next she did a drive through at the donut shop picking up a couple dozen. Her office supplied free endless donuts to the staff, along with bagels and other things, one of the reasons she had started to gain weight when she joined the office, but getting these few extra on the side would help her get her morning started right.

Finally the last stop before work was breakfast burrito place. Multiple bags of greasy meat, cheese, and egg filled burritos were in the arms of the lovable fluffy office worker. 'God I've gotten too fat, but I know I can't turn things around, I'm just going to have to live with it. But if I can't get to work in the morning I'm going to get fired... I know! I need someone's help. Maybe if I had a boyfriend he could help me with all the things I'm too fat for now. Oh this will be great, I won't have to worry about putting on even more weight.'

With that, the box of twinkies were gone and Jenna rummaged around for her next snack, also looking at the time to see how soon lunch was coming.

Jenna needed to find a boyfriend and fast. She knew at her size she wasn't just going to be able to reel in any Tom, Dick, or Henry, she needed to find someone who appreciated her size. She wasn't sure where to look so she started searching online. With a Ding Dong in one hand she moved her computer mouse with the other.

And they even meet tonight. I'll just grab a quick supper after work and then hit up this meeting. Perfect!" 1111121122122222.content:
As the day dragged on, there was no end to Jenna’s appetite​. Her already massive belly ballooned ever outward, to make room for the endless supply of food. As it expanded the buttons on her shirt and skirt fought gallantly to contain Jenna, however her belly was spilling out every possible gap like rising dough, spilling over her waistband of her skirt. It had pushed down the zipper of her skirt, and spilling out of the opening. The button on the skirt struggled desperately, to hold her belly in.

With even the slightest move she could hear the chair beneath her creak and groan.

As the workday came to a close, and Jenna’s coworkers started to heading home, except for Tom.

Tom was also worked at the office as well and befriended Jenna. He didn’t hide that he was a fat admirer as well as a feeder. This was music to Jenna’s ears as she enjoy his company and though he was cute.

Tom, popped into her office. “Are you ready for Netflix and Chill, at my place?”

“Yes, just let me finish these.” Jenna said excitedly. She grabbed the box, opened it and started to devour the first eclair.

Suddenly sounds of popping was heard as the buttons losing the fight was launched across the room. Her belly no longer constrained burst forth, from it’s prison and sat there exposed and jiggling.

She embarrassed trying to cover the exposed part of her gut, but there was too much to hide.

“Don’t worry you can use my jacket to cover it and I will drive you home.” Tom said putting and hand on her shoulder to try confirm her.

“Thank you. You are a great boyfriend. ” She said.

She put her hand on her desk, and tried to stand up. Like a women 9 months pregnant with quadruplets, she struggled to lift her belly into the air to get on her feet, and she got halfway up but, gravity was not her friend, and collapsed back into the chair.

She was breathing heavily.

“Look at me! I eaten too much.” She said almost crying looking down at her protruding belly. “It is so big and heavy, my mom had to come over to help me out of bed!”

11111212.content:
Soon enough the corpulent cutie arrived home. Jenna got out of the car, awkwardly maneuvering her huge bulk out of the seat. She waddled up the few step to her house, her cushiony behind jiggling all the while. She unlocked her door and proceeded inside...until she felt a small pressure on her wide soft hips. She grunted with exasperation, annoyed that she was having so much trouble today with fitting into things.

"Ugh, damn door...i havent put on that much weight, have i?" she maneuvered her bulk back a few steps, successfully unwedging her waist from inside the confines of the doorway. She then tried to enter moving sideways, but that just made it worse! Between her huge gut and immense rump, she found she was wedged much tighter than moments ago, feeling an intensly pained pressure pushing against her belly and her derriere. Jenna struggled and wriggled as best she could, finding it to be of little to no use. All she did was tire herself out, panting and sweating slightly.

"o-ok, what...*pant*...do i do...n-now...?!" she thought aloud.
11111212.title: Uh oh...

choices: Marianne, a friendly (enough) co-worker who doesn't live too far away!
Avery, an old childhood friend who lives around the neighborhood!
111112121.content:
“Okay… okay Jenna…” the pudgy pencil pusher commanded lightly of herself as she attempted to police her heavy breathing, “You’re a big girl. You can handle this…”

Jenna paused and took a sharp inhale, putting more pressure on her stuck stomach as she fit more snugly into the doorframe. Using her leg muscles, the blimpy blonde strained herself to reach as far into the apartment as she could. Then, despite the protests of the odd coupling of doorway and belly dough, she attempted to force her round body though the square hole. At first it seemed to work, Jenna could feel herself sliding through ever so slightly even as her face twisted and contorted in her exertion. It was physically exhausting, her round face becoming red from the center out as little beads of sweat rolled down her forehead…

“Ow ow ow okay!” she cried out in defeat, “Okay… okay… that didn’t work so well…”

Ascertaining the situation further (by means of moving the pliable belly blubber around so she could see) Jenna saw (and certainly felt) that her situation had only gotten worse. She was now exactly half in and half out of the apartment—the spot on her stomach just above her bellybutton French kissed the spot where the plunger fell on the door, and her mountainous butt-blubber hadn’t shifted at all, leaving her at an awkward and uncomfortable angle.

“Oh no…” she whined, “What am I going to do, I can’t be too fat to get through the doorway of my own apartment!”

At that moment, she could hear her phone beep in her purse (still technically outside) as its battery threatened to give out. She had forgotten to charge it before she left for work this morning and her charger in her office had shorted out earlier due to a little soda accident one day during lunch. In her creed to not waste the battery life, she had forgotten all about it! If she could manage just one phone call, somebody might be able to come and help her!

Dropping her doughy shoulder and allowing the big black purse to slide down her rippling arm fat, Jenna reached over the swell of her stomach with her right arm and searched the sea of wrappers and crumbs to find… yes, her smartphone!

Using her fat thumb, Jenna unlocked her phone with a quick swipe.

“Hardly any battery…” she commented quietly, “Better make this one count…”

But who could she call? She didn’t exactly have a booming social life, even at work. And what’s more, who could get there quickly? She’d hate to be stuck in her doorframe for hours as people watched and stared at half of her massiveness…

No time for that, she’d chastise herself later. Right now, she had a very important decision to make.

Of all the contacts in her phone, there were only two people who could get there in a reasonable amount of time…
111112121.title: Jenna's in a Jam!

choices: a fellow foodie like Jenna, they eat lunch together A LOT...
a fitness freak who works across from Jenna, always happy to lend a hand
1111121211.content:
Brrrrrr….Brrrr…..Brrrrrr….

“Hello?”

“Oh thank God.” Jenna exhaled deeply into the phone as the incessant dial tone finally came to an end, “Marianne is this you, please tell me this is you. I need a big favor, and I you’re the closest person I can think of…”

“This is she.” Answered the voice on the other end, “Is this Jen? I was wondering when you’d call me up anyway. What’s the matter, you sound like you just got done running a marathon.” Jenna paused to appreciate the irony in that statement, both women knew fully well that she was in hardly any shape to be running anywhere anytime soon

“N-No, just… if I tell you how, do you think you could find your way to my apartment?” she cupped her hand over the speaker on her phone, “It’s kind’ve an emergency.”

“Where do you live?” Marianne asked simply, “You might not have to.”

“Towers Deluxe?” Jenna asked in return

“Yeah, I know the place.” The fretting fatty breathed another sigh of relief, “What floor?”

“Fourth, room 123.” She paused, “But I think you’ll see me.”

“Okay, let me get my keys and I’ll be on my way.”

Her fat thumb ended the conversation as Jenna pressed the ‘END’ key on her touchscreen. Her head rested a little easier knowing that Marianne was on her way over, that help was on its way and that she wouldn’t be stuck in this doorframe for too terribly much longer.

But still, it was embarrassing for Jenna to have to call anybody at all. How in the world could she have let this happen? She knew she was gaining weight, but there was no way she was too fat to get in and out of her apartment! She had no problem with the doors in her office building, or her cubicle! There had to be some logical explanation for all of this…

No matter, Marianne was on her way. Once she was free, Jenna could think about this (or not think about this) all she wanted.

Speaking of Marianne, just what kind of person is she?
1111121211.title: When you need a hand...

choices: Jenna cooks Marianne a filling meal.
Jenna decides to try and lose weight with Marianne as her coach.
11111212112.content:
Marianne was all smiles, her deep dark eyes glowing with altruism as she spied Jenna's stuck figure.

Well, maybe there was a bit more than mere desire to help...

Marianne Lords managed to hold in the moan that threatened to escape her at the sight of Jenna's extra pounds wedged in tightly between her own doorway.

"Jenna, calm down, I'm here. Let's just take this slow, alright?"

Jenna nodded, shame flooding her as she felt Marianne's slim fingers find her left lovehandle and sink into it.

"Try to wriggle a bit, Jenna."

Jenna did so, and, with Marianne pushing, felt her body slide that much closer into the apartment.

"There we go," Marianne said softly. "You're doing so good. Now give me another wiggle, okay?"

"Alright, and I'm sorry I'm such a whale, I-"

"Hey, don't talk like that. You're not a whale, you're a young woman in fine shape."

"But...I thought you were going to yell-"

"Yell at you like the stereotypical fitness nut? No, Jenna, I'm not like that at all. I know it takes all sizes to make the world go round. Sure, you might not be society's ideal, but you're still beautiful in your own way."

Marianne remembered, remembered growing up chubby, urged on to eat and let herself grow by indulgent parents, their loss, the urge to fit in, to shed her gain, moving away from her hometown to the big city and the new life it promised.

But her urge for larger expanses brought her lingering eye on her large clients, urging them to lose vocally while she wanted nothing more to just lose herself in their jiggly forms until she was that happy, large, person she really wanted to be.

"Thank you, Marianne."

"Of course Jenna, now let's get you through this door and you can pay me back with a big meal. I'm feeling kind of hungry."

Maybe it was time, Marianne decided as she pushed Jenna through some more, to soften herself up again and stop denying what she really wanted from life.

1111121212.content:
Brrrrrr….Brrrr…..Brrrrrr….

“Hello?”

“Oh thank God.” Jenna exhaled deeply on the other end of the line, the endless dial tone had been almost too much for her to bear in her delicate state, “Avery? I need you to do me a favor. Like, a really big favor. And nobody can know about it!”

“Sure thing, Jen.” The speaker said with a hint of worry detectable to all of those who weren’t currently wedged into their doorframes, “Is everything alright? You sound like you’re having a heart attack or something.”

“Everything’s…” Jenna paused to look down at her gut, still squished firmly into the side of the doorway, “Fine. J-Just hurry up and get over here, okay?”

“Alright, I’m on my way. I was looking for an excuse to come over soon anyway. You still live in the same apartment?”

“123, fourth floor, Towers Deluxe.” Jenna huffed out, “I’ll be waiting… erm, outside.”

Using her deceptively nimble fingers once more, Jenna hung up and began breathing a little easier knowing that help was on the way. Avery probably didn’t even live five minutes from her apartment building, she wouldn’t have to wait too long…

But still, it was embarrassing for Jenna to have to call anybody at all. How in the world could she have let this happen? She knew she was gaining weight, but there was no way she was too fat to get in and out of her apartment! She had no problem with the doors in her office building, or her cubicle! There had to be some logical explanation for all of this…

No matter, Avery was on her way. Once she was free, Jenna could find a way to make sense out of all of this.

Speaking of Avery, just what kind of girl is she?

There was a pause as both women looked at each other. It had been sometime since they’d last seen each other. Jenna’s job made it harder for the two to find time together. Avery was a bit taken aback by Jenna’s obese blubber. She remember Jenna being pretty chubby after college but not like this. Jenna looked like a full-fledged fatty. Jenna had similar thoughts about Avery. Avery always was tubby as a kid and teenager but she had clearly outgrown that title. Avery was fat. She had a big soft belly and a round jiggling butt. In college, Avery could pass herself off as curvy or thick but that ship had sailed. She wasn’t quite the whale Jenna was but there was no doubt that she was fat.

111112121211.content:
Avery rushed over to Jen and pushed against her flabby hip.

“You errr… almost… got it!” Jenna said, as her 300+ pound body squeezed into her apartment. Her fat gut oozed through the doorway. She finally popped free from the doorframe.

“You made it!” Avery said, panting.

“Thank you soooo much.” Jenna said. She plopped down on her sofa. “Ugh…How could I do this to myself?”

“Do what?” Avery said, seeing Jenna’s sad face.

“Let myself get so fat!” Jenna said. Tears rolling down her cheek. Avery wasn’t sure what to do.

“I… Ugh-err… You’re not that fat Jen.” Avery said.

“What do you mean? I cant even get in my apartment.” Jenna said.

“Well… maybe it was just… the door.” Avery said. “Are there any other doors you can’t fit through?”

“Well *sniff* no, I guess not. This has never happened to me before.” Jenna said.

“So maybe it’s just a small door. That’s not your fault.” Avery said.

“You don’t think I’m fat?” Jenna said. Her tears finally stopped. Avery paused. Jenna was fat without question, but did Avery want to tell her that?

“Ugh… Maybe you gained some weight.” Jenna looked like she was about to have a breakdown. “B-but you’re not that fat. There’s nothing wrong with your size, Jen. My mom used to tell me: There’s no such thing as too big.” Avery said, feeling a little conscious of her own size.

“You’re right. I have gained a little weight but so what. Just because the door is too small doesn’t mean I’m too big. And maybe there is no such thing as too big.” Jenna said.
111112121211.title: Am I fat?

choices: Jenna breaks a toilet seat
Jenna reaches 400 pounds
1111121212111.content:
Jenna had finally been relieved of all the concerns she had about her weight. She could finally eat with a free conscience. Jen was starting to swell up even faster now. She had accepted her full-fledged fatdom. She quickly became the fattest woman in the whole office. In no time she was up to 350 pounds.

“I can’t believe I’m up to 350 pounds. Never thought I’d see a number that high. But I’m still not that fat right? 350 pounds is like, average in the US. I’m just chubby, that’s all.” She thought. She was sitting at her desk eating candy. She rubbed her bloated gut.

“This belly is not even that big. It could be so much bigger.” Jenna thought as she patted her blubbery fat rolls. “Oops I’m out of candy. I should go get something from the kitchen.” She slowly lifted her enormous butt out of her chair. She struggled to squeeze her flabby wide hips free from the chair. She then waddled over to the kitchen. Breathing heavily from the short walk, she opened the fridge.

“What do we have here? *pant* Well I really should treat myself after that much *gasp* exercise.” Jenna said to herself. She pulled out some left over birthday cake and closed the fridge. She started to make her way back to her desk when she suddenly bumped into another coworker. It turned out to be Alice. Alice had been at the office for a short while. Luckily she was still a fairly thin girl so she didn’t make much of an impact on Jen. Jenna’s large midsection absorbed most of the hit leaving her cake untouched.

“Sorry Jess, must not have seen me.” Alice said. Alice was a bit taken aback by Jen’s much larger figure. Even though she hadn’t been at the office for long, she had notice a significant increase in Jen’s weight since she started working.

“It’s alright. *wheeze* I still have my cake.” Jen said. She was still exhausted by all this movement.

“Are you okay? You’re out of breath.” Alice said. She didn’t want to be to blunt about her weight.

He was living in the same neighborhood as she was, circumstantially speaking and happened by.

"Would you like some help?" He asked.

Recognizing his voice, Jenna said "Good thing you're here, Joe. You think you could help me?"

"Sure." Joe answered. The last time they saw each other was after they both graduated their university associate's degrees, having first seen each other some time in their final year of as such, as each other's classmate.

Joe had hoped they could hang around as friends at least at some point some time soon, but both were kept busy. Jenna's job made it all moreso. 112.content:
"Hello, Gordge Inc., how may I direct your call?"

"Hello, Gordge Inc., how may I direct your call?"

"Hello, Gordge Inc., how may I direct your call?"

Ashley's day at work had certainly become a busy one. With the end of the quarter fast approaching, it seemed anyone and everyone had to call today.

"Hello, Gordge Inc., how may I direct your call?"

"Seriously, it's like they're transferring all the calls to my phone," she thought, though she knew that wasn't true. Though she couldn't see the other secretaries, she could hear them answering and redirecting as many calls as she was. "Christ, how am I supposed to get anything else done?"

A legitimate question, as the office had frankly become a zoo. Apparently, they were down two staff members, though if rumours were to be believed, one of them had been less then useful. Also if the rumours were true, not one but both women had fattened themselves into immobility, and that was patently ridiculous.

Still, true or not (and Ashley suspected not), the girls at this office did seem to have a... shall we say, slight weight problem. Chubby seemed the norm for the majority of the staff, though there wasn't a shortage of women she could safely describe as fat. And there seemed to be at least a few who reached well beyond that title. Indeed, Ashley belonged to a small group that could be called thin without adding "by comparison" afterwards.

It wasn't hard to see at least one root cause. Ashley could see into the break room from her desk, and there were several boxes of doughnuts in there, and a steady stream of staff running in and out of the room. She was starting to see a clear divide in the compulsive snackers, as well.

The chubby ones she typically only saw once over the course of the day.

The heavier ones came by a couple times, too embarrassed to grab multiple pastries in one go, but apparently needing more then a singleton to get through the day.

The fattest ones didn't have such compunctions. Whether from sheer comfort at work or simply not caring, these women would grab multiple desserts at a time and take them back to their desks. One in particular, Melissa, was the worst, grabbing full boxes on the mail cart when she came around. She was undoubtedly the fattest woman Ashley had ever seen as well. She looked almost as wide as she was tall, and her belly hung halfway down her thighs. Her upper arms were the size of roasted hams, and jiggled mightily at the slightest provocation. Jiggle, in fact, was definitely Melissa's watch word, as each laboured movement set some part of her overfed frame into gelatinous motion. Ashley hadn't even been here a full month, and she'd swear Melissa seemed bigger and her clothes tighter in that short amount of time.

In fact, Ashley could hear her young coworker approaching now. Were her footsteps slower and her breathing louder then a month ago, or was that her imagination? Regardless, she smiled as Mel came around the corner. Mel's return smile dimpled her large cheeks, and her small wave set a substantial amount of fat into motion. "Hey newbie, how goes the fun?"

Hanging up as she finished her last call, Ashley answered, "Exhausting. I've been on the phone all day; I've literally got nothing else done."

"I hear ya," Mel said as she dropped a handful of mail on Ashley's desk. "The bosses have so much paperwork going around, I haven't even had time to sort any of it."

Ashley groaned at the new papers on her desk. "I haven't even finished yesterday's yet."

Melissa scrunched her face. "I know, it sucks, but just keep plugging away at it, you'll be fine." Mel looked down at Ashley's desk, forcing her enlarged double chin to hide her real one. "Ash, what time's your lunch break?"

Ashley looked down at her clock, and was shocked to see that it was nearly one. "Oh, damn it! I worked through my lunch hour, and it's way too late to switch with someone!" As if to rub salt in the wound, her stomach let out a soft growl, though certainly only loud enough for Ashley to hear.

Melissa rubbed her chins thoughtfully for a second before gesturing over her shoulder. "Well, it may not be your usual fare, Miss Rabbit Food, but there's plenty of doughnuts in the break room. The one manager's husband is a baker and always bringing them by. She's convinced he's trying to fatten her up, so she gives them to the staff and tells us to help ourselves. Or if that's not to your liking, there's also some pizza left over from a manager's meeting earlier in the week, and we really need to finish that off soon before it goes bad and we have to pitch it."

Ashley couldn't help but look Mel up and down once she said that, though thankfully the large girl didn't seem to notice. "That does explain a lot," she thought as the cart creaked its complaints as Mel leaned heavily upon it, half burying it under her rolls. "Thanks, but I think I'll just wait until I get home."

"Are you sure? That could be a long time away; the Sup almost always starts asking people to work late around this time of year."

"I'll chance it for now, and grab something if I don't have time for anything else."

"Alright, whatever works for ya. Anyway, I got to keep going. The mail won't deliver itself!" Mel made her way off, but not before ("Of course.") grabbing a full box of doughnuts. Ash's eyes were glued to Mel's expansive derriere as it wobbled away from her, leaving her feeling good about her decision to skip lunch rather then eat a lot of fatty foods. She knew she could never get that big, but she couldn't help but worry about her figure after being confronted with that.

"Yes, I definitely made the right choice..."

******

"That was the stupidest decision ever!"

That thought passed through Ashley's mind as she flopped down on her couch, still dressed in her work clothes. Sure enough, her supervisor had come around and asked all the employees to stay late to try and get caught up on work. Her finances were too tight to say no to overtime, so Ash had spent her evening working on data entry, meaning it was nearly ten o'clock before she got back to her apartment. She'd caved to her hunger and eaten a pair of creme horns around four, but the light pastries hadn't stay with her, so now she was absolutely starving.

Adding insult to injury, her right knee was throbbing. Her trick knee, combined with her paltry wages at the gym, had led this one-time high school basketball star to seek a career change for something more sustainable. She certainly couldn't complain about the starting wages at Gordge, "But the hours leave something to be desired."

Ashley stretched her spine, feeling a pop from several spots in her back. God, she was tired. She knew she should cook something and exercise before bed, but the thought of doing anymore right now seemed impossible. She reached over and grabbed the small stack of take-out menus from her coffee table.

"I know I shouldn't, but I really don't feel like cooking. I wouldn't be eating until after eleven if I did, anyway. Take out is fine once in awhile, I just need to make sure it doesn't become a habit."

It certainly wasn't a habit as it stood, as the bulk of the coupons were expired. Eventually, she found one that was still good. Ashley wasn't a big fan of Orange Star Pizza, as it was really, really greasy. However, it was cheap, and most importantly, they were the only place close to her building that delivered after ten. She placed her order for a large pineapple and olive pizza, and got changed out of her work duds.

The delivery guy arrived at about ten thirty, and Ashley couldn't help but smile when the poor kid's jaw dropped as she opened the door. She was a very good looking woman at twenty seven. She stood 5'7" tall, and had a great set of legs. Her toned calves and muscular thighs gave way to the gentle swell of her hips and the more considerable bulge of her heart shaped ass. Sometimes she worried that her lower half was too large to be attractive, but if the delivery guy's reaction was anything to go by, she needn't worry.

She was dressed in cargo shorts and a short t-shirt that showed off her flat belly, and did nothing to hide her 34C breasts. Her family were of Swedish descent, and her long blonde hair fell in curly locks around her shoulders. Her sparkling blue eyes and pristine white smile left the poor guy speechless, and the kid processed her order and went on his way as quickly as he could.

Ashley nearly skipped to the couch after that ego boost, and ate four slices in short order. Back when she was still playing b-ball, she'd had the biggest appetite on the team. Once she wasn't playing full time, she slowed up considerably and carefully watched what she ate. Her hunger got the better of her this time, however, and she was a little taken aback with how much and how quickly she devoured her pizza.

Now, this was the third time this month she was skipping her evening workout, and the first time she'd ordered take-out this year. "I really need to be careful. It's a slippery slope from here if I don't watch out. Still, it's just for tonight; I'll get back on my diet and start working out tomorrow."

Of course, with the temptations at and the nature of her job, that may be easier said then done...
112.title: How far can a former athlete fall?

choices: The slope is very slippery, indeed
Attempts at diet and exercise
And now for something completely different
1123.content:
Ashley walked into her apartment and hung her coat up by the door. Sliding off her belt, she flopped down on her couch with a sigh. "What a long day," she thought as she grabbed a nearby delivery menu.

The last month had seen Ashley ordering out more and more frequently. The end of quarter madness had made for many a late night, and Ashley seldom found herself with the time or inclination to cook anything for herself.

A few times they'd just ordered pizza up to the office, and while she initially tried to restrain herself, it wasn't too long before she was eating her fill alongside the other women. Ashley knew this shift in diet wasn't terribly healthy, but given how little she was still eating next to the other office drones, she felt confident that she was still well within moderation.

She'd also missed her evening workout more then she cared to admit. "And I'm hardly about to worry about that tonight," she thought as she rubbed her sore knee. That said, she took some solace that she was still managing an abbreviated workout more often then not.

"And at least the first quarter is finally over. I can finally start getting myself back on track. Tomorrow, though, definitely tomorrow."

Ashley leafed through the various menus before settling on a nearby fried chicken place, figuring if she was going to get back to her "rabbit food," as Melissa liked referring to it, she might as well enjoy herself now. "And it's been so long since I had fried chicken."

It had been a favorite of hers when she was still in high school, and her family always treated her to a feast of poultry whenever she won a game. The last time she'd had any was back in college, and just thinking about it was causing her to drool slightly.

She also felt a bit of pang of worry as she thought back to her time in college. After her knee had given out in high school, she knew a career in athletics wasn't in her future. However, while she couldn't be on the field, she decided to pursue a career in kinesiology. She'd never been lacking in effort regarding her academics, and had had no problem putting her nose to the grindstone to improve her grades where they were needed.

Her waistline, however, had also taken its share of upgrades as well. Like many athletes, Ashley had continued to eat like she needed to burn 5,000 calories or so a day, but her newly sedentary lifestyle required less then 2,000. On top of that, she'd developed a terrible habit of stress snacking, adding to her calorie count quite heavily.

Her excessive consumption combined with her daily exercise dropping to nil could only have had a single outcome; Ashley had blown up.

Her gain had continued through her final year of high school and into college. She did everything in her power to ignore her rapidly growing weight, but when her lard-engorged ass outgrew her third pair of fat pants in a year, she'd finally caved in and weighed herself. It was then that she'd found out that the 128 pound high school sports addict was now a jiggly 217 pound sophomore.

That had proven the wake-up call she needed. Almost overnight, Ashley had reinvented herself, maintaining a strict diet and exercise plan. She took advantage of the campus pool, swimming laps everyday to take it easy on her knee. Slowly but surely, her dedication paid off and she managed to drop a considerable amount, but never quite managed to get back to her high school weight. After graduation, she'd taken a job at Maxxi's Gym, in large part because she could use their facility at a substantial discount. However, her poor wages combined with being passed up for promotion twice had necessitated a career change, and thus she'd lost regular access to a pool.

Ashley didn't want to find herself that large again, and knew she was already at risk of putting on some weight given her recent slips with regards to her plan. Still, she managed to convince herself that there wasn't a problem.

"It'll be fine just this once. I haven't had fried chicken in over five years and it sounds so, so good. Once isn't going to kill me. It's only a slippery slope if I let myself fall down it, and I'll be back to my normal routine this weekend. I'll start eating better and working out again, and keep my figure. It's not like I could get that big again, anyway.

Besides, even if I did get as fat as I was in college, I'd still be tiny next to the girls at work."

Her flabby blubber jiggled as she sank deep into the sofa cushion. Lucielle had been stuck doing the same thing everyday for years. She exercised less and less, and was fatter than ever before. Yet she couldn’t be happier. Lucielle sat and started to empty the ice cream carton into her big gut. It was odd that despite the incredible decline of her health and fitness, Lucielle didn’t seem to mind that she was fat. Lucielle smiled as the last spoonful of ice cream slipped down her throat. She placed the empty carton on the coffee table. She let out an audible “Aghhhhhhhhh” of relaxation as she patted her chubby bloated belly. She had a moment of bliss as she rearranged her flabby body into a more relaxed position on the soft couch. Lucielle sat comfortably in the light lounge-wear, in her perfectly temperatured living-room, as she mindlessly watched old TV episode’s on Netflix. She then smiled again as she noticed the un-opened package of Oreo’s that was beside her on the sofa. It wasn’t long before the first sweet cookie passed her lips.
