11532122112112221312112112112.content:
"Anything for you ladies?" Shelly's voice cut through to the dumbstruck colleagues.
"Yeah come on girls, I'm gonna need another entree if you don't order soon!" Lucielle cooed from her side of the table whilst already flicking through the dessert menu to pass the time as her friends floundered.
"Erm..." fidgeted Alice, completely thrown by Lucielles order and unsure what to order herself
"Yeah...erm, I'm really not..." started Jessica, shifting her weight slightly causing her immense hips to wobble under her tight blue dress.
"Ok, lets make this easy. They'll have the same as me please Shelly" Lucielle glanced at her friends as she ordered, throwing them a smile as she did. Jeez, they're so small since we haven't been together, they mustn't be eating properly whilst they've been on time off from the office thought Lucielle
Time to change that.
"Okie dokie" said Shelly as she scribbled down the extra orders "your starters will be out in a moment"
The young waitress turned on her heels and strode off, a slight bounce of weight to her bum was noticeable under her skirt as she took off.

"Are you out of your mind all?!" Alice and Jessica blurred nearly in sync
"What? You two looked hungry so I'm fixing that" the bigger blonde smiled sweetly before tuning back to the dessert menu, chewing her lip as she muttered to herself about various options sounding nice.
"Well, it was nice knowing you Al coz I'm pretty sure we're gonna pop tonight" said Jess through gritted teeth.
Alice couldn't bring herself to say anything and fumbled under the table to loosen the tie on her stretchy bottoms as genuine fear washed over her face.
As the pair of whales and the considerably more dominate blonde beluga waited for their starters, they chatted about work, how the new office spaces were, what these new 'enhancements' were...
Of course, Lucielle filled in with tales of gluttony as well which Jess and Alice listened with an almost sick fascination because, despite their on the surface resistance, they were mightily impressed at their girlfriends gain.
As the time passed Jessica and Alice became more relaxed about their imminent food related explosions however far too soon there came the call...

Marching slowly towards them came Shelly once again, arms laden with plates piled high with starters and, behind her, was the first chubbier waitress who's arms were also laden with plates.
"Sorry about the wait" huffed Shelly as she started to unload herself "you guys ordered a lot so takes a while"
"Oh don't worry, it's totally worth the wait" chirped Lucielle who was practically salivating already as the plates came down.
"Yeah, totally..." apprehensively declared Jess as the larger waitress swapped in to deposit her set of plates
"Well I hope you enjoy and just let me know when you're ready for your mains" said Shelly in her waitress routine before walking off to take another tables orders.
The chubbier waitress placed her last plate and stood herself up, exposing a slither of chubby belly beneath her shirt which she swiftly tugged down, blushing slightly through her sweating cheeks.
"Sorry..." she murmured and scurried off back to work, but not before her name badge was glanced.
Carri was her name.

"Oh my god, this all looks so good!" Squealed Lucielle, inhaling deeply with her fingers laced together.
She wasn't wrong.
The apprehensive girls opposite her were starting to get suckered in by the copious piles of starters, each looked capable of feeding a regular girl's appetite on its own.
"Yeah it does..." cooed Alice as she reached for a spicy meatball that was bigger than her mouth.
"Ohh my favourites" said an enthralled and dreamy Jess who had half a chicken wing in her mouth as she skewered a dripping garlic mushroom.
Lucielle didn't have chance to speak as she dove straight in to the food, a mozzarella triangle in each hand with a mouth full of some type of dense potato salad expanding her cheeks before she swallowed and loaded up again. Despite her immediate gluttony, it did not fly her by that her office friends had stopped complaining and were stuffing their faces as hard as Lucielle herself was. This brought a small smile to her face, she couldn't have her best friends wasting away as she grew like she did.

As time ticked by, the piles of food started to deplete and the girls started to get more and more exposed with every mouthful. As the most decent of the three, Jess was just stretching her dress more by the second and, even with just starters, it was already threatening skin tight over her bulbous belly with her second roll forming a clear fabric indentation around her belly button. As the smallest of the group Alice was the most bloated at this point, not that it was slowing her down in the slightest. As she slid a slice of garlic bread down through her lips, Alice idly rubbed her expanding stomach, a thick roll hanging out from under her shirt. Alice was also the recipient of first clothing fatality, her stretchy bottoms had split around a thigh not long in but she was simply greateful for the breathing space at this point. And then there was Lucielle who, at this particular moment, was lent back in her chairs with a deep dish of soup to her lips slowly pouring it down her throat. Her current position allowed for her belly to be exposed to the air to her belly button as her new top was just too small even when she was empty. In the back her bloated hips bulged up and out making her appear wider than usual and they slowly jiggled with each chug of soup.

In no time, the starters were gone and all that remained were three happy girls all rearing to go for their main courses.
"I am so hungry now!" declared Jess now, happily patting her bloated belly leaning back in her chair slightly as she did
"Me *mmphm* too!" shouted Alice through a mouthful of fried cheese, her last from the starters, as she swallowed and burped softly with a little giggle.
Their engorged substitute matriarch sat across from them with a smile on her face, cradling her largely unexpanded stomach feeling pleased with herself for pushing her friends to actually indulge.
"See how easy it would be to get this fat when you have that much fun?" Lucielle interjected with a wry smile.
The two smaller woman looked hungrily at the blonde trying to be shocked but too overcome with hunger to verbalise a protest as their stomachs rumbled and they simply nodded their coy agreement of unwillingness.
"Wow, looks like you guys had fun" observed Shelly who had now returned to clear their plates.
"We certainly did" cried Lucielle with glee, slapping her belly for effect "and now we're definitely ready for our mains if you don't mind" the huge blonde requested.
"Absolutely, I'll be right back with those" said Shelly with a smile, removing the empty plates on her own this time as they stacked without their contents.

"This is the life ladies" whispered Lucielle as she glances a trio of waitresses heaving two deep plates each towards their table "we're gonna eat well tonight" mused the blonde with a Cheshire Cat grin as her friends nonchalantly rubbed their bloated bodies and licked their lips in anticipation as the new approaching smells hit their noses.
11532122112112221312112112112.title: Lucielle frets that her friends are not eating ...

choices: All you can eat dessert bar!
Super sized slumber party at Jessica's!
115321221121122213121121121121.content:
"Oh my god, this is so good!" cried out Alice as heavy forkfuls of pasta flowed through her red stained lips, smatterings of sauce dotted her cheeks from her initial onslaught.
"Mhmm" groaned Jess next to her as she lent over the table to make sure her mouth was close enough to not waste time with lifting food to her mouth and delay her feeding any more than necessary. Her pose left her with boobs pressed against the table, cleavage nearly tumbling out of her neck and the bottom of her dress pulled so tight round her hips it looked fit to burst.
"Just keep eating ladies, we've got all night" called Lucielle through mouthfuls of pasta and chicken, sauce also running out from the corner of her mouth and down her chin.

Hungry as they were, their servers had barely cleared the table before the feasting began again, and boy did it go again. Onlookers would never believe that Jess and Alice had been apprehensive of this meal at first with their gusto but it was clear to them that apprehension had long been put to one side as the smaller girls tore into their mains like nobody's business. Lucielle was going about it at her usual pace which wasn't slow but she was in part distracted by her friends going to fat town across from her. It was just nice to see her friends indulging so much, after all, Lucielle used to be the smallest by quite a margin and now she outweighed them both considerably, even the immense Jessica. It was turning her on a little bit but she was also excited at the thought of the three of them ballooning together, particularly once she returned to work.

"Is everything alright with your meals?" Shelly again
Lucille swallowed "yes thank you honey" she said with a sauce covered smile
"Good, let me know if you need anything else" offered the petite waitress, about to turn on her heels again but...
"More!" came the shout from the other side of the table.
Unexpectedly Jess was asking for more and, still struggling to swallow her mouthful, Alice was nodding in agreement.
"Ohh oh, ok" stammered Shelly, whipping out her notebook and jotting the demand down.
"Better make that three seeetie" cooed Lucielle feeling a little pang of pride for the smaller girls at this point.
"Coming right up" smiled the waitress, taking off up the restaurant again to place their order.

As three forks clattered down on empty plates, a fresh one piled higher than the previous two was placed before each huge office worker. Licking lips with desperate eyes, none hung around before diving in once again to continue the gluttonous feast of the night.

At this point each girl was starting to look different from when she arrived also.
Jess now had her bloated belly pressed firmly against the table edge, unable to bend over as fully as she had previously due to the mass of food sat in her belly. The effects on her dress were also a sight to behold as it was pulled skin tight around her enormous bulk looking fit to burst in multiple different places. The tautness had also eliminated the earlier indent around her middle which was now perfectly rounded out.
Alice at this stage was near naked from her bottom half down as her thighs had all but shredded her poor stretchy bottoms. Now with cellulite dappled thighs spreading wide on her chair with her bloated belly sat heavily on her thighs from above, the smallest of the three girls was only small in a relative sense as she looked fit to be rolled out of there.
And then there was the queen bee of fat. Shovelling pasta into her mouth for all she was worth, even Lucielle with her immense capacity was starting to food baby up at this stage and loving every second of it as she fattened and widened by the second, her shirt struggling to contain less and less of her as she did.
And then, as quick as it started...

"Urge, I'm full..." groaned Alice, clutching her spherical belly in dull pain
"You did good hun" groaned Lucielle, stifling burps between words
"Than..." started Alice
"UUUURRRRPPPPPPP!" a huge burp tore through Jess's lips as she lay back, enormous belly pushing her thighs apart and hanging from under her dress in her reclined position
"Scuse you piggy" teased Lucielle with a giggle, lightly poking the bloated middleweight in her exposed belly which pushes another huge burp out.
"Ice cream" grumbled Jess, massaging her surprisingly still soft skin in her mild food coma state
"You're still hungry?" cried Alice, blissfully ignorant of her own stomach growling despite it's size.
"Ice cream" reaffirmed Jess, eyes flickering and chewing her lip hungrily.
Lucille had created a pair of monsters that night and she liked it.
"Ok well where we gonna go for ice cream?" asked the titanic blonde, also idly rubbing her exposed belly as she asked
115321221121122213121121121121.title: The girls gorge like it's going out of fashion

choices: Back to the office for Lucielle
Lucielle has the rest of the week off before work
1153212211211222131211211211211.content:
"There's a..." *BUUURP* "...REALLY good dessert bar just round the corner from here" cooed Alice as she belched loudly whilst fiddling with the tattered shreds failing to cover any of her plump legs.
"Ooh that sounds like a plan, lets go!" shouted Lucielle as she laboriously shifted her weight generating a loud protest from her perch beneath her.
Jess was too comatose to say anything but readjusted her dress which only served to make it draw tighter over her vast belly and slowly started to hoist herself up.
Lucielle chuckled softly at her friend, remembering many a fond moment of Alex having to lift her over stuffed bulk from a chair.
"Give her a hand Alice, I'll pay up here" offered the much bigger blonde as she practically bounced to her feet, compared to her colleagues anyway.
"Thanks Lu" Alice breathed heavily as she grabbed Jess's hands and pulled her friend to her feet causing the two's bellies to clash in a jiggling mass. The girls giggled like on a drunken night out for much thinner counterparts and made for the door with Lucielle peeling off to pay for the table.

With her immense hips swaying between tables, the 600lb blonde slowly made her way to Shelly, their server, and caught her attention with a small wave of her arm.
"Oh hi" stammered the petite waitress in awe of the woman in front of her "I would have taken payment at the table if you wanted"
"Oh not to worry, we're heading out for ice cream now anyway" smiled Lucielle as she counted the bill out of her purse
"Wow, dessert after all that?" Shelly outburst before catching herself.
"Oh my god, I'm so sorry..." turning bright red and averting her gaze faster than Lucielle could eat a buffet plate.
"Don't worry yourself, I know I'm a big girl" Lucielle said warmly, winking at the embarrassed server with a handful of belly fat oozing between her fingers.
"This should cover it, and a decent tip as well for all your help" Lucielle offered the wad in her other hand.
"Thanks" murmured the still coy Shelly "you're too kind"
"Don't mention it, maybe treat yourself to something to eat whilst you're at it" called Lucielle over her shoulder as she headed for the door to catch up her friends.
Shelly breathed for the first time since her stupid comment once the huge woman had squeezed herself out of the restaurant's apparently too narrow door. Shaking her head at herself, the young girl counted money into the till as a small card slipped out from between them onto the floor. She bent over to grab it, her backside feeling a little tight in her skirt as she did, and glanced over the elegant business card. "Gordge Inc"
Shelly had heard of the company but nothing about it. She shrugged, sliding the card into her skirt to keep safe. The staff seemed to enjoy themselves if nothing else.

*********************

"So ladies, what are we having?" Lucielle called, belly already calling out to be fed again
Jess and Alice were stood in awe in front of a row of cabinets of ice creams in all flavours imaginable.
Fruit flavours, ice creams with sweets sticking out of them, half a dozen different chocolate flavours, mountains of toppings and different sizes of cones and bowls were on show for any lucky patrons to indulge in. The entire shop also had a slight chill to it due to the volume of ice cream within.
"We can't decide Lu, there's just too many choices..." cooed Alice, practically drooling over a particularly decadent triple chocolate flavour before her. Jess wasn't much better as her entire contribution was audibly moaning whilst chewing her bottom lip.
"Ok, lets sort this out then" mused Lucielle "hello? Hello? He...yes, hi sweetie"
She'd managed to catch the attention of one of the servers
"Hi there, how may I help you tonight?" rattled off the average heighted guy who didn't seem all that aware of the current patrons before him
"First hun, if the three of us claimed a member of staff to dote on us til we drop would you still have enough staff for anybody else who might come in?"
The strange request piqued the guys interest and he looked up at the three girls before him, suddenly aware of the gravity of the next order.
"Erm...I think we could manage if we did that..." the poor guy didn't know what to do with thighs shredded trousers, belly fit to burst and hips hips hips that stood before him but he figured the safest bet was to let them eat what they wanted, lest it be him.
"Great! We'll get seated and look forward to taste your ice cream!" cooed the ever enthusiastic Lucielle who turned tail, bumped her colossal arse against one of the cabinets and dragged Alice and Jess to a table.

****************

"Eat up girls!" declared Lucielle as their first bowls were placed before them. It appeared the guy behind the counter had some sense as they had all received containers towards the larger end of the available spectrum.
Alice didn't need a starting flag as she was already diving in before Lucielle had finished talking. Jess needed even less time and was already stuffing herself with the cold sweet, that girl really wanted ice cream that night. Lucielle joined her friends in indulging, taking mouthfuls of strawberry, cookies and cream and an unexpected salted caramel flavour between them whilst watching the other two pig out. She was so pleased to be sharing the stuffing experience she had indulged in for the past weeks with her friends, she also couldn't help but imagine where they would all be in a few more weeks; likely much fatter.

Jess finished her bowl first and was instantly rewarded with a fresh one which seemed to be mostly chocolate. Eyes wide, Jess scooped up the bowl and placed it to her lips, tipping her head back and sucking in the brown scoops slowly as they started to melt from her exhaled warmth. She had always been a notorious chocoholic which apparently had not subsided. Alice and Lucielle finished quite close together and were given similar chocolate filled bowls which they rolled straight into, albeit not as fast as their colleague who was nearly done with her second. Lucielle and Alice exchanged a look between mouthfuls and shrugged, opting to let their friend enjoy herself.

Enjoyment was definitely the tone here as Jess gained a third bowl and then a fourth bowl and then...
"Are you ladies finished there?" called a voice from the counter.
"I think *hmpgh* so" groaned Lucielle, burping into a clenched fist "you full Al?"
Alice was looking worse for wear at this point. Flushed red and cradling a throbbing belly, Alice nodded into her double chin unable to look at the pile of three empty bowls in front of her.
"Well I'm *BUUURP* done too" uttered Lucielle between heavy breaths, drumming her bloated belly and massaging an engorged hip in clear view of Alice's matching three bowls sat within a larger vessel licked clean "Jess?"

Jess was a different kettle of fish at this point.
By special request Jess was currently emptying the tin formerly filled with triple chocolate that had been removed from the serving counter. Having inhaled four bowls the size of one of Alice's and a bowl larger than Lucielle's largest, the staff had conceded to allow the ice cream engorged woman to empty her favourite flavour for the night.
"She's done" bluntly declared Lucielle leaning back heavily in her seat, still playing with her taut stomach which no longer abided by her new top. In the silence she became aware that her leggings had actually popped a seam around her left hip leaving a patch of skin bare and trying to bulge out of their confines. Alex would be proud, she smiled.
Jess finally came up for air as the empty tin slid off her rounded thighs and lent back, the girl really could eat when she tried. She was sporting an enormous food baby to boot as well which only made her enormous belly look even bigger. The extensive bloating had pulled her dress so tight at this point that it no longer touched her thighs and had no flow to it, serving only as a blue second skin to the engorged office worker.
"That was so good..." murmured the last to finish.
"Yes it was Jessy" smiled Lucielle.

It was good to be back with the girls, especially with work starting again soon for Lucielle which she was very excited for now. The three bloated heifers just had to find a way home and it was highly unlikely a single taxi could take their combined weight at this point...
1153212211211222131211211211211.title: All you can eat dessert bar!

choices: Ashley was massive compared to befoee
Ashley is stuffing her face, showing off a perk of the new office
Ashley is startled by Lucielle, and rips her suit.
11532122112112221312112112112111.content:
Lucielle had enjoyed her time off while renovations we're happening at the office, but it was time to go back. Part of the new renovations was a new corporate attire, so Gordge had reached out to Lucielle before her return to get her size. Alex had a little too much fun measuring his wide girlfriend, and Lucielle was pretty turned on by the whole process. Hearing her measurements be three or four times the average person so ingrained just how much of a fat ass she really had become.

Lucielle showed up to Gordge in her well fitting business suit, that draped over her curves in an alluring fashion. Walking in the front door Lucielle could already see one of the new changes. The elevators were smack right there. Usually Lucielle had to walk through the front lobby and around the corner to get to the elevator, and after the short walk from her car she was usually quite tired.

Lucielle hopped in an elevator, and took a seat on one of the new benches. The extra deep benches around the perimeter of the elevator looked like they could fit four women Lucille's size comfortably. A bit improvemnt, and when it was standing only, people tended to over crowd the elevator, which left some of the bigger workers pushed up against one another.

Finally she arrived at her floor where she was greeted by the reseptionist Ashley.
11532122112112221312112112112111.title: Back to the office for Lucielle

choices: Orientation - What's new at Gordge
The boss has a special task for Lucielle
115321221121122213121121121121112.content:
*PING!*
The lift doors slid open before Lucielle to reveal a smartly designed front desk area sporting a fancy sign displaying the Gordge Inc name hung behind the reception desk.
Lucielle lumbered her way forward, her new suit groaning slightly due to its newness not allowing the same stretch that Lucielle's usual attire granted her. As her heavy footfalls pounded on the polished floor the familiar brunette sat behind the desk lifted her head to observe the new arrival to the floor.

Ashley tentatively licked her full ruby lips to inhale the sugar that had collected there before wiping her hands together over the box of doughnuts before her to cleanse the sweet powder from her thin fingers. When she joined Gordge, Ashley had been a bit different from the rest of the staff there. She had very little office experience before starting there meaning she required a lot of training, not that anybody minded as Ashley proved to be a lovely girl, but soon got into the swing of her new position and now oversaw a good chunk of the staff, something that had probably been taken into consideration when appointing her to this particular floor. Stranger than her appointment despite a lack of experience was that, after many MANY months of working for Gordge, Ashley had remained beautifully thin. Prior to her appointment, Ashley had worked as a personal trainer but, following an unexpected accident at work, had to quit that job and desperately stumbled across her current position. Many of her colleagues had expected her to balloon almost instantly with endless temptation in the office and the inevitable crash of her metabolism as she stopped exercising daily, however, much to their surprise, Ashley remained as svelte as ever. If Lucielle remembered rightly, and assuming no drastic changes had occurred in her absence, Ashley was the holder of the prestigious title of 'lightest member of staff'. This of course was a made up title, but one that Ashley and her friends embraced equally in good jest.

"Lucielle! I didn't know you were back today!" cried out the brunette receptionist with a huge grin. It was fair to say, as far as Ashley's face was concerned, her 'fattest' feature was her shapely plump lips which were often coloured in bright alluring colours to accent their size. She was otherwise thin of face, not to the point of appearing gaunt, but she simply did not retain fat on her face.
"Heya Ash, it's so good to be back finally. I've missed this place." Lucielle smiled back as she leaned against Ashley's desk
"Well a lot has changed round here, but you'll find all that out in your new orientation. We've all had to have one but they put on a good spread for it so I'm sure you'll be fine" teased Ashley, brushing a curl of hair from her face as she did and playfully batted her eyes oh so innocently.
"Thank god because I am starving!" exclaimed the immense blonde as she eyed the box of doughnuts next to her friend and leant to grab one.
"I don't think so" cried Ashley with a feign of upset as she lightly slapped Lucielle's wrist "these are mine, I've only had one box today!" As she spoke, Ashley snatched a fresh doughnut and took a large bite.
This knocked Lucielle back slightly, Ashley had eaten a dozen doughnuts that morning already? AND she was starting a second box?
Realising Lucielle's shock, Ashley laughed, cramming the last of her doughnut away and swallowing.
"Told you you'd missed a lot" and with that Ashley rose from her seat, knocking the 600lb blonde back even further.

Although worthy of her face still, thin was not an appropriate description of the rest of her body. Wrapped in a tailored grey dress from the same service as Lucielle's suit, Ashley's figure and blown up. The brunette had swelled in all directions with hips, belly and a bulging rack building up a curvaceous hourglass figure that was straining her dress in all angles. Ashley spun in the spot to display her widened bum along with the thickness of her thighs which rubbed together slightly. Even her arms had thickened slightly giving her the most modest bingo wings to ever grace a woman's arms. Upon facing her colleague again, Ashley's belly sashayed as one mass after her feet stopped moving in a way that only a solid food baby could. Lucielle was impressed.
"I'm finally getting fat!" shrieked the much smaller but still plump brunette as she placed her hands on her swelled hips, giving Lucielle an unexpected glance of a new engagement ring adorning the receptionists left hand.
"Well I don't know about FAT but it is about time" teased Lucielle with a wink.
"Hey, I'm 176lbs now I'll have you know" huffed Ashley, pretending to sulk but struggling to contain her smile "that's like nearly 60lbs up since you last saw me"
"Well you come talk to me when you're crossing 600 sweetie" teased Lucielle again as she rubbed her belly through her suit jacket.
Still pretending to sulk Ashley sat back down and started on another doughnut
"Anyway..." said Ashley through a mouthful of dough "lets see where you need to be first..."
115321221121122213121121121121112.title: Ashley is stuffing her face, showing off a perk...

choices: Quite the heifer, just like the rest of the office
An extremely thin beauty
A bit chubby, growing into the role like most
1153212211211222131211211211211121.content:
"Ah! You need to head straight to Beatrice's office. She's the new HR person they hired to institute all these changes. Looks like she's expecting you first thing this morning, so you might want to start waddling her way." Ashley said as she picked up another donut. "You're just gonna go straight down this hall, and take a right at the end."

Lucielle thanked Ashley for the warm greeting and told her that they should grab a bite later, then took her leave down the pearly whites hallway. She waddled, as instructed, heaving one massive thigh in front of the other past several sets of doors.

Lucielle immediately noticed that every set of doors she past was just that, a set. Double doors seem to seal off each of the offices, and they were the wide kind of doors too.

The hallway was thankfully not too long, and as soon as she was making her right hand turn she was reading the name plackard that sat beside the only door. 'Beatrice Duff; Human Resources'

Knocking gently, she heard someone say come in, to which she complied. On the other side she found a pristine office, furnished with really nice decor. A pair of wide padded chairs sat in front of a large oak desk that matched the rest of the room. Behind the desk sat, who Lucielle could only assume was Beatrice. Beatrice just happened to be...
1153212211211222131211211211211121.title: Orientation - What's new at Gordge

choices: Beatrice proves to be incredibly attentive around the office
Lucielle discovers that not all the girls are as happy with Beatrice as she is
Alex knows Beatrice from before she was employed by Gordge
11532122112112221312112112112111212.content:
Absolutely gorgeous!
And that wasn’t just by Lucielle’s standards, Beatrice was a pinup fantasy fit for a teenagers bedroom wall or page 3 alike.

“Well well well” purred Beatrice with a dazzling smile, planting her hands delicately on her desk whilst cocking a gentile hip to one side “you must be Lucielle!”

Lucielle hesitated in her response, too busy drinking in the radiant woman before her in all her glory. The blonde heifer was loyal to a fault when it came to significant others but Beatrice certainly could turn a girl were she single.

With voluminous ginger locks pouring around her sculpted high cheek bones and resting softly on her shoulders, Beatrice stood a towering 5”10 behind her desk without taking into consideration her stylish heels which only made her even taller.
In stark contrast to all at Gordge, her height was her most dominant proportion as the rest of her body was thin to an almost obnoxious level.

“You are Lucielle, right?” asked Beatrice again, standing straight exhibiting her tightly cut waist sandwiched between a modest but still noticeable combination of hips and chest.

“Sorry Miss, yes, I’m Lucielle” pushed out the blonde through her clouded mind as she wobbled behind one of the chairs, puffing softly with a slight flush coating her cheeks.

Beatrice smirked, her ruby lips parting across pristine teeth as an almost hypnotic chuckle followed the lip movement.
“Please don’t call me Miss, I’m nowhere near old enough for that kind of title”

“Sorry, I...” started Lucielle, still softly panting to catch her breath from the walk and that moment of clapping her eyes on her new HR rep.

“You must be starving, take a seat and I’ll see what I have for you” purred Beatrice as she practically dragged Lucielle into a seat before sauntering off to one side and busied herself with a sideboard that Lucielle hadn’t noticed before.

The much larger blonde watched Beatrice as she worked, noticing the redhead’s pert backside making a shape for itself in her tight tailored skirt despite its un-Gordge like size.

“So I’m going to make this brief Lucielle because I am only here for one thing” spoke Beatrice, still working away to one side.

This sounded ominous.
Lucielle had worked long enough to know that new people in roles of responsibility wanting to do ‘one thing’ was usually trouble at the best of times.
Lucielle’s concerns, however, did not stop Beatrice’s speech continuing.

“I am here to make everybody’s life here at Gordge as easy and pleasant as is physically possible”

This felt a lot like a trap and Lucielle had questions, but before she could get any of them out Beatrice delicately placed a silver tray on the desk loaded with pastries and cakes.

“So, if you don’t mind, I’d like you to tuck in and let me know what I can do to make things better for you”
Beatrice smiled as she balanced herself on the edge of her desk, next to Lucielle’s chair, and watched the blonde as she transitioned from an audible belly rumble to reaching for something to eat to moaning with cream splattered across her lips.

“Well, erm, I guess...oh my god, this is so good!” moaned Lucielle, completely losing track of the conversation as flakes of pastry and great dollops of cream filled her mouth.

Beatrice laughed again as she rounded her desk and placed herself down into her ridiculously oversized chair, naturally meant for a more typical manger of Gordge, and clicked repeatedly at her computer.

“How about, to start with, I just put you down for regular deliveries of food directly to your office and we can tailor things from there?” chirped Beatrice with a warm smile and shining, happy blue eyes.

Lucielle intended to contemplate the situation but subconsciously moaned instead before proceeding with her food.

“I’ll take that as a yes” smirked Beatrice as she watched Lucielle devour food by the fistful “don’t feel like you have to be restrained either, enjoy yourself!”

That comment caught Lucielle slightly, not realising she was holding back until it was mentioned.
Not one to look a gift horse in the mouth though, Lucielle grabbed the tray and kicked up the pace.

*****

“Sorry to break it to you Lucielle, but I’m gonna have to hit the canteen up if you want anything else, you’ve cleared me out!”

“Mhmm, I don’t...urrrp...” groaned Lucielle as she licked her lips hungrily, tentatively groping at her belly as it ballooned out of the bottom of her shirt with her jacket barely reaching around her hips as it lay trapped beneath her bulk.

115321221121122213121121121121112123.content:
Lucielle had returned home after a long day at work, complete with several of Beatrice's prescribed snack deliveries, and an afternoon belly rub to get the bubbles out. Lucielle was eager to tell Alex about her first day back.

"Oh and our new HR rep is amazing! She had plenty of snacks for me during my meeting with her, and she said all she wants is to make our work life as easy as possible. With all the new renovations, and food options, I don't see how it isn't possible!" Lucielle gushed, as she finished a plate of finger foods her boyfriend had prepared for her.

"So this new HR lady, is she more of an Alice or a Jess?" Alex referring to his partners close work friends in relation to their weight and also personalities.

"Not really?" Lucielle thought about for the first time. Beatrice was smaller than everyone at the company, even Ashley, who seemed to be widening the margin each day.

"Don't tell me she's as gorgeous as my Lucielle." Alex joked as he served his gal a second plate.

"Quite the opposite in face. Well I mean she's quite attractive, but she's got no meat on her bones to speak of." Lucielle went on to describe her svelte new HR rep, along with her long amber hair and perfect pencil skirt booty, while she cleared the plate in front of her.

"What did you say her name was again?" Alex asked.

"Oh I didn't. Her name is Beatrice." Lucielle said with a smile. But Alex wasn't smiling.

"Oh God." Alex murmured.

"What's wrong honey? Did you forget to set a timer on the ham?" Lucielle automatic thoughts always going right to food these days.

"No, the ham is fine, it should be ready soon. It's Beatrice, I've worked with her before." Lucielle wasn't expecting that. "That makes total sense!" Alex said, having an aha moment.

"You're gonna have to explain yourself babe, and also pass those pizza pockets." Lucielle wanting to be filled in, and not only her stomach.

"Remember that old restaurant chain I told you I worked at?" Lucielle nodded, her mouth full of cheesy pizza. "While I was there, Beatrice arrived to be our new HR person. She seemed normal at first, but it wasn't long before she started making some unusual changes. It was extremely against the rules to eat during your shift if not on break, but she had that lifted almost immediately. It didn't change much, but then we started stocking the server stands with snacks, and everyone up front got their own refillable soda cup. It started slowly, but I soon noticed all their front end staff had put on a few pounds, especially the girls. Beatrice then put in a system to make sure everyone got a take home meal at the end of their shift, and so on and so forth. She pretty much wanted everyone there to get as fat as possible. It was all under the guise of employee satisfaction, but I heard from one of the older line cooks the truth."

Lucielle was hanging on every word as she polished off every crumb from her plate.

"He said HR got compensated for how much work load they had, and overweight employees generated a lot of paperwork. Reinforced chairs, additional health insurance screening, and the creme of the crop, disability. He told me disability was the end goal for greedy succubus' like her. It meant a ton of on going paperwork, and also that someone new would have to be hired to start the whole cycle over with again. The girls I worked with ballooned in the year I worked with her, and I remember one in particular that got so fat she could barely do her job. That was about the time I found a better cooking job. I'm guessing despite her success it was hard to keep up all of her ploys when you had a staff eating themselves into obesity and barely able to work. But Gordge, Gordge is the perfect place to employ her plan. They have even more resources to keep people working later into obesity, but I bet after a short while she'll have everyone there eating their way into the disability pool."

With a gentle thud, the front door to Ashley's premarital flat swung against the wall shining a pillar of moonlight into the otherwise dark hallway. Kicking off her 4 inch heels one at a time the brunette groaned softly as she settled on her feet and idly placed a hand on her distended stomach. The taxi ride home had done little to allow her to digest any of her feast but Ashley could tell that, at least internally, she was slightly less distressed than how she left Jenna's house.
Slowly waddling down the lengthy hallway so as to not shake her delicate stomach too much Ashley became aware of a slither of light escaping from around the living room door.
"You awake still babe?" called Ashley into the darkness.
Her call was met by the quiet sound of somebody rising from a sofa and the door swung open to reveal her fiancé stood within the confines of the bare wood frame.

***********

Don had originally been a client of Ashley's when she used to be a fitness coach, working as his personal trainer. Admittedly, at the time, Ashley couldn't understand why someone so...buff would need a trainer but she didn't complain as he frequently exercised without his shirt on which made a pleasant change from her usual clientele.
All became clear a few weeks in though when, during a late evening session, the two gym goers found themselves intertwined on a weight bench by Don's lead.
And from there a beautiful romance blossomed. Despite what some would call a sleazy start to their relationship, the two gelled effortlessly spending as much time together as they could muster. Don proved to be quite the romantic as time passed, often surprising Ashley with flowers and home cooked meals along with the occasional weekend away when he could afford it.
The two loved each other dearly and went from strength to strength as the months rolled by.

Alongside their relationship, the two still frequented the gym together either to work out or where Don would hang out in clear view of Ashley as she worked through her daily duties. Anybody looking in could see that Don provided something of a positive influence on the already fit Ashley and, as the months rolled into years, Ashley became more toned, eventually sporting an impressive set of abs along with some sizeable biceps and thighs that could break bricks.
Ashley's toning seemed to only enhance Don's physical attraction to her and their romance deepened, until finally Don dropped on one knee and asked his muscular girlfriend for her hand in marriage.

Happiness ensued for the couple as they started to plan their wedding, excitement growing by the day.
Sadly though, Ashley's infamous work accident came into play, striking her down in her prime and leaving her unable to walk for 3 months.
Don was attentive as ever whilst Ashley was stuck on bed rest, doting on his wife to be like a princess without a second thought. An unwitting side effect of her spoiling combined with a greatly reduced exercise regime was the loss of her muscle tone but, contrary to expectation and paranoia from Ashley, Don maintained his attraction to the brunette even as she developed a layer of pudge around her stomach from her inactivity.

As the months continued to roll by though, their wedding plans began to slow down as the couple was able to spend less time working on arrangements. Don was able to take on Ashley's old fitness coach job giving him direct access in helping her rehabilitate and, in turn, loose her injury induced puppy fat just in time for her new job as receptionist at Gordge Incorporated.

*************

"Evening beautiful, you have a good time?" Don was warmly spoken despite his deeper voice and exuded a gentle nature despite his dominating size. The 6 foot 4 muscle bound man walked towards his fiancé from his framed pose in the doorway and raised his arms to initiate a hug.
"It was so good babe, I've never eaten so much in my life" cooed Ashley with a warm smile as she nuzzled into Don's tight chest, cheek against his naked pectoral.
Contact was made as Ashley mused about her quantity of eating and, unintentionally, Don found himself rather shocked.
"Jesus babe" outcried Don, taking a step back and placing both hands on his fiancée engorged belly "did you swallow Jenna's yoga ball or something?"
Ashley snorted rather loudly, hands placed on her back causing her to push her belly out slightly further than it currently protruded.
"Jenna? Yoga? Her fat ass would burst a yoga ball honey" mused Ashley, laughing as she did before strolling past Don and passing into the living room before heavily dropping onto a sofa cushion. Don turned the corner of the room just as Ashley was shelling her dress once again to allow her body to breath like it did at Jenna's.
Taking a deep breath, Don entered the room again and sat next to Ashley slightly more delicately than she did.

"Soooo...all this was from tonight huh?" asked Don, gently prodding Ashley's spherical belly causing the young woman to groan softly with a little tickled giggle.
"Ooph, yeah this is from Jenna's" cooed Ashley in response, glancing face to face at her fiancé, smiling cutely "I feel so sexy babe, it's really arousing being this full"
"Uh huh..." muttered Don, not all that convinced "it's not uncomfortable then?"
"Not REALLY, its more pleasant now I've stopped eating for a while" replied Ashley, gently caressing her belly with her finger tips
"Well if you're happy" Don muttered again "hey, do you fancy going to the gym tomorrow?"
Ashley almost did a double take at that question, glancing at her stomach and then back at Don.
"You do see how full I am right?" teased Ashley as Don laughed nervously.
"I suppose, I just thought it might help you digest a bit, plus it helps keep that body healthy for longer" quipped Don, attempting to hold in a much stronger opinion.
Long had Don made it known he was concerned about Ashley's colleagues and their general lardiness and the possible influence it may have on his fiancée but, until tonight, Ashley had mostly resisted well and maintained her delicate physique.
Now though, a fresh wave of concern washed over him suddenly realising Ashley may be about to fall off the bandwagon.

"Well I don't know about the gym sweetie but I'd be up for a different kind of cardio, if you know what I mean" looking lustily at her man, Ashley managed to slowly drape a long leg over Don's lap whilst pressing her belly against his abs.
Don managed to resist visibly cringing and composed himself before replying.
"Not tonight babe, I'm pretty tired. I was only staying up to see you in" said the muscle man as he slid out from under Ashley's advance and headed towards the door.
Unsure if she should feel dejected or not, Ashley sidled back into a seat of her own and forced a smile at Don.
"Ok sweetie, I'll see you in the morning then?" called Ashley over her shoulder
"Will do babe, I love you" cooed Don before blowing a kiss into the room
"Night, love you too" replied Ashley, grinning more enthusiastically now as she gently pawed at her naked belly fighting a strong wave of tiredness in her comfort

As Don moved towards their bedroom he couldn't help but think that he needed to make sure Ashley got back to the gym and soon, she was dangerously close to hitting fat territory and that was a concern.
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.title: Follow Ashley home after the party

choices: Lucielle’s group (Shelly, Codi and Sarah)
Ashley’s group (Danielle, Carri and Pauline)
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
“Morning sweetie, you have a good weekend?” called Lucielle to an approaching Ashley, leaning against the receptionists’ desk as she spoke.
It became apparent very quickly however that Ashley, this morning at least, was not happy.
Practically storming towards her desk with her heels clicking against the floor with each step, Ashley’s face was that of a raging thunderstorm. The moment was slightly defused due to Ashley’s newly accumulating pudge jiggling around her hips and more prominent boobs.
Drawing level with Lucielle, Ashley shook her head sternly with an angry pout adorning her ruby lipstick lips before circling round her desk and slamming a box of company provided doughnuts down in front of her chair.
Lucielle stood slightly dumbfounded before the angry brunette but, with hunger in her eyes in the presence of two dozen doughnuts, stretched a hand out to grab a particularly plump chocolate glazed doughnut.
“Donf eben!” screeched Ashley through a mouthful of an undetermined number of doughnuts, dragging the box closer to herself and grabbing a fresh pastry in each hand.
“Woah, nobody likes Monday’s Ash but you are way grumpy” mused Lucielle, placing her hands on Ashley’s desk and filling the receptionists forward view with tightly constructed boobs and belly, the latter straining a poor button up shirt more as the blondes belly surged towards the desk in front of her.
Swallowing hard and sighing, Ashley places the remaining held doughnut on her desk and looked to her larger colleague.

“Sorry Lu, I’m just so tired and hungry. Don dragged me to the gym three times after Friday night and he’s a total dick for it” grumbled Ashley, resuming her doughnut and chewing slowly with a line of jam escaping her mouth only to be retrieved by her finger.
‘Wow’ breathed Lucielle in her head before addressing her curvy friend.
“I’m sorry babe, that sucks” said Lucielle reassuringly, sloping round the desk and wrapping an arm around Ashley’s shoulder as she ate leading the brunette to lean against her friend, continuing to eat doughnuts with her head resting on Lucielle’s hip.
“Anyway, I don’t wanna talk about it” declared Ashley, wiping her mouth with the back of her hand “when do the internship people get here?”
“Oh they’re already here, Jenna’s giving them an introduction in conference room five” replied Lucielle, bouncing herself onto her feet to give Ashley space to stand.
“Well then I guess we best head on down” smiled the smaller receptionist, practically skipping out of her chair and towards the conference room.

******************

“And lastly, before I hand you over to your program coordinators, I hope you find Gordge Inc to be a place you can thrive and become young professionals in the world of business” concluded Jenna, stood at the front of the room addressing the six young women sat before her.
Lucielle and Ashley were already familiar with the women before them, having combed over their applications extensively, but were both elated to be meeting them in person for the first time.
Well some of them anyway, three of the individuals before them were actually familiar faces.
For Lucielle, there was the recognisable couple of young waitresses she had met when she had gone for dinner with Jessica and Alice a couple of weeks back; Shelly and Carri.
Dressed smartly for their young ages, 19 and 18 respectively, the two looked most nervous of all the girls there with Shelly particularly shifting her weight backwards and forwards on her chair. She caught Lucielle’s briefly, eliciting a small friendly wave from the bottom heavy blonde. Blushing, Shelly glanced at her knees and didn’t look up again.

Ashley also recognised one of women in the audience, although far less pleasantly.
Danielle was something of a bitch. Currently sat back in her chair with arms folded and one leg crossed over the other, the 5’10 brunette wore something of a cocky smirk across her delicate lips, emerald eyes burning through her glasses and focusing on Jenna as she spoke. Ashley knew the now 24 year old from her trainer days when she was a client looking to drop some weight which had led to the pair clashing frequently, particularly with Danielle feeling intimidated by the well toned and muscular Ashley back in her fitness prime. However, with Danielle now thinner than Ashley, and with a striking half sleeve tattoo on each arm protruding from the tailored cap sleeves of her shirt, the taller woman internally felt dominance was hers.

This then left the remaining three women, including the largest of the group.
Pauline was something of a weighty marvel, her hourglass shape was very apparent even from her seated position and her tightly fitted three piece suit was stretched in all directions by curves and bulges. Sitting at approximately 260lbs she was by far the heaviest intern on the program, even outweighing Ashley by 80 or so pounds.
Descending in size led to Codi who was a little...unexpected in comparison.
With jet black shoulder length hair framing a delicately chubby face and a side cut that covered part of her face, Codi was an out and out goth. With thick eye makeup and full dark red tinted lips, Codi was quite an imposing figure in the room as she glanced forward quite blankly whilst patting her black and red striped dress down and smoothing it across her lap which comprised of some visibly thick thighs. Stretching back slightly also provided view of a gently curving stomach which, despite her dark exterior, made her appear typical of a Gordge office girl.
Lastly, and rounding out the package, was Sarah who for all intents and purposes was a stowaway in the intern program. Having stumbled across an advert for the intern program, Sarah applied immediately having just graduated in business at the tender age of 21, and was promptly accepted onto the program. Little did anyone at Gordge realise however that Sarah would then be getting on a plane and flying from England to partake in the program. After much discussion and searching it became apparent that Sarah had stumbled across an unintentional foreign applicants advert that had not been intended to ship out and had been removed upon realising the mistake. Not before the blonde Brit could finish her application and secure herself a fully paid position with accommodation and board in the states though.

“Anyway, allow me to introduce to you your program leaders, Lucielle and Ashley” announced Jenna, stepping to one side and allowing Lucielle and Ashley to step forward.
Brimming with excitement, Lucielle took the lead allowing Ashley to stand to her side.
“Good morning ladies, we’re so pleased to finally meet you all, I hope you’re as excited as we are to start this new venture at Gordge” announced the blonde to the awaiting audience.
“I can’t wait to get to know you all better but first things first myself and Ashley are going to take three of you each and get the all important admin sorted” continued Lucielle, smiling widely at the women in front of her.
The pair had been working towards this none stop since her return to work and it was a beautiful thing to finally see it all come together.
With a cheeky sideways smile at Ashley, the titanic blonde continued.
“So, lets get started!”
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.title: Skip straight to Monday and starting the intern...

choices: Continue with Lucielle’s team
Check in on Ashley’s team
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
“So, Shelly, Codi and Sarah, if you guys follow me we can get started” Lucielle chirped with a great deal of excitement with her hands on her hips, smiling at the women before her.
As the six girls rose from their seats and started to sort themselves into groups Lucielle felt a sharp slap on her hip, provoking her to face the direction of the pain. This brought her face to face with a panic stricken Ashley
“You said you were going to take Danielle!” hissed Ashley, noticeably frustrated with the situation.
Lucielle pondered for a moment before remembering their discussion a few days before.
“Oh shit, sorry babe!” mumbled Lucielle having to bite back a giggle at her blunder “I totally forgot, we can’t swap now though”
Ashley seethed and went to continue her rant but the two leaders found themselves surrounded by their new budding prodigies, cutting the imminent conversation short before it could start.
“You’ll be fine sweets, just keep smiling” called Lucielle over her shoulder as she led her team away.
Ashley’s face was a picture as she scowled after the jiggling blonde but quickly relaxed to cover her frustration as she took in her group.

Shelly, Codi and Sarah followed behind the immense team leader as she sashayed down the corridor, hips much closer to the walls than you would expect. Certainly closer than the three interns expected anyway.
“Wow she’s big” exhaled Sarah, her delicate accent cutting the otherwise silent walk.
“Wow you’re not...American” stammered Shelly, shocked at this revelation having been too nervous to acquaint herself with any of the other interns. She had, apparently foolishly, hoped that she would be with Carri at least on the first day.
Codi spat a disgruntled groan completely lost for words at the two naive youngsters and maintained her silence, opting instead to fixate on smoothing her dress as she walked accenting her chubby stomach as she did.
Ignoring the vocalised distaste of her gothic companion, Sarah instead giggled at the young waitress’ observation regarding her accent.
“Not quite chick, England’s more my home turf” smiled the blonde Brit, extending a hand to Shelly
Shelly found herself feeling more relaxed instantly and took the slender hand extended to her.
“Sarah” smiled the Brit again as she introduced herself
“Shelly” nervously added the youngest member of the group
“Pleasure to meet you Shelly” Sarah cooed, tightly grasping Shelly’s hand and leaning towards her “don’t be so nervous, it’ll be fine”

Lucielle smiles to herself as she led the three interns following her, they were already bonding!

Codi rolled her eyes as the other two girls started to bond and slowed her pace slightly to allow them to get closer without involving her. Whilst holding Shelly’s hand still, Sarah turned to look at Codi.
“I’m sorry, Codi right?” ushered Sarah, trying to welcome the goth girl.
“Uh huh” grunted the black haired girl, still not wishing to be involved.
“Well come her silly, we’re going to be working together so we might as well get used to each other” invited the Brit, reclaiming her hand before offering it to Codi.
Reluctant at first, Codi eventually shook the hand offered to her and felt a slight twinge of warmth.
‘I guess she isn’t too bad’ mused the goth to herself
“See, not so bad was it chick?” posed Sarah, offering a follow up smile to test the waters.
Codi stiffened up slightly “just don’t call me chick, ok?”
Taken aback by the rebuttal of her pleasantries, Sarah shrugged it off and smiled “no worries! I’m just so excited to be here, I’ve never been to America and Gordge sounds like such a great company to work for”
“You don’t say” muttered Codi, mostly to herself, eyeing how skinny Sarah was particularly against the backdrop of the office they found themselves in.
“Sorry to interrupt you guys, it’s so nice to hear you getting to know each other, but we’re here now and unfortunately we’ve got to get some serious things done” called Lucielle as she nudged the door to her office open, presenting the large space to the three girls who were all knocked back as the walked in.

Having been freshly refurbished, Lucielle’s office was a huge largely open space furnished with a desk, her personal leather exec chair (which was wider than any other chair of its type the three interns had ever seen) and a medley of chairs for meetings, three of which were set facing her desk for the interns.
Alongside this there was also a second desk in one corner with its own leather exec situated behind it, a sofa against one wall, a large ‘mini’ fridge undoubtedly filled with a range of food and drink predetermined by Lucielle for snacking throughout the day.
Amongst other furnishings though was a wide spread platter of pastries that was nothing shy of typical for the office waiting for the four girls to delve into.
“So ladies, if you’d like to take a seat we can get started” invited Lucielle, heavily landing in her own seat causing an noticeable ‘poof’ of stress from her seat cushion with her enormous arse tightly packed between the arm rests of her chair.
“Oh and please, do take something to eat” smiled Lucielle as she herself grabbed a dense chocolate filled pastry of some description before taking a large bite and softly moaning.

**************

Laughter swelled from within Lucielle’s office which prompted smiles from all who passed as she processed the budding interns, preparing their credentials and uploading them on the office intranet.
Very much led by Sarah’s bubbling enthusiasm, Shelly had relaxed considerably and Codi had, for lack of a better phrase, removed the stick from her arse as the girls bonded with each other and Lucielle.
As the ‘boring’ paperwork side of things came to a close, chitchat started to flow and the girls all became oblivious to how much they were eating.
“So you’re from England, Sarah?” asked Lucielle as she inhaled another doughnut
“Mhmph” nodded Sarah, hovering a hand in front of her mouth as she bit into an eclair “yeah, it’s crazy been here but I’m loving it so far!” cooed the blonde as she reached for a danish to chase her eclair down with “these are so good!” enthused the blonde as she took a bite of the flakey pastry.
“You said it” purred Codi as she reached for a bear claw that was nearly as big as her head. The chunky goth couldn’t help but notice the svelte Brit was no longer flat stomached at this point, although the irony of her own bloating was lost on her as she pulled coyly at the hem of her dress to cover her thighs slightly more than previously.
Shelly was sat quietly, slowly pulling a cronut apart and placing small pieces in her mouth having made something of a pig of herself, not that anyone noticed or judged.

“Well, to be honest girls, now that that’s all done there’s not a lot planned for the rest of the day” mused Lucielle “we had set aside today for your admin because we expected it to take ages but we’ve flown through it”
“Aww, and we were having so much fun” grumbled Sarah with a slow roll of her eyes
“Yeah right” spat Codi as she idly traced her stomach through her dress “so can we go now?” asked the goth, adjusting herself in her seat.
“Sadly not” chuckled Lucielle “think my boss would give me a hard time if I let you off so early, it’s not even been lunch yet”
This stirred the young waitress at the end of the line of interns
“What?! But we’ve eaten so much already” groaned Shelly.
Lucielle chuckled again, smiling at the youngest of the group “don’t worry sweetie, you don’t have to eat all the time”
Again feeling oddly reassured, Shelly smiled and relaxed in her chair a little.
“Ok, how about you guys just relax for a second and I’ll go find something for you guys to do” Lucielle announced, heaving herself from her chair which pinched around her arse cheeks slightly as she rose “won’t be a second” bounced the bulging blonde as she headed to the door and made a sharp jiggling left turn.
Sat in silence as Lucielle lumbered away, the three interns glanced at each other in varying states of fullness.
“Wow, she really is fat” cooed Sarah with Lucielle’s girth engraved in her brain at this point.
“Keep eating like that Union and you won’t be far behind her” interjected Codi with a wry smile painted on her lips
Perplexed, Sarah lent forward with a slight scowl to confront the goth “Union?”
“Check your flag chick” nonchalantly purred Codi as she bit into another bear claw, winking at the skinny blonde.
The thought process glazed across Sarah’s face before the penny dropped and she laughed.
“Yeah well, maybe being fat when you’re THAT happy isn’t so bad” mused the Brit, daydreaming slightly as she spoke.
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.title: Lucielle’s group (Shelly, Codi and Sarah)

choices: Follow the leaders - Lucielle and Ashley catch up at the end of the day
Follow the interns - Early finish, early bonding
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
As the young interns continued to chat between themselves, their exceptionally large group leader returned with a radiant smile on her face.
“Well girls, I have some good news for you” chimed Lucielle as she rounded her desk and took to her oversized desk chair, illiciting a laboured groan from the poor overtaxed furniture.
The three girls opposite Lucielle became engaged to varying degrees, eager to know the ‘good news’ that was about to be bestowed upon them.

“I’ve spoken to my boss and she’s informed me that your positions within the company have been assigned!” Lucielle spoke to her small audience as she delicately picked through any remaining morsels of sweet pastry left scattered on her desk.
“Oooooh” cooed Sarah, sitting slightly more upright out of interest “so we’re not just shadowing people, we’re actually going to be playing a role here?” asked the Brit, slightly surprised at the forward attitude been upheld at Gordge.
“Absolutely!” declared Lucielle “you’re all capable young adults and we want to be able to give you the best opportunities throughout your stay with us”
“That’s awesome” smiled the young Brit, relaxing back into her chair with a curvy smile across her lips.

“So, without further ado” started Lucielle as she produced a small post it note with three lines of scrawl on it “Sarah, you’re going to be joining the business team. After your success at university we figured the best place for you would be on the front line so you’ll be taking part in business meetings, dealing with clients directly and negotiating profitable deals”
Overcome, Sarah lost her until now rock solid composure and descended into squealing excitement
“Oh my god, I’ve always wanted to be part of a business team!” outburst the svelte blonde “do I get to go on business lunches and smooth talk with clients?!”
Chuckling at Sarah’s enthusiasm, Lucielle temporarily placed her post it down to respond
“Well, maybe not straight away but if you’re capable I’m sure you will in the near future” nodded the much larger blonde

Leaving Sarah to bubble in her excitement, Lucielle turned to Codi.
“Codi” proceeded Lucielle “having taken into account your natural flair for fashion and design we’ve decided to put you with the branding team where you’ll be helping to build our new image. We’ve recently undergone a big refurbishment and are still trying to nail down our new theme”
Much more relaxed than her foreign colleague, Codi simply nodded before speaking.
“Sounds cool” the hefty goth bluntly interjected before giving in to her second wind and reaching for a doughnut

“Now, last but by no means least” teased Lucielle as she scrunched her note up and tossed it towards the bin, looking sweetly towards Shelly “you’ll be working alongside me sweetie as my personal assistant”
Having been very quiet to this point, Shelly perked up slightly at the position she had been offered. Although she hardly knew Lucielle and had in fact offended her last time they spoke before today, the ex-waitress found an odd comfort in knowing she would be working alongside the titanic blonde woman rather than a complete stranger.
“Thank you” stammered the youngest member of the team “I won’t let you down”
“I know you won’t sweetie” smiled Lucielle as she leaned back in her chair, fighting the urge to indulge any more from the remaining feast before her.

*************

“Well, with all that done and out of the way there really is nothing else for you ladies to do today” mused Lucielle with an idle scratch of her bulging side beneath the tight confines of her buttoned shirt.
“So we can go?” asked Sarah, wiping a chocolate smear from the edge of her mouth to between her lips; an unapologetic tell of the chocolate muffin she had just devoured.
“You certainly can, might as well get out and enjoy the rest of your days and we’ll start you properly all off properly tomorrow” replied Lucielle
Apparently not needing to be told twice, the three intern girls promptly rose from their seats and made for the glass door dividing Lucielle’s office from the main office floor.
“See you tomorrow!” called Sarah over her shoulder with a small wave to match as she passed through the door and disappeared out of sight behind the frosted glass.
Codi slunk our without a word whilst Shelly uttered a simple ‘bye’ in her meek and timid way,

Quite contented with how the day had gone, Lucielle smiled to herself and closed her eyes for a moment.
The moment was indeed short lived though as her mighty stomach began to grumble beneath her shirt, prompting the bottom heavy blonde to crack one eye open again.
“Well this won’t do” she spoke to herself “Alex would have a fit if he could hear me this hungry”
Sitting properly in her chair, Lucielle glanced briefly at the picture on her desk of her stood with Alex. It was early in their relationship for sure, if she remembered rightly she had only been around the 480lb mark when it was taken and certainly much smaller than the queen of gluttony she was now...
Losing herself in her memories and blissfully unaware she was massaging her own belly, Lucielle swiped up her desk phone and punched in a quick internal code

“Hi Jenny, yeah it’s Lu, could you get a conference platter sent to my office please? Thank you!”
As the phone clicked down, Lucielle again smiled to herself as she waited for her food to arrive, casually rubbing the immense covered surface of her belly in idle self adoration.
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.title: Continue with Lucielle’s team

choices: Celebratory girls night wins out
Fitness comes first
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
“Urgh, you would not believe the day I’ve had Lu,it has been absolutely insane” grumbled Ashley as she pushed Lucielle’s office door open “I hope you’ve had a better...”
Mid sentence, the brunette receptionist glanced up at her coleader and knew the answer to her question immediately without an answer.
“...day” with a wry smile of an impressed nature painted across her lips, Ashley softly put a hand on her hip as she looked over her colleague. Ashley knew that Lucielle’s team had taken off some time before lunch and, as it was now around 5pm, she had expected something along these lines but the end result was quite remarkable.

Looking completely unphased, Lucielle was perched in her desk chair with her shirt completely untucked allowing for an impressive roll of pale belly fat to sit heavily on her thighs. Despite the release of her shirt, the white material was still pulled tight around her vast sides and bulging hips which had the knock on effect of leaving her buttons clinging on for dear life over the much rounder expanse of belly trying to surge forward to join the exposed lower roll.

“It’s nice to see you’ve been busy babe” teased Ashley, pulling a chair alongside the bloated blonde, prodding her exposed flank for effect.
“Well you look just as busy if I might add sweetie” retorted Lucielle, making a clear observation towards the bloated state of her colleague.
“Yeah well, I just have stress eaten like a thousand doughnuts after we split” confessed the brunette, sounding caught between disappointed with herself and ready to do it all again.
Although the exaggeration was obvious, it was apparent she had eaten a lot of a girl her size seeing as she had been in work.

As was the case for a growing girl like Ashley, her dress had already started the day tight but was now even more so. Wrapped tightly around a bulging belly curve, the poor garments hem line had risen a good inch or so up the brunettes thighs and was now so tight around her rear that her underwear was visible from any distance. Ashley had really been pounding the doughnuts today, that’s for sure.
The fat girl aesthetic was not helped by the half empty box of a dozen doughnuts she had brought with her.

“Well sue me” declared Ashley “I eat my feelings now so I expect mobility aid by the end of the week as it will be required”. As if to labour the point, she defiantly took a large bite of her next doughnut with a slight up turned nose.

Lucielle chuckled softly as she reached for more of her own food.
“I say we celebrate tonight. We had a successful first day and we’re finally on the move with our internship program!” suggested Lucielle, staring intently at the smaller girl to her side.
With an unexpected amount of eagerness Ashley replied.
“You know what, we totally should. I had a crappy weekend and we both deserve to be happy” replied Ashley, the defiance running strong at this point.
“Yay!” cheered Lucielle “what do you want to do though?” she asked, not wanting to scare Ashley’s enthusiasm away too easily.
“Well...” started the brunette before being cut off by the chime of her phone receiving a text message “just a sec” she paused as she grabbed her phone to read the message.
Lucielle could see from the changing expression on her face that it was not a happily received message.

“Urgh, stupid Don wants to go to the gym again tonight and wants to know when I’m finishing work” groaned Ashley, her reluctance clear as the weekends resent was kicked up again.

Unsure of how to constructively advise her friend, Lucielle awkwardly rearranged her bulk around her chair before clearing her throat
“Look, I’m no expert on these things Ash but if you don’t want to go to the gym just tell him, you guys are engaged after all”
“Yeah I guess” murmured Ashley, fiddling with her ring as she spoke, noticing it’s slightly tighter than it used to be.

**************

Deliberations continued for quite some time, turning into a full blown conversation with pros and cons been thrown between the two bloated beauties, all whilst food flowed a plenty into their waiting mouths.

“Do you think Alex could beat Don in a fight?” asked Ashley
“You what?” spat Lucielle, unable to get her head around where that came from
“I’m just thinking, what if I came and lived with you guys for a few months, Alex makes me enormously fat so I can’t go to the gym and then we tell Don” elaborated Ashley with far too much sincerity in her voice.
“Well” pondered the blonde member of the party “as sweet as Alex is and as good as he is at doing diabolical things to a girls waistline I don’t think he’d be much good in a fight”
“Shame” mumbled Ashley around a mouthful of doughnut
“Just be honest with him babe” Lucielle offered up whilst nudging Ashley’s phone towards her “its entirely up to you”
“Urgh, fine” complained the brunette, unlocking her phone and opening the message from Don to reply...
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.title: Follow the leaders - Lucielle and Ashley catch ...

choices: The girls have some great banter in the car
It's not long before they arrive at the venue for this evening
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
*Don, I'm going out with the girls from work tonight. It's important, we will have to go to the gym another time.* Send.

Very quickly a reply came back. *...Which girls?* Ashley knew why he was asking. Ashley's co-workers came in many shapes and sizes, and some of them didn't meet Don's standards of "good friend material".

*Alice, Jessica, and Lucielle.* Ashley could hear the groan across town as it showed 'Read by Don' in small letters below her message. *But it doesn't matter who I'm going with, just the fact that it's important to me, and for my work, and I'm doing it.*

*We will go in the morning then.* Was all he said. Even that didn't seem like a good compromise to Ashley, but it was enough to get it off her mind for now.

"Alright Lu, are you happy? I was honest, I did it." She said of her begrudging success.

"Not until we get to this place, I can already smell their nachos!" Lucielle spat with glee, as she rocked herself out of her chair so she could try and make herself presentable again. Tucking everything where is should go, the two Departed the office to grab their comrades before heading out for the night. Before long the four we're pulled into one of their cars and bustling away from the business park.
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.title: Celebratory girls night wins out

choices: Take the shot
Designated driver Ashley
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
"So you mentioned some pretty, in your words, legendary nachos Lu?" asked Ashley tentatively as she stepped out of the car, feeling the cool air of the night hug her exposed legs.
"That's right!" shouted Lucielle as she pulled herself from the drivers seat of her car and joined Ashley in the carpark of their chosen venue for the night "there isn't a better Mexican restaurant within 50miles, trust me I've checked" chuckled Lucielle, giving her smaller colleague a playful nudge as she attempted to tug her shirt down to cover her exposed hanging belly.

Mexican...Ashley's favourite...Don was going to kill her

Biting her lip, Ashley looked on apprehensively feeling a great deal of turmoil with the impending shitstorm with Don whilst trying to ignore the grumbling of her stomach. As she awkwardly bounced from one high heeled foot to the other as a way of resisting the cold slightly, the other two members of their party exited the vehicle behind them, much to the audible relief of Lucielle's car suspension.

"Well are we just going to stand out here all night?" Jessica sharply interjected, brushing up against Ashley from behind.
The weight behind Jessica's stomach knocked Ashley off balance slightly, causing her to totter a couple of steps forward which was enough of a green flag the rest of the group needed to jiggle their way towards food.

*****************

"Good evening and how may we serve you tonight?" asked a middle aged Hispanic man just inside the door.
Obviously on autopilot he didn't look at the fresh patrons as he spoke but was taken aback when he did finally glance upon them.

"Lucielle!" outcried the man, throwing his arms in the air "hermosa dama, it's been so long!"
"It has!" replied the titanic blonde at the front of the group, returning the man's gesture resulting in her belly been exposed even more
"I see that boy has been keeping you fed, I hope we dont disappoint tonight" mused the server, offering a slight bow of his head
"I'm sure you couldn't even if you tried" laughed Lucielle as she, again, tried to straighten her shirt

"Anyway, its not just me tonight" mused the blonde as she sidestepped slightly to reveal the rest of the group "I've brought some friends with me, we're celebrating, particularly...this one!" clarified Lucielle as she dragged Ashley to the front of the group causing her to stumble and allowing her developing assets to wobble slightly.

"Well, let me get you a table and you ladies can start to celebrate" announced the man, disappearing further into the restaurant as he spoke.

Smiling ear to ear with her own feeling of success, Lucielle turned back to the group
"I hope this suits you guys, I know the food here is fantastic and I figured our little Ashley could do with a pick me up" said Lucielle, squeezing Ashley's shoulder as she spoke
'Damn' thought Ashley 'Lu did know Mexican was her favourite'
Dread swimming through her mind at what Don would have to say when she got home, the brunette found herself quickly engrossed in her own hunger and also inspecting her surroundings.

Brightly decorated with wall length murals of stereotypical Mexican scenes, the surprisingly large restaurant felt exceptionally homely, even as a complete stranger. A smattering of other customers could be seen throughout the open plan dining area, not what one would call a crowd, and were all in the throws of their meals or conversation. Amongst the noise, Ashley could also make out the faint sound of a Mariachi band in the background playing through the concealed speakers in the corners of the room.
None of these things quite compared to the intoxicating aromas wafting through the place though. Ashley had long adored Mexican cuisine, considering it her favourite by quite a margin. Back during her bodybuilding days, Ashley took great pride in loading her cheat days and muscle bulking meals with obscene amounts of Mexican calories to impressive results on her figure. She once jokingly declared her six pack was made of tortillas and fried meats to a room of in-awe gym clients. Since taking up work at Gordge though she had limited her intake greatly, indeed, Don rarely even had the stuff in the house so as to avoid temptation for the long since horizontally expanding brunette.

"Aww no, whats up Ash?" cooed Alice, innocent of the situations that had arisen between the receptionist and her fiance.
"I erm..." stumbled Ashley, feeling foolish for bringing up the problem and not wanting to paint Don in too dark a light, he DID only want the best for her after all.
"She's just been in a bit of a funk with all the stress of the internship, not had much time to let off steam because of it" interjected Lucielle, an internal sigh of relief rattling through Ashley.
"Mhm" breathed Jess from the back of the group with a slight air of disgruntled attitude with her meaty arms folded over her impressive gut "like what we do is 'letting off steam'"

"Don't be such a negative nancy" chastised Alice. In an odd turn of events over the past few weeks, Alice's confidence regarding her weight had blossomed, fortunately for her as her weight had also continued to blossom.
This proved to be in stark contrast to the still larger Jessica who found herself plagued by the conflict suffered by many women; wanting to eat to her heart's desire but not wanting to gain any weight. The issue became even more complicated when taking into account Jess's recent tendency of going home from work and downing ice cream by the pint in her underwear.

*************

"Sorry for the wait ladies, your table is ready" announced Miguel (as the girls had been informed by Lucielle their server was called).
