"Thank you Miguel" smiled Lucielle with an almost sickly sweetness as she squeezed past the hispanic man and proceeded through the restaurant
As the four ladies made their way past other tables, Ashley couldn't help but notice how much she had grown recently.

Although, in the grand scheme of things and given her current company, her weight gain to date can hardly be considered vast, the brunette became very aware of how often she had to turn slightly to allow her hips to pass through gaps she would have once thought easy to pass without such a motion.
It also dawned on Ashley just how much her thighs rubbed together nowadays. Never one to sport a true thigh gap, there was at least once a time where her thighs weren't so tightly pressed against each other, particularly, not as far south as they currently were.

Lost in her thoughts, Ashley was blissfully unawares of their arrival at their table in one corner of the restaurant, only been drawn back to reality when the smell of food hit her nostrils.

"Here we are ladies" announced Lucielle as she stood at one end of the long table adorned with a feast traditionally fit for a few more than their current party size.
Traditionally speaking anyway, and if we know one thing about Gordge employees they are far from traditional eaters.
Especially not with a burrito eating queen in their midst.

Ashley looked on completely dumbstruck and the quantity of food before them, mindlessly salivating as her stomach growled from within the confines of her dress.
"Swear to God Lu, you will not be happy until we're all as big as you" groaned Jess, awkwardly tugging at her dress whilst trying to ignore her own stomachs' demands
"And we'll love you all the same Jessy Pie" teased Lucielle as she poured a tequila shot out for each of the girls.

"This is amazing!" squacked Alice with a big smile across her face as she took one of the glasses from Lucielle "thanks for organising this"
"Pffft" snorted Lucielle as she passed out the remaining drinks, leaving herself with one "I didn't organise this, this is just how this place does celebrations".
Unseen by the other girls, Lucielle raised her glass slightly to the watching Miguel and threw him a wink of appreciation. The Hispanic man smiled to himself before returning to the table he was wiping down at that particular moment.

"Anyway!" declared Lucielle, raising her glass in the air "thank you all for coming tonight, now lets get our eat on!"
As the blonde spoke, Ashley tentatively nursed her glass as she saw two distinct paths before her of how the night was going to progress. Lost in thought, she stared through the golden liquid to the bottom of the glass knowing that this one drink would dictate the rest of the night...
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.title: It's not long before they arrive at the ven...

choices: Ashley wakes up and goes home for a tough talk
Ashley stays the night with Lucielle and Alex
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
*157 minutes later*

"I used to be a bodybuilder, y'know?" slurred Ashley, a drained shotglass in one hand and the remnants of some type of Mexican dish dripping through the fingers of the other.
The other three girls, all positioned around the table, giggled to varying degrees at this declaration as they continued to munch through any food they could reach.
"No, I'm serious" shouted the brunette far louder than she would have had she been remotely sober still.
"I used to be..." the receptionist paused to take a bit out of the mush in her hand before continuing, ignoring the strings of cheese and sauce covering her cheeks at this point "...a competition lifting, weight winning bodybuilder"
"Oh I bet" giggled Lucielle. Now, Lucielle was well aware that Ashley used to be a bodybuilder, remnants of that life were still apparent when the receptionist joined Gordge, but intoxication on its own level had impacted her serious nature leaving her to sarcastically quiz her friend instead.

"You should because you'd win because I was one!" shouted Ashley again, leaning over the table towards her friend and invading her personal space far more than she would dream of doing were she in control of her senses.

"Oh yeah, well..." started Jessica from the other side of the table, her mouth partly full with nachos and beef "if you were a bodybuilder then why are you so FAT?"
The whole table burst out laughing at the dark haired woman's inflection on the dreaded F word, including Ashley who was still leant over the table and blissfully ignorant of her stomach gently slapping against the table with each laboured inhale of laughter, her dress doing little to conceal her bloated state.

"Past tense Jessica, jeez" sighed Ashley whilst rolling her eyes, slowly pulling her legs up to her bum and clumsily sitting heavily on the table "anyway, if I'm fat then YOU must be fat too!" screeched the brunette as she lazily attempted to hurl her handful of food at Jessica, falling short of her target and it landed rather wetly on the surface of the table instead.

Alice, having been relatively quiet at this point, snickered whilst lathargically spooning mouthfuls of cheesey meats into her waiting mouth, occasionally alternating with a bite of tortilla.

"You are not wrong Ash" mused Jessica, at peace with herself now she'd got tipsy rather than her usual angsty self.
"I know right!" grumbled the brunette on the table, chewing her lip and reaching for the spirit bottle
"That's enou..." started Lucielle, looking dizzy, but was cut short as Ashley rambled on still.

"I mean, aren't we all fat? Like, really?" questioned Ashley, lost in a perculiar drunken philosophy moment as she continued to flail around looking for comfort in her current position.
"Erm..." thought Alice aloud before being cut off also
"I mean, Alice is fat, Jessica's fat, Lucy Elly is REALLY fat..."
Upon clumsily referring to her friend, Ashley turned on her bum and flopped towards Lucielle, landing boobs and face first against the blonde's immense belly.
"I love you babe!" cooed Ashley, looking doe eyed at Lucielle as she began to knead her friend's belly fat

Confused whether to feel her usual arousal or feel weird that her friend was now groping her, Lucielle attempted to slide Ashley back onto the table.
"I mean, I love you too ba..." attempted Lucielle before drunken Ashley returned to the fray
"And Alex loves you too! Like he really loves you, he loves that you're fat, he's making you fat!" cried Ashley, refusing to let go of her new toy in Lucielle's belly
"I know sweetie, I know" replied Lucielle, looking desperately to Alice and Jessica for some back up with their friend.
Neither of the fellow colleagues seemed to understand the urgency of the matter though as they continued to stuff their already considerably stuffed faces.

"Don doesn't love me fat" murmured Ashley, resting her chin against Lucielle as she spoke rather somberly
"Ok, I think its time we got you home sweetie" assured Lucielle, attempting to lift Ashley up enough to escape her grasp to no avail.
"Why doesn't he love me fat Lu?" asked Ashley, tears starting to well in her eyes as she spoke
"I'm sure that's not true honey, come on, we'll get you home and maybe you guys can talk?" offered the bigger blonde, trying to defuse the situation before a full blown breakdown occurs.
"He won't listen to me!" cried Ashley, this time with a proper blubber to her voice as tears streamed down her face, taking lines of mascara with them
"Shhhh, its ok" sighed Lucielle, this time allowing Ashley to sink down against her as she pulled her phone from her bag and dialled Alex's number

Alice and Jessica suddenly became aware of the situation before them as the sound of Ashley's cries cut through to them.
Unsure of what to do, Alice looked at Jess for advice who simply shrugged before diving back into the enchillada before her.

"Hello?"
"Hey honey, can you come pick me up, Ashley's having a hard time of things and needs to get home"
"No problem, I'll be there in 15"

******************

"Hey guys, hows it going?" asked Alex as he strolled towards the warzone that was the girls table.
"Its been better if we're honest sweetie" replied Lucielle, looking rather downtrodden with a now sleeping Ashley laid against her front.
"So I gathered" nodded Alex "She coming home with us or we taking her home?"
Lucielle shrugged, dislodging Ashley some and causing a line of drool to leak onto Lucielle's exposed belly.
Shuddering at the warm and wet sensation the blonde continued.
"She couldn't decide before she crashed out so I guess if we set off and see if she wakes up? Is that ok?"
"Course it is" said Alex with a slight smile, reassuringly squeezing his girlfriend's meaty shoulder.

*****************

After quite some time, the two girls had managed to get into Alex's car and, much like an over tired toddler, Ashley had not even stirred.
"Who knew Miguel was so strong eh?" joked Alex with a whisper so as not to wake their passanger.
"I'm sure he's carried heavier customers than Ash, shes still only a shrimp in comparison to most of their customers" mused Lucielle, thinking of herself the first time she had regaled the place.
"True" nodded Alex again, concentrating on driving in the dark as they went whilst also avoiding any bumps where possible so as not to disturb Ashley

"Oh" started Lucielle "remind me to text Jess tomorrow morning will you?"
"Sure, why?" asked Alex, slightly perplexed by the request
"Just need to remind her that if she keeps eating whilst there's a crisis going on she really will be as fat as me" Lucielle bluntly said.
"Obviously" teased Alex sarcastically. Although he knew there was a joke in there he also knew that Lucielle begrudged having to help their friend out on her own.

Sensing the tension, Alex stretched a hand out and gently rubbed a monstrously thick thigh next to him "she'll be ok"
Lost in her own thoughts on the matter, Lucielle simply grunted and nodded
'I hope you're right' thought the blonde, as she watched the streetlights go by
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.title: Take the shot

choices: ...Bo
...Lucielle
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
"Did you have a good time at least?" asked Alex, glancing over to his girlfriend.
He knew the situation had gone south but he couldn't stand the silence much longer.
"Yeah it was actually a good night, just a little too much alcohol I guess" murmured Lucielle.

"Well I'm glad for that at least" smiled Alex, glad that there was a high point to the night at least.
Tiredness and the momentary distraction from the road though caused Alex to hit a pothole, shaking the whole car and waking Ashley

"What's going on?" mumbled the brunette, hair splattered across her face and mouth as she put minimal effort into sitting up.
"Hey sweetie, Alex came and picked us up" replied Lucielle, taking a moment to look after her shoulder. Despite the seriousness of the moment she couldn't help but smirk at the state her friend was in. Usually one to take great pride in her appearance, Ashley certainly was a sight at this point as she attempted to remove strands of hair from her mouth.

"Oh...ok" Ashley mumbled again, rather confused. Last thing she could remember was taking a huge bite of a burrito and that must have been a long time ago by the feels of it.
"You had any thoughts about what Lu asked you before you got in the car?" asked Alex, taking considerably more caution on the road now.
"Huh? Question?" Drawing a complete blank Ashley couldn't for the life of her remember, inadvertently answering the question anyway.
"Oh shit, I've got to get home!"

Having responded to the question, Ashley fished her phone out from a handbag, which had been used as a pillow, and was greeted with a bombardment of notifications with Don's name on them.

"Shit" mumbled the receptionist, mostly to herself, as she slumped heavily back in her seat with an uncontrollable urge to cry.

Noticing the situation starting to deteriorate again, Lucielle intervened.
"Are you sure you want to? You've had a pretty rough night" asked the blonde, concern growing for her friend.
"No, no...I've got to sort this" quietly mused Ashley as she texted Don.

'Sorry I didn't text back. Coming home now xxx'

Almost immediately after the message was sent, it flashed up as 'read' with a reply not far behind.

'Thank god, I was worried about you, see you soon xxx'

Well, he wasn't too mad at least, sighed Ashley, sensing upset may be just around the corner.

"Well, if you're sure Ash" murmured Lucielle from the front, pointing up a street for Alex to take.

*****************

Turning her key in the door, Ashley tentatavely wandered into the home her and Don shared. Memories of their live together covering the walls and furnishings.
The walk up the hallway made Ashley feel queasy from all the memories flooding her still drunk head but she knew that her and Don had to have this discussion now or never.

Heading towards a light in the living room, Ashley kicked off her shoes on the way and placed her handbag on a shelf, the noise of which alerted Don to her presence.
Almost instantly, her fiance was stood before her in the hallway, his body language giving nothing away in the moment and his face remaining composed as ever.
"Look, Don, I'm really sorry that..."
Ashley found herself cut off as the air was squeezed out of her by her muscular fiance as he'd closed the gap between them and embraced her tightly.
"Don't be sorry, you're home now" quietly asserted Don, squeezing her that bit tighter as he spoke.
'Home' felt like a perculiar term at this point to the brunette, but she accepted it and hugged her fiance back.

****************

Patience seemed to settle upon the house.
Rather than demanding answers as she'd expected, Don had bundled Ashley into the shower, helped her uncoordinated self get into her pyjamas and had even got her a big glass of water and some toast for the alcohol.
At this particular moment they were sat together, albeit on opposite sides, of the sofa in the living room in eerie silence.

"So..." started Ashley as she put her plate down and sipped from her glass
"I'm sorry I've been so hard on you lately" announced Don, eyes not moving from the spot he had fixated on since they had sat down
Still expecting a knock back, Ashley found herself more thrown by the calmness coming from her fiance.

"I just...really want the best for you Ash and this whole situation just doesn't seem...right?" A quizzical tone caught the end of his sentence as Don placed a somewhat reassuring hand on Ashley's knee.
"I know, its new to me too, I'm just..." started the brunette, laying her own hand over Don's
He flinched slightly at the touch but continued all the same.
"I don't know what I can do to help you at the moment, I mean, I guess you're going through something at the moment and..."

"Woah, slow down there" said Ashley, a certain sternness in her voice "This isn't like a phase Don, I actually like this. I'm enjoying this"
To emphasise her point, Ashley pinched her hip and gave the roll a little jiggle.
Knowing she'd indicated something, Don broke his stare from the wall and looked at her only to see her maintain her pinch.

Taking a deep breath, the muscular man recomposed himself before carrying on.
"Ok, I get that but are you sure that this is...definitely what you want?" Realising the gravity of the situation, Don knew he had to pick his words carefully.
Unfortunately, Ashley's stubbornness on the situation was not for tolerating questions.
"This is definitely what I want" asserted Ashley, folding her arms defiantely with a glass clumsily pressed against one side under her boob.

At this point, Ashley's confidence even knocked her as she had never truly admitted to herself that she was actually enjoying gaining weight. Her first glimmer at Jenna's party with Bo feeding her had opened the door for sure but this was her first moment of commitment to the cause and...it felt good.

"Well then I guess I can try and deal with it then" said Don, tentatively and nowhere near as confident as Ashley.
"I don't need you to deal with it Don, I need you to accept it and like it too" pushed Ashley.
"Maybe with time, I don't know..." stumbled the gym instructor, losing his way in light of Ashley's assertiveness on the matter.
"It's got to be now, not later" mumbled Ashley, not wanting to upset Don but also desperately needing to be heard.

After a moment of silence, Ashley stood up and placed herself before Don
"Look, its not so bad" she announced before rolling her bedshirt up and resting it under her boobs "See? Touch it, go on" teased Ashley, actually feeling things start to improve.
Unsure and completely out of his comfort zone, Don tentatively reached his hand out towards his fiancee's distended stomach
"Oh for god's sake, how long does a girl have to wait" teased Ashley, rolling her eyes before grabbing Don's hand so it didn't move and walking square into his palm so he couldn't help but squeeze her chub.
"See?" asked Ashley again, gently managing Don's fingers so he kept hold of her whilst quiet moans unintentionally escaped her lips as she had flashbacks to that night with Bo.

"I guess...I guess its not so bad actually" said Don, breaking Ashley from her trance enough to notice him actually smiling a little as he took control of his hand back and continued to play with her middle.
"I told you!" smiled Ashley ear to ear, leaning slightly towards him before springing forwards completely and perching on her fiance's lap.
Her landing made a certain situation aware and Ashley couldn't help but smile a little more
"Looks like you're DEFINITELY enjoying this now" teased Ashley again whilst taking hold of Don's other hand and placing it on her hip
Her fiance flushed a deep shade of crimson as he realised himself before smiling softly and taking full hold of Ashley with both hands.
"You're not wrong" mused Don.

For the first time in what felt like a long time, the couple actually enjoyed each other's physical company. Not in a explicitly sexual way, but just embraced and being close to each other.
Ashley had her feeling of dread lifted for the first time that night since leaving work and actually felt like she had been wrong about Don's feelings on the situation, the she had just been crazy to think he was ready to break things off over this weight issue.
That is, until things came crashing down again.

Ashley was now sat facing forward on Don's lap with his arms around her waist and hands laid squarely on her stomach, both were happy and smiling.
"We can totally work with this Ash" whispered Don in her ear
"Huh?" grunted Ash, turning slightly to look at her fiance.
"I like this so if we just manage your weight maybe and then..."
"No Don!" exclaimed Ashley, pushing herself up "I want to keep gaining weight! I've never felt so sexy and if you can't handle that then this isn't going to work!"
Not realising where he had gone wrong Don looked confused and unsure of what to say
"Can you accept that?" shouted Ashley, sensing where this was going
"I'm not sure..." answered Don, honestly, looking into his lap now
"Well then don't call me until you know" Ashley stated plainly before turning on her heels and making for the door.

**************

As Ashley stumbled out of her taxi with tears streaming down her cheeks she was glad she'd had the sense to pick up a coat to put over her pyjamas. She was less pleased however that she had put her high heels back on.
After paying the driver she turned towards the house he had pulled up outside and strode towards the door with out hesitation.
Standing on the doorstep she waited after knocking, pulling her coat tighter around herself as she did, still sniffing to herself.
It wasn't until the door before her opened and a warm cushion of air swaddled her that she looked up to see...
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.title: Ashley wakes up and goes home for a tough talk

choices: The next day
WHAT IF?: One Year Later
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
"Well aren't you a sight for sore eyes" mused the blue haired feeder, hand on hip as she held the door open "bit late for a courtesy call though don't you think?"
Suddenly realising the tears in Ashley's eyes, Bo dropped her stance immediately and threw an arm round her to escort her inside
"Shit, didn't realise you were crying hon, whats up?" asked Bo, suddenly considerably more concerned.
"I think that...I think that me and Don just broke up" sniffed the brunette, curling herself up in her coat as Bo ushered her inside.

"Surely not, hot stuff like you?" asked Bo, kicking the door shut with a flick of her foot "whats happened?"
Before Ashley got chance to respond, the voice of Jenna cut through to them
"Who was it Belinda?" the question had a bit of a loaded tease to it, what with the use of the dreaded full name but, much like with Bo herself, the joke quickly dropped upon realising who it was
"Oh no, you're not looking so good Ash" noted Jenna as she drew her robe tightly around herself to contain her previously exposed girth

"Said she'd just broken up with her fiance" answered Bo for her, guiding the smaller girl to a chair before resuming her position alongside Jenna
"That's terrible sweetie, what happened?" asked Jenna, still adjusting her gown as she spoke
"He doesn't like that I'm fat" stammered the brunette, still in slight shock at the situation she found herself in as she spoke

Unsure of how to proceed, the two lovers looked at each other. Not liking fatness was a peculiar affliction in their eyes and, not surprisingly, not one they had come across all too often.
"Well for starters, get your little ass over here next to us" suggested Jenna as she jabbed Bo in the hip to move along, a much easier task for the smaller of the two love birds.

Ashley tottered over, still wearing her heels as she plonked herself in the parting gap between the two women
"Secondly, get those monstrosities off your feet, never understood why you girls where those things" mused Jenna, rolling her eyes as she spoke
"Never heard you complain when I wear my platforms" interjected Bo with a coy smile and a wink
"Yes well..." started Jenna with a slight blush before remembering the situation "less of that Belinda, we have a friend in need here".

Taking the faux scolding on the chin, Bo shifted slightly to allow Ashley some more space before taking the girls heels away.
"Now you listen here Ashley, you can stay here as long as you need or want" assured Jenna, placing a hand on her leg "don't even be thinking about work either"
Ashley went to interject a point but was cut of sternly
"Not a single thought" glared Jenna, not willing to accept anything other than compliance.

Bo returned at this point with a concerned but friendly face to her.
"Your phone was going ballistic in your handbag hon so I grabbed it for you" said Bo, handing the device to Ashley "seems that fiance of yours is keen to talk"
"Urgh" groaned Ashley as she looked at the phone, a call coming through as she groaned
Feeling bad about walking out she cleared the call off before sending a text to Don

'I'm safe, staying with friends. I need space'

The message was, again, instantly read and then followed by a line of dots indicating Don was planning on replying.
The phone continued to display this for a while but then disappeared completely which suited Ashley enough for now.

Observing all this Jenna squeezed the receptionist gently before offering up her thoughts
"Good idea, don't let him stew because you might fix it"
"Pffft" scepticism had taken over Ashley at this point along with her upset making her unwilling to believe there was a fix for this particular problem.

**************

Jenna and Bo proved to be exceptional hosts as ever, even for their unannounced guest.
In short time a room had been put together for her, fresh linens, towels and an optimistically large change of clothes but the thought was what counted at this point.
Ashley felt cared for here and that was enough for the brunette at this point.
As the three women chatted away to take Ashley's mind off things, her phone buzzed again, this time to indicate Lucielle had texted her.

'Hey sweetie, hope things went ok, call me if you need anything'

Trying not to well up again, Ashley took to responding

'Not great, staying with Jenna and Bo'

She wasn't in the mood for a lengthy discussion and left it at that.
The phone did vibrate again but the potential content did not interest Ashley enough to look.

"I'll fill her in tomorrow at work if you'd like?" offered Jenna
Ashley simply nodded at the suggestion and continued focusing on whatever film it was that the trio were half watching.
Sean Bean had just died so nothing new or distinct there.

****************

"Hey, I know you girls went out to eat but do you want something now?" asked Bo, continuing her good host routine.
"Meh, sure, might as well carry on down the path that's brought me here" cynically mused Ashley as her stomach did groan softly at the suggestion of more food
"Coming right up" half smiled Bo as she wobbled toward the kitchen
Without thinking, Ashley instinctively curled up and cuddled up against Jenna and a surprising passage of time passed before she realised her mistake.
Flinging herself back in shock she couldn't apologise fast enough.
"Oh god, I'm so sorry Jenna, you're being so nice and helping me out and I go and do that" Ashley descended into a slight hysteria at her foolishness but quickly found a hand holding hers
"Don't be so silly" assured Jenna, gently pulling Ashley back towards the middle of the sofa "If you need to cuddle up against me to feel better you go for it"

Completely in awe of Jenna's kindness and understanding Ashley did manage to settle back down and, again, instinctively cuddled against her boss.

Not long after, Bo returned with a selection of food for their guest but found her efforts to be futile.
"Sorry babe, she needed something a bit bigger than that to help her tonight" teased Jenna
"Pfft, leave you alone for 10minutes and you snuggle up to the first girl that appears on our doorstep" joked Bo before sitting down and placing the food on the table before them.

Joking between themselves, the two larger women nibbled away at the food that Bo had brought for Ashley who still remained asleep between the two of them.
"Think she'll be alright?" asked Bo of her girlfriend. Jenna had known Ashley from day one so was probably more qualified to assess that one
"She'll be fine" bluntly put Jenna as she bit into a sizeable fried drumstick "she's a strong girl and anybody would be lucky to have her"
Bo nodded in agreeance as she picked at a lone dorito
"She is cute though isn't she?" mused Bo, looking over Ashley's face
"Now who's flirting with the guest?" retorted Jenna, giving an accusing glare over her drumstick with a hint of mischief in her eyes
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.title: ...Bo

choices: Bo continues to feed Ashley's feelings
Meanwhile, at the office
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
"Morning sleepy head" called Bo from the kitchen table as Ashley entered.

"Oh god, what time is it?" yawned the brunette as she rubbed her eyes and stretched.

"It is...10:23" chimed Bo as she nudged a plate to one side before taking up a coffee cup and taking a delicate sip.

"Oh no, I'm late for work!" cried out Ashley, suddenly lost to frantic mania as she scrambled around achieving nothing.

"Woah woah" called Bo as she jumped up from her chair and grabbed Ashley by the shoulders "you're taking some time off, remember?"

Ashley screwed up her face a touch as she thought back to the previous night.
Lots of alcohol.
Arguing with Don.
Getting frisky with Don.
Running out on Don.
Coming to Jenna's house...

"Oh yeah..." mumbled the receptionist as she slumped inward on herself and against Bo who took her weight rather deftly

"Ok, sit down Ash, there's a good girl" assured Bo as she walked Ashley to a kitchen stool and sitting her up at the table "There we go, not just relax, you want anything to eat?"

Now full caught up on the previous nights events the last thing Ashley wanted to do was eat.
Having finally realised her own feelings on her latest bodily acquisitions and to then be so suddenly rejected by Don for those beliefs, Ashley found herself very confused about the whole thing.
"Nuh-uh" sputtered Ashley, shaking her head as she did

"Well if you're sure, I do make a mean waffle as I'm sure Jenna's told you" smirked Bo from across the table.

Realising she was on a losing battle to cheering Ashley up, Bo reached a reassuring hand over and stroked the smaller girls forearm
"Hey, you wanna talk about it?"

Ashley really didn't want to talk, she didn't want to do anything at this point.
However, her mind had other ideas.

"I just can't believe we'd fall out of me wanting to gain weight" whispered Ashley, holding surprisingly strong despite her wanting to cry.

"Well" pondered Bo "I guess its just not a lifestyle that everybody wants to be a part of"

Ashley looked up, not entirely sure she understood what was been said to her.

"I mean not everybody likes fat girls, we know that much, but its also supporting the lifestyle even if you do like it" explained Bo, continuing to stroke Ashley's arm

"I guess" muttered Ashley, still as confused as ever.

"Right, lets go simple" started Bo "you, very obviously, are enjoying this new walk of life right?"

Ashley nodded as she looked to Bo intently

"Ok, but you've had time to think about these things, Don hasn't" continued Bo "and, at first look, he's not your stereotypical chubby chaser, I mean, that guy is solid workout wise"

"Yeah, he is" responded Ashley on autopilot as she found herself flashing over many a memory of Don working out and showing off his well worked body to her.

"So to suddenly drop this on him that you actually enjoy being fat is probably too big a bombshell for him to process all at once" said Bo

"I guess" considered Ashley as she gently pulled her arm from Bo so as to avoid falling asleep at her delicate touch.

Bo smiled, mostly to herself as she stood from the table and adjusted her slightly ill fitting bed shirt.
"I'm no expert, I mean, I love me the fat girls but sounds like you two might not be so busted just suffering from information overload"
Ashley nodded slowly at this.
Don did actually seem to get into things when he was squeezing her tummy last night and it definitely stirred a reaction, maybe he was just struggling to keep up with a decision that Ashley herself had only just made.

Bo could see the thought process flowing through Ashley and nodded to herself
"Hey, who knew I was so wise, particularly so early in the morning" mused Bo as she started to walk out of the kitchen

"Could I get some breakfast?" asked Ashley, cautiously having literally just declined the offer

"Well I thought you would never ask" smiled Bo as she padded back into the kitchen.

**************

"And then Jenna said 'well if you won't honour the 'all you can eat' promise then I shall take my specific dietry requirements elsewhere!'"

Ashley burst out laughing with tears streaming down her face as she howled, rocking back and forth in her seat.

"It's been a while since I've had someone to share these stories with, Jenna usually asks that I don't" mused Bo as she lent against the worktop, arse spreading immensely against the cool edge as she did.

"But they're so funny" chuckled Ashley as she scooped another forkful of waffle and syrup between her lips, subconsciously rubbing her belly as she did.
Although she was wearing a very baggy shirt for her figure, it was one of Bo's hand-me-downs, the effects of the morning, and early afternoon for that matter, binge were apparent compared to how the brunette had started the day.

"True" nodded Bo with a smile "You ready for a top up, short stack?"

Ashley giggled softly at the name before leaning back in her chair, fingers splayed on the covered surface of her stomach.
"I'm not so sure, think I'm full" purred Ashley, quite content at this point as she rubbed her belly gently.

"Well if you don't want em I guess I'll just have to eat these then" teased Bo as she loaded up a fresh plate of waffles and walked it to the table

"Ohhh, maybe I could have..." started Ashley, readjusting herself in her seat and swiping her fork up

"Nope, these are mine now" asserted Bo as she heavily sat down again and tore a waffle in two, folding it delicately before feeding the whole thing into her mouth.

"Awwww" groaned Ashley as she slumped again slightly, twiddling her fork between her fingers

Chuckling as she swallowed the other half of her torn waffle, Bo winked before proceeding.
"I'll make you some, don't worry" reassured the blue haired pear "greedy girl"

Ashley smiled softly as she got comfy, looking over Bo as she very hungrily tore through her stack of waffles, curiousity spiking as she watched.

"What's the deal with you and food?" asked the brunettte innocently

"Huh?" mumbled Bo through a mouth of pastries as a line of syrup ran down her chin and across her second.

"Well, you're definitely bigger than the last time I saw you" tiptoed Ashley as she watched her friend swallow and wipe her chins.

"Meh, I'm a naturally gluttonous person and Jen is a bad influence on people" retorted Bo simply before biting into her next waffle

"So, you don't like it on you or?" asked Ashley, resting an elbow on the table and her chin in her hand

"Oh no, turns out I do actually really like it on me, just needed Jenna to unlock that realisation" mused Bo

Still not convinced, Ashley lent back and folded her arms

"Seriously" started Bo with a wry smile "a girl does not get to look like this if she doesn't enjoy it"
And with that, Bo pushed herself up and whipped her shirt clean off and tossed it to one side
"See?"
Slightly taken aback, Ashley couldn't help but stare over Bo's body.

Her bottom heaviness was no mystery to anyone who knew her and, needless to say, a single chair could not contain all of her arse which bulged impressively over the edges of any such furnishing.
Alongside her rear was, of course, her bulging hips which were only fractionally behind her ass and were topped with a meaty muffin top to boot which was currently getting a gentle squeeze from Bo herself as she posed for her guest.
Although slightly less known than her backside, Bo's thighs were pretty legendary within her friendship circle sporting a delicate coating of cellulite around their impressive girth.
More surprising to most though was Bo's upper half, sporting an impressive belly that exceeded the limit of her now discarded bed shirt alongside some modestly plump boobs and meaty arms.

"Wow..." mumbled Ashley under her breath in awe of her friend

"Alright Ash, I'm taken" teased the mostly naked host as she sat back down to finish her waffles, not replacing her shirt in the process.

Still staring, another question sprung to the brunette's mind.

"How much do you weigh?"

"Wow, personal much" feigned Bo, throwing a cheeky smile to indicate her joking "276 though seeing as you did ask"

"So that's like 90lbs heavier than me" declared Ashley

"Well, genetics play a big part in me being THIS big for my weight sweets" added Bo "you should see my sister, curves for days that girl and shes not even fat"

Ashley nodded slowly as it all sank in

"Anyway, you still want some more waffles?" asked Bo, dropping her fork heavily to bring Ashley back to reality.

Ashley thought for a moment before simply nodding "please"

With a flick of her hair, Bo stood and padded to the oven once again

"You know Ash, I think you'll be just fine" purred Bo

Only able to smile sheepishly, Ashley waited patiently for her waffles, lost in her mind as she did
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.title: Breakfast at Bo's

choices: Sarah and Danielle clash over their shared task
Lucielle mentors her assistants in training
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
"God, that Ashley is such a flake" sneered Danielle, having just heard the news that her supposed internship leader was nowhere to be seen for the fourth day on the trot.

"Oh don't be so cruel Dani" chimed the ever chirpy Sarah from behind her desk, backed onto the bitchy brunette's own.

"She's supposed to be showing us how to be business women and she's not even professional enough to turn up" spat Danielle from behind her computer, the screen reflecting sharply in her glasses to show that the demeaning woman was only flicking through Facebook as she condemned her superior.

"It's not like we're on a time limit here, I mean, back in England we do these things called work placements where you spend a week in a place of work..."

'Urgh, does she ever stop talking about England?' thought Danielle, continuing to idly scroll through her social media without a care in the world for what the young Brit opposite her was saying to her.

"Uh huh" grunted Danielle in the hopes that a simple placative response would be enough to spur the blonde into carrying on her tale without further involvement.

"...and I know you're not listening so I'm just going to stop talking" announced Sarah with something of a wry look, knowing all too well that her colleague had not been listening to her at any point.
Fortunately, Sarah was too much the optimist for Danielle's grating attitude to have an effect.
That is, unlike the poor soul who had just entered the room.

"Hey, erm, Lucielle wants to speak to us all in her office so could you guys come through...please?" stammered the ever shy Shelly.

"Ohhh, how exciting" mused Sarah with a warm smile "We'll be right through sweetie"
Despite the younger girl's quiet tendencies, Sarah had taken quite a shine to Shelly and often tried to make the easily flustered individual apart of the group.
She didn't like to assume, it wouldn't be British afterall, but Sarah hoped that Shelly at least felt a smidge more comfortable when in her company, certainly more than some individuals anyway.

"Urgh, fat cow WOULD make the meeting in her office" groaned Danielle as she stood and brushed herself down, smoothing her skirt gently against her shapely legs.

"Well you're so trim it won't bother you in the slightest" retorted Sarah in a rare glimmer of bite.
Danielle momentarily stiffened at the incursion but quickly took it in her stride before pacing after Shelly, high heels clicking sternly on the floor behind her.

***********

"Good morning ladies, sorry for all the disruption lately" started Lucielle as she welcomed the six intern girls into her office "it has proven quite the challenge managing you all whilst Ashley has been away but I think we're starting to work through the teething pains now"

Most of the girls simply nodded whilst an audible tsk came from Danielle's scornful direction

Having already formed a not too flattering opinion of Danielle, Lucielle brushed the sound effect off before continuing with the meeting.

"So, I've been talking to Jenna and I think we've found a way to make this all work that bit smoother" announced Lucielle as she casually reached for a doughnut before her "please, help yourselves"

Five of the girls dove in to varying degrees of enthusiasm whilst Danielle lent back in her chair with a scowl.

"Anyway" continued Lucielle as she bit into her doughnut "to streamline, we've decided that Carri will be joining myself and Shelly for the time being and Codi will be moving to work alongside Pauline on the front desk"

Trying to remain professional, it was clear that the two youngest interns were pleased to be working together.
It was not lost on most of the group that the two were close friends and also deeply nervous of their positions so it would no doubt help them both greatly to be able to work alongside each other once again.

Less excited at their pairing, however, were Pauline and Codi.
As far as character profiles go, these two could not be more polar opposites.
Codi was a rather subdued goth girl with a snarky attitude to boot whereas Pauline was the quintessential plump girl, all smiles and cheer whereever she went.
Needless to say, the two girls had not spent much time together to this point and neither was relishing the prospect of having to work so closely together.

"Now I know you've all started to settle into your initial positions but unfortunately sometimes changes have to be made for the good of the company" said Lucielle, sensing the momentary tension between the polar opposite girls before her.

Quietly munching on their doughnuts, or, in the case of Danielle, scornfully burning a hole in the wall behind Lucielle's head, quiet chitchat started to swarm through the group as Lucielle made some notes on her computer, three doughnuts disappearing in the process.
It wasn't long, however, before the titanic blonde addressed the group once again
"Ok, does anybody have any questions?"

Silence befell the group once again until a delicate thin arm raised into the air.
"Hi, I just wondered what was going to happen with me and Danielle now that Ashley isn't here to mentor us?" asked Sarah gently, a little surprised at the lack of mention of herself or Danielle for that matter.

"Ah yes" started Lucielle "you two are a slightly more complicated case so I wanted to talk to the pair of you in private if that's ok?"

"Sure, just so I know" smiled Sarah as she lowered her hand again

Danielle simply nodded, her eyes not moving from their predetermined spot.

***********

As the other girls piled out of the office, Danielle and Sarah made their way to seats much closer to Lucielle's desk.
"So as I mentioned, your situation is a little more complicated as Ashley was going to be directly mentoring the two of you with how the business is run and..."

"Yeah, about that" asserted Danielle, cutting across Lucielle's line of conversation rather sternly "Ashley is only the receptionist here so how can she possibly mentor us on business?"

Knowing full well Danielle was something of a firecracker given her history with Ashley, Lucielle was well prepared for any mutinies against her friend, all the more defensive given the delicate situation following her break up.
"Well for your information, Ashley is an essential part of how Gordge operates" asserted Lucielle, rather more bluntly than she may have preferred "Ashley organises everybody's appointments, manages essential client files and is in control of the companys' annual budget, second only to accounting"

"Wow, ok" gasped Danielle, under her breath, taken aback by the full frontal assault in response to her far from innocent jab against Ashley

"All the same, given her absence, Jenna has constructed a very special task for you both" continued Lucielle, clasping her fingers together around the peak of her impressive belly as she spoke.
"In line with both of your obvious potential and abilities, Jenna has compiled a mock company system for each of you to run"
The two interns nodded intently, keen to impress and succeed for their respective reasons.

"With this in mind, you will be meeting with and securing clients, managing budgets and stock whilst also managing a team of AI staff members that will present their own challenges for you" concluded Lucielle

"AI staff?" asked Sarah, a look of confusion on her face

"I don't fully understand it myself but from what Jenna has told me that the system interacts with you and sets up problems not unlike real staff, all through your computer in an 'instant messager' style" explained Lucielle to the still confused Sarah, not looking too convinced herself.

"So you're basically setting us up as managers?" pushed Danielle.

"That is basically it, thank you Danielle" nodded Lucielle "we're not expecting you to grasp it straight away, afterall, managing isn't as easy as it may look but hopefully your talents will shine through soon enough"

Smiling to herself over a perceived advantage at simply understanding the task, Danielle cockily rested back in her seat, arms folded and one leg crossed over the other.

"Wow, thank you for the opportunity here" beamed Sarah "does this mean we can..."

"Yes Sarah, you will get to have business lunches IF you can get any clients" teased Lucielle, remembering the Brit's earlier enthusiasm for such things

"Yes!" hissed Sarah softly, excitement bubbling up as she spoke.

"Now that that is all sorted, do you have any questions about the task ahead of you?" asked Lucielle again

Sarah simply shook her head with excitement whilst Danielle practically strode out of her chair, heading straight for the door without even speaking.

"Ok, well check your emails when you get out there and all will be explained on how to start the project" shouted Lucielle so that both girls heard, even the tall brunette already half way back to her desk.

**********

"Hey Danielle, I just wanted to wish you good luck, this task sounds really exciting" bounced Sarah, having finally caught up to the leggy brunette

Danielle simply grunted as she took her seat again and went to her emails.
"Mhm you too" muttered the brunette "just don't get suckered into this office's weird fat dynamic, I can't concentrate if you ended up so fat your belly hangs out on your desk"
Assuming a joke, Sarah retorted in kind
"Yeah well, I don't wanna see your thighs bursting out of your skimpy skirts either"

Danielle didn't reply at this point, furiously hammering away on her keyboard instead as acrylic nails flashed red back and forth over the keys.

'Strange girl' thought Sarah as she took to her own keyboard with much less aggression.
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.title: Office Reshuffles

choices: Sarah and Danielle's fued continues
Codi and Pauline have their own partnership problems
Lunchtime for Lucielle and her assistants
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
"Stupid piece of shit!"

Sarah couldn't help but snicker to herself at the sound of her colleague cussing at her computer excessively as the pair began to work through their exciting new task.
Sadly for the Brit, however, her enjoyment hadn't been QUITE as subtle as she had hoped.

"You can pipe down as well, this isn't easy" bluntly spat Danielle, frustration bubbling more as the tattooed brunette angrily clicked her mouse repeatedly.

"Well, where are you stuck?" asked Sarah, genuinely wishing to offer some guidance.
Despite the task having a competitive element to it, the younger girl saw no reason why she had to fall out with Danielle over it, not to say the two were on a study basis of friendship by any definition at this point.

"I don't even know" sighed Danielle, thrusting herself away from her desk to stretch her long thin legs under her desk as her arms fell either side of her chair.

"I'll come to you then" chirped Sarah, hopping from her chair to saunter round their adjoining desks to look over Danielle's computer.

Rolling her eyes, Danielle shoved herself further out from her desk as Sarah shimmied in front of her.
As the young blonde got to examining where Danielle had become stuck, she couldn't help but find herself vaguely examining the pert bottom of her colleague as it floated in front of her.
Despite her earlier quip about Sarah getting fat, Danielle did have to admit that Sarah wasn't shy in the looks department.
Not Danielle attractive but she was ok for an English broad.

"I see what's happened, you've swapped order numbers with quantities so you're spreadsheets are calculating the company as bankrupt" declared Sarah with a, perceived by Danielle, sanctimonious air to her statement.

"Oh screw you" hissed Danielle, putting her in the firing line as least subtle of the two girls.

"I'm just trying to help" retorted Sarah, feeling a little hurt as she turned to face Danielle, folding her arms as she did to assert some dominance over the situation.

"Well really you're just been a show boaty bitch" sneered Danielle, standing from her office chair and assuming the same stance as Sarah, making a far more imposing figure with her height advantage, heels or not "I don't need your help Notting Hill so back off"

Sarah quietly seethed as her cheeks began to flush.
Sarah and Codi had established something of a playful banter between themselves with the whole 'Union' nickname, but Danielle's reference felt much more menacing as the blonde looked her up and down.

"That's what I thought" goaded Danielle as she slowly lowered back into her seat

Sarah also returned to her seat, quickly enough to avoid Danielle seeing the full heat of her cheeks, before returning to her own task.
Despite really wanting to, Sarah thought better of informing the girl opposite her that she was considerably further ahead than she was in their task.

************

Some time later, Danielle had finally worked out what she was doing wrong and, much to the hurt of her pride, Sarah had been right.
That didn't matter though as the brunette was now steaming through her workload at a much more acceptable pace.
Needless to say, she felt much more at ease as she repeatedly clocked Sarah disappearing to the break room and reappearing with some form of sweet confection or another either in her hand or disappearing into her stomach.

"Told you, keep eating like that and you can get a different desk far away from me" muttered Danielle in the direction of Sarah

"Maybe I'll park my new desk next to the stick up your arse" Sarah bit back with a stinking glare.

It was unlike the Brit to throw such vicious words at people but the events of earlier had riled her up and her feelings towards Danielle were far from her usual sunny outlook on others.

Danielle rolled her eyes, lashes batting slightly as she did before going back to her work.

"Besides, I'm not so paranoid about my figure that I have to deny myself the odd nice thing" continued Sarah, placing a slice of cake down beside her keyboard.

"Pffffft" spat Danielle, holding back the urge to laugh rather undignified "you have been to the break room...nine times in the past four hours"
The brunette had paused momentarily to consult her notebook where she had tallied each one of Sarah's trips.
"Don't need to be paranoid when you are riding head long into Lucielle territory with that appetite"

Stunned that her movements had been tracked, Sarah swallowed hard before responding to the allegations.
"Well how about you show me how it's done? Prove its so easy to avoid the break room and then you can mock my fat arse all the live long day" challenged Sarah.

"That ain't going to happen" mused Danielle "I don't eat shit like that"

"Well then lose your right to complain at me enjoying myself" nodded Sarah, feeling a victory within her grasp.

Considering her options, none of which included losing, Danielle finally threw herself up out of her chair.
"Fine! If it'll shut you up" announced the brunette before marching swiftly towards the break room.

"Skinny bitch" muttered Sarah, taking another bite from her cake as Danielle stormed off.

**********

"Jesus this place is disgusting" mumbled Danielle as she slid into the break room.
Thankfully nobody else was there to witness her moment of sin as she slowly paced around the room, observing all the things the fat asses of the office had lying around.

Cakes
Doughnuts
Pastries
A quick glance in the chrome double fridge showed an array of takeout left overs and meals some of the other girls had brought in, prepared from home

The content of food aside, the portions were the only thing that shocked Danielle more, no wonder everyone was so huge here.
A twisted grimace painted across her face, Danielle found herself unintentionally gravitating towards a plate of muffins sat on the table.
A delicate hand written note simply reading 'eat up' was proving more tempting than she had hoped but, still not willing to lose out to Sarah, Danielle reached out and grabbed a rather voluminous double chocolate specimen.

"You'll do" grumbled Danielle as she quickly made for the door again, desperate to not be seen on her scandalous crusade as she bolted back to her desk.

***********

"See? One trip and I am done for the day" declared Danielle triumphantly as she sat down opposite Sarah, taking something of a victory bite from her muffin
'Damn this thing IS good' thought Danielle, her will power ensuring she didn't gulp the whole thing down.

"We will see how you fair throughout the day" plainly spoke Sarah as she continued on with her work.

"Prepare to eat your words, least they have no calories" replied the rather snooty Danielle as she delicately nibbled at her muffin some more.

"Great" replied Sarah with a complete lack of enthusiasm, fingers working the keyboard as she spoke.

"Yes it is" said Danielle, becoming slightly unnerved as to who she was speaking to more at this point.
'Damn muffin, I'm gonna have to work extra hard at the gym tonight'
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.title: Not quite work mates

choices: Shelly and Carri find themselves well suited to office life
Ashley makes her return to the office
Danielle's iron will isn't as strong as she thinks
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
"How are you doing over there girls?" called Lucielle to her newly acquired assistants.

"Ok I think" chirped Shelly as she tapped away at one of the computers that had been set up for herself and Carri in Lucielle's office.

Carri, however, seemed less sure.

"I don't think I'm really understanding this program..." stammered Carri, still nervous and eager to impress all in one.

"Hang on" replied Shelly as she glided in front of her friends computer so as to take a look "ok, it's simple really, once you've inputted an appointment you just press the enter key and it will upload to Lucielle's...erm, the boss's calender automatically"

The correction made Lucielle chuckle, even if she was technically the girls superior she had mentally decided that being called 'the boss' wasn't something she would insist upon.

"Ohhh, that makes more sense" murmured Carri as she resumed typing herself for a moment before receiving a rather satisfying ping

"I did it!" cheered Carri, losing her keenly guarded work ethic for a moment of celebration.

Lucielle clapped softly from behind the girls to mark her approval of the situation.

"Well I could be wrong but I think that sounds like a good place to call it off for lunch now ladies" cooed the hefty blonde from her desk seat, adjusting herself slightly which in turn produced a hearty groan from the furniture.

"Already?" asked Shelly, checking her watch before giving the dial an authoritative tap with her index finger.

"Definitely, an army marches on its stomach and I'm sure you've realised by now that this office is no different" purred Lucielle as she felt a hunger start to build within her.
It was definitely lunch time by her reckoning and she knew full well that Alex would not approve of her skipping a meal for something as trivial as work.

"Wow, time flies" muttered Carri, still rather nervous having only worked in her new position for a few hours after the reshuffle that morning.

"It certainly does" smiled Lucielle as she labouriously heaved herself up from her chair "How about we order in from the sandwich shop down the street again Shelly?"

"Ohhhh, that place was really nice" mirrored Shelly having had lunch there a few times prior to Carri's reassignment.

Truly, Shelly had had lunch with Lucielle every day since starting the intern program and it was starting to show.
Although having only worked there a few days, Shelly had found herself indulging in the office's universally accepted past time of eating and, apparently, her nerves had led her to indulge more than she normally would have.
As such, a delicate layer of bloating had started to form around her usually slender middle.
Largely completely unnoticeable, Shelly caught the odd glimpse of it when getting ready for the day but, up to now, it hadn't bothered her.

"It certainly is" replied Lucielle as she gently stroked her own immense belly through the fabric of her work shirt "how about you take Carri with you, I'll phone my order ahead so you two will just have to pick what you want when you get there"

"Sounds good" smiled Shelly.
Her nerves really did subside when she was with Lucielle and she almost started to feel comfortable in her role as her assistant.
Hopefully her nerves would only improve now that Carri would be working alongside her.

***********

"Is it not weird working with somebody that..." started Carri, unsure of how to proceed as the girls climbed out of Shelly's car having now pulled up at the sandwich shop

"fat?" finished Shelly, knowing full well her friends sentiment.
She hadn't been the first to ask, lets just leave it at that.

"Yeah..."
Carri shrunk into herself a little, she didn't want to offend anybody but it was impossible to deny that Lucielle was a big girl.
Most of the girls at the office were some degree of big when she thought about it.

"It's not bad really, I mean we do know her, remember?" retorted Shelly as she grabbed the door to the sandwich shop, holding it to let another customer out first.

Carri squinted for a moment as she tried to remember before it finally dawned on her.
"Oh yeah, at the restaurant" nodded the younger ex waitress as she spoke.

"Exactly" smiled Shelly as she browsed all the options available in the glass counter "I mean, we wouldn't have even applied for the internship if Lucielle and her friends hadn't come to the restaurant that night when she left her business card"

"True" muttered Carri as she also browsed the many sandwich options, slightly more distracted by the smells of the shop which were new to her unlike her friend.

"What can I get you ladies?" called a dumpy middle aged woman from behind the counter.

"Hi, I believe I'm picking up a delivery for a Lucielle from Gordge Inc?" started Shelly, recalling that Lucielle was on first name basis with this particular sandwich shop.
Come to think of it, Lucielle had been on first name terms with ALL of the shops they had ordered lunch from that week and Shelly hazarded to guess that that was not the limit of her close food contacts.

"Ah yes, she's on the phone now, still ordering" smiled the server, all knowing of Lucielle's eating reputation.

"We'd probably go out of business if not for you girls over at Gordge" she joked as she lent against the counter "What can I get for you two whilst Karen finishes with Lucielle's order?"

Shelly laughed at the suggestion that Gordge alone kept this place afloat, as true as it might have been.

"Could I have two french baguettes, one as a BLT with ranch dressing and the second with turkey, bacon and jack cheese please" asked Shelly, realising that she would probably return to this particular shop again giving her another chance to order something else.

"Absolutely" nodded the serving woman as she rang the order into the till "and you?"

Carri flinched slightly at being directly acknowledged but recovered quickly.

"Erm, could I have the cheeseburger please?"

"You can if you're sure" teased the woman behind the counter, a hand on one flared hip now as the other rested on the register.

Carri nodded before having a thought "could I have extra onions on that too?"

Their server simply nodded with a smile as she finished inputting the order before leaning back to peer into the back

"Lucielle done yet?" shouted the woman, holding onto the front of the register as she did

"Not yet!" called another woman's voice, an air of exasperation to it

The first woman simply rolled her eyes before looking back to the young girls before her.

"You girls best take a seat, this could take a while"

***********

"Oh thank god you're back" cooed Lucielle as her door swung open, allowing in the thick aroma of the food that had been ordered which was deeply inhaled by the blonde heifer behind her desk.

"Ohhh, who got the cheeseburger?" asked Lucielle, all too familiar with all the smells currently bombarding her.

"That was me" muttered Carri, slightly bemused at her senior's ability to pick out an individual item amongst the onslaught of smells

"Good choice, hope you brought your appetite" teased Lucielle as Shelly gradually emptied Lucielle's order onto her desk, leaving just her own and Carri's sandwiches

"I am kind of hungry" admitted Carri as she sat in her chair again just in time for Shelly to place a large box into her lap.

Carri looked shocked, she'd only ordered a cheeseburger so how could she possibly have such a large box.
Upon opening it though, all became clear.
Even having worked in a restaurant for three years prior to the internship, Carri had never seen a burger so big as the damn thing was nearly the size of her head.

"You can always save some for later" whispered Shelly "just keep it on your desk"

Carri's stunned look slowly melted away as the smell of beef and cheese wafted into her nostrils and she got a sneaking suspicion that little of the burger would survive past lunch.

In truth, very little of anything survived past the lunch hour the three girls had.
No cheeseburger remnants, no second sandwich as Shelly had intended and certainly nothing Lucielle had ordered.
All that did remain in the office were three very happy workers, albeit with an air of sleepiness to them.

"So, shall we carry on for a little bit before home time girls?" asked Lucielle, rubbing her now exposed belly generously with both hands.

"Sounds like a plan" replied Carri on autopilot

Having never heard Carri speak first in all the time she had been at Gordge, Lucielle was slightly taken aback but she did manage to conceal her surprise so as not to scare the poor intern before her.

1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
"Urgh, I hate Sarah so much!" screeched Danielle as she slammed the door to her flat, angrily kicking her work heels vaguely towards her shoe rack and dumping her handbag not far past the overly packed furnishing.

Although the sentiment was a well known one, its utterance was becoming more and more frequent, particularly once the typically angry brunette had got home.
She often vented her frustration under her breath through mouthfuls of pastries or leftover takeout food that some of the other girls had 'kindly' left in the break room.

Yes, despite her persistence only a two short weeks back that she wouldn't use the break room again, Danielle had folded.
Twice again on the day of goading that had caused her first venture.
Multiple times every day after that without fail.
And, more importantly, each and every time she left with something entering or hanging out of her mouth as she refused to eat with the other blimps of the office even if they were keeping a watchful eye on her frequent trips.

Danielle was pissed at herself for letting Sarah get under her skin and FORCING her to go to the break room and show her how to resist the many temptations left out for the ambling heifers she worked with.
The brunette intern was also (partially) convinced that Sarah had set this as a trap to detract from her own trips to the break room which, being honest, had worked if that was the intention as Danielle no longer counted how many times her colleague left her desk for something to eat.
Instead that tally was left open for how many times Danielle herself left her desk and committed culinary sin in the eyes of the gym junky.

Most importantly at this moment though, Danielle was pissed with herself for still being stood on her feet as she mentally moaned.

With an angry puffing sound exhaling from the leather bound cushion, Danielle flopped into the cool depths of her sofa instantly feeling better for no longer holding herself up.
Lost in the comfort, the leggy brunette slowly stretched herself out across the length of the sofa, resting her head on one of the brown arms before casually flicking the tv on.

Finding nothing but trashy 'reality' programs, Danielle could feel herself becoming aware of a tightness around her hips and middle.
Disgruntled at the thought whilst being semi-aware of what was causing it, Danielle tossed herself onto her back and took hold of her skirt clasp before slowly parting the opening in the material and allowing herself to breath outwardly.

Instantly relieved, Danielle couldn't help but smile softly as she kicked her skirt off, allowing it to slide off the opposite sofa arm onto the floor with a soft thud before coming to terms with what had just happened.
Left in just her button-up shirt which she proceeded to slowly unbutton, Danielle found herself face to face with the problem that was haunting her since joining Gordge.

Although a naturally shapely and curvaceous woman, Danielle did not relish the view before her as her stomach was looking just a little more weighty than she would have liked.
Completely enhanced in her own mind, Danielle was far from even chubby compared to the woman that started at Gordge, but the evidence of a slight softness combined with the gentle outward bulge of said softness was a little too much for the brunette to accept.
The evident pale red band where her skirt had pinched her slightly bloated middle for the duration of the day did not aid the aesthetic in the slightest.

Frowning at her own near non-existent weight gain, Danielle threw herself up from the sofa, discarding her shirt in the process and stormed off to the bathroom.
As the now underwear clad office worker crossed her flat not even an inch of wobble betrayed her recent spell of gluttony but Danielle was too far gone to think rationally as she slammed the bathroom door before starting the shower.

************

Having washed most of her day's troubles away, Danielle now stood in her steamy bathroom eyeing the outline of herself in the over-sink mirror as condensation slowly disappeared from the edges of the glass.
Sighing heavily, Danielle slowly traced the flaming floral patterns dancing around her upper arms and shoulders.
Whilst quite intimidating, Danielle's tattoos had being a gift to herself once she had reached her goal weight after working with that bitch Ashley
"What a great trainer she's turned out to be" sneered Danielle to herself as she wrapped herself a little tighter in her towel before grabbing a smaller one to start wringing her hair with, content the first wouldn't slip over her breasts.

Whilst fiddling with her brunette locks, Danielle caught a glimpse of her scales resting against the sink.
She hadn't used those in months, probably years now that she thought about it, but something was proving quite alluring about dragging the things out and taking a step onto them.
Danielle shook her head though before continuing on with her hair, feeling the urge to drag her eyes away from the glass scales beneath her.

A smattering of anger rising in her throat, Danielle threw the towel she was drying her hair with to one side before bending down and dragging the scales out in front of her.
Prodding the cold surface with her toe to activate the machine, she huffed with impatience, clinging the larger towel to her body having loosened the knot from under her arm.
Eventually, the scales beeped their awakened chime as the display flashed blue before settling to an unladen '0.0lbs'

Staring tentatively at the scales, Danielle felt herself drawing slightly closer to them, one foot with her perfectly painted red nails raised ready to step and discover her fate.
"Urgh, get yourself together Dani!" her internal monologue screamed as a slight recoil pulled her foot back to the ground.
Breathing slowly to reclaim her nerves, Danielle once again raised her foot before slowly stepping over the scales.
Her teeth taking hold of her lower lip, the brunette then forced her foot to start descending, jumping slightly as her big toe caught the cold glass unexpectedly.
A digital beep rang through the steamy bathroom as her whole foot planted against the glass and, feeling much braver now, Danielle readied herself to step fully onto the glass platform.

*DING DONG*

"Shit!" howled Danielle as she jumped back off the scales, the movement causing her to partially detowel and expose herself to a non-existent audience.
Opening the bathroom door with a billow of steam following her, Danielle glared at the front door as if trying to peer through the wood to see who had interrupted her in this pivotal moment.
Almost on cue though, and without showing themselves through the solid material, the doorbell chimed through the flat again.
"For god's sake" huffed Danielle, discarding her towel completely causing her to briefly wander to her bedroom completely naked, before grabbing a thin robe which she threw over her shoulders hurriedly.

Barely tying the thin material together over her front before whipping the door open, Danielle's mood continued to smolder at the unsuspecting guest.

"Oh hi there, delivery?" stammered the acne ridden teenager stood in the shared hall outside her flat.

"What?" scalded the unimpressed brunette as she leaned against the doorframe with her arms folded, well aware the poor boy before her was caught up giving her the once over rather than doing his.

"Food delivery, from Wui's? You ordered Chinese earlier for delivery at 6?" continued the startled delivery boy as he attempted to recompose himself

"What are you talking about? I've never ordered Chinese food from any Wong's"
Danielle knew after she'd said it she'd got the restaurant name wrong but she didn't care, as if she hadn't eaten enough that day to then be told she'd apparently ordered take out.

"I can assure you we received an order to be brought to this address at this time and..."
Patience well and truly ran out, Danielle closed the door in the kid's face before striding back towards her sofa.
No sooner had she sat down a whimsical ping radiated from her phone signifying a text.
Exasperated as she was, Danielle was a sucker for her phone and for all she knew it was a notification from Tinder or one of the other dating apps she used to flex her femme fatality upon.

Sadly though, it was a confimation message.
From Just Eat.
Saying her delivery from Wui's Chinese had just been delivered.

Sighing heavily, Danielle threw herself up from the sofa and went for the door
"Screw you Sarah" she muttered as she opened the door again, only to startle the delivery boy still stood at her door.

"Don't shout at me again please..." begged the boy as he adjusted his delivery cap nervously.
Fortunately for him, Danielle didn't speak at all, rather she simply snatched the bag from his hands before slamming the door shut again.

Dropping heavily back onto the sofa for the third time that night, Danielle dug into the bag of food she'd just recieved, groaning at every step as more containers came out than she could have even guessed she had pre-ordered.
"We have got to get back to the gym girl" mumbled Danielle to herself as she cracked open a serving of sweet and sour pork before taking another sweep of the tv channels.

Unsurprisingly though, she had declared that fact every day since promising it to that first break room muffin and she was yet to follow through on any of those occurrences.

“Ooooph...heya babe” groaned Lucielle as she edged her way through the front door of hers and Alex’s flat, dumping her bag and shelling her shoes from her chubby feet.

Lucielle laughed again, taking on a coy attitude as she playfully turned on her toes slightly with a flirtatious smile.

Apparently Lucielle’s teasing nature had been provoked with her own sentiment as well as, with a sultry slowness to it, she softly tucked her fingers into the hem of her skirt.

Throwing Alex a teasing half smile through her fringe, Lucielle then moved her hands from her hips and around her front, gently caressing her roundness as she went.
Fingers crawling down her belly, she then proceeded to dig under her skirt again, taking a firm hold of her currently tucked in belly.

Then, as slowly as with her skirt, Lucielle proceeded to untuck her immense belly one pale bulging inch of stretch mark riddled flesh at a time.
As her huge belly hung heavily in front of her tree trunk thighs free of its confines, the blonde took to gently kneading her belly fat between her chubby fingers, quietly moaning as she did.

Fascinated as his 600lb girlfriend fondled herself, Alex forced himself to refocus himself.
“A belly that soft definitely isn’t full I think” purred Alex, fluidly opening the fridge door, grabbing a tray of large chocolate and cream eclairs before stepping up against Lucielle.
Before anything else could be said, one such eclair was raised to Lucielle’s lips pausing only momentarily as her reflexes kicked in to accept the sweet treat.

**********

In no time, the kitchen was filled with the sounds of an exceptionally heavy blonde woman moaning as cream and pastry filled her mouth, stopping only briefly as the remaining piece of eclair followed the first.

“That’a girl” purred Alex as he slowly traced the soft skin bulging between the flaps of a tightly buttoned shirt stretched to its limits.

Lucielle either couldn’t or wouldn’t talk at that moment as she swallowed the sizeable mouthful of pastry in her mouth, licking her lips of any residue only to have a second eclair fill the void within her mouth.

Autonomous tendencies taking hold, a third followed closely behind only to have a fourth chase it down, all the while as Alex gently teased Lucielle’s deep belly button whilst groping her heavy lower belly roll.

The moment seemed to last a long time, travelling in slow motion as the couple drew close with Lucielle dangling on Alex’s every feeding motion untill...

*DING DONG*

“Just one second babe” cooed Alex as he handed the eclairs to Lucielle accompanied with a playful slap to the belly as he strode towards the front door, leaving Lucielle to her own devices.
The blonde was almost oblivious as Alex walked off.

“Hey there mister, got some food here for ya” chirped a rather chipper delivery girl as Alex opened the door “you having a party in there?”

“You could say that” smirked the currently unabashed feeder as he obscured his lower half with the door to avoid suspicion.

“Great” smiled the delivery girl as she began to hand over box after box of piping hot food.
It didn’t go unnoticed that the delivery girl was packing some extra poundage, although Alex supposed that was to be expected given her line of work.

As the last few boxes were handed over, the girl at the door caught a glance of the heifer sized blonde in the kitchen at the other end of the house currently glutting herself on eclairs with her belly hanging free.
The sight, although not repulsive, did send a flicker of self questioning through the delivery girls mind though as she considered her own extra weight.

“Thanks for all that” said Alex as he counted out the money from his wallet “don’t forget to get yourself something when you get back, ok?”

The thought of eating after spying Lucielle made the girl squirm slightly, even if the prospect of blimping up that much was unrealistic.

As he slid the door shut again, Alex turned with a huge grin on his face.
“I hope you’re hungry babe”

Having just finished her eclairs, the answer was obvious coming from Lucielle.
“You bet I am” purred the blonde as she turned to face her boyfriend approaching, her girth clear as the edge of her hips disappeared behind the doorframe.

*********

“Well, we’ve never had to order a second time in one sitting before” observed Alex as he rubbed Lucielle’s belly.

“UUUURP...mhm...URRP”

Lucielle was far too concentrated on filling her face to talk, a quite remarkable thing seeing as she’d not stopped eating since that first eclair.
The softness in her belly had also reduced considerably as the night drew on, although that is hardly surprising given the sheer quantity of food the blonde had consumed without moving an inch.

“I mean, two huge takeout orders is impressive but there was all that pasta and pie that I made for you as well” cooed Alex, continuing to dote on his girlfriend verbally whilst massaging her much firmer belly “not to mention the fridge load of desserts you’ve inhaled as well”

Lucielle felt considerably turned on hearing just how much she had eaten, even if a full sensation was starting to build up, even more so in reflection at how much she’d eaten.

“Not to mention you burst nearly every button on your shirt” teased Alex, taking on a more whispering tone now as he learnt against Lucielle’s fat rolls to talk into her ear.

That broke the blondes concentration, leaving her to moan softly as she recalled each individual button bursting off her rounded gut as the calories mounted up.

“Thought you’d like that” mused Alex as he rolled away from his girlfriend into the barely large enough part of sofa left for him next to Lucielle.

“I think you just enjoy fattening me up” purred Lucielle with a sideways glance.

“Aww damn, you got me” remarked Alex, trying to bite back too large a laugh before it escaped.

Lucielle rolled her eyes with a soft tut before hunkering down slightly in her seat, accentuating her usual double belly slightly even in her stuffed state.

“It is kind of hot though, right?” returned Lucielle with a playful glimmer

“Definitely is babe” smiled Alex before leaning in for an deeply passionate kiss, an arm laying across the peak of Lucielle’s belly as he did.

*********

“Morning girls” chirped Lucielle as she walked into her office, still feeling a little tight after her immense feast from the night before.

“Hey boss!” returned Shelly and Carri with mixed levels of enthusiasm.

The blonde superior slowly made her way around her desk and delicately, or at least as delicate as a woman of her size can, placed herself into her executive chair.

“Your breakfast should be here shortly” declared Shelly without breaking eye contact with the paperwork she was skimming.

“Aww you’re so sweet you two, thank you” replied Lucielle even if the thought of food did raise a minor question in her mind after the extent of her feasting the night before.
She’d barely been able to find a shirt big enough that morning to cover herself in the aftermath.

“At the least I hope you got something for yourselves”

“Oh we did” smiled Shelly, knowing all to well the routine there in that Lucielle would not allow anybody to go hungry on her watch.

Lucielle simply smiled in her content for the situation, little moments of flashback reminding her of the night before.
