The past twelve months had been...interesting.
As Bo awoke from her bed with the faint warmth of the morning sun peering through the blinds it was clear that a beautiful day was about to transpire.
As the now purple and crimson haired woman stretched with her legs dangling over the edge of the bed, her tiredness slowly waned from her body allowing her the energy to drag herself to her feet hereby presenting one of the many interesting moments of the past year.

Despite being a highly dominant feeder it was clear that Bo had piled on some pounds.
The grand total of those 'some', as according to a bathroom scale the morning before, was 64lbs which, for those keeping score, put her at a seam splitting 318lbs.
Although being wholly enjoyed it had been a learning curve for the feeder to be taking on such weight as this was something she normally only observed on others.
It certainly hadnt proved grounds for complaint though, and Bo actually took great delight in her accentuating body.
Naturally bottom heavy anyway, her hips and arse had not hung around in absorbing the bulk of her new weight giving her a frankly enormous girth even for a woman of her weight. Such asset growth was highlighted this morning with her poor panties nearly completely swallowed by her bulging cheeks which she proceeded to hook out for comfort. As the fabric snapped back to its usual position the stretchy edges bit firmly into the soft flesh beneath.
As ever her thighs also carried extra weight along with her waist maintaining her well known middle heavy appearance.
Despite her penchant to letting her clothing hug her lower belly curve, the combined increase in girth as well as the increase of weight around her middle had made this long impractical so Bo took instead to exhibiting her growing belly and allowed it to hand free over her waistbands at all times

"I hope you're ready babe!" called a familiar voice from outside the bedroom which instantly pricked up Bo's ears
"Oh absolutely" she cooed in response, adjusting her fuller bra before leaning back onto the edge of the bed causing her sizeable rear to spread even wider.
As approaching footsteps could be heard outside the room, Bo bit her lip with a wild allure in her eyes, her heart pounding in her chest almost audibly as the person appeared in the doorway before her.
And there, completely naked, stood Ashley.

Now, here stands oddity number two of the past year.
After Ashley's unexpected arrival on their doorstep, Jenna and Bo had taken her in and helped her get over her breakup with Don.
The three became exceptionally close in this time and spent a great deal of time together over the weeks and months and things were going great...up until Jenna came home to see Bo and Ashley entwined with each other on the kitchen floor.
And now the weird part, as Jenna promptly joined the two

Although no official label was ever given to what spawned from that day it was pretty reasonable to assume that the three had formed some crazy love triangle type arrangement which, in turn, had led to their living arrangements with the three STILL living in Jenna's house.

Love triangle arrangements aside though, this particular arrangement had also led to interesting occurance of the year number three which was currently stood in Bo's doorway.
Ashley had got fat.
Partly fueled by her post-breakup sadness but mostly encouraged by Bo's insatiable doting and Jenna's immensely deep bank account, Ashley had blossomed into quite the fat girl.
Throw in a dash of her crashing metabolism ending her body builder career once and for all and the results were the 331lb bombshell stood before Bo.

Her figure had quickly morphed into that of an hourglass, her weight distributing evenly top and bottom giving her some bodacious curves in her early gaining days.
As the food kept coming and her appetite cried for more though, the rest of her started to catch up and developed her not quite dominant belly, rounding out her figure.
Now, stood on the edge of the bedroom, Ashley was a sight to behold and certainly unrecognisable from her former thin self. With thick thighs, bulging wide hips and an unexpected F cup rack, she was still unmistakeably hourglass shaped.
When empty, her belly formed a slight second roll around her waist that hung heavily over her crotch along with immensely thick love handles topping off her hips.

In her current stance, her enlarged boobs hung slightly as round melons atop her belly, her prominant double chin was delicately smooth and adorable and some surprisingly thick bingo wings adorned the underside of her arms where biceps once formed.
She was Bo's pet project to boot and absolutely loved it.

Throwing vast curls of her brunette hair over her shoulder, Ashley strutted towards Bo before stopping inches away from her, her body continuing to jiggle a good two seconds after she'd stopped
"So?" questioned Ashley, lips curled with her fingers digging softly into her hips
"Absolutely" responded Bo before whipping her arms around her second girlfriend's thicker neck and pulled her in to a deep kiss.

After a while though, Ashley pushed against Bo's shoulders and resumed her hands on hips stance
"Urgh, always the gooey romantic" groaned Ashley, with a playful look in her eyes "can't get fat on kisses babe"
With a mild tut in her voice Ashley bent to open a drawer, giving Bo a delightful view of her arse along with a demonstration of how far her belly hangs, and stood again with a funnel in hand
Dropping the implement into Bo's thickened lap, Ashley awkwardly clambered onto the bed, assuming a position with her head against the headboard and her legs trailing down the bed.
In this position her belly also sat on her thighs, deepening the roll around her waist and hips
"So?" asked the heavy brunette again expectantly
"Oh you're so in for it today babe" teased Bo as she proceeded to bring six pitchers of protein powder infused shakes onto a nearby dressing table

Ashley looked over with an intrigued look in her eye before leaning slightly forward, carressing Bo's mammoth hips
"Only six?" asked Ashley, coyness dripping off her tongue
Bo chuckled at this before pushing Ashley back down onto the bed
"So lazy, she wont even humour chewing these days" said Bo to an imaginary observer as she routinely placed the tube into Ashley's mouth and grabbed the first pitcher "There's real food after these if you're even still hungry" teased the feeder over Ashley's lap
Ashley would have responded but the delicious liquid hit her tongue and blind euphoria took over as her eyes rolled back in her head and she hungrily sucked on the tube between her lips.

Life since Don had been amazing and she'd never been more in love with anything before the concept of getting fat.

At home, clothes had become rather trivial for Lucielle, partly out of comfort and partly due to them lasting two minutes at most when she did wear them. Work had become interesting from the side of things.
Now was no exception mind as the immense blonde stood in some pale blue panties and a highly taxed white vest top.

Bottom heavy as ever, Lucielle’s arse bulged behind her in cellulite dappled mounds atop hugely thickened thighs, equally cellulite coated.

Her thighs were so heavy that they formed great thick rolls that both members of the couple fawned over as they tapered into deeply dimpled knees atop thick smooth calves.
Even her feet were fat at this point with chubby toes to boot.

As impressive as Lucielle’s bottom half was, at 700 plus pounds it was impossible for the rest of her to not gain a huge amount of weight.
Speaking of which, her enormous double rolled belly hung heavily over her crotch and more than half way down her thighs. Filling her top half even more were her immensely love handles; thick bulges of fat curving into her heavy belly hang whilst swelling due to the huge weight piled on top of them.

Split by a deep belly button, her upper roll was adorned with rolls of back fat before been topped with an impressive pair of boobs, currently only supported by her own belly and contained within her poor vest top which barely stretched over said chest, never mind any of her expansive belly.
On the side of all this, Lucielle also sported some meaty flabby arms alongside adorably chubby cheeks and a triple chin to drive Alex wild.

“What do you think then?” asked Alex, genuinely intrigued as Lucielle remained silent
As the blonde smiled warmly to herself, she slowly stepped back off the scale, every inch of her jiggling as she did.
“Come on Lu, I’m dying here!” insisted Alex
Suddenly and without warning for a girl her size, Lucielle turned on her heels and dropped heavily on top of Alex.
I mean, all 723lbs of heavy.

Winded and squashed between his huge girlfriend and the poor groaning sofa beneath them both, Lucielle smiled beautifully before kissing Alex deeply.
Hands a plenty as he pawed over Lucielle’s bountiful fat, Alex felt himself growing in arousal to whole new levels, only to have Lucielle break away to look deeply in his eyes.

“You keep feeding me Alex, seriously, I want to get SOOO fat” pleaded Lucielle “I have NEVER been so happy as I am now and I can’t wait to get fatter”
The blonde was biting her lip seductively at this point as she looked her boyfriend over.

“Well I think I can do that” smiled Alex

“Good” purred Lucielle as she labourisly rolled off of her boyfriend sending her body into a violent jiggle again.

Not needing to be told twice, Alex sprung up from his seat and grabbed a dense two tiered chocolate cake layered in cream cheese frosting from the trolley he had brought in.
Without hesitation, Alex mounted Lucielle’s huge belly, knees tucked into the roll of fat over her hips before breaking off a large chunk of cake ready to feed her.

The blonde chuckled, causing ripples of fat to wave through her belly, jostling Alex on his perch, before responding.

It was moments like this that had led Lucielle to take large chunks of personal time off of work lately, not that anybody minded, and fortunately for her someone had taken over the intern program.
The only question now though, is who?

Lucielle reluctantly returns to work...for now
A fresh batch of interns join Gordge
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
Sarah had had an exceptional year.
Having fluked her way onto the internship program in the first place she could never have dreamed to have got this far in just 12 short months, but here she was, sat at the top of the pyramid now.

All credit to her mind, Sarah had worked her ass off getting to where she was now, not to mention having to fend Danielle off of the position as well, so was more than deserving of her position.
It had helped that, unlike Danielle, Sarah was much more pleasant to be around which had scored her major brownie points in the short time she had worked that.
It had also gone in her favour that she was willing to partake in all aspects of the office's usual running, including the girls frequent and over indulgent breaks as well as being no stranger to dip into meals and spreads prepared for meetings.

"Work's like a slave and eats like a manager" Jenna had once said about Sarah and she couldn't be more right.
Sarah had one hell of an appetite when it came to business and food alike so it was only natural that she would succeed at Gordge.
It goes without saying though that she had also gained status for her figure as well over the course of the year.

As Sarah's delicate British metabolism fell by the way side of the constant torrent of American grease and fat she had ballooned incredibly beyond her once svelte figure.
Although possessing a general thickness all round, the blonde Brit had proven to be rather middle heavy with a soft spherical belly jutting ahead of her whilst a shelf like arse led up the rear like a pair of babies fighting under a blanket.
Anyone who looked at her face or below her knees would think that Sarah had barely gained a pound during her tenure at Gordge but they couldn't be more wrong.

The Brit's wildly contrasting figure, aside from been quite the turn on for herself, had also proven to be one hell of a hook for her boyfriend.
That's right, Sarah had bagged herself a guy as well as a promotion.
Unsurprisingly, Jacob had proven to be a prolific feeder after falling head over heels for Sarah and the pair had been going out for nearly 6 months now, even if most of that did consist of stuffing the young Brit until she could hardly breath.
A year's worth of empty calories combined with sitting on her fattening rump all day every day had certainly done a number on Sarah's figure and, based on the last time she weighed herself, she had already crossed the 15 stone mark (210lbs according to Jacob) making her one of the biggest gains of the past 12 months with little competition, even from the biggest women at the office.

************

"I'll see you tonight then hun?" panted Sarah as she heavily lent against the doorframe of her office as Jacob stepped out in front of her, cockney accent still lacing her tongue even after a year.

"Better had do babe, I've got plans for dinner" teased Jacob as he bumped up against his bloated girlfriend before taking her into a big hug

"Oooph careful, I've barely swallowed lunch" moaned Sarah as she gently embraced her boyfriend in return, one hand idly cradling her bulbous belly as she spoke.

Jacob couldn't help but smile at that as he cupped both hands on Sarah's belly where it hung heavily and free of her shirt and skirt.

"Well if you don't burst a button off this shirt tonight then I will have done something wrong" smirked Jacob as he noted the tightness of Sarah's shirt already with buttons nearly stretched to their limit over the peak of her rounded belly as things were.

"You just won't be happy until you can roll me around will you?" teased Sarah, admittedly not put off at the thought of that herself

"Maaaaybe not" cooed Jacob, deliberately avoiding the answer even though they both knew.

As the couple continued to tease each other, Danielle strutted past them and huffed her discontent at their romance.

Now, Sarah knew that most of Danielle's problem was Sarah's weight which was rather ironic given Danielle had hardly maintained her figure.
Over the course of the past 12 months, Danielle had also suffered at the hands of the office routine, developing herself quite the swelled hips and rear arrangement to accompany her rapidly thickened thighs and arms.
She was no slouch in the midriff department either as, particularly noticeable when wearing tight dresses, she had developed a chubby layer around her previously trimmed stomach as well as filled out in her face.

To most people, Danielle was still stunning and actually suited the extra office weight, but Danielle herself was a different story.
Even her two cup size increase wasn't enough to quell the brunette's rage about her increasing weight.

All the same though, Sarah didn't care as she was quite happy with how her life was going, rapidly increasing weight and all.
Having noticed the general consensus on her first day and, now that she was a part of it, Sarah could really see why the women here enjoyed being fat so much.

THIS was a life she could get used to.

As she bid Jacob goodbye for now and made her way back to her desk chair, which groaned loudly as she sat again, a devilish thought crossed Sarah's mind as she scanned her desk of the remnants from her lunch.
Unable to find what she was looking for, Sarah delicately picked up her office phone and hit speed dial.

"Hi Pauline, could you bring me a tray of doughnuts please and would it be possible to order my usual from Dominos? Thank's Pauline, you're a peach" purred Sarah into the receiver, all thought of her hefty lunch nearly gone as her hunger grew fresh inside her.
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.title: The English are coming

1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
The lumbering was unmistakeable, there was only one person in the office that large that walked that slowly. The panting and grunting had an all to familiar sound. The hallways were wider than most, but it was only she that tested the limits of them. Lucielle only thanked her lucky stars her office was one of the closest to the elevator.

Lucielle had just come back from one of her many days off, and folks in the office we're sure to be happy to see her, but Lucielle had other priorities to attend to first, number one being getting off her feet. The only soul she had seen so far was Ashley at the front desk, though the thickened girls eyes were rolled into the back of her head as she sipped on a milkshake from an impressively large vessel.

Finally in her office, after passing through the double door, of which she was of only a select few to be granted, Lucielle crashed on the couch she used as an office chair. After her success with the intern program last year, Lucielles work load some would describe as... light. She had no need for a desk or a computer. Her office was just a couch with a side table and a phone. All the work she needed to get done happened between her lips.

Picking up her receiver, she dialed a three digit extension and waited for an answer. "Hi Codi, yes it's me Lucielle. What was there for lunch? Oh that sounds tasty, can you bring me four plates of that? Also please let Sarah know that I'm here so I can get an update on the new interns. Thanks." Then she clicked down the receiver.

1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
"Oh good Codi, you're here." Lucielle said excitedly, as the girthy goth waddled through the double doors of her office, carrying a tray with four plates. "Oh wow that looks good. Put it down here beside me." The young employee did as she was instructed, eyeing over her superior as she got closer.

Everyone knew Lucielle was a marvel to behold, there was no one fatter in the whole company, and the blonde bombshell was only getting bigger. For women who really gave into the corporate culture around here, Lucielle was the shining example of what could happen if everything went right for you.

Codi was no slouch when it came to Gordge's corporate culture. She had started as a chubby intern a year ago, but had showed so much promise that she had received a full time offer after the program had ended, much like some of her other interns, Sarah, Danielle, and Pauline.

Promise wasn't the only thing she had going for her, the formerly only chubby goth, had joined the ranks of the full time fatties. Never one for aligning with mainstream culture, Codi had a laissez-faire approach when it came to eating. When food was around she didn't count her calories, or stick to salad, that was so industrialized. Instead she ate what she wanted, when she wanted. And when it came to working at Gordge there was always food within arms reach.

Because of this Codi had packed on some serious weight. At first she was a little disappointed, mainly because she couldn't fit into her favorite black and red striped dress anymore. But once she got her full time gig and had a monthly clothing allowance as part of her benefits package, she never turned back. Now a year later Codi looked like an inflated version of herself. Today she wore a gray suit, but it was the darkest gray you could imagine that wasn't black. It hugged her curves in every direction due to its tightness.

Her thighs had certainly rounded out quite a bit, meeting almost all the way to the knee in her tight skirt. Her rear was stretching the fabric as much as the polyester would allow. Her formerly small belly has expanded into quite the pooch. It hung in front of her, giving the slightest jiggle if moved quickly enough. Codi still sported her jet black hair, but had learned to wear it not all in her face, it seemed like the corporate world was rubbing off on her. She still styled in her dark red eye catching lipstick though.

The plumper Codi was nothing when it came to the sheer enormity that was Lucielle, but it did paint a picture for the young goth if she continued down this road for sometime.

Codi could only watch as Lucielle dug into her first plate. Her ass was digging into the couch so far, and her hips were spread over two of the large couch cushions. Her belly was so large it filled her lap almost out to her knees. Even her thick arms looked like boulder on each side of her, framing her large melon shaped chest. She sat there, almost three times larger than her underling, eating four plates of lunch.

"Codi dear, do you mind grabbing me a drink and a few snacks from the break room? My meeting with Sarah should be any minute now. Thanks love."
1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.title: The bulging goth Codi arrives with the food

1153212211211222131211211211211122221222.content:
"Oh be a dear Codi and get me SOO much to eat will you, I'll just be with Lucielle" cooed a very familiar voice from just outside Lucielle's 'office' "and do get yourself something won't you? You are shamefully thin for a goth"

Lucielle rolled her eyes as Ashley's voice danced through her office door.
Since moving in with Jenna and Bo, Ashley had not only become unexpectedly fat but something of an outrageous flirt.
Fortunately for her though, most of the other girls took it well within their strides and Ashley was loyal enough to her little romantic triangle that she rarely acted on her roguish comments.
Not that that stopped her frequent teasing and words of encouragement around the office.

"Speaking of thin" purred Ashley as she rounded the doorframe, holding the door for her exceptionally curvy self with a well manicured hand.

"Talking to yourself honey?" asked Lucielle as she continued to attack the portions of food Codi had just delivered for her.

Ashley laughed, knowing full well she had nothing on her blonde friend even with her immense weight gain over the past year.
"Well as good as Bo is there isn't a girl in this office who can keep up with you Lu" retorted Ashley as she jiggled across the room, every roll of fat and blossoming bulge glaringly visible in her obscenely tight dress.

Lucielle would have blushed were she unaware of her status amongst the other girls.
"You're hardly small fry these days Ash, nearly 150lbs in a year is impressive" complimented Lucielle as she eyed the smaller girl coming towards her.
It was no mystery how Ashley had grown so quickly but the sheer amount was quite baffling, particularly given how well it had distributed around her body.

"Oh I know, if only I could eat more though" sighed Ashley with a twinge of humour and a much larger portion of deep yearning "how do you think Alex would take to having a second desperately hungry woman at his beck and call?"

"I don't think his bank account can handle our combined appetites honey" Lucielle plainly put as Ashley squeezed herself in next to the titanic blonde as best she could given their combined girths, thick rolls of fat pushing against each other.

"Hmm, true" sighed Ashley again "well with regards to that how would you both like to come round to my place tonight? Jenna's putting on quite the spread as a celebration for the first successful year of the internship program and you are kind of integral to it"

Lucielle scoffed at Ashley's underplay of her role in the program "I think you mean I was program leader"

"Past tense sweety, Sarah has that title now" winked Ashley, eying the British born blonde through the glass partition.

"Come in Sarah" called Lucielle, granting Sarah the invitation she wanted to enter her superior's office

"Morning, you wanted my report of what's happened whilst you were...off?" started Sarah, only to be interrupted as Codi once again came in, dragging two trollies piled high with various foods.

"Yes, in good time Sarah, first we eat though" beckoned Lucielle as the trollies were parked before her couch.

"Shall I bring more?" asked Codi, all too familiar with where the answer was likely to go

"Certainly, if you don't mind" smiled Lucielle as Sarah glanced over the trolley before grabbing a rather large chocolate pastry in each hand, her spherical belly still hanging proud over her skirt waistband and clear of the confines of her button shirt.

"And for god's sake, get your goth backside in here pigging out with us!" cried out Ashley, watching Codi wobble back out of the office with a sly grin.

**********

"So are you all coming to the internship success celebration party tonight or not?" asked Ashley again, polishing off yet another buttery pastry as she nudged an empty serving trolley away from her.

"Hell yeah!" cried Codi who was sat on the floor having long untucked and unbuttoned her strained shirt to expose her rounding belly and plump breasts sitting heavily within her bra.

"Count me in" purred Sarah as she lazily tickled her belly which, given the fact she hadn't stopped eating all day, had caused two of her shirt buttons to burst from her garment, leaving a flapping gap to gaze upon her swelling stomach which now sported an impressively deep belly button against the perfect roundness of her gut.

"In that case then, smile ladies!" called out Ashley as she engaged the camera on her phone and pointed it towards the four engorged women

*click*

'Four girls ready to get fat tonight' was the typed caption that Ashley layered over the photo before sending it to Bo to mark the girls attendence.

Ashley barely had chance to smile before a sharp buzzing indicated the response, a like minded picture with Bo exposing her own plump midriff and hips stood in the kitchen of their shared home
'Here I was scared that all this food was going to be just for you ;)'

Ashley bit her lip at the obvious flirt before putting her phone away.
She'd respond in a moment.

"Hey, do you still want my report Lucielle?" groaned Sarah as she reached for a particularly tempting bear claw from amongst the scraps of food.

The biggest girl of the group pondered this question for a while before answering
"I think you've done a lovely job in my absence so lets not worry about so much paperwork huh?"

Sarah simply smiled and nodded in response, not one for over complicating a job if it didn't need to be.

As the four girls continued to snack and talk amongst themselves, the unmistakable figure of Danielle sauntered past the glass fronted office space.
The narcy brunette took a moment to glance at her co-workers before shaking her head and strutting off on whatever errand she was headed for.
Still heavily in denial, Danielle chose to ignore the prominent wobble radiating through her own figure as she stormed off.

11532122112112222.content:
"Honey, I'm home!" called Lucielle as she closed the front door behind her, catching her bulbous arse as she does.
The heavy set blonde giggled to herself as her arse jiggled from the knock as she dropped her handbag, took off her coat and stretched the lethargy from her engorged body after a tiresome first day back at the office. Renovations had been completed at the office which had allowed Lucielle to return to work, albeit regrettably, and she was starving. Compared to the weeks of constant decadence with Alex cooking for and feeding her, Lucielle was wasting away despite having two breakfasts, a three hour lunch with Alice and Jessica and two dozen doughnuts as a return to work present from the management. However, her return home was marked with the smell of cheese and herbs wafting from the kitchen.

Following her nose, Lucielle lumbered down the hallway past hanging photos of her and Alex documenting their time together and, unintentionally, the blonde's impressive weight gain to date. Officially, Lucielle hasn't moved in with Alex but their relationship dictated she spent a large amount of time there which in turn led to some girly aspects bleeding into Alex's house from myriades of stuffed animals to cushions and throws on all flat surfaces to Lucielle's cute pink fluffy slippers which were residing partly under Alex's sofa at this particular moment.

"Alex sweetie?" Lucielle called out again "your blondie bear's home and really really hungry"
Alex had never called Lucielle 'his blondie bear' but she was feeling particularly cute and playful at this point. Her stretching had freed her button shirt from her tight skirt leaving the hem of said shirt floating around her stomach which now hung free as she wandered through the house towards the kitchen. As she idly scratched the underside of her belly Lucielle suddenly became aware of voices coming from the kitchen and quickened her laboured waddle marginally.

As she got closer, Lucielle was able to determine that there were two voices in the kitchen, one being Alex and the other being...a woman? Lucielle didn't recognise the woman's voice and found herself confused, Alex had never had guests in the entire time they had been dating and never even mentioned friends particularly and now there was a woman with him in his house whilst she was at work? Lucielle rounded the hallway corner with a large swing of her hip causing her to knock a table as she passed. The noise briefly silenced the talking from the kitchen but it soon returned with laughter. Now with something of a sulk on and marching her fat legs faster then she'd moved in many weeks, Lucielle bore down on the kitchen at quite some speed for her size. With the door in sight, Lucielle could see Alex walking back and forth doing various cooking tasks whilst wearing the apron that she had bought him with the quirky slogan "you can trust my cooking, my girlfriend is fat". Sat at the table, back to the door, Lucielle could also now see the second voice. Red hair flowed down her back and fat bulged at her sides making her figure dominate the chair she was sat on. She was smaller than Lucielle sure but she was also scarfing down Alex's food like it was going out of fashion which was not acceptable.

"Alex!" shouted Lucielle as she bowled into the kitchen, folding her arms and scowling like thunder.
"Oh hey baby, you hungry?" asked Alex, dishing up another plate by the cooker ready to serve to the blonde filling the doorframe.
"Don't baby me! What's going on here?!" screamed Lucielle, too angry to even notice her stomach was roaring at the smell of food filling her mouth and nose at that moment.
"Woah woah, what do you mean? Nothing's going..." Alex could barely get the words out before he was cut off by Lucielle barging into him with her full weight forcing her boyfriend against the counter.
"I go back to work and on the first day you bring some other woman in to do god only knows what?! I can't believe that you would do..." mid scream, it was Lucielle's turn to be cut off.
"Hi, erm, sorry to interrupt" it was the red head at the table who had now found her feet and was only a few steps behind the arguing couple.
Lucielle turns to face the girl behind her with a glare which throws her off slightly causing her to fidget nervously.
"Sorry, it's just that..."

115321221121122221.content:
"I'm Amy, Alex's sister..."
The belly heavy red head rocked back and forth on her feet as she stood before the now silent couple, avoiding eye contact with the blonde office girl.
"What?!" spat Lucielle still glaring at 'Amy' but with less conviction now having also taken a step away from Alex in the process, allowing him some breathing space from the counter and his girlfriends heaving stomach.
"I'm Alex's sister, I came to visit him for a while. He totally didn't know I was coming but wanted to surprise you once he did know, he loves you to pieces so he says, you're definitely his girlfriend looking at the size of you and I wish I had an ass as big as yours", realising she was rambling Amy looked to her toes again and continued fidgeting, thighs rubbing together as she moved from chubby foot to chubby foot.
Disarmed by the nervousness of the red head, Lucielle felt cautiously trusting of her. Hands on hips, the hulking blonde took steps closer to Amy before, finally, the two were touching faintly by the impressive respective curves of their bellies.
"Leave us alone Alex and order some pizzas" growled Lucielle over her shoulder, not breaking eye contact with Amy and aware of their bellies rubbing gently together as the girls breathed.
With a deep sigh of relief, Alex scarpered and disappeared out of the kitchen, tail firmly between his legs as he feared for his sister he'd left behind.

"Ok, just to be clear" Lucielle started, pulling up two chairs and sitting down to a loud groan of wood beneath her weight "I totally believe you're Alex's sister" Amy exalted for the first time since Lucielle had entered the kitchen and found her way back to her chair which also groaned, albeit quieter than Lucielle's pair, as a curvaceous belly settled on thick thighs.
"Oh thank god, I was sooo freaking out there that you thought..." Lucielle cut off the bloated redhead mid flow.
"Ok sweetie, how about we just get food drunk and THEN we can talk, ok?" suggested the blonde, reaching for a large pot of creamy pasta, tucking in before a question could even be asked.
Without hesitating and with a sigh of relief, Amy grabbed her own corresponding pot of pasta and began to feast away again.

"Ok so Alex used to try his recipes on you?" asked Lucielle
"Yep" Amy replied, swallowing pasta as she did
"And you've just got divorced from a guy who enjoyed your weight at first but was constantly trying to make you lose it?" Lucielle found herself oddly fascinated by Amy and she seemed more than happy to oblige as if still proving her innocence. The belly dominant redhead was considerably smaller than Lucielle but still had one hell of an appetite having already outeaten the blonde at this stage.
"Exactly. Anyway, as a last goodbye I piled on like 15lbs, declared I loved my fat self and walked out of there. I've not been able to see Alex properly until now since the divorce so thought I could surprise him" responded Amy, sucking in a string of spaghetti as she did. "I knew he had a girlfriend but had no idea you were this beautiful, he never tells me the important things" Amy rolled her eyes at this point with a smile between her rounded cheeks.
Lucielle feigned a blush at this point "gee, thanks. You're not exactly a slacker in the looks department" obviously belly heavy, Amy was also thick in the thighs and hip department, her only shortfall been her chest which lagged behind her otherwise ballooning body. Sporting some tight tracksuit bottoms and a red strappy vest top, underwear lines were clear pinching into her fat and accentuating curves and bulges all over her body. She was also a bit chubby of face but not drastically and her fiery hair billowed down her shoulders and back.
"Well thank you" giggled Amy.
"I'm serious, I'd totally fatten you up all day long if I was your jerk of an ex husband" retorted Lucielle, looking closely at the redhead.
"Well you're doing a good job so far if I may say so" Amy leaned back in her chair end exposed her rounded belly, both hands rubbing in small circles on the tightened surface.
"Well the night is young yet, you still hungry?" Inquired the pear-shaped blonde

115321221121122222.content:
"...I'm Naomi, I live across the hall" blurted the nervous red head.
Looking back and forth between her boyfriend and 'Naomi', Lucielle was bemused.

"Yeah, we've been friends ever since I moved into the building and she came round for a catch up" announced Alex, sweating intensely with fear in his heart.

"And why have I never met her before?" asked Lucielle coldly, not relenting the pressure she was applying to Alex preventing his escape.

"She hadn't seen much of me lately because obviously I've been preoccupied with you and we just happened to cross paths when I came back from the shops with all this!" blurted Alex with a slight hint of breathlessness seeping into his voice from Lucielle bearing down on him.

"Honestly, I really didn't know he had a girlfriend until we got talking" responded Naomi.
Lucielle gave Naomi another once over with a glare that could have stopped a train.
In spite of her earlier observations, the heifer-weight blonde started to suspect she had misjudged the situation.

For one, Naomi wasn't quite the chair dominator Lucielle initially thought.
Now stood up it was clear that, although the girl's hips were certainly swollen, her enlarged booty only formed the bottom half of a sizable hourglass.
Seriously sizable.
Stretching a vest top tight between the open flaps of a checked shirt, a deep fleshy canyon of sunkissed cleavage perched beneath the a delicate hint of a second chin.
Aside from her outrageous curves though, Naomi was barely beyond chubby with a visibly shaped waist swaddled in a modest layer of softness, her belly button only betrayed through the material by the combined tightness torturing the garment in other places.

Secondly, 'red' was a very literal description of her hair.
Clearly not natural, Naomi sported a cascade of bright red locks with an intentional hint of much darker hair showing at the roots.

"Look, I don't want to cause any trouble, I..." started Naomi, hoping to defuse the situation

"I think you had best go" cut Lucielle shortly, only to be acknowledged by the swift padding of feet and the sound of the door closing.

Satisfied that the unexpected house guest had left the couple in peace, Lucielle continued on Alex.

"I think you and me need to talk"

*****

Naomi was a sweet girl.
With a Hawaiian father and Mexican mother, she was something of a unique individual State side, a fact which the locals certainly noticed.
Often approached for her looks and doted upon by potential suitors, Naomi stood to be quite the happy girl were it not for one fatal flaw and, despite her outward appearance, Naomi was a cripplingly shy introverted individual.
By her own unintentional research, people were less interested when the focus of their affections wasn't as outspoken as their body.

But then Alex had come along.
He showed no outward interest in hooking up with her and was actually nice to her even when she shied away at times.
Over time, as Naomi warmed to Alex as a person, a genuine friendship formed between the two of them which did wonders for her confidence.
That is, until Alex suddenly disappeared for the most part.

Being who she was, Naomi naturally assumed it had been something she had done - everyone else had walked away after all - and decided to accept the situation for what it was.
Although Alex still lived across the hall and she did catch glimpses of him coming and going, usually with great masses of food with him, Naomi didn't have the courage to ask him what had happened...until one day she needed to know where her friend had gone.

You know the rest from here.

Now, thoroughly embarrassed and internally vowing to never be confident again, Naomi was vegged out on her sofa drowning her sorrows in ice cream in silence.
At least ice cream didn't care that she was shy, its biggest offense was running out far too soon which...

"Urgh" Naomi groaned as her spoon hit the cardboard bottom of the cartoon sat on her tanned thighs, trailing elegantly out of her booty shorts.
Awkwardly standing and clumsily dumping the empty cartoon into the bin, Naomi went in search of more non-judging snacks.
Returning with a family share bag of chips with a look of contemplating pizza, Naomi dropped back into her butt indented seat before tearing open the bag of salty potatoes.
Still sat in silence with storm clouds brewing in her mind, Naomi nearly screamed the place down as her flat door opened to reveal Lucielle.

*****

"Hey, sorry if I made you jump" said Lucielle, letting the door close behind her as she spoke to Naomi
Naomi stared back like a deer in the headlights, hand half into the bag of chips next to her.
"Alex lent me your spare key?" offered Lucielle, noticing the fear in the poor girls eyes which, in hindsight, wasn't all that surprising.
Relaxing slightly, Naomi's body visibly unclenched which Lucielle took as a hint to approach a little.

"Look, I've spoken to Alex and..."

"I wasn't trying to steal him ok?" blurted Naomi, unexpected to herself as much as anyone.

Lucielle smiled a half smile at the outburst before continuing.
"I know, he's explained it all and...sorry, can I sit down?"

Naomi hesitated for a moment before nodding her acceptance.

"Alex didn't mean to freeze you out, which I believe he's already told you, he just got a little caught up with things" continued Lucielle as she heavily took a seat opposite Naomi in love seat that seemed ill equipped to handle Lucielle, with metal joints groaning under her weight.
"He actually kinda hopes you're gonna keep hanging out with him"

Naomi's mind was going ten to the dozen at this point, processing everything.
For one, Alex's girlfriend was absolutely huge which may go some ways to explaining why he never tried hitting on her.
Secondly, thank god Alex still wanted to be friends
Thirdly...

"I was hoping you'd maybe give me a shot too" smiled Lucielle reassuringly, glossing over Naomi's processing face.

She wants to be friends after thinking I was stealing her boyfriend?

"Sorry, is that triple chocolate fudge brownie?"

Now Naomi was totally freaked, how did she know that?!

"I just saw the spoon on your coffee table, looks a lot like triple chocolate fudge brownie ice cream if I am not mistaken" mused Lucielle with a hungry smile curling her lips

Naomi nodded, still unsure of how to proceed with the large blonde girl across from her.

"You've got good taste girl" purred Lucielle, trying as hard as she could to not lick her lips.

"Thanks?" replied an evermore confused Naomi.

"Chips too?" asked Lucielle, less Sherlock Holmes and more Captain Obvious as she noticed the bag nestled against Naomi's hip.

"I eat when I'm nervous, ok?" defended Naomi, odd bursts of courage seeping into the conversation despite her previous pact with herself.

"Preaching to the converted sister, you might have noticed I'm pretty fond of the food stuff myself" probed Lucielle, sensing an opening now she had Naomi talking.

The red head smirked ever so slightly as the obvious was once again stated.

"This might be a little crazy, and totally out of your comfort zone, but how about we get some pizzas in and just girl it out?" asked Lucielle, going for broke at this point.

Very hesitant now, Naomi considered her options.
She had just been angling for pizza before Lucielle had arrived, and the thought did sound really good.
But then, that would involve socialising which was not Naomi's idea of a good time with pizza...
115321221121122222.title: Girl Next Door

choices: With food all around her, Lucielle piles on the pounds
Finding an unexpected friendship, Naomi starts to pudge out
Alex finds his hands full as Naomi comes back into his life
1153212211211222221.content:
“Yes! This is gonna be so good!” cheered Lucielle with a surprising amount of enthusiasm, much to the shock of her foodie friend for the evening.

“I guess so” muttered Naomi as she curled herself up a touch more at the outburst of the exceptionally large blonde woman sat across from her.

“Ok well if I order then I’ll get changed into something a little more comfortable and we can take it from there, sound like a plan?” asked Lucielle with a warm smile across her cheeks, a hand sprawled across her belly as she hit back rumbles of hunger.

“Yeah ok...” replied Naomi, still nervous as all hell and somewhat thrown at having somebody in her apartment.

“Is there anything in particular you want?” asked Lucielle, attempting the bridge the gap as best she knew how to.

“No, I...I like everything really” said Naomi, feeling her own hunger bubbling up at the thought of imminent food, particularly the pizza she had been craving so much since escaping Alex’s apartment.

“Girl after my own heart” teased Lucielle as she hammered away on her phone, ordering like a woman possessed as her tongue idly wetted her lips at the thought of food.

“Do I...erm...” started Naomi, politeness dictating she had to offer something at this point but was quickly silenced.

“No no, this is my treat, by means of an apology if nothing else” smiled Lucielle, still ferociously typing into her phone.
“Besides, I suggested it so only fair that I pay”

Naomi couldn’t argue with that, free food was one of the few perks she could enjoy on her torrent of failed dates since moving to America.

“And...done” announced Lucielle “now, get yourself comfy because we are in for the long haul”
Then, with surprising grace and an audible complaint from the seat, Lucielle got to her feet and made for the door to cross the hall again.

*****

“Thanks a bunch, my love to the boys!” called Lucielle after the delivery boy as she closed the apartment door behind her.

Crossing back into the living room, Lucielle took a deep breath as she inhaled the thick stench of grease and cheese wafting through the air.
“I hope you’re hungry Naomi, Alex usually orders and portion sizes are lost on me at the best of times”
The blonde chuckled softly as she returned to the seat that she had claimed for the night, her great rear spreading out and against the arms in plush bubbles of fat.

“You order from these guys often?” asked Naomi having noticed the driver hadn’t been shocked at the quantity of food he was passing into the apartment.

“Oh yeah, totally” replied Lucielle as she clumsily bunched her hair into matching messy buns on either side of her head, giving her the silhouetted appearance of Minnie Mouse assuming the cartoon character had been a 600lb blonde woman.

“Makes sense” mumbled Naomi, scratching her bare left arm whilst tugging her vest top down to cover her chubby stomach a little more than it was.

“Anyway, get tucked in otherwise there won’t be any left for ya” smirked Lucielle as she greedily swept up a huge pizza and a family share bucket of chicken.

Naomi couldn’t help but crack a smile.
As impressively huge as Lucielle was, looking every pound of it in a skin tight T-shirt riding high up her belly and shorts that looked barely able to contain her immense lower half, it seemed implausible that the blonde could finish off the mountain of food between the two girls.
The thought didn’t stop Naomi from taking her first share though as she grabbed her own pizza, tearing off two slices and sandwiching them together before taking a big grease dripping bite.

“Woah, you go girl!” cheered Lucielle as she caught a glimpse of Naomi’s technique.

The sound halted Naomi mid bite with crimson hair cascading around her full cheeks, a wave of anxiety washing over her as it suddenly dawned on her how ‘on show’ she was.

“Oh sorry honey” rushed Lucielle, realising her mistake “I didn’t mean to stare, I just love a girl who can eat”

“Oh...ok” murmured Naomi as she slowly nibbled at her edge of pizza, feeling terribly shy realising Lucielle was paying attention to her.

“Honestly, I didn’t mean anything by it” reassured Lucielle as she resumed to her own glutting with gusto.

Marginally content that Lucielle had stopped watching her, Naomi went back to taking decent sized bites.
‘This is so weird’ thought Naomi as she went through her pizza at a surprising anxiety fuelled rate.

*****

“Phew that was a meal” sighed Lucielle, leant back in her seat with her hands rested on her taut belly, cheeks puffing outward with gentle breaths of fullness.

“Uh huh” grunted Naomi through a mouthful of meat, a half eaten tray of sliders perched next to her on the sofa as she hungrily chewed away at the thick burger.

“Still going huh?” purred Lucielle “I’m impressed”

“Thanks?” responded Naomi with some hesitance, still bemused at how into eating Lucielle was despite sitting opposite her for an entire meal.

Aside from Naomi’s appetite, Lucielle couldn’t help but be fascinated by the size of the tanned beauty’s food baby was as if hung against her thighs.

“Can I ask you a question?” asked Lucielle, picking away at a tray of fries.

Naomi shrugged, lips still locked around one of her diminishing burgers before nodding slightly.
Lucielle smiled.

“An appetite like yours and some obviously incredible genetics, how are not the size of...well, me” asked Lucielle quite bluntly.

Naomi swallowed hard whilst sweeping up the last burger with her svelte fingers before replying.
“Well I have gained a bit since coming here” admitted Naomi, taking a large bite of cheesy bread covered meat.

“Really? How much?” asked Lucielle, curiosity getting the better of her and realising that Naomi was far more talkative with food in her.

“I dunno, probably near on 30lbs” shrugged Naomi, adjusting the visible side strap of a red bra, causing her sizeable chest to jostle uncontrollably for a moment, waves rushing through her exposed cleavage.

“Wow, that’s pretty impressive” mused Lucielle as she tried to imagine the girl before her with 30lbs less on her figure.

“High compliment from someone such as yourself” retorted Naomi with an almost wry look, the distraction of food allowing some confidence to seep out.

“Meow” teased Lucielle as she gulped down most of a bottle of coke that she had been nursing for 20 minutes.

“How much did you weight?” asked Naomi rather reserved again as she resumed her efforts on her burger

“When?” chuckled Lucielle as she patted her belly, ripples of fat rolling into her hips.
“Well once upon a time I was about 290 but now I’m pushing 600lbs”

“Wow...” thought Naomi, a soft whistle escaping her lips.

“It’s pretty great to be honest, get to eat whatever I want whenever I want” purred Lucielle, getting lost in her own thought as she daydreamed about her gain.

“I can see the appeal” mused Naomi, slipping down the last of her food.

“Wouldn’t hurt to cut loose once in a while you know” suggested Lucielle with an awkward shift of her hips.

Naomi considered that one.
She had, admittedly, had enough fun that night to not hate it but reservations were her strong suit at the best of times.

“I mean, you don’t need to make any serious life changing decisions now, just enjoy the moment” smiled Lucielle, groping at her belly a little.

“Well tonight has been pretty nice” admitted Naomi, lying length ways on the sofa, feet dangling over the arm closest to Lucielle with her head on the opposite one.

“I’m glad to hear it hun” replied Lucielle “and it’s nice to have such great company”

Naomi creased inside, she’d barely spoken and yet Lucielle thought she had been good company?
Maybe the titanic blonde going out with her only friend wasn’t so bad after all.

That being said, women such as Jessica (as in women with big appetites, impulse control issues, and lots and lots of free time) often found ways to occupy themselves in ways that weren’t exactly healthy to a girlish figure…

And even though she had promised Victoria that she’d wait to eat the pasta she’d made (after Jess had begged and begged her to) Jess had already eaten that too…

It was no mystery as to how Jessica had expanded so quickly—easily putting on thirty pounds since the month had started. With how much she ate in a given day, combined with how sedentary her lifestyle was becoming, Jess’ already fat form was blowing up faster than a parade float on thanksgiving!

Idly typing on her keyboard with one free hand, so as to make her screensaver disappear, Jess hardly noticed the amount of strain it took to lean her heavyset shape. After finishing her latest snack, Jessica resumed her day-to-day routine of lethargy. Her eyes lazily traipsed the computer screen while one hand idly scratched her belly—occasionally giving it a little rub. She would continue doing this all day, if she had a mind to.

Looking at the photos on the desk and wall Chelsea could see her Hispanic-based boss was a slim and trim lady in her university days. But 2 pregnancies had done her toll and Chelsea could see the small potbelly that Miranda´s suit sported while the raven-haired Latina took her own seat.

"Chelsea" her boss started "I know you have great references but your attitude is a no go! There are so many complains that you leave your seat for smoke breaks so often... There are already rumors you spent more time smoking than working, you see?"

"Well... it´s not my fault this state has a strict anti-smoking rule! And I need my cigs to stay calm and concentrated."

"I see, I see, Chelsea... It´s not that I don´t understand you but you have to stop it. By the way... you remember the questionaire you filled out when you apllied over here?"

"I think I do? What´s the matter?"

"Chelsea... you stated to be a non-smoker... Have look!"

The blonde took the copy of the questionaire Miranda passed over. Yes, there it was... She picked "NO" being asked about her smoking habits. Chelsea shrugged... How could she even think to get away with such a lie just to look much better and more responsible to improve her chances to get the job? But how could anyone expect such a slim person like her to be a non-smoker for real? All the girls she had under her belt as captain of the cheersquad smoked like chimneys to stay slim and trim... So was it her fault that soemone belived a lie that was obvious?

"Kay..." Chelsea said rather quiet and insecure.

"Chelsea, you obviously lied about that matter just to get the job. You know what... we have a strcit anti-smoking policy over here and we do not sign up smokers at all."

Okay... I´m going to be fired any second went tthrough Chelsea´s mind.

"But... I undestand you Chelsea. You wanted that job so much after graduation... and I must say aside from the time you are absent for taking puffs you seem to be a talent! So I might offer you the following: You promise that you will quit smoking immediately and I´ll cover you, okay? But I want you to sign a contract in which you agree to the term you will get fired if you ever spent working time for smoking issues. How does that sound?"

Chelsea hadn´t to think twice...

"I´m into it!"

"That´s what I wanted to hear! I´ve already written down everything before, so here we go."

The paper was handed over and Chelsea signed it with relief.

"One more thing now, Chelsea... Your cig pack, please!"

The blonde´s hand slid into the right side pocket of her black jeans. Seconds later the pack of cigs was handed over to Miranda who took a pair of scissors destroying each of the cancer sticks in front of Chelsea´s eyes.

"That´s all for now, Chelsea! Good luck!"

"Thank you for my second chance, Miranda!"

"Hey... we all did stupid things at a young age, didn´t we?" Miranda laughed before Chelsea stepped out of the office closing the door behind her.

Being back at her place Chelsea went thought the files, doing the calls needed and answered the mails coming in.

A few hours later, just before her break, Chelsea felt uncomfortable though... The cravings for nicotine finally hit her like a steamhammer... Oh man, she wanted to have a cig so badly. But she knew she couldn´t.

PING!

A new mail appeared on Chelsea´s screen!

"Chelsea,

I´m doing my break now. What about you joining me?"

it stated.

Chelsea looked at the sender information.

The mail came from...

Miranda

Option 2:
Felicia (co-worker, brunette, 5´4 (163 cm), 120 pounds (55 kg), same age like Chelsea)

Allegedly.

A hiccup escaped her mouth, her eyes showing surprise as she realized she'd torn through her meal.

1153322222211.content:
In an office, any ordinary office though especially this one in particular, someone taking the time out of their night to make a meal to bring in for a select few or (preferably) all of their coworkers to enjoy was a real treat. Not many people had the kind of patience and warm heart required to willingly set aside their free time to make a meal just to watch it be choked down by the usually unappreciative.

Carrie was a welcomed exception to that rule.

Reportedly, Carrie had no formal culinary education. That being said, no one in the entire office would believe that for a moment. She was talented, a natural in front of the oven, and seemed to never spare an opportunity to remind her friends and coworkers in and of as much. Every other day, and according to those more fortunate than most, on the weekends when she afforded herself some overtime Carrie would bring in the biggest, richest meals to satisfy the knotted stomachs of her dear overworked coworkers.

And if someone was so lucky to get on her good side, rather her better side as no one could conceive a seriously negative thought to attach to Carrie’s personage, she would sometimes invite her coworkers over for dinner.

To put it bluntly, it was no surprise how Carrie had amassed every two-hundred or so extra pounds that clung to her girlish figure. The meals she made for her guests were fantastically fattening, so rich and creamy that no one in their right minds could pass up an offer. And delicious to say the least, or so Carrie had been told a million times throughout her life.

In an office bursting at the seams with rampant gluttony and monstrous appetites, it was no surprise that Carrie soon became very popular very quickly amongst her fellow coworkers. However she always preferred the sweet, lovable Alice over them all. She was softspoken, polite, and always brought her best manners over with her when Carrie invited her over. As the two grew closer and closer, Alice found herself seated at Carrie’s dinnertable more and more often. These trips to Carrie’s caused her so much immediate satisfaction, yet did little to quell the whalish woman’s weighty woes, fueling her dietary drive even further in a strange variation on the typical morning after experience…

Melissa watched from across the lunchroom table as Alice, oddly enough, nibbled at a salad. Though she showed little to no actual interest in the leafy meal, every time Alice would look up to see Melissa looking at her, she would dive back in with a practiced enthusiasm. Every now and then she let out a little “Mm, this sure is good!” as if just to make sure that everyone knew what she was eating. After one such instance, Melissa’s curiosity had gotten the better of her.

“Alright Al, what’s the idea?” she asked tersely, crossing her arms over her billowing belly as it hung off the edge of her chair between her legs, “You had a salad on Friday too. What’s going on. Have you been talking to your sister again?”

Alice shrunk visibly, her cherubic cheeks glowing bright red as if soaked in embarrassment extract. Her heavy shoulders bunched up and her neck disappeared beneath her excess skin. Her bright blue eyes darted opposite to her friend as she lifted one chubby arm and another forkful of her salad into her mouth.

“I-I don’t know what you’re talking about!” Alice said unconvincingly

“Come on Al, I’ve known you for five years now, and I’ve never seen you pick up a salad in any one of them.” Melissa quickly amended, “Except for a) after you talk to your crazy bitch sister, and b) whenever you think you’ve gained weight.”

Alice shrunk further into her roundness, dropping her little plastic fork back onto the now abandoned plate.

“I’m just… trying to eat a little healthier is all.” Alice squeaked, such a soft voice coming from such a rotund form, “I think I’ve—“ here Melissa groaned, “—put on a little too much weight recently…”

“Oh stop it, you look fine!” Melissa said as she bit into a donut, “Anyway, who cares. You’re still skinnier than I am.”

“I’m not trying to be skinnier than—“ Alice huffed, exhaled in exasperation at her friend’s lackadaisical attitude towards what (to her) was a very serious plight that she had dealt with all her life, “I’m just… trying to eat healthy, okay? It’d be a nice change of pace, is all…”

At this Melissa’s ears perked up, the 350 pound beauty suddenly more attentive and alert than she had been all day at her desk. She leaned in over the table, forcing her great breasts to pool into melon-sized mounds of soft jiggling flesh on the table.

“And why do you say that?” she asked greedily, “There some new restaurant opened up in town that I don’t know about?”

Alice snorted, “Yeah, it’s called Carrie’s kitchen.”

“Never heard of it.” There was a beat as Melissa realized that Carrie’s kitchen was not the name of some new, probably rustic-themed, restaurant but Alice was in fact referring to the kitchen of Carrie, one of the newer ladies that had been hired on recently, “Oh!”

“Yeah.” Alice said almost sharply, “She invites me over all the time now and she makes all this food… and I always feel bad if I don’t eat it all, y’know?”

Melissa, who’d probably never felt bad over anything she’d ever done in her entire life, looked more hungry than sympathetic. “Is it any good?”

“Oh it’s the best food I’ve ever had in my whole life!” Alice gushed despite herself, “You remember the Christmas party last month?”

“Yeah, when Christina ate so much she barfed in the bathroom.”

“Right, she made all of that. Except the pizzas. B-But you know what I mean!” she said in a hushed voice, “And if I don’t stop going over there, soon enough you’re going to have to widen the doorways just to get me in the front door!”

Melissa winced at the thought

“So what are you going to do, Al?” Melissa asked

“I dunno… I mean, I can’t just keep going over there and stuffing myself til I pop.” She caught herself quickly, “But at the same time, I don’t want to hurt Carrie’s feelings…”
1153322222211.title: Unhealthy Influences

choices: Carrie shows them to the table, where Melissa gets JUST what she asked for...
Alice heads to the bathroom, where she finds something interesting...
11533222222111.content:
So it was decided, without much reluctance on any party involved, that Melissa would join Alice and Carrie that Friday night.

Though in truth, neither Melissa’s attendance nor invitation went without ulterior motives. Alice had invited Melissa because, hopefully, that meant that Carrie would focus more on her rather than Alice; leaving simply sated rather than grossly overfed without having to be the bad guy and refuse Carrie. Melissa, on the other hand, had agreed simply under the premise that Carrie’s food was divine. She had brought food into the office all the time, and loved it. But an entire dinner table full of the stuff? The thought alone made Melissa’s stomach growl and her mouth salivate…

So on Friday night, after much mental physical and cosmetic preparation, the two overfed office gals carpooled a la Melissa’s painfully cramped sedan, arriving at Carrie’s place a good five minutes before they were expected. Dressed as casually as possible for two cuties so corpulent and round, they heaved themselves out of the car (much to the vehicle’s relief) and tottered up the walkway.

While both had opted for casual clothing, Alice had taken the invitation a little more seriously. She dressed in a light blouse made of stretchy material and shaded in light purple. The tight, stretchy fabric hugged every inch of her swollen chest and bobbing belly as both bounced about leisurely with her every belabored step. Wrapped around her lovehandles and the lowermost section of her multiply-tiered tummy were some elastic pants that Alice had lucked into while wandering around in the maternity section. They looked normal enough, though with her awkward belly-front gait one could have easily mistaken her for a heavily pregnant, heavily fed mother-to-be.

Melissa had taken the meaning more literally, opting for some of her most casual clothing available. She wore jeans, quite possibly some of the largest ever made, wrapped around and over her legs and stomach. The extremity with which the denim withheld the onslaught of massive, jiggling blubber made her walk awkward and stiff-legged—not unlike a flabby bride of Frankenstein. Above her sausage casing, Melissa draped her gut in a simple, large, and low-cut sweater that managed to make her look even larger. Black may have been slimming, but “slimming” wasn’t a word equipped to tackle the 350+ pounds of Melissa’s greedy gut.

“Nice place.” Melissa huffed as she wrestled with her legs’ lack of circulation, “Long walkway though.”

“It gets easier.” Alice lied, already quite out of breath, “Just… let’s get to the doorbell.”

A few more awkward, heavy steps later and the two were at the front door. Alice extended one flabby finger and pressed deeply into the softly-lit button, a polite chime ringing inside the abode.

“Coming!” a voice cried from the other side of the door as heavy footsteps neared the porch, “Hold on a second ladies!”

The door swung wide open to reveal Carrie, dressed in a long-sleeved frock and some sausage casing of her own. She was quite top-heavy, and somewhat shorter than Alice. So while she appeared somewhat rounder than either girl, Carrie certainly looked more youthful. With her long brown hair and her deep green eyes, Carrie was quite the looker.

“I’m glad you made it!” she said emphatically, “Come on in, dinner will be ready in a minute.”

“So we can just go…” Melissa paused as she wriggled her way through the door, “Straight to the table then?”

“Of course you can.” Carrie said with a smile, “I hope you’re both hungry!”
11533222222111.title: Dinner Party for Three

choices: All of Carrie's "sisters" blow up like balloons! They're even bigger than Alice!
Carrie used to be way Way WAY fat(ter)! No wonder she's so good at cooking!
115332222221112.content:
“A-Actually, I have to use the little girls’ room.” Alice said politely with a little abashed smile, “You girls go on ahead.”

Melissa shrugged, not bothered a bit by Alice’s immediate absence from the table as Carrie showed her to the dining room. As both women waddled out of sight, Alice made a dash (rather a swift and rather awkward hobble) down the hall and to the left. The bathroom was just as neat and meticulously clean as she had remembered, and she had been here so many times that she hardly had any trouble making use of it…

After her business was finished, Alice heaved herself from the toilet and over to the sink to wash her hands. While doing so, a picture caught her eye.

“That’s weird…” Alice said aloud as she took the frame off of the counter and into her still wet hands, “I’ve never seen this before.”

It was four little girls, each in varying shapes and sizes. The oldest couldn’t have been but about seven while the oldest was somewhere around thirteen. The oldest one was definitely a little chubby, and shorter than the string-bean next to her. In fact, the only reason Alice suspected her as the oldest was how developed she was at even such a young age. Could it be… no…

“These are Carrie’s baby pictures!” Alice cooed aloud, “Well at least one of them anyway. I never knew she had a sister. Or three.”

Alice stared at it for a moment more before putting the frame back where she found it, drying off her hands, and leaving. As she waddled down the hallway, taking up much more space than was necessary by anyone who wasn’t an overfed porker, Alice couldn’t help but glance at the few photos that dotted the walls here and there.

It wasn’t until Alice entered the living room where the pattern struck her, causing her to totter back into the hall and check for herself.

Yes, there was definitely a pattern—
115332222221112.title: Unusually Uninteresting Sight

The pictures told a story of 3 sisters that went from chubby kids, to plump teens, to fat young women, to absolute blimps. The most recent pictures of Carrie’s sisters showed women of at least 350 pounds. Alice was shocked. They were even larger then she was! She wasn’t sure what to do with her weird discovery. Alice waddled back to the dining room. As soon as she entered the dining room she forgot about the sisters. She became mesmerized by the smell of the food on the table. The scent was intoxicating.
