1153322222211121.title: Family fattening

choices: Alice contemplates returning to Carrie's
Alice keeps thin by having Melissa eat all her food.
11533222222111212.content:
Yes, Alice immediately dug into her plate. It was hard not to. She had been eating herself round for the past few years of her life already, so it had become something of a habit to eat food when she saw it. And with how good Carrie’s food was, Alice didn’t see how she could possibly resist it. Plus it would have been rude not to indulge in dinner tonight. She’d made such a fuss about bringing Melissa over and Carrie had cooked so much…

Even still, Alice found herself resting her fork down lightly on the napkin by her plate. Beside her, Melissa ate rapidly and with great fervor. Every now and then their doughy arms would collide with her friends’ wild movements and swinging motions. It was no mystery who was getting the most out of the meal, and Carrie seemed to pick up on it.

“Alice?” the sweet woman had asked in an almost matronly manner, “Is everything alright?”

“Hm?” she sounded, looking past Melissa at Carrie who seemed genuinely worried, “Oh yeah, I’m fine.”

With that she picked up her fork again, which satisfied her hostess, though she could only nibble at her plate. Whenever Carrie made eye contact with Alice (or looked like she was about to), the swollen sweetie would pick up her fork and take a big hearty bite before swallowing. Had anyone paid much attention that night, they would have noticed that the portioning was quite off for three people—with Alice having eaten only one plate, Carrie having seconds, and Melissa leaving not a scrap for anyone to take home (as Carrie was wont to suggest)

All three women sat at the dinner table, Carrie at the head while Alice and Melissa sat together facing the sliding glass door. Carrie made coffee for everyone, but only she and Alice would have a cup. Melissa was too full—fuller than she’d ever been in her entire life. Her belly, already big and round, had swollen to a taut swell that cut angrily into the obstructing table. She had slid back noisily earlier in the meal to allow herself some comfort room, and was now contentedly playing with her fully-exposed tummy; kneading the soft fat that hung so lazily from her waistline.

“Mmmm…” Melissa moaned thickly to herself as she digested, a big smile spread between her chubby cheeks, “Alice was right, Care. You make some mean dinner.”

Carrie smiled from behind her coffee cup, swallowing her drink before responding.

“Well thank you Melissa, I’m glad you enjoyed it.” She said before turning, “Alice, did you enjoy it?”

The blobby blonde looked up from her half-drunk mug as if from a daze, smiling unconvincingly in Carrie’s way with a little nod that flexed her second chin. Alice hadn’t actually eaten much at all, having barely nibbled at her plate before scraping it off onto Melissa’s. She’d been doing it all night, Carrie dishing out more and more only for Alice to slide it onto Melissa’s plate when no one was looking. Inwardly, she apologized to her friend as she sat there, stupidly rubbing her stomach and burping quietly to relieve the great pressure that Alice had helped build up.

But there was just something about tonight that was different. Alice had already been wary about losing weight, but seeing those pictures on the wall… Of Carrie’s sisters, how much they had changed—how much they had grown over the years—wasn’t exactly reassuring. One night a week might not seem like much now, but what if Carrie started asking them over more and more? How could Alice refuse such a sweet woman who had just moved to town without hurting her feelings?

“Alice, sweetie, are you alright?” Carrie asked her friend from across the table, reaching across the unphased Melissa to put a hand on her flabby forearm, “You’ve been awfully quiet tonight.”

“Y-Yeah, I’m fine.” Alice repeated with some trepidation, “I was actually just thinking that… I, um, don’t really know all that much about you.” But she quickly tacked on, “Neither of us do, for that matter. You um, invited us over and we barely what you do on any night other than Friday!”

Carrie laughed generously, sending her shoulders and chest bouncing.

“Alright then, I suppose now’s a good a time as any for us to get to know one another.” She agreed with an unsuspecting smile, “I’m from Arizona, I’ve got three sisters, and I’m really not used to living in New England.”

“Tell us about them!” Alice pounced over-enthusiastically before shying back down, “Y-Your sisters. Tell us about them.”

“Alright…” Carrie said with a slightly surprised expression, “Um… Well there’s Gloria, she’s an accountant in Phoenix. And then there’s Anna who also lives in Phoenix. And my youngest sister Courtney lives in Tempe while she’s studying at ASU.”

Alice nodded, completely uninterested.

“Do you have a, uh, photo of them or something?” Alice asked rather awkwardly

“Um… I guess. They’re all over the house, but I think I can pull something up on my phone?”

Carrie was obviously a little put off by Alice’s sudden interest in her sisters. She had been having Alice over quite regularly for the past few weeks or so. The two had been bonding for some time over their mutual level-headedness, and for such unexpected behavior to pop up out of nowhere understandably raised an eyebrow or two. But never the less, Carrie expertly whipped out her phone and skimmed through for pictures pertaining to Alice’s sudden interest.

“Here’s Gloria.” She said, outstretching one of her arms to show Alice a woman relative to her own size. Perhaps a bit bigger. She was dressed in clothing not unlike her own, and Alice recognized the meek features and sensible style. Surely she and Gloria might have a lot in common if they’d ever met. But goodness if her belly wasn’t big…

“And Anna.”

The next of the sisters was certainly much bigger than the last. Easily outweighing her by a good… fifty pounds? If Alice could see them together she would be able to say for sure. She was much rounder, but also shorter than Gloria had been. With a big belly that hung well down to her knees. She had large doughy shoulders –woof, that tank top was not a good idea—and a certain unmistakable lack of discrepancy between her chins and neck.

“Oh, and here’s Courtney. It’s a little older, but here’s her last month at her birthday.”

Alice’s jaw dropped at the sight of Carrie’s “littlest” sister. She sat with two skinny girls on either side of her on the couch, taking up a great deal of space with her overall expanse and enormity. She wore a cone hat with ‘21’ in big red letters, while her roomies wore similar ones. They were all clutching tequila in their hands, and Courtney had rested the cake on her gigantic stomach. It was an ocean of lightly tanned blubber. It spread her legs apart and hung out of her hoodie, pouring (from what Alice could tell) right off the couch by a good inch or so.

“They… they look…” Alice felt faint—is this what Carrie’s cooking did to people?!—“Nice.”

“Yeah, I love ‘em.” Carrie said fondly as she looked at the pictures herself, “Honestly, I wasn’t too happy about moving all the way up here. But I suppose they’re gonna have to learn to live without their big sis. I mean, I can’t pack their lunches for them every day like I used to when we were kids anymore.”

Carrie laughed, and Alice laughed too, but hers was tinny. Nervous.

“Oh wow!” Carrie suddenly said, “Look at the time, it’s really late!”

Alice panicked and checked her phone. Sure enough, it read 11:43!

“Listen, I’m putting in some hours tomorrow and I’ve gotta be ready by six in the morning.” Carrie apologized, “But it was nice having you two over, thank you so much for coming. We should really do this again sometime!”

“Y-Yes…” Alice said with a smile as she nudged Melissa (who was still kneading her stomach) out of her chair, “We really should (not. Ever. Again. Or I’m gonna wind up like your sisters!)”

“Oh good, actually I was thinking of having you two over again on Tuesday?” Carrie ventured, “I know, you must be getting so sick of me, but I was thinking maybe we could… do this a little more? It’s good for me to hang out with friends. We’re friends, right Alice?”

“R-Right.” She answered nervously, “Friends.” (big fat friends)

Carrie smiled jovially, “That’s so great. Listen, I’ll talk to you Monday about Tuesday. Thank you again for coming over!”

As everyone said their goodbyes, Alice walked Melissa to her car before plopping down behind the wheel. She gulped, her eyes wide in anticipation and anxiety.

Something had to be done about this Carrie situation. If the other sisters were any indication of how much Carrie liked to cook, and how much Carrie liked to cook, Alice would have to redouble her efforts in making sure that she was under control. The thought that anyone so young as Courtney could be so large would normally make Alice think twice, but considering that she’d lived with Carrie all her life, Alice could completely understand. If that were her and Carrie had been pumping her full of food for years Alice would be…

she shuddered, dismissing the thought.

Something had to be done before Alice needed a forklift to get in and out of her apartment...
11533222222111212.title: Alice resists eating all of Carrie's amazin...

choices: At Carrie's Alice pigs out again
At Carrie's Alice slides her food on Melissa's plate again
115332222221112121.content:
On Monday, Alice was dreading coming to work. She was so conflicted about how to handle her situation with Carrie. On one hand she had really bonded with Carrie but on the other hand she really didn’t want to end up a total blimp like Carrie’s sisters.

At the office Alice and Melissa sat in their two desk cubicle.
“Carrie’s dinner on Friday was aaaaammaaazzzing, right?” Melissa said to her slightly less overfed friend.

“Ugh yeah I guess.” Alice said with a lack of enthusiasm.

“We’re going again tomorrow right?” Alice tried to interject but Melissa talked over her. “Oh my god I can’t wait, that food is to die for.” Melissa said.

Just thinking about it made Melissa clutch her massive gut. She didn’t have the same concerns as Alice did about these feasts at Carrie’s. Melissa was a gorging machine. She put no value in the consequences of her tremendous eating habits, for all she cared about was stuffing herself with delicious fattening food. Needless to say she was excited for her next trip to Carrie’s.

“Did you see those pictures of her sisters? Wasn’t it weird that…” Alice stopped as Carrie walked over to their cubicle.

“Hey gals, I brought muffins!” Carrie said holding a large plastic container. She always brought great food from home for her coworkers who were never ones to turn down food.

“Oooo, gimme.” Melissa practically ripped the muffins out of Carries hands before she could even hand them over. Melissa tore the top of the plastic container and took one of the dozen or so chocolate chip cinnamon doughnuts.

“So are you gonna come over aga,” Melissa interrupted Carrie’s sentence.

“Alice you HAVE to try these they’re amaaaazing.” Melissa said, handing her a large muffin.

“Ugh… yeah sure.” Alice took the muffin, figuring it would be rude to not try one of Carries muffins in front of her. She took a bite, which was quickly followed by another and then suddenly it was gone. Alice couldn’t believe how good it was. See, Carrie noticed Alice’s lack of enthusiasm towards her food on Friday. Carrie, wanting to impress her newfound friend decided to kick up the quality of her food. She really wanted Alice to like her, and one way Carrie made sure of this was to make sure she liked her food. She had dug deep into her cookbooks and pulled out her very best recipe’s. She made sure Alice wouldn’t second guess coming over to Carrie’s house routinely.

So as Alice swallowed the last of her muffin Carrie asked:
“So are you guys gonna come over for dinner tomorrow?” Alice thought about it.

She was dead set on saying no about 5 minutes earlier, but damn if that muffin wasn’t the greatest thing she’d eaten. Alice’s will power wasn’t particularly spectacular as exampled by her big obese body that had only steadily increased for years now. Alice really liked Carrie and her food… how could she say no? She’ll just go this one time she told herself.

“Yeah I look forward to it. And wow are these good muffins. Are you coming to Mel?” Alice said. Melissa had almost finished all the muffins. She looked up at Alice with about 2 and a half muffins crammed in her mouth.

“Wah?... ah yah, *gulp* definitely.” Melissa said as crumbs showered onto her flabby cleavage.

“Cool, see you later.” Carrie said as she waddled away.
115332222221112121.title: Alice cant say no

choices: Melissa makes this a regular occurrence
Alice gets back at Melissa for this
1153322222211121211.content: When they arrive at Carrie's Melissa immediately goes to the dinner table. She starts to dig in. But a few minutes later she slows down. Alice asks what's wrong and she says that she has to go to the bathroom. When she gets back she tells Alice she already ate before this and she wasn't feeling too good so she needs Alice to cover for her and eat her food this time. Alice painfully agrees and while Melissa takes Carrie into the other room Alice starts chowing down.
1153322222211121211.title: At Carrie's Alice pigs out again

choices: Time passes:Carrie and Alice have gotten close—Melissa has gotten overtly rotund
Alice uses Melissa to dispose of other extra meals too...
1153322222211121212.content:
Alice smiled warmly across the table as Carrie regaled both of her hefty houseguests with stories. She’d gone from what had happened earlier this week, to how she felt about Christina, somehow circling back around to a story from her childhood, and was now working on a panging yarn that was as dreadfully long as it was irrelevant. Though Alice was anything if not polite. She wouldn’t say a word to draw attention to herself.

This was always the hardest part…

“So I was on the phone with Corporate and Jess says that I—“ as Carrie gabbed, Alice quietly scraped a majority of her chicken onto Melissa’s otherwise full plate, the brunette behemoth stirring slightly as she noticed a forgotten piece to her meal ”—So I have to call up Bradford again just to make sure he wants 60 orders instead of 50!”

Alice’s smile expanded in an attempt to make believe she had been following Carrie the whole time, instead of slowly sliding the majority of her meal onto Melissa’s plate.

For now, neither of them had been any the wiser. Carrie was far too caught up in socializing with her new friends to notice that one of them was pawning off her third helping on the other. And Melissa, said other friend, was far too greedy to think too hard about it. She’d seen Alice passing her portions once or twice and remained silent (honestly thankful for the gift) but usually Alice was more deft—despite what her great size might have let on.

As Alice smiled generously, guilt and appetite waging war on her conscience for giving away such a loving and tasty meal, Carrie’s story broke in laughter. Then she noticed Alice’s empty plate.

“Oh my, Alice!” Carrie said shocked, “That’s your third plate! Are you still hungry? I could get you some more of anything you like.”

“O-Oh no, that’s—“

“A little of everything? Come on, we’re almost done.”

The meal had begun, several hours ago, with a fully stocked pan of chicken breasts. They’d been stuffed with goat cheese (which was a lot more appetizing than it sounds!) wrapped in bacon, slathered in American Swiss, peppered and spiced accordingly. There had been twenty breasts some hours ago. For sides, Carrie had prepared home-made (and very very very buttery) mashed potatoes and filled two serving bowls with tonight’s portions. Then she’d made some texas toast (again, very buttery) and garlic bread.

Carrie herself had eaten until seconds. Alice had “eaten” thirds, but between what she’d slipped to Melissa she had actually only eaten a single serving herself. Each serving had two breasts. So that’s four for Carrie, One for Alice…

“No… moar…”

And almost fifteen for Melissa.

In her incredible disregard for her surroundings, safety, or girlish figure, Melissa had eaten twelve bird breasts, as well as all the trimmings that came alongside it. Claiming almost an entire loaf of texas toast and innumerable garlic breadsticks.

Her gut was taut and round with her decadence, shiny with sweat as she struggled to digest her accidental overindulgence. Surely she couldn’t have gotten this full already? Though, in all honesty, most of it had been a blur… a blur of cheese and pleasure…

Alice looked unpleasantly at her friend, having hoped to maybe pour this down Melissa’s hatch as well…

“Oh, well, I suppose if you’re full Melissa we don’t have to have dessert.” Carrie said with a smile as she gathered up the dishes, “I can send you and Alice home with a slice of pie if you want. Or maybe one of you would like to take it home?”

“Oh no, we couldn’t…” Alice said with a grimace, fathoming that this was one of the many ways Carrie must have inflated her sisters with food, “We’re both, um, very very full.”

“Oh…” Carrie said sadly, “Well it’s cherry. I’m allergic to cherries. I made it for you two, but… well if you don’t want it, I’m sure it’ll keep til next time.”

“Melissa will take it home!” Alice said confidently, patting her friend on the flabby shoulder, “Isn’t that right, Mel?”

“Wh—WhUUUURP?!”

“Oh good!” Carrie said happily, instantly renewed and jovial, “I’m glad you both like my cooking so much! It seems like so long since I’ve had to cook for anybody. It’s nice having you two around. Hey, what do you say we do this again on Friday? I mean, if you’re not doing anything.”

“Oh that’d be wonderful!” Alice said happily, enjoying the perks of friendship with Carrie

“K…Kay…” Melissa moaned, suffering from the drawbacks of the very same “friendship”…
1153322222211121212.title: Melissa the Human Garbage Disposal Unit

choices: Melissa confronts Alice about eating her food for her.
Melissa loves eating so much she continues to balloon
11533222222111212121.content:
An interesting dynamic had been formed between Carrie, Alice, and Melissa. Alice really enjoyed her friendship with Carrie but really wanted to avoid eating her food. Melissa, who is great friends with Alice, is only okay friends with Carrie but she was in love with her food. This lead to a recurring event of Alice and Melissa coming to Carrie’s for dinner, Alice talking with Carrie all night while Melissa would eat Carrie’s food for both her and Alice.

For months this occurred 2-3 times a week. Alice and Carrie were becoming better and better friends while Melissa could pig out like never before. After a few months, Alice had actually gotten her weight down to 300 pounds. Melissa on the other hand, had become even more of a blimp. Her weight soared into the 400’s as she kept glutting her flabby bloated body. She became a helpless eating machine. For her whole life Melissa had never been able to truly satisfy her raging appetite, but at Carrie’s she reached new heights of piggish indulgence. Melissa still loved the unhealthy excess that was her daily consumption of food but her body was getting so large so fast she could barely function at work. Every other night she would be at Carrie’s barely able to speak as her tremendous belly was filled to the brim. Alice couldn’t help but worry about her friend. She knew Melissa loved to eat more than anything, but she couldn’t help but worry.
11533222222111212121.title: Melissa the piggy

choices: The Next Day
A month later
115332222221112121212.content:
Despite Melissa acknowledging her astronomically surging weight gain, gorging, feasting and glutting her giant stomach was now the dominant aspect of her personality, and she could barely think of anything else other than food, food and more food! As such, Melissa's mammoth stomach continued to be packed to the very brim and mountains of blubber continued to steadily pile themselves on her huge bloated body.

"UURRRRPPPPPP...oh gosh...HICC...what a MEAL...HIC...everything was so delicious...HIC...and plentiful...HIC...and RICH...URRRP...I can't believe how amazing...HICUURP Carrie's cooking continues to be...HICCC...I just can't get enough!" After a particularly explosive night of gorging herself at Carrie's, Melissa was woozily reclining in Alice's car on the way home, having stuffed her stomach to the point of stupidity and was unable to even sit straight. Her hugely overglutted belly surged into the sky like a mountain and was beginning to pour over her knees, in a truly gigantic single spare tire. Melissa had a look of ultimate satisfaction as she sleepily massaged the titanic rich load of food that sat heavily inside of her. "HICCC...I could easily...HICC...do this every day...UURRRP"

That off-hand comment got Alice thinking, however. Her flourishing relationship with Carrie now made her eager for their dinners together, and she figured that if Carrie didn't mind, (which Alice knew she wouldn't) they could make dinners an every-day occurrence. That way, everyone could be happy, Melissa could stuff herself into oblivion every night and Carrie and Alice could have a good time together. "Say, Mel, that's a good idea. You want to go eat at Carrie's every day? It's on our way home from the office anyway." Melissa, despite her engorged state, immediately perked up at the suggestion of gluttony like this every day. Struggling to lift her head to see over her giant gut, she squinted curiously at Alice and licked her chops greedily, giving her bubbling belly a few happy pats "HIIIICCCC, ya mean that? Every day like this...HIC...mmmm so much foood...HIC HIC..Let's DO it!!" Melissa and Alice grinned at each other, and their unwitting partnership was taken to the next level.
115332222221112121212.title: Melissa the Belly

choices: A month later
Alice decides to pass off more meals to Melissa
1153322222211121212121.content:
The next day, during a spell in the break room, Alice sat picking at a salad while Melissa, as usually steadily gorged herself, apparently ignoring the fact that she'd have access to as much food as her big stomach could possibly hold in a few hours, if Carrie agreed. Alice passed another box of Carrie's baked goods over to Melissa, who belched a thank you and grinned greedily, her shirt now permanently inadequate at covering her massively gigantic gut. At that moment Carrie puffed in bearing two heavy bags of her baked goods, to Melissa's obvious delight. "Hey y'all! What's good?" Carrie sang out as she strategically placed the baked goods easily within Melissa's reach.

Alice grinned back and finally brought up the subject she and Melissa had discussed last night in the car: "Hey Carrie, Mel and I have really loved coming over for dinners every other day. You're so kind."
Carrie beamed "Why that's so sweet of you to say! I've so enjoyed making new friends here and finding people who enjoy my home cooking, especially you, Mel." Melissa patted her gut greedily and said: "UURP! you bet! everything's so incredible, I can't stop...omphgulp...eating and eating and EATING...UURP. I could do it *munch* every day!" Moving from box to box, Melissa gorged herself frenetically, as if Carrie would suddenly take her delicious baked goods away from her gaping maw.

Carrie beamed even more brightly and, true to her giving nature and Alice's expectations, immediately answered: "But of course! Why didn't I think of that? I'd love to cook for you two as often as you can come over. Being so far from family makes a gal hungry for some good friends."

Melissa squealed with delight but Alice wanted to make sure it wasn't an undue burden for her friend: "Only if you're ok with it, Carrie, I know cooking so much is a real time-comittment and I don't want to be a pest..." Carrie cut in with a genial wave of the hand: "Quiet, Alice, I won't have any of that talk. It's not like I got much more exciting to do after work. I'd absolutely love to cook for you guys! Come by around 7:30 tonight, kay?" Carrie then shuffled out of the room, leaving Alice looking forward to another evening with her friend and Melissa to gorging herself blind.

---------------------------------------------------------

"...uh, Mel, you sure you're ok?" Alice cast a worried glance at her co-worker as their long dinner-get together with Carrie stretched into its third hour. Alice, as usual, had continued to pass off many of her plates to Melissa, who gorged and glutted herself with zealous ferocity, but was now slumped in her extra-wide chair, her hands desperately clutching her supergorged gut but her dazed and greedy eyes roving the table for more: "*burbleHICC* yeshh, don't worry 'bout me...HICC...mah schtomach's handled worse...HICCCC...ohh mannn...whats for dessert...HICUUURRP?" Even Alice was shocked at Mel's insane gluttony, but the girl was beyond all reason. Her calling in life was to eat, and eat until her stomach could not handle one more crumb of food. In a similar way, Desert came and went in a similar fashion, with Mel managing to shovel serving after serving of cheesecake into her great bubbling gut. Finally leaving and collapsing into Alice's car with a slosh and a gurgle, Mel moaned with discomfort and ecstasy: "SO GOOD...*burble*...HICCCC...I can't believe...HICC...Imma be doing thishh...*sloshHICCC* EVERY DAY...UUURRRRP...thishh is my dream come truee...HICC." Mel settled back comfortably and plopped her hands limply atop her giant belly and drifted off into a food-induced torpor. Alice just shook her head in disbelief at Melissa's massive appetite and in mild concern about how much bigger she'd get if this kept up for any amount of time.
1153322222211121212121.title: The Next Day

choices: Dinner
Later
11533222222111212121212.content:
Alice was feeling really good about herself today. She had stepped on the scale that morning and discovered she had lost 5 pounds. It wasn't all that much but it was something for the obese former cheerleader. Passing most of her lunch and snack meals off to Melissa was really working. Her body was still so soft and flabby, but at least her clothes fit better and she felt better than ever.

"Ugh, I'm...HIC...so hungry." Melissa whined while they were on their way to Carries, beads of sweat already forming on her fleshy neck: "It's been what? 30 minutes since we left the office...HIC *pant*?" In the intervening two weeks since their daily meal with Carrie had begun, Melissa had been enjoying herself immensely, especially since she also went to lunch with Alice most every day, where Alice had quietly feigned fullness and allowed Melissa to gorge herself on the rest of her meal. Now, Melissa was not a completely dull person and had quickly caught on to Alice's supposedly stealthy passing off of meals, but Melissa being Melissa, she welcomed the charity and an implicit, unspoken symbiotic relationship had grown up between the two fat women, one struggling to become less so, the other hurtling headlong into gross preponderance. Indeed, with such a constant stream of food flooding into Melissa's stomach, the past two weeks saw the greedy glutton blow up even faster and become even more eager for eating, to the point where her stomach was nearly constantly packed to the very brim with rich eatings. Her belly was even more gigantically packed with soft blubber, and Melissa seemed in no way ready to stop, indeed her appetite seems to have hit the accelerator. Though there already was an obscene amount of food crammed into Melissa today, she was as eager as ever to begin yet another large gorging session.
11533222222111212121212.title: Alice decides to pass off more meals to Melissa

choices: more time, more Melissa
Finally Melissa finishes
115332222221112121212122.content: After a usual monumental meal, Carrie and Alice were picking at the remains of their substantial dinners and softly chatting at one end of the table, but mostly dumbfoundedly staring at Melissa at the other end, who was still going strong, even after Alice had lost count of the servings she had glutted into her gut. Melissa’s wide ass was rapidly too large for the dining room chairs, but always thoughtful Carrie had provided a wide bench, and here Melissa had parked herself for hours, practically shovelling mountains of food into her belly, which now gelatinously poured across her lap and over her knees and was stupendously swollen with food. A great bubbling belch erupted from deep within the vat of her superstuffed stomach: “*burbleUUUURRP* more pleaseee...HICHILP!!” Mel expectantly patted her mammoth gut as Carrie leapt up to bring Mel another huge bowl of alfredo pasta. Thanking Carrie with a rich hiccup, Melissa continued to shovel food down her throat, oblivious to the creaking of her bench, deaf as she was to all but the call of her bottomless belly. Suddenly, the wooden bench abruptly broke, and all 468 pounds of Melissa collapsed to the floor with a *GLOOSH* as Mel gave a frightened squeak, but managing to not spill the rest of her alfredo pasta, which she rapidly gulped down at an frenetic pace. Belching thunderously, Mel leaned her superswollen body against the wall and clutched at her giant gut with glee. Food-drunk beyond reckoning, Mel just wanted to keep cramming herself with as much food as her gut could possibly hold. Smiling cutely, she gave her huge belly a few healthy slaps: “bubbleHICCCHILP!! oopsies...shorry Carrie..HIC...say...HIC...ya got any more pasta...sloshUUURRPPP.”
115332222221112121212122.title: Later

choices: Alice reacts
More time passes!
1153322222211121212121221.content:
Carrie’s daily dinners with Melissa and Alice were now commonplace, and though it was quite a great deal of work for Carrie to keep making the huge dinners, she thought nothing of providing as much hospitality as possible for her two friends. After another month, Alice and Carrie became as close as friends could get, often talking for hours upon hours during their dinners together. Further, Alice lost another batch of weight due to giving her dinner portions, as well as surreptitiously ‘sharing’ most of her other meals with the hapless Melissa, who nonetheless adored all the charity and spent her time glutting her gut to its maximum possible capacity every chance she could, and then some.

Speaking of Melissa, the four weeks of gigantically rich feedings every day, plus eating most of Alice’s food, caused her weight to skyrocket even further, and the end of the month found Melissa looking absolutely HUGE, sitting comfortably just past the 500 pound threshold. Her belly, as usual, bore the massive majority of her fat, and it was becoming so gigantic that Melissa’s center of gravity was distinctly centered two feet into her gut, making walking any distance a great struggle. However, the administration at Gordge had seen worse and heavier cases, and so looked benignly on Melissa’s outrageous eating. And what an eater she was! Greed and gluttony became all consuming for the young office-worker, and there wasn’t a minute that she wasn’t eating, thinking about eating, or dreaming about eating. The more she ate, and the bigger she got, it seemed the more she wanted to keep eating. Though Alice grew more than a little worried at her co-worker’s accelerating gluttony and the astronomical size of her blubbery belly, Carrie, on the other hand was overjoyed that someone so enjoyed her cooking, and took special care to make sure Melissa was continually surrounded by food, whether at her house or at the office. She even took to inviting Melissa over for lunches on the weekends, and on those days the greedy glutton stuffed away two massive feasts into her rapidly growing gut.

Today, Melissa was gasping for breath after a marathon lunch with Carrie. it was late afternoon, nearing dinnertime, and Alice was due to arrive soon. Today she had absolutely outdone even her vast expectations. Laying slumped on the dining room floor, Melissa grasped what little of her mammothly glutted burbling gut that she could, sweating like a sinner in Church, but nevertheless had a stupidly satisfied and self-indulgent smile plastered on her face: "UggghhhHIILLP...now THATSHH a meal...burbleHILP!! So much RICH...HICCC fooddd...It’shh all soo gooodddd...HICCC*sloshURRP* *gasp* I am SO full, Carrie...HIICC...I might just burst...uugghhh my stummHIICCC...HIILLP." Mel's belly groaned and burbled with indigestion and overload that came from her crazed gluttony. Gasping for air, Mel whined and pathetically tried to rub the tension from her massive gut, but crazily giggled with unrequited greed.

Carrie shook her head knowingly: “Oh Mel, I hope you haven’t spoiled your appetite for dinner! I worked so hard cooking up a storm while you were eating lunch, I’d hate it to go to waste. You know how Alice and I eat so little! Look, you can even start early if you like and take it slow. I’m already setting the table!” Carrie gestured to the kitchen counters, which groaned with yet another vast feast. “Look! I got Pasta Alfredo, Buttermilk Chicken, Shrimp scampi, and so much more! Oh yes, also...”

Melissa’s eyes had been glazed over when Carrie had begun to speak. She was gasping at the
gargantuan weight of her gluttony and woozily hiccupping and was giving anyone who could see a conceited, self-indulgent smile, one hand resting limply on her explosive belly,which had incredibly bloated far beyond its normal gigantic size. Her belly was one incredibly giant mountain of vastly overswollen, overgorged, overfilled, and overglutted blubbery fat, permanently way too vast for Mel to handle. Despite this, and despite the oh-so-rich squelching of her stupendous stomach begging her to stop, Mel had snapped out of her catatonic state and had perked up as soon as Carrie began speaking about eating and by the end, interrupted her, wiping drool from my lips, her hands drumming the top of her mammoth gut eagerly: “HICCHILP…alright…that’shhh enough…HICHILP*gloosh* don’t tell me any moorreee...BELCHHILP...I’ll have it all...HIILLP... gimme everything...bubbleUURRP.” She grinned at Carrie wickedly, her eyes on fire with determination and greed.

Carrie chuckled, but her eyes flashed a smidge of worry “I know how much you love my cooking Mel dear, but don’t feel obliged just because I cooked it. I know you ate a big lunch, and I’d hate to impose any more on your full tummy.” Understatement of the century though it might have been, Carrie’s kind soul wanted to make sure that Mel had a way out if she so chose.

“Don’t worry your head...HILLLP...’bout my stummHIC...HICHILP!” Mel shot back, slapping the sides of her superswollen gut incredibly, stupidly impatient to begin eating again. “HILP!! I have room for...HIC*burble*...everything you’ve made...HILP...and ANYTHING...HIC...you wanna give me...*bubble*HILP!! Alice or no Alice...URRP.” Mel gripped the swollen flanks of her gargantuan belly and wiggled her gut back and forth, her hands singing deep into her fat despite her gorged state. An explosion of rich bubbling erupted from the mountain of food from Melissa’s previous meal, the disturbance jostling up a few more belches and hiccups as well from the depths of the overglutted vat of her gut: “*burble*URRP...See Carrie..*slosh*HILP...plenty...HIC...of...HICCC*bubble* oh goodness...UUURRP*squelch*...spare room...HICHILP*gloosh*” Melissa struggled mightily and rolled herself into a roughly sitting position on the floor,spreading her fat legs as far apart as she could to allow her giant belly to spill with impunity on the floor, mentally preparing it and herself for this new onslaught of rich eatings. “HILP!! Iet’s get to it, Carrie..HIC!” Mel grinned and clapped her fat hands like an excited child, the clapping causing ripples to arc their way through her entire body.

Carrie matched Melissa’s grin with an equally wide one of her own and speedily set down a large platter of buttermilk chicken in front of the stupendously fat young lady, who began tearing into it as if she hadn’t eaten in 3 days. And so dinner began.

And so Melissa ate...and ate...and ate. Carrie had neglected to mention that Alice had texted her earlier, informing her that she was on a clothes-shopping day to celebrate the loss of even more of her excess weight, and that she would be eating dinner at home. Overjoyed at her friend’s joy, good hearted Carrie however also didn’t have it in her to cancel dinner for Melissa, for she saw how much obvious delight she took in cramming all of Carrie’s delicious goodies into her mammoth stomach. And oh BOY did Melissa cram. Choking down massive bite after massive bite, Mel was so eager to stuff as much as she could into her bottomless pit, that half the time she didn’t bother chewing before forcing in another giant mouthful. At least six times she nearly choked in her effort to cram as much as humanly possible into her mouth for increasingly heavy, rich swallows. Obviously, Mel was in euphoric paradise. Surrounded by such gigantic amounts of rich gluttings all to her own and all the time in the world, she utterly lost herself in the joys of feasting, despite her stupendously swollen state resulting from the mountain of food that already sat heavily in her giant stomach. Nevertheless, bowls, plates, and trays and platters piled high with supremely rich and well-made food were in quick succession funnelled into Mel’s cavernous gut and slid across the floor to Carrie without any second thought. Melissa’s belly rapidly began bulging farther and farther out, pushing the gorging, gluttonous girl ever back slumping against the wall, and pushing her tank top permanently above her vast gut, exposing her entire massive quaking vat of churning blubber for all to see, her superswollen stomach sloshing and bubbling more and more clearly with futile efforts at proper digestion. Melissa was sweating profusely with the effort of glutting, her gut violently churned and ached as she packed more and more inside, but she did NOT stop until the end, until it was all done.

Well, not exactly ALL done. Carrie had some more desserts and spare dishes prepared, but Melissa had well and truly reached her stupendous limit. Profoundly food-drunk and woozy out of her mind, it was obvious she was in no state to do anything under her own power. Hastily calling on Alice, who lived closeby, Carrie slowly coaxed the loopy Melissa, who probably appeared more food than girl by this point into the back seat of her SUV. The car itself groaned to support the Quarter-ton girl with God knows how much food crammed into her monumental gut as Mel collapsed heavily with a thunderous *GLOP*. What puzzled Carrie is that Mel just couldn’t stop giggling through uncontrollable belches and hiccups, and gripping any fold or handful of her belly that she could reach.

As short as it was, it appeared that the trip had sufficiently revived Melissa to the point of being able to stagger to Alice’s door on her own. Belching a goodbye to the exhausted Carrie, Melissa stumbled into Alice’s condo, just barely able to balance the vast counterbalancing weight of her mammoth gut. She peeked into Alice’s living room, where the now-250 pound former-cheerleader was relaxing with a light TV dinner and some flattering clothes that clung to her mighty, increasingly shapely bosom. Hearing Mel’s decadent hiccup, Alice looked up confusedly at Melissa’s quadruple-chinned face, which was creased into an dopey smile, yet her eyes screwed near shut from the effort of walking. Melissa giggled at her confussion: “HIIIILLPPP...hehehe Hayy Aliceee...HIIILLP...I’m BAAAACKKKK *burble*"

11533222222111212121212211.title: The Aftermath

choices: A few weeks later, her job has affected her waistline.
Mel's stomach growls! The beast craves more!
115332222221112121212122111.content:
Mellissa woke up the next morning to her pride and joy filling out her field of view: her massive tummy. She smiled down at it and gave it a pat, to which it replied with a vicious growl that rippled her entire belly. The beast she had so lovingly fostered and grew was now awake, and it demanded nourishment. And she was all to happy to oblige! That tummy had taken over her a long time ago. Now, her belly was the master and Melissa was the slave, serving it's every whim and demand in it's never ending quest to grow bigger and hungrier. It was a goal that was now much easier with the new job Mel was going to be in starting today.

"Shhh... honey it's okay. You're gonna get your meal soon, big girl" Mel cooed to her tummy, as the Beauty was trying to calm down the Beast.

Even after eating so much last night her tummy still felt as empty as ever! Her cooing and patting didn't do much to calm it down, in fact, her belly growled even louder, angry at it's lack of food.

Seeing only one way to fix this, she went down to her kitchen, and ate herself silly! Exiting the kitchen, her stomach stuck out like a massive orb. It was like a parasite, growing and sucking nutrients from its host. The thing glorped and gurgled, as it struggled to break down the massive amounts of food that was crammed into it. It was at it's limit, however, anymore and it wouldn't be able to handle it. But that was exactly what Mel was planning on doing to it. Drunkenly she made her way to her car and went off to work.

She made it to the office and as soon as she walked in the door, all of the attention was on her. How could it not? With a belly that big and loud, it drew the attention of anyone that was there. Carrying such a great weight was difficult for Mel, so as soon as she reached her desk, she sat down and used her swivel chair to move around. She wheeled herself across the office and everyone she passed has a comment for her.

"Oh, wow! You're really getting big!" Someone said.

"Yeah, I know, she's a big one!" Mel replied with a slap of her belly

Eventually, she made her way to the janitors area. They were already cleaning out the kitchen. Her tummy growled at the sight of all that food being laid out in front of her. But whether it was from hunger or fullness, she couldn't tell. Either way her stomach seemed to be in distress. She ran a loving hand across it's vast surface, saying sweet nothings to her stomach as though it was a small child that was crying. It seemed to do the trick though as her stomach seemed to calm down. Once she was satisfied that her stomach was stable, she licked her lips and dug in.

The food wasn't the freshest, in fact some of it seemed questionable if it was even safe to be eaten. Her stomach seemed to agree with a sickening gurgle, like a stomach about to explode. She continued to choke down all of this on top of what she ate earlier. Her stomach swelled and swelled, gurgling sludgily as it did so.

After a few hours, she was finished. Well, almost. She held the last bite of a stale cinnamon roll in her hand. She was gasping for breath and her stomach made the loudest growl it had ever made, begging her to stop this. It was too full of junk to keep going. All of that bad food was bloated her up on top of that and she felt like she was one bite away from exploding. She was covered in sweat and her arms were shaking.

Before she could take the last bite, Alice walked in the room and saw her friend on the floor. She was initially stunned by the size of her friend, but slowly smiled.

"Well, Mel, what do you think? Is your stomach able to handle this every day?" Alice asked.

Mel looked at her with a devious smile. "Of HIC...course it is!" She managed to get out before she quickly shoved the last piece into her mouth.

As soon as she did though, her stomach shook and rippled, growling like a dying beast. Mel groaned and clutched what little she could of her stomach. The growls increased in volume and the pain became excruciating before her stomach gave a loud GLOOOOOORRRRGGGLE and expanded out a good two more feet!

Alice looked at her in shock as Mel slapped her gut with that crazy smile on her face.

"Does that answer your...BURP...question?" Mel asked.

As the weeks when on, Melissa continued to pamper her ever more massive pride and joy, and as it grew larger and heavier, the more aroused she got from how it felt. She loved to show it off, wearing clothes that allowed her big belly bob and jiggle in front of her, even leaving it exposed when not at the office.

The sight of her wheel herself around the office in her swivel chair became an attraction to her co workers, as her belly slowly grew past her knees, and push out the sides, making her look like a roly-poly toy. However, she also drew attention when did walk, because her belly which hung below her thighs swung like a pendulum.

But, what drew the most attention was at the end of the day, when the overwhelming weight of her belly required several attempts heaving it up into the air, in order to get out of her chair.

After she go to her feet, she smiled down to her tummy, and said “My girl, is really getting big, aren’t you?”

It replied with a vicious growl that rippled her entire belly."That's my girl" Mel smiles as she caressed her tummy.

115332222222.title: How about Rebecca

The larger women of the office encourage Becky's eating
1153322222221.content: Rebecca was a little lost in her first month at the office. It was her first time every working at a desk. She was only 23 and had little work experience doing anything. But Rebecca was destined to fit in at the office. She was a plump 250 pounds. She was skinny up to her teens. It wasn’t until her senior year of college that she started to fill out. By her graduation she had a nice curvy body. She had finally gotten the boobs and butt of a real woman. She was one of the hottest girls in her class that year. I guess you could say she had “it” in all the right places. But after graduation Becky didn’t stop filling out. She went from curvy to thick to chubby to fat in a very short time. Next thing she knew she was more than 200 pounds. Rebecca’s mind didn’t handle this rapid weight gain very well. Instead of acknowledging that she had let herself go, she went into denial. She simply didn’t see her fat rolls when she looked in the mirror, she just saw that smoking hot body from her senior year. Unfortunately for Rebecca’s figure, working at the office would only help her state of denial as she was now surrounded by big bloated behemoths like Courtney and Jenna. Even the thinnest worker in the office, Victoria had a good ten pounds on Becca. Rebecca was no doubt destined for a long and glorious career at the office. She already had become good friends with Victoria (who was the same age as Becca), and she had a good relationship with her boss, Jenna.
1153322222221.title: Rebecca- young, plump, and in denial

choices: Victoria and Rebecca hang out
The girls all go out to lunch together. Rebecca's a bit bigger though.
11533222222212.content:
The employees at the office were taking a break in the break room (obviously).

“And then when the shirt he gave me was too small, he called me fat!?!” Victoria said.

“Wow. That’s just rude and unnecessary.” Alice said.

“You should meet George the tailor.” Courtney said

“Yeah, I mean if you’re fat then what am I?” Melissa said.

“I mean it would be one thing if you were actually fat and he said that, but you’re not even fat!” Courtney said.

“I don’t know. I’d like to think I’m not fat, but…” Victoria responded.

“Oh nononono, Vicky. And Becky you too. Don’t let anyone call you fat, cause you are not fat!” Alice said.

“Yeah if anyone calls you fat, you tell me and I’ll show them what a fat person looks like. And then I’ll sit on them. Show ‘em what a fat person feels like.”
Courtney said. The room started to giggle.

“You guys really don’t think I’m fat?” Victoria said with a smile. The 260 pound cutie took a bite from a doughnut.

“You know what you are… You’re just curvy.” Alice said.

“Yeah, your booty is to die for.” Melissa said.

“The way you fill those leggings you wore Friday. I mean, forget about it,” Courtney said. This was a classic example of the girls in the office looking out for one another. Victoria was “curvy” about 80 pounds ago. She was quite fat an on a collision course with obesity.

“I flaunt what I got,” Victoria said, basking in her friends compliments.

“I’d like to think I’m curvy.” Rebecca said. She was dying to get into the conversation.

“Becky you could even stand to put on a few.” Courtney said.

“Yeah. Why don’t you have the last box of doughnuts? You’re making us all look bad with that body.” Alice said playfully. She slid a box of doughnuts over
to Rebecca.

“Does she really need the whole box?” Melissa whispered to Alice.

“Thanks. I love doughnuts.” Becca said.

“I think you have to if you’re gonna work in this office.” Victoria said.

“Yeah, just make sure Melissa doesn’t steal yours,” Alice said.

“Hey, how am I supposed to steal doughnuts when you keep telling people? Some friend you are.” Melissa joked. Everyone was having a good time.
Especially Rebecca, who was finally being accepted by her coworkers. Not only that but she was being showered with compliments about her figure, which was just what Rebecca liked to hear.

“Are you gonna eat those doughnuts?” Courtney asked Rebecca who had only had one doughnut from the box.

“Yeah, c’mon skinny. Eat ‘em up or I’ll steal them from you,” Melissa said with a laugh. Rebecca’s coworkers completely butchered the realities of her weight. Rebecca was anything but skinny or small. She had a tubby belly that perfectly hung over her pants. Her belly button was a deep crevice of blubber. Her belly looked a bit smaller than it truly was because on top of it was her huge heaving breasts. They had swollen with fat. They managed to remain perky despite the thick layer of flab weighing them down. She had an absolutely glorious rack. The rest of her fat inflated her jiggling rear and smothered her porky thighs. She was anything but skinny.
11533222222212.title: Breakroom Buddies

choices: The girls get dinner at the buffet
Victoria and Rebecca are getting fat!
115332222222122.content:
Rebecca and the rest of the girls in the office went out to lunch. Rebecca was now a bona fide member of the office. She was finally getting in to the rhythm of things at work. She was also getting along with the rest of the office workers. She was now one of “the girls”. The only problem about her finally finding her place in the office was Rebecca’s waistline. She was already gaining weight before taking the job but now that she worked in the office her gaining went to another level. All the snacking at her desk, the pastry heavy breaks, the lunches with Victoria, the dinner feasts with the rest of the girls, All of it was taking a heavy toll on her already chubby frame.

The girls all made their way to the Food Court. They all made their hefty food orders and waddled back to their table. A choir of groans came from the seats around the table as 5 fatties lowered their overfed rumps. Courtney, Melissa, Alice, Rebecca, and Victoria all placed their large mountains of food on to the table. The truth was Rebecca wasn’t the only one who had gained recently. The 4 other coworkers were blowing up almost as fast as Rebecca. See, working in the office caused a steady gain regardless. Their weights could go through short periods of loss and gain but in the long term their weights were rising at an almost constant rate.

“So then the cop pulls me over and says I was getting a ticket for not wearing a seat belt.” Melissa said.

“Yeah, then what?” Victoria asked.

“Then I’m like: Uh officer I can’t buckle my seat belt it’s too short.” Melissa said. “That’s not my fault that’s the car’s fault.”

“Damn right!” Courtney exclaimed.

“He said: I still have to give you a ticket. So I was like that’s ridiculous! Why don’t you give the ticket to the car company. They deserve it!”

“Wow, you go girl.” Alice said through a mouthful of food.

“This next part is what really pissed me off. So I said why don’t you give the ticket to the car company. Then he said to me: Why don’t you just lose some weight!”

“Oh my god.” There was a collective moment of anger and disgust at the table.

“So then I started getting on his case about mistreatment and abuse. He finally crumpled up the ticket and let me go.” Melissa said with a sense of satisfaction.

“Good for you, what a pig.” Alice said. Rebecca wasn’t sure it was the cop that was a pig in that story.

“You’re right though, cars these days are way too small,” Victoria said.

“Vicky you don’t even know. For about a year and a half I’ve been driving with my belly rubbing the steering wheel!” Courtney said.

“Yeah, when I’m driving I’ve got one hip sitting on the cup holder and the other hip rubbing against the door. I mean, have they ever heard of the term pear-shaped?” Alice complained.

“Seriously, and Al you’re not even as large as me and Melissa. How big are you these days?” Courtney asked.

“I’m only like 345.” Alice said. (interesting use of “only”)

“345! That’s like average in America! Most women I see are at least 300.” Courtney said. The second part was probably true but the first part was definitely not.

“That’s funny, I saw my aunt just the other day and she said I should watch my weight! Just because I may have put on 20 pounds doesn’t mean I’m fat.” Rebecca said. Rebecca was a plump 270 pounds now.

“I hope you said: You should watch your mouth!” Melissa said.

“Hahaha, seriously. And Becky with boobs like yours 20 pounds here and there will just make the boys crazier.” Alice said. Rebecca’s face lit up at Alice’s words. Those 20 pounds were making her worry, but Alice’s comment had completely excused all those worries. Rebecca was free to eat without any regrets. The problem with Alice’s logic was that while Becca’s boobs were fantastically soft and plump, her tubby belly was pushing out farther and farther from under her heavy chest. Her gut was still slightly under the shadow of her breasts but that wouldn't last much longer.
115332222222122.title: Lunch Break!

choices: dessert time!
free choice
1153322222221221.content:
All the new job smell had officially disappeared from Rebecca. All awkwardness in her job performance had gone absent. It was like she had worked in the office for years. The girls were going to go have dinner together at the local all you can eat buffet. This was a weekly tradition for the coworkers, but this would be a first time experience for Rebecca who hadn’t gone any of the weeks prior. The all you can eat buffet was a sanctuary for the women of the office. It catered to the needs of girls who were on the larger side.

The five girls met up in the parking lot of the restaurant. They waddled through the opening of the restaurant and up to the register.

“Table for five, and we want the special service.” Courtney said. The employee nodded and led them to a booth. It was by far the largest booth any of them had ever seen. The booth was specially designed for a large customer, or in this case 5 large customers. The girls squeezed their way into the booth. Menus were passed around the table. Rebecca was confused by this.

“Why do we need menus? Aren’t we going to the buffet?” Rebecca asked.

“Oh no sweetie, they bring the food to you.” Courtney said.

“Yeah it’s great. I mean what’s the worst part about all you can eat buffet’s? The walking!” Alice said.

“I mean, after my fifth course how can you expect me to go walk back and forth again to get my six!?!” Melissa said, unaware of the ridiculousness of her statement.

“That’s why this place is the best,” Victoria said. Rebecca read the menu. It was an astounding compilation of deep fried, sugar coated, grease covered, breaded, wrapped in bacon, well salted, doused in sauce food. Not a single salad or vegetable option. After the menus were looked over 5 waiters came over to the table. Each girl took turns naming everything they wanted in their meal. After that was done the waiters left.

“So now they’ll come back with your food.” Victoria said.

“And they’ll keep bringing you trays until you tell them not to.” Alice said.

“Yeah I love this place. They actually have booths I can fit in.” Courtney said.

“I know right! Most places I’m like: how am I supposed to eat all I can eat if after the 4th course I can’t fit in the booth anymore?” Melissa said.

“This is the only place I can actually have all I can eat without being interrupted.” Alice said. Then the waiters returned with 5 trays stacked high with food. The conversation stopped and the eating commenced.

11533222222221.content:
Hannah waddled her slender form through the hallway. Her perky and large breasts, and her supple behind were the only places she could be called "Fat". Her buttoned shirt was tight as she packed the copious stacks of insurance papers with her, moving to the central filling area. She heard a high-pitched voice, "Hey hannah!" Hannah turned to the co-worker. It was Jessica, walking to her lunch break. Hannah replied. "Hey Jess!" The redheaded, 350-pound woman turned back to her walk, shortly afterwards a 'Pop' rang out from behind. Hannah turned and saw a button laying on the floor.

She thought to help poor Jessica as the obese woman tried to bend over, but a brunette hurried over to help her. Hannah turned about and kept walking to the filing area. Jessica was a good girl, if a little big. All Jessica needs is a good, old-fashioned, lifestyle intervention, thought Hannah. She thought of maybe getting in contact with her and scheduling a visit to a scale and a gym one day. Maybe on Good Friday, the manager was good about giving them Christian holidays off. Hannah appreciated that above all, she was born and raised in a deeply religious families. The Laurens were very prestigious members in Rock Hill, with a vast family of 8 children and more uncles, aunts, and cousins than could be counted.

Hannah reached the filing cabinet with her brisk and lively pace. Unlike the fatter, bulkier members of the office like Vanessa and Jessica who would have taken a good twenty minutes to reach it, it took Hannah a matter of seconds to reach the uninterrupted wall of files. Hannah spent a few minutes fitting each folder into their respective cabinet slots. Hannah spent her high school years on the school dance team, which kept her very slim. Most of the other dancers on that team, especially Brooke and Taylor, fattened up even beyond their already plump forms after the dance team was over and when they entered college. Hannah was literally the only one who hadn't really gained in college due to her rigorous regimen of exercise and dieting. She had her spots of fatness, but those were overcome by simply slipping into her routine.

Hannah finished finally filing everything away, and turned back, an announcement came over the loudspeaker. "Will all office employees please report to the conference room, thank you." Hannah sighed in annoyance, she never seemed to be able to catch a moment of peace. That was one thing she was envious of the blubbier members of the office for: They seemed to have more peace sitting in their chairs, enjoying their fatty treats. She even thought for a moment of giving up her diet and exercise regimen, for one moment. Then she had to bring herself back to reality. She would enjoy a long, healthy life, hopefully with a sweet guy, and live well into her 90's. She couldn't say the same for Jessica and Vanessa, who she projected would die in their forties. She made a fast walk down the stairs, the blubbery mass of multiple female office workers in their white button-up shirts followed her.

They all arrived in the large room where stood the manager, Rob Herrison. He sported a goatee and a massive 383 pounds on his 6'4 frame. He was huge in both senses of the word. He spoke in his loud, deep voice. "Now! We're reaching quotas this month, ladies. The board says that we're about to make a huge amount of money, we're working in tandem with a Weight Loss company. For every ten pounds lost, they're giving away discounts for life insurance. I want you ladies out there, working, selling! Now get out there and make some money. We're closing up for the day, get yourselves rested and fed for tomorrow!"

Everyone began leaving, and Hannah exited. As she left, her phone rang. She withdrew her phone and answered it as she stepped away. A familiar voice rang up. "Hey Hannah, it's Brooke!" Hannah spoke with excitement to her old friend. "Hey Brooke! How are you?" Brooke spoke. "Hungry, and that's why I've called. I thought we'd get back together for the rest of the evening, lunch and supper are gonna be on me!" Hannah spoke. "Well that's great, Brooke! Where do you wanna go?" Brooke spoke. "Market Commons, we're meeting up for lunch at California Pizza." Hannah pondered for a second. She could afford to break her regimen for one day. "Sure thing, see you there!" Brooke replied, "Bye now!" Brooke hang up, and then hannah put away her phone as she briskly maneuvered around the panting, blubbery females around her and got into her car.

As she drove up to the vast commercial mini-town that was the Market Commons and manuevered into her parking place, she briskly jogged towards the nearby california pizza, and at the door she saw the familiar form of Brooke. Brooke had obviously ballooned up since Dance team was over; When she had left, she was already almost 160 pounds and rather chunky. She had gone up to what looked to be around 240. She extended her blubbery, suited arms. "Hannah!" Hannah wrapped her arms around Brooke. "Brooke, how you doin' babe?" Brooke spoke. "Just fine. Let's get inside girl!" Both women were rather hungry. Hannah had not had her lunch break, and Brooke was Brooke, always ravenous. The only thing that had previously kept her in some semblance of shape was Dance practice. They entered the pizza joint, and got a booth by the windows. Many people sat around. An old acquaintance sat near their seat, and after they had ordered their drinks; A regular coke for Brooke and a diet coke for Hannah, they began conversing. "How's work, Hannah?"Hannah smiled and replied, "Oh, it's great! I have a feeling I'm about to get swamped tomorrow, we're expecting a wave of people." Brooke nodded. "Mmm-hmm. I work at BB&T, and tomorrow's the expected crowd; People putting in their paychecks. But I can bring you lunch tomorrow!" Hannah smirked. "That would be great, Brooke!"

Hannah turned around, looking at the crowd of mostly unfamiliar faces. To her right, across the aisle she saw a heavy-ish man sitting across from a blubbery woman that would fit right in at the office. Hannah recognized it as Sam from high school, the resident history nerd. He was an odd mix of introvert and extrovert. Hannah smiled and spoke. "Sam!" The man turned and spoke. "Hannah? Hannah Laurens? My god, it really is you!" Hannah spoke. "Yeah, how have the years treated you?" Sam spoke. "Oh, just peachy. Inbetween semesters at college, I married my beautiful wife here, Kelsie. Kels, look over there, it's hannah!" The blubbery brunette smiled and waved at the thin woman.

The lunch had gone on with a good deal of conversation between Brooke and Hannah, talking about their lives after High School. Eventually their extra pizza came and Brooke had dug in, but Hannah had also done her good bit of the damage. She was ravenous and it seemed like a competition between the two. They both left stuffed like turkeys,Brooke's white blouse started to poke its head from her suit jacket, a bit of her stomach peeking out at the world from the bottom. They spent the duration of their evening at first, the movies, where brooke, and by the pressure of the popcorn smell, Hannah, beat the odds by actually buying popcorn. They finished up their night at the nearby italian resturaunt afterwards, Hannah ordering Penne Pasta, with Shrimp & Whole Grain Spaghetti. The absolutely gorged women finished up their night waddling out of the resturaunt. Hannah's gut had expanded massively, and Brooke's blouse showed her belly up to the bellybutton. They sat at a pair of rocking chairs nearby in relaxation, and Hannah thought. She didn't want to be typical health freak Hannah, but if this is how Brooke ate every night, she'd follow Jessica down Heart Failure Road. She made up her mind, and turned to brooke, speaking...

I'll deal with it over the weekend, thought Hannah. The calls seemed to stop after one more after lunch.

She felt an urge to get up and get a snack from the fridge, as she saw her-co-workers do the same. She shrugged; She'd committed enough health sins today, why not another? She got up and walked over towards the Fridge, and encountered Jenna, one of the obese coworkers. She turned and spoke, with a sigh. "Good god, I don't know what the hell corporate did, but everyone seems to be fearing for their lives. I've had about.. Forty calls today, I had to eat through a few of them." Hannah nodded, feeling the big girl's pain as Hannah grabbed a bag of Chips from the fridge. "Some of the people on the phone, bless their hearts, they don't know a smidge of common sense." Jenna nodded with an "Mmm-hmm," as she poured herself a cup of coffee. "I don't know how these people remember how to breathe. What's your name?" "Hannah," Hannah replied. "What's yours?" Jenna replied, "Oh, I'm Jenna. Nice to meet you." The young brunette with her hair tied in a bun waddled away with her mug. Hannah walked away with her bag of chips. She sat back down at her desk and ripped the bag open and began eating the Barbecue chips.

The day sustained a few more calls, and by its end, Hannah had gone to get another bag, and dug into that. Something about these long, stressful days made Hannah hungry. As she left the office, she began her drive home. Her phone rang on the way there, and she picked it up. "Hello." She was greeted with...

Hannah pulled up on the street of the sushi restaurant, the smell of the luscious hibachi luring her like a nasal-borne siren. She saw Brooke standing in her blue, flower-pattern blouse, this one a bit loose. She smiled and looked at Hannah. "Hey there babe! Sorry I couldn't talk during your work, didn't want to interrupt ya." Hannah waved her hand, saying "It's fine, Brooke." The chill of the autumn night gave both ladies a chill. "Woooh.. We better get inside." Hannah spoke. "Bbbbr. Yeah, damn weatherman said it'd be 70 tonight."

Brooke and Hannah entered the Japanese-themed building, eventually getting to their table after what seemed like an eternity of waiting in line to get checked in. Brooke ordered her typical coke, but Hannah decided to join her in getting a regular coke. She decided to indulge herself tonight, and two days of indulgence wouldn't kill her. As she looked about her menu, she saw a hunk of a man sitting at a nearby table. She poked her bony finger into Brooke's fleshy arm, exposed by the short-sleeved blouse, and as her friend turned to her, Hannah pointed to the black-haired,well-kempt, muscular and bearded man at the next table over. On top of that, Hannah could detect a Southern cadence about his voice, and there was nothing that turned Hannah on more than a Country boy.

As the chef prepared to come to the table, Hannah ordered the Hibachi steak and shrimp combo, with a side of scallops. Hannah had not had hibachi in weeks, as her diet was mostly greens and nuts. As she ate through her meal, she kept sneaking peeks of the Black-haired country boy inbetween bite of her scallops and shrimp. She ate through her meal, and as they finished, Hannah pulled her chair up as the country boy got up, giving a stuffed sigh. Hannah approached her, getting out her phone as her flabby friend watched on in anticipation. Hannah walked up to the country boy as he began walking away. "Hey." The black-bearded man turned, speaking. "Uh, yeah?" Hannah spoke. "Hi, uh.. My name's Hannah. I just wanted to say..." Hannah locked up for a second and then spoke. "...I really like your beard, and you should totally call me." She handed the bewildered man her phone, he quickly entered her number, speaking. "Hey, thanks, uh, Hannah. I'm Austin. Austin Calone." The man smiled. "I hate to sound like a dork, but, uh..." Hannah beamed with hope, with gleam and light. It was happening,love was about to happen.

"...Who's your friend over there?"

Hannah's smile vanished and her heart plummeted. In her mind she picked up and slammed it into the man's face, and began trashing the entire resturaunt, screaming in complete anger.

Instead, she answered with an obviously disinterested "Oh. She's Brooke." Austin looked sympathetiecally. "No, I didn't mean it like that, it's just..." He leaned into her ear. "If you were to get a bit more...Like your friend.. Then maybe we could talk." Hannah spoke. "Oh, then, uh, sure." Brooke spoke. "Hannah, we got to go." Hannah spoke. "Coming, Brooke!" She turned and walked out.

This was absolutely a change in pace. She talked to a cute guy and he gave her terms.

Not exactly terms that she liked. She knew exactly what the guy meant when he said to "get a bit more like" Brooke. Hannah wouldn't comprimise her weight for anything.

Would she?

The lines became a bit more blurred in hannah's head. Yes, she wanted to live a long time and not die early of diabetes and heart attack, but damn, an angel like that doesn't descend every day from heaven like this.

Brooke spoke. "Thanks for coming, Hannah. Wanna go to a movie next?"

Hannah knew there were plenty of fattening treats at the movies. Her mind was stuck on this; Would she toss off every lifetime commitment she'd made to stay healthy and not go the path of the typical former athlete, and gain weight? Would she throw her health away for love? If anything, this moment would decide.
"Uh.."

“Sure, let’s go!” Hannah said as they left the restaurant. I’ll just give my diet a little slack… that’s all. Hannah tried to justify her actions.

They arrived at the theater and Brooke ordered an extra large soda and popcorn. Hannah hesitated but smelling the buttery snack in Brooke’s arms was too much for Hannah too resist. She ordered a large bucket of popcorn and soda and happily munched on the unhealthy bucket of junk food. Hannah’s taste buds weren’t used to such unhealthy and delicious treats. It was overwhelmingly tasty and enjoyable for her.

Hannah continued to ponder what had happened earlier as they watched the movie. Could I be wrong about being fat? Brooke always seems so happy, AND that totally hot guy wanted her. I somehow didn’t even have a chance with him.

Halfway through the movie she got another large bucket of popcorn. She was eating out of anger now. That guy was really bugging her. I eat a salad almost every day! Munch. Going to the gym 3 times a week! Munch. Just to get rejected in favor of my FAT PIG of a friend! Gulp. What was that stupid juice cleanse for? Munch. I didn’t even eat candy on Halloween! Munch. I can still fit into my old dance uniform. Slurp. Meanwhile Brooke has freaking DOUBLED in size, and yet she got that hunks number! Munch. Why am I even trying so hard!?! Munch, chew, munch, swallow.

Brooke looked over to her friend who was voraciously shoveling popcorn in her face. Hannah’s cheeks were bright red and she was so worked up in her anger that she was breathing heavily.

“Are you okay?” Brooke whispered. Hannah stopped and swallowed her mouthful of popcorn. She snapped out of her rage realizing she was in a public movie theater.

“Uh… *pant* yeah… *huff* yeah I’m fine.” Hannah said. She went back to watching the movie actually and enjoyed the rest of her night with Brooke. But she still kept thinking about what happened and whether it was really worth it that she had stayed in shape all these years.

115332222222211111.content:
It was no big surprise that afterwards, Brooke and Austin kicked it off rather well, and Austin knew the right poison for brooke; Movie nights, Dinner dates, Lazy days at the house. As hannah sat in her room that next Tuesday evening, thoughts ran through her head.

She had always stayed fit, in part, to get guys. That was what the media said, right? Have a hot bod, get the perfect guy.

But of course, something had to go wrong. Had anyone else seen Hannah's life, they'd think she had it made: Steady office job, Perfect body, and (mostly) happy days. Hannah wondered what in her life had gone so wrong that she literally could NOT find a guy that supposedly was sure to fall for her. It wasn't happening.

And in that moment, Hannah's rage boiled over. That always-nice, goody-two-shoes, never-angry Hannah Lanes snapped and turned against the basilisks that she had turned to for the majority of her life, and the prior objects she had seen as her bulwark.

She screeched and stormed about her house, slamming her punching bags to the ground, pulling down her chin-up bars, smashing up her treadmills, hurling health food to the floor. She didn't care about what they'd done for her previously, they had done nothing if they couldn't get her the perfect life that they promised. She saw these objects of her prior life as a health freak as Charlatans, Chicanery-laden objects of lies and deceit. They did not give her the life she wanted. They did not give her the perfect guy, the picket-fence life of domesticity and peace that had always been her golden vision of the future. As she stood there, her fury overwhelming her senses, the anger washed away in a tide, depression to come flowing back in, as she collapsed on top of the pile of her former life, sobbing.

-------------------

"And then, SHE gets the hunk instead of me!" sobbed Hannah, sitting on the break room couch. She dug into a box of cookies, slid to her by the chubby hands of Melissa.

"Oh, dearie, we've all been there. Our friend gets the man instead of us," supplied Alice, in her ever kind and sympathetic tone.

"Yeah," spoke Melissa, "Screw guys. I'm in a relationship with Food." Courtney leaned over and wiped some tears from Hannah's face, as she spoke.

"Y'know, you guys are the best co-workers a girl could ask for. Especially in a time like this..." Hannah continued digging into the cookies and Melissa kept the food coming. Hannah didn't care what she ate in that time, its calorie content or its fat content, nor its sodium nor sugar contents. All she cared for was how it made her feel.

The sympathy feeding went on for a bit and into Lunch Break. The rest of the gals, famished from comforting Hannah, made a unanimous decision to go to the Burger Barn, a newer restaurant that had opened up around the block. Hannah didn't hesitate in joining them. She no longer had the hesitation that a health freak had. She had sheer determination. Somewhere, deep down, though her conscious brain thought of it only as comfort eating, something inside her urged her to unconsciously try to get fatter. Maybe then she'd be able to steal Austin back for her own, and leave Brooke in the dust.

As Hannah sat with her co-worker Posse, digging into a set of Chicken Tenders and two sides of fries, she saw Brooke and her little hunk Austin. Hannah noticed for one thing, that Brooke had even more than her usual amount of food. And if she knew Brooke, brooke normally still got gargantuan portions. She could see that Austin didn't sit fine enough with 240, but still wanted bigger. Hannah could already see Austin's work wreaking havoc on Brooke's button-up from their night back on Thursday; She could see the buttons straining, and tidbits of Brooke's succulent flesh poking through.

Hannah wondered: Did she truly hate brooke as her brain tried to convince her? Or was it just petty jealousy.

These thoughts she pondered while she dug through her mountain of fries and chicken strips. A procession of 'Pops' rang from Brooke's table, as the girl stared down at her malfunction. Brooke attempted to get up, but her large, stuffed behemoth belly wedged her into the booth, and her Boyfriend was gone.

Hannah's brain processed this. Did she truly want to see her old friend humiliated and hurt, just because she got the guy of any girl's dreams?

Mentally, she answered...
115332222222211111.title: Transitions.

choices: The next night, at the food court..
One month later...
1153322222222111111.content:
Hannah got up. "Omigod, Brooke, are you okay?" Brooke grunted. "Yeah..This booth's just...Too damn small. Urgh!" Hannah reached in, gripping the gut of brooke, soft and doughy, rippling with the blubbery girl's attempts to rip herself free of the booth. Hannah gripped the back of the girl. She shoved in Brooke's gut and began pulling on her back at the same time, helping her out of the booth. Brooke panted, her massive gut and extended rack heaving and rising, until she slowed her breathing to normal.

"Thanks Hannah." She wiped at her eyes. "What's wrong?" asked Hannah.

Brooke sniffled and spoke. "The bank said that...That..*Sniffle*... I was getting too costly...For their health coverage...And they fired me....*Sniffle* *Sniffle* I can't believe I've gotten so fat..*Sniffle*..That I can't hold down a job.." She began crying, and Hannah patted her on the back. "Brookie, Relax. It'll be alright, someone will hire you, you're not even fat, you're just...Pleasantly plump."

Suddenly, Jess jumped up. "Our office offers unlimited health coverage! And You're not even as heavy as me, I'm sure that the office would love to hire you!" Brooke looked up. "R...Really?" Jess nodded. "Mmmhmm! It even provides for whales like Melissa." Melissa nodded and smirked, not even caring about the remark. She had learned to shrug off the weight comments a long time ago.

"It'll really hire...A pig like me?" Brooke said slowly, a tone of sadness mixed with excitement. Courtney spoke. "Of course. I mean, if you're a pig, then call me a Blue Whale." Brooke spoke. "Then...Then I guess I'll apply.."

Hannah enjoyed the rest of her meal and then enjoyed the rest of her day with the girl. Her abandonment of her healthy lifestyle led to her joining the girls in their constant raids on the break room. Her embracing of the office lifestyle led to greater pleasure within her job. She saw it as a social affair. Another side effect was the pounds long kept back by the diet and exercise started breaking down the dam built up by her years of exercise, and she had begun seeping up the ranks as a heavier girl. She had hit 130 by the end of the week, and her button-up had begun straining to its limit.

Brooke,too, was quickly absorbed into the lifestyle of the office as she got the job the next day, and fit right into the small posse of fatties. Red-headed Jessica took her under her flabby arm especially, allowing her to hang out in her office, officially for 'Cooperation on tasks', but it really turned into a co-feeding time. Brooke seeing a look into her future with rapidly-bloating Jessica, she started following, going from 250 up to 265 by the end of the week.
1153322222222111111.title: A new addition.

choices: "Hannah Lanes, please report to Hilda's office."
"The office is closing early, thank you."
11533222222221111111.content:
Hannah and her blubbery friends waddled into the Food Court at the nearby mall. After a bit of scattering off, each of them had stopped off at their favorite joints; Melissa at the Burger King that stood inside the mall, retrieving her typical 2 bags packed full of the unhealthiest concoctions they had. Brooke at her favorite Italian pizzeria, grabbing what must have been 6 slices and about 3 bread sticks, Jessica joining her, getting a full pizza.
