Courtney got a massive heap of assorted noodles, meats, and soups from the Chinese place in the mall. Hannah visited her favorite Japanese joint in the mall, grabbing several sushi rolls, some hibachi chicken, and some shrimp.

After getting their tray fulls (Or in Jessica's case, pan fulls) Of food, they sat down at their tables. Hannah looked at Jessica. "Someone's hungry." Jessica nodded. "Damn right, I haven't eaten all day, except for about three bags of Cheetos and two mugs of coffee." She dug into the large 28 inch pizza ravenously, each slice taking multiple bites to overwhelm. Courtney slurped up a forkful of noodles and spoke. "So Brooke, how's the experience been so far?" Brooke gobbled up a slice of pizza, and spoke. "Mmm. Good, it's good communing with a few girls about my size." Melissa interjected. "About your size? Hon, we've got about.. What, 200 pounds on you." Brooke chuckled. "Well, if I keep eating this way, I should catch up." She giggled and patted her sizable tummy. Hannah spoke. "You think you have catching up to do, I've got to power eat to get up to you guys' weights." Brooke spoke. "Yeah. It'll be kinda hard with all that goody-two-shoes dieting and exercise you do." Hannah waved her hand and shook her head. "Nah. I don't do that anymore. I realized it didn't get me anywhere, really." Jess spoke. "Well, good to see that you've started on the road. But you've got a lil' while to go."

After the friends finished gorging themselves on their lunch, they hurried back to the office and, discovering that they had next-to-no work for the rest of the day, decided to meet up in the break room. And with the social gathering came the titanic amounts of food; An econo-sized pack of Cheetos, three family bags of chips, and a huge box of cookies. Courtney was beat from her Chinese feast earlier, and only occasionally grazed, but Hannah, Brooke, Melissa, and Jess split up each snack; Brooke took the cheetos, Melissa and Jess tag-teamed the cookies, and Hannah gorged on the chips.

As the feast finished, Hannah leaned back into her chair, beat by the serving of chips intended for a family. And then it happened; Two buttons popped off her shirt, exposing the top of her stomach, now extended by the gorging.

Melissa smirked and spoke. "Well, looks like our little Hannah just hit a Milestone. Congrats! UUUUURP!"

Hannah looked, chuckling and speaking. "Heheh, thanks...Guess I got a lil' carried away."

She stared at the popped buttons. In this moment, her subconscious' plans had been exposed, and this brought her to think. Am I actually trying to gain weight?
As she saw the looks of the other stuffed girls, a few other buttons joined hers in popping: Jessica's for sure, and Brooke as well.

You know what? Why not. I've starved myself my whole life, and now's my chance to relax a little.


Suddenly, over the loudspeaker, came...
11533222222221111111.title: Friendship means Indulgence.

choices: Epic pizza feast!
a month later...
115332222222211111112.content:
“The office will be closing at 3:30 today. I repeat, the office will be closing early, at 3:30 today… Thank you.” The loudspeaker shut off. All the girls in the break room looked around in excitement.

“That’s only in an hour!” Hannah exclaimed. The room burst into celebration and giddiness.

“Well in that case I’ve got some things to finish up at my desk.” Courtney said as she left the break room. “Yeah, I do to.” Melissa said as she and a few others exited. Just Hannah, Brooke, and Jessica were left sitting in the break room.

“Wow this is going to be great… off work at 3:30.” Hannah said.

“Hey how about after work we go to my house and order pizza?” Jessica proposed.

“That sounds awesome! I already feel a bit hungry again.” Brooke said.

“Yeah I’m up for that.” Hannah said.

They all went back to their desks where they digested the heavy meals they had for lunch. They then met back up at 3:30 where they drove to Jessica’s house. They decided to stop by Mcdonald’s first where they picked up three big bags of burgers and fries.

The chubby trio entered Jessica’s living room, still making their way through the greasy bags of fast food. The bulging bellies (varying in size) of the three women were poking out of their shirts as their missing buttons had caused their tops to hang open to reveal parts of their midsections. They sat down in Jessica’s living room and continues shoving burgers and fries down their throats.

“Sho I’ll *gulp* I’ll call the *slurp* pizza place.” Brooke said through a mouthful of food.

“Order from *munch* Gino’s. Besht pisha *swallow* in town.” Jessica said. Brooke dialed Gino’s pizza.

“What do you guys want?” Brooke asked Hannah and Jess.

“I want a whole meat lover’s pie.” Hannah said. That was a lot more than she usually ordered but she was throwing out any sense of restraint. Something about hanging around with her flabby friends encouraged all of them to be as gluttonous as possible. Besides, anything Hannah couldn’t finish would happily be eaten by Jessica or Brooke.

“One plain pie… One pepperoni pie, and do you wanna split another meat lover’s?” Jessica asked. Brooke nodded and repeated it into the phone. SHe also ordered another pie for herself.

“It’ll be here in 30ish minutes.” Brooke said as she put down her phone.

“Better finish up these burgers then.” Hannah said. Lacking the gorging skills of Brooke and Jessica, she still had a ways to go with her large order of Mcdonalds. She had a burger in each hand, alternating bites from each burger. It felt weird, eating so rapidly. She wasn’t experienced with stuffing her face so ferociously. She could barely keep up with amount of food she was shoving past her lips. Hannah managed though to get in a groove that let her get through the burgers at such a voracious pace. She had reached a level of eating focus that she had never experienced before but she had seen it many times eating with Jessica and her other large friends.

Hannah happily licked her fingers as she finished the last handful of fries left in her bag. DING DONG!

“Oh that must be the pizza!” Jessica said.
115332222222211111112.title: "The office is closing early, thank you."

choices: They would go get outfitted at George's.
They would go back to sleep.
1153322222222111111121.content:
It took a second before anyone could raise their blubbery rears to get up to actually retrieve the pizza. Of course, it was Hannah. She got to the door and opened it, taking the money. Before her stood a pizza boy in the doorway, somewhat burdened by the pizza stack he heaved over to the slender-ish woman.

"Here's your pizzas, ma'am. Enjoy."

Hannah ravenously picked up the pizzas and shut the door. It was not like her to be so rude, but in her mad dash to fatten herself, she didn't care in any way, shape, nor form. She just wanted the food. She set the arrays of pizza down, her meat lovers before her, and the 4 pizzas before the whale-like redhead and the blubbery blonde to her right on the couch.

Hannah looked at the amount of food before her. A few short months ago, if she saw this, she'd spray holy water all over it and grab all her nearest Richard Simmons tapes, and put herself on a crash diet for even smelling it.

And now she was diving in.

She alternated between biting into a big slice of the huge, deliciously greasy pizza laden with pepperoni, sausage, salami, and Hamburger meat, and jamming a fistful of fries down her throat. She had shifted her athletic talents of the past into her eating, as Brooke and Jessica hogged on the pizzas, dual wielding slices and biting with voracious aptitude into the gargantuan slices, and gobbling down the straggling remnants of the fries in their bags. Jessica was, of course, the most apt at this, eating like a champion, going through the record-breaking slices in mere half-minutes. By some miracle, possibly because the stress was being relieved elsewhere, her remaining buttons were holding.

Brooke was trailing in second, also gobbling down the slices with a ferocious attempt to get them packed into her stomach. Hannah, feeling inadequate, stepped up her eating pace, now at about 3/4ths of the way done through her McDonalds, and 1/4th done with her pizza. All mouths were consuming like reverse machine guns, all had gotten to the point where they no longer ate the food, they simply consumed it, eating to get through, the taste of the pizza itself almost erotic in nature, but the eating itself seeming like the pathway to heaven.

It only took until about 6 to complete the massive feast, all beauties sat back on the couch. They had defeated the massive meal, surmounted the mountain of calorie-laden food, and the bloated, blubbery battlers had their battle-scars strewn about their bodies: Tomato sauce stains down their shirts, a few pieces of crust and ketchup from the burgers and fries laying about. Hannah finished her last burger, and as she finished, that had to have done it. Not only did buttons pop off her shirt and careen towards the wall opposite her, but her airtight shirt had torn in several places. Brooke lay strewn on the groaning arm of the couch, in her bra and panties, as her pants had become choking quite a bit ago, and her shirt lay in a heap near it, torn and ripped like battle armor after a long day. Jessica's shirt had literally fallen to shreds after her gorging, and her pants had burst, all ladies, excluding Hannah, lay half-naked on the couch, and Hannah's pants seemed as though they would go as well at any moment.

After a little bit, all woke up, returning to sipping the dregs of their remaining McDonalds. They saw the clock, as it flashed 7:00. They thought perhaps to get an early rest, and to go back to sleep on the couch. But they all knew they needed some clothes for work the next day. Eventually, it was decided that...
1153322222222111111121.title: Second Lunch crosses over into Supper.

choices: They Celebrate the new clothes with more eating! (Jessica ignores her gains.)
Jessica starts worrying about her weight, slowing her gains.
11533222222221111111211.content:
As the gang groggily awoke, Hannah looked over. "Woah...*Urp*...Looks like you guys did some serious work on your clothes." Brooke spoke in reply. "Yeah, we got work tomorrow too, crap..." The two simply giggled in piggish delight. Jess spoke, sweating like a hog, her second chin highly evident as she sat back on her couch seat, her sweat-drowned stomach just two or three inches from her knees. "Uuuughh....What about...George's....place..."

Brooke spoke "George?" Jess took a gasp and a huff, and wiped her sweating fore head. "George's place...*pant* He tailors to..*huff* to big girls like us..*wheeze*...I've had to...*huff*...visit him..*wheeze*..three times..*gasp*..in the past month..*wheeze*...He's really good.." Hannah nodded. "Yeah. But, uh...Got anything to fit us in here?"

Jessica nodded, wheezing and gasping in near-asthmatic volumes. "Yeah...*wheeze*...Look in...*Pant*...The Closet..*Wheeze*"

After borrowing some of Jessica's old clothes, the girls, once Jessica had gotten a drink and rested up a bit more, and went to the tailor's shop just across the closed office building.

"Ladieees!" shouted the thin, short, black-haired man. "How are my favorite girls doing?" "Just fine, George. We went gorging tonight and we need some new work clothes. George spoke. "Okay, let's get started! Ooh, looks like you brought some new gals! What's your names?" Hannah smiled and spoke. "I'm hannah." Brooke spoke. "And I'm Brooke." George smiled. "Well, who'll go first?" Hannah replied, "Uh, how about Jess?" Brooke agreed, saying "Sure, you go next, Jess." The whale-like redhead waddled up. George moved the tape measure around her wide, expansive belly, the measure going about 75 inches around. "So how'd all this happen, honey? Don't spare me the dirty details!" Jess replied as George slid the tape measure around Jess' lardy arm.

"Well, it started with going home from work early. We celebrated by eating lunch...For the second time of the day...With two pizzas for me and brooke here. Hannah skimped and only got one. And in the process, we bust out of our shirts, and our pants burst." George nodded at the story. "Mmm. Sounds sinfully good, I'd burst out of this shirt if I could eat like that, but if I ripped this shirt, I think i'd die." Jess slipped off her pants as the tailor measured her thick, rolling thighs and legs. George spoke.

"And you know the drill, Jess. Ya don't have to look, but I got to have a weigh-in so I can know when to have the next set ready." Jessica nodded and waddled over to the scale, standing on it. The number flashed up to 395.68, which the tailor wrote down. Jessica, out of curiosity, bent over her belly to peek, and gawked at the number. "Geez! I'm almost 400." She stepped off as George spoke. "I'll be right back with your clothes dear!" George hurried back into his office and came out with a semi-transparent dress shirt without buttons and a set of elastic-waistbanded work pants. Jess slipped them on and with the comfortability of the clothes, she walked back, smiling a bit, but still not exactly delighted over the big number.

Brooke walked up next, anticipating the big number. She knew she wouldn't have such a shock, she'd learned to accept the fact that she'd be fat a long time ago, and now it was just a matter of seeing what would happen next. She got her measurements across her expansive belly, which showed up at about 50 inches. her supple bust, and on her large rear-end, which was prominent along with her stomach. Her weight came up at about 276.35, and she waddled away with another button up, quite a bit more loose than her previous. It promised to hold up for quite a few pounds more, but it'd most likely go as she hit 300, which would doubtless be any day now.

Hannah walked up, not yet waddling as she was still in the 100's. Her measurements brought her stomach up to about 35, and her bust was prominent along with her stomach. Her behind was rather big, but not among the biggest attractions. Her weight came up at about 164.43, and George awarded her a blue button-up, about the size of Brooke's old one, so very loose fitting. It served to Hannah as a new goal to shoot for: Bust these buttons.

Soon, the ladies exited the parlor.
11533222222221111111211.title: Wake Ups and Viewing Progress

choices: Hannah reaches 200 pounds
Hannah likes her new fat.
115332222222211111112111.content:
“Wow this fits perfectly. That man is a wizard!” Brooke said.

“Yeah I told you he’s the best.” Jessica replied

“Do you guys smell that? *Sniff* Smells… oh my god that smells good.” Hannah said.

“Yeah there’s a buffet just around the corner.” Brooke said. Jessica started to rub her belly.

“You gals ready for dinner?” Jessica asked.

“Yeah I think I’ve got enough room.” Brooke said patting the side of her gut. The plump trio went to the buffet and quickly piled up plates of french fries, chicken tenders, etc.

They each dove into their meals with gusto. Despite the somewhat shocking news that she was nearing 400 pounds, Jessica had quickly gotten over the realization and was happily stuffing her face with the fattening foods. She enjoyed food way too much to get concerned over her weight.

Brooke was unfazed by her weight and gorged herself with no restraint as she thought nothing of her fattened up figure. Hannah on the other hand was motivated by her gain. Despite her belly quickly feeling full (her stomach could not handle quit the load that Jessica and Brooke could), she continued to eat, determined to stuff herself with the delicious, unhealthy food.

Hannah was the first to give up after her 4th plate. A bit later Brooke gave up and quickly Jess gave up too. The three women were happy to see their new clothes still completely intact. Although there were quite a few stains and crumbs on them.
115332222222211111112111.title: buffet dinner

choices: Hannah can't control herself-She gorges on the ice cream.
Hannah's able to hold herself back from gorging until the Thanksgiving meal.
1153322222222111111121111.content:
The month closed up after a few weeks of gorging. By the first week of the next month, Hannah had finally hit the big 200. It didn't hurt her gain that she sat mostly in the break room, and she started even exceeding Jessica in her gorging. As she hit 200, she developed a form of training that had thrown her into Binge Eating by the end of the month.

The christmas tree stood alight with ornaments and decoration in the office lobby, even though november had set in, it was that time of the year when you could count on the weather being cold. And in the New England weather, winter certainly came early. Hannah, with her extra pounds, came in with a medium coat, not cold by any sense of the word, as her fat and coat gave her plenty of warmth.

She remembered the first winter she stayed here after she moved from South Carolina; She wasn't ready, being from naturally hot regions, winter came later than it did here. But now she was ready for the cold, especially suited to it now that she had an extra coat of fat. Thanksgiving was just around the corner, and for that, she was thankful. It meant a trip down south, and this was her last workday here before taking the few days off and then the weekend.

The building was actually closed to business, it was just a tradition for the day before thanksgiving break, for everyone to pig out together before they went to their families to pig out as well. Hannah was well stocked for the feast: She brought a suitcase full of snacks and a fast food bag, setting them down on the break room table. She was just about dead as she finished hauling the massive load of food over to the table. First she set down the gargantuan bag of food, stacked with about 5 or 6 servings of Hotcakes with sausage, Sausage biscuits, Bacon biscuits, Egg and Cheese biscuits, and 3 orders of Hash Browns. She dove into them, eating them without problem. After she finished the massive stuffing meal of over 5000 calories, she didn't even wait to dig into the massive pack of 10 cheetos. She ate through them right to lunch, until the girls took her out to an Italian restaurant where she ate about 5-6 plates of Alfredo Pasta. Afterwards, she returned to her suitcase and kept eating right on to lunch, scarfing down a massive amount of Lays Potato Chips bags until Supper, which she spent gorging with Brooke, Melissa, and Jessica at a Steakhouse. As the night of gorging finished, Hannah, her clothes and things pre-packed, boarded her plane to South Carolina and the flight continued. She sled asleep in her seat as the plane flew by in the whirring stillness of the night.

As the morning came up over Rock Hill, South Carolina, the bundles of pine forests and leafy trees, still bearing orange and red-hued leaves. The trees gave Hannah a comfort, a reminder of her days as a child, bringing back some of the best memories. Eating strawberries in the forest in picnics, dates with Evan before distance and lack of interest on both ends had broken them up, She exited the massive plane and looked out. There in the distance was her mother; A rather heavy woman herself, with about 50 pounds on Hannah. Her blonde had faded as her old age advanced, and only a few tinges remained in the advancing grey. "Hannah!" Hannah extended her arms, wrapping them around what she could of her mother. "Ah, Hannah, it's great to see ya!" Hannah patted her mother on the back. "Good to see you too ma!" The two heavier women started waddling back to her mother's car. Her mother eyed her body. "So, I see you've changed a bit, Hannah." Hannah nodded. "Yep. I gave up the whole 'health kick' thing, and with the crowd at the office being full of bigger girls, and, well.." She waved her hands over her enlarged body. "Heck, let's call a hat and hat and say that I got fat." Her mother nodded, chuckling. "I told ya you couldn't stave it off forever. Female side has a history of gettin' fat." The car ride was ridden with tales of her misadventures with the girls, the office work, funny stories about different Co-Workers.

Eventually she arrived at the house out in the country, near some to-be-harvested cotton fields, dotting the landscape near her house like a field of clouds, not to mention the vast acres of soy her mother'd driven by. She arrived at the moderately sized house, ringed by woods. She entered the house to the greeting of multiple family members, whom she'd shared her stories with. Of course, there came the whispers she couldn't hear amidst conversation.

"Lord, she butterballed up. I remember her being a lot slimmer than that."

"Good god, how did she get so fat?

"Ohp, looks like the Female McKinney curse hit Hannah."

She picked out her favorite spot: A bed close to the ground, strong and wide, in one of the front rooms facing the road. As night fell, and all fell asleep, Hannah's stomach roared in dissatisfaction in the fact that it was not being glutted with a trove of food. Hannah tried to stave it off, trying to think about it. The dilemma puzzled her, but...
1153322222222111111121111.title: Holiday time!

choices: Nobody discovered Hannah's gorging, and the Thanksgiving feast commenced.
Someone discovers the evidence of her ice cream splurge.
11533222222221111111211111.content:
Hannah got up, tiptoeing and trying not to make too loud a noise as she tiptoed past the guest bedrooms and finally through the living room, and into the nearby dining room/kitchen. It had a vast number of tables and chairs, with a large table. She knew exactly where the Ice Cream was, but oddly enough, she found some set out on top of the freezer. She saw a note laying on top of the vast, white, square freezer beside the ice cream, and she realized it as being written in her mother's writing.
"Dear Hannah-
If you're anything like me, I know for a fact that you're starving. Happy Thanksgiving!"-Mama"

Hannah grinned like mad. Her mother even had the courtesy of buying her favorite flavor: Orange Sherbet. Hannah quietly grabbed a spoon and sat down at the table, and gorged like a woman gone mad on the gallon of rich, orange deliciousness. She didn't moan, but she constantly gave looks of satisfied, porky greed at the Ice Cream.

As she finished, the Ice cream slid down her gullet, but her stomach growled for more. It didn't occur to her that she would be depriving some of the kids from Ice Cream, she simply dove into the freezer as sneaky as the piggish blonde could, and fetched another gallon of the Orange Sherbet. She dove through it, eating through it like a woman gone mad, as though she depended on ice cream instead of air.

As she finished, her stomach kept growling, the Pavlovian response bred in: If it growled, it would recieve food, and frankly, it simply wanted more food for the sake of eating. Hannah ate through the entire freezer's worth of ice cream and, realizing the evidence'd be discovered, went to her suitcase, unzipped it, and took out a few gallons she'd not gone through at the office, and re-froze them. She brought them to the freezer, put them in, and got back to bed, and fell soundly asleep.

The morning came early, as the smell of fresh-brewed coffee rolled through the house. Nobody checked the freezer; Everything had gone as planned for Hannah, as she got a mug of the strong coffee and sat with her relatives who relished in the strong, black brew.

As 12:00 Approached..
11533222222221111111211111.title: Midnight "snack"

choices: Hannah spends a couple more days with her family
Skip to Hannah's Christmas break
115332222222211111112111111.content:
Hannah was very relieved as her family was completely oblivious to her ice cream binge from last night. She could now safely wait to enjoy an enormous thanksgiving feast with her family. Although she found that to not be any easier for her. Her belly rumbled and begged as it was so unfairly teased by the delicious smells emanating from the kitchen.

Her mother really knew how to cook (her flabby figure was evidence of her vast cooking experience), so Hannah was very pleased to hear her mom would be in charge of preparing this years feast.

Hannah clutched her plump belly which was aching from its emptiness. She so desperately wanted to go to the fridge and grab a snack, anything to deal with her hunger, but she knew it would pay off if she waited until food was served. Her mom said it would only be a few more minutes anyway. Although every minute seemed to last an eternity as she waited along with her many aunts uncles and cousins.

Finally her mother announced that thanksgiving dinner (or late lunch really) was served. Everyone rushed into the dining room and took their seats. Hannah’s grandmother made sure grace was said before the eating commenced, much to everyone’s (Hannah’s especially) frustration. Eventually though there was nothing that could delay the feast and a gravy covered frenzy occurred as everyone piled food onto their plate. None moved quite as fast as Hannah though, who felt like she might die if she didn’t put something in her groaning gut. She had made a mountain of food on her plate.

The last few weeks of gorging with her friends had prepared her well for this moment. Even if she was still nowhere as big as Jessica, Melissa, or even her Mom, she had learned to eat as well as any of them. She ate so much her bloated tummy started to rub against the table. Her sweater was pushed up her belly revealing her deep navel. She pulled her skirt down to let her gut have more room as it sat on her thighs.

Many plates later Hannah finally stopped. Pretty much everyone had stopped eating a while ago, except her mom. Some had even left the table. Hannah licked her gravy covered lips and let out a loud burp.

“Hannah *gulp* don’t do that at the *munch* table.” Her mother said through a mouthful of food.

“Oh it’s thanksgiving. That’s just a sign of a good meal.” Hannah’s uncle Jim said. Everyone at the table chuckled, except for Hannah. She sat back massaging her partially naked belly. The only sounds coming out of her mouth were burps and moans as she eased her stuffed gut.
115332222222211111112111111.title: Feast!

choices: The food, they pig out.
The games, they have a little fun.
1153322222222111111121111112.content:
The period between christmas break and thanksgiving break was filled with gorging in the break room. Her binging steadily increased, as she joined Jessica. In the period between the two breaks, Jessica, Brooke and Hannah teamed up to especially pack on the pounds. Jessica had hit 450 by the beginning of the break, as Brooke had broken 300 and hit 320, and Hannah had shot up beyond expectations, hitting 280 by christmas break, shooting up behind Brooke, her binge eating acting like rocket fuel propelling her gains.

The annual Christmas Party had come around on the beginning of Christmas Break, and the whale-like women waddled in. Red-headed Jessica's belly swelled like an over-bloated exercise ball had been jammed on top of an already-chubby belly, with breasts to match and a buttocks to prop it all up. Brooke's weight had gone to a similar area, and she looked like a shorter-haired, blonde Jessica. Hannah looked like a longer-haired brooke from about right after thanksgiving break. Her old buttons had long since been popped and ripped, and she'd made George a pretty penny before she got this new one. There was something deep inside that turned her on about being out-of-breath and snapping these buttons with her blubber. It made her feel big, like a destructive godzilla-like monster. The destruction of the clothing through her rapid, blubbery expansion gave her great delight and she'd find herself leaning back in her chair often leaning back trying, intentionally, to pop the buttons, making her feel like her own goddess of destruction.

The christmas trees sat around, all emblazoned with the sentimental feeling and lights all abound with the typical red and green lights, the tacky, replayed christmas music coming over the loudspeakers in the large meeting room. The three waddled in, and near the corner there was a grouping of seats, all triple-strength to hold women of their weights. The women all set their things down at the table, Brooke wearing a long, shimmery blue dress that showed off her curved, bulging belly. Jessica wore a long white dress, also showing off her curves. Hannah wore a similar garment, hers being black. Once the women had set their things down, they looked at the array of activities. There was Guitar Hero, Xbox games, and of course, there was the food. They looked on it all and decided...
1153322222222111111121111112.title: Christmas time at the office.

choices: Hannah spends her holiday off time eating
Hannah, Brooke, and Jessica hang out on one of their days off
11533222222221111111211111121.content:
“Man that food looks good.” Brooke said, licking her lips.

“Yeah we better get to it before it’s all gone.” Jessica said. There were quite a few heavy heifers already gathering around the food spread, but there wasn’t really any threat of it running out. The office always went the extra mile with food for these office parties. It wasn’t particularly surprising given how many obese women populated the Gordge offices.

Anyway Hannah, Brooke and Jessica all made their way to the long line of tables covered in food. They weren’t the only ones with their appetites on their mind. Courtney, Melissa, Vanessa, and Jenna were already piling food atop their plates. Looking at the enormous amount of delicious food, Hannah knew they had made the right decision. She bit her lip as she felt an almost sexual pleasure from the thought of how much she was going to eat.

Several local restaurants were catering the event allowing for Hannah to create the most heavenly combinations of delicious (and fattening) foods. The party quickly became a gorging session for the largest and most gluttonous employees of the office.

Hannah grabbed a piece of fried chicken with one hand and a slice of pizza with the other as she continued to stuff her face. Her taste buds were overwhelmed by all the mouthwatering flavors she was biting into. She added a whole new kind of pleasure to her eating as with every plate Hannah tried to come up with a different combination. French fries in my spaghetti? Why not?... Should I put cheese on my hot dog? Ooh, how about mac and cheese on a hot dog… Who needs burger buns when I can just use two jelly doughnuts? I should be working for Dunkin Donuts.

Next to Hannah, Brooke and Jessica also gorged themselves silly. Their bellies growing bellies pressed tightly against their dresses. Towards the end of the party their incredible devouring had slowed down as they were finally starting to feel full. Hannah had stopped a few minutes before. She leaned back in her groaning chair, rubbing her painfully full belly. She was pretty uncomfortable as her packed stomach tried to digest the greasy contents of her feast, but she didn’t regret it as her face was flushed and her eyes glazed over from the awesome pleasure of the delectable stuffing session. Jessica finally stopped and pushed her empty plate away. The 400+ pound blimp of a woman backed up her chair to stop her enormous belly from rubbing against the edge of the table.

Brooke was still going though. She was really outdoing herself with the incredible amount of food she was packing away.

“Wow, *burp* don’t hurt yourself there, Brooke.” Hannah joked watching her friend gorge herself. Brooke’s belly was incredibly bloated. There were small creaking a tearing sounds coming from her tight dress.

“Haha *urrp* What am I *munch* going to do, pop?” Brooke joked. Just then her dress burst apart as her belly ripped right through the fabric. There was an almost perfect whole in the dress where her enormous gut surged out of, spreading freely over her thighs.

Brooke blushed with embarrassment, but decided to just keep eating instead.
11533222222221111111211111121.title: Party Pig Out

choices: Jessica's chair snapped under the pressure, sending the whale careening down.
Hannah's chair gives, sending her spiralling down.
115332222222211111112111111212.content:
The chilly new england night sent many of the thinner girls running for the cozy indoors, however it troubled not the natural-coated fat forms of Brooke, Hannah and Jessica. They nabbed a seat close to the kitchen, a table. The girls knew better, all of them 300+ pounds, than to sit in a cramped booth and force the workers to have to yank them out. They sat in their chairs, and for a bit, there was silence.

After their drinks were ordered: Almost all cokes, Jessica was the first to break the silence. "How's your break been, Han?" Hannah giggled and replied. "Fattening." Brooke and Jessica chortled, making their expansive stomachs roll. "Same here." spoke Brooke.

It certainly was true; The girls had been packing on the pounds. Brooke had hit 350 in the week following, Jessica had hit 480, and Hannah had busted the big 300, landing on 310. Hannah spoke. "Yeah, and I have to say, I've been happier since I've gotten off my Health kick and gotten on my Fat kick. Though getting out of breath doesn't exactly make me bounce with joy." Brooke nodded. "Bigger is Better, mama always said it, always adhered to it. I remember when I tried to lose weight inbetween dance team seasons back in sophomore year summer. I ended up hating it and just dropping it."

The conversation carried on well until the women saw their delights coming: Brooke ordered an entire personal pizza and a group serving of Shrimp Mozambique. Jess ordered TWO personal pizzas, with a plate of simple spaghetti, with sauce and meatballs. Hannah ordered two group servings of Fettucine Alfredo, drenched in decadent cheese sauce. The blubbery women dug into the meal, ripping the noodles and pizzas apart, alternating them for sips of their drink.

The meal carried on for the next hour, and our ladies' bellies had teased the table. The women were still not done, barely half finished with their massive portions. That was one thing they liked: The big portions for the big people. It was no secret that La Bellisima catered to larger clients, as almost exclusively everyone eating there was either an athlete on a carb load, or the obese. The women exhaustingly ate through their plates: Jessica was damn near dead from the effort she put into the feast. Brooke was sweating as though she were back in Dance team practice. Hannah was starting to sweat considerably, but nowhere near the amounts of raining sweat that Brooke and especially Jessica were putting into eating.

As the battle with the food ended and our plump Valkyries emerged victorious over the food, their bellies stuffed, they heard the groan of one of their metal chairs...
115332222222211111112111111212.title: Chilly night for our Blubbery Babes.

choices: Jessica wants to lose weight
Hannah really likes her fat
1153322222222111111121111112121.content:
Jessica leaned further back in her seat to give her bulging and bloated belly some more room in her lap. As she struggled to shift her massive body the creaking sound from her chair intensified. Suddenly the legs gave out sending Jess’s incredible blubber crashing to the floor. The obese whale yelped as her enormously round bottom hit the ground with a thud. The room seemed to shake as the almost 500 pound woman was grounded.

Most of the restaurant looked over at the loud commotion caused by the beached whale. Hannah and Brooke would’ve gotten up to help their friend if their bellies weren’t so full and sensitive. Brooke halfheartedly tried to get out of her chair but couldn’t handle the discomfort of moving her packed tummy.

Jessica lay on her back, her enormous gut sticking up in the air like a doughy dome. A few of the waiters rushed over to help. Two of them grabbed Jessica and lifted her up. It took a few tries but slowly Jess’s obese blubber was on her feet. Another waiter brought over another chair. This chair was specially made for the largest customers at La Bellisima, with a wide seat and much sturdier legs. Jessica was guided onto the extra padded seat. She was breathing heavily and sweating from embarrassment and exhaustion.

“So who *burp* wants dessert?” Hannah said.
1153322222222111111121111112121.title: Jessica's chair snapped

choices: The trainer examines Jessica's diet.
Actually, what's going on with Brooke and Hannah?
11533222222221111111211111121211.content:
As the obese trio exited the restaurant, Jessica's sweaty face was extremely worried. Brooke looked over and felt compelled to speak on the matter.

"Uh, Jess...You okay?" Jessica shook her head. "No.. No I'm not... I feel so embarassed, I haven't broken a chair before. I know I've been putting on weight, but I don't think I've been getting that fat. And my doc told me I'm morbidly obese.."

Brooke waved her hand, as to almost try to swat down the invisible stream of worries. "Pshh. Those quacks don't know their hind-ends from a hole in the ground. Jessica spoke. "Yeah, but my grandma and my momma died of a heart attack. My doctor says that if I don't drop some of these pounds soon, I'm going down the same road, I'm really scared about that, he said that I'm at high risk even being 40 BMI. My last check up, I was 73 BMI, he says that I need to start soon, or he estimates about, like, a month before..."

Brooke hugged her. "Honey, honey, calm down. She's being overdramatic. But if you're really that convinced, then I know a gym I used to go to when I cared about being in shape." Jess nodded. Her fears were calmed by the embrace of a friend as the blubbery trio entered the car and Hannah began moving to the driver's seat. Brooke spoke. "Well if your doctor thought your lifespan was short before, it's about to get even shorter." Hannah turned and spoke. "Shut up, your belly rubs against the wheel." Brooke spoke. "I still drive better." Hannah jokingly threw the receipt at Brooke.

The trio drove home to Jess' house. While the embarrassed redheaded whale waddled off to bed. Hannah and Brooke relaxed and watched some T.V for a bit, gorged on some Ice Cream, and drove back home.

The morning light shone through the wide, expansive windows of the gym. A man in a tank top and in
"Quite some damage." the instructor said. "Well, that's just fine, 480 pounds. I've helped out people with worse weights."

The muscular blonde man raised an eyebrow. "Not trying to criticize you, but at this point, most women give up. What's got you here?" Jessica nodded. "Well, I broke a chair at La Bellisima, and the day prior, I got a health checkup and found out my BMI was 73 and within about a month, if I don't change my diet or exercise, doc's predicting a heart attack."

The muscular man nodded. "Hmm. So, what's your daily exercise routine?" Jessica nodded and chuckled. "Uh....Does 'Nothing' Constitute an answer?" The trainer chuckled. "Uh huh, well, that's changing. We'll do our standard evaluation. Lay down on that mat for me, Jessica." The whale-like redhead laid down on the large blue mat. The trainer spoke. "Start doing some crunches."

The obese redhead gripped the back of her head, and began doing it. The first three were effortless, but after this, she began encountering some resistance. She got out of breath at about 8, and she absolutely stopped as her determination gave out at about 14. She laid out on the mat, gasping for breath. The trainer spoke, getting his water bottle and giving some to the fat woman. "Okay, so your exercise tolerance is very low. We'll work on that." Jessica felt like shit, but she felt like progress was coming.
11533222222221111111211111121211.title: Jessica's Weighty Worries

choices: Jessica tries to diet
Hannah gets stuck in her chair
115332222222211111112111111212112.content:
Hannah picked up Brooke from her apartment. Christmas had passed the day before and the end of their vacation was nearing. The two friends figured they would spend one of their last days off relaxing together.

Brooke squeezed her enormous gut into Hannah’s car.

“Did Jessica respond?” She asked Hannah.

“No she’s going to the gym again. She’s really sticking with this weight loss thing.” Hannah responded.

“Well more eating for us I guess. Let’s get drive thru before your place.” Brooke said.

They stopped at several fast food drive thru’s on their way to Hannah’s apartment, accumulating quite the greasy feast. They grabbed their food and waddled into Hannah’s place. Dropping their stuff on the coffee table they both sat in her living room.

“So how was your Christmas?” Hannah asked.

“Good. Went to my parents’ house. I pigged out sooooo much.” Brooke said grabbing her gut.

“Yeah I was all by myself for Christmas eve. Still got some good presents though.” Hannah said.

“Oh yeah what’d you get?”

She gave her pants a tug. “These babies. My mom sent them to me. They’re the most comfortable lounge pants ever.” Hannah said. The stretchy lounge pants fit loosely on Hannah’s bulging bottom and thick thighs. Hannah’s Mom definitely was predicting the future with just how large a size she ordered for her ballooning daughter. Hannah had plenty of room in the large stretchy waistband (something all of her current wardrobe lacked). “These are going to be my new fat pants for a while.”

“Aren’t all your pants technically fat pants now?” Brooke joked.

“Hey… haha I guess that’s kind of true.”

“Yeah you’ve really been putting that belly to work recently. No more skinny Hannah.” Brooke teasingly poked Hannah’s plump stomach fat.

“I like it better this way. I wouldn’t change my body at all, well except for adding even more to it. Speaking of which lets dig in.” Hannah said as they started eating their fast food. Hannah loved her new state of fatness. She had found completely new and unique pleasures in stuffing her belly and watching her flabby body grow. All the delicious food she consumed daily, watching buttons pop and clothes tear, it was all part of Hannah’s new favorite hobby.

Brooke worked her way through a bucket of KFC while Hannah alternated bites from the burgers she held in each hand

A few hours and two pizza and Chinese food deliveries later and Hannah and Brooke were stuffed. Hannah clutched her swollen gut in her hands.

“haha I *burp* look soooo fat.” Hannah moaned with pleasure, feeling just how full and bloated her middle was.

“Just think right now Jess is probably doing sit ups and torturing herself on the treadmill.” Brooke said.

Hannah licked her fingers and purred. “I’m glad we’re *burp* doing this instead.”
115332222222211111112111111212112.title: Hannah and Brooke's final days off

choices: Her willpower gives out: She digs into the cake right then and there.
Her willpower holds: She puts it into the refrigerator.
1153322222222111111121111112121121.content:
While Hannah and Brooke gorged like it was their last day on Earth, Jessica ate lunch.

The sweat-laden fat woman had recieved specific instructions from her trainer on that first day, and she had just finished a satisfying workout. The trainer had her slowly build up her cardio endurance and it felt like a kind of sweet purgation, disregarding the pain and the burning she experienced. She'd lost about 3 pounds so far, and she was trying to stick to it. She ate a small lunch: Salad and a sandwich, with a diet coke.

It was a good enough meal, but at that moment, the memories of the sweet, succulent, fattening meals from before rushed in. She tried to shake her head and rid herself of the sinfully delectable treats she had consumed. She repeated to herself mentally that she was getting healthy now, and that once she'd dropped some weight, she could MAYBE come back to the treats.

She kept eating through her lunch, delighted. As she finished it, her doorbell rang. She went to open it, and outside sat a box with a note. She picked it up, shut the door from the charging cold before it could batter through the open space, and she set the note aside. First, she opened the box.

She was assaulted with the amazing smell of a hot, chocolate lava cake, with creamy, thick chocolate sauce in the middle of the round, chocolate treat. It was heaven but hell for the fat woman. Heaven in the sights and smells, but hell in that she couldn't have it. The note sat on the side. "Hey Jess! We know you're on the whole diet thing but we thought we'd let you have your cheat day today! Haha love ya! -brooke & hannah"

The two lardy women drove away from their ding-dong-ditch of cake. The already-stuffed blondes conversed. Brooke opened up the Conversation. "I feel so naughty for trying to get Jessica to get off her diet, kinda like we're pulling a prank." Hannah nodded. "Oh, you don't know the half of it yet. If this cake doesn't batter down her willpower, when we get back to work on Monday, I'm going to piledrive her "diet" phase into the dust." Brooke chuckled in recognition. "That'll be fun."

At the house, Jessica held the box aloft as she walked to the kitchen with it. She stared at the treat, almost calling her name as to say "You do not need your diet...You just need me..." But she tried to shake off the warnings. She had to prove to herself she wasn't just an eating machine who did nothing but eat and get fatter, eat and get fatter, eat and get fatter. She had to prove to herself she had some form of control over what she ate, over her life, over her weight. From an early age her appetite had gotten the better of her constantly. She had occasionally thought of diets and exercise, but only stuck to them for one or two days. But the siren call of the fattening, sinful, almost seemingly deadly cake called to her. It was an anathema but a lure, a hatred but a love, two warring sides of her body in her. Her willpower was straining at this point, remindingly like her chair that had snapped last week. Eventually..
1153322222222111111121111112121121.title: Adventures in healthy living.

choices: They return to work, everyone discusses their break
Jessica indulges herself once again.
11533222222221111111211111121211211.content:
Jessica stared at the cake on her kitchen counter. I really don’t need to eat that. You’ve done so well exercising and everything… you ate a damn salad for lunch! You can keep yourself from eating this cake. She told herself.

She looked down realizing that she had subconsciously retrieved a fork and was about an inch away from stabbing it into the moist cake. She dropped the fork and backed away. Just walk away, she thought.

Leaving the kitchen, Jessica’s enormous flabby belly grumbled. That damn salad and sandwich could not calm her beastly appetite. Jessica tried to get her focus off of her aching hunger. It didn’t help that she could smell the delicious chocolate treat from her living room.

About 2 minutes later Jessica’s blubbery enormity came waddling into the kitchen.

Just this once, she thought, digging a fork into the cake. The sugary concoction was gone in minutes. The starved whale devouring every last crumb. Immediately Jessica was filled with regret.

“It’ll just be this one time.”
11533222222221111111211111121211211.title: Her willpower gives out

choices: "Thanks, Brooke! Thanks hannah!" She digs into the food.
"No thanks, I'm good!" Hannah and Brooke gorge on it instead.
115332222222211111112111111212112111.content:
The bleary morning came in, as the multitudes of women came in, many formerly skinny employees entered with plenty of extra pounds to their frames. Of course, sticking out above them all were Hannah, Brooke, and Jess. The smell of coffee was strong in the air: The lifeblood of the office worker was especially needed on this day after the break, especially to the blimped forms of Hannah and Brooke, both of whom carried their cups in one hand, and their suitcases in the other.

The bloated women proceeded to the elevators, upgraded for excesses of 1,000 pounds. All except for Jessica. She seemed intent on taking the stairs, usually an alien concept to her. The stairs were more surmountable than previously, but they were still a challenge to her nearly 500 pound frame. By not even the finish of the first flight, she was sweating up a storm. But before, one time when the elevators were broken, she had a specific memory of feeling like her lungs would give out by not even the finish of the first flight. She carried her lunch with her: A simple chicken salad. She didn't expect to eat much, as her trainer told her to eat less during the workday, at such a sedentary job.

The poor porky whale had no clue what was to befall her.

Hannah and Brooke proceeded past Jessica, and they spoke to her. "Hey Jess! We heard about the whole diet thing, how's that working?" Jessica huffed her reply. "Oh..*Huff*..It's been..*Wheeze*..Good...ohgod..*Huff*...Thanks for..*Wheeze*..The cake.." Brooke just smiled, and spoke. "Well, we got to get working. See ya at breaktime, Jess!" They proceeded to their offices.

Brooke and Hannah and the rest consumed their usual metric mouth-ton of Cheetos, Pepsi, and Chips. At 10, Hannah and Brooke made the excuse that she got an urgent call from their friend at the gas station, when in reality, she ran out to buy a massive chocolate cake. The thing was as heavy as expected, and thei had gotten back by 12. Perfectly timed, it turned out, as Brooke had gotten back about that time with the three bags of super-sized fries, and the bag of triple cheeseburgers, every bag packed to bursting.

Jessica sat back at her desk, and she took out her chicken salad. She dove into it with the rabid hunger of a dieting fat girl waiting for lunchtime. Which, coincidentally, she was. She finished it in a matter of seconds. She sat back and tried not to think about her stash of snacks. Suddenly, from behind the corner, Brooke's head appeared. "Heeey, Jess! I packed a bunch of food for lunch, but I filled up on snacks and I'll just keep snacking on through the day. I hope you'll like my food!"

Jessica stuttered forth the beginnings of a reply, intending to refuse. "Well, uh, that's nice, and uh, thanks-" She was immediately cut off, Brooke saying "You're welcome!" Brooke began stacking the four bags on top of Jessica's desk. Jessica stared in awe and wonder at the bags of food. At that time, Hannah peered around the corner. "Hey, Jess! I thought I'd bring you something to cheer you up from the workday."

Jessica stared at the mountain of fattening food. The incident of yesterday's failing of willpower came back guiltily to her mind, but the taste of the cake came back as she stared at the new delicious monstrosity of Red Velvet, splayed out before her behind the wall of bags. The war raged in her mind, until eventually, she said..
115332222222211111112111111212112111.title: The ambush is set.

choices: Brooke get's stuck in her chair
Jessica's willpower fails her once again
1153322222222111111121111112121121111.content:
Jessica stared at the delicious cake. She then began to devour it. Taking huge bites out of the soft pastry.

She knew she shouldn’t be doing this but she just didn’t care right now. It felt soo good to be naughty and cheat her diet. The cake was gone in minutes. The massive woman patted her giant gut and licked her fingers.

She looked at the four bags Brooke had left. She wasn’t sure what they were but they smelled really good. She hesitated, thinking about what her trainer would say if he saw what she was doing. But thinking about how good that cake was, she didn’t care about her stupid trainer or anything else. She just wanted to eat!

She was ecstatic to find the bags overflowing with French fries and burgers. She greedily shoveled fries into her mouth. Emptying three of the bags into her belly. Her gut was so bloated after the hundred or so fries she just ate. She had lost tow buttons on her blouse as her swollen tummy pushed out in front of her.

She moved onto the bag of burgers. There must have been at least 10 cheeseburgers in it. Lie an absolute pig she kept stuffing her face with food even though she could feel her stomach starting to hurt. Her chair creaked as she shifted her enormously obese body closer to the burgers.

Finally the last bag was empty and her indulgence was over. Jessica certainly felt bad but it didn’t matter since she also felt so good. She had forgotten why she loved being fat so much. Feeling all that delicious food packed into her midsection gave her such pleasure. She felt so fat as she noticed the sweat coating her naked double belly.

Jessica hadn’t eaten like that in a while and she had missed having her massive binges. But she knew she would regret this. She still felt scarred from breaking her chair that time.
1153322222222111111121111112121121111.title: "Thanks, Brooke! Thanks hannah!"

choices: Hannah goes for a night out, bringing all the girls.
Jessica faces another test of willpower.
11533222222221111111211111121211211111.content:
Brooke relaxed as she sat back in her chair, her button-up straining from the non-stop stream of snacks. Thank goodness George had prepared from her last visit. But soon enough she felt like she'd have to make another trip to the stringy man. He was odd enough, but he understood the struggles of the fat woman.

And that was a trait that Brooke liked, especially.

She felt her stomach rumble as she sat in the ever-encroaching chair. She turned her eye to her ever-present mini-fridge full of drinks and snacks. She reached for it with her dangling, flabby arms jiggling, and she strained to no avail, to try to reach it without getting up. Damn it, she thought. Now I gotta get up.
The porky blonde put her sausage-like fingers around the thick iron of the armrests, trying to push herself up and she used her feet to attempt to shove herself up.

All that seemed to be happening, was that her blubber strained against the metal chair and her arms burned in the intense effort. Brooke spoke aloud. "What the.." She began attempting to heave herself up, but all that happened was her forehead began to drizzle sweat and she produced a futile 'Nnnnnnngh..' as she attempted to heave her porcine form out of the chair, but only produced sweat and huffs. "You've got to be...NNnnnnnnngh...*Huff*...Kidding...Me..." she spoke as she attempted to heave herself out of the chair.

The implications about her weight were of no concern. What WAS of concern was being stuck in this damn chair. And she had absolutely no desire to be stuck in here while her blubbery stomach growled. She was presented with two options: Call for help, or break her chair deliberately to get out and have her feast. And she didn't want someone gripping her stomach and trying to heave her out of this chair. And it was going to keep getting stuck, it wasn't just this one time.

Therefore, she calmly and deliberately leaned forward as to be "standing up", the chair still attached to her, rear, and then sat, with force, producing the intended effect: The chair crumbled into pieces. THEN Brooke had time to think about her weight dilemma.

She thought that she needed to invest in some bigger chairs, because she sure as HELL wasn't going to torture herself with exercise and dieting. She knew that if she gets stuck in chairs, she's too fat to exercise, and a little dieting isn't going to take all her fat away. As such, she waddled away, retrieved a spare steel chair, sat down slowly in it, as it groaned and creaked its protest to her 350 pound mass, grabbed her damn cheetos and a drink, and wallowed in her gluttony.
11533222222221111111211111121211211111.title: A 'Sticky' situation.

choices: "I'll have the Red Velvet Cake."
"No thank you, I'm good."
115332222222211111112111111212112111111.content:
The young evening sat glowering in the sky as the weighty madams waddled together. Jessica was leading the pack: Despite her gorging earlier today, her workouts started to show some form of progress on her ability to move. "Hold up..Jess.*Huff*.." wheezed Brooke and Hannah alternatively. Jessica nodded. "Alright, okay.." And she slowed back to the crawling pace of Hannah and Brooke.

The sun hung lazily and exhaustedly in the rim of the sky, as the moon began standing up from its position in the opposing half, as the pod of whale-like women waddled into the waiting La Bellissima. Jessica spoke. "By the way guys, If you don't mind, after this I've got to run..Literally." Hannah spoke. "Yeah, yeah..*wheeze*..Sure thing, miss..*huff* "I'm in shape.."*pant*..Jenny Craig.."

The trio stood in the warm reception of the waiting wooden area, as the multitudes of lardy guests sat and dined on the rich, saucy foods around them. A rather chubby, yet not yet plump waitress began guiding them to a table reserved for some of the heavier members of La Bellissima, with sturdier chairs with luxurious armrests, lower to the ground, and closer to the kitchen. The trio were hardly the fattest customers, but they were among the top 25 percent of them. The heaviest ever served by La Bellissima was a woman sitting at about 840, who needed to be hauled in through the Cargo entrance, and fed there.

The plump group took their seats and all made their orders. Brooke stepped up her order to Hannah's serving levels. She had a renewed determination as she had the fat girl realization that usually happens. only she didn't go through any form of athleticism, and had gone whole hog with her gaining, both getting party sized-plates of cheesy-sauced pasta. Jessica, however, was still intent on trying to stick with her diet. She'd already gorged today and if she kept breaking her diet, it'd fall down on itself. She ordered a light salad and a small serving of pasta.

The meal passed without much conversation: Jessica wanted to speak, but the two bloated blondes near her were too busy eating their lives away. The waitress approached. "So, are we all done here?" Hannah spoke. "Actually, we'd like some dessert." Jessica looked nervously at the table. Hannah spoke. "I'll have the Monstrissima brownie." Brooke raised her multi-chinned head, and spoke. "I'll order a large vanilla gelato bowl, with chocolate syrup." The waitress turned her head to Jessica. She took a moment, then spoke...
115332222222211111112111111212112111111.title: Whale's night out.

choices: 'No.' She engages her full inner fat girl.
'Yes.' She keeps herself under the guise that she's still on a diet.
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.content:
"No thanks! I'm good enough." The waitress nodded. "Thank you, I'll bring the other two desserts by." The two blondes gorged on their choice of sinful sugary delights, and eventually went to pay the bill. While Brooke and Hannah waddled over to the movie theater to watch a movie and gorge on popcorn, Jessica went off for a jog.

The air rushed past her face, and for the first quarter of a mile she was doing good. As the distance gradually increased, Jessica began sweating like a hog, but she kept going. When she hit a wall, she looked down and saw her jiggling, bouncing mass, and reminded her of her past gluttonies, of the image of herself lethargically sitting in her office, surrounded by mountains of snacks with crumbs rolling down her fat and even more being hurled down her lardy, blubbery throat. She was done, and the determination had kicked in. Before, she would have given up at step one and gone back to gorge at La Bellissima.

But this was a new Jessica. Her expedition went on for another, amazingly enough, 3 miles, before she stopped to sit on a bench, to relax. The night was young yet, and she had a feeling that she'd get energy to get going again.

Three months passed at the office with quite some change. Rob had been fired due to evidence of tampering with Corporate Funds, and Jessica was promoted. Jessica had actually dropped about some 50 pounds in the past three months in keeping with her diet. Her belly had shrunk regardably, and her body in general had gotten smaller. She was about 421 pounds, in her last weigh-in. She had even more ambitious plans, to drop even further by year's end, possibly to even get skinny.

However, Brooke and Hannah's old plan to renew Jessica's Weight gain had been revived recently. They'd ask Jessica to come by for lunch, but Jess would simply reply that she's busy working. And afterwards they'd call her to have dinner, but she'd reply that she was working out. Brooke and Hannah's constant eating and snacking had drastic effects on their waists, in other words, an expanding one. Brooke had broken the 400 marker, landing squarely on 402, and Hannah was just before it, at 395. The women spent a good majority of their working day snacking at their desks while working, or gorging in the break room. They were done attempting to break Jess' diet by invitation, they would do it, one way or another.

Which explained why they came back with enough McDonald's bags to feed a football team after a game.

Jessica sat in her office, and saw the women waddle in. "Hey Jess! We know you must be starving, so we dropped by to give you some lunch!" Jessica shook her head. "Well, guys, that's nice, but you know I'm trying to lose weight." Brooke put on her best pouty face. "Awww, but Jeeeeesssss, we got this all for you, hon!" Hannah replied in like. "Yeaaaah, c'mon Jeeeessss." Jessica sighed. "Fine." The blubbery blondes deposited the ocean of food off, and speedily exited to their own pizza gorging cave within the Break Room.

Jessica looked at the bags. Every single one had been super-sized: Ten bags full of nothing but fries, Five full of 40 order chicken nuggets, and 5 more full of Big Mac's. Doing some rough math, the meal could have been nothing less than 60,000 calories.

Her stomach faced with temptation, could not resist it. And her stomach resumed control over her mind.

Jessica, with almost nothing on her schedule, had the whole day to eat. And the whole day she planned to spend eating this meal. She spread the fries out into a gargantuan pile, and piled out the nuggets and burgers on either other side. She dove her face into the mount of fries, gobbling masses of salty fries. If one wasn't looking, one could literally have mistaken the sound for that of a hog eating. Because this was an exact replication of that sound: The sound of pure gluttony. Jessica withdrew her head once she'd glutted herself on quite a few of the fries, but the pile had barely even dropped. She panted and wheezed as she hadn't done in her most intense workouts. But once she'd gotten her breath back, she dove back in, gobbling the fries with wild abandon. Her past sense of moderation had been slain by her dormant desire for gluttony. She'd gone back into the pile with more determination than she'd had on her diet, keeping her head in the pile for the next full hour, putting a good dent in it. As she withdrew for the next air break, she reached down for the fatty Big Macs and Chicken, next focusing herself on this great feat of eating. She finished half of this as she committed back to the fries, reducing them down to 1/2. While everyone else was on their lunch break, they passed Jessica's office, not inquiring about the mound of food. Jessica worked on the remainder of the fries, and as the day hit the 3/4ths mark, they had vanished from the desk, save for a few crumbs. Jessica went on finishing the other half of the Big Macs and the chicken, sometimes venturing to stuff one inside the other in a grand display of gluttony.

As she finished, closing time was a mere 4 minutes away. She leaned back in her chair, suddenly hearing a 'CrrrrRRRRCK' as the chair's back gave out, and as did the chair itself. Mid-fall, the bloated blimp assaulted the ceiling with a barrage of snapping buttons: Every single shirt button, her tight pants button, and as she hit the ground, her pants burst from their inability to contain Jessica's lardy legs.

As the bloated redhead lay there, coated in a lake of sweat and a layer of salty, heart-killing foods, she had to contemplate on whether or not she was truly on a diet anymore. She decided...
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.title: As time goes by...

choices: Hannah and Brooke spend some time at a buffet and gossip about Jess
Brooke & Hannah keep tempting Jess with loads of food, unknown she isnt dieting
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.content:
As she lay there belly-up, panting and sweating from her incredible binge, Jessica realized something. She realized that no matter what, she'd always be tempted to stuff herself like that again. She hefted herself into a sitting position and rubbed her engorged, tight belly as she tried to breath with the big ball of food inside her.

"Ugh...oh god *burrrrp!* that was delicious...almost forgot how great food tastes since going on a diet...ugh *urp* so full..."

The butterball then stood up with a grunt, opting to rest her belly on her desk, as being so full and just letting it hang with gravity's pull put a bit more pain on her back. Jess then started thinking about something she hadn't before.

...ok, i think i'll go off my excersising and my diet but...maybe i can be both healthy and fatty...

Jess smiled at this revelation and rubed her belly, thinking of all the wonderful gorging to come.
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.title: 'No.' She engages her full inner fat girl.

choices: One month later, Jessica's weight gets entirely out of control.
Jessica recedes back into her diet.
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.content:
The two 400-so pound blondes waddled into the thick smell of Barbecue sauce that emanated from the Buffet. Porky Pam's was the favored destination for both: A. It was a buffet, which Hannah adored, and B, it had barbecue, which Brooke nigh-worshiped.

The two blubbery blondes were forced to wriggle their ways into a booth, as the tables were taken up by the regular weekend crowd. The booth allotted for them to get out for the moment, but they knew that would change rapidly. They had the employees notified that when they stuffed themselves to the point of inability to leave the booth, they would need plates retrieved for them. As they returned with their first course of many, they began conversingn. Particularly, about Jessica.

Hannah opened up the first shots of the conversation. "Yeah, I wonder how fat Jess'll get once she's off her diet." Brooke chuckled. "Hon, after 15 bags of McDonalds, I think she's off her diet." Hannah gave a devilish chuckle. "No thanks to us, heh." Brooke spoke. "I feel so naughty, but so good at the same time."

"So how much do you think miss redhead dropped on that diet?" Brooke shrugged, and spoke. "At a liberal estimate, I'd say sixty, seventy five. At a realistic estimate? thirty." Hannah spoke. "She's dropped a lot. That'll change, though, now that new Jess is probably back."

At about that moment, Jessica entered. "Speak of the devil." spoke Brooke. The blubbery redhead, sweaty from the short walk from within, showed that the meal had immediate effects. Though some of those 60,000 calories had been burned off by moving, that still constituted a gain of approximately 20 pounds, and she had gained 5 more in the next week, leading up to this bright Saturday morning. She was wearing a peach-colored shirt, with an overly-tight camisole underneath, causing fat to mushroom and puff out from the top of her body, especially true of the area of fat beneath her armpits, fat leaking out, and heaving with each breath. The poor camisole seemed as though it was fit to burst. The blubbery redhead was also forced to sit in a booth on the far side of the restaurant., but the difference being, she was straightaway stuck within, thus her server being forced to ferry food back and forth.

Brooke and Hannah reached this point rather soon: Their bellies wedged firmly against the table. Jessica, however, had long gone beyond this point. Her blubber was firmly jammed against the booth, and her absolutely strained camisole had burst. She had gone beyond thirds, fourths, and fifths, and had gone on to sevenths. She was eating almost in almost an olympic manner, eating as though it were her job. Massive amounts of ribs, mashed potatoes, fatback, rice, gravy, chicken.

Hannah and Brooke had stopped, however, at the point where the employees could haul them out. Jessica had no such sense.

Jessica kept eating and eating, and eating, and eating, and by the point Hannah and Brooke had reached eigth plates, and had hit the very end of their stomachs, Jessica had gone onto twentieths. She was sweating a storm, drinking like a race-winning runner, the sweat staining her shirt. Even her 6X-large shirt was showing strain. Her stomach was completely packed to bursting, every inch felt full.

And she loved it.

However, there was the simple problem of the table: Her stomach was leaking onto, and over it, and she literally could not move. Quite the pickle miss Jessica was in. "Uh, Ma'am?" Jessica waved her hand. "I'm...*Pant*..Good.."

This insane woman simply kept eating: It was only 2:20, and by the time that 7:30 had arrived, she had the workers get her 30 more plates of food. By this point, she literally could not fit any more food into her.

Luckily, the booth's table had been literally unable to withstand any more. So had Jessica's conciousness given as well. As the table broke, Jessica fell down to the couch, and passed right out.

As the whale woke up, she was surrounded by the walls of an ambulance. After another three hours, all seemed to check out, except for a massively excellerated blood pressure of about 156, and an increased heart rate.

The next day's work brought plenty of gossip about the whale who broke a booth, and the end of Jessica's dieting phase.
The end of Jessica's Diet, of course, would bring the pounds coming back,
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.title: Pot calls the Kettle.

choices: One of the girls is having much more trouble getting around the workplace
The three challenge each other to an eating contest
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.content:
It had been a month since Jessica had broken the booth seat at Porky Pam's Barbecue Buffet. In that time she managed to glut herself enough to bring her weight back up to the 500 pound range, gaining an astonishing 60 pounds in that timespan, placing her at 510 pounds. Meanwhile Brooke currently weighed in at about 450 pounds with Hannah just below her at 420 pounds.

All three whale-sized women had gotten together for one of their gluttonous group lunches at one of the mall's food courts. They just barely managed to find a table large enough for all three of them, and all three ladies had to use two double-wide, metallic chairs to fit their massive rears. For Jess though, even two of these sturdy chairs were a bit inadequate as her vast, wobbly butt hung over the edges slightly.

Hours into their meal, everyone seems rather full and they casually begin conversing.

"Oh that *urp* buffet was s-so *pant* good I couldn't eat *pant* a-another *urp* bite..." Jessica said as she leaned back heavily, her stomach so full it was a bit hard to breath.

Hannah smirks and reaches over to playfully pat Jessica's massive, bulging gut, teasing her
"Well don't over do it, you're *urp* getting pretty big Jess!"

Brooke giggled as she rubbed her own full belly, making her own comment. "Yeah, i think this *Buuurrp!* is the heaviest you've been yet!"

Jess then smiled and teasingly poked Hannah's fat belly peeking out of her tight shirt.

"Oh hush *urrp!* Like you two can talk! Both of you *huff* better lay off the buffets, cause you're no *urp* skinny minnies yourselves; Soon you'll be as big as me!"

All three fatty friends giggled and chuckled together at each other's good natured teasing. They all continued casually conversing about anything and everything, from office work, to personal life, to what latest tv show they had seen.
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.title: Fatty Friends

choices: "I'll diet and exercise."
"I'll take the Mobility Scooter."
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.content:
The day was long and dull, and the only way the three could stay awake today was by gorging on more than usual. Jess stepped it up to 3 bags of chips per hour, and Brooke had stepped up to 5 mini-donuts per half hour, which she'd trained to eat in one bite. Hannah had to keep awake with about 3 bags of cheetos per hour.

The day was also chock-filled with paperwork: Those cheetos, chips, and mini-donuts had to come from somewhere, and where they came from, needed paperwork to make sure the company actually bought them. Hannah had no clue why they needed to make sure they actually had them: She had crumbs on her blouse, didn't she?

Thinking about her blouse, she checked, and it began riding up from her stomach, revealing her generous lower belly. She pulled it down: Soon enough she'd have to make another trip to george. She had been intending to check up on her gains anyways: She wanted to know how close she was to 500. She thought back on her old life as a health freak, and wondered why in god's name she'd ever want to go back to being a skinny, joyless, stuck-up health nut. She never enjoyed eating at all back then, and now she did. She was glad she had gone to "The dark side".

She had finally filled out the last item: 1 industrial sized crate of Cheetos, and 6 party-sized bags of Lays BBQ. She had to but pen her signature and then...

She looked at the daunting walk to the filing cabinet. She had to get up, and for that reason she groaned and then slowly got up, her blouse starting to ride up again. She rolled it down again over her huge belly.as she started walking towards the filing cabinet. After leaving her office, she began sweating and panting not even 2 offices after hers, and the filing cabinets turned out to be 12 offices down.

Each step forward proved to be more of a challenge, and she remembered that this was the same walk she made months upon months before, when she pondered the life of the fatter woman.

She had pondered it, and now she was living it. And mobility had proved to be one con of it.

However, for everything else, it proved to be a pro. She could eat whatever she wanted, and she could fulfill that primal urge to consume, that urge to fatten ones' self that has been embedded since the Ice Ages, when food was scarce. It felt good to indulge it, to give in and not even care about your diet. It was a fulfillment of her deep, buried urges that she wanted to let loose of.

However, that appreciation was not felt as she had to sweat and pant through the hallway. As she finally approached the filing cabinet, she looked at the signs and her heart sank: The sign read "TPS Reports and Policy Changes." A sign pointed right, down he hall, reading: "Resource and Equipment logs". Hannah turned and the other hallway was the longer side of the office block of this floor.

She trudged down the hallway, already panting and sweating, but now moreso. It was torture, hell on earth. As she hit halfway through, she felt drained utterly,and her shirt had ridden up past her navel, the sweat rolling down slowly and sluggishly. The hallway proceeded a little bit more, she was almost there. As she finally reached the filing cabinets, she jammed it into the nearest cabinet and began attempting to walk back, simply leaving the drawer open.

She didn't make it even halfway back before everything started going black. Hannah panted and tried to slow down, but she was already as slow as she could be. She trudged to a snail's pace and finally made it back to the halfway mark of that hall before she collapsed with a loud 'Thud'.

She awoke in the hospital, looking around. The doctor stood at the head of her bed. "Ah, miss Laurens. You're awake. You seem to have overexerted yourself and passed out from the exertion. You seem to be getting to the point where mobility's an issue for you." Hannah nodded. "Come to think of it, I've had a lot of issues with mobility recently." The doctor nodded. "It's a side effect of the level of obesity you've reached. I've had miss Jessica come in here when she hit about your weight, and I had to prescribe her a mobility scooter. I believe I'll have to prescribe you one of two things: A strict diet and exercise regimen, or a mobility scooter."

Hannah considered and weighed the two options. Would she go back to dieting and exercising to be able to walk down the hall? After a bit of deliberation, she answered...
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.title: Heavy Hannah's Mobility Moping

choices: Immobility comes sooner than Jess thinks; the next day at the end of work...
Jess over exerts herself
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.content:
As Hannah pondered her decision, she weighed the pros and cons of each. If she went with losing enough weight to get around comfortably, then that means she'd need to limit her food intake and go back to torturing herself with small-portioned, tastless diet food, and exhausting, painful excercises. She wasn't even sure she could do most of them any more; she could barely take the exertion of WALKING let alone excercise! As she saw it, the mobility scooter option had more pros than cons, so she finally made her decision.

"I'll take the mobility scooter." Hannah said confidently.

"Well alright miss Laurens, I'll give you the perscription and you can just take it in and get yourself a mobility scooter. You can check yourself out as soon as we're done here." Said the doctor as he began penning the perscription.

The next day, Hannah showed up to work on her new mobility scooter and rode up to Jessica's office, knocking a pudgy hand on the wooden, double wide door. She waited for a response, backing up her scooter slightly.

"Come in!" Jess' voice rang from inside her office.

With that, Hannah opened the door and manuevered inside. She parked her scooter just in front of her friend's desk.

"Hey Jess, can I talk to you about something?"

"Yeah sure. Oh but you're ok right hun? I heard you passed out yesterday and were rushed to the hospital" Jess sounded concerned and very worried.

"Oh I'm fine. I just gotta not over exert myself. That's why I decided to get me one of these babies" she pat the handlebars of her mobility scooter, "but that's kinda what I wanted to talk to you about anyway; I remember the doctor saying he perscribed you one of these too, but I never see you use it...I was just curious why you don't and a little worried...you're not following a doctor's orders Jess..."

Jessica sighed heavily, "I'm fine Hannah. I don't use mine because I still want to walk around by myself and plus I figure I have a little more waddle left in me before I become immobile. That and well...honestly it MIGHT be too small for me now...I don't even know, it's been so long. But I'll see if I can fit in it and I'll start using it when I become immobile."

Haannah looked a bit uncertain but nodded, understanding her friend's logic, "Alright Jessie, if that's what you want."
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.title: "I'll take the Mobility Scooter."
