1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.content:
The overflowingly fat Jessica sat on her triple-reinforced chair that could, by this point, probably stop a couple 9 milimeters bullets. Her belly no longer sat comfortably in her lap, but now rolled aggressively towards the desk's edge. Its vast expanse had Jessica's pants unbuttoned, her underwear covered by her rolling stomach, which was nudging the edge of the desk, only because Jessica leant back.

She took a peek at the clock, which shone that ever beautiful number: Five-O-Clock.

Oh, goody, thought the butterballed redhead. Time to hit the road!

She sat up, the sheer effort of this leaving her panting and attempting to catch her breath. Now her belly was no longer content to tease the edge of the table, but the hyper-obese woman's stomach, which still bore the brunt of her weight gain, flooded over the edge and sat like a frozen wave, paused in time on the spacebar of her inactive keyboard.

She sat for a bit as the rest of the traffic cleared out of the hall. She decided to wait for the traffic to reside and finally, she put her hands on the armrests. She attempted to get up as usual, planting her feet on the ground as she attempted to haul her buttery ball of a body upwards.

However, as she shoved, her lardy, flabby, fatty arms jiggled and quivered, ineffective in any way or shap in attempting to haul her fat body up. "Huh?" she said aloud as she panted. She attempted again, trying with her legs. The ball of her heels didn't touch the ground, however, and the tip of her feet had nowhere near the strength needed to haul the 500+ pile pound of lard up.

She realized this, and attempted to lean forward, but the mass of her belly refused to let her lean forward that far. She heaved and shoved, pushing and going as far as she could, but she ended up just exhausting herself as she resigned to falling back into the chair. She leaned back, panting while she reclined, and her stomach came back up to tickle the desk.

Jessica gathered her strength for a second assault. She'd launch herself forward as she could. It was the only way she could get up, as her arms and legs wriggled and jiggled, twitching in their pain and blubber.

She made her second attempt, but her legs and arms refused to cooperate, as she ended up simply attempting to hurl her torso forward.

It hit her. It had happened, immobility.

In defeat and shame, she rolled her chair towards the closet, opening it. She rolled the mobility scooter out. It seemed a little small, but damn it, she wasn't rolling home in this chair.

She attempted to shift over to the mobility scooter, and found..

Jessica had ultimately decided that she was no longer on a diet anymore. The gravitational pull of living a wonderful, gluttonous fat girl's life was too strong. Though she was indeed off her diet, she also decided not to tell Hannah or Brooke; the round, blubbery redhead was enjoying their efforts to try and tempt her, and without those efforts, it just meant less food for her.

Jessica was waddling her way into her office one morning when she found a particularly large pile of various candy bars and sweets stacked high on her desk, completely covering the wooden surface.

Jess merely smiled. "Oh those two...they must've really missed me and my old eating habits, considering I suppose I was the one who showed them how great it is to just relax and indulge a bit."

Meanwhile the two weighty temptresses of food were sitting chatting at their desks, snacking on a few stray bags of chips.

Brooke gave her friend a smile. "You know, I wonder how long it'll be until we have the old Jess back?"

"It won't be long." Hannah giggled, "We just need to keep up the pressure. I kinda miss Jess; now that she's on that stupid diet, she hardly ever wants to hang out anymore."

"Oh I know...all she ever wants to do is *urrp!* stay at home and excercise, or go to the gym instead of going out and having fun!"

"Yeah, it sucks...But we'll have her back to her normal self in no time!" Hannah said cheerily as she took a handful of lays and shoved them in her mouth.

At every possible moment, Hannah and Brooke would give some type of snack to their friend, usually in large quantities, or they'd buy her a huge lunch, or leave a tempting pastry or desserrt by her door.

Jessica was enjoying their increasingly frequent attempts at breaking her diet with much happiness and gluttony.

About 3 months in, Hannah and Brooke were hauling a cake in. They would get Jess again today. They prepared to drop it off by her door, when they heard munching and crunching inside.

Out of curiosity, Hannah peered her double-chinned face around the corner. And her double-chinned-ness had expanded considerably. At last weigh-in, which was about yesterday, she hit 477, just around the corner from her friend. Her belly was massive, and had not yet doubled in. Brooke was another story: She had hit 480 if she weighed an ounce, and believe it, she certainly did. Her belly had doubled, and her legs had recieved a good deal of the weight, though the majority of the gain went right for her belly and fractionally to her breasts.

As hannah peered around, She saw the blubbery blob that was jessica, gnawing on a mass of chips: An entire, large bag of BBQ chips was her target, and she had a bag of fast food sitting behind her. She was also speaking into a phone. "Yeah...I'll take a Large pepperoni, please. Yes, with the order of wings. Oh, twenty. And I'd like a regular coke with that. Address? Oh, that's 1152 Greyhouse Lane. Thanks! Bye!" Hannah's realization had come: The diet was gone.

Of course, it should NOT have been a surprise even that day a couple months ago. Jess had shot back up to her former weight and then some, hitting the big 500. At present, Hannah estimated her to be about the 520's. And Hannah had an eye for weight. Even though she had long given up dieting, she hadn't given up watching her weight. She just watched it in a different way: She watched it go up and up. And she delighted in this. She no longer ate in spite of the lost man. She ate for the pure glutton inside which she relished now. That which she hid under exercise and ran from, now she could no longer hide. It came out, and came out in a big way.

And while this ran through her head, the hippo-like redhead turned her head. "Hey Hannah!"

Hannah got up, holding the cake brazenly. "Hey Jess!" Jess smirked. "Thanks for the cake, but you know I'm on a "diet", right?" Hannah chuckled. "Suuure, same kind of diet that I'm on." They both matched words: "The See-Food Diet." Jess snapped her fingers. "Well, ya got me. I was off my diet three months ago, I'm just enjoying myself now." Hannah spoke. "Well, I'll just leave this cake here for ya."

As hannah walked out, she decided to...

1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.content:
Hannah decided to keep feeding her friend and bringing her loads of treats. She knew it made the rotund red-head happy (as well as even fatter) and she felt happy as well as a bit of a 'naughty' rush, knowing she was having a hand in blimping up Jess.

Brooke meanwhile had her own plan for Hannah. She knew that Hannah was always just a few pounds below her in weight. So, why not help her along? She decided to use the same tactics they had been using on Jessica for so long.

For example, whenever either just the two of them or their trio of them plus Jessica would go out to a buffet, Brooke would convince her friend to eat just that bit more.

"Hey Hannah you *uuurrp!* should really try this teriaki chicken, it's *urp!* sooo good!"

Hannah just looked at the offered plate and shook her head. She was stuffed.

"Oh I *urp* couldn't eat another bite...I feel miserable *uurrrp!* oof..."

Brooke giggled "Aawww, come on Hun, you, full? Pffft. As if! At LEAST just take a couple bites. Pweeeaaase?" Brooke gave her best puppy dog eyes.

"Oh fiiine! Gimme that plate..."

The results were predictable for all parties involved...
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.title: Continue feeding Jessica. Brooke makes her own ...

choices: Fist-pumped. She begins exercising and dieting.
Hung her head. She tries to find a way to gain.
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.content:
The month had turned some interesting results from the three blubbery women.

Hannah sat in her office, chomping into a 100 gram mega doughnut retrieved from the . Brooke's encouragement didn't help her eating habits, and she'd tripled the amount of calories she consumed at work.

Not conciously, of course: If hannah knew how much she was taking in, she'd revert back to her old ways. Brooke would always slip it in slyly at first: It began with a few extra chips, or another mini-doughnut, or maybe even one of the mega-doughnuts from that bakery across the way. And then she'd moved on to a full bag, a full box of mini-doughnuts, three mega-doughnuts.

Now Hannah had gotten to the next stage: At this point she'd take in half a large bag of chips, a full box of doughnuts, and six mega-doughnuts in the full stretch of the day.

And this was NOWHERE near all she'd eat: For breakfast she'd munch on multiple biscuits, a hash brown, and she'd have a chocolate chip frappe, for lunch, she'd have a couple burgers and two orders of large fries. For supper it would vary, but her supper would always add up to about 2,500 pounds.

And all this had amounted up to 516 pounds on Hannah, who sat at her desk. Her huge, rolling belly now rubbed against her desk, even as she sat a reasonable distance away from it. She tip-typed away at her desk as she also bit into the mega-doughnut, savoring the rich chocolate.

Of course, as she finished up the report and sent it to her boss, she reached under her desk for a vanilla cake. Her efforts to fatten jessica had not slowed. The opposite, they'd increased. Although Hannah averaged in at about 12,000 calories per day, Jessica had one-upped her, going up to a frightening 20000 calories per day.

This was mostly due to the huge amounts of food given to her by Hannah and Brooke. The whale-like redhead had swelled to 637 pounds in one month, and every pound still seemed to be going to her massive stomach. At this point she needed a mobility scooter to get around, buzzing around and cutting even more calorie burning. And every pound strained even her tent-sized button up that was roomy at her previous 520 pounds, and every inch of blubbery, expansive flesh filled the button-up shirt, which was seemingly airtight.

And all this ferrying food back and forth, however, did quite a bit for Brooke. While the two were gaining to no tomorrow, Brooke seemed to not be gaining a pound. And, unlike Hannah and Jessica, nobody was shoving food into her mouth and insisting that she eat that mountain of food. She was the one doing the insisting, the demanding.

She was about to find out, though, because she had decided to weigh herself. She knew Hannah and Jess were gaining, and she gave herself a pat on the back, but she wondered why she wasn't gaining: She was eating burgers and fries, having fast food breakfasts, drinking soft drinks. What was going wrong?

She had stripped down to a bra and her panties: She still had her big, big belly and her decent rack, nipples threatening to mine through the black bra that she wore to sleep. She stepped onto the electronic scale, peering over her massive, lardy stomach. The number shone clear: 472 Pounds.

1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.content:
Hannah leaned back in her chair.

It had sat about 3 weeks ago that she had began her firm regimen of weight gain. She was no longer a casual gainer, and it showed: As the fat woman leaned back in her chair, which creaked and held up as much as possible, her fat overflowed from the bottom of her button-up: It was the largest size that George could afford to make.

Every inch of fat showed from her tight-squeezing, skin-tight dress button-up. At every button, a centimeter or two of flesh showed as the button peeled aside slightly. She had finished her fifth box of doughnuts. She'd gone on from mini-donuts to the real thing, full-on baker's dozens, consumed by the end of the hour.

She grabbed her mug of coffee: Eating this much was thirsty work. Especially for a woman of her girth. She slurped and tried not to spill anything on her shiny white shirt. A little dripped out of her mug and impacted her black skirt. That, she didn't worry about. She continued slurping on the black concoction until it ran dry. She contently sat in her chair.

THe past three weeks of utter gluttony felt like her old routines of exercise: She sweated as much,she was as tired at the end of it, but she actually enjoyed it and was delighted to start, whereas when she attempted to work out, she always dreaded it at the start, and dreaded the next session. Now she was doing what she loved, only intensely.

A part of her, likely a residual of her initial doubts, spoke to her, making her wonder that if this was really all that good. Sure it felt nice, and all the food was good. It was nice getting to relax for once. But now she literally could NOT walk up one set of stairs. Was it worth it all? Was it truly worth the rapid-approaching immobility?

Then the real hannah came back: Of coruse it was! Why shouldn't someone live to their enjoyment? Life was fickle and short anyways, why not enjoy the little a person can squeeze out of life? As the proverb goes, you only live once.

Such deep thoughts come when you eat doughnuts like a hog.

Suddenly, in the door appeared a blubbery form that took up half the doorway. Her black hair was done up in a bun. Her face came familiar to Hannah: It was Taylor, the Marketing manager.

Taylor was another dancer at the school, the other blubbery member of the team. But, though her girth was technically bigger than Brooke's at the time, Brooke still weighed more. As junior year approached, she made experiments in weight loss and was mildly successful. But Hannah could tell that this didn't last as her fat form took up half the frame.

She finally spoke. "Hey, Hannah! Can I talk to you for a second?" Hannah gave an affirmative nod. Of course, Taylor shut the door and pulled up a chair. Anytime someone wanted to talk to her in person, it was known that, like Jessica, it had to be done in her office, or it wasn't worth doing. As taylor pulled up the chair, she spoke again.
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.title: Professional Eatlete

1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.content:
"Hannah, you know that this company encourages large women to be the best they can be and that you've been a great worker in the past," Taylor began. Hannah felt a sense of dread build up.

"Yes?" Hannah said inquisitively.

"Well Hannah, your work has fallen apart lately and nothing you wear is even remotely close to the dress code. Jessica had a similar problem recently but she seems to be hitting a plateau for now. Can you put the effort you used to into your work and presentation?

"I can try," Hannah said. She was taken aback at Taylor's statements. She knew it was all true but didn't want to face it. How would she gain without income?

"That's what I want to hear, but I need to see it too. We don't like to let people go Hannah," Taylor said.

"So what if I don't improve? What if I keep getting fatter and I can't work the way I used to because of it?"

"Well, I guess you'll want to try going on disability. But are you planning to eat yourself to death? There are a lot of big girls here but most of us try to keep in some kind of shape. I don't mean to be rude but a lot of us are worrying about you. You're barely breathing just sitting here Hannah! Your face is red, you can barely walk to the bathroom, Hannah... talk to me."

"Taylor, I am gaining on purpose. I don't think I'll stop anytime soon, maybe never. I think disability would be the only option really," Hannah said. She knew it was the right decision but she was so worried to tell the honest truth of it.

"You aren't the first girl and probably not the last to say that. Come by my office before you leave. We have a great doctor who'll approve the request no questions asked when she sees you. I'll give you her info. If it's what you really want..."
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.title: "Hannah, we need to talk about your work."

1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.content:
The 3:50 mark was rolling around on the clock as the obese, blonde form of Hannah sat comfortably at her desk. Her round, blubbery mound of a stomach sat at a nice, happy medium between her desk and her thighs, a couple centimeters from her knees as she dilligently typed and huffed down doughnuts.

Her white button-up was a little strained from her sitting, but when she stood it was rather loose. Her dress skirt stopped just below the knees, black with white stripes racing downwards, though it was from a couple pounds ago, and it was straining due to her rather expansive thighs. Her baker's dozen started running low to one and a half donuts, as she nearly finished the Report.

She typed in the last word, and sent it on the Transfer folder, and printed it out to the Printing room. Of course, the girls had ceased filing their own paperwork, new people were gotten to do that for them. It had frankly become a herculean task for the lardy whales of the office to move all the way to the printers and to the file cabinets all in one trip.

Finally, Hannah shoved herself up with a bit of effort, and waddled over. She ensured that she had a couple sips of her pepsi and walked over to Taylor's Office, leaving her rather out-of-breath and red-faced.

Within Taylor's Office sat Taylor and a white-coated black woman, who was almost stick-thin, quite the contrast to Taylor, who was finishing up her recent conquest of Crunchy Cheetos. Her gains really showed in this older suit: Her button-up was almost at bursting point, and her vest seemed just as skintight. Even the simple act of breathing seemed to show each and every thread in the exposed shirt.

She turned to the bloated blonde who now stood in the doorway. "Ah, Hannah, good to see ya. I'll let ya'll get started, I was just chatting with Doctor Underwood here." Hannah smiled. "Have a good day, Miss Blankenship." Taylor smiled and waved her delicate little wave. As she began leaving, an audible ripping and multiple pops emerged, as she hurried out. Hannah made out the figure of her flabby belly jiggling around. She had the vague feeling that this sight would become more common, Taylor was ever-naive about her office-related gains, as opposed to her and Brooke, who embraced the fattening ways of the Office openly.

The woman turned to her. "So, Miss Hannah, Miss Blankenship told me you were here for Disabilities?" Hannah nodded, replying in her out-of-breath, panting voice. "Mmm-Hmm. Movement's been...A bit..Difficult..Due to..Some weight gains..." The doctor nodded. "Alright. I would just give it to you, but I need to record a couple things, which is why I brought.." She lifted a bag out into view, with an 'Umph'. "...These." Hannah could plainly see a scale sticking out the bag, as well as a tape measure laying on top of it, just to the right of a variety of different instruments, including Syringes and a Blood Pressure armband, as well as a Patient's Gown. A curtain sat in the corner.

The doctor pulled out the metal, electronic scale first. "Okay, Hannah, Let's see how much this intentional weight gain has done." She set it down, set it to zero, and spoke to Hannah, pulling out the gown. "Go into the curtain area, strip down, and put this on." She handed her the gown and Hannah went to change.

She came back with the teal-blue gown adorning her blubbery form. Doctor Underwood spoke. "I just need you to step on the scale." Hannah nodded and obliged her , stepping on the cold, electronic metal scale. Hannah couldn't see the numbers, and she heard Underwood mutter something and scribble on her clipboard. Hannah spoke. "Uh, how much do I weigh?" Underwood spoke. "Five hundred ninety eight pounds.." Hannah nodded with a little bit of a smile. Underwood spoke. "How much did you weigh at your last weigh-in?" Hannah replied. "Oh, Four hundred seventy seven." Underwood nodded and scribbled in a bit more information. She spoke. "Okay, go ahead and have a seat.

The obese blonde obliged her and took a seat across from the slender doctor, as the doctor prepared to write. The doctor opened up. "So, can you tell me about your exercise routine?" Hannah spoke. "None, most exercise I get is walking to my car and to my office. Occasionally I walk to open the refrigerator." Underwood shook her head as she wrote. "Mmm. And what does your diet look like?"

Hannah spoke in a casual tone. "Well, I Usually eat 3 bacon biscuits, each with a quarter pound of bacon, with a Chocolate Chip Frappe for breakfast. I eat 2 burgers for lunch with 2 large orders of fries. I usually snack at the office on about 3 bags of Cheetos and a baker's dozen glazed donuts. For supper, I eat tortellini with cheese, and I usually put a cup of alfredo sauce on it as well, just to really get the flavor out, and afterwards I usually have half a pound cake."

As she finished counting on her fingers the amounts she ate, she turned to the doctor, who was scribbling away on her clipboard, but she could see a heavily dissapointed face on her face. "Hmm, hmm, hmm. Okay, just sit right there..."

The doctor ran through the usual tests: Heart rate, Blood Pressure, Cholesterol. The doctor eventually came back with a note. "Alright, you'll have your disability within about a week." The doctor spoke. "Although, I have something you may or may not want to hear."
1153322222222111111121111112121121111112.title: Doctor's Office Call.

During this conversation Samantha’s office broad door were opened and Tessa arrived on her wheelchair to the Ashley’s office. Tessa saw Claire seated in the chair and said “Hi Claire, I’m glad to see you; I just wanted to ring you up, because I have work for you”.
“Nice and what shell I do?” asked Claire

Tessa replied “You know my friend from Big Pony. They are working on new menu and they need to check the quality and some recommendation. They hope, that if it will be as successful as the last one was…“, Tessa looked from Claire to Ashley and added “…and you can take your friend as well, because they will be ready today in the evening. Ashley, are you interested, aren't you?”

Ashley was surprised and little confused “…of course I’m, but I know nothing about this job…”

Tessa said “Ashley, don’t worry, it looks, that you have talent. By the way Claire is my best external consultant; you can learn lots from her, if you like.”

Ashley agreed to take part in Claire’s degustation mission without other hesitation. Tessa smiled on the girls, said good bye to Claire and left Ashley’s office.

Claire encouraged Ashley “Ash, don’t worry this will be nice work and it will be great to have friend there. They have great chef and large portions there. You will see, so let’s meet at 6PM here.”

When Ashley said good bye to Claire, Samantha waddled to the Ashley’s office with smile on her lips “Ashley, you truly impressed us with your great cake. I hope, that you will enjoy your first degustation session. And now let’s go for some generous lunch, I’m so very hungry”. Ashley followed her bulky boss to the car. Ashley was almost surprised, that Samantha can walk in her surprisingly tight skirt and on high heels.
Ashley and Samantha had great full lunch in small Italian restaurant near to the office center and both of them were stuffed with great lasagna and sweet tiramisu.

When stuffed Samantha was struggling to get into her SUV, they could hear loud rip followed by several pops. Samantha's overfilled skirt ripped in seams and the freed doughy flesh of her heavy belly pushed created too much pressure on the pure white blouse, so the buttons popped. Little surprised Samantha said “Wow, it looks, that I just ruined my business skirt suite!” and explored her soft assets with her hands and added “yes, yes, I put on some”.

Ashley will invite her office friends
1211121111111111111.content:
Samantha said “we will have to stop at my place, in need to change my dress. It is not that far.”

“Of course” nodded surprised Ashley

Samantha started the car and headed to her house. After few minutes they stopped by large house. Samantha invited Ashley inside the house, seated her to the comfortable sofa in the living room. On the table coffee table were paced bowls with selected chocolate, candied fruits and some chips. Samantha was holding her ripped skirt in one hand and with her free hand she showed on the bowls and said with smile “Ashley, help yourself. Especially you should try the chocolate from the blue bowl, it is great”. With that said, Samantha waddled to other room to exchange her ruined clothes.

Ashley was still stuffed from the lunch, but she was not able to resist the chocolate on the coffee table and yes, the taste of the chocolate from blue bowl was so addictive. After few minutes Ashley was able to see her immense boss slowly walking from the bedroom almost naked in her white bra and panties. Samantha headed to bathroom obviously. Her large fat belly was divided into two large folds. The lower fold partially covered by the panties was reaching below the half of sturdy thighs. On top of the top belly fold were spilling Samantha's breasts. Samantha's body jiggled with every laborious step and this made her breast to wave and to try to escape the constraining bra. From behind Ashley was able to see undulating broad hips and large cottage cheese buttocks. Ashley had no negative feelings during this show, on the contrary she reminded Claires's dark soft and smooth body and imagined, how soft have to be even larger and heavier Samantha.

Ashley was melting delicious chocolate in her mouth and looking around the living room. She was able to see set of pictures where was Samantha posing most probably with her husband. On the oldest pictures was Samantha plump and on the most recent she was already quite heavy. Her husband was quite tall and probably muscular man and on every picture he embraced his ever growing wife. He had so delightful grimace, that it was more than clear, that he enjoys this close contact with his soft wife. Ashley remembered similar feelings, which she was able to see on her dad, when he was looking or hugging her mother. At this moment she had to think about George from Gourmet heaven and for short time she imagined herself in his hands. Her thought were interrupted by Samantha's voice “Ashley, my dear, please come to help me...”

Ashley got up and followed the voice coming from the bathroom “Of course, I'm coming”

When Ashley came to the bathroom, she could see heard shape of Samantha's huge rear as she was bent down and trying to reach something under the basin. Samantha straightened with load groan and wheezed “Oooof, I can't reach there...(wheeze) for the scale”

Now was Ashley able to see large industrial weight scale scale under the basin. Ashley squeezed by her voluminous boss and moved the scale to the middle of the bathroom. She was very surprised by it's remote display, which she placed on the basin. Samantha stepped on the scale and placed palms on the sides of her soft globular belly. The red numbers on the display started to blink. When the number stabilized, there was shining 440lbs. Samantha looked at the display and said “Wow, it is not surprising, that the walking is so hard these days. I added another 20 pounds this year! What one can do! Lets go to dress...”

Samantha heavily waddled back to the bedroom, her booty was shaking and thunder thighs were touching from her bottom to the knees. Ashley placed the scale back under the basin and went to the living room. She was thinking about her hefty manager and again she put eyes on the snapshots. Not only the husband, but even Samantha looked so happy on these pictures. Ashley set down to the sofa and automatically put another piece of chocolate to melt in her mouth. Again she had to thing about her mom and dad. It was obvious, that you can have nice life even with some additional weight.

Newly dressed Samantha entered to the living room and said “I'm ready, lets go to the office”

She had nice loose summer dress with deep neckline where she presented large amount of cleavage. It was interesting to see, that the dress were loose, when Samantha was standing, but when she was seated in her SUV, they were quite snug.

In the afternoon Ashley had to prepare process some papers, prepare some invoices and schedule several business meetings for Samantha and Tessa. She was almost done, when Nora arrived with slight buzz on her wheelchair and asked “Ashley, my dear, I need some help again. Do you think, that you will have some time?”

“I'll try, what can I do for you Nora?” asked Ashley.

“I have here some recipes again and I need to rewrite them...” said Nora and tapped by her plump fingers on folder of papers which she had on her vast bosom “

“I'll be done in a few minutes with these papers and then I can work on it. It was very interesting last time. I backed the Schwarzwald's cake from them.” said Ashley.

Nora smiled on Ashley, passed folder with recipes to her as well as the bag with some box in it “I have some sweet bonus for you of course and thank you”.

Ashley thanked to Nora and continued to work on the papers. When all of them were processed, she opened the folder with recipes. She took first one and opened text editor. At this moment she stopped, put the recipe back and opened the bag with the box. There was formed set of twelve tempting doughnuts. Ashley felt her mouth watering.
1211121111111111111.title: Samantha will go to home to change her dress

choices: Rest of the day
1212.content:
Ashley didn't know a thing about Gourmet Heaven so she was reluctant to take the job. She wanted to go home and do a little research. She thanked Samantha for the opportunity and let her know that she would be in touch. Ashley left the premises and headed home.

At home she pondered the job prospect. She was in dire need of employment and hadn't heard back from 99% of her applications. She knew she better take the job, Samantha seemed nice enough, how bad could it be? She gave Samantha a ring back and told her she could start tomorrow. Samantha sounded delighted, and Ashley was as well.

The next day Ashley showed up a little early, just to make a good impression. She again pulled up in front of the Cake Kingdom building where she was going to be working. On her way in she passed the Sweet Shop where her interview had been. To be honest she was impressed with the campus this company had. The fact that her own building had it's own coffee shop was incredible. The rest of the building was as uniquely named as everything else. Since it was the Cake Kingdom each suite of offices was named after different flavors. She made her way to the Red Velvet office where she was going to be working. All the tasty names got her belly rumbling. After these treats yesterday Ashley had been craving something sweet.

When she walked into her set of offices she was shocked at what she saw. There was food everywhere. Baskets of cookies, and full on cakes on every surface in the office. The office was pretty small, just two windowed offices, and half a dozen cubicles. They had their own bathroom along with kitchen and conference room. The walls were covered with filing cabinets and tables. Typical office, except for the food spread. Ashley knew that when she took a job for Gourmet Heaven that they must have been in the food business some how, but what had she gotten her self into.

Ashley made her way to the back office where she knew Samantha would be awaiting her. She walked through the open door and was greeted with Samantha's warm smile and a hello. The girls said their pleasantries and carried on a conversation for a few minuets. Ashley couldn't help but notice the box of donuts that Samantha was eating through. Samantha offered Ashley one. Ashley had been taken aback by all the sinful food in the office, but she was still craving sweets after yesterday so she took her new boss up on her offer. Samantha kept offering until Ashley had eaten three and the box was empty.

"Well how about a little office tour before we get you started." The large woman took her time getting up from what looked like a reinforced office chair. There were only four other women in the office and Ashley got introduced to all of them. The first thing she noticed was that all of these women were fat. She wasn't surprised after seeing Samantha, and also seeing the amount of sweets each woman had at her desk. First off was Nancy. Nancy was an accountant and had been here for a few years. She looked to be about 200 lbs and almost 30. Next was Tasha. Tasha was in HR. She had also been here for a few years but was much younger than Nancy. She had joined the company right out of college. She was only 25 but was already 230 lbs. Tasha was also probably the closet one to Ashley in age. The next cubicle over was Fran. Fran was probably a little younger than Samantha, late 30's. Fran was in charge of sales. She had been there for years and had a lot of experience at her job. She was definitely the biggest of the bunch at 330lbs. Well not as big as Samantha, not one touched her enormous size. Last in line was Denise. Denise was in the quality control department. She must have been the same age as Nancy judging by the old picture on her desk of them at a graduation much slimmer. Now it seemed like Denise was around 250, when she used to be such a twig.

Finally Samantha showed Ashley her desk right in front of her office. Samantha also told her to make her self at home and get comfortable, nothing was off limits. Throughout the day Ashley got acquainted with her new job. It was very different from being a fitness instructor. Throughout the day Samantha called on her to bring her treats. It seemed like Samantha never wanted her desk to be cleared of something to eat. She watched as her boss munched all day long. No wonder these women were so big, endless supply of free food and no restraint. Ashley helped herself to a few treats but tried not to over do it.
1212.title: Ashley will consider the offer and call later

choices: Ashley is surprisingly good at her new job
Ashley is fooled and is actually the one fattened
12121.content:
Throughout the day as well the other women in the office would drop things off on Ashley's desk for Samantha. Along with their work they would leave Ashley a treat. Ashley had been tempted to eat them but refrained as she wasn't hungry. Soon they piled so high that Ashley decided to have something just to get it off her desk. She decided to have a slice of red velvet cake, after all it was the office specialty. The cake was delicious and she couldn't help but have another slice. Later on as she passed Tasha's desk she thanked her for the cake. "It's to die for isn't it." The chubby blond gushed. Ashley couldn't help but notice the empty cake tin with remnance of a demolished red velvet cake in the corner of her co-workers desk.

"Is there anything I can grab you?" Ashley asked.

"Well since you asked, there is this tray of brownies in the kitchen I have been craving all day. Could you be a doll and grab it?"

"Gladly." Ashley said before she took off in the direction of the kitchen. 'Boy these girls really like their sweets. They all must be fat from working here.' Ashley thought as she grabbed the tower of brownies and brought them back to Tasha. After the brownie delivery she though she should check in with the other three girls. After asking them all the same thing, they each wanted something sweet to munch on. Ashley complied with their wishes and brought them all treats from the kitchen. As she made her way back to her desk she was summoned into Samantha's office.

"Making quick friends are we?"

"Yes, everyone is so nice." Ashley replied.

"Well we are going to be having a meeting in the conference room in 10. I need you to go pick up a donut order from the Sweet Shop and drop them off in the conference room."

"Gladly." Ashley left the office and headed down the hall to the Sweet Shop. 'A donut order? Does it ever stop for these girls?' She thought as she stepped into the sweet smelling shop. She asked for her order at the counter and was handed 6 big boxes. 'Holy moly this is a lot of donuts.' She took the boxes back to the office and spread them out in the conference room. As she got back to the office Samantha stepped out of her office and announced the meeting to the other girls. All of their heads perked up as they noticed Ashley walking by with all the boxes. They all waddled their way into the conference room and took a seat. Samantha sat at the head of the table with Ashley next to her. Ashley was ready to take notes on her tablet. Each worker took a box from the table and placed it in front of them selves. Each box was full of a dozen donuts. Even Samantha had taken a box, which left only one left. The last box was for Ashley. In that brief moment she knew everyone was looking at her and was expecting her to take the last box. She knew she didn't need the calories but she also knew they would probably be the most delicious thing she had ever eaten. Well besides that cake earlier, as Tasha put it, it was to die for. Ashley didn't want to be looked at as the outcast so she graciously took the extra box and snatched a donut out of it. It was truly tasty and she even craved another after the first. As the meeting went on Ashley had a few more donuts, while her coworkers had no problem packing the entire box away. The meeting ended and each full bellied woman made their way back to their desk. Ashley couldn't fathom how each of them could eat so much, or let them selves go so badly. She could understand Fran, long time vet with the company and getting up there in age, but the other younger workers were all so plump. Their bubble butts filled their work skirts showing off how supple each cheek had become. The rolly polly bellies bulged out in front of them like they had a basket ball under their blouse. Each of them also sported a hefty bosom. Their inflated chests filled their bras and taxed the buttons on their sweaters. Each of them was a wobbling pile of fat, and Ashley didn't see that changing any time soon with how their eating habits were.

After the meeting Ashley was called into Samantha's office. "Was there something you needed Samantha?"

"Yes dear, have a seat." Ashley sat in one of the comfy chairs in front of Samantha's desk. She noticed the remains of all the snacking Samantha had done that day. Her waste bucket was full, and she still had crumbs on her desk waiting to be cleaned up. "Ashley we have a pretty easy philosophy here at Gourmet Heaven, and that is a healthy employee is a happy employee. Do you understand me?"

"I think so." Ashley replied. 'Fat employees are happy employees?' She thought to herself.

"Now our employee's may not know about our corporate philosophy, but it's our job to make sure they are happy and working at their best."

"So that's why there is treats and food all around the office. You want to encourage your employees to eat, because the more they eat the happier they are."

"Exactly. Our research has shown that women encouraged to indulge, to live with less restraint, work better in this company. I'm sorry that I didn't bring this up during the interview, but part of your job is going to be helping your coworkers get the encouragement they need. Is that something you can do?"

Ashley thought to herself. These girls pack it away without a second thought already, how hard could it be to help them on their way? "Of course Samantha, anything you need."

"From now on a want a daily report of how your work is going."

"As good as done." Ashley replied.

"Alright then. Dismissed. And don't forget this box of donuts left over from the meeting. I couldn't have another I'm stuffed." Samantha handed Ashley the half full box to take to her desk. Ashley passed the rest of the day nibbling on her donuts and other snacks on her desk. Her desk was more food than it was paper work. By days end she was quite stuffed and her flat belly poked out more than usual. She said goodbye to her coworkers, and remembered that tomorrow was going to be a much different day.

They deliver way too much food
121211.content:
Ashley arrived promptly the next morning for work. She had been planning her attack all last night. It also crossed her thoughts that she used to get paid to help women lose weight and she was pretty much being paid to fatten them up. Hey a job is a job. She stopped by the Sweet Shop and picked up an order of 6 dozen donuts again, get the morning started right. She gingerly eased into the office holding the tall pile of boxes and placed them on her desk. One by one she handed them out to the girls in the office as she greeted them for the day. Once she was done so took a box in for Samantha as well.

"Good morning Samantha. Fresh donuts?"

"I'd love them, thank you. Getting a good start this morning I see."

"Indeed. Gotta make sure these girls are well fed, right? And in the process of doing that I was wondering if I could get clearance from you to order a milkshake machine for the kitchen. Coffee is just so blah." Samantha had a smile across her face. Ashley was going to do just fine with the task given to her. She knew the girls in the office were going to balloon with all the extra calories Ashley was going to get them.

"Of course dear, that is a marvelous idea. Get me your notes and research by lunch so we can process the order." Samantha was still smiling as Ashley went back to her desk, giddy from getting her idea approved. When she got back to her desk there was one box of donuts left. She had forgotten that an order of 6 boxes included one for her. 'Oops.' She thought to herself. 'I guess I over ordered. Nothing to do now but have a few.' Ashley had been wanting them anyways. After delighting everyone else with treats she craved some for herself.

Ashley started researching all sorts of different machines for the office, but finally settled on one that took care of all the work for them. All Ashley had to do was refill it in the morning. She presented her findings to Samantha and an order was placed.

Ashley had other ideas for her coworkers as well. She called and doubled the order of sweets to be delivered daily to the office. The reason there were sweets to eat is because the company provided them free of change to encourage their staff to eat freely. A cleaning crew would come in the morning before office hours and clean up the empty platters from the day before and restock the office based off the reoccurring order. The current order Ashley felt was to limiting. The woman on the other end of the phone warned Ashley from over ordering, the food was free but they didn't want it to go to waste. Ashley assured her that it was not going to go to waste. She got the approval from Samantha to up the order on the grounds that she had to deal with any left overs, which meant consuming them herself. So tomorrow they would start to see an increase in the sweets around the office.

Ashley's last change for the day was to up the ante during their staff meetings. Instead of donuts she filled the conference room table with a smorgasbord of pasties. Her coworkers eyes lit up with then saw the fancy feast. They thanked Ashley for her hard work and started in on the mound of sweets until they were gone. During the meeting Ashley took scrupulous notes on who was eating what. All part of the report she had to submit to Samantha at the end of the day.

After the meeting she spent the rest of the day either at her desk with paperwork and phone calls, or our roaming the cubicles prodding her fellow workers with sweets. As the day toiled on Samantha asked Ashley to stay a few minutes after work. All the girls got their things and left for the day and Ashley made her way into her boss's office.

"You wanted to see me Samantha?"

"Yes, take a seat. I'm assuming you have your daily report for me?" Samantha asked.

"Of course." Ashley read her report to Samantha as they shared some brownies that Samantha had strategically placed in the office right before the meeting. The big thing she noticed was that Tasha was by far the biggest eater. She ate more and faster than everyone else. She really enjoyed having treats delivered. Fran was also a big eater, but not in the way like Tasha was. Tasha was ferocious, and Fran was more complacent. Fran loved to have something on her desk and in her hand, but wasn't attacking it with lust like Tasha did. Denise was also a big eater. She didn't eat as much as Fran, or as wild as Tasha, but she definitely enjoyed the perks of the office. Last but not least was Nancy. She was probably the slowest of the bunch. It's not that she didn't like all the sweets, she definitely embraced the company culture, she just wasn't as passionate or excited like the other girls were. There was an opportunity here.

"Amazing report Ashley keep it up. I also can't wait to see the changes tomorrow."
121211.title: Ashley is surprisingly good at her new job

choices: Samantha really puts the pressure on Ashley for this last month of the quarter
A rival office emerges
1212111.content:
The next day the milkshake machine was installed. Ashley had also ordered cups for everyone with their names on them. She used her cup to make sure the machine was working perfectly, a tradition she kept up every morning after it was installed. Milkshakes were delicious and Ashley enjoyed drinking the thick liquid. She made sure everyone got some and knew how to get more when they wanted it.

Also the extra food order had arrived that morning. The office was extra full of treats and sweets. The staff seemed excited by all the changes that were happening. They dug in viciously like Ashley knew they would. These chubby workers really liked their sweets and she really couldn't blame them. Everything was free and it all tasted so good. It was murder for their waistlines though. Everyday the office workers seemed bigger. It might have just been Ashley's imagination since she knew all too well how much these girls packed away.

Samantha was happy with Ashley's work. The girls were eating at an increased pace, and not leaving a scrap behind by days end. She also noticed Ashley unable to resist the sweet life of the office. She continued to order her extra box of donuts in the morning, right next to her morning milkshake. Ashley could also be seen enjoying a red velvet cake at her desk most days. Ashley wasn't on any pace to become the next Fran or anything, but things change quickly in this company. Samantha was happy with the office's improvements, but she was also privy to what was coming ahead in the company.

It had been about a month since Ashley started at Gourmet Heaven. By now her progress could be seen on her co-workers. Each of them had gained 10-20 lbs. Tasha was on the higher end of the scale, now weighing in at 250. Her bust had gotten so big she had to leave open most of the top buttons of her blouse for them to breath. Fran and Nancy had steady gains as well, and little Denise brought up the rear, literally. She may have only gained 10 lbs, but it seemed to have all gone to her behind.

Ashley was not immune to the gaining either. She had also gained 10 pounds but was completely oblivious to them. One day Ashley was called into Samantha's office first thing in the morning. She used this opportunity to deliver her boss some donuts. Samantha was on the phone and gestured for Ashley to put them on her desk. Ashley complied and took her normal seat in front of the desk. Ashley could over hear Samantha's conversation but couldn't make out what she was talking about,

"Yes, our investment is up 75% over last month... I know my new investment is paying dividends... The new account? It's healthy. Up 10 points actually... My team is probably going to be the top performers this quarter if we keep it up... I know next quarter is going to be crazy with all the changes. Well I have to let you go, ta ta." Samantha hung up the phone and focused her attention on Ashley. Ashley had slipped a couple of donuts out of Samantha's box and was just finishing them as Samantha was finishing her call. Ashley had had such a sweet tooth since getting this new job. Samantha had noticed Ashley's new business suit. She must of out grown the old one since this one was looking a tad bigger than before. She decided to test the waters.

"I love the new suit Ashley."

"Aww, thanks. I just felt like sprucing up my wardrobe with a few new things."

'She doesn't suspect a thing, the poor dear.' Samantha though as she noticed Ashley's little bulge of a belly that she didn't have a month ago when she interviewed her. "Well we only have one month left of this financial quarter. Time for a report." She gave Ashley the floor, and Ashley presented her work for her boss.
1212111.title: The next day goes swimingly

choices: Yes!
Hire someone new to replace Denise
12121111.content:
As the next month started Ashley kept up the same old routine, if it's not broke don't fix it. That was until she was called into Samantha's office.

Ashley had just given Samantha the monthly report just a few days ago. Samantha had been pleased, but still wanted to achieve even more. Ashley had surmised that Nancy was sitting now at 215 lbs, Tasha was up to 250, Fran the vet at 342, and Denise with a small bump up to 260. And of course Ashley didn't know it but she had gone from a nice 110 number up to 120.

"Ashley, great first month. I can really see the results." Samantha laughed in her head at the thought of how well the new recruit was joining their corporate philosophy, especially after being a fitness instructor. "But we need to keep our foot on the pedal." Ashley nodded in agreement as she listened to her boss. "I think our weakness is Denise, she just isn't embracing the culture like we want her too. Fran has been here long enough and is comfortable with how we operate. Tasha embarrassed things from day one and I think is really flourishing in the environment. And Nancy is accepting of it too. When Denise first started she seemed like she'd love it here, but recently she has been withdrawn. We need to change that and I need your help Ashley. Can you do that for me Ashley?"
12121111.title: Samantha really puts the pressure on Ashley for...

choices: At months end both girls are gainers
Denise doesn't gain a pound but Ashley's getting huge
121211111.content:
Ashley, being the ever obedient worker, agreed to solve Samantha's 'problem'. "We really need to bring her on to the team philosophy. I'd recommend using some team skills to accomplish this task." Samantha told her.

That night Ashley brainstormed a plan she hoped would work. Samantha wanted Denise to be a team player, so maybe she needed some team support. Folks like Fran and Tasha took care of themselves, they didn't need to be edged on to gobble down sweets. It wasn't going to be enough just to tempt Denise with lots and lots of delectables, she needed to be hands on. Maybe if Ashley sat down and enjoyed food with Denise she would be more apt to take part.

The next day she set the plan in place. Everyone else's appetite was on autopilot, so she focused herself on Denise all day. At first it was a small cake she split with her and ate with her at her desk, making sure she ate the whole thing while she was there. Then she made sure she was sucking down all of her milkshake and getting a large refill. She split a box of donuts with Denise, and then a plate of gourmet cookies. All day Ashley was bringing food over to Denise's desk.

Denise started to get wise a little bit. She was curious why Ashley was sitting with her all day and none of the other girls. Ashley's response was that she just didn't know Denise all that well and wanted to get to know her better. Secretly she was pumping her full of sugar.

By days end Denise had consumed triple what she would have on a normal day. She was stuffed. She thanked Ashley for spending so much time with her today as she left to go home. Ashley grinned as she was so proud of her work. Unbenounced to Ashley though, she was quite full as well. Her small belly was looking quite taught in her small business suit. Ashley gathered her things and left for the day, ready to do it all over again tomorrow.
121211111.title: Yes!

choices: Ashley starts to learn what the other girls really think about being fat
Skip to the end of the year when Ashley is really fat
1212111111.content:
Ashley knew months end was coming and started to reflect on her work. Samantha had asked her to get their numbers up by the end of the quarter, and Ashley was satisfied that she had done a good job. After all the effort she put in with Denise, the girl was looking a bit rounder. Of course the bootylicious woman had plumped up mostly in her rear, but Ashley was still proud of her accomplishment.

The feeling reminded her of her past life. She used to feel accomplished when she'd help a client lose weight, and meet those milestones. Now she was like a weight gain coach, but the clients didn't really have a choice, they just were sort of accepting of their fate. Ashley looked around the office and at the rotund women that filled it. This was her job now, she was a corporate encourager, and she wondered where this career would take her.

Before she could get out of her head, Samantha snapped her out of it by calling her in to her office. "I believe you have your report for me." Samantha gleaned. Ashley read off her extensive report, full of numbers and names and food items. Then it came to Denise, her project. She gave her report on the assignment she was given, and just hoped it was what Samantha wanted. She told her about the social aspect of the encouraging, and the constant assistance she gave to her project.

Samantha looked on at Ashley as she gave her report. Samantha knew what was going on day to day, she wasn't very far from the action, this was a small office, but she liked getting the report from her special project manager. Ashley sat in the lush seat that was in front of Samantha's desk, mostly reading off a piece of paper. Samantha noticed that Ashley kept pulling at the hem of her skirt like it was constantly riding up. Ashley's plan had definitely started to work with Denise, Samantha saw her this morning and her booty was looking much bigger. But Samantha's plan was working too. Every morsel Denise ate so did Ashley, and it was showing on the relatively thin woman. The tight business suit showed Samantha everything she needed to know. Ashley wasn't going to plump up over night but was well on her way to looking the part when it came to a Gourmet Heaven worker, Samantha could not complain.

Ashley had finally finished talking allowing for Samantha to respond. "Great work Ashley, you really helped us through this tough quarter. But you know what they say, another game starts tomorrow."
1212111111.title: At months end both girls are gainers

Jenna worked her way up the corporate ranks and now was in charge of the entire branch. She was now 32, with her own office. Her branch was running smoothly in her first year in charge of everything.

Sitting down in her own special office the 500 pound manager undid her belt and pants button. Thus her first act as boss was to make the office more suited for someone of her…ilk (basically for really fat girls that eat a lot). These “adjustments” kept Jen and her employees literally “fat and happy”. As she worked on her BOD (Box of Doughnuts) she looked out to examine her employees

Alice sat at her desk. The 27 year old had the face of an angel, and the body of a hippo. Through high school and college she was a popular kid. Cheerleader, prom queen, honor roll, she was perfect. Alice combination of looks and personality were almost too good to be true, but all good things must end. When she joined the office she couldn’t help but get caught up in the gluttony of her coworkers. Despite her angelic qualities she was helpless to the sinful indulgence that plagued the office. While her inner beauty remained, her outer beauty became buried in a layer of fat. Her sense of restraint eroded. As Jen looked, Alice leaned back in her chair and patted her doughy belly. While she remained gorgeous for someone of her size, there was no way of ignoring her obese state. The 340 pound cutie lifted her plump body out of the chair. Spinning around 90 degrees she showed her massive butt and wide padded hips.

Melissa sat at her desk across from Alice. The two were best friends. However Melissa was only 25. She was already a bit chubby when she got the job but working at the office unleashed her inner glutton. Being a fat girl was in her nature. Melissa was always greedy, lazy, indulgent, and fat, so when she joined the office she was in her natural habitat. She fell in love with pastries and fast food, stuffing herself constantly. Melissa pigged out so much she had blimped up to 370 pounds. Even around the office she was fat for her age. The young whale sat at her desk shoveling doughnuts into her mouth. Her free hand undid her bottom shirt button. Her overfed gut pushed out over her thighs.

Victoria was stationed at the entrance to the office. The young secretary had been working at the office for only a year. She was already chubby when she joined the office. The freshman 15 continued to the college 60 for Vicky. Being a young and naive she was quick to adopt the office lifestyle. Being a ditzy party girl she had no thoughts of restraint or consequences. She was too busy enjoying her early 20’s to get concerned over her weight. Sitting at her desk all day she had piled on 70 pounds in her young career. Now at 23 and 260 pounds she happily sat on her flabby butt, grazing on junk food.

The second most experienced worker at the office was Courtney, a cheery woman who was a diligent worker. She had been living the office life for many years now and over time had completely let herself go. At 410 pounds the 29 year-old stuffed herself daily at the office. She was a veteran of the gluttonous office lifestyle. After many years at the office she had become very comfortable with her situation even though it had turned her into a 400 pound whale. Jenna watched Courtney make her way back to her desk. It was clear that she was coming from lunch for her entire midsection was on display. She was cradling her stuffed belly and heavy fat rolls with her hands, or at least as much as her hands could hold. As she waddled her way through the office she accidentally bumped into another coworker.

Jenna watched as the newest addition to the office bounced off of Courtney’s puffy side blubber. Christina joined the office just a few months ago. Christy was really shy around the office, and wasn’t socializing with any of her coworkers, it was probably why she remained so thin. This was bothering Jen. “Maybe someone should invite her to lunch,” thought Jenna. She really wanted Christina to fit in like the rest of the office gals.
