They’re friendly, they’re reliable, and you know, I would honestly recommend their services to any of our listeners who might be interested. Call them up at 1-800-GOR-DGE1 and tell them that Marni from KISS102.5 sent you, and tell them to thank me later for the free commercial.”

“I like ‘em as much as the next gal, Marni... As long as the next gal isn't you.” A distinctively deeper, but no less feminine voice flooded from Alice’s speaker, “But are you sure you’re not just saying that because of the care packages they keep sending over? The ones that I never get to try?”

“Whu—?” the Marni voice managed after a familiar crackling of paper, “D-Don’t be shully… haha…” the voice gulped, “Just, you know, trying to earn my paycheck.”

“Uh-huh, well keep eating those candy bars and your wallet won’t be the only thing getting chubby—chubbier, anyway—.” The thicker voice was back with a little giggle, "In the next half hour, we have Ka—“
CLK!

Alice used one chubby finger to press her radio’s power button, silencing everyone’s favorite pair of Radio Sirens for the day. Everyone liked Cass & Marni in the Morning, all the way up the corporate ladder. They were the only local radio station that everyone in the office could agree on which, given the diversity of tastes in the office, was really saying something to the quality of their programming.

“Aww!” A collective moan escaped the break room as its inhabitants voiced their displeasure

Alice smiled apologetically and shrugged her meaty shoulders, tapping her wrist with one sausage finger. They were only allowed to listen to the radio on breaks, which while frequent, hardly synced with the schedule of everyone’s favorite radio queens. Everyone only got to listen to Cass & Marni twice a day, unless they caught them early on the car-ride to work.

“Sorry ladies, but break’s over.” Alice said with wavering sternness, “Gotta get back to work.”

“You suck, Alice!” Melissa moaned as she crossed her arms underneath her heaving tits, “Why do you have to be so responsible all the time?”

“If I weren’t so responsible all the time, you’d spend your whole mornings in here eating chips and listening to the radio.” Alice said with a little laugh as she waddled over to her chair-bound coworker, “Come on, if we don’t settle the Rodriquez Account by tonight Jenna said we’d have to come in on Saturday.”

“I think I can live with that.” Courtney chuckled throatily, her belly quivering in amusement, “I’ve always been more of an instant gratification kind of girl anyway.”

The whopping senior representative ribbed her skinny-minny sidekick in the side with one doughy arm. She turned expectantly to Christina, who could only smile nervously and give a rigid thumbs-up as her massive superior stared her down like the last kruler in a box.

Apparently this was all a part of “being one of the girls.” She’d been working here for a while now, but this was the first time she’d actually been invited—or felt comfortable enough—to have break with her co-workers. For the past few months she’d been eating her lunch and listening to the radio in her car. It was nice to feel so welcome… maybe all those extra helpings the other day had helped her make some friends around here!

Over by the radio, Alice looked over her shoulder expectantly, giving her a clear view of the hallway outside the break room. She couldn’t hear or feel any of Jenna’s thunderous footsteps, so that meant either she was already in her office—where she couldn’t see them—or she was abusing her managerial position again and hadn’t come into work yet. Given how long it could take her blonde beluga of a boss to lift herself from an office chair or tear herself away from a breakfast buffet, there was no telling when Jenna would be back to where she could see them…

“Okay, just a few more minutes.” Alice said with a naughty giggle escaping her as a quiet chorus erupted from her fellow fatties, “I really wanna hear the second date update!”

Alice flicked the radio back on and hurried as fast as her doughy legs could carry her back over to the lunch table. A smile settled between her chubby cheeks as everyone laughed—it seemed all it took to get By-the-Book Alice to live a little was some radio… and maybe an extra donut or two.

After a pesky song or two, Alice and the girls were rewarded with more quality time with their favorite morning talk show. They listened intently and gave their own unrequited responses amongst themselves, particularly regarding the bad first dates section that they all seemed to enjoy. Nobody seemed to notice that twenty minutes had passed, and that they were almost half an hour late back to work…

“Y’see Christie, it’s all about taking it easy once in a while.” Courtney said in a pseudo-sagely manner as she dug into another treat (this time a bagel) “Even Alice knows that. Work’s important and all, but you’ve gotta live a little if you’re gonna survive around here. Which is why the girls and I got you this, newbie.”

Here Courtney plopped one of the biggest, fattest donuts Christina had ever seen in front of her on a napkin. It looked like just a regular glazed donut under a magnifying glass. Nothing strange about it other than its peculiar size.

But she’d already eaten quite a few of them, and her stomach was really starting to hurt… plus, it wasn’t even lunch yet.

“Thank y—urp!” Christina covered her mouth as best she could to bolster the belch behind her lips, “But really, I shouldn’t.”

“Aw come on!” Courtney said with a pat to Christy’s comparatively tiny back, “I just told you that it was Friday and that you should live a little. Saved the last Super-Donut for you and everything! Do you know how hard it was for me to convince Melissa not to eat this?”

“T-Thank you, but…”

Christina looked back to the glazed monstrosity before her, unable to ignore the fact that it was coated in so much sugar that the break room’s lighting was clearly reflected in the slick coat of confectionary sugar on top. It stood taller than most sandwiches…

“But I really shouldn’t.” she managed, “It looks so bad for me…”

“Hey, you think those Super-Donuts are cheap?” Melissa barked from her seat across the break room, “You’re just lucky we’re actually giving you yours this time instead of just ordering it for you and splitting it up three ways!”

“Melissa.” Alice said sternly

“What? It’s rude is all.” She said in a huff, “She wants to fit in and all, then she’s gotta go and ruin it by being a prude.”

Christina turned tentatively to Courtney, who pursed her lips knowingly and drummed her fingers on the table expectantly. They didn’t really think that she could handle all this, did they? Maybe if she were their size, but…

Gripping the side of her super-donut, Christina lifted it into her mouth and took as big a bite as she could muster—which wasn’t much. But still, considering that she’d been coerced into eating nearly half a dozen regular sized donuts already, it was saying something that she could take such a chomp.

Bite after bite passed through her lips with erratic precision. No two chomps were quite the same: mostly small, due to the pain that slowly grew in her stomach, but she managed to take a couple big chunks out of the task at hand when she realized how little of it was left. She was sweating, her stomach was so full. It pressed tightly against the white of her blouse as the other women looked onward in excitement. They cheered her on in an attempt to keep the scrawny girl going, lest she fail to devour the Super-Donut. It was sweet and sickening, and Christina felt like she was going to barf every other bite...

But before long, her super snack was nothing more than just that—a snack. A good snack, great even! Maybe one of the best donut’s shed ever had in her whole life.

One that had left her sick and feeling bloated all morning, but a snack still.

Okay, two big indulgences down… how much worse could it get? It’s not like being “one of the girls” meant eating like that all the time, right?
13111.title: Christina and the Super Donut

choices: Christina talks with some of the girls
Christina and Vicky go to the gym
131112.content:
Fortunately Christina’s coworkers didn't force any more food on her. They would rather have more for themselves than to give away a tasty treat. Unfortunately for Christina, that wasn't going to stop her inevitable weight gain.

There was simply too much food around for her to resist. Walking into the break room to the noxious smell of fresh doughnuts was too tempting for the skinny girl.

“I guess I could have one.” She would say. But one doughnut is a slippery slope. Every day she would have a doughnut, until she started having two doughnuts. Then every time someone had treats she would partake. She started to become friendlier with her coworkers, leading to more and more lunches in the cafeteria. At first she was able to justify eating her salads for lunch alone, but as she made friends in the office it was harder for her to say no to a fattening cafeteria feast. She slowly started to adopt her friend’s gluttonous habits.

Slowly her defenses against obesity started to fall. She stopped going to the gym and stopped walking to places (mainly cause her friends never wanted to walk). She could hardly be called fat especially compared to her coworkers, but more and more her weight increased. Her body filling out what was once lean muscle with soft fat.

Of course for Christina she barely noticed her subtle gain. Her new friend group made her look like an Olympic athlete. In fact her coworkers/buddies were about the worst people to help Christina with her weight. One was an absolute pig (Melissa), one was a completely oblivious weight gain prodigy (Victoria), another was a 350 pound former cheerleader (Alice), another, her boss, can barely stand on her own (Jenna), and last but not least, her mentor, was perhaps a 400+ glimpse into her future (Courtney).
131112.title: A bad influence

choices: "Going to the gym" quickly becomes "going to the restaraunts AROUND the gym."
Christie gets called in that Saturday to help Melissa and Alice with something
1311122.content:
Christina lightly cupped the soft pot belly in both of her hands. It was soft to the touch, and surprisingly lively. She’d press deeply into the soft creamy surface of her skin, only for the pressure to cause some other area on her tummy to swell. Her lips in a tight and tiny frown, she rolled the tank top back over her belly.

Looking in the full-body mirror, all the young former intern could see was her pot. It stuck out so far that who cared if her breasts were getting bigger? So were her arms, her legs… her butt. Even her face was rounder! A whole fifteen pounds that had just materialized into and onto her body—something had to be done about this.

She let out a puff of venom and left the bathroom.

This was insane. She’d never had a weight problem before, never so much as gained a few pounds that didn’t melt right back off. And it was never more than five, tops. Maybe ten if Thanksgiving came around the wrong time of the month. Something had to be done about this…

***


“I’m so glad you talked me into this.” Victoria said with a slurp of her smoothie, “This place makes the best strawberry banana blend!”

Christina watched as the olive-skinned secretary drowned herself in icy mix. One hand held the cup between five chubby fingers while the other swiped at her phone. The usually prim and proper Victoria had dressed down in light of the occasion, however Christina couldn’t help that she didn’t quite understand what she was supposed to do at the gym.

Both had dressed light in respect to the spring weather. While they’d come in heavy coats to ward off the chilly New England breeze, beneath their North Face jackets both had worn their best workout attire. Christina in a tee and yoga pants from her college days (that, unfortunately, were much tighter than she would care to admit) with sneakers. Victoria in a tank top that wrapped around the two prominent folds of her belly while squeezing her proud Italian bust line. Below, however, Victoria had opted for a pair of tight black running shorts that were stretched to transparency. Her enormously inflated ass had left her booty shorts spread so thin that not only could Christina make out her friend’s panty lines, she could also clearly make out what color they were…

Christina took a slurp of her own smoothie, albeit a tiny one filled with self-conscious examination of her own pudgy paunch.

“So, like, what do you wanna start with?” Victoria asked obliviously as she tied her long black hair back, nestling her blend between her breasts as she topped her head with a Yankees cap, “We could do… um… that thing. Or that. Or… whatever that is…”

“Crunches.” Christina answered as her chub rumbled, “Definitely crunches.”

***


Christina sat porcine on the matted floor, struggling to so much as breathe. She’d began sweating after crunch number three, having hardly done so much as one crunch since her Gen Phys Ed her freshman year, and had so far made it all the way to crunch number fifteen.

However, her belly was still very present. She’d half-way expected it to disappear every time her elbows touched her knees, but every time she was greeted with the dumb smile that her belly made with her huddled position.

“O… Okay…” Christina huffed, rolling onto her side, “Good… Good start.”

Meanwhile, not but a few feet away, the treadmill creaked ominously as heavy dragging footfalls scraped against the track. Flabby arms flailed wildly as the rest of Victoria attempted to stay with the low setting. Lifting one elephantine leg up after the other every day was something she barely did every day, hardly preparing her for this “exercise” thing.

Christina couldn’t help but watch the big black bubble off her butt bob up and down with every belabored step. The mirrors in front of her showed that poor Victoria was sweating buckets, her moon-pie face absolutely enflamed in a beat beet red. Her gut jumped up and down with her every movement, visible beneath the white tank top that clung tightly to her sweaty shape.

Suddenly Victoria fell, landing on her belly and knees with her big round bottom stuck high in the air. Her Yankees cap fell off too, but both eventually slid down to the floor of the gym. Victoria soon struggled to stand, and quickly shut off the devil machine before fixing her hair.

“This is stupid.” She whined, “Christie, can we go yet?!”

“Vicky its… it’s only been half an hour. I’ve still gotta work my arms, my legs… maybe do some butt clenches.”

“Ugh!” the spoiled secretary stomped her foot, sending her thunderous thighs and bulbous belly into a frenzy, “Can’t we, like, at least go get a pizza or something? I’m starving!”

“We had McDonalds on the way over here!” the younger girl said, exasperated and exhausted, “Look just… just, uh, go get some smoothies. I’ll do some push-ups and then we’ll go. Okay?”

“Fine.” The immensely thick Italian said with a huff as she whipped around, back to the smoothie bar, “ Don’t even need to be here anyway…”

Christina rolled her eyes as she got back into position. She laid down on her hands and knees, still able to feel the sweat that had come off of her back. She kicked out her legs and dropped down to the floor (now able to smell her sweat, gross!) before pushing down on the floor with her untoned arms.

“O-One!” she grunted, “Tw… Two!”

Her arms gave out, and she collapsed into a skinny pile of blonde assistant right there on the yoga mat. She was really out of shape!

…And she apparently smelled, really bad.

“Hey, Christie, they said they only served smoothies from ten to eleven.” Vicky came back in all of her pudgy preciousness, “Y’wanna head to like Taco Bell or something and get one?”

Christina worked her way back to a standing position, brushing herself off with both hands and taking deep pathetic breaths before continuing.

“Tell you what.” She wheezed, “I’m gonna go… shower. Then we’ll… I dunno… go back to McDonalds and… and get a milkshake or something.”

Eh, what the hell. She’d done pretty well today. She deserved a little treat…
1311122.title: Sweat and Spandex

choices: Victoria struggles to fit into her fancy workout clothes
they only walk on a treadmill for a few minutes then stuff themselves
13111221.content:
Victoria and Christina continued to go to the gym. Christina was a bit surprised when Vicky wanted to work out again, since she hadn’t even exercised for more than a few minutes the first time and she left a bit upset after tumbling off the treadmill. Christina wasn’t going to ask her to comeback with her but Victoria seemed excited to go back. Of course Victoria didn’t actually enjoy any form of exercise and she was too naïve to realize that she actually could use some exercise given her increasing weight. The real reason she wanted to join Christina was simply because going to the gym seemed like a hip thing to do for someone her age. The tight sporty clothes, the expensive energy shakes, the cute headbands, the high tech iphone apps, Victoria was totally hooked on the gym fad. Well other than the actual exercising in a gym part.

“Hey Vicky, you ready for the gym tomorrow?” Christina asked. Victoria swallowed her doughnut.

“Totally, gotta make sure I stay in shape somehow.” Victoria said confidently.

“Ughh, yeah STAY in shape… Right.” Christina said softly.

The next day Victoria picked up Christina on their way to the gym.

“I’m not sure getting taco bell before we work out was a good idea.” Christina said.

“I’m pretty sure it’s actually good for you. Have a big meal then burn it off in the gym.” Victoria said.
13111221.title: "Going to the gym"

choices: all this "working out" with Vicky is only gonna make Christy really friggin' fat
Christina's gym membership has some unusual benefits around town...
131112212.content:
Just because she was a blonde girl with big breasts in a low-paying position in an entry level job didn’t mean that Christina was stupid. She was pretty smart, actually, which was why she was the first to notice a flaw in Victoria’s logic.

“Oh yeah, I think I should totally be able to eat whatever I want now that I’m working out.” The softly shaped secretary announced proudly, “I mean I burn so many calories throughout the week on my workout, I’m pretty sure that I could order one of everything on the menu here and not gain a pound.”

The two of them were, of course, crammed into their customary booth at Taco Bell. Victoria on the side away from the counter while Christina was forced to stare down the glowing menu hanging from the ceiling. Christina had almost choked on her softshell taco upon her workout buddy’s contented announcement, stifling a snort with a little help from her mouthful of meat.

“Vicky, I’m… pretty sure that’s not how that works.” She said, mildly amused by her friend’s zeal for meals, “You’ve still gotta track how much you eat. You’ve still gotta track fat grams and calories and make sure you’re burning more than you’re storing.”

“And I’m like, so good at all that stuff!” Victoria interjected, “My mom practically raised me on pasta and I never gained a pound. Back in high school, I could eat all I wanted and I never gained any weight. I’ve got, like, a super metabolism. I swear, I burn so much energy doing the littlest of things.” She punctuated her point by taking a huge chomp out of her burrito, deep throating the cheesy meaty mess into her greedy maw

Christina couldn’t help but interpret that as she got tired after doing the littlest of things. It was pretty hard to take Vicky’s claims of a so-called super-metabolism seriously when she easily outweighed Christina by a good hundred pounds in below the waist weight alone.

“Yeah…” Christina ventured, attempting to shoe-horn some reality into Vicky’s delusions, “But… you know we only go to the gym on Saturdays, right? I mean it’d be different if we went every day, but you know… work and all.”

“Ugh, I know.” Vicky swallowed, not breaking eye-contact with her wrap, “We should totally do this more though. I love working out.”

Christina watched her friend wrap her lips around the tortilla-wrapped mess and choke down another bite. As she chewed Vicky’s chubby cheeks bulged with her current intake, and a glob of sour cream dotted the corner of her mouth. She’d broken a sweat way back on taco number two, and the light perspiration that misted her forehead was still present below her headband in the fluorescent lighting. Her soft olive skin bulged out of her track suit, her arms packed into the tight sleeves of her top, as various parts of her ample anatomy shook and shimmied in its struggle to remain comfortable in too-tight clothing.

“You think we could do Sundays too?” Victoria ventured, forcing her mass of masticated mush down her throat, “I, like, never have anything to do on Sundays.”

“Uh… no, I can’t do Sundays.” Christina pulled the judgmental thoughts from her head.

It wasn’t like she was in any place to judge someone for her weight. Since she’d started going to the gym every Saturday, she’d somehow still managed to put on another five pounds. Five more pounds in just three weeks, despite watching her diet and doing her best to stop at one donut every morning in the office. These little outing with Victoria were great, but they seemed to be spending a lot less time in the gym and more time in the restaurants outside the gym…

“B-But I can do Wednesdays after work!” she said suddenly, her hand cupping the swell of her pot lightly underneath the table, “I just… uh… really wanna shed some pounds, y’know?”

“Okay, I can do Wednesdays.” Vicky said thickly through her mouthful, still gripping the remains of her burrito in one hand, “So, what, like carpooling? Because I know this great little smoothie shack right down the road and I could totally drive us there before we work out.”

“Y-Yeah, whatever.” Christina said dismissively, “And we could, like, walk to the gym from there right? Yknow, get some cardio going?”

“Ugh, I dunno… we’re gonna walk to the gym later. Do we really wanna tire ourselves out on just… walking? We should do that on the ‘mills.”

“Mills?” Christina asked, eyebrow raised

“Yeah, its gym slang for treadmills.” Victoria said with a slurp of her soda, “I use gym slang now.”
131112212.title: Witness the Fitness

choices: They go on a discounted eating spree all around town.
Christina shows off her gym benefits at lunch with some friends.
1311122122.content:
They continued to workout together. Or at least Vicky’s version of “working out.”

Christina was starting to become weary of her fattening gym trips. She was smart enough to see the flaws in her and Victoria’s absurd workout routine. And she could especially see the flaws in her own stomach. Christina was starting to notice her body accumulating doughy flesh. Unfortunately she was almost too smart in that she always managed to convince herself that her gym trips were somehow worth it.

“But we do always work up a sweat still… that’s always important. And I really like spending time with Vicky, she always makes me laugh. How do I know it’s not something else that’s causing me to gain weight? I’m going to keep going and see if anything changes.” Christina thought to herself.

“Christina, hurry up!” Victoria yelled. Christina was in the locker room bathroom at the gym. Christina then washed her hands and walked out of the bathroom.

“Ready, V?” Christina said. They waddled out of the gym. They were both still sweaty from their exercising. They managed a whole 12 minutes of walking on the treadmills before calling it quits.

They were still in their gym clothes as they made their way to the exit. While Christina used to look only thick next to the obese Victoria, she now looked undoubtedly fat. Although one was much bigger than the other, their doughy bellies bounced with each step. Their thick jiggling thighs rubbed together. Christina’s plump, soft features filled her clothes rather tightly, while Victoria’s clothes were struggling to keep her ample flesh from escaping.

“Yesterday I was looking at the gym’s website and I found a whole list of discounts and deals you can get with a membership from here.” Christina said.

“Really? I wanna see that.” Victoria said. She pulled out her smart phone and they both stopped walking near the gym exit. “50% off 2 pizzas… 3 burritos for the price of 2?... Free fries with a drink! This is awesome, Christy!” Victoria said with excitement.

“Pretty cool, right?” Christina said.

“Forget our usual meal, I think we should take a trip around town. Let’s see just what this membership can get us.” Victoria said with a devilish grin.

“I think I have the time.” Christina said with a bit of her own excitement.
1311122122.title: Member benefits

choices: All the discounts make it hard to remember exercising—Vicky and Christy balloon!
Vicky's bubble butt is starting to become an occupational hazard in the office..
13111221221.content:
According to the app on her phone, an iced caramel frappe would cost her 680 calories. Which would have been great to know three frappes ago, and she probably would have turned down that muffin if she knew how many fat grams were in it. The scones were a terrible idea, with or without the icing, and taking a sip of Vicky’s milkshake couldn’t have been the wisest of decisions. At this rate, the only thing she could eat here was the free samples by the door! Why would they put this place outside a gym?!

“Mm, ohmigod…” Vicky said throatily, her mouth full of frozen dairy product, “Christy? These things are the best. You’ve gotta try one.”

“N-No thanks…” Christina’s distress was obvious to anyone who wasn’t Vicky, “I’m, uh… I’m gonna go to the bathroom. Jog. Jog to the bathroom.”

“Oh come on, if you buy one more, I get the other one free!” Vicky cried out as Christina removed herself from the booth

“N-No thanks!”

God, what was happening to her? Not that long ago, Christina was a model of skinny girl chiq! But now, here she was drinking down calories like they were going out of style! She pumped her soft arms back and forth with every exaggerated step, her round pot-belly wobbling noticeably underneath her tank top, and let out shallow puffs of air at a time. Securely inside the bathroom and making sure she was alone, Christina whipped out her phone.

“Okay, six hundred and eighty calories… times three…” she swiped her thumb over the calculator app, “three hundred and eighty for the muffin… I had two scones, so four-sixty times two… oh my god…”

Thirty-three hundred and forty calories. In one sitting.

Christina pressed her sweaty back against the wall, her heavy breathing echoing in the bathroom as she attempted to calm herself down.

No big deal, right? They hadn’t even gone to the gym yet. She could burn all that off, right? How long did it take to burn thirty-five-hundred calories? Surely if she just ate this (for the rest of the day!) she’d be fine. This and breakfast wouldn’t kill her. Just a carbo-load. Athletes do it all the time…

Right?

Oh God…

***


One…

Two…

Three…

Ugh!

Christina collapsed on the mat, sweating in all the wrong places after only three half-situps. When crunches had started becoming something of a problem for her three weeks ago, one of the gym regulars suggested doing sit-ups to work up her core. But lately even those were starting to become impossible…

Her hands reeled in over her stomach, resting on the swell of her pudgy paunch as it lay distended and flabby. In this position, the belly-flab pooled outwards as it sunk under its own weight, collapsing into her lovehandles and collecting her sweat off of the matt. The sound of her and the mat meeting had progressively gotten louder every week, but Christina was sure that she’d heard the distinct sound of her modest amount of backfat clapping against the mat.

She struggled to look down, seeing only the white mounds of her t-shirt clad hooters and the mountain peak of her belly.

Ugh, how long had her belly been big enough to see over her tits…?

In a sudden burst of energy renewed, Christy launched into another sit-up, touching her elbows to her knees for the first time in weeks in her frustration-fueled frenzy. She later, however, fell back onto the mat. Down for the count, if her sides and neck had and anything to say about it…

She lay there for three solid minutes before working up the strength to remove herself from the floor, cautiously rocking her way over to the smoothie bar, wary of her aches and pains, and eased herself down onto a stool next to Victoria.

“Mm, good workout?” Vicky asked innocently as she slurped on her smoothie, not looking up from her phone nor deviating from the straw, “This place is the best, isn’t it?”

Christina’s eyes narrowed to slits as she stared daggers at Victoria, who hadn’t left her seat at the smoothie shack since they’d been here. Granted, that had only been about half an hour, but it seemed that her work-out buddy was more concerned with what cap went with her outfit than she was with working out.

slrrrrp

Christina smacked her lips as she watched Victoria guzzle down a rich blend of banana and strawberry…

“You know these things only have like, two hundred calories?” Vicky asked, turning her attention to the immensely sweaty Christina for the first time since she’d sat down, “I just, like, can’t stop drinking them.”

Christina looked over to the menu.

“Ouch, they’re… really expensive.” She wheezed

“Not if you have one of these babies…” Vicky whipped out her card, well-worn as ever despite their short time together, “Cut the price in half, and then cut that price in half. They’re like, super cheap.”

Christina watched as Vicky slurped again, resting the cup between her two titanic tits as she used both hands to fiddle with her phone. Beside her, several empty cups sat discarded, presumably the ones she couldn’t get enough of…

“Umm… how many of those have you had?”

“What? Oh, like, five.” Vicky said with a snort, “But who cares? Lo-cal right?”

***


Everyone at the table grimaced at the bill. It was everyone’s least favorite part of the meal, given how enormous their appetites were. The main downside of eating so damn much was that it was expensive. You were going to wind up paying for it one way or the other…

“Oh my…” Alice gasped, her pudgy hand cupping her lips as she cut her curse short, “I knew I should
have stopped at seconds…”

Melissa crinkled her nose as her bill over to Alice silently, hoping that nobody would notice.

Christina wretched at the rather large number next to ‘total’. Surely she hadn’t eaten that much’s worth of food tonight, had she? God, she felt like such a pig. Nothing to do now but pay for it, said the girl with the messiest purse in existence. Just had to find her credit card and…

“What that?” Alice asked, pointing to the little gold card Christina had put onto the table

“Oh, it’s my gym membership card.” Christina mentioned off-handedly while she rummaged through her purse

“Ew.” Melissa curled one nostril at the golden card, "Jeez Christy, we all know you’re the skinniest girl in the office, no need to rub our noses in it.”

“No no, I just brought it because I thought I might…” —click!—“Get a discount?”

"No way, you get a discount here?!" Melissa roared, suddenly impressed by the tiny piece of plastic, "That's so cool."

"Well... maybe, I dunno." Christina said, pondering the possibility, "I mean, everywhere else accepts this thing, and it's pretty close to the gym."

"If I had that—" Alice started, but was cut off

"We'd have to roll you into the office!" Melissa said with a playful nudge of Alice's ample side-fat, "You'd never leave that little Chinese place on Eighth and you know it. I'd have to rent a forklift just so we could go out on Friday nights!"

Alice immediately grew very flushed at the notion, and fell silent.

Christina's mouth watered, against her better judgment... she couldn't possibly have been hungry after all that—

"That place with the Lucky Cat in the window?" she licked her lips, "You think I could use my discount there?"
13111221221.title: Perks of Healthy Livin'

choices: Christina is no longer "the skinny one" she's become a full blown fatty!
Christina and Victoria are bragging to their friends about their discounts.
131112212211.content:
Christina and Victoria were going crazy over their gym discounts. They were always on the hunt for new discounts. They were hooked on the thrill of savings.

“I can’t believe our membership works here. This place wasn’t even listed on the website!” Christina said, licking the sauce off her chubby fingers.

“Ha, good thinking, asking the women at the gym’s front desk.” Victoria said. She leaned over to show Christina the long receipt. “Can you believe it? All that for just 30 bucks?”

“Wow that might be a personal best. That might be considered robbery!” Christina said with a smirk. “You know we haven’t been to the gym in a while.”

It was true. They had both been too caught up in their pursuit of finding every discount in town. Despite Victoria’s complete aversion to exercise, the thought of the smoothie bar at the gym peaked her interest. She rubbed her swollen, yet still hungry belly.

“Let’s go then.”


They waddled into the locker room. They weren’t planning on going to the gym today but luckily they both had their workout clothes in Victoria’s car.

They both striped down and suited up. It had been almost 3 weeks since they had been to the gym, and it showed.

“Ur- urrrr… Christy can you *pant* help?” Victoria said. She was trying to pull up her black spandex leggings over her giant bulging bottom. She turned around showing Christina her soft pale cheeks. Christy grabbed the stretched material. The two women grunted and huffed as they slowly pulled up over her jiggling flab.

“*huff* Thanks.” Christina struggled to bring her shirt down over the curve of her doughy hanging belly.

It was clear that they had done some expanding since they last wore these clothes. Christina’s chubby butt peaked out from her tight track pants. The polyester fabric that wrapped around her blubbery thighs made a noise as she waddled. Victoria’s giant belly and bottom bounced with each plodding step. There were several small holes in her spandex leggings as her fat stretched out the fabric. There was a small sliver of flesh around her waist as her shirt failed to cover her ample doughy midsection. You could see every curve, roll and flabby fold on the two overfed plumpers. Their tight, overstretched clothes showed every bounce, wobble, and jiggle of their swollen, out of shape bodies.

“You know we should probably get some smoothies first.” Victoria said.

“Yeah for like fuel.” Christina responded. “Plus with the discount, we’d be dumb not too.”

They waddled over to the bar. Victoria’s enormous bottom hung far over the edge of her seat. They started off with a strawberry banana smoothie.

“Mmmmm… This is really good!” Christina said sucking down the last of her drink.

“I know! Oh you should try the pineapple one.” Victoria said. Christina was just going to have one smoothie before she worked out but the taste was too good, plus it was such a good deal.

“That one was even better.” Christina said.

“Why not another? You’ll really like this one.” Victoria said. And so they continued to go down the menu. One after another they sampled smoothie after smoothie. They just went down so smooth.

“Are their anymore smoothies to try?” Christy asked.

“What about one of the shakes?” Victoria said.

“I don’t think we should be drinking protein sha- Oooh there’s a chocolate one!” Christina said. The tubby “gym members” certainly didn’t need to order a protein packed “Bulk-up Shake” but with a resemblance to milkshakes and flavors like chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry, it was hard for them to say no.

“These are *burp* a bit more filling. I’m not sure these will help us lose weight.” Christy said. She rubbed her full gut.

“What? We’re in a gym, how could it possibly be bad for you?” Victoria said, sucking down the shake. Christy could’ve argued but conveniently accepted Victoria’s logic.

They spent a long time and emptied many cups sitting at the smoothie bar.

“It’s getting late, wanna go?” Christina asked.

“Yeah, that was fun.” Victoria said. The two women dropped from their stools with a thud. Their giant bloated bellies bounced heavily as they hung out of her shirt for everyone to see. They certainly provided a lot of motivation to the rest of the gym goers.
131112212211.title: Eating in the name of savings

choices: Screw "tomorrow"! Christy needs to work out NOW!
Alice takes Christy aside and apologizes.
1311122122111.content:
Christina was the first to realize that she had a problem, rest assured.

Over the past couple of weeks, as well as the ones in the near future, Christina had begun to implore Victoria that the two of them actually visit the gym from which the memberships they so gleefully abused hailed from. A snack here, a meal there, but then it was off to the gymnasium to melt of some pounds!

…In theory.

In practice, however, Christina would find her willpower hardly as bolstered as she would have thought. For every crunch, sit-up, rep, pull-up, or crunch she managed on the sweaty gym floor, there were at least a hundred calories to make up for it. Christina would sweat and sweat and work and sweat for a pathetic amount of time before calling it quits and taking a breather with increasingly idle Victoria—which almost always resulted in her work out for the day being prematurely cancelled.

And so, despite her genuine zeal for weight loss, Christina wasn’t finding herself losing much of anything. She would begin every day with a conscious effort at psyching herself up for squeezing in as much exercise as she could in one day—walking papers over to her coworkers instead of emailing them, lifting heavy files, using that little ball she bought to put between her legs and squeeze, butt-clenches at her desk, anything to get herself moving. However, she would find herself defeated day in and day out at increasingly early intervals.

The only muscles Christina would strengthen in those coming weeks would be her jaw, her sole limits tested were her lethargy and appetite, and the only direction her pants size would go was up…

***


Christina instinctively tugged at the clingy material that wrapped around her bobbing belly. She pinched and distorted the fabric, uncertain as to whether or not the pattern was slimming. It didn’t look slimming in the mirror that morning, but it was either this or her Librarian Clothes. She wanted to look fun and pretty…

Her hand cupped the round pudge that pooched heavily over her waistline, the vinyl material stretched over her vast paleness. Even her hand looked fat, with thick squishy arms that lacked their previous definition of bone and muscle. She frowned instinctively at her willful pudge, too stubborn to just go away already.

She wanted to look fun and pretty, even if she was fat.

Christina took a few steps forward and opened the door into the break room, an eruption of girlish gabbing going unheard by the self-conscious employee as she imagined booming footsteps following her every movement. Surely she wasn’t that fat. But this dress had been a mistake, for sure. It was breathy, yeah, but it was so close against her skin… it couldn’t have been flattering.

And it wasn’t. Christina’s big butt had the workings of a shelf behind her, each cheek moshing from within the floral pattern of the vinyl-polyester summery dress. She had gotten quite hippy lately, with her thighs flaring outwards while her legs thickened beneath her. Even her toes had gotten fat—evidenced by her open-toed sandals to complete the easy-breezy-I’m-not-fat look she tried so desperately to pull off.

Her round face flushed as she felt the eyes of her coworkers beat against her as she walked towards the vending machine. Just a soda and an apple pie, she warned herself, or no dinner tonight. Gotta eat healthy, gotta eat right. Tomorrow was Wednesday, so maybe she could convince Vicky to jog to the gym with her… oh--

The cool touch of the glass sent a chill through Christy’s shape. Maybe she’d taken a few steps too many forward… no point in stepping back now, just deal with it…

”You know Cass, I’ve been thinking.” Gnoshed a distinctive voice from the radio, followed by the familiar sound of rustling plastic bags, “If fe would juff ignore all the critfism iftead of jufmm.mmmm… mmpmhm…”

Christina punched in the numbers, an anxious sweat misting her forehead. Surely nobody here was in any place to judge her for her weight, right? For God’s sake, none of these girls could even sit on the same break room bench with one another. Surely just because Christina might have put on just a teeny… tiny amount of weight, no one would say anything.

The little spring whirred and the apple pie fell to the floor of the machine. Here came the worst part—bending over. Her pants had all ripped right down the seat, thus the dress. Even if this dress wouldn’t rip (rather, shouldn’t rip!) she had an overall distaste for the action by this point.

”Marni, Marni, Marni… you know I can’t understand you when you talk with your mouth full.” came an irate and deeper woman over the speaker, ”Jeez, are you eating again? I thought the studio asked you not to bring food in here anymore?”

”Oh gimme a break, I missed breakfast.”

As Christina bent over, she gave everyone in the break room a prime view of her big round ass. Courtney led the room in playful catcalling, which was nice of her, but still rang kinda hollow to currently self-depreciating Christina.

“Ha ha, you guys.” She said, her round face flush with embarrassment as she whipped back around with her apple pie in tow, “I’ll have you know that I’m going to the gym tomorrow, so you’ll have a lot less to catcall at by this time next month.”

“Oh jeez, stop being such a prude.” Melissa said with a roll of her eyes, “Trust us, we’re the experts on fat girls. And you’re no fat girl.” She slapped her gargantuan stomach, stuffed into a tight white blouse and brown skirt. The mammoth middle shook violently at the action, while Melissa’s other hand fed her donuts.

“That is a fat girl.” Courtney said with a thick thumb to Melissa, “And a pretty unrepentant one at that.”

“Oh bite me.” Melissa crinkled her nose at Courtney, biting viciously into her donut

“Guys… come on.” Alice said in an almost maternal manner as she nudged her head towards the sulking Christina, who hadn’t taken to the joke as well as the others had, “Christina, sweetie, you look great. Really. I dream of the day I could pull of a cute little dress like that again.”

Christina smiled, despite herself. Alice’s comment made her feel a little better, but she still felt like a stuffed sausage in its casing. She sat down next to Alice, and she did her best to play the wallflower again. She wasn’t feeling exactly confident in herself, you see…

”Okay so maybe I’ve put on a little weight, but I do not have a problem!” Marni huffed and puffed over the speaker ”I go to the gym, like, six times a week! I’ve got the discount points to prove it!”

As Christina nibbled away on her pie, trying to make it last, it dawned on her that she had hardly been paying attention to the conversation at hand. She’d been sitting there for a good five minutes while talk radio poured in over the loudspeaker system, and she’d zoned out a little.

“I dunno Courtney, I could totally see myself getting a gym membership.” Melissa said with a wry smile, “I mean, Christina’s gym gives out all these free discounts and shit… I could deal with a little exercise if it meant I get to save some money.”

Courtney just laughed, “I’m sure you’d have to actually go to the gym in order to get the discount, ‘Lissa.” Her entire body shook with amusement, “You shouldn’t be able to just sign up and get discounts. It doesn’t work that way.”

Melissa leaned in in an effort to hush her voice, but Christina could definitely hear what she said…

”Looks like it works pretty well for Christina, huh?”

CREEEAK THUMPUMP!

”Whaa--!” Marni’s voice reemerged once the distinct sound of chair splintering settled, her voice muffled in its distance from the microphone, ”C-Cass! Hff... hff...Help me up?!

Christina stood up from her seat at the table, little droplets of tears behind her glasses, and stormed out of the room. Courtney punched Melissa in the flabby arm while Alice shot her a dirty look, but it couldn’t make up for Christy’s hurt feelings…

”I rest my case, Mega-Marni.”
1311122122111.title: Inadvertant Intervention

choices: Christina and Victoria embrace the full power of their gym discounts
A more confident Christina enters the break room.
13111221221112.content:
Christina waddled out of the break room and dropped in to her desk chair. Tears were sliding down her face. She heard footsteps and looked up to see Alice.

“I’m sorry about Mel, she’s just cranky. She didn’t mean to hurt your feelings.” Alice said.

“But *sniff* she’s right. I’m such a pig.” Christina said grabbing her doughy belly for emphasis.

“Oh Christy, you’re the farthest thing from it.” Alice paused. “How about we go to the gym together?” Christina stopped crying.

“R-Really? Like now?” Christy said.

“Yeah, I wanna see what you and Victoria are always talking about. I doubt Jenna’s gonna do anything.” Alice said. Christy smiled and they walked towards the door.

“We’re leaving early, I’ll explain tomorrow!” Alice yelled to Jenna.

“Wait, what’s going on? Let me come!” Victoria said as she struggled to get off her chair. She half jogged up to Alice and Christina outside of the office.

“Wha- *huff* Where are we *wheeze* going?” Victoria huffed as they waddled through the parking lot.

“The gym, and… I guess you can come along.” Alice said, not wanting to say no (Vicky probably wasn’t taking no for an answer anyway).

They piled into Alice’s car and swung by everyone’s place to pick up some gym clothes. It was hard for Christina to stay upset as Alice whisked her off to the gym, combined with Victoria’s gullible confusion she had officially flipped her frown upside-down. Finally they parked and walked into the gym.

“Oh these smoothies are too DIE for! You’re gonna love them.” Victoria gushed.

“Smoothies?” Alice asked.

“Yeah, they have strawberry, pineapple, My favorite is banana, actually I think cherry and blueberry is my favorite… or maybe lemon and raspberry.” Victoria continued to gush about smoothies until they got to the locker room.

“Bulk-up shakes?” Alice said.

“Yeah I don’t know why they call them that but they taste sooo good, you’ve gotta try one.” Vicky said.

“I think I’ll pass, but that sounds cool.” Alice said. Christina giggled at Victoria. They each went up to a locker and took out their work out clothes. “I don’t think I’ve been to a gym in years. I can’t believe I still had workout clothes in my closet.” Alice said. She had a habit of making half-assed attempts to get in shape. Which meant every year or so Alice bought new gym clothes only to use them while she sat eating on the sofa.

Christy sighed as she could feel her clothes clinging to her pudgy frame. She did feel a bit better though as she looked at her two friends next to her. Alice’s sweatpants looked like tights as her thick legs removed any bagginess and comfort that usually came with sweatpants. Meanwhile Victoria’s spandex leggings left little to the imagination as her enormous rear stretched the material.

“So do you have like an exercise routine?” Alice asked as they walked out of the locker room.

“Uh… sorta.” Christina said halfheartedly.

“I’m just going to go to the smoothie bar. I don’t like sweat.” Victoria said. Alice wasn’t surprised, but she wasn’t about to let Vicky sit this one out.

“C’mon Vicky don’t bail on us.” Alice said.

“But… but…” Victoria said.

“I’ll pay for your smoothies when we’re done.” Alice said. That was an offer she couldn’t refuse.

“Let’s do the treadmill for a bit.” Christina said. They waddled over to the treadmills. They each started a slow walk. Christina went up to a faster pace. Victoria and Alice were barely staying on their feet. Their large bottoms wobbled violently as their bulky gelatinous thighs squished together.

Christina was starting to breathe heavily and sweat trickled down her head. She started to feel disappointed in herself, as her thoughts from earlier returned. That’s when she heard the sound of the treadmills turning off. She looked next to her to see Vicky and Alice standing still.

Victoria and Alice were weezing and covered in sweat. Alice was hunched over and leaning heavily on the machine. Her legs trembled as they struggled to hold up her bulk. Victoria clutched her chest as her pudgy bosom rose and fell with her huge gasps.

“I *huff*… I *wheeze* qu-quit.” Victoria said as she stumbled to the smoothie shack.

“Ye… Yeah let’s *pant* do something *huff* else.” Alice squeaked.

“Sure. How about sit-ups?” Christy said. They waddled over to the mats. Alice dropped to the floor with a thud. She really wanted to quit but she wanted to keep it up for Christina.

Christina looked up at her breasts and belly as she laid on her back. She hated that she saw her doughy gut sticking out past her breasts. She looked over at Alice.

“Just give me a *pant* second to catch my *huff* breath.” Alice said. Christina looked at Alice as she lay on the floor. She was surprised how huge Alice was. Her shirt stopped a couple inches above her belly button. Her half naked gut looked like a big dome of blubber. Her thick arm fat oozed on the floor. Her giant breasts made most of her neck disappear. Christina definitely didn’t feel so big anymore.

“Alright let’s start.” Christina struggled as slowly she lifted off the mat. She tried but couldn’t go all the way up before she fell back down. She looked over at Alice. With her legs up Alice’s belly rested against her thighs. She groaned and through her momentum forward. Except the only thing that came off the mat was the back of the head. Her body stayed pinned to the floor. Her breasts, belly and thighs squished together as she made another attempt but she remained grounded.

“You don’t *huff* have to *pant* stop.” Alice panted. Christina went back and made a few more attempts. She managed to go all the way once before falling back with a thud.

“So, what’s *gasp* bothering you?... I know Melissa can be *pant* mean but why does it bother you so much?” Alice said.

“I just… I’ve gotten so fat.” Christina huffed.

“Well, so what? Join the club. There’s no punishment for being fat… aside from wearing bigger clothes.” Alice.

“It’s just that I look so big and…”

“Big? You’re the skinniest one at the office. You always wear tight little dresses and skirts that make us jealous. Life is a lot easier if you have confidence in yourself.”

“I guess.”

“And don’t let Melissa bother you. She wished she looked as good as you.” Alice said. Christina smiled.

“Let’s stop. I could definitely go for a smoothie.” Christina said getting off of the mat.

“Oh god, let’s hope Victoria hasn’t bankrupt me.” Alice joked. They waddled over and sat next to Victoria.
13111221221112.title: Alice takes Christy aside and apologizes.

choices: Eased by Alice's input, Christy finds a better balance in eating and exercising
Inspired by Alice's input Christy starts to loosen up around the office a little
131112212211121.content:
Okay, so maybe she was overdoing it a little.

Maybe, given the current happenings around the office, it wouldn’t have been particularly wise for Christina to order several entrees all to herself. And maybe, just maybe, it was a bad idea to ask for the extra-large, only-available-on-request cup and fill it with a sweet bubbly nectar that was Baja Blast. But a) you could only get it at Taco Bell, and b) her membership rewards made it just a bit more affordable.

Which made it pretty easy to justify the burrito triplets, a cheesy gordita crunch, and an order of nachos all to herself (with one of those little bags of Doritos that they gave out!)

“Oh my God Alice, now that you’re gonna exercise with us, you can totally eat whatever you want!” Victoria announced, aggravated by her coworker’s restraint, “Stop being such a baby and actually get something that’ll fill you up.”

Alice tucked the little gold card back down into her wallet and banished it down into the depths of her purse. She’d never felt so stupid, signing up from this gym membership.

“I-I don’t know, Vicky… I still feel pretty dumb for even getting this thing. I work later than either of you—when am I even gonna have the time to go?” she pursed her full pink lips around her straw and took a sip, “Plus, I’m pretty sure that’s not how ‘exercise’ works… especially considering you didn’t do any…”

Christina gnoshed down on her prey, oblivious to the world as she pierced her burrito’s soft tortilla skin and guzzled down its sour creamy blood. Once she swallowed, her hands instinctively wriggled their way down the neck of her meal before taking another bite, and so on, only occasionally breaking to take a slurp of her delicious green drink.

Maybe such an indulgence after all of her weight woes wasn’t the smartest thing to do, but dammit it made her feel better!

“Then like, you should totally start coming on Saturdays with me and Christina!” Vicky said contentedly, “Like, Christy totally won’t mind, will you?”

“Mmphmhm…” Christy mumbled through her burrito

“Saturdays are when I hang out with Melissa though… and Wednesdays are when Jenna keeps us after.” Alice interjected, ignoring her friends voracity, “I mean, I could go with you guys every once in a while though. Do you go on Fridays?”

“Sometimes we go on Fridays.” Vicky said with a sip at her straw, only to get an abrasive (yet familiar) slurping noise in response “I’m gonna go get a refill.”

As Vicky made her announcement and unlodged herself from her place in the booth, it did not escape Alice to sneak a peek at the immense Italian’s prodigious backside. It was easily her most distinguishing feature, and growing more and more pronounced by the day. At least as large as her own, but on a girl half her size. The two rolling avalanches of butt blubber sloshed lazily in Vicky’s tight spandex, stretched to transparency over her quivering olive mass. Her thighs rubbed together audibly—the sound of spandex on spandex making an unmistakable noise with her every awkward gait—and her flabby arms swung from side to side slightly with the motion.

Vicky stepped to the sodajerk and put her cup under the fountain, her flabby belly cutting into the stainless steel counter on which the machine sat despite her generous distance from it…

“So does she, like… not… know?” Alice asked Christina, without looking back, “With the way she talks you’d expect Victoria to be a little… um… a little er… Christina?”

“Whu?” Christina looked up from her meal, cheeks bulging with masticated meaty mush, “Shorry I wushn’t… glp… paying attention.”

Alice’s eyes softened slightly, making the svelter blonde take a large bite of her gordita, “Christina, are you still upset about what Melissa said to you?”

“Doh.” She said before swallowing, “Why would I—“

“Sweetie, I know a thing or two about comfort eating.” Alice said with a slight sternness, “Enough to recognize it when I see it.”

Christina sighed in a semi-silent relent.

“Ugh, fine. I am.” She said sharply, “It’s just… where does she get off calling me fat? I mean I know I’m fat, but she… but she… ugh. Hurt my feelings, so now I’m stuffing my face.”

To punctuate her point, Christina grabbed the remaining burrito left on her tray and took a big chomp out of it. She shoved the food to one side, giving her one bloated cheek, so that she could continue to make her point before continuing to make Melissa’s.

“Guess I am fat, huh?”

Alice tentatively touched her friend on the arm and waited for her to swallow.

“If you keep eating like that, maybe one day. But for right now, you’re still the skinniest girl in the office.” Alice said with a smile, “Just be careful, and don’t let anyone get to you so bad. You’ve got to have confidence in yourself, or every time somebody calls you “fat” or “tubby” or “wide-load”, you’ll wind up eating exactly like you are today.”

There was a silence as Christy finished her food, looking Alice in the eyes while she swallowed.

“I guess I did overdo it a little today, huh?”

“A little. Can’t have you winding up looking like me or Vic—“

“So I was thinking that, after this, we’d show Alice that little café down the road!” a third voice, Victoria, re-entered the conversation, “You know, that one with the giant muffins and the extra-extra-extra large coffees? Oh my God, and the smoothies too! They’re almost as good as the ones in the gym! And maybe we could all get one of those big, fat, chocolate chip cook—”

“Vicky, I’ve already been there…” Alice objected softly

“But not as a member!” Victoria announced proudly, “What’s the point of having that card if you don’t enjoy all the discounts it can bring?”

“To maybe go to the gym?” Christy interjected dryly

“Whatever, besides that!”
131112212211121.title: Check-Up Session

choices: Vicky, Christina, and Alice go on a discount priced food rampage
Christy's new confidence leads to quite the weight gain.
1311122122111212.content:
Christina stood in front of the bathroom sink. She looked herself over in the mirror. She smoothed her shirt wrinkles on her belly. The shirt was a bit tight around her soft midsection and breasts but she thought she pulled it off. She might not have had much of an hourglass figure anymore but she still had more than any of her coworkers. Her hair looked really good, she thought. Christina walked out of the bathroom and into the break room. There was Courtney, Melissa and Alice chatting while they stuffed themselves with junk food.

She waddled over to the refrigerator and opened the door. Bending over she searched through the contents of food. This sparked chorus of catcalls from Courtney followed by Mel and Alice. Christina playfully shook her ample rump to play along with the bit. She even did a little dance as she pulled the piece of birthday cake out of the fridge and sat at the table. Her belly still wobbling as she took her seat.

“Yeah then she said she pretty sure she’s still at her high school weight.” Courtney said.

“Who are we talking about?” Christina asked.

“Vicky. It’s so weird when she’s at the smoothie bar at the gym she’ll sometimes order the weight gain protein shakes just because they taste good!” Alice said.

“Haha seriously? That’s kind of funny actually.” Courtney said.

“Ha Yeah only Victoria could gain weight at a gym.” Christina joked.

“Are you sure she’s the ONLY one, Christina?” Melissa said snarkily. Christina blushed, but she wasn’t about to get upset over lame quip.

“At least my buttons are all still here.” Christina said, pointing to the gap in Melissa’s shirt were a button had popped off. It wasn’t satirical genius, but whatever. Alice and Courtney giggled.

“Yeah, gut get a little too big to handle?” Courtney said, playfully poking the naked belly blubber where the button used to be. Melissa cracked a smile.

They all became quiet as they heard a crashing noise and a yelp.

“I think Vicky just broke her chair.” Alice said.

“Or Jenna.” Christina said.

“No that would be much louder.” Courtney said
1311122122111212.title: Christy loosens up

choices: Christy wins a free 6-month upgrade to Premium Gym Membership on the radio!
Christy goes clothes shopping! Lord knows she needs it...
13111221221112122.content:
At the gym, three seats were hidden in plain sight beneath the copious amounts of bottom blubber. Victoria’s immense rear end had graduated to a seat per cheek, but Christina’s ever-expanding bottom was beginning to engulf more and more of her chair with every passing outing.

“Mmm… you know, these are good.” Christina said with a nod of approval, placing her chocolate milkshake back down on the smoothie shack’s countertop, “I mean, they’re bad as hell for you, but still. Not bad, not bad.”

Vicky slurped down hers eagerly, her toes clenching beneath her barely-broken sneakers. Her drooping olive gut brushed against the wood of the counter, her uppermost stomach slab spilling onto the surface of the counter.

“Right? But since we’re working out…” she trailed off before stealing her milkshake back from Christina, “We can totally have as much as we want. You want one?”

“No, I think I’ll just get another smoothie.” Christy crinkled her nose before smiling at the woman behind the counter, who went right to work on making her a double banana blueberry, “A lot easier to eat, plus I’m in kind’ve a fruity mood today.”

“But you’ve like, eaten every flavor.” Vicky huffed, upset by Christy’s lack of willingness to admit she was right, “You sure you don’t want something new?”

As Christina’s smoothie came up and she passed the girl her cards (both membership and credit) the doughy blonde representative took a big slurp from her straw.

“I’m pretty confident that I’m just gonna stick to smoothies for now.” She said with a laugh

***


“Here’s to Health Insurance!”

Five chubby arms raised in the air and clinked their glasses, clear champagne sloshing around in each crystalline container before being downed by their respective drinkers. The restaurant was somewhat hoity-toity, and no one really wanted to make a scene, but tonight was a cause for celebration.

“After 12 months of working with us, you’re finally a real employee!” Courtney said with a laugh, “If you had just quit your stupid internship we coulda given it to you sooner, but…”

“Yeah yeah, whatever.” Christy said dismissively, “Heard it before, shoulda jumped on, shoulda told my boss to go screw himself, shoulda done a lot of stuff. What’s important now is that I’m officially one of you guys!”

Christina’s announcement rang true in more than one way, of course. While it was true that now she had become a fully-fledged member of Gordge Enterprises, Christina was also beginning to fit in around the office in more than just status.

Her strapless blue dress hugged her expanded form tightly, little rolls of back fat dimpling behind her shoulders. Her doughy arms wobbled with every movement, and the bigness of her belly was beginning to stress the front of her ensemble for the evening.

“Welcome to the office, Christy!” Alice laughed, “It’s not like you haven’t spent the last eighteen months with us anyway!”

Christy’s thick arm shot forward to grab a complimentary roll once she saw that Melissa was making a move on the basket. Her chubby fingers wrapped around the soft piece of bread before she took a bit chomp out of it—leaving her coral lipstick on the remaining grain.

“Jeez Christy!” Melissa whined, “It’s not like there’s not six other pieces there.”

“Not if you had anything to say about it.” Christy said with her chubby cheeks full of bread, “I’m pretty confident in saying that you would have eaten them all if you had the chance.”

Everyone, sans Melissa, laughed.

***


It was midnight in her apartment, and the only light to be seen came from the dimly lit refrigerator in Christina’s kitchen. The low hum of the machine’s motor filled the room, and made the floor vibrate slightly at its feet.

“Mmm… this looks yummy…” she licked her full pink lips with a greedy, salivating tongue as she reached into the frigid ice box and pulled out a Tupperware container.

She’d woken up not but five minutes earlier, her belly grumbling wantingly for something sweet and filling (despite the fact that tonight had been pizza night, and she’d emphasized the ‘pizza’ part extra tonight) It just so happened that there was a little chocolate cake in the fridge that she’d been saving for just such an occasion… since this morning.

Christina’s wide and generous shape eclipsed the light from her fridge a little more every night. However, from behind, it gave a perfect impression of how far her gluttony had taken her. The once slender employee had grown quite round, with round heart-shaped hips and rolling curves that shook whenever she walked. Even now, her belly and love handles lay completely exposed by her lacking tank top, soft creamy pudge lapping over her panties and eclipsing her crotch.

With one thick arm, she held the cake out decadently, while the other rubbed her burgeoning belly. They'd both grown impressively thick these past few weeks, with her indulgence yielding her wobbly arm wings and increasingly toneless appendages. Even her fingers looked completely unrecognizable, from the slender typer's fingers had grown ones more akin and accustomed to munching on donuts and sweets around the office. Her round face flushed red with excitement and greed as she eagerly awaited her sweet delicious treat...

“I’m pretty confident that I’ve earned this…” she said with a greedy grin, drooling from the corners of her mouth, “After all tomorrow is Wednesday…”
13111221221112122.title: Corpulence con Confidence

choices: This obviously calls for a trip to the gym.
Christina explores all the advantages of her new membership.
131112212211121221.content:
Christina shoved another handful of fries down her throat.

“I onsh shaw *gulp* Melissa eat 4 boxes of Oreo’s for dessert.” Courtney said. The booth table was littered with dishes. The combined effort of Courtney, Christina, and Alice was too much for the waiter to keep the used plates from stacking up.

“That’s incredible. So are we ready to go?” Alice said, grabbing her bag.

“Yeah let’s go.” Christina said, squeezing out of the booth.

“Man I need to get me one of those memberships. That cost me a fortune.” Courtney said, struggling to get on her feet.

The trio waddled out to the parking lot and climbed into Courtney’s car.

“Man I am stuffed.” Christina said as she rubbed her swollen gut. Turning on the car the radio came on.

“It’s not my fault your seats are small! I just think making me pay for two plane tickets is too much.” The voice came through the speakers.

“Hey that’s Cass and Marni, turn it up!” Alice said.

“Looks to me like your butt is too much.” Cass said. “Call in and tell us what you think, also we teased it earlier, we are giving away a free 6 month premium membership to Fit Life gym to our tenth caller.”

“CHRISTINA, that’s YOUR gym!” Courtney said with giddy.

“If you don’t call them I will.” Alice said reaching for her phone. Christina already had her phone in hand. She dialed the number.

There was a long moment of silence as Christina waited anxiously for a response.

“Looks like we’ve got our tenth caller.” Everyone tensed up. “Christina, are you there?” Alice and Courtney shrieked with excitement before quieting down to hear Christina.

“Uh yeah, am I the tenth caller?” She asked nervously.

“Yes you just won a 6 month premium membership to Fit Life Gym. That’s gonna give you bigger discounts around town, free use of the saunas and massages…”

“And don’t forget free smoothies at the smoothie shack!” Marni interrupted.

“We have very different uses for the gym, Marni. Anyway Christina you can come down to the studio at 224 Main Street to pick up your prize. And we’d like to thank our sponsor Fit Life the…” Cass’s voice as quieted by the car stereo. Christina stayed on the phone for a couple minutes with one of the radio producers. As she ended the call they all made girlish screams.

“Oh my god, oh my god. Where was the address?” Courtney asked.

“224 Main street. Do you think we’ll meet Marni or Cass?” Alice squealed.

“Could that happen? Oh my god free massages and smoothies!” Christina yelped.

They zoomed over to the studio. They were lead through several rooms until they were standing just outside a radio booth.

“Omg that’s them!” Alice said. Cass and Marni talked for a few second before removing their headphones. Cass got up and walked out of the booth. Marni stayed in her seat and pulled out a large sub which she took a big bite out of. Cass walked over to the blubbery trio.

“Which one of you is Christina?” Christina squeaked out a response. “Well congratz. Maybe I’ll run into you at the gym.” Cass said. She then walked pass them. Another guy gave Christina a bunch of paperwork to sign and then finally handed her a shiny black card.

As they left the radio building Christina checked her phone. One voicemail from Victoria. She wondered what it could be about.

“AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH… End of message.” I guess Vicky tuned in too.
131112212211121221.title: Tenth caller

choices: Massage Parlor!
Steam Room!
1311122122111212211.content:
It was plainly obvious that none of the officious ladies that waddled in some time later that week were even passingly familiar with the teachings of a gym.

The particularly large one with the distractingly large breasts, Alice, had crammed herself into yet another expensive purchase of expansive exercise clothing. The entirety of her upper half was painted a soft pink by the tight clingy clothes she’d stuffed herself into, complementing the lovely shade of red her cheeks had grown in the short distance from the car to the door. Her lower half was a darker shade of magenta, the outline of her belly tucked beneath the waistband of her sweats clearly defined as it pressed tightly against the confining bottoms and spread the gap between her ensemble—a slight smile of pale pudge creeping into view every so often, forcing her to tug at her top. Her mammoth arms swung at her sides in her attempts to keep momentum going, and her mouth hung open slightly as she struggled to breath.

Opposite her was Victoria, who seemed peculiar in that she seemed more breathless than her much larger friend. While no doubt immense in her own right, she was still at least forty pounds Alice’s junior. Vicky’s exaggerated pear shape was never more evident than in her spandex lycra workout leggings—stretched to transparency over the olive tree trunks that were each of her thighs. Her upper half was hardly as contained though, as her peculiar denial over the matter of her weight had robbed her the decency to tuck her tummy into her waistband. The soft, malleable mass that was Vicky’s voracious gut slapped loudly against her fat thighs, and wobbled with increasing ferocity at her every awkward step. Between her proud Italian bust, she’d crammed a milkshake with the straw aimed to her mouth, leaving her hands free so that she might update her Facebook status and report that she was going the gym.

The proud contest winner herself, Christina, looked almost svelte between the two of them. She’d opted for a rather modest t-shirt that she’d stretched over her puckish upper half. The past few months of her rapid expansion had lent her no favors in the clothing department, as even now the soft smile of her underbelly could be seen bobbling out from under the hem of her tee, much like Alice she had been forced to tug down on it every so often to keep herself decent. Her glasses had been removed in anticipation of her incoming workout with the premium membership, making her face look thinner, but her half-sleeves wrapping around her doughy upper arms, combined with the chubbiness of her wrists and lack of definition in any part of her body counteracted the modest favor.

The three of them hobbled up to the front counter, whereupon Christina proudly flashed her Premium Membership card…

“Alright Miss, if you’ll just follow me I’ll show you there.” The trim, toned attendant said with a smile as she stepped out from behind the counter

Christina happily obliged, her two flabby friends following suit as the skinny minny lead them down the hallway where, Christina noted, the bathrooms were.

“You take your card.” The woman said, whipping out her own platinum colored membership certificate, “And then you put it under the scanner.”


A quiet beep sounded that she was safe to go through.

“There are mats in the center where the TV is, some treadmills and exercise bikes if you’re a real cardio nut like I am, the strength stuff is in the back, and if you’ll go past that, there’s the sauna and massage parlor.”

“Great, thank you very much!” Christina smiled as she, Vicky, and Alice attempted to step through

The smile on her attendant faltered slightly at the intrusion.

“I’m afraid that, if your friends don’t have Premium memberships, they’ll have to stay outside…” she said with a practiced friendliness, “We’re kind’ve a new gym, and getting people to pay for the Premiums is a really big deal. My boss would kill me if she found out…”

***


Fit Life Gym really was a new gym.

The Premium room was almost completely empty, at least the main section with the cardio equipment was. Except for the attendant that had let her in after the other one left, there was only maybe three people inside, Christina included.

And they were both really skinny.

For a while, Christy just kind’ve stood there, unsure of what exactly to do. Admittedly, she was a little intimidated by the other women in the room. One of them looked like Jillian Michaels, and the other one looked like that woman from the Golf channel. And here she was, weighing in at almost two hundred and fifty pounds.

Maybe she could just… avoid them? That woman who led her here said that there was a sauna and massage parlor.
1311122122111212211.title: Members Only Benefits

choices: it's Cass, relaxing after a long day of working out!
it's Marni, relaxing after a long day of "working out"!
13111221221112122112.content:
Deciding that her option was infinitely better than risking anyone who might be in the back room with all the weights and stuff, Christy opted to go try and snag a spot in the sauna.

***


“Ahh…”

Christy loosed up enormously as soon as she sat down on the dripping wet tiled seat, her ass spreading wide with her combined weight atop it. She’d undressed (having the foresight to bring a bathing suit in hopes of testing out their highly advertised steam room) and had come in to find the room already quite steamy.

She lay back against the wall, the moisture in the room running down her back as it clung to the wall. In her reclined position, her singularly large gut spilled out between her legs, thighs separated in pleasure that doubled as allowing her belly some room to breathe. It touched the tile too, wet on her underbelly now. From her seat, she kicked her chubby legs in enjoyment.

Her two noodley arms supported her bulk, their vertical positioning causing the pudge on her upper arms to droop downwards towards her elbow.

This room… she could get used to having this room all to herself for the next six months.

She closed her eyes and her head lulled back as steam overtook her. The heat was high, but not overbearing. It was a relaxing warmth that she allowed inside her. Soon she began to sweat, and moisture began to accumulate upon her like she were merely a fixture in the room.

Overcome by some curiosity, Christina found her hands slowly travelling to the great round mass that was her gut—now wet and dripping. She touched it tentatively with both hands, kneading the fleshy mass like bread to be.

It felt… really good…

“Hiya.”

the sound of another voice shook Christina out of her steamy stupor, and her heart shot up into her throat.

“Whatcha… um… whatcha doin’ there?” the voice said, sounding uncomfortable, “I figured you might have been breathing heavy because of the steam but… yeah, just making sure.”

“I-I-I-I… ohmigod.” Christy squeaked, “I’m so sorry, I thought I was alone and—“

“Hey, it’s no big deal, just… you know, you’re not.”

From deeper into the steam room, near the corner, another shape emerged to join Christine in her sauna. The doughy office girl had been so relieved to finally get into this sauna, she hadn’t taken the time to make sure that no one else was in here with her! How embarrassing!

“Hey, I recognize you, you’re that girl who came down to the studio!” the voice sounded more familiar now, “At least you’re using your prize, right?”

Wait, Christy recognized that voice...
