131112212211121221122.content:
The shape became much more clear as heavy, wet slapping sounds filled the room. Before long, Christina found herself sitting next to quite a round woman who, if their sitting positions were to be taken into account, was about a foot shorter than her.

“I’m Christy Smith, you might know me better as Marni from the Cass and Marni Morning show on KISS102.5.” the spherical woman announced with an air of self-satisfaction amongst the mist, “Always happy to meet a fan.”

Needless to say, Christina hadn’t really imagined Marni to be so… big.

Sure there were some off handed comments about her weight every now and then, but Christina hadn’t really picked up on any implication that Marni was a human butterball. The bench that the two of them sat on was a little thin, but Christina managed to sit on it just fine. The woman next to her, little more than completely naked, was practically pouring herself onto the floor. Her belly drooped completely off the side of it, and her fat thighs were only half on. The only thing that was completely seated was the hostess’ hind quarters—moreso that she took up more of it than needed than anything.

Christina could hardly wonder how a woman with no neck could be a radio hostess, her thick double chin eclipsed it entirely. Her elephantine arms wobbled as she stuck her hand out to shake, which Christina took.

She looked way different on the billboard downtown…

“Actually, I’m Christy Summers.” Christy smiled awkwardly to the steamy swollen siren, “Do you think I can maybe call you…”

“Marni? Oh sure, everyone does.” That air of self-satisfaction was strong, “I sign my checks that way, I have all my friends call me that, it’s totally cool.”

“Cool.” Christy said with a smile, torn between her bewilderment at the spherical celebrity before her and awe that she was sitting to everyone at work’s favorite hostess! “So do you and Cass, like, hang out here or what?”

“Cass? Nah, she’s doing yoga.” Marni said dissatisfied, “You mighta saw her, tall brunette with really big boobs?”

“Looks like Jillian Micheals?”

“Kinda. In the right light.” Marni agreed with a nod of her little no-neck, “Without the weird monkey nose.”

Christy laughed, taken moreso by Marni’s ‘real-peopleness’ than the actual humor of the joke.

That was a joke, right?

"You know, this steam room is greeeeeat..." Marni said with a sly smile hidden by the steam, "But if you wanna really get the most out of your membership, you should...
131112212211121221122.title: Mega-Marni in the Mist

choices: Alice and Vicky try to get their hands on a premium membership
Free choice
1311122122111212211222.content:
“Really?”

“Oh yes those massages are to die for. I just got one actually.” Marni said. She leaned her head back and slouched down. Her swollen legs weren’t even touching the bench anymore, instead her overfed bottom spread even farther over the tile.

“Cool.” Christina checked the clock. “You know I actually think I’ll get one now.” Christina said as she lifted her chubby mass.

“See you around.” Marni said.

Christina waddled out of the steamy sauna. She dried off her sweaty blubber and went to get a massage. She struggled a bit to climb up onto the table. Her flabby belly and breasts spread onto the table like pancake batter. The masseuse came out and started to press deeply into her back. Christina’s midsection had gotten so doughy recently. This included her thick rolls of back flab which the masseuse rubbed thoroughly. Christina felt a little embarrassed feeling the hands sink so deep into her squishy layer of fat. The masseuse most of been grossed out trying to find any muscles in all her blubber. But didn’t Marni say she’d gotten a massage? Even Christy felt slim next to a short butterball like Marni. Christina calmed down. She actually was really enjoying the massage.

Christina turned over. Her meaty back hit the table with a thud. The female masseuse sunk her hands into Christina’s swollen belly. Christina let out a little moan of pleasure as her big gut was squished. She wasn’t quite sure what the Masseuse was doing since she couldn’t see past the horizon of her jiggling cleavage but it felt sooo good. It wasn’t a sexual pleasure as much as it was a sensual pleasure. Either way she was just going to enjoy it.

***

Christina waddled out of the premium area of the gym. She spotted Victoria and Alice over at the smoothie shack. Had they been drinking smoothies this whole time? Christina thought. She waddled over and plopped onto a seat next to them.

“Hey Christy! What was it like Ms. Premium member?” Alice asked.

“It was really cool.” Christina said.

“Like, what did *slurp* you do?” Victoria said sucking down a smoothie.

“Well I went to the sauna for a while. Oh you won’t believe who I met there!... I talked to Marni!” Christina squealed.

“You mean, Marni and Cass, Marni?” Alice said. Christina nodded.

“No. way. What was she like?” Victoria asked with giddy.

“She’s like, practically the same as she is on the show. I also saw Cass but I didn’t get to talk to her.” Christina said.

“Did they look like they do on the billboard?” Victoria asked.

“Hmm… Cass looked like Jillian Michaels sort of. She was really fit. Marni was shorter and rounder than I thought.” Christina said.

“What do you mean rounder?” Alice asked.

“She wasn’t just round really. She was like… BIG.” Christina said.

“Big? Like… Fat?” Victoria said.

“Cass often mentions she’s gained some weight. I always pictured her with some chub.” Alice said.

“No she was really fat. Like FAT fat.” Christina said, holding her arms to gesture a giant belly.

“As big as Alice?” Victoria asked. Alice frowned.

“Uhh. Not exactly, close, but she was short so she looked even fatter.” Christina said.

“Wow I wonder when that billboard picture was taken. Anyway what did you do next?” Alice asked.

“Then I got a free massage, which was amaaazing.” Christina bragged.

“I think I need one of these premium memberships.” Alice said.

They continued to talk as they kept sucking down smoothies and shakes. They left the gym with their bellies bloated and heavy. Victoria and Alice especially were packed full of smoothies. Their guts hanging freely out of their clothes.

Alice hatches her own scheme to get a free membership...
13111221221112122112221.content:
”—and if you’re still wondering, Marni and I are still giving away Premium Memberships to Fit Life Gym on Main. That’s six months no down payment, no deposit, no strings attached. You call us, you win, you go and you work up a sweat. Be caller number ten around lunchtime and you six free months at this place. You’re not gonna get a deal like that anywhere else! In the next eleven minutes we’ve got…”

“Oh my God Alice, please don’t tell me you think that’ll work.” Victoria said smugly as she clogged the cubicle’s doorway with her massive posterior, “Like, if you want a premium membership, you’ve gotta like, earn it.”

Alice sighed exasperatedly as she turned the volume down on her personal radio, her chubby fingers twisting the dial.

She never entered these stupid things, and this was probably the reason why. Three straight days of calling in at every chance she got, and still no membership. She was always really close though, caller number nine or caller number eleven. It wasn’t like she was jealous of Christy or anything. She won fair and square, and Alice couldn’t be mad about it. It was just…

Well, she would have made so much better use of it is all. Actually worked out, actually used the treadmill, actually go to the gym to exercise. She’d been trying to lose weight (off and on) for the past few years now and then suddenly Christina gets, like, the best gym membership offer ever? It just figured, with her luck, that she’d have to watch someone practically throw away something that she’d been begging for since the start of her swelling.

“What do you mean?” Alice asked with a polite, yet practiced, interest, “Christina won six months Premium Membership from doing this, are you saying that I can’t?”

“Like yeah, Christy was a fluke!” Vicky said, amazed by Alice’s apparent ignorance, “Plus you’re like, super unlucky. If you wanna win a Premium ‘Ship—“

“—Ship?” Alice asked, eyebrow raised dryly

“—Gym Slang.” Vicky explained quickly, “Then you’ve gotta work the numbers.”

Alice’s flabby arm moved the mouse on her computer over to the tab marked ‘FIT LIFE—MEMBERSHIP PACKAGES’ and clicked, showing a professional-looking chart with lots of various packages available and their prices stated.

“I have been, and there’s no way I could afford it.” She said glumly, “It’s a hundred bucks a month, and between my tailor and my apartment… and Melissa… there’s just no way I could—“

“Not those numbers!” Vicky said, waddling her way into the already crowded cubicle, “Like, your Discount Points. The points you get every time you swipe your little gold card at all the places we go out and eat.”

“They keep track of those?” Alice asked incredulously, her interest genuine by this point, “How many is a Premium Membership?”

“I think it’s like, a hundred thousand.” Vicky answered, Alice cringed slightly at such a high number that shattered her dreams so expertly, “But listen! Like, every time you get your card swiped somewhere it’s a hundred points. Me and Christy go out to the gym three times a week and we eat twice. So I did the math—“

Somewhere somebody coughed expectantly

“—Okay, Courtney did the math and like, that’s 600 points just going out to eat. But they also count when you use your discount on the smoothies and milkshakes and stuff, so that puts me at two thousand a week and—“

“Two thousand a week?” Alice exclaimed incredulously, “Vicky how many of those things do you drink?!”

“Ugh, like, get Courtney to do the math, I dunno.” She said with a roll of her eyes, “So like, If I go to the gym six times a week instead of just three, that means I’ll have four thousand points a week!”

“Vicky, even if you did go six times a week, you’d still have to go every day and order all that every day and eat all that every day for the next six months before you got a premium membership.”

Vicky sauntered a little closer, cocky as ever, and gave that little airheaded smirk she gave whenever she thought she had a good idea—which wasn’t often.

“Like exactly.” Vicky announced proudly, her hands resting confidently on her wide (wide wide) hips, “I figured that by the time Little Miss Premium Member gets out, I’ll wiggle my way in and see what it’s like to have a sauna all to myself!”

Alice’s jaw dropped. It actually dropped. How could anyone think that this was a good idea? Vicky had hatched some hairbrained schemes before, but this just didn’t seem healthy. Alice wanted a premium membership to Fit Life too, but not nearly as bad as Vicky did, apparently.

“Vicky, you know you can’t do that.”

“Why not?” Vicky asked in a huff, “It’s not like Christy’ll know! I’ll just go with her on Wednesdays, Fridays and Saturdays and all the days in between!” she answered with a satisfied little smile

“Yeah, but you can’t just eat your way to a Premium Membership, it’s not healthy!”

“Duh! It’s a Gym! I’ll just work it off while I’m there!” Vicky turned her impressive pearness and headed back out to the hallway, “Sure beats sitting on my butt waiting to be Caller Number Ten.”

***


Christina slurped on her milkshake absently. She could see why Vicky liked these so much.

Okay, so she really shouldn’t be here without Vicky. Or at least Alice. It wasn’t fair. They were workout buddies and... and there was just this unspoken code between them that they shouldn’t work out without each other. It was like that time when Vicky skipped ahead on Netflix without her knowing. It somehow just felt… wrong.

However, all of her doubts melted away as soon as she saw the masseuse come her way. She put the milkshake down on the bench, but rejoiced with a little squeak upon being told that she could still sip away while she got manhandled by the little Korean woman.

Oh God… this was heaven.

Getting pampered and rubbed and kneaded… sipping on milkshakes without lifting a finger... she should do this more often.

A lot more often…

It wasn’t like anyone would know. Premium Members only right?
13111221221112122112221.title: In Want of Membership

choices: Alice has been hatching her own plan to get a premium membership.
Victoria talks to Courtney.
131112212211121221122211.content:
Christina had been a premium gym member for two months now and she had been enjoying it to the fullest.

She swiped the card and waddled in to the premium facilities. There was a separate locker room for the premium members who wanted to use the sauna or get a massage. She had two smoothies in hand to sip. Christina started to take her clothes off. As she pulled her shirt off her bulging belly flopped down on her thighs. Her juicy fat rolls jiggled with her every move. She switched into a bikini. Christina took a glimpse of herself in the mirror. Her swimsuit was getting really snug. Her soft fattened breasts squished together to make a long crease of cleavage. The tight bikini bottom was giving her a wedgie as it struggled to fit over her wide round bottom. She lifted up her gut to see the front of her swimwear. She had gotten them a month or so ago and they already were pinching into her increasing layers of blubber. Christina picked up her two smoothies and waddled into the massage room.

The female masseuse greeted her and Christina awkwardly heaved herself onto the table. She laid on her back with her belly sticking up. There was no doubt Christina had gotten fatter since becoming a premium member. She had filled herself up with all those extra special discounts. And don’t forget the smoothies. She had even fallen for those bulk up shakes that only weightlifters and Vicky drink. A lot of it had gone to Christina’s overfed middle. The masseuse’s hands sent ripples through her giant gut flesh. Her belly was like a big dome of jello that constantly wobbled and jiggled as Christina packed it full of sweet and salty foods.

Her belly wasn’t the only thing that had gotten fatter though. Her face was becoming nice and round, filling out her cheeks more. Her arms also were now flabby and plump. But Christina didn’t care. She was in such pleasure as she sipped her smoothie while blubbery body was massaged.

“Sorry Vick and Alice, this is too much to resist.” Christina said to herself.

Little did she know she wasn’t the only one sneaking in extra gym trips.

***

Victoria waddled through the gym and over to the smoothie bar. Her whole body jiggled as she pumped her rotund legs. A lot of her belly was on display as her shirt struggled to cover her rolling mounds of blubber.

She took a seat at the bar of the smoothie shack. Her obese body barely managed to fit in her chair.

“One banana strawberry.” She said. Vicky spread her thick legs apart to give her gut some room. She had already used her member discounts at Taco Bell and Roman’s Pizza before she came to the gym, and her belly was pretty packed. Victoria wasn’t done eating yet, though. She sucked down her first smoothie with ease. She ordered another one which didn’t last long either. Then she ordered a chocolate protein shake. Which she sipped for a while.

Victoria was in ecstasy as she gorged herself. I am so going to get that membership. I’m getting so many points! Let’s see, today I got 100 for the meat lover’s pie at Roman’s. Then there was another 100 for the burritos. So that’s 200. Then this is my… 3rd smoothie? Or was it 4? No, no it’s the 3rd. actually I’m gonna order another.

“A blueberry orange please?” Victoria said.

So that’s 400 smoothie points. So in total that’s… uh… 600! What did Courtney say I need? 600 points a day…Or was it 700? Hmmm… I’ll just get some ice cream across the street, just to be safe.

Her 4th smoothie came to her. She started slurping it up.

She had been doing this every day for the last two months. When she wasn’t hanging with Alice or Christina she was shamelessly feasting on the various restaurants around town. She didn’t have a good grasp on numbers so she recruited Courtney to help her keep track of her progress of achieving 100,000 discount points.

What Victoria had failed to notice over the last two months (and the last few years really) was how her body was handling her eating. Her spandex covered thighs looked like giant plump sausages. Her bottom was so large it had lost any of its round shape, instead it now was just two enormous mounds of jiggle. Her belly had split into two doughy slabs of doughy fat. She was looking more and more like her elder coworkers (Alice, Melissa, and Courtney), in that there wasn’t a single part of her body that wasn’t covered in a layer of soft and flabby padding.

She took the last sip of her smoothie. Vicky rubbed her bloated gut.

Ha, I should have been doing this earlier. I can’t believe Alice said my plan was crazy! She’s probably just a little jealous that I’ve got such a nice body. I forgive her though, I’d be jealous if I didn’t have my good genes.

Victoria grunted as she lifted herself onto her feet and left.
131112212211121221122211.title: Day in and day out.

choices: Jenna and Courtney are at lunch
Christy and Vicky "working out" that weekend...
1311122122111212211222111.content:
“Thanks again, Melissa…” Alice said with as much earnest as she could muster while pawing at the box of donuts, “I really appreciate you helping me out and everything.”

With a heavy thud, Melissa’s massiveness came toppling down atop the bench seat. Even as she collapsed, her girth continued to wobble as it attempted to settle itself into a sitting position. Her thick arms wrestled with all four boxes and the iced coffees that she’d picked up upon Alice’s request. Two iced caramel frappes the size of beer mugs, one for each of them to slurp down on break.

“No sweat Al.” Melissa said with a little chortle, “Jeez, you’d think I was giving you a kidney.”

Alice popped the top on her box, great gut grumbling greedily at the sight of the glazed sugary temptresses before her. Still warm, too! That little bakery next to the gym never seemed to let her down, and with the added bonus of her discount…

“Oh, here.” Melissa said, mouth already full of masticated mush, as she handed Alice the tiny gold card between her two sausage digits, “I know you don’t like to be separated from your precious member card.”

For the past two months, Alice had idly been working her way to a Premium Membership at Fit Life Gym on her own. And while she didn’t quite agree with the voracity with which Victoria tackled the problem, Alice had to admit that her way had its merits. It also had its calories, which was why she would be undertaking this challenge nice and slow—she would get a membership, yes, but there was no point in spending all that money at once and keeping up with all those points...

Which was where Melissa had come in. Since her greedy gal-pal outright refused to set foot in a gym, let alone sign up for a membership (despite the innumerable discounts it provided) Alice had seen fit as to allow Melissa her own hand in attaining Alice’s prize. Every so often the two of them would go out to eat, and Alice would let Melissa ring up with her membership card. That way, Alice gets the points and Melissa gets the discounts!

Everybody wins!

“Mmm… these’re good.” Melissa grunted as she made her way through the pastries, “Figures they’d put this place next to a gym, right?”

“Yeah.” Alice half-laughed, “Well you’ve gotta treat yourself, right?”

Alice had been doing a lot of that lately—more than usual, to be precise. In fact, ever since she’d gotten this stupid card, it had enabled her to eat just a little bit more without feeling the negative impact on her wallet. It showed in the additional fifteen pounds or so she carried on her already bulbous frame. Most of it went straight to her chest, but Alice’s best skirts and dresses were going to be getting snug… again… if something wasn’t done quickly. Maybe she’d better pay George another visit soon…

”And that concludes our new… hff… Munching with Marni segment…” the voice over the breakroom intercom announced in a breathless huff, “And fellow members of Fit Life… Fit Life Gym, Patti’s Pastries is having a special deal just for us fellow exer… exercisers. Half the price, double the discount points! Head on down today to get your… Pastries from Patti!” Marni concluded with false enthusiasm, “God, who do you have to fire to get a decent cheeseburger around here?... still on? What—”

Melissa looked at Alice expectantly, who looked excitedly back to the radio, red-faced in anticipation.

“Do you think we have time?” Alice asked, smacking her glazed-covered lips as she fought salivation, “Break’s gonna be over in twenty minutes…”

“We’ll have plenty of time if we tell Jenna we’ll bring her something back.” Melissa said, equally as voracious as her more polite compadre, “Think your car’s got enough gas?”

“Oh yeah, sure…” Alice began the arduous process of lifting her heaving hulkishness before pausing, “Think we can bring some donuts for the road?”

Courtney and Jenna were jammed into a booth together.

“Yeah why not. Another bacon cheeseburger with fries and onion rings.” Jenna said.

“And I’ll have another Panini, please.” Courtney said. The skinny waitress nodded and walked away.

“What was wrong, had she never seen someone order fifths before?” Jenna said.

“Maybe she’s scared we’re gonna eat her.” Courtney giggled.

“Hah maybe if she had some meat on her bones I’d consider it.” Jenna said. They both laughed out loud.

“I don’t know, stuff her with cheese, wrap her in bacon. I’d take a bite.” Courtney giggled.

Their flabby necks and swollen breasts jiggled as they laughed. The two women looked silly as their enormous bellies were jammed into the booth. Their overstuffed and overfed guts were oozing onto the table.

“Hey so have you *burp* noticed Christina and Victoria’s weight gain. What’s gotten into them.” Jenna asked.

“Well basically Christina got this extra special membership to the gym they both go to.” Courtney said.

“They’re both still going to the gym? Would not have guessed that.” Jenna said.

“But apparently neither of them actually work out. Christina just gets massages and Vicky just drinks smoothies there. Plus their memberships give them discounts at restaurants.” Courtney said.

“Really?” Jenna said in confusion.

“Yeah and basically Victoria is trying to use her membership discounts enough time so that she can get a Premium membership like Christina.”

“So she’s eating food basically to get a membership at a gym? That makes a lot of sense.” Jenna said sarcastically.

“When has Victoria ever made sense?” Courtney said.

“Well this sounds like my kinda gym if all you do is get massages and eat lots of food.” Jenna said.

“Yeah, I guess… When is this food getting here?” Courtney said.

131112212211121221122211111.content:
The distinct sound of nylon against nylon scraped against her ears, the black leggings she’d stretched across her thickening thighs were proving to be a horrible decision. They were uncomfortable and loud, sounding her presence to anyone within an earshot’s distance. As if the fact that her thighs had become so inseparable lately wasn’t bad enough, but to think that she could force them apart with an abrasive material like panty-hose?

Christy picked at her legs, painted black by the thinly stretched stockings. They were uncomfortable and compressed her meaty lower half, the fabric was drawn so tautly around the thickness of her legs that her pale peachy skin was plain and evident beneath what were supposed to be pitch black hose.

Christy lumbered towards the break room, her only refuge from work outside of the office. Every awkward, wobbling waddle of her gait was met with obscene amounts of jiggling and shimmying beneath her ensemble. From the top of her head to the tips of her toes, there was no denying that Christy was definitely a Gordge Employee.

She’d draped herself in a verdant turtle neck; one that was meant to be worn by women much smaller than her in design. It hugged her every curve, accentuating her breasts and giving them a kind of pronounced roundness, however it also had the same effect on her great doubly-tiered gut. Half-way tucked beneath the waistband of her black leather skirt, the minor deception hardly hid that Christina was quite top-heavy. Her arms filled the sleeves of her sweater with gusto, the overlap of her upperarms evident even under the heavy cloth. Her boots, even, looked ready to burst at the zipper with her fat calves poured into the sleek black shoes.

Her hair had been done in a more popular style recently, giving her bangs that came over her forehead while still keeping the majority of her hair up rather than down. With her glasses and newly configured facial fatness, it only served to make Christina look much rounder in the face than before—something that no one seemed able to tell her.

As she walked, Christina’s hands fell to either side of her great wobbling mass of stomach, able to feel its quivering movements with every belabored step. Inwardly, she wretched at how far she’d allowed herself to fall. How much she’d allowed herself to eat—and moreover how fat she’d gotten.

“Hey Christie!” Courtney had asked her earlier that day, “I get off a little early today, you wanna head over to Carrie’s for dinner?”

“N-No thanks! Gonna head over to the gym after work!”

And maybe actually work out this time. Maybe not spend so much time getting massaged and poked and prodded, or sitting in a steam room sweating like a pig. She hadn’t even used the treadmills once since she won that Premium Membership three months ago. All she’d done was drink smoothies for free and maybe watch the TV that they kept in front of the workout equipment…

However it was hard to resist.

All the perks, and all the discounts… it had a way of sucking her right back in. No matter how hard she tried to resist, Christina just kept falling back into the same routine. Slurp slurp sweat, slurp slurp sweat, go get a bite to eat. And it was so nice to have someone to massage her day in and day out, to take away the strain of her hectic lifestyle. Office life was hell! Nobody seemed to get that…

Suddenly her stomach grumbled. It begged for something sweet.

Christy inadvertently pressed herself against the glass of the vending machine, green-draped gut smooshed against the unyielding glass. Looking over all of the options available to her, or perhaps the walk from her cubicle to the break room, made her breathe heavily. She hardly noticed when her soft pink tongue came to lick her lips.

E4…

B7…

A9…

With surprising dexterity for such pudgy pointers, Christina nimbly fed quarter after quarter into the hungry machine. And it yielded many snacks in return for its counterpart in hungry machinery. Christy’s lips had curled into a not so faint smile as she eyed all of her delicious meals—no, her delicious snacks. Meals were what she got discounts off of. No reason to feel bad about a little snack, right?

Her stomach grumbled again, this time more loudly and with greater ferocity. She touched it with one hand, her outstretched fingers sinking slightly despite the bracing fabric. She arched her back slightly in anticipation of the arrival of her beloved snacks, however her free hand continued to feed more and more quarters into the slot.

B6…

C3…

D7…

As her cheeks grew flush at the sight of her bounty, the hand currently caressing her belly began to squeeze. Lightly at first, then it evolved into a gentle kneading as her cheeks grew rosy and her eyes glassy.

Out of currency to feed her beast, Christina grunted thickly as she bent over to retrieve her prize. As she bent over the strain on her leather skirt was audible, as was the strain on Christina. It had been so long since she’d done any actual exercise that even bending over at her weight, nearing two hundred and seventy pounds now, was beginning to become arduous.

But she managed.

She gazed longingly into the mound of treats cradled in her thick arms, happily convincing herself that this would be her one indulgence for the day because, after this, she was all business. Gym. Workout. Sweat. The works. She was being bad, yes but…

Was that really so wrong?

Alice and Melissa sat in Alice’s living room. There was a perimeter of empty wrappers and containers surrounding the two bff’s. KNOCK! KNOCK! KNOCK!

“Al, that’s the *hic* pizza… guy.” Melissa said. Alice grunted heavily as she tried to get up. Alice and Melissa’s enormous hips were wedged together in the sofa.

“Melissa... scooch *huff* over.” Alice panted. Melissa attempted to shift over to give Alice some room but could only manage to send her mountainous belly into a violent jiggle.

Alice readied for another push. “Hrrrn…” KNOCK! KNOCK! KNOCK! “JUST Ah *pant* MINUTE!” Alice gasped. Her stuffed gut oozed further off of the sofa cushion. Finally her wide hips popped free and she stood upright. Alice awkwardly waddled to the door. Her packed belly sloshed with each step, much to Alice’s discomfort.

She opened the door and handed over cash and her gold membership card in exchange for several boxes of pizza. She took back her card and closed the door.

“Was he *wheeze* cute?” Melissa asked as Alice placed the pizza on the coffee table.

“Yeah but… Hrrrr!” Alice groaned as she dropped heavily onto the sofa. “I don’t *huff* think we’re seducing anyone looking *burp* like this.” Alice puffed.

She was right. The girls were not ready to appear in public. They had been eating like pigs for hours and it showed. Their faces were covered with sauce and their flabby folds and jiggling cleavage were covered with crumbs. Alice’s swollen belly had completely outgrown her tank top and sat naked in her lap. Melissa had shamelessly opted to just remove her shirt showing off her enormously doughy upper body. They had been doing this every weekend for months now. Each time pushing their limits further and further all in the name of those precious discount points. They had really outdone themselves this time. Their overfed guts rose and fell with each heavy, audible breath.

Yet still as Alice opened the first box of pizza, and the obese whalish women caught a whiff of the hot cheese pizza, their glazed over eyes lit up and they happily grabbed a slice.

“And now it’s Marni’s meal of the week! Had anything good this week Marni?” They stopped eating to hear the radio better. “Cass, yesterday I had some great Chinese food from Ten Dragons Kitchen on North Ave. The best dumplings I’ve ever had… mmm and the… the fried rice was sooo… tasty mmm.” The voice trailed off. “Uhhh, Marni?... Oh uh, yeah it was great especially if you can get a discount from Fit life. And the best part… they deliver!”

“I *hic* could make some room.” Alice said.

“I’ve got my phone.” Melissa said eagerly punching in the numbers.

13111221221112122112221111122.content:
A harrumph escaped Christina as she scanned her platinum card, which elicited a foreign boop rather than the welcomed beep that she so longed to hear. Obviously it wasn’t just a fluke, this was the fifth time in a row she’d swiped the damn thing and it still hadn’t let her inside. She’d left work a little early today in hopes of squeezing in an extra-long massage in light of her stressful day, casting aside her looming thoughts of fabric torn asunder and the ominous groaning of her office chair in hopes of a well-deserved extra half-hour with Mei-Ling.

But not if this stupid scanner had anything to say about it. It figures that on the one day she needed it the most, the stupid thing would break. Maybe she could just get someone to let her in…

“Excuse me, do you think you could help me?” Christina puffed at the familiar blue-polo’d woman while gripping a banana-strawberry blend in her free hand, “My card… it’s not working. My membership should have a few more days on it. Do you think you could maybe…?” She trailed off as she smiled hopefully towards the shorter, but considerably fitter woman.

The attendant was more than ready to help, and simply swiped the card herself—only to be answered with the same uncaring ‘boop’ that had mocked Christina so readily for the past five minutes. With a little frown of her own, Christina’s attendant bade her to wait for a moment while she ran the card at the front desk. She waited, but was hardly satisfied with the woman’s answer upon her return.

“Yeah, this says your Premium Membership has expired.” The shorter woman said with a saleswoman’s sympathy, “But if you’d like I could renew it for you?”

Christina nearly choked on her smoothie. How could her membership be over?! Sure it had been the allotted six months (even though it certainly didn’t feel as long) but she could have sworn that she’d had another few days to go. At least one more day…

Christy’ pudgy lower lip curled into a pout as a nasal huff escaped her

“I can’t really… afford…” Christy trailed, “I mean, I could call the studio where I got it. I’m sure they could verify that—“

“W-Well, if you can’t afford a Premium Membership at this time, we do have a new option available so that regular members can be afforded our premium packages.” The woman, clearly an expert hustler, said with infallible chipperness, “Its twenty dollars for a day pass, and that gets you unlimited access to the massage parlor, deluxe workout areas, as well as the sauna until closing. Now you can buy a week’s pass for a hundred and you’d basically be getting your weekends free…”

Christina’s jaw dropped.

“I-I, uh… only have a twenty…” she whimpered, her wallet having been mysteriously cleared out well over the course of the week and several restaurants

“So did you wanna do the Day Pass?” the attendant asked perkily

“Uh… yeah…”

***


Oh God, how could this have happened?

It had been a whole six months already, and now Christina was either going to have to pony up a hundred bucks a month (or four hundred if she went with those week passes, which were totally outrageous!) in order to keep herself entertained (and fed) in the manner that she had become accustomed to…

A heavy sigh poured from beneath her heavy breasts, her massive mams falling as her chest loosened. No point in thinking about that now. Just… enjoy yourself.

Christy pinched the spaghetti straps on her dress, her arms bending back at an angle made uncomfortable by her pillowy arms. She pulled off the skin-tight material, with little shocks sounding as the incredibly static-prone thing brushed against her skin. It was winter, and hardly the time to be wearing such light clothing. But Christy was beginning to run out of options, and it was either this or wait for her dry-cleaning to get done. She’d been freezing all day, and her little half-jacket and boots had hardly helped her stay warm.

Freed from its polyester-blended prison, Christina’s great gut surged forward. It looked bigger with the floral-print painted across its width, but even in the nude Christina’s vast pale gut painted an impressive picture of indulgence and greed. Doughy to the touch and folded into two great rolls, Christina’s corpulence couldn’t have been more cumbersome. It now hung heavily over her thighs, inching closer and closer to the skin of her knees with each passing day. It was paired with two swollen love-handles that oozed over the waistband of her panties, along with another set formed by her rolling back fat meeting under her arms.

Wriggling her way out of the dress, Christina took two belabored steps out of its circumference as it now lay on the floor. Her two legs had grown impossibly thick; with two great boulders that wobbled aimlessly and acted as a makeshift shelf during Melissa’s more sadistic days. She could see it without a mirror, turning her head gave her a clear view of her great big bottom. Her legs had thickened and thickened until there was very little distinction between her calves and thighs—other than simply growing wider as one travelled up from her swollen toes to her hidden hip-bones.

Slowly, Christina dressed herself in her work-out gear. She’d been reduced to a simple t-shirt and sweat pants over a newly-purchased bathing suit, where in the height of her fitness craze she’d opted for much flashier gear akin to Victoria’s. If it hadn’t been for her great gut, she would have worn a sports bra alone, like the other women in the gym. But then, if it weren’t for her gut, she’d wear a lot of things. Her breasts had probably outgrown the conventional “sports bra” sizes anyway. They’d grown quite large alongside the rest of her, often having to fight her chub-caked arms for space in any tee she might wish to wear. Her face had even grown unrecognizably fat; the collar nearly choked her as it cut deeply into her neck!

She pawed at her stomach and worked Vicky’s old sweats over the bottom-most roll, tucking her lower stomach inside. She then rolled the t-shirt over the remaining pudge and removed her glasses. Bending over with great agony, the calamitously corpulent office gal scooped up her dress and balled it up before throwing it and her glasses into the locker she’d been provided.

As she head out the door, Christy caught sight of her immensity in the mirror…

“Hmph…” she whined, cupping the vastness of her gut with both hands, “Figures that I’d just now lose my Premium Membership… quit work early so I could work out, lose some of this—“ she slapped her vastness, causing an irreparable wobble that reverberated all the way to the swell of her fat ass,

“Ugh… I so can’t deal with this right now…”

***


After a smoothie (a, considering they were hardly free anymore…) Christy was in a somewhat better mood. Stripping her outer layer of clothing and waddling into the sauna (much to the chagrin of the fitter patrons of said gym) Christy made her way over to the steam room.

“Maybe sweat some of this off…” she grunted thickly with another jostle of her jiggliness, “But noooo gotta pay twenty bucks a day if Christy wants to get skinny.”

Or one hundred a week. Or one hundred a month if she wanted to go that route. But even then, that was so expensive. There was no way she could afford that and keep herself clothed, fed, and entertained… mostly fed.

Christy opened the door and head inside, noticing with some disdain that she and the door could not occupy so much of the same space at the same time anymore. However, she managed, and launched herself down on the damp floor with a heavy SPLAP! And a splash of sweat and water.

“Ugh… they should totally let you bring smoothies in here…” she whined huskily, only to be taken by surprise when someone took the liberty to answer her.

“Oh my God that’d be so cool.” Said—

131112212211121221122211111221.content:
“Vicky?” Christina said with surprise. Sure enough sitting on the bench in all her fat sweaty glory was Victoria. Boy she’s looking big. Christina thought. Victoria did look like glistening sack of flab. Her sweaty blubber was oozing all over the tile bench.

“Hey Christina! What’s up?” She said. Christina plopped down next to her.

“Wha- what’re you doing here?” Christina asked. “Did you pay for a day pass?”

“Day pass? No I got a six month membership.” Victoria said.

“But… how?!?” Christina couldn’t believe it.

“Discount points! I used my member discount enough times to get a premium membership.” Victoria said.

“Really?” Christina perked up at the thought of another way to get a membership. “How many points was it?”

“100,000 points although they might’ve changed it. Took about six months to get that many.” Victoria said. Christina frowned after getting her hopes up. She wasn’t getting 100,000 points anytime soon. “I’m surprised you’re here. I thought your 6 months would be up now.”

“Uh… well actually it is. I payed 20 bucks for the day pass since my membership just expired.” Christina sank down into her chubby neck and shoulders.

“Oh that sucks. This is actually my first day with my premium membership.” Victoria said with a smile.

“Cool. Do you like it?” Christina said with no enthusiasm.

“Definitely! Well besides the fact that I can’t bring smoothies in here. You’d figure since I get free smoothies they’d let me bring them in here.” Victoria said. She continued to talk but Christina stopped paying attention.

I can’t believe this is it. No more massages, no more sauna. Worst of all my best friend will be enjoying it without me! Maybe I could get that many discount points. Christina put her hands on her bulging sweaty gut. Who am I kidding they’d have to roll me into the locker room at that point. God I’m so fat… Oh stop it Christina, you’re still the skinniest in the office. Alice can’t even find a shirt that’ll last her more than a week. Still though, I probably should lose some weight. I’ll get a regular membership again (still got to have those discounts). I’ll start exercising after work… eventually. Damn I’m going to miss daily massages. So relaxing and stress relieving, especially on a day like today. Victoria stopped talking and looked over to Christina. Christina wasn’t sure what to say.

“Uh… No way… That’s crazy.” Christina said awkwardly.

“I know right? So then…” Victoria continued to blabber. I’ll still get a day pass every couple week’s maybe, just to treat myself and hang with Vicky. Man this sucks… I’m so eating that cheesecake I saw in the bakery yesterday.
131112212211121221122211111221.title: Vicky?

choices: Christy nixes the gym all together and balloons like never before!
Alice bumps into two certain celebrities at the buffet...
1311122122111212211222111112211.content:
Christina spent the next few days in a slump. It wasn’t enough that she’d lost her Premium Membership, or that she was the heaviest she’d ever been in her entire life, but Vicky just had to go and rub it in her face by getting a premium membership. In what world was it fair that Vicky gets to go and get massaged and drink smoothies and have access to all that exercise equipment when she’s not even going to use it!

“Oh, just let me sit on my fat ass and drink all of these smoothies and milkshakes for absolutely free!” she imagined Vicky saying, “Oh did I break the door with my saddlebag thighs, ah-ha I’m like sooooo sorry!”

Ugh.

She took a slurp on her straw, her chubby cheek pooling in her hand as she leaned into the table. Her belly cut deeply into its surface, and her armfat rested lazily on top. Christina’s nostrils flared as a guttural and jealous growl escaped her. For a moment, the pace of her sucking increased as she venomously slurped down her iced coffee.

It just wasn’t fair. She was so done. Like, more done than she’d ever been with anything in her entire life. All she wanted to do was just sit at home and eat ice cream. She’d been living like a queen the past six months, and now she was just supposed to stop? How would she unclench? How would she relax after a long day at the office? Where would she spend all her time? How was she supposed to lose weight when she couldn’t drink all those healthy smoothies or have access to all that fancy equipment that only the Premium Members could use? How was she supposed to sweat off her pudge when she couldn’t use the steam room?!

“Hmph.”

A nasal pout became her as she slumped forward ever so slightly. Her large and swollen bottom spread wide across the bench seating in the break room, and her dress cut slightly into the rolling surface of her back fat. Her lower lip expanded slightly as it curled into a pout, one pudgy hand gripping the nearly-empty frappe.

Christy licked the sticky caramel residue from her lips as she contemplated getting a soda from the vending machine. She ultimately decided against it, but her mouth was still uncomfortably dry. She clicked her tongue against her teeth as she fought the urge to rise under her own power and quench her thirst. Sodas had calories, calories were bad, yadda yadda yadda…

Still, a Sprite couldn’t hurt, could it?

The overfed employee gave a great huff as she kicked one flabby shapeless leg over the bench seat. She pivoted on her well-padded ass and planted the other foot firmly on the ground before pushing against the surface of the table with her hardly-hardy arms. They shook slightly with the effort that her pampered muscles exerted in moving her mass, but Christina soon found herself in a standing position. Lumbering over to the vending machine, Christy readied her quarters from her pocketbook.

Today was going to be one of those days. She could already tell…
