Christina has an accident at the office
13111221221112122112221111122112.content:
Alice waddled heavily over to the buffet and started stacking food high atop her plate. The overfed sweetheart reached past her ever growing belly to put some fries on her plate. She was quite a bit bigger after Melissa and her ate their way to Alice’s new premium membership.

“Oh, sorry.” Alice said, accidentally bumping flabby hips with a large woman next to her. She looked up and saw a familiar face. “Marni? OH MY GOD are you Marni from Cass and Marni on KISS102.5?!?” Alice yelped.

“Ah yes, that’s me. I take it you’re a fan?” Marni replied.

“My names Alice, Oh I’m a huge fan…” Alice proceeded to fangirl all over Marni for a few minutes while they filled up their plates. “Yeah but at Gordge we listen to you every day almost.”

“Wait you work at Gordge? They send us the best gift baskets.” Marni said rubbing her big belly.

“OH Oh! That’s me, I was the one that decided to send the weekly instead of every two weeks, and everything!” Alice said. Marni smiled thinking about the delicious treat in those baskets.

“Would you like to sit down and eat with me and Cass?” Marni asked.

“Oh my god yes.” Alice said trying to contain her excitement. Being a semi-popular local radio show host made Marni the minorest of minor celebrities. It wasn’t often that she got to feel like a really big deal. So she welcomed Alice’s intrusive fandom plus there was the chance of getting some more of those gift baskets out of her (once a week was just not enough!).

So Marni and Alice waddled their giant wobbling rears over to a table were Cass was rubbing her bloated (but still slim) tummy.

“Marni, I gotta stop having these buffet… Who’s this?” Cass said looking up at the chubby smiling face across from her.

“This is Alice. She works at Gordge, and was the one in charge of those gift baskets!” Marni said.

“I hear there great gift baskets apparently. I wouldn’t know because someone keeps eating them all by herself.” Cass joked.

Alice and Marni were a surprisingly good match. As they both shoveled food into their hungry gullets, they chatted on and on. Alice would listen intently as Marni did what she could do best, ramble (she had made quite a career out of it). Alice would occasionally throw out a “and then what happened?” or a “haha no way!” as Marni continued her endless chain of stories and opinions. Alice tried a few times to respon with a story of her own but it would quickly send Marni off on a tangent (much to Alice’s delight).

They would talk through several plates of savory buffet food. How as she been eating this whole time? Alice pondered as they got up for another plateful. Even as she talked endlessly Marni still managed to keep cleaning her plate. I guess that happens when you talk for a living… Is she always eating during the show then? Alice wondered. Looking at Marni jiggle, it certainly was possible.

By the end of their meal the two heavy heifers were swollen and bloated. Cass had left early since she had stopped eating many plates ago. Marni’s talking pace had slowed a bit but was still going strong.

“Yeah I actually think I met a Gordge employee at Fit life, in the premium member facilities… ke-kelly?” Marni struggled.

“Oh Christina! Yeah she told me she met you. I’m actually a premium member there now! I go there all the time!” Alice huffed.

“Hah no way. Well maybe I’ll see you in the sauna or something. But I think it’s time I get going. It’s been a pleasure Alice.” Marni said struggling to get on her feet.

“It’s been so cool to talk to you, Marni. Hopefully I’ll run into you again.” Alice said with a giant smile. Alice remained seated. She whipped out he phone to text Melissa. Her obese body was jammed into the booth. Her belly was uncomfortably digging into the edge of the table but Alice was way to giddy to notice.

***

“Wow I am shooo jealoush!” Courtney said through a mouthful of doughnut.

“Yeah I hope I run into again.” Alice said. Alice’s run in with Marni had been all the rage at the breakroom table the next day.

“And shoutout to my girl Alice at gordge for giving us TWO gift baskets this week!...” They all giggled with excitement. “Yes Marni we here love the fine people and the great services offered at Gordge. You can Call them at 1-800-GORDGE1…”

“Are you sure that was a good idea Al?” Melissa asked.

“Well she asked so nicely I couldn’t say no.”
13111221221112122112221111122112.title: Fatty fandom

choices: One day, in the break room...
That night, in Christy's apartment...
131112212211121221122211111221121.content:
Full pink lips wrapped around an opaque green straw as a mashed mix of dairy and artificial flavoring was pulled into Victoria’s mouth. She guzzled, she did not sip. Her thirst for thick, creamy products was relentless and it seemed that only choking down as many milkshakes as possible was going to do the trick.

“Mmm… so good…”

Her voice was thick with exertion as her stamina dwindled. As if speaking was too much trouble for the overfed and underexercised secretary. She let out a husky ‘mmm’ as the sweet pink mixture sank down her throat and into her belly.

She put the cup down, her breathing labored from the simple act of slurping. A light cloud of perspiration coated her entire body, her mouth agape as hot air escaped her. Using her flabby, bulbous arms Vicky reached for another. She took it to her chest as she drank the sweet sugary mixture like a fish would water. Another guttural groan as she savored the sweet taste of her latest shake.

“Hey Michelle gimme… gimme another…” she purred huskily to the short woman who worked the Smoothie Shack, “Alice you… urp… you want a Bulk-Up shake?”

Alice looked her co-worker and friend up and down noticeably before giving her answer.

“No thank you.” She said with a smile, “Uh, Vicky, what’s in those things anyway?”

“Like, just… fruit and stuff” The secretary panted before being handed a freshly-blended Blueberry-Banana-Blast, “They’re… mmm… they’re so good. You sure you don’t want one?”

Over the past year or so, Vicky had been expanding at an alarming rate. Nobody seemed to notice too much except for Melissa, who took stock only in the fact that someone other than herself was growing alarmingly expansive. And Alice had known Vicky was growing and gaining faster than anyone she’d ever seen before but…

Well, as the barstools groaned beneath her gigantic ass, Vicky’s weight was beginning to become downright destructive. In the past few months she’d broken several of her office chairs and tipped a break-room table. She’d heard some talk about her getting a new car, but lately there was something floating around about her carpooling with Jenna. She didn’t make coffee runs anymore and, honestly, Alice was more than a little worried about her friend’s loose grasp on reality. Vicky’s insistence that she hadn’t gained a pound since high school were a little alarming now that…

“UURP…’ma go to the bathroom…” the immense Italian said thickly as she slid off of her seats and tottered off.

Alice watched Vicky’s vast volume wobble and shake uncontrollably with every awkward step. Her large, formless ass cheeks fought for space in Vicky’s yoga pants, painted grey by tight fabric. It was as thick and stable as a table, Alice was sure she could sit her smoothie on the back of her friend’s enormous rump and it would come back to her intact. Vicky’s great gut hung heavily in front of her, down to her mid-thigh by now, and wobbled with as much ferocity as the back.

Her olive immensity was not simply constrained to her enormous ass and behemoth belly—her arms were uselessly doughy and untoned with several inches of fat caking the outer layers. She could no longer rest her arms at her side due to her thick bingo wings, and her breasts were becoming back-breakingly large. Even her face, once more or less defined due to her pear shape, had grown round and soft. She looked like a completely different person—the only semblance of the real Vicky beneath all that blubber was the worn Yankees cap she worked out in.

Alice raised her eyebrows and took a sip of her smoothie. God she's gotten huge. She's become bigger than me! Alice thought. Victoria certainly had surpassed Alice's previous weight but they were actually currently at the around the same weight. Alice herself had rounded out quite a bit in her pursuit of a premium membership, more than Alice was even aware of.

“Oh you can, um… just sit that over there.” She said to Michelle, the girl behind the counter who returned with Vicky’s milkshake, “She really needs the exercise…”
131112212211121221122211111221121.title: My Big Fat Italian Gym Rat

choices: Vicky's brushes off coworkers concerns about her recent weight gain
Vicky misinterprets another piece of advice from her trainer
1311122122111212211222111112211211.content:
After a long Monday morning full of meetings, Alice was really looking forward to her lunch. Food had been on her mind all day and a sandwich and a calorie laden salad had been waiting for her in the break room. As she opened the fridge door to get her much deserved meal, Alice was shocked by what she had found.

"Shakes! So many shakes!" shouted Alice. To her surprise the fridge was stocked with shakes. They took up much of the fridge space, so much so that Alice had to dig around just to find her meal. Where did all of these drinks come from?

"Hey Alice! Got a case of the Mondays?" said a cheery Vicky. "Oh I see that you're checking out my bulk up shakes".

Alice turned around to see Vicky with an empty shake in hand. She looked even bigger since the last time she saw her at the gym.

"Are these all yours?" asked Alice

"Yep! My premium membership allowed me some one-on-one time with a trainer. He said a healthy diet is the key to keeping in shape. So I took his advice and I bought a whole bunch of shakes to have with me at work and at home. Now that I am drinking these all day, I'm eating healthy and that allows me to cheat a little bit more than I used to. Anyways can you hand me that banana berry blast bulkup?"

"Don't you think you're taking this a bit far? I don't think this is what your trainer meant by a well balanced diet."

"Nonsense! I don't want to end up like all these fat girls here in the office. A girl has to watch her figure. Actually can you hand me another? I'm going to take one back to my desk"

Alice handed another drink to Vicky and watched as her ass brushed the sides of the door frame. Alice was truly concerned by what she had just witnessed, but was paralyzed by Vicky's actions. She watched as the workweek went on and Vicky continually slamming shakes at work and at the gym. By week's end she was already outgrowing her current wardrobe. At this rate, Vicky was going to get massive.
1311122122111212211222111112211211.title: One day, in the break room...

choices: Wrong. Vicky follows through with her new diet advice without question
Wrong. Vicky's trainer is a feedee and has been giving fattening advice
13111221221112122112221111122112112.content:
Vicky felt great about her new diet. The premium features of her new gym membership were really paying off. While the massages and saunas were great and all for Alice, Vicky really saw the benefit of her personal trainer. After all who better to keep her in shape then someone who does it for a living.

The trainers first piece of advice was already having its impact. Vicky had to get a new chair since her ass had grown too wide to sit on it. She was more off than on the chair. Her company ordered the widest chair that was available, but even that chair was a bit of a struggle for the office fatty. Not fazed by her chair predicaments, Vicky sought more advice from her trainer.

It was only a few days after meeting with her trainer that Alice and other coworkers started to notice a change in Vicky. Her clothes were tight already, but now she was starting to overflow them. Her titanic ass, was becoming uncontainable. Her ass would cause even the strongest of stretch pants to slide down revealing her panties. Her stomach, while no match for her ass, stretched over the waistband and spilled out across her vast thighs when she sat down. Fat rolls revealing themselves around every bend. Something was up and Alice had to find out.

Alice approached Vicky at her desk. She was already putting away another shake as her stomach extended to contain yet another calorie laden bomb.

"So, it seems like you're enjoying your new diet." said Alice

Vicky huffed, out of breath from chugging another shake. "Oh yeah Alice, you should try it. My trainer really has me working hard."

"Oh really?"

"Yeah. I saw him earlier this week and he gave me some more dieting advice. He said having a healthy diet is not the only key to staying in shape. Having an active metabolism is also important. Considering that I'm pretty young, he was encouraged that I could really turn up my metabolism if I ate more frequently."

"Eat more frequently? That doesn't sound right."

"Well he said it's important to break my day up to more meals. So I've been taking his advice."

"Hmm...Vicky I think he means to break up breakfast, lunch, and dinner into more meals"

"No. No. I don't think you know how this works. But let me explain. How often are we awake in the day? 16 hours? That's like...not the entire day or something. The rest of the time you're sleeping. That's giving your metabolism time to slow down because it's not digesting a meal. So on top of adding an extra meal or two to my day, I make sure to fill up before I go to bed. That's the secret Alice. Eating before you sleep keeps your metabolism active even as you rest. Every night I drink a few shakes and maybe spoil myself with a carton of ice cream or a cake or something. It's been very effective. I wake up hungry and that's a good sign. That means your metabolism is working."

"Oh..uhh..yeah that sounds like a great diet plan. I'll have to check it out sometime." Alice knew that this was wrong, but there seemed little she could do to convince Vicky otherwise. But she had to walk away from the situation before she got too wrapped up into it. She left Vicky to her shakes.

Something didn't seem right though. How could Vicky be misinterpreting so much information? She wasn't the brightest girl in the word, but she had to see that this advice was bad...right?
13111221221112122112221111122112112.title: Diet All Day and Night

choices: Vicky tells her coworkers about Chase, but all they see is added poundage
Chase force feeds Vicky as a part of the 'diet'
131112212211121221122211111221121122.content:
Chase Williams was the head trainer at the gym. While he enjoyed staying fit and training others, it was his true delight to see all the curvy and fat women that would come through those double doors. Chase was attracted to larger women, which was not considered normal for someone in his profession. In fact, it was much worse than that. Chase was a feeder. It was very difficult for Chase to balance his work life with his dating life. He mostly kept his feeding relationships under wraps. He also tried to contain himself at work even when he was asked to train the overweight women at the gym. This all changed, however, after Chase met Vicky.

Chase had never seen such a pear-shaped body like Vicky had. Her gelatinous ass was something unreal. Her hips and thighs were so thick, you'd hunt forever to find and definition. And what's worse, she was actively gaining weight. Chase saw Vicky expand over the course of months at the gym. He'd constantly find her throwing back smoothies and shakes at the gym bar. When Vicky sought after a trainer, Chase couldn't resist taking her under his wing.

Through their first few sessions, Chase realized Vicky is not the sharpest tool in the shed. Her tactics for keeping weight off was actually having the opposite effect. He battled with his morals to trick Vicky into gaining more weight. Ultimately his desire to see her expand outweighed his morals and he began to feed Vicky very explicit instructions. Eat and drink more healthy foods (especially bulk up shakes). Eat more meals across the day to keep up the metabolism (and especially at night). Chase saw the results of his actions. The more Vicky grew, the more he knew that he wouldn't be able to resist dating her. While Chase had dated feedees, they were willing participants in the act. Chase was diving head first into unknown territory. How big could Vicky get? He was hoping this was just the beginning.

Luckily Chase has his charms. He was able to get Vicky on a few dates and now they were a couple. This definitely drew the attention of some of Vicky's coworkers. However, it would soon fall on deaf ears as Vicky fell deeper into Chase's plans.
131112212211121221122211111221121122.title: Chubby Chaser

choices: "I'm even too fat to exercise! I'll never be able to lose this weight."
"Maybe I should by that workout tape."
1311122122111212211222111112211212.content:
Christina sat on the sofa with the TV on. A large pizza box lay empty on the coffee table in front of her. She brought another spoonful of ice cream pass her lips. She was eating it straight out of the carton. Christina was in a rut. She was definitely going to regret how the night went. And to think it started out so good!

Earlier in the evening Christina decided she was going to finally go back to the gym. Not just that she was going to sweat, and get a real workout in. She even changed into her (ill fitting) workout clothes. She was on her way out the door when she looked over to the TV.

A Seinfeld marathon? Oh no way, this is my favorite episode! And it just started. Christina unconsciously walked over to the sofa and sat in front of the TV. I… I can probably… I’ll just watch one episode. Christina thought to herself.

One pizza delivery and a couple trips to the kitchen later and here she was. Still sitting on the couch, still wearing her gym clothes, eating ice cream out of the carton. As delicious as the ice cream and pizza was it wasn’t going to stop the wave of shame and regret that was about to hit Christina in 3… 2… 1.

“*Sigh* I can’t believe I did it again. I even got my clothes on and everything! This is all your fault.” Christina grabbed a handful of her bulging spare tire, making it jiggle slightly. “You just have to get in the way of things. You hear that belly? Why do you always have to ruin my plans… it’s bad enough you ruin my shirts.” Christina actually giggled a bit, but it didn’t make her feel any better. There was still a pang of grief coming from inside her (not to be confused with the pang she felt from the meatlover’s pizza she had eaten earlier). She sighed deeply. She just felt so pathetic.

“Having trouble getting to the gym? Want to shed some pounds but can’t afford the pricey memberships or the expensive equipment?” Christina looked up and nodded. “Well here’s the answer looking for! Introducing my brand new home workout video: The 5 Minute Upper Body.” Christina stared at the montage of slim and toned hardbody’s doing crunches and pushups on their living room floors. “Just 5 minutes a day and you could end up with abs like this!” Christina took the last bite of ice cream as she stared blankly at the numerous before and after pictures.

“I could do that.” Christina said. “I don’t even need to buy the video. Just 5 minutes, that’s all. Just some sit ups, right? Might as well if I’m going to wear these clothes.” Christina heaved herself off the sofa with a grunt. “Hrrn!... You’re totally redeeming yourself, Christina.” She said, as she gave her bouncing belly a slap. “You hear that, tummy? Your days are numbered.”

Christina awkwardly got down onto her back in the middle of her apartment. Her giant butt spread out on the carpet.

“Alright 5 minutes. Let’s just do some sit ups. I can do… a sit up, right?” Christina said. She positioned herself properly. She rubbed her hands together in preparation. She took several deep breaths. She needlessly readjusted her position one more time. “Alright, deep breaths… appropriate clothing… feet together, as they should be… what’s that noise? Is someone at the door?... Nope, that was nothing…” Christina laid nervously on the floor. She looked down at her doughy belly sticking up in the air. “Alright… all ready… just one situp… starting now… and here… I… go.” Finally Christina attempted her first sit up. She grunted heavily and tried as hard as she could to reach her knees. The top of her soft back lifted an inch or so off the ground. Her torso bent only slightly. Her chin dup into her pillowy soft cleavage as she struggled to accomplish even a fourth of a full sit up. Her giant flabby belly started to jiggle as her poor underused abdominal muscles struggled to flex under the immense weight of Christina’s obese pampered body. After just a few seconds her heavy upper body collapsed back onto the floor. Her flabby arms flopped onto the ground. Her chubby round face was as red as an apple and sucking for air. Her exposed jiggling belly rose and fell with each huff.

“If only *pant* they… had *wheeze*… a 5 second *huff* workout.” Christina lay uselessly on the floor.

As she caught her breath Christina said to herself…
1311122122111212211222111112211212.title: Putting the Unfit in Fitness

choices: From then on Christy becomes a bonafide greedy glutton—she's a total hog!
Christy being "too fat" is a convenient excuse for "let me be lazy" at work!
13111221221112122112221111122112121.content:
It had come out in a sharp, nasal whine. The exertion of attempted exercise had robbed her of the fortitude to announce it angrily, and her lack of breath had kept her wheezing until well after her declaration had been completed. She simply lay there, flat on her back, huffing and puffing like an old smoke stack. Her great distended gut and swollen sweater puppies rose and fell erratically at her frenzied breaths, little dots of tears to come in the corners of her eyes.

However as she lay there longer, TV blaring and surrounded by the evidence of her indulgence, the words still lingered on her lips. Like peppermint chapstick, they tingled.

She was too fat to even exercise. And she’d never lose this weight…

A few more moments passed before Christina attempted to roll herself into a sitting position. It was quite a challenge to overcome her girth, the bigness of her belly and weakness of her muscles proving to be a very unfortunate combination. Pathetic grunts and wheezes rolled under the blare of Seinfeld as she rocked. Eventually she gained enough momentum to gain footing on the coffee table and couch. Her arms shaking slightly from the strain of her weight, Christina managed to pull herself up.

She remained there, now sitting, desperately trying to catch her breath. The whole act had left her completely winded. Less than two years ago, this would have been literally no issue for her. But now, in her current state…

There was no way she was ever going to lose this weight. She was too fat to exercise.

The words washed over her. It wasn’t as painful a realization as one would have thought. It should have been. In every other world, Christina would have roared and rose to the challenge, or sunk even further, or something. But instead she just sat there contemplating what it meant. What it meant to be “too fat to exercise.”

Eventually she stood, if only to collapse back on the couch again. Wordlessly she grabbed the remains of her binge and continued. Her eyes stared glassily at the television, though she wasn’t really watching. Her stomach gurgled expectantly at a commercial for pizza, and the temptation was surely there.

“What’s the point?” she said to herself in an almost relieved tone of voice, phone already in hand, “I’m a total fatass anyway. What’s another pizza gonna do?”

Four. Four more pizzas. Stuffed crust with an order of breadsticks and dipping sauce. She locked her phone and went back to the television, leaning onto the agonized arm of the sofa. With one hand she propped her head up, doughy arms spreading over the rest like pancake batter, while the rest of her just lay there lavishly. Her other hand rested on her great pale paunch, which swelled over the lip of the sofa cushions.

“Why even bother dieting?” Christina asked herself again a few moments later after she recognized a home-delivery Chinese restaurant that Marni had recommended, “It’s not like I can exercise!”

A faint, if somewhat crazed smile dimpled her chubby cheeks as she resumed her seat. Her stomach groaned, and her hand went to soothe it. She began to rub it now, gently pressing down on her big belly with one outstretched palm. There was an unexpected excitement tucked away in her breast, one that fluttered at the idea of her incoming intake. About getting to eat.

“Mmm… It’s not like I can… do anything about it!” Christy giggled naughtily as she hung up the phone, sub-shop delivery guy in tow while she knead her gut vigorously, “I’m just too fat!”

Her toes clenched slightly at one of her own particularly pressing squeezes. Her fat ass cheeks clenched, making her rise a good two inches off the couch. Her breath was hot and frequent, panting not out of exertion but out of excitement, and the blood beneath her skin made her red with anticipation rather than exertion.

She giggled slightly as she continued to poke and prod her body, delving further and further into her defeatist mindset. What was the point of working out? She was too fat to do it properly, and if she couldn’t exercise then there was no way she was going to lose weight! So why bother freaking out if there was nothing to do but—

DING-DONG

—eat.
13111221221112122112221111122112121.title: There comes a time in every fat girl's life...

choices: Christina pigs out when she gets home
Christy's clothing seems to have given up on her body as well
131112212211121221122211111221121211.content:
Christina sat at her desk. It was nearing the end of the day and she was unusually excited. She leaned away from her keyboard and started to hum. She put her hands on her big hungry belly and rubbed. Courtney (who shared a cubicle with her) looked up at Christina.

“Well someone’s in a god mood.” Courtney said.

“Mhmm, I just got a coupon for Roman’s pizza and the Ten Dragons Chinese food place.” Christina’s gut rumbled and her mouth watered. “Think I’ll use them both after work.”

“Sounds like a good night.” Courtney said.

“Yeah I think I’m gonna stop at Mcdonald’s after work too… and maybe I’ll get a cake from that bakery on 5th.” Christina was now squishing her hands deep into her flabby rolls.

Courtney wasn’t even phased by Christy’s proposed evening of gluttony. “Haha, Nothing better than taking a tour of the towns restaurants. I call that ‘kitchen hopping’. In college everybody would go bar hopping, but my sorority gals and I would go kitchen hopping, hehe.” Courtney heaving breasts jiggled as she giggled.

“Haha I’m gonna start calling it that.” Christina chuckled. “You know I haven’t really told anyone, but last week I finally gave up on losing weight.” She said softly.

“Oh…” Courtney said. She thought Christy had given up losing weight a year ago… or at least it appeared that way. “That’s good to hear.”

“Yeah I finally realized that this is the body I’m stuck with. No point in trying to change it.” Christina said. “Do you know what I mean?”

Courtney honestly didn’t quite know what she meant. In Courtney’s 15 or so years of fatness and near constant weight gain, she had made literally no attempt to ever lose weight. She had never gone through a drastic weight gain that made her freak out over the changes to her body. No, Courtney had slowly packed on the pounds throughout her adulthood, never causing her to have that “Oh my god I’m fat!” wake up call/crisis that so many fat girls have. She had really never had any care or insecurities about her weight and she never really understood all the whining and worrying that came from her fat friends. Still though she had seen Christina go through a range of emotions since she started working at Gordge. She was glad to finally see Christina at some sort of peace.

“Ugh… Yeah I guess. Losing weight always seemed like self-torture. Glad to hear you’ve finally become a member of the unapologetic fat girls club. You will receive your card in the mail.” Courtney joked. Christina laughed.

“Are there any benefits to joining the club?” Christina riffed.

“hmmm Not really other than guilt-free eating, never having to worry about anorexia, and possibly buying an extra ticket on planes… Oh but you do get to hang out with me, Melissa, and Alice.” Courtney said.

“Well I can’t pass an opportunity like that up.” Christina giggled. “But when is my initiation party?”

“Uhh… how about tomorrow at lunch.” Courtney laughed. “But you’ve got to pay for it.” They both chuckled and Christina continued to smile throughout the work day.

***

She had really found comfort in her conversation with Courtney. Now that she was finally feeling okay with her weight, it was good to know her friends were okay with it too.

Christina was sitting in traffic on her way home from work. She could smell the burger king drive-thru sitting in the passenger seat next to her. She had gotten it for when she got home. Christy figured it would hold off her appetite until dinner where she would really treat herself with those coupons she found… But boy those fries smelled good.

Christina rubbed her flabby middle and let out a sigh. Her belly was beckoning to be filled.

“Mmmm Just wait until you’re home, Christie… but oh god this traffic is slow. If I eat now I’ll be hungry again before dinner though. Wait what am I saying? I’m not going to lose any weight regardless. I’m a fat girl now, I am supposed to be eating whenever I want. I’m too fat to be holding back this poor empty tummy.” Christina said with a naughty grin. She dug her hand into the large fast food bag and began feeding herself fries.

A few traffic lights later and the bag was empty. Christina laughed with a look of shock and embarrassment. “That didn’t last as long as I’d hoped.” Christina moved on of her hands to her slightly bloated gut. It wasn’t filled yet. Her mouth was still watering thinking about what she could eat next.

“Y’know I could really go for some of that Chinese food and pizza I was planning for dinner.” She was thinking about how she could get them both delivered. “If I ordered it now I bet it would be at the apartment by the time I got home.” She was pretty sure the menus for the places were in the glove compartment. Christina giggled naughtily and picked up her phone.

After she placed the orders she patted her belly and let out a sigh. “Oh, the things you make me do.”
131112212211121221122211111221121211.title: Unapologetic Fat Girl

choices: Needless to say, this is gonna have an adverse effect on Christy's waistline
Actually, what's going on with Vicky? Some rumors about broken furniture?
1311122122111212211222111112211212111.content:
Christina almost literally kicked the door down.

With one flabby foot, she pushed the door open after fumbling with the tumbler and her key. Normally she’d use her hands, but they were a bit preoccupied at the moment. She’d just caught both delivery boys as they’d arrived, which was very convenient for her but more than a little confusing for the barely pubescent boys who had to wait on her for a full five minutes, and had all but ripped their parcels from their hands.

Even still, Christina’s gut was the first thing in the room after her foot. Due to her positioning, it brushed uncomfortably against the side of the door in her sideways motioning. Another belabored half-step inside, and everything save for the last few inches of her bodacious bottom was fully inside her apartment. A few more steps forward, and Christy laid her spread from the delivery, plus a few other items she’d picked up along the way out on the coffee table. The feast stared back at her from down below on the table, and Christina did the same.

“Mmm…” she moaned thickly, her stomach churning with an insatiable greed as one chubby hand slunk over to soothe it, “Mmm… oh mmm… I can’t wait to… to…”

Christy’s face grew flush again, her chubby cheeks reddening with a wicked delight. Her forehead began to perspire lightly, and an inexplicable warmth spread throughout her entire body. Her warm pink tongue ran over her full lips as her heaving hot breath filled the room. The hand placed on her abdomen began to knead her dough, gripping tightly onto the pliable pudge that suffocated Christina’s once slender form.

Wiggling the fingers on her free hand dramatically, Christina reached for one of the boxes of pizza first. She flipped the lid and pulled out two thick greasy slices of sausage pizza. She took a deep instinctive inhale as she drew them closer, her mighty breasts becoming mountainous for a moment before she let it out. The warmth grew as she brought it closer to her maw, salivating near uncontrollably at the sight of her sweet mistress Roman’s Pizza…

“Mmmm… oh no…” Christy looked down.

A huge grease stain on her dress. Her new dress. The one she bought specifically because all the other ones wouldn’t fit her anymore…

“Rmmm… no problem, I guess…” she huffed after a few damaging dabs at the spot with greasy fingers, “I’ll just change… probably shoulda done it anyway…”

Ripped from her carnal desire, Christy waddled into her bedroom, two slices in tow to snack on, and proceeded to undress. With one hand (the other was a little preoccupied with keeping her tummy full) Christy undid the straps and acquired some nighties for herself. A pair of yoga pants (Vicky’s? They looked like Vicky’s…) and an old shirt from Fit Life.

She wriggled the gray sweats up her tree-trunks with little difficulty, Vicky was even then quite more bootylicious than Christina. She tucked the lowermost of her triply-tiered stomach into the crotch of the pants and proceeded to wriggle her way into the shirt (which was hardly as comfy as Vicky’s old pants!)

However, a devious thought overcame Christina, as she stood there with her hands wedged between her waistband and belly fat. Looking around, as if anyone were home, Christy unrolled the pants from over her stomach and proceeded to tuck it under, allowing her big belly to hang free.

It was… relaxing, oddly.

“Mmm…” Christy moaned throatily again, rubbing the now free segment of her stomach, “Can’t believe I haven’t been doing this since, like, forever ago… My tummy feels so much better…”

Grabbing the pizza crust from the chester drawers and promptly sticking one end in her mouth, Christy waddled back into the living room where she immediately thrust herself down onto the couch. Attempting to lean past the great obstructions that were her balloonish breasts and giant gut, Christy managed to work her large doughy arms over to the coffee table, where she grabbed as much of her feast as she could manage.

“Oh God… this is… mm…” she began to sweat again after the first few pieces of pizza, her excitement at indulgence overwhelming her, eventually her external monologing becoming little more than “mm’s” and “ah’s” as she gleefully stuffed herself.

Slowly, Christina’s eyes glazed behind her glasses as she lost herself in the great feast she’d procured for herself. Pizza boxes disappeared, and the Chinese takeout barely stood a chance. The dollar-menu burgers were wiped out in moments at a time, all devoured by the great greedy glutton in the making.

Her breath was shallow while she ate, whimpering and whining as the corners of her lips tugged into a piggish smile. She was unstoppable, eating anything and everything edible in sight until she was sated. And when the needs of her stomach were filled internally, Christina would take to fulfilling its external needs…

“Mmm… mmm…” she cooed as she played with her pudge, squeezing her delightfully fat belly as she digested. She closed her eyes during the action, that greedy grin replaced with one of absolute privilege. She kicked slightly sometimes, like she was on a bicycle, as she knead. But even still, her breath was loud and distinctly pleasurable. Her short bursts of vocalization usually amounted to—

“Ah!” she’d whimper as a sharp pain came over her stomach. She’d pressed a little too hard…

It gurgled. Communicated with her…

“Mmm…” she mumbled lazily, her eyes dreamily half-open, “I wonder if we have any ice cream…”

She looked down at her nude, pale gut as it swelled over the lip of the couch cushions…

13111221221112122112221111122112121111.content:
Now that Christina was indulging her growling guts every whim, she was happier than ever. Another side effect though was that she was fatter than ever.

She was touching up her eye make-up in the bathroom mirror. Her bottom belly roll rested in the sink as she leaned closer to her reflection. Christina may have given up on attaining a perfect body but she hadn’t given up on looking pretty. She smacked her plump red lips and adjusted her stylish thick framed glasses. Standing back a bit she looked over her appearance. Her chubby round face looked pretty cute when framed within her long blonde hair which was artfully tied up in a tactically messy bun.

From the neck down though, Christina was sort of a mess. Her shirt clung tightly around her every pudgy curve. You could see the outline of her overfilled bra as it pressed against her shirt. Their slivers of white flesh in the visible gaps between each button. The fabric creased uncomfortably around every doughy roll and fold. Christy’s poor pants were under similar duress. She had lost the button that morning (almost giving Courtney a black eye) and the zipper was pulled all the way down (her belly wouldn’t let her zip it up). Luckily she had managed to fit a belt around her expanding waist that could hold her pants up. Still though the pants were giving her a bit of a wedgie and felt like every step she took was going to tear them to shreds.

Christina thought about how poorly clothed she was. “Well what am I supposed to do with a big fat belly like this?” Christina gripped her belly and arched her back like a pregnant woman would. She felt a bit of rush from feeling so naughty.

She turned away and walked out into the breakroom. She waddled over to vending machine. She was caught off guard as her belly bumped against the glass window, causing her to stumble a bit. She couldn’t even see most of the snacks since they were blocked by her blossoming breasts, but Christina had memorized her usual order from the vending machine. Her glazed over eyes stared at the falling candies and treats as her right hand fed coins into the slot and robotically punched in several codes. Christina felt her pants unravel just a bit as she bent her enormous bottom over to receive her snacks. She then waddled over to the fridge to collect more fuel for her aching tummy, which she placed on top of the pile of food she was creating in her arms.

Her obese body dropped onto the seat with a thud, and her collection of unhealthy junk spread onto the table. Melissa and Alice might have noticed Christina’s preposterously large meal if they weren’t focused on their own stacks of sugary, greasy food. As she sat down, Christina felt her belt pinch tightly into her gut. Her belly rolls folded over and made the belt disappear in her stacks of flab. Christy face grew red as she desperately tried to relieve the enormous pressure around her enormous belly. Finally after a few seconds of torture and anguish, she released her gut from the terrible pinch. She let out a sigh as her flabby rolls burst free and surged further onto her lap. Her pale fleshed pushed out over her pants, letting her bottom belly roll sit naked under the table.

But Christina was just thinking about how good the doughnuts tasted.

”Hey its Cass from KISS102.5. Have you ever been at a business meeting and looked at your boss or your coworker and thought, y’know, ‘That suit looks great, like it was made just for her!’ Well, truth be told, it probably was. A lot of professionals have their clothes tailor made to fit them, and for so can you. Locally owned Taperman Tailoring is your one-stop shop to better clothes and a better professional career. So check our website for an address or call 555-279-7733 and tell them that Cass and Marni sent ya—“

Christina fidgeted in the back seat of Alice’s car, her fingers drumming anxiously atop the great dome of her belly as she passed both a Burger King and a McDonald’s. A greedy growl emanated from deep within her fleshy folds, even as she strained her neck to keep both signs in view.

“I’m just saying, I never thought I’d be the one driving you around.” Melissa chuckled amusedly from her seat behind the wheel, “I always figured that it’d be the other way around.”

Melissa lifted one thick arm to nudge Alice’s ample belly, her hand sinking deep into her friend’s soft flesh before Alice swat it away with an arm far fatter and squishier than Melissa’s. A disgruntled burble escaped the super-sized secretary as she fended off her friend’s tauntings, her full lower lip creasing into a pout.

“Stop it, Melissa.” Alice grumbled huskily, her voice thick and heavy, “You’re being mean.”

“I’m just saying with all the time you spend at the gym…” Melissa rebutted playfully, “I told you those places were evil. S’why I never bother with one.”

Melissa snorted with laughter while a good-natured chortle escaped elephantine Alice. Her time as a premium member of Fit Life had done little to stunt her weight gain. In fact, it went from a steady crawl (if not a right plateau) right back to ambitious and quickly climbing. She’d quickly overcome Melissa’s own girth, upsetting the precarious balance the two co-dependent enablers had forged over years of Melissa being heavier, and then some. While by no means the largest woman at Gordge, or even the largest woman in their branch, Alice was certainly a heavyweight these days.

The reason Melissa was driving was due to Alice’s weight, in fact. Two-fold if one wished to be specific. Alice’s mass had grown far too large for her current vehicle, her breasts and great gut wedging the wheel to a complete halt. Melissa’s own enormity, while no means healthy, was just so much svelter than Alice’s so that it allowed for the basic movement of the steering mechanism.

Of course, for how long she would remain thus so much lighter than Alice was subject to change. She and her friend frequented many of the same restaurants and often indulged Alice’s Premium Membership benefits—the empty donut boxes strewn about the vehicle a testament to the sheer impossibility of going even a moment without something to snack on.

“Hey, you getting enough air back there?” Melissa looked into the rearview mirror at Christina, “Alice’s AC’s kinda screwy.”

“Hmm?” Christy snapped back from the window, “Oh, yeah, I’m fine…”

Another gurgle. Christy was not fine.

She was in her biggest dress. A nylon number that clung to her way too tightly. Everything was outlined to the smallest severity. Her breasts spilling out from her bra, every dimple and spare roll her stomach had to offer, even the outline of her belly button and the crack of her fat ass was on complete display and painted the softest shade of Porky Pig pink.

“Hrrmm…” Christy fondled her pink pudge with one chubby hand, “You’re sure this George guy knows what he’s doing?”

“Oh he’s the best.” Alice answered energetically from the front seat, “Everyone in the office goes to him.”

Another “hrrm” from Christy, this time of doubt.

“Marni goes to see him too.” Alice said with a bigger smile, knowing that it would grab Christina’s attention, “You know she’s always got the cutest outfits.”

Christina didn’t. She’d only ever seen Marni half-naked or in workout clothes, and that was some months ago when she still had her membership. But from what she knew about Marni, Christy was sure that her judgement could be trusted. Besides, now that her money wasn’t going to Fit Life, she could afford a little… adjustments… in her clothing now and then.

“Look, don’t worry about the price tag.” Alice reassured her friend, “Everything’s on sale, and so are a lot of the adjustments. You’ll be fine!”

Christy looked up abashedly and smiled towards her friend, who smiled into the vanity mirror. It was a pretty sweet thing of Alice to offer to take Christy with her. They’d both bonded lately over how difficult it seemed to stay clothed. Though with Alice it was a bit more… understandable.

How bad could it be?

Christina was feeling a bit nervous about going to the tailor, but a quick stop at the mall food court for some Cinnabon eased most of her anxiety. She through her wrapper in the trash and they waddled into the store. The obese trio waddled past the store front of clothes and into a backroom.

“George!” Alice said as she suffocated the grey-haired man with her enormous blubber. Melissa also gave him hug. “We’re bringing along our friend Christina, who I think finally requires your services.”

George was a short slender man. Probably in his late 50’s with thick framed glasses and grey and white streaks in his hair. He came off very Martin Scorsese-ish. They chatted for a bit. Melissa and Alice had been seeing George for a few years apparently. Christina found it odd how much Alice and Melissa seemed to… swoon(?) over George. I mean he’s charming but… really? Alice really is gushing about him. This is kind of uncomfortable.

“Alice, you’re daddy issues are showing.” Melissa whispered. Alice blushed and immediately shut up.

“Great well which one you would like to go first? How about you, Christina? Don’t worry, I won’t bite. Although I can’t speak for my assistant.” George said. Alice burst out laughing.

“Ugh, sure I guess.” Christina replied. George lead her into the middle of the room while Alice and Melissa took a seat off to the side.

“You just undress and I’ll get the measuring tape.” George said. Christina began to undress. Her tight dress chaffed against her soft belly as it slipped off of the doughy obese body it had struggled to contain. Christina let out a sigh of relief as she unclasped her bra and her heavy, flabby tits hung free. George came back and looked at the naked Christina from a few feet away. He tilted his head, crouched down, stood up, walked around, looked up close, stepped further back. Christina wasn’t sure what to do. George continued to mumble and talk to himself. Finally he spoke up.

“Oh Christina, I can see it now.” He held his hands together like he were imagining Christina in a picture frame. “Yes don’t worry, I am going to make you so beautiful. Not to say you aren’t already beautiful, no of course not, you’re gorgeous, a blonde heartbreaker like you… Mhmm, yes… but you’re going to make everyone jealous when we get you in a proper dress or blouse.” Christina didn’t know what to say, but she couldn’t stop herself from blushing. She had certainly not expected to be flattered here. “Alright I’m just going to measure you and then I’ll sew you a blouse that’s to die for.” George started to measure all over Christina.

“So you’re going to make me completely new clothes?” Christina asked.

“Yes, first time customers always get a heavily discounted set of dresses, blouses, skirts, and what not. And before you say anything else I’ll just tell you that you’re not going to say no to the prices we offer.” George said.

“Really? Like a whole new wardrobe?” Christina said with a bit of girlish excitement. George could afford to give first time customers like Christina a practically free new wardrobe since they always end up paying it back with frequent adjustments.

Christina was showered with compliments until George stopped moving his measuring tape.

“So I’m done?” Christina asked.

“Yep, just go back and sit down and Cheryl will help you with everything else.” George said. Christina dressed back up and waddled over to Alice and Melissa. “Who’s next?” Alice’s hand shot up and she struggled to get off of her butt and waddle over to George.

Alice undressed in the middle of the room. Christina was a bit taken aback by Alice’s naked enormity. George was too.

“So Alice how’s life treating you?” George said.

“Oh you know, there’s been ups and downs.” Alice responded.

“Ain’t that the… er, truth.” George said as he struggled to get the tape measure around Alice’s massive double belly. George was having a bit of trouble measuring Alice incredibly obese body. Eventually asking for help from his assistant. “Well you’ve definitely gotten a bit bigger.” George said.

“Yeah, so you’re gonna have to let everything out more?” Alice asked. That was usually what happened anyway.

“Well… actually no. I’ll probably have to make new clothes for you.” George said.

“What?.. What do you mean?”

“Well you’re change in size is a bit more… dramatic than usual. I don’t think I could adjust your current wardrobe anymore to fit you. You can only alter clothes so much.” George said. Alice looked down with a look of disappointment.

“oh…” was all she squeaked out. She wasn’t going to cry but Alice definitely felt a little deflated from the news.

“Hey on the bright side, you’re going to get a brand new wardrobe.” George said trying to cheer her up.

“Heh, I guess that… could be fun.” Alice said solemnly. She dressed herself and waddled heavily over to her two friends.

1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Strong, nimble fingers squeezed and kneaded the doughy padding between Alice’s neck and shoulders, despite there being little hope of reaching her atrophied muscles beneath her thick flab. Her skin and swollen pugs of pudge were sensitive though, and it felt good for them to be handled. The massage table, tailor-made for women of larger sizes, creaked and groaned as she lay belly up on the flat surface—her great gut rising and falling with every belabored breath that the beached blonde could take.

The svelte masseuse, not her usual girl but another tiny thing that was as short as she was talented with her hands, took to Alice’s bulk well. Her hands slid across her vastness from her shoulders down to the great dome of her belly, pressing inwards from both ends and causing light swelling in her uppermost section. She loomed over Alice’s head, taut midriff a mere half inch from Alice’s nose, as she fluffed her. Alice took great enjoyment in the sensation of soft tender hands taking such care of her delicate and pampered stomach, though she would never openly admit it. It caused her breath to shallow and her cheeks to redden, the pleasure immense in that her hands lay limp but her belly go rubbed without spending any extra energy.

It was almost enough for her to forget what had happened earlier. With George. And the tailoring. In front of everybody…

The recollection made her mouth uncomfortably dry, feeling cavernous and hungry. Her pavlovian response to comfort eating was strong, and even now she wished that she’d been allowed to take food into the massage parlor.

The masseuse moved from the top of her stomach to the middle, the sides of Alice’s fat gut until they were shiny with lotion. Her stomach wobbled obnoxiously at the action, swaying from side to side for a time longer after her massuese’s hands left her flesh. However, her girl was professional. She swathed her customer’s giant rising gut like she was basting a doughy white turkey. She pressed up here too, on her sides, causing a greater swell that rose lower than the one before it. It caused a sharp inhale from Alice, an oddly sexual (though shallow) sound that made Alice bite her lower lip in embarrassment. She made the strangest sounds sometimes…

Oh, the clothing store. That’s right. It had happened in front of everybody—Alice had been so embarrassed that she actually insisted that Melissa drive her home, whereupon she and Christy went out to eat not two minutes after Alice was in the elevator up to her apartment. She’d taken a taxi to the gym, and it had taken her five minutes just to get to a sitting position…

“Mmmm…”

A hum escaped Alice as the masseuse took a crack at finding Alice’s hip bones. She toyed with her thick thigh fat, pressing sternly on Alice’s outer legs and the sides of her mountainous ass. It was nice to be massaged, given that she was rapidly approaching a state when she was unable to do it herself. She clenched her titanic cheeks in excitement and...

“Oh!” Alice cried out as the support beneath her suddenly gave way after a lurching groan.

The table collapsed beneath her immensity, leaving her laying flat on her back amongst the broken metal and malformed table. The masseuse quickly jumped to attention and grabbed Alice by the flabby forearm with both her tiny hands, but proved to be illequipped in dealing with a tragedy of such epic proportions.

“H-Hold on, I think I might need some help…” the woman wheezed, taking a half-step forward in search of someone, “Rachel… Hey, Rachel, could you come help me?”

Two women were required to lift Alice and all her immensity, and that was with back-breaking exertion on her part as well. By the time she was standing, Alice was a wreck. Naked, enormous, and wheezing up a storm.

“I suppose we’ll have to break out the heavy duty table…” she heard the one named Rachel mumble behind her, “The one we use for that radio star…”

Tears welled up in the corners of Alice’s eyes. It was becoming increasingly obvious that there was only one solution to her problem…

1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Alice tried to keep her composure while she waddled out of the gym. Wiping her eyes, she got fiddled around her in her bag until she pulled out her cellphone. She needed to let loose. She also needed to talk some stuff out. While her best friend in the world would always be Melissa, Alice needed a listener. A shoulder to cry on. That certainly was not Melissa. Luckily her other longtime friend in the office was available.

***


“Hey Al, hop in!” Courtney said, pushing the passenger door open. Alice lowered her enormous bottom into the car. Thank god Courtney was a well prepared fat woman. She drove a giant SUV that felt spacious even for a person like Alice or Courtney.

She had stopped crying but you could still see it in Alice’s sniffling, bright red face.

“Something bothering you?” Courtney asked. She already knew the answer. Alice just sort of nodded her head. “Well let’s get some beer and wings in you.”

Courtney drove to their usual bar spot. They had been doing this for years. Alice, Courtney, and Melissa going for a drink at the Blue Door Bar, in the booth in the front right corner. This was a comfort zone for Alice, and the only place she wanted to be right now. Courtney and Alice struggled to squeeze into the booth seating. The two extremely obese women barely fit their bulging bellies behind the table.

They each ordered beer and buffalo wings.

“So what’s the reason why you called all of a sudden?” Courtney asked.

“Ugh… It started when I couldn’t fit in my car anymore, then I had to get all new clothes from George, then I broke the massage table at the gym… an-and *sniff* I-I…” Alice was struggling to hold back tears.

“Aww that… that sucks… I’m sorry.” Courtney said.

“I just can’t believe I’ve let myself go so much. I just got that premium gym membership and still I just get fatter!” Alice said.

“Oh come on Alice.” Courtney put her hand on Alice’s shoulder. “Being fat isn’t the end of the world. Hell, I’m fatter than you are. You don’t see me getting down on myself, do you?” Courtney said. Alice sat back, gaining her composure.

“Well, yeah…but… I guess… I guess you’re probably right.” Alice said with a sigh. “It just feels so shameful, letting myself go like this. I feel so embarrassed. At least you and Melissa have come to terms with your weight. I wanted to LOSE weight and somehow got fatter.” Alice said.

“Why do you want to lose weight? You don’t really act like you actually want to lose weight. You keep telling yourself that you don’t want to be fat but I think subconsciously you have a different opinion… Being fat isn’t so bad if you stop telling yourself you’re supposed to be skinny. Yes maybe you get out of breath easier and going up the stairs sucks but that’s okay! You’re not a cheerleader anymore, Alice. It’s not a big deal if you’re out of shape. So you can’t drive your car anymore. Buy a bigger car! They make bigger cars, it’s not like you were never gonna drive again. That 90’s hunk a junk is a deathtrap anyway.” Courtney said.

“Yeah… You’re right! You’re right.” Alice said.

“And so you had a bit of an accident at the massage parlor. Everyone has embarrassing moments. Would you rather torture yourself on the treadmill 3 times a week or be able to eat what you want?” Courtney asked.

“Well obviously eat what I want. You know, I think you’re right. It’s just that for all my laugh I was Ms. Overachiever in everything, it’s hard to get over the fact that I had lost my figure.” Alice said.

“Instead of saying you lost your figure, just think of it as gaining even more of a figure. I’ve seen guys take a glance at those cans.” Alice blushed. “C’mon order whatever you want, and you better not feel bad about it. Especially since it’s on me tonight.” Courtney said.

Their conversation quickly turned into their normal banter and Alice became her usual bubbly self. Most of all though Alice stuffed herself until she nearly burst. This time though she felt no shame as she hauled her enormously bloated belly out of the bar.

1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
“Thank you for calling Gordge Enterprises, this is Victoria, how may I help you today?”

The support groaned ominously on the vastly overburdened office chair as Vicky lean back laxly. It had recently been a gift from Courtney, custom-fit for the portly PR’s pudge. And while Victoria wasn’t quite as heavy as her fellow office drone was, which was no difficult task, there were some areas where the two of them were a perfect match… and then there were some where Victoria exceeded that of the other employees due to her uncanny expansion in the past few months…

“Mhmm… yes sir, I’ll transfer you right away.”

With husky whimpering grunt, Vicky leaned forward again, eliciting another sharp whine from her chair. Straining the sleeves on her custom-sized purple business blouse, one of Vicky’s meaty arms stretched towards the base. Constrained by the tightness of her top, Vicky’s doughy digits just barely managed to poke the little white button that would transfer the caller to Jenna. After the deed was done, her arm instantly reeled back in like an immense olive fish line, and her fat thumb pressed the “END” button on the cordless. She then began the arduous task of resituating herself in her seat, an act that was beginning to become increasingly lengthy and hardly worth the effort.

The act of wrestling with her own immensity left Victoria breathless, her chubby cheeks flushed in exertion. They were getting rounder now, burying her pretty Italian features under the fleshy avalanche of her olive skin. Her thick second chin left her neckless. Either of her round arms lay on the rests, pouring off either side of their perches. Victoria’s great gut rest lazily on her lap and thensome—the thickness of her thighs robbing her of the ability to spread her legs and allow her the adequate room that her belly required. Her thick black hair was up, the heat from her neck under her ‘do was beginning to become unbearable. The tiny silver earrings she’d chosen today looked absolutely ridiculous on a woman so huge, so elephantine.

She slowly shifted back to her computer, her eyes focused on Jenna’s door and her newsfeed. It wouldn’t be the first time she’d phoned it in through work—the intricacies of her social life and who her sisters were dating now seemed a lot more interesting than whatever it was she was supposed to be doing here. So long as she made sure to switch the windows before anyone saw her, no one would be the wiser…

“Ugh, she’s getting fat.” Victoria raised an eyebrow maliciously at a picture of her second-oldest cousin, “Always knew she would.”

Victoria giggled to herself, an action that reverberated in the chair. It had a high squealing giggle as Vicky’s girth shook it with her amusement

“Oh he’s cute…” Vicky said to herself with mild amusement, photo-stalking a friend of her friend “Friend request…”

She leaned forward interestedly, the chair wailing a little more at the sharpness of the incline. Her belly bunched against the desk

“Oh mmm…” she licked her lips at a picture her old college roomie had taken of some sushi tagged #healthyliving, “I could go for some of that right now…”

She crossed her cankles under the desk, lurching forward slightly with the lightened support. Her ass flexed slightly in excitement deep within her cheeks, an action that was hardly noticed nor felt

“Ooh they have deep fried stuff…” she’d navigated to the restaurant’s website in hopes of having found a new stomping ground, “American Dream Roll… hmm… it’s sushi though, so I guess it balances out if it’s deep fried…”

Her stomach growled deep within her belly folds, her nostrils flaring slightly as a familiar emptiness overcame her. She wondered, not so idly, what spicy mayonnaise tasted like. She’d never heard of it before, but then she’d never been really big into sushi. Her eyes widened as she lost herself in the PDF of their menu.

“I wonder if I… get my discount there…?” she huffed, having grown quite excited by the prospect of maybe going there right now, “Ooh… Happy Hour is half off… Oh if it worked then I could just eat… I’d eat that—“

REEAK!!

“And… and that…” she mumbled breathily

WRAAACK!!

“And, like… all of—“

K-KRAAAK!!

With a heavy cubicle-shaking THUD, Vicky was flat on her fat ass. She’d put too much pressure on the chair, and it had given way beneath her. She fell on her back, laying porcine on the floor as her ass made her lower half rise a good bit higher than her upper half—even cushioned by her copious amounts of back fat. Her great belly domed up in its two distinct rolls tall from the floor, the reverberation felt in her gut having caused two of the lower buttons to pop right off and fly somewhere in the office.

“Ugh!!” she grunted thickly, deeply irked by yet another furniture malfunction, “These stupid fucking chairs again! Like, when are we gonna order some that aren’t total bullshit?!”

Christina waddled into the breakroom. She was in a very good mood today… she had actually been in a good mood for a while since she had stopped feeling so gloomy about her weight. But today she was feeling especially good.

As Christina made her way over to the vending machine her big overfed belly bounced with each step. All of Christina bounced with her walk to be honest. Her big bottom wobbled and each landing of her feet on the soft carpet sent ripples through her flabby breasts and upper arms. Usually the jostling of her fat didn’t put Christina in a good mood but today was different.

She had finally received her clothes from George, the tailor, over the weekend, and since it was Monday, it was the first time Christy was wearing her new clothes around the office. While showing off your brand new clothes was something pretty much every girl (or guy for that matter) enjoyed, Christina’s case was a bit different. While she did like how cute and stylish her new wardrobe was, the reason why she was in such a good mood was because of the fit. Christina had never thought plus size office clothing could be so comfortable. Instead of having her big belly awkwardly shift as her tight shirt struggled to contain its wobbling enormity, her soft belly rolls bounced freely under her perfect fitting blouse. Her pants felt wonderful around her thick thighs. She wasn’t sure what George lined them with but she felt no chaffing as her blubbery legs rubbed together.

She punched in several numbers and watched as various sweet and salty goodies dropped from the vending machine. Christina bent over to retrieve them, surprised when there was no ominous groan or stretching sounds coming from the seat of her pants. It felt like she was in her pajamas.

Christina was almost giggling from the unbridled giddiness she was experiencing with the new level of comfort she had found from her new unrestrictive wardrobe. She waddled over to the table and sat down next to Alice. She instinctively reached to adjust her pants and belt to give more room for her gut but found that her hefty belly sat perfectly in her lap. Christy could not believe how awesome this was.

“Christina are those the new clothes?” Alice asked.

“Oh I wanna see. Here, stand up and show us your outfit.” Courtney said. Christina hefted herself up and sun around to show off her knew clothes.
“I LOVE the way this blouse fits. All of it fits so well really.” Christina said, wuickly sitting back down so she could get to her snacks.

“Yeah George is like a wizard with that tape measure.” Courtney said.

“I should be getting mine from him soon. I really need them, too. This skirt is barely holding together.” Alice said as she looked over her enormous body.

“I hope it does for your sake. Especially after hearing about Vicky’s clothing malfunction at the gym.” Courtney said.

“I don’t know, I think Alice could probably pull off the “half naked with my pant’s torn to shreds” look, pretty well.” Melissa said. They all snickered and giggled.
