1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
It had been four hours.

She’d told her, for her birthday she wanted to go out clubbing. Like they used to. They, like, never went out to the club anymore. That is to say they never went together anymore. Sometimes it had been more beneficial to just leave her behind and head out herself, slink around with some guys and dance a little. If she’d had it her way, they’d never do anything except eat. Which, admittedly, was kinda fun to do sometimes. They never got to spend any time together outside of work anymore, which was totally lame. Even at the gym, the one place that both of them liked to go, was pretty divisive. So she’d take her out on her birthday, go wherever she wanted. Even if it was out to eat before they hit the clubs—which seemed pretty unlikely now considering that they had a morning show to do and it was already ten ‘o’ clock.

Cass sat across the table, her plate empty and her attention lacking. She propped her head up in her hand while she watched, idly, as her longtime friend and coworker ate her way through a week’s paycheck. And it had been like this for hours. Just eating and eating and eating, plate after plate and swipe after swipe of that damn platinum card. After all the trouble she’d gone to for tonight, it was understandable to be a little upset, right?

She’d gone and paid off the owner of Marni’s favorite buffet in town as incentive to allow her friend to really eat all she could eat, instead of just kicking them out half-way through the night. She paid for that tent of a dress she was wearing (courtesy of Taperman Tailoring, thus the ad), and her hair and makeup for the night on top of driving her around. Cass had put a lot of effort into making sure tonight was going to be fun, but so far it had been anything but…

Marni had pushed the table all the way over to Cass’ side, requiring every inch of wiggle room there was to spare. Her behemothic belly still managed to brush against the lip, and as she ate it threatened to swell over and onto the table’s surface. Her arms rested firmly on the crest of her corpulence, her various rolls and copious padding of pudge proving quite obstructive—though she managed to gorge herself with little difficulty. Her wide, rounded arms constantly quaked with their constant movement, feeding forkful after loaded forkful of serving into Marni’s awaiting maw.

She looked like someone had taken a prom queen and blown her up too big. The dress was low cut, wrapping around the distinct and dominant tiers of her stomach before stopping just above her knees. Her arms wobbled freely, having undone the tight straps not long after she’d realized that it wasn’t going anywhere. Behind her, two black boulders of bobbing butt blubber struggled to break free from her cocktail dress confines. Her hair was up and her makeup pristine, her round cheeks rosy and her plump lips painted, and it was all because of Cass.

But nooo. Pre-clubbing birthday dinner had quickly become Marni-Munchie-Hour.

Marni gnashed and chewed at her most recent victim, a plate of meatloaf hobbled together in hopes of buying some time. Her second chin flexed and expanded as she swallowed, having completely obscured any presence of her neck. She was slowing down now, at least, but that was beside the point. Cass had sat here this whole time watching as Marni ate herself stupid. She picked idly at the remaining chunk of steak she’d gotten about twenty minutes ago (having had time to actually digest her dinner and go back for a little more later!). Something about being around Marni when she was like this made eating seem a lot less fun…

“Uhn…. Oh man…” Marni wheezed, her breath long lost in the sea of gluttony she’d been swimming in for the past few hours, “I can’t… oh Cass, I can’t… ungh…”

Marni’s ridiculously flabby arms pushed the table a little further into Cass’ middle, officially making her uncomfortable. It relieved a little pressure off of Marni’s massiveness, but not nearly enough. A nasal whine escaped her as two hands rushed to either of her flanks, rubbing gently as she attempted to soothe the beast she’d created.

Great, now she had a stomachache.

“Think you’ve had enough Birthday Girl?” Cass asked flatly, not looking up from her phone as she placated her pudgy partner, “Y’wanna go out to the club now or wait until next year when you’ve finally digested?”

“Urrp… I can’t… Cass can you just… come over here?” Marni pleaded as she tentatively touched her tonnage, “I just need some… I just need a little more room…”

Cass rolled her eyes.

“Sure… why not?” she answered flatly, wriggling her way out of the booth and walking around to Marni’s side, whereupon the heaviest host pushed the table as far into the booth seating as she could. A grateful groan escaped her as her belly sagged further, free from its support. The definition between her various rolls was less evident and her belly was rounder, no doubt full of tonight’s great birthday binge. She rubbed the spot where her belly had been forced upwards for so long, her dress tighter now that the entirety of Marni’s middle was forcing it forward. If she ripped that thing, Cass would have too—

“Oh… Oh so much better…” Marni mumbled thickly, closing her eyes and lulling her head back, “You’re the best.”

“Damn right I am…” Cass grumbled, “Considering I paid for the—“

“HEY, WE’VE GOT A BIRTHDAY!!” a clamorous call rang out as the kitchen doors swung open, an entourage of waiters and waitresses flooding around the booth, a particularly Hispanic man in a chef’s hat clutching Marni’s last present of the night—a big chocolate birthday cake. It was supposed to come out hours ago, but Cass supposed that it was closing time soon. No doubt this was their little way of saying “we’ve gotta go soon, and so do you.”

Throughout the entire birthday song, Marni just stared at the cake; defeated. She had saved no room for dessert, and Cass could tell. Her breathing was heavy, her sweaty swelling mass moving up and down constantly—something that Cass could unfortunately feel thanks to their close quarters.

“Oh… you really didn’t have turrrp…” Marni burped, “Cass, I… I think I’m gonna have to take this home. I can’t…”
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Happy Birthday Mega Marni!

choices: So Christy's job performance is up. That means a R-A-I-S-E!
Christy is officially no longer the "skinny one" in the office
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
The svelte siren’s eye twitched slightly. Take it home? After everything she’d been through tonight, Marni was just gonna take the damn thing home? That… that didn’t seem right. To her. She’d paid for this, and everything else tonight… someone was gonna eat that cake! Dammit she’d been watching her eat all. night. and she was going to eat that stupid—

“Uh, no.” Cass said flatly as she put her phone down on the table, “I’ve seen you eat, like, twice as much as this. You are not gonna take this thing in my car, forget about it, and me wind up eating it. It’s just not gonna happen.”

Cass grabbed the knife and cut a big square from the bulk. Then, channeling some of the disappointment she’d felt throughout the night, she stabbed it with a fork.

“Open up.”

Cass raised the fork above her head, watching as Marni’s gaze hypnotically followed the levitating tidbit of cake. She was far too addicted to food to say no, the whimpering that peppered her gasping breaths making her desire all the more obvious. Like a dog begging for scraps, Marni just couldn’t say no. No matter how full she was…

“Mmm… Mmmmm…” she moaned, her eyes closing as a hot puff of air escaped her, “Can’t… mrmm…”

Another mouthful, still no objections. Marni’s arms slid down the swell of her gut, having been relieved of duty. Her head lulled over, her mouth agape in expectation and acceptance. Every bite was welcomed with a sensual sound that Cass had only ever heard her friend make when eating cheese cake, and soon her free hands began to caress her stomach lightly.

Cass had been watching her eat all night. This cake, this stupid little cake? Nothing. Marni could eat this in a second if she wanted to. After all, she’d paid for the damn thing. And it was not welcome in her apartment. It wasn’t like Marni cared about her weight anyway…

“Mm…” Marni burbled sleepily as Cass placed another forkful in her mouth.

“Come on, halfway done.” Cass commanded, bringing her hand to rest on the taut sphere of Marni’s great gut.

Marni winced at Cass’ touch, the dress hardly thick enough to afford any sort of insulation against the outside world. However the light stroking, an action which came naturally to Cass, seemed to ease her ailment. In her heels, Marni’s toes clenched as another mouthful made its way past her lips.

“You’re doing great, come on Birthday Girl.” Cass asserted, drumming Marni’s tautness with her fingers while she waited for her heavyset heifer to finish chewing. As soon as she saw Marni’s dangling double chin flex, another bite. Marni just had to eat this bite, she had to. B-Because they were closing soon.

“Mm… no… too full.” Marni panted, “Can’t… ah… can’t do it…”

Cass squeezed Marni’s malleable mass with her outstretched palm, causing the whalish woman to convulse and let out a sharp yelp that startled the other late-nighters. Cass manned the final bite on the utensil and held it above Marni’s head.

“You want it?” she asked firmly

Marni began to salivate from the corners of her mouth as the tantalizing treat was held in front of her, just out of reach. Her mouth opened ever so slightly, her eyes nearly crossed as she kept the fork in sight. She was sweating bullets, her massiveness itchy in anticipation.

“You waaaant it?” Cass asked again, an eyebrow raised wryly and her lips tucked slyly to the side

“Yuh… yes…” Marni managed to huff

“Whaaaat?” Cass asked again

“I said… yes…” Marni whimpered

“Good girl.”

The last bite was placed immediately in her mouth. She chewed and swallowed instinctively, left an absolute wreck. She sat in place, pathetically pudgy and out of breath as she wheezed up a storm. Cass couldn’t help but watch, wide eyed, as Marni began to clutch at her distended middle. Her enormous breasts bobbed up and down with every belabored breathing, and her cheeks were rosy red. Marni looked like she was about to pop, barely conscious if Cass had her guess. But that’s what she wanted, right? She’d spent all night eating and eating and eating on Cass’ dime instead of going clubbing with her. She’d been left so stuffed, and sweaty and… vulnerable…and... and...

“Hey, uh, don’t mean to interrupt…” one of their waiters returned suddenly, “But we’re kind’ve… closing. So… make of that what you will.”
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Icing on the Cake

choices: EAT
Go back to Fit Life Gym
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Through all the changes Christina had been through in her short time working for Gordge, the one thing that didn’t change was her work ethic. She was incredibly productive and efficient at her job and always went above and beyond when completing the tasks she was assigned.

That’s why it was no surprise when she was called into Jenna’s office after lunch on Wednesday.

Christina grunted as she hauled herself out of her chair. Her spare tire cascade in front of her upper thighs, forming a doughy belly apron. She waddled out of her cubicle and into Jenna’s office.

“Hey *gulp* Christina, come take a seat.” Jenna said, licking the ketchup and grease off her fingers. The enormous boss leaned back heavily in her groaning chair. She wiped her hands on her massive, clothed belly.

Christina pulled a chair across from Jenna’s desk. Christina let out a sigh as her bulk lowered onto the seat. She was a bit nervous for some reason. Could it really be a raise? Courtney said it probably was… but then Alice thought it was a promotion. Is that better?... Wait what if it’s neither? What if I’m being transferred?

“We’ve enjoyed your time spent here at the office and at Gordge inc…” Jenna said, she paused. Oh my god am I getting fired? I bet it’s because I ate all the brownies in the kitchen last week… I totally was gonna have only one, I didn’t mean to eat both boxes!

“So… Are you okay? You look like you’ve just seen a ghost.” Jenna said.

“Uhhh… Yeah, yeah I’m fine.” Christina said gathering her composure.

“Well anyway, you’ve done really well recently so I’m awarding you a pay raise.” Jenna said.

Christina cracked a small smile. “Oh… uh, thanks!” Christina blushed, feeling a little dumb for thinking she was getting fired.

“Yeah keep up the great work.” Jenna said.

***

Later Christina gabbed about it to her friends in the break room.

“Wow that’s awesome. You probably needed it to. The starting salaries here really suck.” Courtney said.

“Yeah I managed to get by. Finally I’ll have some walking around money though.” Christina said.

“Don’t be too sure, you’re paying for our next lunch together.” Alice said.

“That’s not fair Al, we could probably bankrupt her by the third course.” Melissa joked. They all laughed and Alice blushed a bit.

“Ha, I’m not wasting a cent on you greedy girls.” Christy said.

“So what are you going to spend it on?” Courtney asked.

“Yeah you’ve got to spoil yourself a little bit. At least to celebrate.” Alice said.

“Hmmm… I’ll have to think about that.” Christina pondered. What should I do?
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Payday!

choices: An informal eating contest is incited between Christina and Melissa...
Apparently you can't just take all that chicken without getting in trouble
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
“Hey save some for the rest of us, will ya?”

Christina was ripped from her affair with the remaining sweet and sour chicken, a good glop of orange-covered poultry making a sweet sticky mountain on her plate. She looked over to Melissa in a quick affirmation of her coworker’s suggestion, shuffling a little further down the aisle and allowing the brunette a play at the bin. Her belly brushed against the rack where the trays could slide, spilling over slightly in a bright pink bulge over the cheap imitation marble. Using one of her flabby arms, Christy made a grab at some sticky rice and poured it over her chicken, making it rain bright white on her little orange mountain. Then another spoonful, and then one more, before she topped her first course with shrimp.

It had been a pretty long time since Christy had come here. Twin Dragons Buffet was pretty ritzy, for an all-you-can-eat joint. Ever since she lost her membership at Fit Life and decided that she couldn’t afford the once constant indulgence of upscale Chinese food, Christy had been forced to eat at WuKong (the other all-you-can-eat Chinese restaurant, it wasn’t as good but it was cheaper and they delivered.) But after Jenna had given her notice about a certain someone’s pay raise…

Christy huffed as she plopped herself down into the booth, a tremor going through the restaurant floor. Pivoting her pathetic muscles, the overfed employee scooted her supple supine self as close to the wall as her burdensomely bulgy hips and enormously fat ass would allow. Even still, her stomach was already becoming close friends with the table. Her flabby elbows rested lazily on the table’s surface as she made a hasty grab for her silverware, her greedy eyes already glistening as the heaping pile of carbohydrates called her name…

Only for Courtney to come bumbling over. The PR rep held a platter in between her hands, resting it on the great shelf of her doming stomach as she waddled to the table. She looked ridiculous, such a large woman with such a small (comparatively) tray only served to make herself look larger by comparison. But she was far from the only fat woman who ate at this establishment…

“You know… gnosh… Marni did a review of this place.” Alice said idly as she readied another forkful for herself, seated across from Christy, “Did you know that they had a chocolate fountain?”

“Hasn’t she… hff… already done this place?” Courtney huffed, her laborious largeness having stolen her breath as she waddled over; a problem that only cheap oriental food could cure, “Mm… Like, four times?”

“That was on the Marni Munchie Hour.” Alice corrected after a quick sip of her dark bubbly drink, “This was on her blog.”

“Which is also called the Marni Munchie Hour, and it’s still the third time she’s reported on it there.” Melissa corrected as she waddled over, the rest of the sweet and sour chicken in tow as well as some beef tips and shrimp, “Gave this place five stars, but I think they paid her off with hibachi chicken. That chocolate fountain sucks.”

“Ugh, not that one!” Alice rolled her eyes as Melissa squeezed into the inadequate space next to her, “She did this on her regular blog. The KISS102.5 blog that she shares with Cass.”

“You know way too much about those women and their personal lives.” Courtney interjected, much to the amusement of the other ladies.

Christy smiled impatiently and returned to her mountain. Chicken covered in rice covered in shrimp, a veritable masterpiece of the oriental cuisine. She’d found a real liking for it on the cheap from WuKong, but it always got her coffee table messy and it was a pain in the butt to clean up all those takeout boxes. But here, at Twin dragons, she could get all the sweet succulent benefits of her munchie menagerie without all the pesky cleanup duty…

“Ooh, that looks good!” Alice announced her intrigue in Christina’s meal by leaning in closer with a distinct huskiness to her voice, “Where did you… mm… did you think of that all by yourself? What’s in it?”

Christy paused, mid-bite, to make eye contact with her massive superior. She blinked in slight frustration, put the fork back down, and did her best to be as polite as possible.

“It’s just, uh, shrimp and rice and sweet and sour chicken.” She said quickly, picking the fork back up again before Alice could ask a follow-up ques—

“Yeah, like all the sweet and sour chicken.” Melissa griped, poking at her meager (in actuality, a more than healthy helping) of the sweet orange meat, “Little Miss I-Got-A-Raise decided to get all the good pieces!”

Christy eyed her friend with scrutiny before looking back at her own plate…

“Hey!” Melissa whined as Christy took several big bites out of her massive meal, shoving the goopy sweet stuff between her lips with a big smile on her face, “You pig!”

It was true, and Christina couldn’t deny it. She’d been thinking about this ever since she’d gotten the raise, making this meal and shoving it down her throat. Ten of these, a hundred chicken-rice-shrimp mountains to go down into her belly! As she swallowed, a familiar warmth spread throughout her giant belly apron.

“What did you expect?” Christy said slyly with a pat of the crest of her stomach, her hand lingering there for a moment before returning to its place at the side of her plate, “Every fat girl for herself right? And in twenty minutes, when they put out some more, I’ll just eat all of that too!”

“You wouldn’t.” Melissa gasped somewhat playfully, “You couldn’t.”

A guttural grumble growled loudly enough for all four women present to hear, Christina’s advantageous appetite having been aroused by the prospect of living up to her promise-slash-threat. Her hand slowly slid back to the crest of her stomach, stroking it lightly as it commanded her to eat the as-of-yet unavailable entrée.

“Watch me.” Christina burbled thickly before delving into her appetizer…
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Oriental Outing

choices: Fatter wallet=even fatter Christina
free choice
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
The four fatties continued to eat and chat. Christina and Melissa had completely emptied the bin of sweet and sour chicken. Their little rivalry had stopped for a few minutes. Until Alice noticed something.

“Looks like they’re replacing the sweat an” Christina and Melissa immediately jumped up to get more chicken. They both struggled a bit to get out of the booth. Melissa stumbled a bit allowing Christina an early lead in their race to more food. Christina sprinted for about two steps before realizing she was in no way capable of maintaining a dead sprint. Her blubbery breasts smacked her in the face and her whole body quaked and wobbled before she slowed down to a pathetic jog. She managed to steal about half a plate of sweet and sour chicken before Melissa came and bounced into her. Their bodies jiggled, Christina nearly lost her balance. They quickly waddled back to their table.

All four of the were giggling and Christina and Melissa were breathing heavily as they shoveled food into their mouths.

“We’ve got an old fashioned eating contest going!” Courtney said.

“Well my money’s on Melissa.” Alice said.

“Guess I’m rooting for Christy then.” Courtney said.

They rushed back for more and by the 3rd trip there was no sweet and sour chicken left. Christina and Melissa both stared at the empty bin. Then they glanced at each other’s plates. Christina had maybe one or two pieces more than Melissa, and she gave a devilish grin.

“Oh it won’t be that easy.” Melissa said as she quickly started dumping chicken fried rice on the rest of her plate. Christina paused before realizing what Melissa meant. She immediately started to pile on the dumplings.

“You guys are still going? Thought you were just fighting over the sweet and sour chicken.” Alice asked.

“N- *gulp* No!” Christina said.

“Ish jusht *gulp* round… *munch* two.” Melissa said through a mouthful of rice.

They continued to demolish plate after plate of Chinese food. It wasn’t really much of a contest between them. No one was keeping track of how much they were eating since they were too wrapped up in their own glorious gobbling. They were having way too much fun to stop though. It was more just an excuse for Christy and Melissa too eat as much and as fast they could. Something they were both very good at.

Christina’s mouth was just a couple inches away from the dwindling pile of noodles in front of her as she shoveled them rapidly passed her lips. It tasted soooo good. Christina was experiencing such bliss as she ate with reckless abandon. The food was so delicious and she could feel her belly starting to fill up. She frowned a bit as she realized her plate was empty. She almost always ate too much too quickly. Christina often ran out of food before she ran out of appetite. She always regretted not taking her time with her meals and actually savor her food before it all disappeared in her belly. But she didn’t have to worry about that today. No matter how much I eat they’ll always have more. I can just keep eating until I don’t want too anymore. Christina smiled thinking about her piggish intentions.

She picked up her tray and waddled quickly over to the buffet. She huffed trying to catch her breath. These back and forths from the booth to the buffet had her completely red faced and wheezing. She grabbed from several bins forming a pile of various foods on her plate. Her mouth watered and her eyes were glazed as she continued to add onto her plate. Her mouth turned to a big stupid grin as she watched the pile of food on her tray grow incredibly large. Every trip she somehow managed to fit even more on to her tray.

Meanwhile Melissa continued her incredible eating pace. While Christina was completely letting loose with her appetite, this all felt routine for Melissa. When she ate she had one gear. Melissa always ate like it was a competition. She just ate until her belly was full or there was nothing left to eat. Either way once the food was within arm’s reach, it didn’t stay there for many more minutes.

Many plates later their pace had started to slow. Christina struggled to squeeze her bloated belly out of the booth. Her swollen middle wedged tightly against the table. She finally popped out and made her way back to the buffet. She now managed a very slow waddled. Her packed gut bouncing with each step (much to Christina’s discomfort). Her left hand kneaded her doughy bottom belly roll (which now hung naked over her pants). She had eaten an enormous amount of food. I don’t think I’ve got much more room for more. I’m not sure I can take another plate… Oh they refilled the sweet and sour chicken! Guess I could have a bit more. Christina giggled a bit at how much she was spoiling herself. She piled another mountain of chicken on her plate and waddled slowly back to her seat.

Finally they had all eaten their last plate.

“So who one?” Alice asked looking at her two overfed friends. Their enormous bellies bobbed up and down with their heavy breaths. Neither of them looked very comfortable.

“I… *huff* ugh- *burp*… Oooh… *wheeze* mmmm.” Christina was deeply massaging her exposed gut. She could do little more than groan and purr as she attempted to ease her overstuffed middle.

“Haha, you got anything to say about that, Mel?” Alice laughed.

“Huh?... *pant* nuh *huff* nop- *URRRP*!” Melissa gave an earth-shatering burp.

“Guess it’s a tie then.” Courtney joked. Christina couldn’t even laugh, she just grumbled.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: buffet blitz

choices: They made sure to visit the KISS102.5 booth for a chance to win prizes!
Christina made a bee-line for the buffet. Hungry. Now.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
”—taking it down two spots, making it number 7 on our Top 40. Your commercial-free hour of music on this chilly October morning has been brought to you by our friends at Gordge Industries.” a surly tempting tone flooded the speakers, ”You know, we’ve been plugging their advertisements for years now and, honestly, I cannot attest to how much… how much they treat you like family, y’know? Marni and I go straight to them every time we need them, they’re always there, and… and honestly, I wouldn’t go to anyone else even if they didn’t pay us to say that.”

”That’s right Cass, they’re just… the best kind of people and… and they’re… phew…m’hungry…” a thick, husky voice added before the tell-tale rustling of a bag of chips, “I just can’t begin to shay how… howmmm… shay how mush we’be come to rely on them in our day to day livesh.”

”Uh, yeah, right Marni… who totally isn’t eating in here right now because the producer has been getting onto us about ants.” the cohost’s suspiciously specific denial hardly made a dent in her partner’s intake, “Uh, make sure to, uh, check us out at Juan Gringo’s All-You-Can-Eat Mexican restaurant, Marni and me will be down there tomorrow morning during the show. Make sure you stop by so you can enter to win some prizes and get a chance to meet me and Marni.”

The gnashing of chips and smacking of lips flooded the airwaves as Marni continued her feasting unencumbered, happy to rustle her bag of ruffles for all to hear around her…

”Or maybe just me… something tells me Marni’s gonna be a little busy…”

***


It was a chilly Saturday in October, a little windier than most with one too many clouds in the sky. There was a genuine concern among many that the grand opening of Juan Gringo’s was going to get rained out, the fledgling business’ chance at success ruined because of a little wet weather. But nobody seemed to mind too terribly much. It wasn’t too bad outside, just a little cold and a little cloudy. Perfect enough weather to partake in munching on some cheap Mexican food…

“Oh my gaaaaaawd… it’s so hoooooooot…”

A flock of fatties stomped down the sidewalk, encompassing the entire stretch of cement with their collective gaggle’s girth. Three of them, quite well-acquainted, had decided to make a day out of their respectively uneventful weekends and decided to give this new place a try. If this place was as good as it promised to be, then they might have just found a nice little outing to go during lunch. Or maybe on Friday nights? If it had a bar, Friday nights…

That is, if they could ever make it there.

Christina was already regretting her decision to park so far away. But around the block was literally the closest any of them was going to get to Juan Gringo’s with a vehicle, given the concert in town. She had been forced to walk more today than she had in… God, months. And it was killing her.

She pulled one leg in front of the other in an uneasy swinging motion, her fat thighs too thick to allow any semblance of her once elegant gait. Her thighs touched all the way to her knees and, when in tandem with her drooping belly apron that obstructed the view of her feet and thensome, the act of physically lifting her legs was becoming more trouble than it was worth. She swung her arms to gain momentum while in motion, her elbows eclipsed by soft pudge that had built on her upper arms. Her giant belly bobbed lazily in front while her breasts followed suit, the exertion of heaving her enormity around making her entire face go flush with exertion.

She’d dressed in thin layers, her elephantine expanse was prone to overheating. That being said, here they are now…

“Oh my gaaaaaawd… it’s so hoooooooot…” she whined again, near tears, “When are we gonna get theeeeeeeere?!”

“Almost there, Christy…” Courtney said in front, leading their little gaggle, “Can’t you smell that?”

“I sooo can…” Christina bemoaned as her gut growled venomously at the heifer in front of her, “It’s driving me crazy… I’m so hungry…”

“Jeez, you baby, we heard you the first time.” Melissa, behind Courtney but in front of Christina, interjected, “Is this what it’s like to take me places? Because I don’t want to go anywhere with me anymore.”

The past few months had been more than kind to Christina. Jenna’s raise had afforded the former intern more than enough to allow a certain upgrade in her cost of living. Which, while potentially able to improve her life in other ways, basically went directly into Christina’s dietary habits. Affording her a similarly svelte wallet but a much more ample form…

When the three of them arrived at Juan Gringo’s…
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Crossing the Border

choices: Christina enjoys a week of all the Mexican food she can eat.
Victoria's gym membership runs out.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
“There’s the *huff* concert! It should *pant* right… here.” Courtney said. The blocked off street was pretty crowded with a large stage and several booths and street vendors in the middle of the road. Near the edge of the large crowd was Juan Gringo’s. The three hefty women waddled across the street to the restaurant, but stopped before entering. Right outside the place was a booth with Marni and Cass doing their show. A pretty small crowd gathered around the booth.

“Wait, let’s enter to win a prize from Cass and Marni.” Courtney said.

“Yeah, that could be fun.” Melissa said.

“Aw, you’ve gooot to be kiiidding me. If I don’t *wheeze* eat something now, *huff* I’m gonna eat both of you.” Christina whined. Her stomach whined too.

“Come on Christina it’ll be so quick.” Melissa said.

“Yeah, and who knows you might even win again!” Courtney said.

“That song was Camera Shy performed live by Athletes Foot right here on Main street. We’re about to go to break but don’t forget to stop by and enter a chance to win a week of free food from the brand new Juan Gringo’s all-you-can-eat Mexican restaurant! We’ll be giving that away to our lucky winner in the next hour or so…” Cass’s voice came through the loud speaker at the booth.

Christina paused for a bit. God she was so hungry, but a week of free meals from this place? Christina was hungry but she was also smart, and she knew the economic choice was to try to win. She hated making her empty belly wait but Christina knew the potential payoff was much more important.

“Fine let’s do it quickly.” Christina said. They waddled over to the booth. They were a little disappointed they couldn’t meet Cass or Marni as they just ended up talking to some producer who asked for their info. They then quickly walked into Juan Gringo’s.

“Let’s hope this place actually has good food now that we just signed up to potentially eat here for free.” Melissa said. They were seated in a (fortunately) large booth. Juan Gringo’s was a bit different than your conventional all you can eat joint. You could order food which would be brought to you from the kitchen by your waiter or you could got to the buffet where they had all kinds of Mexican food as well as a make your own tacos and burritos area.

Before Melissa and Courtney could even decide which option they wanted Christina was dashing over to the buffet area. She was in no mood to wait anymore.

Soon they all were gorging themselves with nachos, burritos, tacos, and anything else that could be filled with beans, rice, salsa, and meat. The three gluttonous friends didn’t say a word as they were so wrapped up in their greedy lust for filling their bellies.

Christina breathed a sigh of relief as she cleaned her fourth plate. Not only was it a relief to satisfy her suffering tummy, it was a relief that everything she ate was soooo good. The difficult journey from her car to Juan Gringo’s was definitely justified by the delicious platefuls of Mexican food.

Eventually their voracious devouring slowed a bit as their feast was coming to an end. Christina put down her plate and squeezed into the booth. Her heavy gut sat naked cause of her too small t shirt. Christina groaned at the discomfort of her belly. She leaned further back to give her tummy some more room in her lap. She rubbed the red mark on her skin where her jelly rolls had been pushing against the table. She purred with pleasure before remembering that there was still a plate in front of her waiting to be eaten. Reached past her enormous belly and plump breasts for the delectable food she had just retrieved. Since she was running out of room in her stomach, Christina figured it was time for dessert, thus she had piled a stack of churros onto her plate. She grabbed two or three in each hand and began to alternate bites from the two thickets of churros she held in her hands. Christina grinned with greed and pleasure.

“Alright we’re ready to announce the winner of a week of free food from the brand new Juan Gringo’s restaurant.” They all heard from the booth outside of the restaurant. The three bloated babes stopped eating as they listened closely for the winner of the prize.

“And the winner is… Christina White! Come over to the KISS 102.5 booth to pick up your prize…”

1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
“Alright we’re ready to announce the winner of a week of free food from the brand new Juan Gringo’s restaurant.” Alice’s surprisingly quick typing quieted against the keyboard, turning to her personal radio in anticipation of the announcement. She’d entered online about an hour ago, crossing her chubby fingers and toes that she might score that sweet all you can eat deal, “And the winner is… Christina White! Come over to the KISS 102.5 booth to pick up your prize!”

A crestfallen sigh escaped the swollen sweetheart as she slowly lolled back to work. She would have loved to be out with the girls, trying out Juan Gringo’s herself, but Jenna needed someone to stay over. And unfortunately for her, Alice had drawn the short lot. Christina was so lucky—Alice had been entering the KISS102.5 contests and daily giveaways since she’d started working at Gordge, and she’d never won anything. But Christie had entered twice, and both times she’d won some pretty awesome gifts!

Even still, there was always next week. They always had something to give away on that show, and as more and more restaurants picked them up as sponsors, the more delicious all those prizes were getting. Last week it was a free office party catered by their local Chic-fil-A, and the week before that it was a fifty dollar gift certificate to the Twin Dragon Chinese buffet. Alice was really holding out for another BOGO deal from Taperman’s Tailoring; the last few weeks had been pretty hard on her wallet and her waistline.

“Hff…hff…Big…deal…” a slow, husky drawl wheezed from somewhere else in the office, “Like I’d really…wanna eat all I could eat…at some…some Mexican restaurant. Do you know how many… how many carbs are…like, in a burrito?”

Victoria punctuated her opinion from her desk with a much needed slurp of her smoothie, her full lips wrapping around the bright green straw and sucking down the thick fruity mixture. She released with a huff, her arm falling uselessly back into place on her desk. Her other arm stretched to grab her protein bar, fresh from the “bulk-builders” section of the bar at Fit Life, and unwrapped it nimbly with deceptively sluggish fingers.

“Like I can’t even… imagine how many calories are in one of those… those things. Those things they serve.” Vicky puffed as she stuffed a good two-thirds’ of the bar into her mouth, “All the…bread and…and the cheese…mmm…and the sauce that’s on like… everything.” The secretary paused to slurp down another sip of smoothie, “All those…mm… those tacos and… and like the quesadillas… It’s all like soooo fattening.”

Alice inwardly mused at the hypocrisy of Victoria criticizing anyone’s dietary techniques, even if they were absent. For a while now it seemed everyone had been expanding just a bit quicker than usual, what with all this “who’s gonna get a premium membership” and all the discounts and coupons and stuff, but nobody seemed to have blown up quite like Victoria. For all her big talk about exercise and nutrition, Victoria was hardly in any position to judge anybody about their weight!

She was sitting in one of Jenna’s old reinforced chairs, her posterior and their boss’ were hardly shaping up to the same in size. She poured out of it at every angle, her mile-wide thighs pressed and bulged out of the holes created by the armrests. The thickness of her thighs forced her to sit stiff and rigid, and the severity with which her ass stuck out meant that she was more out of her chair than in it. Even still, the cartoonish proportion that her body had developed meant that there was a good few inches between her ample backfat and that actual back of the chair. She leaned back every now and then, but that cause a great strain on her back and the chair—the agonizing groans of Jenna’s old chair was a testament to just how bottom-heavy voracious Victoria was becoming.

Her face was unrecognizeable, having widened and softened with all the extra weight, and her bingo wings were swollen and obstructively flabby. Her fat breasts rested lazily atop her great swollen gut, which surged forward and pooled onto her fat lap. If she had more sitting room, Victoria would have spread her legs so as to allow more room to breathe for her belly, but as she sat now it was all but impossible to actually reach her workspace. She couldn’t even reach all the way around it now—yet somehow she found it perfectly acceptable to berate Christina for happening to win an all-she-could-eat fiesta at Juan Gringo’s.

“Like…Christie’s gonna get…soo…fat…” even her voice had changed, having slowed and deepened slightly as she’d gained, “She should really start…hitting the gym again.”

Even good-natured Alice couldn’t help but chuckle at the hypocrisy of it all.

“Oh stop, I’m sure Christie will behave herself.” Alice said in a motherly manner as she eased Vicky off of her friend, “And besides, I’m sure if we’re nice, she’ll let us all in on it.”

“Really?” Vicky puffed, “You think?”

“Well yeah, we’ll probably wind up going there every day next week.” Alice explained to the already salivating secretary, “They’re supposed to be a really good chain, I haven’t had any since I went on that business trip out west.”

“Mm…” Vicky purred thickly, Alice could practically see the reflection of all that delicious Mexican food in her glazed eyes from all the way over there, “I guess… so long as she… shares…”

***


Victoria huffed and puffed as she heaved herself into Fit Life gym, a few hours after she’d finally escaped her horrible office job. It was time for her afternoon workout, right after her post-power lunch afternoon snack. She gripped another protein bar in her hand and alternated between awkwardly waddling towards the door and taking large bites out of the poor granola-chocolate-peanut mix.

She was already beat from the modest walk from the car to the gym (with Premium Member parking, no less!) and couldn’t have looked any less like an athlete. She was dressed in an old tank top that hugged her every inch and roll while completely exposing her ample armfat to the world, and a pair of bright blue leggings that struggled to stretch over the supreme swollenness of her giant ass. Even her Yankee’s cap looked a little snug on her head, her fat cheeks bunching up in distaste as she lumbered towards the door. She had to lean forward when she walked now, or she would fall backwards onto her copious amounts of posterior plush—probably without even feeling a thing.

“Hff…hff…” she puffed as she tried to squeeze through the doorway, her ass fat catching on the cold metal frame and oozing back over it. She looked backwards, getting a clear look at the problem. She shimmied her hips in as seductive a manner as possible (for any hot guys who might be watching, natch.) but found that it didn’t so much free her so much as make her mad. She was still stuck! She raised her hands to either side of the doorway and pushed, popping right out.

“Easy…peasy…” she wheezed

Vicky lumbered down the hallway, giving curt hellos to the gymgoers out in the main workout area whom she’d become acquainted with during her patronage. Vicky tottered down the hallway, her big fat ass leaving almost no room for anyone to get by. She settled at the entrance to the Premium Member area, a sweating sputtering mess as she felt around for her platinum card.

Finding it, she whipped it out and swiped it down the scanner…

BOOP.

Vicky curled a nostril and tried it again. Boop. Boop. Boop. Boop. That wasn’t the sound it was supposed to make, was it? Obviously not or she’d be inside right now, getting her smoothie on.

“Hey, Marianne!” Vicky barked at a familiar blue polo’d woman who just so happened to be trying to squeeze past Vicky’s ample ass fat, “My card’s not working. It’s going ‘boop’. Do I need to get a new one or something? This thing’s pretty old.”

The attendant, Marianne, was more than ready to help. She smiled and took the card from Victoria and swiped the car herself—boop.

“Yeah, this just means that your Premium Membership has expired.” The shorter woman said with a saleswoman’s sympathy, “But if you want, I could always renew it for you? We’ve got a really good discount on return members.”

Expired?

It hadn’t been six months already, had it?

“Okay then I’ll renew it.” Vicky said resolutely, “How much is it a month?”

“Well, since you’re a returning member, you’re only going to have to put fifty dollars down this month. Now next month will cost the whole hundred dollars, but—“

“A hundred dollars a month?” Vicky asked, her second chin dropped, “I can’t afford that!”

“W-Well, I would really suggest that you look at our basic membership package then, Vicky. It’s only fifty a month, twenty five this month since you’re a returning member, and it comes with a discount at all the premium passes.” Marianne said with some trepidation, “But if you’re really looking to get back into shape, then—“

“Back into shape?” Vicky huffed, putting her hands on her hips and standing as defiantly as her great girth would allow, “What’s that supposed to mean?”

Marianne faltered, grimacing slightly in the line of sight of one of their biggest customers. Vicky was practically sumo-sized, and the wee little cardio-er knew that she wouldn’t stand a chance if this got physical.

“I-I suppose we could allow you just one more day. Just this one time.” Marianne said with an awkward smile, swiping her faculty card in the scanner, “Just, uh… have fun! And make sure not to tell my supervisor!”
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Victoria: Supersized and Sassy

1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Christina licked her lips as she stared into the cavernous mouth of the break room fridge, her soft stomach gurgling as her clingy blouse cradled it. Everyone always brought the best stuff; Alice and her takeout, Victoria with her mother’s home-made pasta dishes, even Courtney’s sandwiches looked professionally made and appetizing. Her own meal seemed meager in comparison, two microwavable Hungry Man dinner plates with a cupcake from the bakery down the street for dessert. Sure somebody always made a Quiznos run before lunch, and that usually helped fill her up, but it still didn’t seem very fair that she had to suffer like this. Just looking at all of this stuff was making her hungry…

One thick arm slowly breached the fridge, the icy mist that it created making goosebumps appear on the sausage-like appendage. Christina wiggled her fingers greedily as she traced over the surplus of food that sat before her, just waiting to be plucked like an overripe fruit. She toyed with the idea of taking one of Alice’s little fold up boxes of Chinese, but decided against it. Alice was always so sweet after all, it wouldn’t have been right. But Victoria had been awfully loud lately, and she wouldn’t shut up about that stupid contest she won last week. She’d probably be glad that Christina took away a few of those nasty old carbs, right? But that would have been hard to disguise—breaking the first layer of cheese and taking a huge chunk out of that sweet meaty mix would have probably just served to piss Victoria off, and there was no way that Christie could avoid getting caught red-handed this close to lunch.

She gripped her boxes in one hand tightly, biting her lower lip as she fought the urge to just take everything for herself. Her gut groaned at the sight of all this delicious food that teased her, her breathing shallow as she rest her hand on the first shelf in the fridge. There had to be something, just a little extra that nobody would miss?

Christie grunted thickly as she settled on taking one of Courtney’s sandwiches—it was her turn to make the Quiznos run anyway, it’s not like she’d catch her. Christie palmed the impressively large thing and ripped it from the expansive cold cavern, clutching it tightly to her fattened breast while she tossed one of her Hungry Man meals into one of the microwaves. She put in the time and collapsed onto one of the benches, unwrapping Courtney’s confection from its protective cellophane.

“Mmm!”

Christie moaned as she chewed—even cold, it was still probably one of the better sandwiches she’d eaten in a long time. A home-made chicken sandwich with tomato and mayonnaise on sourdough with lots of lettuce and some spices. The meat was still so juicy and the tomatoes so plump and watery that it dripped down Christie’s mouth and dribbled onto her breast. She took another big hungry bite, scarfing down her little stolen treat as quickly as she could.

“Hey Christie!” came a cheery voice, ripping Christie from her sandwich trance.

Shit, had the door opened? She’d hardly noticed!

“H-Hey Al!” Christie said shakily, holding her pilfered prize covetously into her bosom while she chewed, “You, uh… you ready for lunch?”

“I really am—it’s been such a long day.”

The swollen sweetheart puffed as she struggled to pull one thick leg in front of the other, her big belly bouncing as Alice fought against her own girth. She’d dressed in stretch-pants again, meaning that she was obviously overdue for a trip to the tailor. Her long white shirt, practically a tent with an off-white pattern sewn into it, looked snug against her copious upper half. It hugged her breasts tightly, with her impressive hooters very obviously (though, knowing Alice, very inadvertently) on display. Her stomach would force it up ever so often, meaning that Alice would have to struggle to reach past her own ampleness and pull it back down over the massive quivering swell of her stomach.

“Oh? Is that a sandwich?” Alice asked with her sugary-sweet good-natured concern, “That looks… really good, actually. Where’d you get it?”

None of your business.

“Oh, you know… out.” Christie smiled awkwardly as Alice tottered towards the fridge, “I was out and got it.”

“Oh.” Alice smiled, satisfied with Christie’s vagueness, “Then whose food is in the microwave?”

“Mine.” Christie answered through a bite of Courtney’s sandwich, “I, uh… I skipped breakfast.”

“Oh.” Alice’s answer was a little more put off this time, having distinctly remembered seeing Christie down at least two or three super donuts this morning, “Is that one, um… also yours?”

She pointed to the remaining Hungry Man meal that Christina had under her arm, nestled against her big belly. The bespectacled blonde glanced aside nervously, guilty conscience wracking her brain and making her unable to think clearly.

“I missed dinner last night.” She said almost proudly before taking another big bite, “Sho yah.”

“But we went ou—“

Christina heard the door open this time, its hinges worn after so many years of constant use and abuse courtesy of the hungry gals that roamed the office. But she wouldn’t have had to, considering that Melissa tended to make her entrance known. For as big in the belly as she had gotten, Melissa was easily as big in the mouth. She practically burst through the breakroom door, her flair for the dramatic easily getting the best of her.

“Phew! Jesus Christ I thought lunch would never get here.” She announced, waddling in belly-first with her arms swinging merrily.

Melissa was not untouched by the weight gain that had affected her co-workers, having put some significant poundage in the past few months especially. Her stomach was hit hard, hanging lower towards her knees as her multiply-rolled middle gained depth and width with every passing meal. It practically swung from side to side when she walked, her jowls jiggling in unison with her every step as the cubicles shook before her mighty mass. A few more meals, Christie reckoned as she munched nervously on Courtney’s sandwich, and Melissa wouldn’t be able to reach around it anymore.

“There you are!” Alice said in a motherly tone as Melissa plopped her expansive ass down on the seat of the table opposite Christie’s, causing the poor thing to groan, “I thought you said you were just going to the bathroom—that was twenty minutes ago!”

Alice bobbled towards the table that Melissa had claimed for them, two bags of takeout in hand as she lumbered over. She placed them both down on the table, Melissa eagerly leaning into her belly to rake one in for herself, and slowly lowered her heft down. Alice had gotten pretty big lately, and nobody knew it better than she did. She was often careful, and tended not to just throw her weight around. But with the way that bench bent beneath her, Alice’s bulk was just getting more and more destructive by the day.

“I figured I’d order lunch after I got done.” Melissa eagerly ripped open a box of fried rice, pausing only to match Alice’s stink eye, “What? I ordered you one too!”

Christina mostly ignored this, choosing to stuff as much of her snack into her mouth as possible. It was so good. Seriously, why hadn’t she done this before? The chicken had to be home-made, there was no way this was store-bought.

“What smells good?” Melissa asked, taking a few sniffs, “Mm… Hungry Man? Chicken tenders, mashed potatoes aaand… a brownie? I think?”

“Yeah, how’d you know?” Alice asked, impressed

“I can see it on the box.” Melissa stuck out her tongue at her gullible glutton of a friend, “Seriously Al. Hey Christie, you gonna share one of those with your best pal Melissa?”

Christie looked over, looking like a deer caught in headlights—still chewing fiercely on her chicken cud.

“What? Oh, no. These are, uh… these are mine.” She said hastily, “But, uh… you can have the brownie if you want. They never come out right.”

“They do if you cook ‘em right.” Melissa grunted as she heaved herself up at the sound of the microwave timer, her big belly bunching up against the bench as she ho’d, “You can’t just put it in there with the rest of the tray, you’ve got to take it out and cook it separate.”

Melissa’s great gut brushed against Christina’s ample back fat as the larger brunette turned into the alley created by the table and counter, squeezing herself into the small space as her belly oozed onto the countertop and her big fat butt bumped against Christina’s head. She got the tray out and placed it on the counter, grabbed a knife and fork, and cut out the brownie before leaving Christina with the rest.

“Want me to nuke the other one for ya?” Melissa asked with a surprising lack of judgment, “It’s okay, I’ve had two-tray days. I get it.”

“Oh sure, yeah that’d be great.” Christina leaned, trading tray for tray as Melissa popped in the other one, “Thanks.”

Melissa struggled to turn around, her rolling love handle pushing into Christina’s side as she waddled out of the cranny she’d nestled into, her belly flopping back down once it was free of the counterspace. She popped the meager brownie into her mouth and chewed, her double chin pressing against her breast. She then proceeded to collide against Alice’s ample girth, Melissa’s middle forcing Alice’s arm forward a little too far, knocking her bite of fried rice and hibachi chicken onto the table.

“Hey!”

“Sorry Al.” Melissa grunted through brownie, “Gettin’ kinda tight in here, huh?”

1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Alice nodded affirmatively while Christie simply grunted in response. She was almost done with her little meal now, good timing considering she had her actual lunch to get to before Courtney showed up. She was torn between picking up the pace and disposing of the evidence and taking her time to savor the flavor—what in the world was in this thing?

“Hey… yeah, I’m about to go on lunch. Call you back.” Another voice puffed as Victoria squeezed her way through the door, her zaftig thighs forcing her to totter in sideways so her enormous hips and fat ass didn’t get stuck, “Ohmigawd yes I’m gonna call you back. Jeez.”

Vicky’s incredible ass was visible from any angle, even looking directly in front of her. Her hips had gone from ample to monstrous, with her thighs swelling out and over her knees. In front of her, Vicky’s titanic tummy rolled into three distinct sections of pure overindulgence, pouring out of her blouse and slapping against her overtaxed leggings. She sauntered through the little aisle left between all the tables, wisely choosing to avoid Alice’s road-block bulkiness but in the process her immense Italian ass made room for itself on Christie’s table by knocking over the fully-cooked tray. Luckily the cellophane wrapping was mostly still on it, but the corn couldn’t be saved—it wound up all over the breakroom floor.

“Vicky!” Christina cowed, “That was my lunch!”

“Ugh, like soree.” she huffed, reaching into the fridge and forcing her ass into Alice’s personal bubble while she pawed at her lasagna, “It was like, really close to the edge. Just… pick it up or something. It’ll be fine.”

Christie huffed, putting her sandwich down on the table as she hoisted her bigness up from the bench. She leaned over to pick up what remained of her second course, but when she reeled herself back up, she found herself head-first in Vicky’s underbutt, causing both women to let out sharp cries of confusion.

“Ooh!” Vicky squeaked as she pressed herself against the wall, thankfully giving Alice another inch or so of elbow room, “Jesus Christie!”

“You’re the one who knocked over my lunch, Vic.” Christie said exasperatedly, coming up red-faced from exhaustion at the simple act of bending over, “Try to control that tank ass of yours.”

“Ugh!”

Vicky waited as patiently as possible for Christie to sit back down before she wriggled her way into what little room there was between the counter and Christie’s table. The cabinets were just above there, and held little condiments and stuff that everyone used. Vicky leaned into the counter, covering a good half of it with her fatness in her hopes of reaching the top shelf. She rocked backwards into the back of Christie’s head, making pathetic little grunts of exertion at every attempt—giving Christie whiplash as she slowly fought against being wedged into Vicky’s titanic crack.

“Do you need some help?” Christie finally asked, scooting away from the super-sized secretary’s carnivorous ass, “What are you trying to reach up there anyway?”

“My… protein bars…” Vicky huffed, all red-faced and sweaty, “I keep them… up there… so no one will… steal them…”

“How do you put them up there?” Melissa asked wryly as she observed the situation, “You can’t even reach without sitting on Christie’s head—why don’t you just keep them on a lower shelf?”

“Shu… Shut up.” Vicky huffed as she side-waddled back into Alice’s personal space so Christie could reach the box of protein bars, “Thanks Chris…”

The box wasn’t in her hands a second before one of Vicky’s chubby fists plunged into it, stretching out the cardboard as Vicky’s chubby ball of a fist emerged with two of the filling things. She immediately unwrapped one of them and pressed it past her lips.

“Tell me you’re not going to eat all of those…again.” Alice warned while staring Vicky’s right butt cheek in the side, “You’ve got a whole pan of lasagna to go through.”

“It’s called… carboloading… gawd.”

Vicky puffed as she choked down the remaining portion and started on her second, wriggling her way through the lacking aislespace. Christie and Alice instinctively removed their lunches from ass-length as Vicky’s ponderous posterior poured onto the tables. That ass was getting to be far too much to handle. She collapsed on a microwave-facing bench, much to the reinforced thing’s dismay as it hollered in agony, still munching on a protein bar.

Christie rolled her eyes and returned to her sandwich—the last section of her sandwich to be precise. Even with all the distractions, this had absolutely been the best thing about today. She had to get this recipe from Courtney—was there a way to do that without incriminating herself? Probably not. But then again, it’d probably be easier than stealing one of her subs every day.

The microwave beeped shrilly, ten minutes later, as Vicky’s pasta bubbled to a searing perfection of molten marinara. A whiny, entitled huff became the big-bottomed beluga as she attempted to hoist her fat ass off the table. Alice, in her sweetness, saw fit to turn at the sake of her own meal and remove the pan for Vicky, a certain understanding between them forged due to their similar limited mobilities. It was passed from Alice to Melissa, Melissa to Christie, and then from Christie to Vicky.

“Mmm…gimme…” Vicky burbled through the hints of chocolate that remained on her lips, taking the piping hot pasta toward her without a second thought.

The door opened yet again to reveal Courtney, an armful of subs held tightly against her tonnage—

“Hey ladies, I’m back!” she announced happily, “Should I try and find a space or, uh…Christie, did you eat my sandwich?"
