1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Christina had been having a wonderful week. She had been eating with no sense of restraint lately and a week of free all-you-can-eat Mexican food only heightened her level of gluttony.

She had gone to Juan Gringo’s Mexican Restaurant every day this week. She had even managed to go two times on a couple days, once with her office friends after work and then a second time for dinner. On Friday Jenna was nice enough to extend everyone’s lunch break so Christina could take them all there for lunch.

Friday night she got home late from another large Mexican dinner. She closed the door of her apartment, huffing and puffing from having to take the stairs to the third floor. She hung up her coat and dropped a greasy bag of fast food on the kitchen counter. Christy had stopped at the drive thru on the way home. She wasn’t sure if she’d eat it tonight given all the food currently in her stomach, but maybe she’d want a late-night snack later. Even if she didn’t eat it tonight she’d save it for another day. Christina loved having extra food in her fridge that she could just pop in the microwave and eat. She had an ample supply of Chinese food and pizza that she would snack on throughout the day and at night. Christina had gotten used to having something tasty and delicious in her mouth at all times. For most of the time Christina spent in her apartment she usually had a box of fried rice or a bag of leftover fries or a bowl of buttery popcorn in her hand.

Perhaps not tonight though because she was so incredibly full. One benefit to going out to eat with Courtney and Victoria was they almost never stopped talking. There was hardly a moment where one of them wasn’t gabbing about something, allowing Christina to sit back and listen and, most importantly, focus on the food in front of her.

The bloated blonde made several groans and grunts as she waddled into her bedroom. She had to get out of these clothes. Christina was wearing a navy blue V-neck sweater and some very tight jeans. She fiddled with her belt which was constricting around her squishy waistline. Since her bulging boobs blocked her view, she walked over to her mirror so she could see what she was doing. Christina let out a “hrrrk!” as she pulled and undid the belt. She let out a sigh as the pressure around her blubbery midriff was released. The button on these jeans had popped off just last Wednesday so her belly was allowed to bulge out. The pressure of her big paunch forced the zipper all the way down and caused her sweater to ride up several inches. Christina’s overfed gut was finally free.

Looking in the mirror she noticed the pinkish red mark going all the way around her doughy middle. It was probably time to poke a new hole in her belt, but she wasn’t in the mood to do that now.

Next she took off her sweater and under shirt. She struggled to pull the stretched sweater out of her big flabby arms. Christina hadn’t really noticed how thick her arms were getting. She examined the hanging blob of fat on her left bicep before throwing her clothes in the hamper.

Left in just her underwear, she began to remove her bra. Undoing the clasp behind her back she let out a deep breath as her plump breasts were freed. As her boobs grew bigger and heavier with fat, the more and more she looked forward to removing her bra at the end of the day. Her breasts had filled out a lot as she put on more weight. They still managed to look relatively perky as they rested slightly on the top of her growing belly.

Christina through the bra aside and took some clothes out of her dresser. A comfy pair of pajama pants slid nicely over her thick fleshed out legs. The stretchy waistband did a nice job handling her round swollen butt. She tucked the pants under her hanging gut for comfort.

Next was a thin white tank top that she pulled it over her bulging bare breasts. When she yanked it over her belly, Christina found it to be quite tight. The whit top had barely made it down to her belly button. She pulled it as far past her heft as she could. You could partially see her stomach fat as the cotton fibers struggled to stretch over her pillowy flesh.

As she walked out of her bedroom Christina could feel the tank top rising up, letting all of her belly hang out.

“Oh screw it.” Christina said, as her hands instinctively went to rub her exposed flabbiness.

She went over to the bag of fast food she had brought back. The burgers and fries were still nice and warm. With her ballooning belly no longer constricted by pants or a belt, Christina felt like she had some room for more. Bringing the bag over to the sofa she let out a grunt as she lowered herself down. The couch seemed to groan in response. With one hand submerged in the greasy bag of food and the other pulling the remote out from under her big soft rump, she put on a rerun of the Simpsons that she had recorded.

After the burger and fries were consumed and several episodes were watched, Christina let out a long yawn.

“I think it’s about bed time.” She said in a sleepy voice. But with all the food in her gut she stayed firmly on the sofa and within minutes she was fast asleep with her salty fingers clutching her swollen belly.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: A Big Bulging Belly

choices: Courtney?
Alice?
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Holding meetings at the Gordge office building was beginning to become something of an issue. Despite several renovations over the part of the past three years, and a major overhaul once Jenna took over as branch manager some years before that, it was becoming painfully clear that there just wasn’t a way to rally several incredibly obese office women and squeeze them into that tiny meeting room. They’d tried it just last month to do the quarterly review, and the results were disastrous. Everyone was cramped, there weren’t enough chairs for everyone to sit down in and almost none of them were wide enough for them to use, it got really hot and muggy, and everyone tried to peel out of the room at once—meaning that Victoria got wedged in the doorway with some of Alice’s belly and her left boob.

Since then there had been some talk about another renovation, but in the meantime they’d been using the office floor as their makeshift meeting room. Jenna would announce that there would be a meeting over the loudspeaker and then she’d call everyone’s attention to herself once she managed to trudge her way out of her private office.

She had become a painfully large woman after working in such a sedentary job for so many years, no doubt combined with her natural penchant for overeating and underexerting herself. While several of the women working under her were explicitly obese—Alice and Courtney were getting to the point where they couldn’t ride the elevator together—Jenna had steadily remained the biggest, fattest woman in the office.

“Attention everyone, please?” Jenna’s deep though distinctively feminine voice soared over everyone’s cubicles, “Just a quick little meeting and then everyone can get back to work.”

Christina pushed back, rolling herself out from her desk and turning the swivel chair outwards. Her stomach rested gingerly on the seat of the chair between her legs, separated in the spacious cavern created in its accommodating design. Around her, Christina’s coworkers did the same with varying degrees of difficulty as the office purred with the various fatty grunts of exertion.

“I know, I know, but it’s important.” Jenna mistook the chorus of groans as begrudging her for calling them to attention on a Friday (which, granted, some of them might have been)

Jenna had put on a distinct amount of weight since Christina had arrived, which was really saying something. She had not been exempt from the steady gain that gripped almost everyone in the office, having put on at least another hundred or so pounds in the few years that Christina had been working for her. Her great stomach swelled outwards past arms’ length and dipped down to her knees, making any trip an impossibly difficult trek for the big beautiful branch manager. Her breasts, enormous mounds of soft womanly flesh, always looked ready to pop right out of any of her custom-fit business suits (Christina had often hypothesized that this was intentional). Her face, doughy and round and chinned three times over, was framed by her stylish brown bangs—an attempt at making her puffy cheeks seem less so that failed miserably—and her hair was often pulled up into an updo to reduce heat on her back neck-roll.

“Hey, yeah. Right here.” Jenna waved a heavy arm that swung with flabbiness, “Just… phew…”

She lowered her enormity onto Victoria’s desk, causing it to creak ominously despite its solid construction. By the time she was confident that she had everyone’s attention, Jenna had completely lost her breath. Standing at her size, as well as the arduous trip from her office all the way out here, was exhausting. So she continued while sitting on Victoria’s desk—which worked out great for Victoria, considering that meant she didn’t have to listen since Jenna wouldn’t see her on her phone.

“I’ve…phew… I’ve been branch manager at Gordge for a long… long time.” Jenna said resolutely as she folded her hands on top of her gut, “And in that time I’ve seen it grow and prosper and… pretty much just kick ass until we became the most profitable branch in the country. When I started here… Gordge South was the… the top dog. But thanks to all our hard work, it’s us. We’re awesome. You’re awesome and while I’m… really sorry to say this, I’m leaving.”

There was a slight rabble, causing Jenna to raise her chubby hands in a call for pause

“I’m not leaving the company. You’ll probably still see me every now and then. I’ve been promoted to corporate, which is… well it’s a huge honor for me. I’ll be staying until the end of next week, but after that I’ll be packing up and I’ll be out of here. I didn’t tell anyone because… well, let’s be honest here, this is just really painful for me. I’ve really come to… really love all you guys and I’ll always miss being your boss. And Carrie’s homemade brownies.”

A chuckle from the crowd.

“We’ve still got a whole week for goodbyes, but I just wanted to wish everyone good luck. I thought I’d take this time to announce my departure, but also to announce who’s gonna get the Big Girl chair and a private office once I’m out of here. Would you please step up here—
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Office Crowding

choices: Courtney's first week as the new boss
With Jenna gone the search begins for a new hire
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
The women of the office clapped and congratulated their coworker as Courtney started to lift herself from her seat. The obese office veteran got about four inches off of her chair before immediately falling back on the strained seat. Once again she lifted herself up, her flabby arms wobbling as they pushed down on the bending armrests. There was a short hesitation until, with a final grunt she stood upright. The clapping had died down but started up again as Courtney maneuvered her obese bulk through the cubicles, up to where Jenna was sitting. She was a little out of breath when she reached Vicky’s desk.

“Thank…*huff* Sorry… Thank you so much guys. I’m very excited to be taking over for Jenna, though we’ll all be sad to see her go.” As Courtney said this she gave Jenna big hug. Given how incredibly fat the two women had become, it was literally about the biggest hug you could possibly imagine. There was a chorus of aww from the small crowd.

“Oh it’s really not that big of a deal, gals. I’ll be the new assistant regional supervisor for the east coast. It’ll be my job to come visit the branch twice a year.” Jenna said. Though it was a little hard to believe, with her enormous body that just kept growing fatter, that she’d be willing to take yearly business trips for much longer.


“Yeah in a way you’re actually still my boss.” Courtney said with a giggle. “Anyway, for next week Jenna and I will basically be your co-bosses. Jen will technically be in charge but I’ll start to shoulder some of the load since she’s gonna be really busy and I could use this time to ease into the job… As for what to expect from me as your boss, Jenna’s been a great example for me the past however many years it’s been. You guys are incredibly productive and put up great numbers for the company, so I won’t try to fix anything about that. One thing I would like to do as manager is make it a little more comfortable around here for all of us.” This was met with a few hoots and hollers of approval. “I’ve got some idea’s but for now I think we all just want to give Jenna a good send off. We need to organize a party next week.”

Jenna’s last week at the office went well. On Thursday everyone brought her gifts for being such a good boss and they had a party after lunch with three different cakes (since Jenna couldn’t decide on what her favorite cake was).On Friday they said goodbye and they all gave her big long hugs, there were even a few tears shed.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Saying Goodbye

choices: Courtney's ideas are great—but they're making everyone bigger &lazier than ever!
Courtney introduces another change to the office
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
It didn’t take long for Courtney to implement some much-needed changes around the office. After Jenna’s announcement of her departure Courtney quickly had a suggestion box installed outside the break room with a little notepad and a pen nearby, encouraging her soon-to-be subordinates to scribble out some ways that they felt the office could be improved. Nobody really took that kind of thing seriously—they’d had a suggestion box before, and nothing ever got done—and it was mostly just forgotten about.

But when the construction crew arrived, everyone changed their tune quickly.

Everyone was kicked out of the break room for a week, unable to do so much as look in the doorway. They were forced to suffer through long hours of noisy construction, stay cramped up in their cubicles, and were blocked off from the coffee machine, refrigerator, and the communal vending machine. Everyone had to go out for lunch every day for a week—leading to lots of empty wallets. Courtney assured everyone that the renovations would be worth it, and even rewarded their patience by caving into the high demand for a second lunch break.

Finally, just when it was about to become to much, the construction suddenly stopped. They had all left at five ‘o’ clock the day before and came back to a quiet workspace for what seemed like the first time in forever. There were no big burly men swinging construction supplies around, no hard rock radio drowning out their Cass and Marni, there wasn’t so much as a waft of beer burp to darken their morning. Instead, it was quiet—almost eerily so.

“Hrm.” Christina crinkled her brow curiously as she waddled through the front door, lumbering down the hall towards the break room, “That’s weird…”

Nobody was there! Every day for the last week it seemed like there was at least one big sweaty guy clogging up the hallway and giving her an eyeball over, but now only emptiness. In fact, the only proof that those guys had been there at all was the significantly wider door—painted to resemble its predecessor, though the little window that saw inside had been removed.

Christina looked around anxiously. Was anybody else here? Was her ordeal finally over? Could she use the break room again? The overfed office girl outstretched a plump sausage-y arm and twisted the doorhandle, wincing at the loudness of the new tumbler and hinges. Surely nobody would care if she took a little sneak peek, right? How much farther could the crew have to go before they were done anyway? It was just her getting accustomed to where she—and the other ladies, of course!—were going to be spending their lunches, nothing more nothing less. It wasn’t like she was being… sneaky, or anything right?

Closing her eyes, Christina pushed the door inward and took a step inside. She fumbled around the wall for the familiar lightswitch. Instead of the peg-like switch she’d grown accustomed to, Christina found a little shape on the wall. She slowly slid it upwards, the lights growing brighter the further she pushed it up—a dimmer switch! That was sorta cool, she guessed.

However once fully illuminated (to a level which Christie found comfortable of course) the true nature of the wondrous renovations were made known. The entire room had doubled in size somehow, with the familiar tables being spread around more comfortably instead of pressed tightly against the wall. The walls had been repainted to a more modern two-tone blue design and the floor hand been retiled in a sleek black and white, the cabinets and counters having been redone in a similarly modern style. The vending machine had been coupled with a sister vendor, alike in every way except in that Christina could tell that the duller one was the original.

Christina took another step inside, looking around in wonder at the completely changed room. It felt… warmer, somehow. Wait, there was an air vent in there—Courtney had an AC unit installed, and it was running heat full blast! Christina couldn’t help but smile as she gleefully took off her coat, resting it on a new coatrack. She waddled over to the counters to find three microwaves instead of their usual two, with two sister Starbucks coffee machines sitting side by side ready for use! Were those—no, they couldn’t have been. Courtney hadn’t possibly gotten them—

“You like the blenders?” a surly tone took Christina by surprise, “Were you the one who asked for those, or was that Vicky?”

Christina whipped around much quicker than a girl of her size should have been able to, an action that caused her stomach to sway destructively over to the far left side. Her heart jumped out of her chest as her breathing took a sudden spike.

“Courtney!” she called out a little louder than she would have liked, “Oh my God, you scared me!”

Their new Branch Manager had taken to her position very kindly. While Courtney never had any problems keeping herself clothed professionally beforehand, since her promotion she had been indulging a bit in her outfits. A tailor-made business suit that could have easily been tailor-made for a hippopotamus was draped neatly over her great expanse; her blimpy body colored black with little pink pinstripes running up and down her vicious curves. A pink blouse collar popped out of the jacket, the sleeves visible as Courtney’s bingo wings stretched its arms to the point of distortion. Her smile swam in a sea of her second chin as she tottered forward, her heavy footsteps much louder than Christina’s.

“Well serves you right for spoiling the surprise.” Courtney joked, “What do you think? Do you like it?”

“It’s… it’s great!” Christie said emphatically, “How… how did you make it so big in here?!”

“Well I just asked the crew to knock out a wall. We stopped using that old meeting room once Jenna took over, so it was just kinda there and we just kinda needed the space.” Courtney said nonchalantly, leaning on a nearby table to support her supreme heaviness, “Seriously, I’ve been working here for years and I finally just got sick and tired of not being able to move in this freakin’ room.”

Christina watched as Courtney’s great gut heaved up and down with her labored breath. She was getting out of breath from the sheer labor of just standing—Christina was surprised something like this hadn’t happened sooner, given how long Courtney had been so big…

“Well it looks great, really.” Christie said excitedly, “Where’d you get the money for all this?”

“Jenna put a little aside before she left, and I just kinda… found the rest of it, if you can believe that.” Courtney said with a shrug of her meaty shoulders, sending her massive mams up and down with them, “I've got a lot more ideas that I'd like to try out; finding some time for a few more breaks for you guys, mini-fridges in your cubicles, all kinds of stuff. But for now I figured, hey, why not start off me being the boss on my best leg, right?”

“I’ll say.” Christina said with one last cursory glance of the break room, “So can I…um…”

“Get some coffee?” Courtney said with a smile as she waddled forward, “Sure you can. Just… um… help me take off my jacket first?”
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Break Room Business

choices: Courtney's ideas have everyone packing on the pounds
The next Sunday they go to the grocery store.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
The new break room was a huge hit. The ladies of the office raved about it for two whole weeks, basking in the extra space, newer appliances, and better seating. Courtney didn’t stop there with implementing her ideas for improving the office.

She convinced everyone to stay at the office an extra half hour everyday by giving them two rest breaks and two lunches.

Courtney had an amazing knack for accounting and managing a budget. She had managed to find enough money to get mini-fridges for everyone’s cubicle as well as order new comfier chairs for their desks.

One day Victoria glanced at the clock and saw that it was time for the first break of the day. There was a chorus of groaning chairs, feminine grunts of exertion, and straining and stretching fabric as everyone headed for the breakroom.

Vicky let out a sigh. Her new office chair felt so big and comfortable under her sprawling flabby butt that she almost didn’t want to leave it. Plus with her minifridge stocked with chocolate protein shakes she wouldn’t have to worry about keeping her gluttonous belly full.

“Oh my god, these pumpkin frosting doughnuts are awesome!” Vicky heard coming from the open door to the break room. The mention of pumpkin spice doughnuts made her mouth water. The smell of the warm fresh pastries reached her nose and Vicky perked up in her chair. The pleasing thought of eating the delicious, sweet, seasonally flavored treat captured her attention like a worm on a hook would to a fish. She rolled her seat away from her desk and leaned forward with her hands on the armrests. Her blubbery belly rolls bulged forward as they were squeezed against her lap. She tried to keep her back straight and stuck her butt out so she could get the proper leverage needed to lift her 400+ pounds of poorly conditioned flab.

“Hrr…” Vicky grunted as she slowly lifted out of her seat. The stitching of her skirt audibly stretched and partially ripped as it struggled to contain the massive girth of her globular overfed cheeks. The butterball secretary let out a big exhale as she finally stood on her feet. Although her new chair didn’t grip around her wide pillowy hips like her old ones had, the task of getting off of her seat and overcoming the gravity of her obese bulk was still a pain in her enormous bottom. However, as much as she’d prefer to stay in her seat until the end of the day, the thought of delicious doughnuts kept Vicky moving. She entered the breakroom and was happy to see that there were still plenty of doughnuts left. Whoever picked them up this morning had ordered an extra box apparently.

“Oh, hey Vicky. What’s uh” Alice stopped midsentence and retracted her hand from the pastry box as Victoria’s plump hands dove in the way to grab three doughnuts, one of which was quickly devoured by the young and hefty Italian girl. She closed her eyes and shuddered slightly at the heavenly flavor of the tasty confection.

The break room was buzzing with enormous gluttonous women chewing and chatting. The only person in the office not there was Courtney who just happened to waddle through the widened doors at that time.

“*pant* Attention!... Whew *huff*, everyone listen up! Mute the radio please.” Courtney said, using one hand to lean her heavily overfed frame against the kitchen counter. “Okay this’ll just take a second. So I know you gals have been working you’re little buns off since I took over for Jenna. All of you have been kicking butt this week, and I feel very proud to be your boss. Anyway recently I found the time to do a little organizing of the budget and managed to free up some money. Since everyone here has been doing such good work, I figured the office deserved a reward for it. So what I decided to do with this chunk of the budget that’s opened up is set it aside for a weekly shopping trip to keep this kitchen stocked with all the goodies we’d like to munch on during the breaks and at lunch.” There was a small round of applause from the employees. “So I just posted a piece of paper to the bulletin board that’ll be our shopping list and everyone is free to write what they’d like to have in here. Then on Sunday a couple of you can come with me to whatever grocery store is closest to get everything and bring it back here. That’s all I have to say, everyone can go back to what they… Are those pumpkin doughnuts?”
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Mmm... Doughnuts

choices: Word character limit, yo.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Over the next few months, Courtney’s itinerary for improving the office finally came full circle. In time she had managed to almost completely remodel the Gordge building to suit her tastes, taking great measure to ensure that her employees were getting exactly what they wanted. Jenna may have been the most benevolent boss anyone could have asked for, but Courtney had a certain way of getting things done. She was an ambitious go-getter, even this late in the game, who had more or less been watching Jenna do her job for years now. The main difference between the two was follow-through—Courtney had the drive and corporate know-how to get things done, whereas Jenna was more or less content her (admittedly positive) results. Sales improved, customer feedback improved, and thus so did their funding.

With that money, funneled by her impressive head for business into investments and partnerships with local businesses, their branch’s budget was becoming as grossly overfed as its employees. In that time, Courtney made sure to implement as many of her ideas as she could with the money that was left over; the break room was rewired with new speakers for the radio, the snacks in the vending machine switched to name brands, she remodeled everyone’s cubicles and put minifridges in them! Morale was so high around the office that she had somehow managed to trade everyone staying an extra thirty minutes each day for an extra lunch break and extending their fifteens to thirties! Their local partners in the community were getting rich, the office girls were all happy as clams, and frankly the CEOs were left scratching their heads as to why they hadn’t put Courtney in charge in the first place.

Of course all these perks came with the downside of dependency and complacency. Despite how happy everyone was, the suggestion box was usually overflowing with further suggestions on improving the office. The office chairs were considered so “flimsy” by many of the local Gordge employees that Courtney had finally broken down and begun ordering exclusively from the company that made her own chair, replacing everyone’s one day without warning. Doorway widening was becoming less of a kindness to the heavier-set folk and more and more of a necessity. Replacing the (brand new!) fridge in the break room with something a little bigger wasn’t exactly the optimum way to spend their resources, and even Courtney was sure that what food they bought specifically to keep in the break room should have lasted longer than a few days considering she’d bumped up the budget—twice!

But even still, Corporate couldn’t have cared less. It seemed the better she did, the more money she got thrown at her for her to do what she pleased with. Sure everyone may have been abusing the system a little bit with all these nifty perks—but who could blame them?
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Corpulent Company

choices: So hey, Alice has been going a little nuts lately.
For the past few months Melissa's barely even MOVED.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
“So tell me I’m not the only one who thinks that those M&M commercials are disturbing—the one where the red one is, like, being shoved into a freaking oven so those women could eat him?” a surly tone sung from the P.A. system in the break room, “I mean, yeah it’s funny, but there’s a little part of me that’s like ‘No, get out of there! Call the police!’”

“I dunno, Cass. Those commercials always made me…hmmm…” a deeper, though distinctively feminine tone took over, “Always made me kinda hungry.”

“What? You’re terrible!” Cass laughed, “They’re shoving him in the oven and they’re going to eat him! How can that make you hungry?!”

“Mm… I’d prob’ly be the one shoving him in the oven.” Marni laughed, her high-pitched giggling having fully transformed into a husky chortle, “I am not even playing. I would eat that little guy like he was going out of style.”

“Of course you would… you’d probably go after the big yellow one next, right?”

“Mm… you betcha!”

One could practically hear Cass roll her eyes, “What about you guys? Would you cook the little M&M guy or join the sane side and let him live? Give us a call at—“

The break room was the biggest hit out of Courtney’s many “improvements” on office life. It was chock-full of anything and everything that the gluttonous Gordge employees could ever want. Two vending machines, a phone charging station, a fridge filled with yummy treats packed to the brim with various foods and lunches. The tables had been replaced with much more sturdy and dependable ones that were promised to be able to handle any abuse given to them. Each of the three microwaves were whirring, a veritable harmony of hoggish delight as three identical meals circled slowly in unison.

A big fat ass painted floral by a stretchy spandex-polyester dress shimmied anxiously as its weight shifted from one foot to the next. The black panties beneath it were practically etched into the design, the great girth of each cheek stretched the garment to a stubborn thinness. Two and a half feet of heavy hips drew the fabric tight over a massive ass, while a pudgy avalanche of belly struggled to win for the other side. Each fold was outlined, the three distinct rolls that made up each segment of stomach perfectly traced and drawn by the clingy dress—the floral blobbiness oozing onto the countertop. She outstretched one thick arm, her flabby arm wing sinking slightly as she searched the cabinet for one of those clear plastic cups.

“Ngh!”

Christina White grunted as she fought against her own girth, weighed down and obstructed by her extreme thickness. Her spare tire rested uselessly on the countertop while her lowermost belly roll pressed uncomfortably against the wooden door. Her chubby fingers felt the thin plastic of the starbucks cup—she lurched forward and grabbed at the stack before recoiling back down, cups in hand. The overfed office drone smirked self-satisfactorily at the stack, grabbing one off the top before placing the rest of them down on the counter.

As she waddled over to the coffee machine, Christina’s great gut bobbed a good foot in front of her. It entered any room well before she did, and warped the flowers on her dress beyond recognition. Her mammoth mams spilled over the lip of both her bra and her dress—she was practically popping right out of the thing. However she seemed to pay no mind; she had on a happy little smile as her chubby cheeks dimpled and her double chin bunched up.

Everything in the microwave wasn’t hers—just the one on the right. Leftovers from last night’s Chinese binge with Alice and Melissa sizzling and popping in the Styrofoam container. It would make for a good lunch after the Jimmy Johns guy got here with her sandwiches, and a great lunch if there were any of those fudgesicles left in the freezer…

Christina stretched out her hand to rub her belly, which purred hungrily in response to all these mental images. The big blonde sighed thickly as she waited as patiently as she could, biting into the cupcake she’d bought from the snack machine to tide her over.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Christina's Battle of the Breakroom Bulge

choices: Vicky gets some troubling news! Also, she's really friggin fat!
Courtney hasn't escaped her "improvements" either—she's the worst of all!
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
“—I’m gonna be real right now, I had such a crush on the red M&M when I was a kid. I had this little stuffed one that I would kiss every night and snuggle with…” Cass was absolutely hysterical, her laughter was actually interfering with the feed on her mic, “I don’t know why—I wouldn’t even eat the red M&M’s out of the packaging… I was a weird kid, okay?!”

“Oh my god that’s precious.” Marni’s deep laughter slowly faded, “I’ve known you for… years and I have NEVER in my life EVER heard this story!”

Alice bit deeply into the jelly donut, little orange-yellow goo popping out of the glazed confection and dribbling down onto her white cotton blouse. It dotted the corners of her mouth, getting nestled into the little nicks on her chipmunk cheeks. A few crumbles followed suit, bouncing down and settling on her vast cleavage. The pale fleshy melons pooled to either side of her enormous gut as it hung from her office chair, each arm loaded with a donut for her to shove down her throat.

“Jeez Al, you can slow down a little.” Melissa (believe it or not) chastised her friend, “Lunch is in, like, two-point-five seconds.”

“Mrm.”

For a while now, it was becoming increasingly clear that Alice’s weight was beginning to get out of hand. For years, Melissa had relied on her level-headed friend to reel her back in whenever she went off the deep end. Until now it had never been needed to be reciprocated, even with Alice’s weight slowly overcoming Melissa’s own enormity she had always managed to stay cool as far as indulgences went. But for the last few days or so, Alice had been like a woman possessed—she’d been eating non-stop since Monday, and even Melissa was beginning to get a little concerned.


“Well at least save some for me!” Melissa snatched the box away, much to the displeasure of her blimping best friend, “You’re taking all the good ones…”

Melissa plunged in a chubby hand and returned with two chocolate crullers, popping the end of one into her mouth lusciously as her friend watched.

“Give’em back!” Alice cried out hungrily as she lunged towards Melissa, her efforts counterbalanced by the extra four hundred pounds on her mighty frame and kept her seated, “Come on, don’t be a jerk!”

“Not until you tell me what’s got your big ol’ panties in a wad.” Melissa said knowingly, biting into the cruller again, “You’ve been eating like crazy since Monday and I wanna know what’s up.”

Alice had been eating like crazy for a while now—it was only just now that she was beginning to overtake Melissa’s scope of reason. Alice’s weight had risen to the higher regions of the four hundred pound range, nearing the big quarter-ton a little bit more every day. She was practically spherical, with a fat gut that slapped against her knees with every awkward hobble forward. Her face was still sweet and kind, though the roundness of her cheeks forced her eyes to squint slightly, and her jowls had completely enveloped her neck by this point. Alice couldn’t even touch the tip of her belly anymore—what with her well-padded bingo wings and the overall thickness of her sides, and with how big that thing had gotten lately…

“Fine.” Alice huffed, “My sister’s coming to visit… I need comfort food.”

“Aw shit, Stephanie?” Melissa whined, curling one nostril up, “Jesus, here girl. You need ‘em.”

With permission, Alice resumed gorging. She picked up two donuts and stacked them on top of one another, biting into them helplessly as she chewed with a mission.

“I’m just so… gulp… worried…” Alice looked down and frowned, “She hasn’t seen me in a while… and you know how judgmental she is…”

“Yeah I do.” Melissa answered bitterly, biting into her cruller, “Is she the one who got you that diet book for Christmas?”

“Y-Yeah…” Alice swallowed, “And I’ve put on even more weight since then.”

Melissa watched as Alice bit eagerly into the next few donuts. Within moments the entire box had been demolished, save for the untouched cruller Melissa still had sitting on Alice’s desk. She watched as her friend leaned past her own ample side-fat to reach into the mini-fridge, whipping out a pre-packaged Starbucks Frappuccino blend. Despite her own tummy rumbling, Melissa sighed and pushed the little treat towards her friend.

“Here. Eat up. Lunch is on me today, ‘kay?” Melissa put a hand on Alice’s well-insulated shoulder
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Alice's Ample Appetite Explained!

choices: So lunch is gonna be eventful.
Lunch? Screw lunch! Vicky heads down to Fit Life and DEMANDS answers!
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
”—Probably why I was such a fat kid. I just could not stop eating those things. Like really, I was addicted to chocolate.” Cass’ tone turned regretful, ”And if I keep hanging out with you I’m gonna be right back there, considering Fit Life bit the big one. Seriously—it was like the greatest place ever! Why would anyone not go there?!”

”Hey, it wasn’t just your gym. It was our gym!” Marni said defensively, the sound of unwrapping could be heard away from the mic, ”I went there too, y’know!”

”You went there to get massaged and sit in the sauna.” Cass answered flatly, ”Seriously, where am I gonna go to get my sweat on? Plus… y’know, their yoga instructor was really hot…”

A disgruntled sigh escaped the Italian mound of flesh that squashed the industrial-sized chair behind the secretary desk. Victoria had the most displeased look on her face, her jaw dropped as her chins expanded with fat, her eyebrows curled in confusion—Fit Life shut down? When the hell did that happen?!

She took an instinctive sip of her strawberry smoothie, loaded with protein and bulk-up powder for flavoring. It helped whet her tongue, but did little to discourage her rage. How had that place shut down? She was there like, every day giving them money for smoothies and junk! Sure it had been a little lonely in there lately, but that was no reason for them to shut down!

She shifted in her seat angrily, her belly bunching up into a pudgy pagoda as she shifted the weight on her hips. The chair groaned beneath her giant ass as it swelled to fit its seating arrangement. There was a full foot of space between the shelf of her ass and her rolling hillside of backfat, and her hips forced the arms of her swivel chair deep into her fat thighs. Vicky could no longer sit leaned over for long periods of time, nor could she comfortably reach the back of her chair without wedging its spine into her crack. This did little to discourage her delusions of a slender bod, the byproduct of going to the gym. Which was now closed down.

“Like, is this some kind of joke?!” she huffed, “Omigawd I, like… I just can’t even right now! UGH!”

One of Vicky’s uselessly pampered hands clicked off her radio before stuffing the straw back in her mouth. Good for her she’d stocked up on all that delicious smoothie mix, but bad on them that they were so stupid to get shut down!

“I’m, like, gonna complain on the internet!” Vicky huffed, not even checking to see if it was time for lunch, “This is out-freakin’-rageous!”
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Vicky's Violently Voluminous Outrage!

choices: Stephanie's plane touches down later that night, Alice and Melissa pick her up
Suddenly finding herself "free" Vicky calls up Christina for a girl's night out
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
So getting to Fit Life wasn’t exactly the easiest thing in the world to do for a girl of Vicky’s size. While most women in the office were either small enough to drive standard-built cars without much of a problem or were large enough to warrant something custom-built to cater towards their bulk, Vicky was in the one-woman camp of the latter trying to accomplish the former. As such, since her car was “broken”, she’d been relying on her mother and other coworkers to take her to and from work until such a time that it was “fixed”. And since her mother was at work, her sisters were all preoccupied, and her daddy was caught in a meeting, this meant that Vicky didn’t exactly have a decent ride. Even still, when she wanted something, Victoria was a woman of considerable conviction.

The yellow taxi dipped noticeably to the pavement as it struggled to support the intensely bottom-heavy brunette, puttering and knocking as it tried and failed to go the speed it was being directed to. The speed limit was forty, but the driver had to press hard on the gas pedal to ensure that it could keep momentum with the extra four-hundred or so pounds it had so close to its trunk. As the soon-to-be-abandoned building came into view, Vicky frantically urged the driver to stop. The yellow car stopped immediately at the entrance of the gym, whereupon Vicky attempted to wriggle herself out of her wedged position.

Vicky was easily too big to shimmy out of the back seat of the “surprisingly small” taxi cab. Her ass was so fat that it left almost no room for anyone else to sit next to her, and her belly rolls poured between her legs and touched the back of the cab’s front seats. Her arms were too flabby to do much of anything than shake helplessly when she tried to use them—it was so bad that, after a full three minutes of struggling, the cabby had to get out of his car and pull the super-sized secretary from between the seats of his cab.

Never the less, Vicky was always the unfettered. Her gym was going under, and she demanded answers! After taking a few moments to compose herself, leaning against the valiant yellow vehicle for support, Vicky trekked onward towards the entrance. She eventually reached it a sweating, huffing mess in a purple pantsuit tailor-made for a hippopotamus with a glandular disorder. Her round cheeks shiny with perspiration and glowing bright crimson, and every inch of her glistening in fresh sweat.

“Hey!” she hollered, banging on the glass, “Heeey!”

She did this for a while before somebody, presumably one of the employees remaining to help close up shop and make sure all the equipment went to the right place, finally came to see the source of the racket. The poor woman was met with Victoria, easily one of the biggest women in town, pressed against the glass double doors. Her fat belly spread like butter against the reflective material, and her ridiculous rump all but eclipsed the doorway. Her triply-chinned face looked quite angry…

“Hey… yeah, sorry we’re closed.” The little black-haired woman said with a mix of fabricated and genuine sympathy, “Sorry Victoria.”

“Marianne, don’t… don’t be like that you... you little...!” Vicky puffed, “I come here like every day! How can you guys be closed?!”

“Like, we served the same people over and over again. And only five of them bought premium memberships.” Marianne said flatly, “I guess we couldn’t afford to give everyone discounts at all the places they ate at to try and win premium memberships.”

“What?!” Vicky roared, “That, like, doesn’t even… make any sense! I wanna see a manager!”

“Well, you’d better check out the unemployment line.” Marianne said crossly, “Look, we’ve got a lot of work to do in here… so unless you wanna work up a sweat, please leave.”

“B-But I just bought a Gold—“

Marianne dropped the curtain over the glass, leaving Vicky with only a white backdrop to voice her complaints to. Vicky stood there for a while, dumbstruck. Where was she supposed to get her hot bod from now? It wasn’t like there were any other gyms that gave out discounts like Fit Life did…

“Please… just leave, Vicky.” Marianne said flatly from behind the screen, “Don’t make me call the cops.”
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Formerly Fit Life

choices: a smile—"Yeah, and I'm not the only one, am I? Gimme a hug!"
a frown—"Like you should talk, porkrind."
crying eyes—"It's not my fault my genetics SUCK, okay?"
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
It wasn’t hard to see that they were sisters—it never had been.

Alice and Stephanie came from the same statuesque Aryan gene pool. They both had proud noses, big blue eyes, and stunning features. Whereas Alice’s features were smoother though, Stephanie’s were characterized by their comparative roughness. Her eyebrows were thicker, her nose just a bit larger, and there was a slight cleft carved into her chin. She was still gorgeous and, in fact, these features managed to fool most people into thinking that she was the older sister between the two of them. Something that Alice had hated the most before her almost 400 pound weight gain.

However, it… really wasn’t hard to tell that they were sisters anymore.

Stepping off of the plane was a wide woman, and Gordge-sized at that. This wasn’t just your regular fat lady, this woman was easily the size of girl that Alice and Melissa had grown accustomed to. Somehow that made them feel more wary of Melissa’s descent. Because, obviously, no matter how hard they blinked their eyes or did double takes—that double-wide lady was Alice’s sister.

She was colossal—unlike anything Alice or her gal pal had ever seen outside of their workplace.

Stephanie’s elephantine legs buckled and ached as she lugged her meaty mass out into the terminal. Belly wobbling, breasts shaking, her face flush with anguish as she struggled against her own girth. Was that what they looked like when they walked?

“St…Stephanie?” Alice blinked back tears—ripe with emotion, Alice was always wont to cry—“Is that…”

“DAAAAAMN.” Melissa busted out, “Steph, no offense but… you got FAT!”

Melissa’s rolling laughter echoed in her voluminous gut, her swaddling neck folds rippling in mirth. Alice winced and smacked her friend on the pillowy arm.

But honestly, Alice was… just as confused, to say the least. The last time that they had seen each other, Stephanie had been so thin! Lithe! Active! Those were definitely not words to describe the thundering heifer huffing and puffing her way to them, double over to catch her breath.

Stephanie looked up at the two of them with…
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Like Sister Like Sister

choices: "What? Like I wouldn't recognize my big sister! C'mere, gimme a hug!"
"How could I not? Have you put on even MORE weight since last time, tubby?"
"Of course I did! And is this your girlfriend? I had no idea you were... um..."
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
It wasn’t difficult to see that they were sisters.

Stephanie and Alice favored each other greatly, stemming from their resemblance to their mother’s side of the family. Both had very conventionally pretty faces, with elegant noses and big blue eyes. Alice’s eyebrows were a bit more trim than her sister’s, whereas Stephanie had the slightest cleft chiseled into her chin. They were about the same height, and more or less the same hair color. Stephanie tended to highlight the blonde in her hair a bit more than Alice ever had, but otherwise they could have been basically indistinguishable—one would have never guessed that Alice was the older sister between the two of them.

Again, should have been indistinguishable.

The biggest key difference between the Gellar sisters was that, despite their similar facial structure and upbringing, the two couldn’t have looked more different as far as body sizes were concerned.

Alice was a big, pillowy hippo who had only grown bigger and more pillowy in the coming months since she had seen her sister last. She was barely able to stand without growing winded, with her great belly seizing in place as she breathed heavily from the exertion of supporting her own massive body right there in the middle of the airport. Meanwhile Stephanie was a lean, muscular blonde of considerably smaller size.

Stephanie looked around the airport—but not for very long. The familiar sight of her humongous older sister stuck out like a sore thumb. Likewise, Alice had no trouble picking out the familiar face of her sister even through the crowd.

“S-Stephanie?” Alice ventured timidly as she took a few heaving steps away from Melissa and towards the slightly version of herself, “It’s, uh… it’s Alice! Bet you… um… didn’t recognize me, huh?”

Stephanie, taking a good look up and down at her sister, said…
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Like Looking Into a Mirror

choices: The trio head to the bar.
Christina's having more weight issues.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Alice blushed at the comment by her sister, and masked her sigh with a belabored chuckle that jiggled her blubbery face. "Heh, heh, yeah...Guess I have.." Melissa's thick arm patted Alice on her back, rippling her fat rolls, in their endless process of rising and falling with the rest of her expanse of fat. "I try to tell her to go easy, you know? She loves the donuts."

Stephanie turned to Melissa. Her eyes very smoothly and quickly rolled over the expanse of her fat-with just a blink of skepticism, someone would have to be peering intently into her eyes to notice it. But if noticed, her expression almost said, Sure you try, lardass. "Melissa, pleasure to meet you." Stephanie said. "Sis talks about you all the time in her e-mails." Melissa smiled in return. "Your sister is an absolute treat at the office, pleasure to meet you as well."

The two shook hands and traded hugs, the sight about as absurd and full of contrast as could be seen. A comparative rod that was Stephanie's chiseled form being engulfed by the bean-bag-like body of Mel. The hug was brief and courteous- Melissa could feel Stephanie's subtle physical hints leading to an eagerness to pull away from the hug. "Come on, jet-lag's an ugly slut, let's get some drinks!" spoke Melissa. "Couldn't have said it better myself." said Stephanie. "Come on, sis. I can show you how good I've gotten at Quarters since last time we met." Alice smiled. "Sure, let's go!"

The humanoid, inflated forms of Melissa and Alice chugged behind Stephanie's easy strides. Steph couldn't help but hear the pained huffing that came from the back and right where Alice was walking. "You alright, sis?" she asked. Alice huffed a reply, "Yeah... Just... A little winded.." Stephanie slowed her pace noticeably, visibly attempting to slow her pace in front of her sister. Of course, Melissa was huffing just a little louder- Stephanie could plainly hear. A subtle jerk of the head to the left- the kind a person naturally makes when identifying a sound. Melissa could tell- she turned her face aside to Alice, to gauge her reaction. Alice turned to her as well. Their faces were mutually uneasy.

The trio passed through the doors to the outside of the airport, Stephanie turning with a chuckle. "Woop, why am I leading? You guys know where your car is." "True, true." replied Melissa. The walk was silent from there on, until they reached Melissa's car, which she raised her key-fob and unlocked with the 'ch-chnk' of the locks disengaging. Alice hung on the passenger side, opening, and leaning into the seat, pulling to a seat. She pulled her other leg into the foot of the car, only to be met with the obstacle that was her thighs. Her other foot dangled in the threshold, Stephanie preparing to get into the car until she saw her sister struggle to try and pull the door closed. With a look of bewilderment, Stephanie looked over her sister's blubbery side, dangling out of the threshold and the door unable to compress the fat on its own. "Need some help, -big- sis?" Alice could not contain the sigh that came before a "Uh, yeah, if you would." Melissa pulled her door closed as she rocked the car, shimmying further to the right. Stephanie couldn't help but behold how absurdly fat these two were. Alice and Melissa's blubber was nearly touching, but it gave Stephanie an idea. "Shimmy further in, Al." Alice did so, and Steph was able to shut the door. She went to her own seat, and was able to pull her own seatbelt down with ease.

Her sister and Melissa were not as fortunate. Melissa struggled for a moment, but pulled it down a bit easier-into a seatbelt extender. There was no such invention in the passenger side, as Alice struggled. Stephanie watched the metal buckle jimmy ever closer to the slot. Alice was an inch short, but the belt had no more slack to give. Melissa spoke up with a sigh. "Steph, get the other extender for me, will ya?" Alice interrupted. "No, I don't think I need it. Sis, just help me." Stephanie tugged and tugged with her might- it only got the buckle a bit closer- it tickled the rim of the slot, but no click. Stephanie groaned. "Suck that giant thing in." Alice groaned, " I -AM-!"

Stephanie exhaled sharply. Steph dug around in front of her, but found the extender. "This is a whole other level, -big- sis." Alice groaned. "I know...I know I'm fat, Steph."
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Sisterly Shame

choices: The breakroom's not the only place Courtney's been expanding.
Alice really struggles at the gym.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
The Blue Door Bar at one o'clock in the afternoon was as calm as a bar could be, even on a Saturday. The first thing that hit Steph about the place was the wooden interior, and the incessant smell of peanut dust and booze. There were the usual assortment of characters- a sloppy mid-aged man with a receding amber hairline and a beer gut, a few college-aged girls, and not many besides save for Stephanie and the tubby twosome who had to come in one at a time by merit of their wideness. Their weighty, ponderous steps resounded, drawing eyes from across the bar. Alice began to cringe, but memories of the night with Courtney came up. She held all of her bulk up with pride, as did Melissa.

They took a seat on the other end of the bar, farther away from the mid-aged man. "This place is like the Daydrink Saloon back home." remarked Stephanie. "Yeah," replied Alice, "Except there's no Edna and her scream-y husband." Stephanie gave a hand wave. "Pssht. Don't shit-talk my mans Alvin. Besides, Edna's a hoe anyway." Alice and Melissa chuckled as the thin blonde bartender speaking to the middle-aged man gave him a remark and walked over to them. "Hey, ladies, what can I get ya's?" he inquired in a light Brooklyn accent. Melissa spoke up first. "Gimme J.D." The bartender nodded and strode handily to the tap and the paired shelves, grabbing a bottle of Jack Daniel's and a shot glass. "Uhh, Corona." The bartender put down the bottle of Daniel's whiskey and picked up a bottle of Corona. "Lime or no?" he asked. "Lime." replied Stephanie.

She turned to Melissa. "Straight Jack? I thought you were driving." Melissa spoke up. "You guys know how to drive too." Alice began the infant stages of a laugh, but choked it down and replaced it with a winding sigh. "Well, guess I'm the Designated Driver. Uhh, just give me a coke." Before the bartender could reach for the drink cooler, Stephanie barked out, "-Diet-. Coke." Alice sighed and spoke up. "Regular coke." Stephanie threw up her hands. "Giiirl. That stuff has as many calories as a snickers bar, and more sugar. Did you even wipe your ass with that diet book?" Alice shrugged as the bartender slid their drinks onto the bar-top. "I tried it for January, but it was Paleo and I love donuts to death." Stephanie jabbed at Alice's doughy, expansive midsection which rubbed and spilled an inch or so onto the bar, "If only they felt the same." Alice rubbed at the jabbed flesh, contained in its jiggling by the wooden counter.

Melissa spoke up. "Oh, if it's not too much of a bother, can we get some Nachos?" Steph began to roll her eyes until she began to accept the situation- she had a bit of a nacho craving anyway. "Sure, be back in a moment." Stephanie spoke up as the thin blonde man disappeared behind the thick metal door, the mid-aged man stared into his liquor, and the college-aged girls snickered about something. "Oh, god. You guys wouldn't believe the shit-show that was this flight." Alice turned keenly to her sister, speaking up. "Oh? Do tell." Melissa sipped on her Jack, mumbling something to the affirmative before putting down her shot. "Yeah, go on." Stephanie began to ramble as she picked up her beer. "So, I get on this plane. It takes, like, forever to get up to the pilot's... happy place or whatever, and, stupid me, I didn't -go- before we left the terminal." Alice and Melissa nodded at the story, as Stephanie went on, Alice interjecting, "Oh, gawd." Stephanie nodded in reply. "It gets worse. So we finally get to cruising speed, and the seatbelt light turns on. I get up to try to head to the -only- bathroom on this god-forsaken plane, and guess what's blocking it? The damn service cart!" Both Alice and Melissa gave a groan of sympathetic annoyance. Melissa spoke up. "The hell? Why would they bring it up from the -back- if that's where the only bathroom is? And what hell-spawned company makes an airplane with bathrooms only on one end!?" Stephanie rolled her head. "Satan's Toenanils, Incorporated, apparently!"

The bartender slid smoothly out as the heavy metal door, which weightily slung open. In one smooth motion, he slid the basket of nachos onto the counter-top, with two containers of cheese stacked on the chips. Steph continued, pausing only for a brief "Thankyou," and resumed, " And, the -only possible way- to the bathroom past the cart gets stopped up as some ancient geezer stops her for a coffee, which she takes forever to pour and hand to him!" Alice spoke up. "You should have shoved your way past them, that's, like, a national emergency." Melissa spoke up immediately. "Did you pee your pants?" The trio broke out in giggles. Alice reached for a nacho and uncapped one of the cheese containers, attempting to speak through her giggles. "The first thing....you could think to ask... Did you pee your pants.." Alice munched on the nacho chip as her sister joined her in munching on the chips, and Melissa joined as she polished off her shot of whiskey.

The trio got back to Melissa's car, Alice sliding into the driver's seat with another can of coke. "Sis, you -really- ordered a can to go." Alice nodded. "Yes, yes I did." Stephanie groaned. "Bitch, don't you groan, you ate like half the nachos!" Stephanie giggled. "Difference is, I'm not, like, five hundred pounds! I got wiggle room!" Alice bit back. "Nothin' to wiggle in all that room, girlie!" Melissa cooed in amusement, "Oooooo!" "It's not a joke, Al." griped Stephanie. "You were barely, like...What, still in the three-hundreds last time I saw you! You were pretty tubby, but shit, girl! How can you just stay this big?" Alice grunted and cranked the car. "That's not a rhetorical question," poked Stephanie, "We're going to the gym tomorrow." Alice groaned. "Fiiiiine. If for no other reason than to spend some time with you."
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Booze at Blue Door.

choices: Victoria's ballooned up recently!
Alice and her Sister work out at the gym.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
"Nngh... Damn this waistband!"
Courtney pulled the waistband of her skirt down just a tad. It was technically an elastic waist, and in theory it should have been form-fitting. In reality, though, the flowing, blue-and-black marbled skirt only had so much room in the waist, and every inch was being taken up by Courtney's expanding, rolling gut. Although Christina and Alice had been targeted hard by the nearly predatory changes that Courtney had made, Courtney herself had begun to feel real damage to her ever-expanding waistline.

Her skirt which she had bought barely the week before the renovations as a flowing and loose but tasteful skirt had now become a constraining nightmare which felt like it was burrowing through her massive stomach. Its tightness could no longer belie the fat below the clothing, and every waking moment, thick folds of fat stuck out and jiggled with every breath and movement, conspicuous as they joined with the continuously expanding shelf of fat above Courtney's belly button that no longer was content to be contained by the skin-tight blouse, and even on an 'empty' stomach now hung out at least an inch and a half.

Courtney sighed at her clothing woes, and adjusted her blouse, trying in vain to stretch it back over her midriff, which it refused to do. Her black blouse, which once smoothly transitioned to her lower half and concealed her midriff now had become an airtight crop-top which rose and fell with each shallow breath. The short sleeves revealed another area of Courtney's body that had been inflated by fat; her arms. Courtney's bicep was flabby and fat before, but now it would be inadequate to compare it to a ham. The forearm and the attached shoulders were pumped with fat by the injection of endless calories, the very top of the arm bursting from the choking sleeve like dough emerging from a can. Courtney's sausage-like fingers were always in motion, whether to type on her keyboard, or to retrieve her weakness- a Boston Creme Doughnut from the break room, now always fresh by her decree.

With such changes on top of her pre-existing, already hoggish work environment, it was no wonder to anyone keeping track that Courtney had climbed into the five-hundreds. Courtney grunted as she hefted her massive form up from her chair, with the aid of the ever-steady desk, and she thundered towards the break room with a mixture of a pant and a grunt. With a bulk of over five hundred pounds and climbing, Courtney shook the floor as she walked. Every worker on her floor heard the tremulous reverberations that resulted from Courtney's treads. She entered the break-room, populated additionally by Victoria.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Courtney gets a taste of her own medicine.

choices: Victoria tries to get to work, but she can't focus.
Stephanie is working Alice like a dog at the gym.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Since Vicky had lost access to her "fitness," any pretense of holding back her gains had long gone out the window, but Courtney's changes had truly made Victoria's gains ridiculous.

Victoria could barely fit between the chair and the table, even given the nearly two-meter distance from the back of the chair to the table's edge, nearly every centimeter of it was taken up by Victoria's absolute fatness. "Oh... Hey, Court!" barked out Victoria. Courtney nearly winced at the loudness of Victoria's voice. "Hey, Vick." replied Courtney in a cool, calm voice. Courtney's thunderous footsteps traced towards the state-of-the-art coffee machine, and poured herself a Latte- a complex process reduced to the push of a button.

Courtney looked at Victoria as her hot drink was poured. She must have gained nearly sixty pounds- now hovering in the high four-hundreds, but not quite in the four-nineties. Victoria's gains had recently come mostly in her plump rear-end, but not to be outdone by her other parts of her body, her belly still was quite sizable. It simply wasn't to the standard of Courtney or Alice. "That project you've been working on, how's it coming?" Victoria raised a brow. "Huh? Oh, yeah, uh... That, uh..." Courtney kept up her stare. Few could browbeat by eyes alone like she could. "Uh..." Victoria had drawn an utter blank. Courtney gave a tsk, tsk as she spoke up. "You know, Vick, this break room isn't meant to replace actually working." Victoria crossed her immense arms and shook her blubbery face in indignation. "I'm working!" she barked. "I'm just taking a well-deserved break!" Courtney rolled her eyes. "Ya' better. The deadline is next monday's work-day, and if we don't have it, Jenna's gonna visit us to shove a heel up my ass."

Victoria shoved a donut down her gullet, and spoke up. "Dunno if she could." Courtney turned to her. "What do you mean, are you saying that my butt is too fat, or that Jenna is too fat to shove her foot up it?" Victoria gave for an answer a knowing grin and a shrug. Courtney and Victoria chuckled together.

Courtney treaded off, while Victoria gulped down a swallow of her coffee in nervousness- Court wasn't nearly as complacent as Jenna, she actually expected work to be done, and to not have the day be one long feast of donuts and snacks.

Victoria returned her greedy, plump, bejeweled hand to the donut box. She'd get back to work. She just needed a donut or two... or maybe the rest of this box.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Victoria's Voluptuousness

choices: Alice, Mel, and Steph head to the buffet, and Steph has a surprising appetite!
Victoria tries to crack down on her work-load.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Alice's eyes were blurred by a thick veil of sweat as she gripped the hand-rails of the treadmill in a death grip. She feared to remove her hand to wipe her vision clear for fear of losing her grip and falling off the tread-mill. Suddenly, a voice seemed to burst the veil. "Sis, c'mon, you're only going three-point-five!"

Stephanie had insisted on putting a heavy emphasis on cardio today- she had insisted that it was necessary to counteract the ills of the many sugary, calorie-laden sodas that Alice had drank in place of alcohol. Alice tried to reply, to make an excuse for her horrifying lack of stamina, but all that came out was blustered mumbling. Her lungs were on fire and her legs felt like every muscle fiber was about to pop off. Her jiggling pillars of lard that were legs wavered with each step. It was almost comical to see this immense wad of belly-heavy fat waver left and right on the treadmill if it didn't seem so absolutely dangerous.

Melissa's voice called from the bench. "You can always join me in my exercise, Al. I call it doing fuck-all and not giving a shit about cardio." Alice blustered more sweat. Stephanie called out to Melissa. "You know, it'd be a good idea to join us. Never such a thing as too big to exercise." "Yeah, but there's such a thing as not giving a shit about exercise." Stephanie spoke up. "Suit yourself. It'll be your money you've got to spend to get bigger pants." A few moments later, and Alice heard the sound of another treadmill cranking up beside her. Alice straddled the track and finally wiped her eyes. Melissa, the Melissa was in fact on a treadmill. Alice spoke up after catching her breath, just before resuming her work-out. "Am I seeing things, Mel, or are you actually working out?" Melissa spoke up. "Sue me. I'm allowed to get on a treadmill. Besides, it's not like I'm eating kale and drinking kombucha now. I was just getting bored on the bench." Alice giggled, with Melissa speaking up shortly after, after barely a few seconds already beginning to get out of breath from just going three miles per hour, "Fuck you...I'll kick your ass...Al.."

Stephanie turned to Alice as she wiped her eyes and resumed walking. "Gotta admit, Al, I'm impressed you're keeping up. You're struggling but you're going." Alice turned to her sister, and spoke, saying, "Not like I'm...immobile...yet..." She wheezed out a laugh and so did Stephanie. Five long, punishing minutes followed the thirty Alice and Stephanie had been on the treadmill. Melissa was horrifically out of breath, her mouth gaping and literally gasping for breath, as Alice and Stephanie's treadmills finally wound down to a stop. "Ohhhthankgod," Mel mumbled out, as she stood on the sides and stopped her treadmill, before hopping off the treadmill and wobbling towards the water fountain ahead of the pack, chugging down a steady stream of water for a solid minutes. Alice and Stephanie both exchanged looks of bewilderment. Alice came up to the exasperated, bloated form of Melissa and patted her on the shoulder. "Ya did good, Mel." Melissa scoffed. "Don't bet on it. I don't know how you nuts do this, let alone how.." She pointed at Stephanie, "This one has fun doing it!" Stephanie spoke up. "The trick is to do it more." Alice hitched up her hands, clawing them like an old, evil crone, and spoke in a faux-raspy voice. "More, more, yes, my pretties!" Stephanie giggled and picked up the act. "Sooon, my diabolical plan to have you lose ALLL of that weight will be complete!" Melissa shook her head. "Y'all are fuckin' nuts." Alice and Stephanie broke down laughing.

Melissa and Alice were soon led to a bench with a bar suspended by a tether to a stack of numbered weights, all on top of one another. "This is a lat pulldown, it helps with your back n' stuff." Stephanie spoke. She then pulled herself to a seat and demonstrated. The stack was set at a daunting 150, and stephanie pulled the bar down to her chest, her muscular back flexing in the strain. Stephanie went on, completing this maneuver nine more times before letting the bar slide up before catching it, pulling herself up and indicating the seat. "Give 'er a try, Mel." Melissa shrugged. "Okay, but I'm toning that weight down." Melissa pulled to a seat and removed the pin from the stack of weights, shifting it up to a weight labeled '30.' Stephanie handed the bar to Melissa, who carefully took it, and awkwardly pulled the bar down to just above her great bulk, made even wider by her sitting position, sticking out somewhere short of half a meter either way. Melissa grunted as she repeated the maneuver about eight more times. Alice and Stephanie looked with pride as the blob of fat that was Melissa was actually lifting weights. Melissa gritted her teeth, pulled the bar down one more time, and then let the bar ascend, with a loud 'Thunk' resounding from the stack of weights. She stood up and lifted her flabby arms, flexing. "Wooo!" she whooped. Alice and Stephanie gave her a high-five. "I think I can actually get used to lifting stuff. Just keep me off that torture machine." Stephanie and Alice chuckled.

Alice's turn came, and she was able to move the weights down about 20 more. Both Alice and Melissa went about twice more before they were properly worn out. As the trio left the gym, sweaty but satisfied, Stephanie patted both of the blubbery women's shoulders. "You know, you two aren't half as bad as I thought you were gonna do." She thought, long and hard, as Alice gave a reply. "Aw, thanks, sis. I appreciate. We can head back to my place and I can cook something." Stephanie spoke up. "You know what? Let's head to a buffet place- you gals deserve it." Alice and Melissa looked at each other with eyes of wonder. Stephanie- THAT Stephanie- had just offered to take them to a buffet. "Yes! Thank you, sis!" spoke Alice as she bear-hugged her sister.

Stephanie returned the fierce hug as best as she could around Alice's great bulk. She felt pride in her sister's hard work that day, but another part of her was quietly whispering to her that maybe it was best to let Alice be as she wanted to be. It was a part further on the edge of her psyche, though- she still believed with most of her heart that Alice and Melissa both ought to keep at the gym.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Alice's Arduous Ordeal

choices: Victoria goes to Christina, and begs for her help.
Alice, Mel, and Steph eat at a buffet, and all of them hog out!
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Victoria giggled with glee as she watched a video on her computer. Having this much fun ought not to be allowed.

For Victoria, it more-or-less wasn't, however. Earlier that day, Courtney'd laid into her about her work. She thought she heard some thunderous footsteps from the office where her mind approximated Courtney was stationed, and she figured she ought to at least -look- like she was working. She tabbed over- she'd watch that other video she'd slated to 'watch later' in a moment.

Placed before her eyes was a rolling, nigh-endless spreadsheet. Courtney's task was to account for company expenses for new acquisitions as well as taking into account money gained from subsidy companies. Courtney felt frozen. The amount of space on the sheet actually taken up by her work could be covered by two hands. Nearly the whole screen was blank, and she had to dig through the expenditures of Gordge.

Victoria sighed and mumbled, "Jeeezus, christ..." She tabbed out and looked at her browser. Her initial intention was to swap over to the corporate bank account on another tab, but she saw the alluring draw of one just before, the bright emblem of her favorite blog website, with a notification next to it- a new post! Victoria clicked on it. Anything to put off the monster that was the unfinished monster that she had barely started. Her eyes poured over the text of the blogger. The warm, inviting style that this globe-trotting, enviable writer had wrote in informed Victoria of foreign locales, complete with pictures and amazing descriptions of all types, from the evening glow of sunset clashing with the light of Paris all the way to the serene, rolling Mekong river in Vietnam stretching like an azure serpent along the verdant, lush jungles of that land. It took Victoria away from this office for a moment.

That exact thought reminded her- didn't she remember a great post they'd made about Prague? They had a funny story about a night in a bar, and she had to find that again! It gave her a gut-laugh just thinking about it.

She subconciously reached for her snack bag. Next to procrastination, subconscious snacking was one of Victoria's gold-medal sports. She could do anything and power through months' supplies of various sweet, salty, and sour snacks. In fact, every tip or type at the keyboard was followed by her other hand in a snack bag. To sit near Victoria while working was to hear an endless stream of crunching, munching, and occasionally burping from sips of soda.

She grabbed a fist-ful of cheese snacks and crammed them into her mouth as she glanced at a title. Finally, there it was! She read through the post- the whole rolling story of the writer going from a few drinks of beer to running into the bar's tough guy, to winning a fight with said tough guy by jamming their thumb up his butt. Victoria rolled with laughter- that part brought her back to this post at least twice a week, but it was always funny to her, not just the event itself but the way it was built up, the description of the tough guy- it was great!

She heard shuffling of feet and a lot of movement beyond her office. She turned, to see what the commotion was all about, and saw the workers with their things moving. It occurred to her to check the time. It had gone from returning from the break room at two all the way to five o'clock! She had blown every minute of that looking at the blog and watching videos!

She turned around and wrapped up her bag, grabbed her stuff, and pondered what to do as she put effort onto her desk to lift her fat body from her chair.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: An attempt was made.

choices: Alice, Melissa and Steph's buffet outing.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Christina sighed in contentment. Finally, the workday was over.

She stretched her great, flabby arms as she wheeled her over-taxed chair backwards, leaning back as she did so. She was careful not to apply too much pressure- there had been an unfortunate time or two that she'd relaxed too hard and tipped the chair over, her massive form still in it. As she leant back up and prepared to turn off her computer and grab her things, she heard Victoria's voice as her eyes hit Victoria's greatly inflated form.

"Christieeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee."

Christina was surprised by Victoria's sudden appearance. She grasped at her chest as she involuntarily gasped. "Vickie, damn girl, you scared me!" Victoria did not reply, she merely pouted. "Courtney's deadline is killing me," she sadly spoke, each word dripping with a mixture of confusion and frustration. Christina raised a brow. "Deadline? Oh, the accounting thing? That's due soon. Do you got it?" Victoria shook her head desperately. "NO!" She carried on in rapid succession, "NO, I DON'TGODDITBECAUSETHERE'STOOMUCHWORKIT'SKILLINGME," Victoria's litany was to continue, but Christina raised a hand and stated firmly and loudly, "Stop it, stop it. You're not making sense." Victoria hyperventilated and took a seat. Christina spoke up. "Geeez, girl. This is killing you. Go out and grab a bite, I can just pull some overtime." Victoria's eyes lit up. "Ohmygawd, ohmygawd! Thank you!" She embraced Christina's greatly inflated form, who embraced back. Christina patted Victoria's blubbery back. She gave three more pats in quick succession to let Victoria know she could let go. Victoria held on for a beat, then released. "See you later, gal. Thank youu!" Christina smiled and waved.

Then Christina opened up the file, thinking it was just some light work to polish up.

The shock of the horrifically unfinished report nearly stopped Christina's heart, to an almost literal extent. She could do little but glare at the amount of undone work as she clutched at her heart, which soon returned to its normal rapid pace. There was almost nothing done on this report! There was barely one or two rows filled in!

Christina sighed and got up. She returned a few minutes later with the remaining store of donuts of the extant box that was on the break room table, and a mug of strong, black coffee. She put herself to the task, taking in a deep draught of coffee before diving into the document. It became a rhythm, thumb-alt, pinky-left tab. A flurry of key-strokes, then an enter. Repeat. Repeat. Repeat. Christina broke the monotony with donuts and sips of coffee. Time dissapeared into the void of monotony.

Clack-clack-clack-clack. Nom. Nom. Clack-Clack-Clack. Clack-Clack-Clack. Slurp.

Christina continued like this for an indeterminate amount of time. She reached for her coffee. The weight was suspiciously low. She leant the cup up. Nothing. She groaned. She reached for a donut, and munched on it. She slowed down, trying to stay focused on the work. She heard footsteps and the sound of creaking wheels down the hall. Soon, the form of the janitor, a tall black man appeared in the doorway. He spoke up. "Miss? You know it's two at night?" Christina chuckled, and spoke up. "Yeah... yeah, I know.. I gotta get this done.." The man shook his head, and spoke up. "Alllriiight, you know how to get out.." Christina nodded as the man slid out of sight with his cart, shaking his head.

Christina was able to go on a bit further. The time weighed on her. It felt like it was just five when Victoria came in, but the document was nearly done. She had to take a moment to get up. She applied leverage to the table, and her legs shook. Plying herself with caffeine and sugar could only get herself so far on artificial stimulants. This was a moment of driving willpower, though. She -needed more donuts and coffee. She was almost done. She could see the bottom of the page. Her legs tried to surrender, punishment for her physical neglect, the pounds of lard jiggling under the strain of standing under such little awareness, but she would not be denied her coffee.

Christina's massive form trudged wearily through the corridors. Her evenly-distributed fat shook like tree-limbs in the wind, by their sheer volume and buoyancy. She took a moment to look out the windows.
