The black of the sky was broken by the city lights glinting like the reflection of a sky that might be in a lightless city, lights of almost any color against the pure blackness of the sky with racing pale lights coursing along the highways like yellow-white blood.

It was a moment where reality felt purest.

Christina returned to her desk with a mug of coffee, and another whole box of donuts. The monotony resumed.

Clack-clack. Nom, nom. Clack-clack-clack-clack-clack-clack-clack. Slurrrp. Clack-Clack.

The coffee urged her onwards. More cells, faster. The little white boxes filled with thin black text, dollar signs. She needed a few more rows.

She noticed a pale grey hue in the window behind the screen as she filled the very last box. She ate a few more donuts from the box. Out of interest, she double-checked. There were still a few more. She sipped her coffee as she watched the paleness of the 4 A.M sky turn to the hot orange of 5 A.M. She rubbed at her drum-tight blouse. It felt a bit too tight- she looked. Surely enough, the amount of coffee she'd drank and the donuts she'd eaten had bloated her stomach to a size considerably greater than her normal sized stomach.

A few hours later, and quite a bit more of coffee later, Victoria arrived at the office. Christina waddled wearily past her and spoke. "You're welcome." Victoria simply smiled and spoke. "Thank youuuu!" She then noticed the deep sleepiness and slight resent in Christina's eyes. "Christie...how long have you been here?" Christie blinked a few times, and spoke flatly, "All night." Victoria's eyes went wide. She walked away and mumbled a "Sorry." as Christina clocked out. She turned and went to her car. She was going to take a -few- days off.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Sometimes, a girl needs help.

choices: Everyone but Steph reconvene at work the next day.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
The bell on the door of the Opal Ox Chinese Buffet rang as first, the mammoth blonde and black-haired forms of Alice and Melissa entered before Alice's thin blonde sister. Alice huffed and puffed. "Hooh. Why'd you have to park so far, sis?" Steph rolled her eyes. "Oooh, pity you. You had to walk a whole fifty feet." The thin asian woman appeared before the trio. Her neutral face belied a weariness, only hinted at by a chuckle. "Heyy, Alice." Alice chuckled. "Hey, Annie!" Stephanie stared at Alice. The look told- she had great suspicion over her sister's fast recognition by the waitress. "I'll take you to your table." spoke Annie.

The trio waddled, or walked, to their table. Stephanie spoke up. "You seem pretty well acquainted with this place." Alice spoke up. "Hey, a girl's gotta eat, Steph." Stephanie decided against saying anything else- she knew Alice was trying, or so it seemed. They finally came to their table, a nicely placed table by a corner window, with a view out onto the green lawn in front of the restaurant, with a four-way intersection just beyond, the restaurant being right on one corner. The group sat down at the table. Annie spoke quickly. "Alice, coke... Uh, you, ma'am?" She indicated towards Melissa with her pen. "Uh, same." She indicated at Stephanie. "Diet coke." She nodded as she scribbled, and spoke. "The buffet is open, don't let me stop you." She rapidly paced away from Alice, who spoke up. "Thank you!" All three got up and shuffled away to the buffet.

Alice's mind was already racing. She raced by the steamed vegtables for their more attractive cousin- the egg rolls placed next. She took the tongs through their paces, grabbing three, then four, then another three egg rolls. Melissa was caught behind Stephanie. She expected quick access, but surprise overtook her face as Stephanie remained at the egg rolls for a good thirty seconds, piling egg rolls onto her plate. She stepped up, and there were a measly four remaining. "Damn, girl, you guys are some egg roll fiends!" Stephanie chuckled. "We both got the egg roll gene." Both her and Alice raced to pile their plate. Crab Rangoon, Fried rice, teriyaki chicken on a stick, sweet and sour chicken, the plates were stacked almost to a comical extent, Stephanie's plate actually managed to top Melissa's in height. As they arrived at the table, Melissa didn't fail to express her shock. "Damnn, girl! How the hell? That stacking is beautiful!" Stephanie smiled as she put the plate down. "I played college softball, we get HAWNGRY." Alice mimicked shoving food into her mouth a moment before actually committing the act herself. Melissa ate quickly, but not at the speed that Alice and Stephanie dug in. Melissa wasn't saying anything, until Stephanie and Alice hadn't come up for breath, or pulled their heads off their plates in a solid minute. "Are you girls even breathing!?" Alice nodded and spoke, muffled by the food. "Nose breathing," before returning.

The plate of food which would normally take several minutes to slog through even for a girl the size of Melissa, and it was already nearly gone in under two- scratch that, Stephanie's was already clean, a split second before Alice managed to finish hers. "Awwh, damnit!" spoke Alice. Stephanie cackled. "Time for round two!" Alice got up, physically sweating and her shirt beginning to burgeon to a significant proportion of its full capacity, and her great, heavy belly beginning to shake outside of the bounds of the bottom of the shirt as Alice jogged to the buffet. The staff became visibly exasperated and entertained- absolute gluttons like this were once-in-a-lifetime opportunities to see. The second plates were equally piled high. Melissa began to lack the words, and was barely on her second plate by the time Alice and Stephanie had begun their third plate. By this point, slim, trim Stephanie had a taut, stuffed belly that hung out a good six inches, and Alice's massive gut was straining her shirt which was beginning to ride up from just below her gut to her belly button. By contrast, Melissa's shirt was barely strained. By the time Melissa's shirt was beginning to show real damage, Alice and Steph were on their most egregious violation; the dessert plates.

They returned with obscenely rich hills of powdered donuts on top of ice cream which layered atop small dessert cakes, which were encrusted with almond cookies. Stephanie's collar was lined with sweat, Alice's shirt had ridden up to below her breasts, her great swinging gut rolling atop her knees as she pulled wearily to a seat opposite her sister. The two were on a final, slow run, and their full stomachs began to show. They winced in pain at how full their stomachs were, but dutifully ate through their dessert plates. At one point, Alice physically gritted her teeth and moaned in pain, and stephanie ate the last piece of her dessert plate, and passed out. Melissa spoke up. "Oh, my god, Steph!" Alice waved at her. "Sh's j'st...." Annie stepped up. The fairly dim setting sun had turned to ink-black night. "Okay, ladies, is time to go." Melissa spoke. "I'll get the bill." Alice nodded, as Annie looked at the two and muttered something in mandarin. She called to the kitchen, and what seemed like the whole staff came out with two wheelchairs. They teamed up on Alice, almost all of them grabbed a piece of her massive, jiggling, lardy body which had outgrown her shirt, and her seated stomach rolled over her knees. The sweating, whale-like form of Alice was hefted by every fat part of her body. The chinese staff groaned, one of them visibly could not bear Alice's weight as he had to heft her up by her back fat, but by some miracle, they managed to fit Alice into the wheelchair which seemed impossibly big on its own, but just correctly sized for the impossibly obese woman who now sat in it. A smaller one was reserved for Stephanie.

The kitchen staff attempted to cram Alice into the car, but to no avail. They exerted and tried to fit her in, but her fat stomach was too distended to fit into the passenger seat. They wearily dropped her into the back-seat, wiping sweat from their brows. Melissa herself could barely fit behind the wheel, but Alice had bloated her stomach so extensively by her binge that it was lodged firmly into the seat in front of her. Melissa pulled up towards Alice's home, but was troubled. She didn't want to have to pay for an ambulance to wheel Alice back into her home, so she decided the only solution was to park for the night, and sleep in the car. She kept the air conditioning running, and did her best to sleep.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: The athleat!

choices: Courtney gets a message from Corporate- She's got work to buckle down on.
Christina's getting attention for her work- and it's making Vicky jealous!
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Christina sat in the break room, rubbing at her temple while downing her fifth cup of coffee that day, and her fifteenth donut. She'd spent the last day sleeping, and she'd spent that night awake, and her sleep schedule needed some re-adjusting. A pair of rumbling feet entered the break room, and about a foot before the rest of them entered, Alice's massive protruding belly entered the room, tight as a drum against even the free-form black gown-like dress she was wearing, still taut from the last night's absurd binge. "Damn, Al! That dress!" spoke Christina as Melissa's similarly bloated form followed Alice into the room. It began to dawn on both Melissa and Christine that Alice was, if not right at melissa's level, just behind.

"Heyy, Christie." spoke Melissa. Her eyes widened with concern as she cast a glance at Christine's sleepless form. "Girl, you alright? You don't seem yourself." Christine groaned. "I had to stay here all night the other night because Vicky doesn't understand how to do work on time." Alice wobbled over towards Christine and patted her on the shoulder, speaking through her pants from the exhaustion of walking from the elevator to the break room. "Sorry, girl. You'll...You'll get you some sleep tonight." Christie nodded. "Thanks, babe." She patted Alice on the small of her back. The action created two 'smacks' that jiggled Alice's gargantuan gut from her back fat rolls halfway through her massively blubbery torso.

Christina couldn't help but feel some extra fat on Alice's frame. "Not to be a bitch, but you're feeling a bit thicker than normal, girl. What's the deal?" Alice's mouth began twitching down- but then her old conversation with Courtney rolled over in her mind- No need to feel ashamed. You be you.

"Oh, just had some fun at the Opal Ox with Mel and my Sis last night." Christina replied in slight wonder, "You never told me you had a sister! Is she a big girl like us, or.." Melissa chuckled and shook her head, joined by Alice, as she said, "Ohh, fuck no. She's a fit nut, and she never lays off Al about her weight." Alice nodded. "It's been a bit hard the past week, but I think she's starting to come around to who I am." Christina smiled and chuckled. "That's good, at least! I can't imagine having a sister like that- my dad's hard on me enough about my weight as it is." Melissa chimed in, "For me it's Aunt BeeAnne. She's passive-aggressive about that, won't shut up about," she intoned in a loud, nasally voice, "Yeah, I don't eat those things. Calorie booombs!" and her face turned to one of anger as she continued on in her normal voice, "And she has the audacity to take out the scale if we're ever in the same house together. Fuckin' bitch." Alice nodded with an impressed face as she took a seat and began her normal routine of sipping at a coffee with far too much sugar and cream,and scarfing down donuts at Melissa's average of two a minute. "Sheesh. At least Steph is outright about it. I can't stand passive-aggressiveness. If you think I'm a whale, say I'm a whale! Shit!" Melissa and Christine gave a good chuckle.

The rest of the work day progressed well, to the conclusion of the day, and Alice returned home to drive Stephanie back to the Airport. As Stephanie hopped into the car and popped on her seatbelt after loading in her goods, the conversation mulled over Alice's work day. "Oh, yeah. My co-worker apparently had to stay overnight on Wednesday, day before yesterday, because someone was literally about to screw the whole department." Stephanie gasped. "God! That's crazy! Stay overnight, as in, all night?" Alice nodded. "Mhm. All night. Only thing that powered her through the day was coffee. Coffee, and a couple boxes of donuts." Stephanie turned to her. "A couple boxes? " Alice shrugged. "Yeah, a couple boxes." Stephanie crossed her arms as the drive paused at a stoplight. "I'm a little scared at how casual you reacat to someone literally eating several dozen donuts over the course of a day. That's over three times someone's daily calories." Alice nodded. "Yeah, I guess it might be a little overboard." Stephanie sighed. "I knew you were being casual about it because I knew you were taking part in it." Alice stared a bit ahead. She saw this coming, but she began to hear a hurtful kernel of truth in what Steph was saying. Perhaps she was overdoing it, just a bit. Stephanie continued as the car came toward the Airport. "I don't mean to be a bitch, because I saw you do some good work. I know you can do this. I'm worried about you, I'm worried about your health. I left a meal plan on your table. I know you can do this." She leant over to kiss Alice on the cheek. Alice leant over as much as she could to accept the kiss as she pulled up to the terminal. "Fly safe."

She watched her sister walk into the terminal. Maybe it was time for a minor change- not dedicated weight loss, but maybe time to slow it down.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: That Friday.

choices: The Crunch begins.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Courtney's eyes stayed latched on her screen as the glowing panel flipped between spreadsheets, note documents, and long trailing word documents full of headings, subheadings, and citations. Her fingers darted back and forth across her keyboard, typing a sentence or two, flipping to another screen, examining data, flipping back, typing, tabbing over to her notes to see where she'd planned to go from here.

It was some intense planning for a Pizza Monday, but it was a special occasion- it would be 6 months that Courtney'd been the boss at this branch of Gordge, and she'd done stellar work. Her multitasking kept her busy, but with her talent for multitasking, it also kept her full as her other hand could easily dart to a bag of chips, a sweet, a sugary drink. Courtney's waistline had been blooming, and her blouse attested to her growth. It was drum-tight at the navel, and barely any more slack towards her breasts, which were fattened in their own right. Her pants showed every curve in her thickening thighs, and the button held on by a prayer and a dream. Examining it too closely could cause the delicate brass creature to leave its station in Courtney's crammed pants.

Courtney's phone began ringing. Courtney tapped her hotkey to save her documents, and panned her chair towards the phone to pick up, her hand moving before her
taxed chair grumpily creaked in that direction. The sudden movement sloshed her stomach, and Courtney's leaning her head towards the phone put her brilliant second chin on full display as it dangled below her subtly pointed chin. She spoke. "Hello, Branch Manager Courtney. How can I help?" The familiar voice of Jenna rang on the other end. "Heyyyy, Courtney!" Courtney's face lit up, her blubbery cheeks perking up and her mouth drawing a thick smile. "Jen! Oh my god, how have you been?" Jenna spoke briefly but curtly, "Been good, been good." She broke off abruptly, uncharacteristic for her- she liked to go off on her tangents. "Listen, babe, Corporate's been riding my ass about your report." The sentence stunned Courtney. She could think of no response besides, "Report? Which one?" Jenna quickly replied, "The mid-year mark report. It's due end of next week."

Courtney's heart sank. The quarterly was a monster. The report that had processed from Christina was merely the mandatory biweekly report to the investors. One would think it would be a simple matter of compiling all reports, but it was far more than that- the sheer number of Biweekly's that had to be put together and the mountains of data would take the whole firm's effort. Courtney grimly but shakily replied, "Uh....Uh, yeah, I'll have that to you by then." Jenna spoke. "Thanks, babe. We'll talk more after that, sorry, if you're panicking about it, imagine the panic over here, it's five times worse. Gotta go. Got busy lines from eight departments. Bye babe." The phone clicked. Court had never heard Jenna that curt, quick, and to the point. It worried her immensely. The stress of the moment manifested in her grabbing two bags of cheetos, downing them in a few moments, and she picked up the phone. She began the process of talking to the department heads. This would be the mother of all crunch weeks.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: The Incoming Crunch.

choices: The crunch continues.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
The break room was populated at its usual population that afternoon. Alice was munching on a donut, as Melissa spoke up after a sip from her mug. "Al, what's up, has your sister gotten you on another diet or somethin'?" Alice shrugged. "Nah. Just tryin' to tone it down, y'know? Not going all Jenny Craig on you guys, just trying to spend less money on clothes." Alice patted her stomach for emphasis. Her recent gains had been meteoric, and this compromise somewhere between a diet and gluttony left her in just enough of a balance to not shred her clothes at the rate she had been. Christina spoke up as she grabbed two donuts. "More for me, then." She swallowed nearly one whole, and began to reach for a third to beat Melissa to a bavarian creme. "Yeet!" exclaimed Christina. Melissa surged for the donut, but Christina pushed her back with one hand holding her spare glazed donut while she used her other hand to bite into the creme donut. Melissa seized the exposed donut, and Christina's face grew wan. "Hey, no fair! C'mon!" Melissa chuckled through a full mouth as she bit through the glazed donut.

The break's jolly mood came to a crash as Courtney appeared in the doorway, her blubbery, breathless figure devoid of her usual characteristic cheer when interacting with her workers. "Guys...I hate to be the, the..." she paused to take a deeper breath, then resumed, "The bearer of bad news, but we need to compile the mid-year, and it's due by the end of the week." The room grew silent as the herd digested their donuts and coffee. The group seemed to be stunned, but Courtney pressed the point in an urgent voice. "As in, breaktime needs to end and you guys need to get cracking. We can't waste a single hour." The group stood up and walked back to their desks with mugs of coffee and a few snacks.

The office hallway filled with the clicking and tapping of fingers on keyboards, combined with the rustling of plastic packages as the blubbery office workers crunched through bags of snacks that would last normal workers a few weeks, which, in this office ran about one day on a normal day. But this day was no normal day. Alice grimaced as she pressed herself to try to keep her calm and not return to the gluttony she'd just begun to try to curb. She leant into her keyboard, her strokes landing heavier as she tabbed in and out, checking over her work, making sure her numbers were accurate. For now, the sugar high was keeping her on top of her work. As time went on, though, the sugar wasn't enough. The sheets seemed to be endless. She gave in - she reasoned with herself that she wasn't necessarily dieting - it was okay to splurge if it meant getting through her workday.

Melissa and Christina were shamelessly powering themselves through their mountains of work with salty foods, but their reliance on it slowed them ever so slightly. Their bags of snacks ran low soon - they had to break into their cabinets sooner, precious minutes that slowed their work. Even Victoria was putting work in, but she was still more preoccupied with the food than her work. Her belly had balanced out her gains in her thighs and breasts, growing with each bag of chips and cheese snacks she swallowed. Her new blouse that she had bought the past saturday was beginning to countenance the vastness of her stomach which bloated as Victoria ate on. Thankfully for Victoria, she was pragmatic yet sensible with her fashion- this blouse had plenty of stretch, it would sooner ride up than rip. Eventually, Victoria actually filled up and could focus on her work. By that point, her blouse was riding up by a good inch, hinting at her navel.

Courtney spent the day frantically e-mailling and calling, stuffing her face in between calls, e-mails,and compiling finished sheets as they came in. She was almost a master at managing exact timing between calls, able to perfectly time swallowing, chewing. Her poison of choice were sweets - fairly annoying in that they needed unwrapping, but Courtney had that down to an exact science- peel it open from the top just enough to retreive the goodies inside, discard the plastic, begin eating. She was less eating to occupy herself as her workers were as she was to try to calm her nerves. As a result of this and her obsession with keeping good time, she was less eating the sweets so much as she was inhaling them- give them a good two chews then swallow. They were soft enough that they'd dissolve of their own accord going down. Her nerves were able to create a bottomless pit effect for her stomach- her dress began to tighten to epic proportions.

Five o'clock rolled around, and Victoria had already stood up and was nearly halfway to the door when Courtney called from her desk. "If you guys could stick around for overtime, it'd be REALLY appreciated." Victoria continued out the door, and Melissa followed her. Alice and Christina remained, along with Courtney. Alice spoke up. "I'm going to order a pizza for delivery if that's okay." Courtney called. "Yeah, yeah, should be fine." The office was nearly dead-silent. The pizzas arrived about thirty minutes later- Alice's jiggling form hurried to collect the three boxes. The black heavyset delivery man's red work shirt hung over his belt as the young man raised an eyebrow at the clacking. "Man, y'all working hard. What's up?" Alice grabbed the boxes and turned off with no explanation. The delivery boy grunted at the lack of a tip, and walked away.

Alice's belly jiggled and shook as she dropped a pizza off at Courtney and Christina's desks. Her bloated massive belly, which hung down halfway towards her knees, was stuffed with food, but she was beginning to become numb to the sensation of fullness- she was now stuffing herself just to keep her mouth occupied, as now was Christina. Courtney's dress had stretch build in, but Courtney could feel it beginning to give - she'd barely touched her pizza, but she unconciously kept reaching for slices and working. She was focusing on the job. Her brain was on a sole task. Alice's loosening blouse was now riding up above her navel, and Courtney had unbuckled her dress pants and her belly began to spill into her lap as she crammed pizza and cheese snacks into her mouth while she worked. About an hour passed before the trio tried to leave. Alice grunted and groaned, but was able to roll out of her chair to a standing position. Courtney and Christina tried, but couldn't do it. They checked their chairs - their bloated stomachs were pinning them in. They had to fold their side flab back in through the arms, and stood with force. Christina had forgotten her pants were unbuttoned- they slid down, her undergarments being quickly hidden by her massive stomach. Her thighs were thick with fat, approaching the size of a maturing tree trunk. Embarassed, she pulled her pants up, and tried to force the button back in. She sucked in her gut, tried everything she could, but the button was centimeters off the mark. She took to the fat girl's best friend- a safety pin. She pinned the pants closed as she walked out of the office.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: The Crunch begins.

choices: The gang meets up Friday night.
Jenna visits - and she's gotten WAY fatter!
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
That Wednesday had come as the herd shuffled off the elevators. The crunch on the mid-year report had taken a toll on the group. Melissa's face had swollen with grumpiness, Christina's face had turned to stone-like indifference, and Alice looked eternally exhausted. In addition to the endless snacking at the office, the pack had also been indulging at home. And while normally even these weighty women would be full from the amount of eating they'd been doing for the past week, nothing can create false hunger like stress.

The blouse which Alice had freshly bought that weekend was beginning to truly introduce itself to Alice's stomach. The frills and puffs of the blouse in more places bound themselves to Alice's green blouse, especially around the navel. This morning hour was normally a golden hour of chuckles, conversations, and greetings.

However, the deathly silence which bound the office itself told of the grim mood of the office.

In a few short minutes as the band of blubbery ladies had reached their computers, the only sounds that filled the office were the sounds of opening bags and the clacking of keyboards. The dim mood of the office put a cloud on everyone's mind. Even if they had desired to converse with someone else, they were either A, too busy stuffing their face to focus, or B, too busy working to talk. The same pattern as Monday had come on, but the stress of the week had begun to pile up. In with the friends had come fresh restocks of their supplies, and at the moment, things seemed to be holding.

Victoria, however, had slipped - she had undercalculated. If the others' low morale had resulted in determination to finish the project, her low morale had made her even lazier. She had her blubbery legs propped up on her desk as she scarfed down entire share packages of snack cakes. The others were eating over-filled handfuls of treats and snacks, but Victoria was going beyond this. Her blubbery face was becoming coated in a layer of salty snack residue and chocolate smears. Her mind bounded onto any other topic than work. That funny meme she'd just read - where was it from? She remembered she'd seen it with Alice while out over the weekend - maybe she knew?

The thick office atmosphere was cut like a knife by Victoria's voice as she, too lazy to get up from her desk, yelled out, "Hey, Al." Alice did not reply. "Al!" The second call was getting to be too much for the others. Melissa gritted her teeth and mumbled under her breath, "This bitch..." There were about three beats of deathly silence. The sound of a creaking chair and a groan from Victoria's office. The sound of feet coming to bear Victoria's heavy weight upon the floor, then the sound of her preponderance stepping across the floor. Each and every heavy step of the way brought more anxiety. Eventually, Victoria's feet stopped on the ninth step. Alice looked up from her computer.

Alice was not having a good day by any standard. She'd looked in the mirror this morning and felt dissapointed at herself after having broken her promise to her sister about toning down. She'd even e-mailed her sister about how she'd hit her calorie goal this past Sunday, and gotten a congratulatory e-mail back. She was not happy at having her attempt to calm down broken by the stress of the crunch.

The last thing she needed was Victoria's grating voice.

"Hey, Al." Alice stared death into Victoria's eyes. Still no reply.
"When did you show me that meme, the one with the turtle laying upside down, like, "It's me on monday at the office?"

Alice thundered back. "Vic, girl, I'm trying to WORK here. Pleeease." Victoria shrugged. "Fiiine." She stomped off. But not nine steps back into her office, but four to the right into the break room across the hallway, next to Melissa's office. Melissa looked across at Alice. Both of the ladies grimaced at each other as Alice rolled her eyes nearly into the back of her head. Melissa nodded, and mouthed "Same."

Christina had kept her head down and said nothing. She cringed horrifically, but she didn't take the time to e-mail Courtney about it. She figured that if her plate was full, Courtney's plate was stuffed. The mid-year report itself was actually coming along very well - it turns out that when the Gordge girls got their heads down, and into the work (Albeit with a hand in a bag of chips on the side) they could crank it out. Halfway through the week, the report was now at around 80 percent done.

However, Christina's blouse was 100 percent overstretched. Her stomach was half-hanging out of her navy blue blouse, taut and round, completely stuffed. In the past, her belly could barely tickle the edge of the table. But now, her stomach rubbed the table sorely.

If the stress eating was pushing Christina's blouse to the breaking point, Courtney's stress eating had ruined hers. Her blouse, special tailor-made, was burgeoning with her stomach. Her pants were already unbuttoned, and had been since 11. Her growing fatness had been bringing her airtight blouse to its breaking limit for a while now - her fat arms had to be practically jammed into their sleeves, and took nearly a set of pliers to remove. Her shirt had run out of looseness about two months back, but now, the seams strained to exist.

By 5 O'Clock, nobody had even begun to pack up. Victoria had spent the whole day in the break room since her fiasco at noon, gorging herself on the donuts procured by Courtney's reforms. By 5, she had actually started feeling full. This had a side-effect, though - she was stuck in the break room chair.

"Guys? I'm stuck."

"Where?" echoed out Alice's voice.

"The break room. I'm stuck in this chair."

Melissa spoke up. "Join the gang. I'm just gonna stay for overtime. Maybe you should too. Might actually get some work done."

Victoria roared back. "Ex-CUSE ME? I've been working hard!"

"Working hard to bust out of your skirt, you bloated Italian rat!"

Courtney screeched from her office. "IF I HEAR ONE MORE WORD OUT OF ANYONE'S MOUTH, SO HELP ME GOD, I'M BUSTING YOU DOWN TO JANITORIAL PAY."

The office was once again silent. By 7, the dreaded mid-year had finished. But the toll on the workers' waistlines was to prove to be significant. On average, the whole firm had gained around 10 pounds from stress eating. Alice and Melissa had busted that to 20. Alice couldn't even fasten her dress pants by the end of the day, even at home, and even after her food had digested.

Courtney had bested that to reach 30 more pounds, and Christine was at 25 additional pounds. The half-week of non-stop binging had ruined nearly everyone's wardrobe, and certainly had ruined Alice's proposed demi-diet - at least for the moment.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: The end of the crunch.

choices: Alice tries to breach the gap between Victoria and the Group.
Christina's having issues trying to hold down her food consumption.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
The wooden floor of the same bar where Melissa, Alice and Stephanie met creaked under the thunderous steps of the blubbery ladies which now crossed it. Melissa's bloated form entered the bar first. Her dress shirt was tightly drawn across her bulging stomach which could not be contained by its cooperation nor the cooperation of the skirt below, which created a shelf of stomach hanging over the skirt thinly covered by the black dress shirt. By this point, Melissa had abandoned buttons - as an ever-expanding woman, she had discovered a long time ago that buttons were an obstruction to her wanton gluttony, and required much too much sewing. Her belly, having expanded to titanic proportions, drifted ever downward towards her knees, meeting the goal whenever Melissa sat down. The same shirt which Melissa had been wearing the past week had started this week far looser, and Melissa's stomach occasionally met the fabric, but now the two were nearly melded together on a constant basis. Seams were beginning to pop and strain.

"So, the real question, ladies." spoke Melissa as Alice's fattened form entered the room after, wearing a drum-tight blue dress which groaned under the stress of Alice's bluging belly. "What flavor of wings?" Alice chimed in. "Hot wings!" Courtney seconded Alice, chiming in just after, "Hot wings!" Christina spoke up. "Garlic Parm?" Victoria was absent from the gathering - she was still feeling stung from Wednesday, and was absolutely glum on Thursday. Not a word between her and the rest was exchanged, and she spent most of the day in her office eating. Alice spoke up after. "How about let's do the wing split option? The sixty wings come with several flavors." "Yes! Thank you!" replied Christina in a gracious tone. The pack reached the bar and took their stools, and the Bartender leaned in. "Hey, ladies. What can I get you?" Alice chimed in, "What kind of IPA's do you have?" The bartender listed off, "We have Blue Dream Pale Ale, Kick My Teeth Stout, Derniere Lager, Brousvaarden White.." Alice stopped him. "Gimme the Derniere." Melissa followed. "Gimme Jack D. None of that hipster shit." Christina spoke up. "Eh, Budweiser." Courtney spoke up. "Uh, hit me with some Jameson Scotch. Oh, and we'll have the Sixty wing bucket." The bartneder nodded. "Okay, what flavors?" Alice spoke up. "Uh, Hot wings and Garlic Parm." "So, half and half?" asked the bartender. "Yeah, half and half." replied Christina.

The bartender gave over the selected drink choices to the fattened ladies. Christina began sipping on hers. Christina was wearing one of her older blouses, which she had hoped to use to replace her work blouse - but before a single wing was consumed, it was obvious that it would be inadequate. The bottom of her stomach was peeking out of the chartreuse blouse, and every part of her blouse was stretched to full, with a few bits of folding clothing in patches where the tightness wasn't as bad. Her jeans were doing double-duty, however. It was only by the grace of God and some of the most intensive athletic work Christina had done in the past three years that she'd been able to button the Jeans, and she was fairly certain she'd have to unbutton her Jeans - a task which she undertook while opening up the conversation. "You think we were hard on Victoria?"

Melissa scoffed while beginning to sip on her whiskey. "Fuck no. She doesn't wanna pull her weight, she can work at a chinese buffet if she wants to do nothing but eat all day." Courtney jokingly coughed. "I said NOTHING but eat all day." Courtney shrugged. "True, true. I will say, Victoria needs to get her shit together. There's enjoying yourself at work, and there's what she's doing - I have half a mind to ration the donuts in her case." She mindfully looked to her own blubber. "And maybe even in mine - this crunch has done a number on my belly." Christina spoke up. "Shit, how do you think I feel? I could barely button these jeans tonight, and I -thought- this blouse would fit. It fit fine like, a week ago." Alice followed, "You think that's bad, my poor spanx could barely come on. I was -trying- to chill out on the eating before that damn crunch hit." Melissa spoke up. "See, that's where you went wrong. Also, spanx? Why bother?" Alice turned to Melissa. "Unlike you, I like to -try- to fit into my clothes." Melissa spoke up. "My clothes fit me! Well... Most of me. Not my fault that my shirts can't deal!"

The wings finally came about, and the ladies dove in. "Well, all I know is, you ladies sound like you're about to propose something stupid." Christina spoke up. "How is trying to chill out on our food consumption stupid?" Alice nodded. "Yeah. I like that green blouse I got, and the poor baby's about to die out in like a week. How about let's not necessarily try to LOSE weight, but just try to stay the same for a while? Long enough to build up a wardrobe for when we eventually get fatter, at least." Courtney spoke up through a mouthful of wings. "That sounds reasonable. But how would you incentivise that? More food?" Almost everyone's eyes lit up. Alice spoke up. "If the point is to try to help us build our wardrobes back up, how about some coupons for one of the clothes outlets around here? Or does George give out any gift cards?" Christina lit up. "Yes! YES! A gift card from George's!"

And thus, the gang celebrated the idea. By the end of the night, they'd ordered another bucket of wings - and a few more beers each. The night became a blur, but the idea of the gift card from George's remained. Whenever the contest began, one thing was certain - this herd of hippos was going to have a problem limiting what they ate.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Back at Blue Door

choices: Christina is trying to fall back on her old fit girl routine. It's not working.
Courtney's got another crisis - Corporate's about to sell out to a fitness corp.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Alice tugged at her green blouse, struggling to keep it tucked neatly into her pants. "Damnit," she mumbled, "I need'a cut back on those donuts..." Alice rubbed at her intensely bloated gut. Her shame began creeping back in through a back door as she beheld the damage done by her unchecked gluttony. She'd checked for upper sizes - one of her favored hobbies when trying to de-stress at work - and found none in a pattern or fabric she liked. This green blouse was the line in the sand for her - further would mean degrading herself to wearing what she considered to be little better than loincloth.

She strode thunderingly out of the elevator. Not that she was trying to thunder out, but her sheer weight made her average, normal steps sound as if a giant were flicking the floor with its thumb. Loud steps were no stranger to the walls of the office, but their loudness had even been alarming its enlarging occupants, normally so blissfully unaware of their constant fleshy expansion. Alice popped by the break room, but she found herself automatically walking towards the donut box. It had become an unconscious routine of hers, even going so far as to open the box and reach for a chocolate eclair. Then she had remembered as she held it and looked back down at her gargantuan, blob-like torso. She firmly turned her back to the box and grabbed a mug of coffee, and filled it with the hot black concoction which brought life in the office, and walked back to her office. She unconsciously began munching on the eclair she had forgotten to put down, and only recognized its existance as she began to sit down. She groaned, angered by her own lack of self control. She remembered the lectures her sister had given her on her last visit as she threw half of the eclair away in an iron display of willpower from Alice.

As Alice drug herself through her work - occasionally checking her distraction sites to keep herself sane - she woefully recalled the breach between Victoria and the rest of the group. She didn't see victoria in the break room, scarfing down far too many donuts even by the standards of the horrifically fat women of Gordge. She figured she was likely in her office eating more of her preferred treats from her private hoard.

Alice felt a pang of sorrow, though - Victoria knew how to bring the fun at office parties. She could be a shoulder to cry on for many people. It became clear to Alice that it was unfair to judge Vicky by one bad crunch week. She began attempting to piece together an idea to try to bring Victoria back into the fold. How would she do that, though? Fun and parties are one thing, but those are the exceptions in an office? Then she remembered - Easter was around the bend, and by that time Alice wagered that if anyone was still on these demi-diets, they'd be on the breaking point. Alice smirked - she had confidence in her plan.

Alice began typing up an e-mail to Victoria detailing the basics of her plan. She heard a groan from across the hall, approximately from Melissa's office. Alice turned to the sound and got up, waddling and breaking a sweat to get to her doorway. "What's wrong, Mel?" Melissa spoke back. "I've only had one donut today and I don't know if I can make it without number twooo.." Alice spoke up. "I'm feeling you, girlie." She rested a hand on her stomach, rising and falling from the exertion of the short walk Alice put herself through to get herself up and walk to Melissa's office. "I had to stop myself halfway through an eclair," she said, pausing for a gasp, "I don't know if I can make it." "That's not reassuring, Al." replied Melissa, leaning back in her overtaxed office chair, the gravity making her double-chin far more pronounced as it hung down towards her collar, just tickling the edge. "You're supposed to be the diet mom of the office stopping us from getting here, if you're having this issue, what hope do we have?" Alice shook her head, getting some breath back. "I don't know, I don't know." The two respectively stood and sat in the area, taking a breath before Alice spoke again. "So what do you think about an easter party?" Melissa spoke up. "Ooh, an easter office party! That'll be awesome!" She took a pause for a breath, and spoke. "Who do you think could get the food for that?" Alice spoke up. "I was thiiinkiiing..." She leaned her head towards Victoria. Melissa cast an unsure glance at the ground and then took a pensive facial posture. "Well... She does love her some food... Maybe she'd be good at that."
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Alice the Diplomat.

choices: Alice gets around to Victoria, and the plan is coming together.
Melissa is...doing well?
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Christina leaned on her desk as she focused on the lines on her computer. The main issue was that there was nothing much to do.

Christina had gone whole skinny hog on the problem of her rising weight. She had mentally mapped her whole plan - she'd go back on meal prepping and go to the gym after the office. She figured she could cut back really easy - she did this all the time back in the day, why can't she just do it now? She had prepped a chicken and rice for today and had it very near at hand - she wouldn't be caught in the trap of even going for a donut. She kept herself busy with anything she could find - checking up on her templates and refreshing her e-mail. But it wasn't working. Christina was unable to truly stay busy. She picked up the phone - if she couldn't stay busy with what she has, she'd find something to do. Even if that meant calling Courtney.

Courtney's phone rang, and the blubbery suit picked it up. "Hello, this is Courtney." "Courtney, hey, it's Christie. Got anything you need doing?" Courtney hummed, and spoke. "If you could call Jenna and ask about the schedule for the next audit, that'd be great." "Great," replied Christina. "Anything else you need?" Courtney cocked an eye into the phone - this was unlike Christina. "Uh... could you e-mail Hiring and get them to hire another intern?" "Will do," spoke Christina. Surely enough, as Courtney prepared to put down the phone, she faintly heard, "Anything else?" Courtney annoyedly spoke. "Yeah, grab me a pizza from Dannio's around the corner after those calls. That's it." She hung up before Christina could say anything else.

Christina was happy to have something else to do than hit F5 all day as she simply dialed the extension to talk to Jenna. A few rings, and Jenna's familiar voice came over the phone. "Hello, Jenna here. How can I help?" Christina spoke. "Hey Jen! It's me, Christina! Courtney wants to know what the schedule for the next audit is." Jenna replied, "Hey, Christina! Yeah, uhhhh...." She paused, taking a breath, "I think it's scheduled for next month, May 13th, 3:00 over here." Christina nodded and spoke. "Alright, sounds great." Christina continued on, wanting to blow as much time not eating as possible. "So, how's it over there, Jenna?" "Oh, it's great!" replied Jenna. "They have a 24/7 Pizza bar, and it's great!" She took a moment to take a breather, audible through the phone. "It's not been great for my waistline, though. I swear I've gained fifty pounds while I was here. I might have to cut back so that I can actually wear clothes." Christina spoke. "Same, sister. We're all trying to cut back over here - Alice has been going crazy recently and we're all trying to extend our wardrobe's lifetimes." Jenna chuckled and spoke through the phone after a gasp. "Well, I've got to get back to work- Nice talking to you, Christina!" Christina spoke in reply, "Bye!" The clunk of Jenna's phone sounded into Christina's end, as she hung up in reply. It was not too reassuring to hear that Jenna had kept stuffing herself, but Christina tried to take heart that Jenna was going through something like the same thing.

Christina typed up an email to hiring - she wanted to put the phone down, especially as her arm strength was not what it had been and she was beginning to physically tire of talking on the phone. Christina made a mental note to go for a jog after work. She rocked her mass to her feet, and thudded towards the stairs - she figured she would try to get some cardiovascular health back as soon as she could. She opened the door - creaky from disuse, and leaned forward to try and see over her massive gut. She managed to do so and picked her way down, each step down feeling like someone giving a massive jiggle to her gut - making her breathless by motion downward and not even accounting for her difficulties simply walking. She kept descending as fast as possible, but her forehead became drenched in sweat as she got further down. Eventually, she did reach the bottom of the stairs, but she was absolutely out of breath and felt like her heart was trying to leap directly through her chest cavity. She breathlessly trudged towards her car, as her stomach groaned from lack of food at its regular massive rate. Christina managed to get over to her parking space and opened her car door, sliding in and rocking her vehicle back and then forth. She struggled to pull down the seatbelt but sweat blocked her vision. She wiggled the metal of the buckle back and forth until she eventually heard a click as the oppressive heat of the interior of her sun-warmed car doubled her sweating. She cranked her car as fast as possible and turned on the A/C.

By the time Christina returned, she came back with two pizzas - both meat lovers, if she remembered Courtney's order right. She had stopped for a snack to calm her stomach so she could get back to her meal prep. She trudged towards the elevator - she wasn't insane enough to believe that her massive form could trudge up four flights of stairs when she nearly had a heart attack from simply trying to go down. The elevator was chugging today, though, and her stomach demanded tribute. Christina gritted her teeth - she was determined to hold on just a little longer. Eventually the elevator arrived, though every minute was like an hour until she finally trudged toward Courtney's office. As she approached, she saw Courtney munching on a pizza. "Oh, Christie." she spoke, though a full mouth. "Sorry, but I already ordered delivery. You can keep those two, though! Sorry!"

Two boxes of pizza later, Christina unbuckled her burgeoning pants. She groaned as she came to a realization - cutting back was going to be much harder than she had thought.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Christina's distraction diet.

choices: Easter and the party comes around.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Alice groaned as the next week had rolled onward and her green blouse grew tighter.

Though she had sworn that she would keep her gorging down, she couldn't stop herself from an "accident" or two a day. The sugary, calorie-laden "accidents" were taking a toll on Alice's waistline - it must have gone up another inch. She was ever so slightly more sweaty and exhausted as she made the long trek from the elevator to her office. Her pants became that minute longer to put on. Her stomach's fullness was becoming more pronounced, and the top of her stomach was forming something of a 'shelf' as it edged outwards, forming the very cradle of a massive blob-like gut that doubled up on itself.

She was beginning to reach the end of her patience one week in, and she was perplexed. Wasn't she the one with all the self control? That was who she was. Almost as if a sign, she noticed a lack of thunderous footsteps that bore Melissa's waddling pattern. Melissa happily sat in her office, focusing and typing away at her computer as Alice leaned and examined Melissa. Alice had to look hard past her own fattened face, but she could almost swear that Melissa hadn't gained a pound.

This was an oddity - at about this time, she'd always hear Melissa stomping to the donut room. She'd heard it last week plenty - but come to think of it, last week's end, she was making fewer trips. Was it possible that Melissa was actually cutting back? Alice struggled upwards, her first effort resulting in failure as her 500 pound form came back into her chair. The attempt left her breathless as she panted to get her strength back. She grappled with her desk and strained her calves to support her massive weight, after a groan and a supreme effort, succeeding. She took a moment to catch her breath, and then thudded towards Melissa's office. The office could begin to tell how the "weight" was shifting - Alice's footsteps had become that micro-decibel louder than Melissa's as her form became that extra bit fatter and Melissa's remained the same.

Alice panted from the exhaustion of walking across the hall. "How the hell.." she began, sputtering out of breath before she could finish. Melissa finished for her, "I'unno. Guess I'm just tired of Donuts." It was like hearing a body snatcher talking through Melissa's lips. Melissa surveyed Alice's form - her arms were beginning to fatten out, starting to form a ham-like appendage around her bicep with the fatness of her bingo wings and the lard on the arm itself. "How the hell can you be..." spoke Alice, gasping for breath mid-sentence, "tired of donuts? You're Mel!" Melissa shrugged. "I mean, folks change." Alice shook her head. She still thought of Melissa as the larger of the pair - she always thought like that. Christina chimed in from her office. "I swear to god I'm three dress sizes from just giving up and going naked." Alice leaned to look at her. "I feel you, girl."

Christina was barely keeping pace with Melissa, barely maintaining her weight. If she had gained a pound, it wasn't obvious. "Christie, I'm literally about to break down." spoke Alice. "I just can't deal, I can't stop fucking eating even when I want to" Melissa stood up with a grunt and a gasp, and waddled to Alice, struggling to fit an arm around Alice's roll-proliferated back, patting it and shaking her gut mightily with the contact. "There there, Al." spoke Melissa. "You know, if you want, we can take a walk." Alice sniffled. "I-I could try."

The two took off at a pig-trot, and for approaching the first time, Melissa was ahead of Alice as the blubbery, porcine woman thudded breathlessly behind Melissa. "You okay, Al?" spoke Melissa. "You really don't sound so hot." Alice spoke. "Ij'st..." She gasped, speaking hoarsely. "Needt'...siddown." She wobbled her way to an open bench, plopping down. Melissa thought about taking a seat next to her, but Alice took up the entire bench with her vastness. Her shirt was drenched in sweat. "Wh... Wh't happen'd to me?" spoke Alice. Melissa comforted her friend. "You've just gotten a little bigger, Al." Alice grabbed her gut for emphasis "A little? Melissa, I'm fucking massive! I can't walk properly, I can..." she took a few breaths "I can't breath properly.. If I keep going like this, I won't be able to walk or breathe at all."

Melissa took a while and breathed the air. She began to fully appreciate the moment. She rubbed Alice's back. "Al, it's no shame to be bigger than other folks. How do you think I felt when I became, literally, the biggest girl on the block?" spoke Melissa. A beat passed as a Taxi honked and its driver screamed an obscenity at an SUV which nearly swerved into its lane. "It wasn't easy for me. I tried to diet for god knows how long. I might, might, several years later just now be about to start one that's actually successful." Alice hung her head a bit. She had always assumed Melissa never cared about being the fattest girl on the office. It began to dawn on Alice beyond her own speculation that she had assumed the title. The moment had come like falling through a trap-door onto a prepared mattress - there was still some shock in the moment, but cushioned by the understanding acquired by Alice for a while. Melissa comforted Alice. "So what if you're the biggest girl now? Enjoy it! One day, you might be back to being smaller. Maybe sooner, maybe later. That's life. You're a different person at different times, based on what goes on. Hell, places change. Who knows? We might be the oddballs out one day, and the rest of the company's taken over by Cali health nuts. Time goes on and the best we can do is roll with it." Alice chuckled and spoke up. "In our state, literally."

The two shared a good laugh in the street, a pair of laughing fat women in a busy April city street together. Melissa's mind turned back to Victoria as the stone grudge began to soften and melt.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: People change.

choices: Alice's eating turns to binging. The office gets concerned.
Victoria tries to work harder, fueled by donuts.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
The day of the party had finally come. The skinny(ish) interns and ground-floor workers prepped the conference room. It had all the extravagance that a Gordge party should have. There were two full pizza buffets, a gorgeous array of cakes, donuts to be generously consumed, and row upon row of two-liters of soda.

Alice's gut was the first in, followed by the rest of her immense, flabby corpus. She had planned the party at first, but had left much of the detail down to others. She couldn't resist thudding over towards the pizza and "sampling" the goods, opening a box and shamelessly eating a slice of meat-lovers. She was wearing her blue dress, but it was becoming far too stretched to be called anything short of enhanced nakedness. Every one of her multiple rolls along her back was visible, and her mighty love handles which had become more pronounced in the week leading up to Easter had only grown, to say nothing of her expanded stomach. She was beginning to plainly take Melissa's place for gluttony, and had begun to plainly surpass her in girth.

Eventually the others panted in. First was Christina. She had padded her belly ever so slightly, but not to the degree that Alice had. If there was any pretense before, it was obvious now that Alice was giving up on restraining herself. Christina waddled over towards Alice. "I gotta say, girly. This is gonna be good. I've been holding back a lot recently, it'll be good to let go." Alice chuckled. "Same here. Though, to be honest, I've let go a lot more since last friday. when Mel and I took a walk." It seems like it's the last walk she took since then, thought Christina. Even to Christina, Alice's size was becoming a bit much. Christina, aiming for the beam in Alice's eye, could not pluck the log from her own, seeming to miss her expanded stomach.

Following was Melissa. Infuriatingly, she seemed to stick to her program. Did her dress actually fit better today? "Okay, come on Melissa, now you're just showing off." Melissa faux-strutted. She still wobbled greatly, her gut shaking side to side as she did so, but less than normal, some unseen muscle seeming to check the bounce. Quite plainly, something was changing about her. Melissa spoke up. "Alright, I'll budge. I've been visiting that gym Steph took us to." Alice cackled and Christina chortled, as Alice followed her burst of laughter, "Of the two of us...You were the one who followed Steph's...Advice..." Alice took a moment to breathe as her laughter wore down, exhausted by this vigorous exercise.

Courtney and Victoria were soon next up. Victoria's orange tan was as radiant as ever, but it was quite obvious she had more than kept up with the pack with her gains. Her ample rear and thighs had taken a great blow by her gorging, and she had CERTAINLY grown from when she last truly communicated with the rest. But she was slowed by her lack of partaking in the office ritual of donuts and coffee every other hour. The walking horde of blubber lifted their bingo wings and cheered, "Vicky!" They embraced Victoria, looking like a great singular organism of fattened bellies and limbs, all panting and heaving, their guts rising and falling in rhythm.

As they parted, some eyes passed Courtney. She was able to absorb herself in work to the extent that she was able to avoid the gains of Christina and especially not the outright surrender of Alice. However, she was certainly not unscathed. Her stomach and calves fattened just slightly. However, next to the whale that was Alice, she went virtually un-noticed. Everyone talked, even fat Jessica from the higher end of the ground-floor workers. The fact that Alice was gaining and Melissa was, in fact, losing, weight, was shocking. "So, Vick, how's things been?" asked Melissa. Victoria shrugged and spoke up. "Better than crunch week - God, I thought I was gonna die." Alice chimed in, having grabbed three slices of pizza, forming a grotesque kind of "'Pizza Sandwich.' "We all did, sis."

She bit into the tip. Nobody said a word - everyone tried to continue talking, but some worried glances were cast Alice's way. It seemed as though this was but the tip of the iceberg. Christina followed, though. She folded the slices and ate them one atop the other, but only going two-deep. "Hey, save some for me!" spoke Courtney, followed by Victoria. The pizza boxes were being raided hard by the pack - thus,the reason for two pizza buffets. Melissa engaged in double-fisting individual slices, but none could match Alice, who took to a similar practice with her triple-stacks. Melissa and Victoria spoke while Christina listened. Alice seemed focused on the pizza for a moment longer, but came to the conversation having killed a whole pizza in a matter of a few minutes. "So, Mel, you're looking pretty slender! What's the secret?" Melissa nodded. She couldn't contain the smile on her face. "Thanks, it's really just holding back on the donuts - we'd made a bet that whoever could hold back enough could win a gift card to George's tailor shop." Victoria sighed in annoyance. "Damnit, sucks that I missed out on that. I would have loved that. I love his women's suits -they fit my form so well. What do you think you'll get there?" Melissa spoke. "Well, I'unno. I might pass it on to Al - it's looking like she'll need it more than me." The blue dress' straps were digging into the fat, meaty shoulders of Alice, as her blue dress strained to bursting to contain her great, heavy stomach. She replied merely by eating more pizza.

While the night came to an end, the air had cleared almost to a crystal degree. Victoria was one hundred percent back in the group.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: The Easter Party.

choices: Courtney knows what to do - get Alice to a therapist.
Alice's behavior has consequences.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
"How did she spend so much on it?" rang out Christina's voice as the gaggle of blubbery women trudged towards the elevator. "It was becuase it was a real small breed - real tiny thing, but she's so cute." spoke Victoria. Easter had come and gone and the company was now in the dawning days of May. Christina's gains had slowed, but still trudged on as the ponderous woman led the way into the ritzy elevator. Her well-rounded gains had resulted in both the need for a new pair of work pants which hid her gains and a fresh new blouse bought to cheer her up. In part, this was also to hide her mid-400's pound weight from herself.

Melissa followed Victoria. "I can't get why someone would get a dog. I've always been a cat gal. Dogs are too damn hyper." Christina spoke up. "Yeah, but they're sooo-o loving! I love the little scritch-scratch at the door when I wake up. Cats just don't give a shit." The elevator carried the group upward.

As the elevator arrived at its destination and the familiar floral patterned hallway of their floor, they trudged onward. Halfway, Christina and Victoria's stomachs rose and fell with increasing frequency as they panted from the effort. Melissa spoke up, somewhat belabored but not as much as the duo, "You can make it. Almost there." Melissa's old blouse was slightly baggier than the easter party - if she had lost weight, it was a slight amount.

Something was wrong, though. Normally by now, the smell of freshly-brewed coffee and donuts would be wafting into their nose from the quickly approaching break room. There was a sole donut container remaining of the normal mountain of donuts. It was shocking - this had never happened before. "What the hell?" said Christina. The source of the shortage of the donuts soon became evident with the sound of hog-like stuffing down the hall and to the right.

Alice had fundamentally changed since the easter party. The words implanted into her mind by Melissa did not merely stop Alice's woes, they made her turn down a whole new road. If she was going to be the fattest girl in the office, why not embrace it? The Dionysian gluttony was plain by the machine-gun like rate at which Alice ate pastries and delicacies. She consumed a massive eclair in three bites with one hand while she continued her work with her other. For the second, she truly did have to stretch, however. She had to lean forward, scrunching her wide girth directly up to her desk as she could feel her panting breaths between bites of food. Even then, she had to reach over a good two feet to access her keyboard, her fat and flabby forearm covering a good portion of the desk where they rested.

Her green blouse had disappeared from her repertoire, gone to 'the closet' wherein every fat woman keeps the clothes slain by her gains, shelved off to the side from her current tent-like garments. Even these were being quickly taxed. It was barely two weeks after Easter, after which Alice had bought her current lilac blouse, and it was already beginning to stretch across her stomach with some effort. It was mesmerizing to see Alice eat the amount she was eating. It occurred to the onlookers whether or not she was even breathing or trying to replace it with food. It was clear to any who were looking that Alice had broken 500 pounds, while most of the office still hovered around 350-450. She was rocketing upwards, at around 530, maybe even 540.

The gaggle withdrew into the break room and sat with coffee, finishing off the last box of donuts and pressing a handy little button installed to alert interns that more were needed. They whispered to each other and turned on the radio to the Marni and Cass show for noise. "Jesus, I'm getting kinda scared about Alice." said Christina. "Yeah," said Victoria, "She's really overdoing it. I think she's got a problem." Melissa's face grew grim. "I don't know. It's not like her. She's been eating more for a while now, but not like this."

Alice heard some mumbling. She didn't have to guess what it was about. It was about her. She looked wistfully at her great, rolling gut as she fed its growth with a chocolate-filled chocolate donut. Stupid, always hungry gut. She fed herself more and more in this cycle fed not just by sheer gluttony, but also out of no small amount of self-loathing. She was feeding herself as punishment for eating too much. It was illogical to be sure, but her mind was beginning to lose logic in the aftermath of her altered status in the office and recognize its own change.

As the day went on, it seemed as though Interns were bringing bags of fast food every other hour to Alice's office. She kept eating more and more, a day's worth of calories in each bag. It was never enough. After the day ended, Alice drove back to her home and sat on the couch with an array of delivered pizzas, finishing two before the night went out. Her feeding became less about punishment and more about addiction. Everybody recognized the problem, but nobody knew what to do.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Alice's problem gets worse.

choices: Next
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
"Oh, come on, I can do this!"

Alice kept thinking that mantra to herself, unable to speak it and keep her limited breath at the same time.

"This is where we separate the women from the girls, come on!"

She was engaging in what was quickly becoming the most difficult part of her day - getting out of her car at work. Her small vehicle was definitely not designed with a person of her dimensions in mind, and it was hard for her to get out of the auto without getting stuck on something.

"Almost!... Almost!..."

Correction: it was hard one or two hundred pounds ago. Now it was nearly impossible. Alice had her overtaxed muscles pushed to the bitter edge. Her right hand was gripping the driver's side handhold, while her left elbow was dug into the door frame, trying desperately to force her lardaceous figure through the door. It was quite an uphill battle. Her massive gut rolls had firmly wedged themselves around the steering wheel, and even stretched to her limit, her gigantic booty still remained planted in her seat.

And a fair bit of the center console, to be honest.

Even her flabby arms and watermelon-sized breasts were acting as obstacles today, as her attempts to scrunch herself small enough to extricate from the vehicle forced them into her face, cutting off her already critically short air supply.

"Oh, God damn it!" Alice flopped back into her seat, bested by her fatty frame for a third time. As she sat there panting, her treacherous stomach let out a soft growl of hunger. Despite having a large breakfast at home, and a fast food binge on the way to work, her belly needed more. Six months ago, she'd have been in the breakroom by now, filling that need. As her weight went up, however, Alice's mobility was suffering more and more, pushing her third stuffing later in her day then she'd have liked.

"Okay Alice, get it together. You know what they say; fourth time's the charm..."

******

"... actually, you'd better make it three double cheeseburgers with fries, two slices of pizza, at least six pieces of chicken, and whatever cake they have for dessert."

Alice finished listing off her lunch order to the intern, intending to work (re:eat) at her desk rather then chance the breakroom. Whoever this girl was, she was clearly new. Tall, thin, and blonde, she was very obviously trying to hide her disgust at having to help a land whale stuff herself beyond obesity.

"Like, you mean a slice?"

"No, the whole thing."

The girl choked back a sound of incredulity. "Um, anything else?"

"Coke, no ice."

"Diet?"

"No, regular."

If Alice had noticed the intern's not-so-subtle jab, she gave no sign of it. The young woman left to get her order, watching as Alice grabbed a jam-filled bear claw, her wobbly bat wings drooping heavily with fat, and scarfed it down in two messy bites. She was grabbing a second one as the intern entered the elevator, and was taking a bite as the door closed, despite her lunch being mere minutes away. The intern shook her pretty, blonde head.

"What an absolute pig. I'll bet she doesn't even know her fat ass split her dress..."

******

"I just e-mailed you the figures for last week. Yes. Yes, I'll have this set ready to go before closing."

Alice was on the phone going over her work with her higher-ups. She was doing it in true Gordge fashion, however, with a pastry in one hand and the phone in the other. Alice had long ago perfected the technique of talking on the phone without the other person realizing she was eating, allowing her to maintain all but a breakneck pace without pause.

Alice leaned back in her chair, eliciting some alarming creaking sounds from the suffering piece of furniture. This chair had been designed with fat people in mind. It was a beefy thing, well reinforced, armless, and with a large, solid base. However, it hadn't been made with someone Alice's size in mind.

Cccccccrrrrrrreeeeeeeaaaaakk!

So far, it held, but it was only a matter of time. Alice's body engulfed the poor thing, and depending on which direction you approached from, you wouldn't even be able to see the chair. Her large rolls of back fat pressed around the top and sides of the office chair, while her gargantuan thighs and massive ass drooped heavily over the seat, hiding it fully from view.

"Uh huh. Of course. Yes, Ma'am." Finishing her current doughnut, Alice leaned forward to grab another, a task made rather difficult by her huge belly and breasts. Pressing her gut hard enough into the desk that it left the furniture groaning under her considerable load, she grabbed another sugary pastry with her still surprisingly narrow fingers, despite the enormity and droopage of her fore and upper arms. She leaned back with a smile to enjoy her hard earned treat.

SNAP!

Suddenly, her overworked chair collapsed, and her conversation was cut off with a loud "AAAHH!" as she fell backwards onto the floor. She landed with an almighty crash that echoed through the building, and the people on the floor below her looked up in fear and wondered if the floor was about to collapse under an errant I-beam.

Alice was aware of three very important things in the immediate aftermath.

One: she was pretty sure she'd just split her clothes at work. Again.

Two: it takes a surprisingly long time for her jelly-like rolls to stop jiggling after a shock like that.

And three: she still had her doughnut. As the first people arrived to see what happened and offer assistance, Alice was already licking the last of the jam off her fingers...
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Alice's Widening Load, and Weighty Woes Part 1

choices: She needs therapy now!
Her friends come to visit
Spiralling out of control
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
"Where the heck is he!?"

Alice was really starting to get worried. She'd ordered those pizzas almost thirty minutes ago, when it seemed like there would be plenty of time for the delivery guy to get here. But now, she was down to four ("Just four!") slices, and was starting to panic a little.

"He'd better hurry up," Alice thought as she crammed one of her remaining slices in her trembling maw.

Alice had been given a week off in lieu of the chair-crushing incident to give her time to recuperate, and she'd tacked on a week's worth of vacation days to give herself a nice, long break. Unlike most people, however, Alice had spent her entire break on the couch stuffing her face. Between online grocery purchases and delivery meals, she hadn't even attempted to leave her place in the last twelve days, and certainly wasn't going to start today.

The buzzer sounded off, bringing a smile to her face, and causing her to start drooling. Alice now began the long, arduous process of getting her fat ass off the couch. She couldn't just slide forward, as her gigantic cheeks would drag the couch cushions off with her. Instead, she shuffled from side to side, moving her body forward a bit at a time. Already, she was getting red in the face and short of breath, as this was the hardest she ever worked anymore.

Bzzzzzzzt!

"I'm *gasp* coming, *gasp, gasp* keep *gasp* your pants *gasp, gasp* on," Alice half shouted-half panted as the buzzer sounded again. She'd finally made her way to the edge of the couch, and, placing one hand on her end table and squaring off her feet, prepared to stand.

"Hrrrrrrrrgh!" Alice let out a grunt of exertion as she forced herself upright on the second attempt. Her table creaked loudly as she did so. Already, the piece of furniture had a noticeable bend to it from the number of times she'd abused it lately. Alice wiped the sweat from her brow as she began to waddle towards the door. Her thighs had grown so immense that she nearly had to turn sideways to get one foot in front of the other, and all her precariously swaying flesh did nothing to help her balance.

"I have got to give him his own key or something. This is getting ridiculous..."

******

BEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEP!

Alice grabbed as much of her huge belly as she could and tried to pry it off her steering wheel.

BEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEP!

She was not having much luck.

If she'd had any doubts about whether or not she'd gained over her extended sick time, they were gone now. Alice had put her car seat as far back as it would let her, but her enormous body had simply surged forward and flattened the wheel the moment she was inside.

BEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEP!

The worst part of the ordeal, beyond how loud and public it was, had to be just how much of her was in the way. Her hips and ass were so large that she couldn't even reach the seat controls to try and grab an extra inch. Her tits were so big and propped so high on her immense belly that she couldn't see a thing below her chin except flesh! Copious amounts of lardy, fatty, jiggly flesh!

She couldn't even get her one leg in the car at all, not that it would have mattered much. Even with her right ass cheek and thigh covering the center console, her left hip stuck far out the door, precluding any chance of closing the aperture anytime soon. And even if she could have closed the door, it's not like Alice could drive like this, anyway. She could barely move, and her arms were so thick with fat that they were almost immobile against the rest of her. With a lot of difficulty, Alice managed to get a hand on her purse and dig out her cell phone.

BEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEP!

Sniffing a little, Alice made three calls. The first was to the office, claiming she'd been in a car wreck and couldn't come in, which was pretty easy with the horn sounding non-stop.

The second was to her building's superintendent to help her get out of her car, as her fat ass was completely wedged in there.

She sniffed some more as she dug a 3 Musketeer bar out of her purse and devoured the sweet treat with indecent haste. She placed her third call as she opened and ate another bar.

"Hello, Ling's Chinese? I'd like to place a delivery order for the Dinner for 12. My address is..."
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Alice's Widening Load, and Weighty Woes Part 2

choices: While Alice is at Rehab, how's the rest of the gang doing?
Alice meets some new friends at Rehab.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Alice heard another knock on her door.
Ugh, who is it now?
She began the long and hard task of getting up from her normal napping state. These days, if she wasn't eating, she was sleeping.

Her gut had long since developed into a great double-folded gut which stuck out a foot and a half, draped in an online-ordered shirt which was enough to cover her massive, fat torso. In the weeks - maybe months - she had spent off, 'ballooning' would be the only word adequate to describe what had happened to her. Her eating disorder combined with her lack of activity in any regard had been disastrous for her weight. Tens of thousands of calories each day had sent her up a hundred pounds easily.

Her arms were great rolling tubes of fat, like pastry tubes full of custard and equally jiggly. Her breasts, free of the constraint of a bra, bounced atop her stomach, always the dominant force in the relationship, though her breasts approached the cusp of the stomach like two gelatinous demi-orbs of fat, laying flatter to her stomach against the pressure of her shirt. Alice heaved a deep breath to try to stand up. She learned better than to lean on the table, and so she had begun trying to use the arm of her couch. It had served her well, but just then she noticed that the arm had begun to try and bend - it was too late, a 'Crack' left the wooden spine of the arm laying dangling within the cloth. Alice had not been able to stand up, and was still on the couch. She shuffled over to the other side of the couch by sidling over, jiggling her immense, fat body as she eventually arrived, short of breath, to the other side of the couch.

She grabbed her cup of soda and drank - she seemed to always be thirsty these days, even though she was doing nothing. She sat there for a moment, panicking about what was going to happen. The knock came again. "Hello? Al?" Alice recognized the voice, and the panic in it - it was Christina. Alice sat and called out with the power in her fat-laden lungs. "Christie, hey...Check to the right side o...of the door...key there..in the rocks.."

In a moment, the door opened. Christina had put on a few pounds herself - around ten or so, which showed themselves only in the heightened fullness of her thighs and a belly that was just that much more broad. Christina was shocked quite plainly. "Jeez, Al.." she said. Alice laid back in apathy and shame. She felt the eyes of Christina. It felt almost as if Stephanie had come back. Alice's heart picked up in rate as Christina spoke. "I figured something was up, but dear god, girl." Christina came up to Alice through the hoard of undiscarded pizza boxes and a corner full of plastic containers. Christina spoke up. "Listen, uh, I figured you were having some problems." Alice took a sharp breath through her nose - and mouth, the weight on her lungs was too heavy for just one or the other - and began to speak. "I don't know anymore, Christie." She took another one. Her eyes began to wetten and she began to sob, her great gut and massive chest heaving. "I - I get so fat, I figure there's - there's nothing to do but eat, and get bigger, and fatter, I can't..." she took a moment to breathe, but she couldn't continue as she broke down into tears.

Christina patted her on her shoulder. Before, when such had been done, Christina could at least feel the bone of the shoulder below. But the fat accumulated in the months since Christina had last seen Alice had taken their toll - the bone was completely intangible, it was as though she was touching a warm, gelatinous mass. "I figured I ought to get you some help, girl. Let's help you up." At that, a strapping, bulky man and a lean, strong man entered and took Alice by her underarms, aided by Christina. The two struggled to lift the mass of fat that Alice had seemed to become. The task was arduous, but the two combined managed to lift the 600-some pound, elephantine woman. Alice was able to help them by waddling along as they brought her towards a comfortably - painted light red van with a logo on the side - "Daniella's Eating Disorder Rehabilitation Services."

Christine remained with Alice through the waiting process. The waiting room was a mixture of characters - some skeletal and anemic, some approaching Alice's size. All eyes were on her, though. She felt it. Christine did her best to comfort Alice. As always, the massive woman's stomach rumbled. Alice gritted her teeth. She didn't want to say anything here about her hunger.
