It would make her seem ungrateful - not wanting help.

"Alice?" called a voice. Christine and two aides helped Alice stand to. Christine helped Alice towards the door, but the attendant stopped her from following. "Sorry - patient privacy, nobody else is allowed." Christina raised a brow. "But I'm her best friend." The attendant sighed and spoke patiently. "I get that, but it's just clinic policy. It's for her mental security." Christina sighed. She had hoped to be there for Alice in this moment, but she gave it up and drove back towards the office. Her own stomach rumbled -maybe she ought to grab something for the office?

Alice was greeted by the sight of an average - built woman. She had some fat about her hips and her doctor's coat revealed a slight fatness about the waist, but to Alice's eyes and in comparison to Christina, she seemed positively slim. The red-headed woman spoke. "Heyy, I'm Doctor Daniella Goodrich. So you came here for some help?" Alice nodded and spoke. "I just can't stop eating. Like, I physically can't stop. Even when I know I'm not hungry and when I know I shouldn't, I keep eating more and more, and it feels like I can't do anything.." Goodrich nodded. She didn't stop Alice, but added on as Alice trailed off. "Well, we can help with that. I'd like to know what you normally eat in a day." Alice sniffled. "Well, I... I start off with some order-in breakfast... two sausage and gravy platters, two stacks of pancakes.. three sides of bacon, I love my bacon.." Alice paused to take a breath. "I drink, like, a cup of coffee with some regular coke... I eat some donuts for something sweet, like two or three, not many.."

The dizzying list went on. Breakfast alone had over 3,000 calories. She ate well over the same number for snacks, with 4,000 calories at lunch and 5,000 at supper. There was no wonder that this woman was massive. Daniella spoke up. "Well, that's a lot of food. So it seems you've been doing what we call binging. That's not a judgement, but it's just a term. How long has this been happening?" Alice wiped at her eyes. "Uh... a month, a few months...I think it started around easter."

Daniella kept a damn good poker face, a sympathetic one, but if her face spoke what she felt, she'd be gawking. This woman had gained something in the span of 100 pounds in a month. It was only May 18th, easter was a month and five days ago. "Well, we can help you. Are you comfortable getting on a scale?" Alice took a moment to breathe. She dreaded it, but she was curious in a way. "Uh... yeah.." Daniella looked at her. "You don't have to get on, you can just avoid it if you want to." Alice shook her head. "No, I want to get onto the scale." Daniella smiled. "Excellent." She turned to a great slab of steel in front of a digital display and indicated. "Step on, when you're ready." Alice felt truly comforted by Daniella. Part of it was in the way she phrased things, the other was that comforting smile. Another thing was her form - she didn't feel like stick-slim Stephanie, always judging her wordlessly.

Alice stepped on. The numbers ticked up and down, and then arrived at a number - 659.283. Alice stared at the number in despair. Daniella noted the number and turned the scale off. "It's okay, it's okay. You didn't try to do this - you have a problem. But you can help that, if you let us help you." Alice turned to Daniella and asked with sorrow, "How the hell can you do that?" Daniella nodded and spoke. "Well, part one is therapy - we need to help you understand exactly where this comes from." Alice nodded. "Part two is nutrition - helping you get a better direct relationship with food. No dieting required - just good eating. Part three is optional - exercise. I definitely recommend it." Daniella added very quickly, "Mainly because it helps you divert your attentions from your inner demons, and it also helps you reduce your weight. The habits you're at right now put you at big risk, and reducing your weight to whatever you're comfortable with will make you overall a healthier person."

Alice contemplated. "You can feel free to back out, if you want. I hope you stay and let us help, but you're making the decisions."
Alice accepted. She felt genuinely welcome here with Daniella, and she knew what awaited her at home. She figured being here a while would definitely have helped her out. She needed it, and she knew it.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Alice begins getting help.

choices: Alice is having trouble at rehab. She can't stop binging.
Melissa's diet starts flipping over - her weight gain resumes!
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
"...And I don't know why it keeps doing it, you know?" The husky voice of Marni rang out in the office. It landed on the gang of Christine, Melissa and Courtney. Victoria waddled in at the end of Marni's line. Her fat form approached like a great flabby pear, bloated by a good 2 inches in the hip, maybe 1 in the waist. The bottom- heavy emphasis on her gains resulted in the bottom of her blouse failing to cover the lower part of her stomach. "Hey, girls."

Courtney swivelled her head. She had gained significantly in her face, stomach and thighs - her head looked like it was mounted on a small mound of fat, thick at the back and a double-chin which began to become less of a flap below her chin and more of a "necklace" of fat. Her gut had grown a good half hand's length, still lacking behind the mammoth fostered by Alice but not insignificant in comparison.

"Hey, Vic," spoke Courtney, "how's it going with you?" Victoria shrugged her shoulders and spoke, " Better the Alice. Is it true that she's in rehab?" Christina nodded. "I had to help take her. She was in a real bad way, she couldn't get off her couch without help. She looked bigger than Jenna did when she left - she looked like a blob." The group hummed in concern. "Yeah," spoke Melissa, "I was getting afraid that she was going to eat herself to death. I hope she gets the help she needs at Rehab." Melissa's slimming had slowed, the reason why plain as the donut in her hand. It was nearly impossible to lose weight in the office for a reason. Her waist had shrunk a good inch, she even seemed to be in a smaller blouse. Her morose face spoke her concern. "All that fast food isn't good for your heart."

Victoria spoke up, "Yeah, we'll need her around for a while. She's real nice to have in a pinch. But yeah, she was ordering so much food I could barely get new copy paper in."

There was a decently long silence, filled only with Cass ranting about the coldness of the studio. "Oh," said Christina, "did you hear," she said, planting one flabby hand on the table as she spoke. "That intern who was bringing Al her food got canned?" Courtney chuckled bemusedly, her knowing smile indicating everything. Melissa queried "No, what happened?" "Well," said Christina, "It started with Jessica, she's been packing it on lately, and when she saw that the Intern wasn't carrying food for Al, she tried to order the intern to get her, like, two pizzas and garlic bread." Christina paused to drink some coffee. The room grew tense until she resumed. "She. Flipped. Out!" "What'd she say," asked Victoria, " What'd she say?" Christina spoke up. "She said something like," Christina assumed a low, faux-angry voice. "If you want your diabetes, go get it yourself! I'm not fattening you stupid cows any more! I'm not your feeder, you dumb fat bitch!" The rest of the room gawked at the re-telling. Christina resumed normally, "They had to pull Jess off of her, and Courtney fired her the next day." The rest of the office cackled.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: The office goes on.

choices: Someone to help! Please!
For pizza. Just give up.
And now for something completely different
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
"BBBBBRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAPPP!"

Alice let out a shockingly loud belch as she finished off another bucket of chicken. Taking a moment to pick out the loose bits of skin from the bottom of the container, she slurped the deep-fried goodness off her fingers. Pitching it aside. she leaned her enormous, flabby body to the side. It took her a couple of attempts, but with a throaty "oomph," she managed to get her fingers around the next tub and drag it to her greedy maw.

The last two weeks had not been kind to Alice. Even without her subconscious, her belly had been massively stretched by her rampant overeating, meaning it needed far more food to feel full. Combined with her inner demons, and its demands to be fed had been nearly deafening.

Matters had taken an even worse turn when she found one of her old high school year books. Alice had taken some of her therapist's advice and tried to clean her place, which was admittedly rather difficult at her size. Still, she'd persevered and managed to get a couple old boxes of books on shelves when she found the photos of her past.

She'd been so different in high school. Thin, pretty, popular, voted Most Likely to Succeed. She'd been the envy of the girls of her school, and the boys would have given anything just to date her. "If only they could see me now," Alice thought as she scarfed down another piece of chicken.

Seeing herself as she'd been in her junior year and comparing it to the amorphous blob she'd become had been too much for the poor young woman to bear. Attempts to get hold of Daniella had been fruitless endeavors. Unknown to her, Daniella was dealing with several life-or-death cases at the moment, and her secretaries were keeping Alice and other secondary clients in the dark as to why she was unavailable in the name of confidentiality.

And so, Alice fell back on the only thing she seemed to do anymore.

Eating.

Alice had spent the last two weeks eating, and eating, and eating. Ordering greasy and sugary foods in ungodly massive quantities, Alice stuffed herself to the point of painfully full, slept, then woke up to do it all again. Time had lost all meaning, except where what places were open was concerned. Her belly needed to be full at all hours of the day, and she was only too keen to fill it.

There was also some of the delivery guys to consider. While some were flat-out disgusted with her and made no attempt to hide it, others had been more... accommodating. The delivery drivers for Orange Star Pizza had been particularly forward, with one of them even suggesting a camera set up for online viewing, insisting that people would pay to see her. Alice had been both rather disbelieving and a little uncomfortable with his claims, but she'd been willing to tolerate him for the food her brought her.

Heck, a couple of them had even been kind enough to help her move around her apartment when she needed to.

Her already overflowing waistline had taken the brunt of the abuse she was heaping on it. Even in her gargantuan internet clothes, her body was stretching the material dangerously thin. Alice thought she might have already burst the inseam of her pants, but her gigantic gut rolls and massive mammaries kept her from seeing or feeling if that was the case. Her shoulders and upper arms had surpassed being ham sized and seemed keen on outgrowing turkeys.

And taking all that into consideration, it was really saying something that she could still see her ass without any difficulty.

As Alice ate and ate, her long suffering couch was beginning to creak ominously. She'd already broken both arms on the piece of furniture, which sagged uselessly in the cloth upholstery. As she crunched into another greasy morsel, the body of the couch gave way with a mighty crack. Alice gasped as she felt herself drop 18 or so inches, hitting the floor with an almighty thud. A mix of couch and fat crashed into the wall behind as she struck earth, and the accompanying cracks informed her that she'd certainly destroyed a fair bit of her drywall and possibly the studs behind it.

As the jiggling of her lard subsided, Alice took stock of her situation. Her fat ass had already destroyed her bed, and now it seemed her couch had finally followed suit. Her shirt had ripped in multiple places, leaving her flabby flesh on display. Her pale skin was covered in stretch marks, and had been slick with sweat since her a/c broke down last week. Her body's opulent deposits of sagging fat wobbled as she tried to grab what of her scattered chicken she could. She devoured what few pieces she could reach, cursing herself as she did so.

"Of course my fat ass broke my couch. I'm so unbelievably fat. From prom queen to Jabba's sister, and I can't stop this. I just need to eat and eat and eat. It's all I can do, all I'm good at. Eating more and getting fatter. How much bigger can I even get? God, I'm so, so fat..."

All too soon, Alice had finished what chicken she could reach. Groaning, she tried and failed to reach anymore of the chicken that had scattered across the floor, succeeding only in tearing more holes in her clothes. "C'mon, c'mon!" she muttered as she tried to reach the rolling cart the delivery guys brought her latest feast in on (as if she needed any proof that they were trying to fatten her further).

"Ergh! Damn it!" Alice fell back panting, her back hurting and her legs wiggling uselessly in their excessively fatty casing. Perhaps this morning she could have walked, even with immense difficulty, but after all she'd had today, that ship had sailed. Pinned under her lard, she felt herself tear up with a sense of mounting horror. She wasn't crying because she was immobile, if only temporarily. Not because she was out of control, which she totally was. Not because she desperately needed help, which she really did.

No, she was crying because she couldn't reach her food, eat it, and get even fatter.

"What is wrong with me!?" Alice dug her left hand into beachball-sized breast's equally massive bra. Fishing around her overflowing bra cup, she dug out her cell phone from its jiggly prison. Alice's belly let out a terribly loud growl as she called...
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: World's Fastest (Fattest?) Relapse

choices: Alice is clearly in trouble. Time for someone to snap her out of it.
Alice is clearly not coming in much anymore - Jessica replaces her.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
At first, Alice thought to herself, I can just call Orange star. She rationalized it because they'd helped her move before.

Then she thought, Maybe I should get a pizza too. A pizza became a pizza and bread sticks, and that was joined by an order of wings. By the time the order was placed, she had ordered that plus a large cookie - for something sweet, of course. The irony of ordering all this food was not lost on the stocky, olive-skinned delivery man. He looked at the couch and spoke. " Wow, miss Alice, that couch is broken pretty bad." Alice sniffled. "Yeah, Greg, it's broken pretty bad. Just set that pizza on the table, will ya?" Greg did so. As he walked, he pondered, Just how damn fat do you have to be to not care about that? As he regarded the piles of delivery from today alone, he decided, About that fat. He sighed and spoke, "Lemme help you get up." He braced himself for the task - Alice in this sorry, blob - like state looked like a daunting task. Alice spoke up. "Sure, thanks.."

Greg took a deep breath and tried to pull by Alice's flabby underarms, reached only by a dedicated drive by his hands to penetrate the fat folds and flab of her arms. The clammy, jiggly, unwashed folds repulsed Greg - but if he didn't help, this whale would lay on her cracking floor forever. He heaved as Alice tried to get up as well, and with a great heave, Alice stood on her two feet. She looked exhausted from this miniscule feat, but went for her wallet. She paid the Delivery man, who spoke. "You know, you should get some help if you need help moving around."

By the next week, Alice had a fresh routine. She now laid in an ultra-strong, widened gurney in her living room atop where her couch had once been. She didn't care about the damage - to her house or herself. She meekly accepted the fact that she couldn't move and only needed a hand opening the door and occasionally a bath. A fat attendant now lived in her bed, her name was Sandra. She was almost just like Alice was around 400 pounds ago - a belly - gaining blonde, eating her way to Alice's fate.

Alice was not exactly in a prime state of health beyond her bed - bound nature. Her perpetual windedness had only gotten worse with her gain, but luckily Sandra happily provided an oxygen tank hooked up to Alice's nose via a catheter. As a benefit, Alice could speak more. For her other ailments, an array of pills were now necessary.

But Alice began not to care. She began to live merely to eat.

Two more months passed, and Alice soared over 700 pounds. She neared 800 as her face began to be eternally sunken behind rolling hills of fat. Her stomach rose above her a foot, a feat only achievable by such a fat beast as Alice. Her legs almost seemed to merge as they rubbed together at the thigh. Alice could feel her sheer weight pressing her organs in.
The only thing that made anything bearable was Sandra. She always tried to keep Alice's mind off of her condition - always talking about something but her weight. " So, who you got for the Stanley cup?" Alice nodded firmly. "Oh, Caps for sure. Saanin has a beautiful way with the stick, just, " Alice swung an imaginary hockey stick, aiming away from her oxygen. "Wha-bow! So precise, too."
Sandra, however, didn't feel too discouraged by Alice's state in terms of her habits. Whenever Alice ordered, she'd slip in a "little" something. She wasn't quite binging like Alice, but she was plumping up at a fair rate. From the August when she was hired until that late October, her great gut grew about three inches to about 63, and her legs grew more gelatinous. Her ass lagged behind in it's gains, always smaller than the rest of her.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Alice's Surrender and life changes.

choices: Jessica works on catching up to Christina's vastness in the holiday season.
Melissa's diet really starts crumbling as Thanksgiving rolls around.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
The elevator opened on the fat, fat form of Jessica, entering the usual 11th floor den of the group, while the normal pod of fat women jawed away in the break room before cracking at the morning workload. Jessica had grown considerably since joining Gordge at an already large 300 pounds. In her first three years, she'd gained 40 pounds - and by this time, five years after, she had gotten up to 400, square and even. Her gut was every bit of 65 inches, being similarly belly-centered to Alice, with more of her fat distributing to her arms and thighs, with considerably less going to her breasts. Her body resulted in what resembled an apple - her great, girthy stomach - thickly bordered by flabby arms, pumped with fat, and thighs which gave her legs staying power against the might of her stomach.

In her department, she was somewhat fat. But in her department, the thin interns which put on a bit of the gordge weight either transferred away and lost the weight, or got with the program and fattened up. But few adapted to the environment like Jessica, the only thing stalling her temporary rise was the lack of openings. That had been mostly fixed with the semi-opening of Alice's position

"Wait, so are you firing Alice?" inquired Christina with a wan face. "No, I'm not firing her." spoke Courtney to her and Melissa in the break room. "But she's been MIA for 7 months, from what I hear literally eating up her paid sick leave, and straight-up abandoning the rehab we helped fund. I'm cutting her off on the paid leave so that I can pay Jessica to do her job until she finds some way to get back to work." Melissa spoke up. "So is there a cut-off point?" Courtney spoke with obvious forethought to the question. "It's November, and if she's not back in by New Year's day, whether it's in crutches or what have you, she's out and being replaced by Jessica." Melissa and Christina sighed. "But we love Alice.." Courtney spoke up. "So do I, and I've been hoping she's okay. But while I love accommodating you guys, I can't enable you guys to take me for a free ride. Had enough of that as an intern." Courtney crossed her lardy forearms atop her bulging, rolling stomach which exceeded all others in the room as Courtney's busy-eating had taken her up to 550. "If Alice can't work by New Year 2020, she's fired."

At that moment, the girthy and bubbly Jessica entered the room. Oddly, however, she was, in fact, below average. Christina's fat had continued piling on - the liberation of snack domination from Alice's grip had given Christina a free hand in eating more, and over the three months since Alice had seen her, she'd gone up from around 450 to 480 while Melissa had held steady at 420, but her determination began to show signs of wavering as she began slipping in a donut or two more each day. "Hey, Jess!" Jessica wobbled towards Melissa, an old pal in Gluttony, and the two still considerably blubbery women hugged, smushing their two great guts together. Jessica looked at Melissa's stomach. "No way, you've been losing weight on us, girlie?" Melissa chuckled. "Nah, just staying the course - trying to slow down. Don't wanna eat myself silly like someone." Jessica hummed in understanding. "Yeahhh, heard about Al, sad story. I heard that there's an ambulance at her house, like, every day now, or something like that. Maybe it wasn't one of those emergency ones, but one of those.. I don't know, private ones?" The group raised eyebrows at Jessica. She chuckled and shrugged. "We're getting to where Jessica doesn't even understand herself." spoke Courtney. The four laughed.

The topic returned to Jessica, "So, I heard you blew up on an intern the other day." spoke Melissa. Jessica's face turned red with rage with the memory. "Don't fuckin' get me started on that bitch, oooohhh, the nerve. I ask her to do something simple, just bring something back on me, then she goes off on me like I'm asking her to kill her baby!" Courtney chuckled. "I soo enjoyed firing her. My favorite firing." Jessica turned to Courtney. "What's your second favorite?" Courtney thought, then spoke. "There was this bigger girl - Madison - she was about 400,she was big. Had a heart attack, had to lose weight for medical reasons. Understandable. But when she came back, she thought she was a health guru. She had to go when I caught her trying to destroy other people's fast food orders - something about "I'm just trying to help them, I'm just trying to help..""

The group had a good chuckle before the work rhythm set in. Jessica pulled her suitcase into Jessica's office. The chair had to be replaced, obviously, as it had been broken badly by Alice the last time she was at work, 7 months ago. Her snacks were gone -shipped back home and consumed within 2 days. Jessica set down her suitcase,and began unpacking her belongings onto Jessica's desk. She was happy to be here, truly she was.

But if the stories and rumors about Alice's health were to be believed, she truly didn't want to be here because of what was going on. Alice's long seclusion had given way to rumor en masse. Everything was being suggested from a theory that she was getting weight loss surgery, to the idea that she had a heart attack and died, to the idea that she was bed-bound now, and needed help moving. Mary Jolynne suggested that Alice was secretly cavorting with freemason lizards, to channel the apocalypse to the world.

Not many people listened to Mary. The most logical idea seemed to be the bed-bound theory - if Alice was dead, people would know. Jessica was hoping that it was not weight loss surgery - she was truly an embodiment of an old world mother - she believed that bigger meant healthier, or at least happier. If that was the case, Alice would be bouncing with joy. But most unfortunately, she could barely bounce from the constraints of her gurney.

Jessica adapted quickly to the workflow in this high branch of the office. While she loved to eat, she also knew she had to work - she knew that there had to be a balance between the two. She tried to put the worries over Alice's condition behind her, and focus on her job. In her first week, she was very productive - exceeding easily Alice's last hours of productivity. If Alice was to be pink-slipped, Jessica had a promising career to be had.

That is, if she could avoid eating herself into immobility, like Alice.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: A new face in the office, and a new ultimatum.

choices: Alice gets the ultimatum - she just doesn't care about it.
So what does Courtney want with that treadmill desk?
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
The city in which Gordge was nestled turned into its usual white-matted self as the first snows came in later November. Of course, with the snows came the holidays.

With the holidays came the exact type of treats which Jessica was sipping on and munching on as she breathily trudged into the office. It was the monday after Thanksgiving, and she had stuffed herself to bursting - her waistline already had begun to tell the effects of the first few weeks of the holiday season - it had expanded a good inch already, and that extra inch gave her buttoned - up blouse, upsized on her promotion, that extra inch of tightness.

Jessica sipped idle-mindedly on her white - chocolate peppermint latte. The drink easily had 400 calories, but her chocolate-brownie-batter-donut had around 450. She was averaging about four of these a day - paired together, of course. She sat typing in her slouched-forward pose that she usually worked in. This accented perfectly her already increasing fatness - her great stomach rolled towards her knees, about five inches short of the goal, slowed by her fat thighs which, in their growth, fought Jessica's pants.

Of course, in addition to her snacks, Jessica had to share holiday lunches with the group. These were special occasions - catering was brought in for holiday lunches, but not decently healthy sandwiches and chips. Horrifically decadent pasta dishes, double-patty burgers with all the bacon and sauce that the blimping women of the office loved. Christina munched on a monster of a burger while Melissa treated herself to a plate of pasta.

Melissa's hips and waist had resumed their old forward march, and Christina had noticed. She subtly intoned, "So, Mel, how's the gym been treating you?" Melissa shrugged. "It's too damn cold to get to the gym. Plus, it's the holidays - I can put it off for a while." Christina smiled. "Atta girl. I was worried you weren't gonna be yourself this holiday season." Melissa snorted a laugh. "Well, I'm still me. What, did you think I was lay off sweets for the holidays? I'm Me, you know I wouldn't do that!" Jessica followed up as she munched on her second plate of pasta. "I had a cousin who would diet specifically over the holidays. That was like, five years ago - this past Thanksgiving, I saw her, she was like 200 pounds heavier." Christina spoke up. "I mean, what did she expect she'd do? Starving yourself while everyone else is stuffing themselves isn't something that's gonna last. Shit, I'm amazed she didn't get fatter."

Christina's gains -had- started slowing leading up to Thanksgiving. She had only gotten up to 485 - but with the holidays cranking her eating up beyond maximum, she was eating almost at an Alice-like level, slowed only by the fact that she was still at work. While Jessica was up an inch, Christina over the past two weeks was up easily three, and her work clothes were showing it, as well as her physicality. It had been a great while since Christina had even attempted exercise, but walking to the copier or the break room felt like epic treks.

Past the break room, a team of unfamiliar feet tread, with a slight shuffle of something else. The group watched as two movers shoved a box along the turquoise carpet of the hallway. The group, one Hispanic man and one man of indeterminate origin looked in at the group while they caught their breath. "Holdon," spoke the mixed-race man pushing from the back while the Hispanic man leant on the box, sneaking a sideways glance at the break room. They had to stop themselves from outright gawking at the gluttony before them, each woman at the break room like a great glob of fat shoved into a suit, and given sometimes equally, sometimes less fat legs and arms. Christina spoke up. "Need some help?" The mixed-race man spoke in an english accent to Christina. "Yeah," he said, pronouncing a hidden 'r' afterwards, "where's, er, Courtney?" Melissa spoke up. "Oh, uh, she's just down the hall and to the left. To the right of the Printer there, at the end of the hall." The mixed-race man raised two fingers to his forehead, horizontally, and shot it towards Melissa in a salute. "Right, cheers. Don't mind us." He got back to his side, having caught his breath and gotten his directions, resumed shoving the box. It was then that the group noticed what was on the label of the box:

'WorkEffic Treadmill Desk - Standing/Walking Combination Work Desk'

The group shot surprised glances at each other. "What does Courtney need with a treadmill desk?" asked Jessica. Christina shrugged, "Maybe a snippy early Christmas gift? I got one of those one year from my cousin Doris - she just stopped coming to Christmas dinners when I'm there. More ham and cake for me."
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Holiday Heaviness.

choices: "You had a phone call from Gordge."
"Start with these while I get some more!"
And now for something completely different
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
(A/N: Bloody 10k character limit :P)

"Yes. Yes, I'll give her your message. Yes. Yes. If she doesn't call you to confirm, I will. Alright. You as well. Bye."

Sandra hung up the phone, her meaty arm shaking as she put the hand set down. The pudgy nurse had put on a considerable amount of weight since she started working with Alice, and that process had only accelerated as of late. She was now living with Alice full time to better help with her needs, but one obvious result was a clear spike in her consumption. Already a terrible snacker, she was only eating more frequently and larger portions as time went on.

Combined with the recent deluge of holiday goodies, and it wasn't much of a surprise that Sandra had put on a good amount of weight. Her belly and bust had borne the brunt of her recent gain. Her gut rolls drooped down heavily and spread a good distance across her lap when she was seated, which was quickly becoming her natural state of being. Her breasts, meanwhile, had become huge, lardy things totally devoid of any self-support, resting heavily on her enlarged belly those days she chose to go braless. She was currently wearing her largest pair of scrubs, and would very soon need to replace the all-too-tight garments.

She still looked minuscule next to Alice.

Pushing on the counter to help herself up, Sandra rose with a grunt of effort. Grabbing a couple boxes of doughnuts from the table, she sampled a couple on the short walk to Alice's room. She heard the sounds of eating long before setting eyes on its sole occupant. Once she turned the corner, Alice was pretty hard to miss.

In the past few months, Alice had put on a bit of weight.

Scratch that. Alice had put on a ton of weight.

Without even the minimal exercise of walking to her desk, and nothing getting in the way of her eating, Alice's weight had simply exploded. She had quite literally spent every waking moment stuffing her face with the fattiest, greasiest, or most sugary foods she could lay her pudgy mitts on.

Well, that her nurse could bring her, rather.

Alice had been having mobility issues back in the spring and, just like her, those had grown immensely. By summer, she'd been unable to rise and walk unaided, and she hadn't even tried to move since November. And so, she'd just laid in bed, stuffing herself until her belly hurt, followed by sleeping it off, then doing it all again.

Perhaps somewhat ironically, her finances had never been better. Alice was now on long-term disability, which was netting her a solid chunk of change each month. On top of that, she'd finally caved to the pizza guy's suggestion about the cam site. And though Alice was loathe to admit it, he'd definitely been right about the audience. She'd made over $500 her first day, and that amount had increased exponentially since she started eating on stream for money. She hadn't even had to send Sandra on a grocery run since her web guy set up a bot for her fans to purchase her food and have it sent to her door.

Alice's growing fan base were sending her an absolute mountain of food, and she was only too eager to find a place for all of it.

Sandra looked over her greatly bloated charge. Her double wide gurney had been replaced with a massively overbuilt medical bed, which was currently tilted forward. Alice's belly was beyond huge. Divided into four massively thick rolls, her gut was a mass of stretch marks and cellulite. It rose above her frame by about two feet, and stretched to both sides of her bed and down to her knees. Her gargantuan breasts were as big as medicine balls, and rested both on and to each side of her belly. They had adjoining rolls of fat under her arms, and the two together greatly hindered her arm movements and left her limbs splayed out to her sides.

Her arms were flabby things, grown to near-uselessness by sheer fat. Her upper arms were the size of large turkeys, and her forearms were as thick around as many peoples' thighs. Even her hands, which had remained thin and dexterous in the face of her positively massive gain for so long, had begun to grow into clumsy, chubby mitts. Despite the general ineptitude of her remaining useful limbs, their ability to funnel food to her mouth seemed undiminished. As Sandra watched, Alice was grabbing Christmas cookies by the fistful from the tins resting on her belly like a lardy, fleshy table, moving them to her mouth as fast as she could swallow them.

Her face had taken a fair share of her newfound poundage, as well. Her plump, greasy lips were half hidden behind the smothering embrace of her softball sized cheeks, and her large triple chin rested on her plump chest, which wobbled with each shuddering breath. Even her neck had gotten fat, and Sandra knew if she pulled Alice's hair to the side, she'd find a large and growing roll of blubber starting just behind her ears and running down to her massive shoulders. Her face was well marked with spots of grease and crumbs, as Alice had been filling her bottomless belly since 8 o'clock this morning, and currently showed no signs of slowing down.

Even her back had gotten larger, and there were times that Sandra was convinced that she could see Alice rising higher in bed day by day as those thick, heavy rolls grew even more.

Alice's lower half had taken the brunt of her new girth, however. Her ass was beyond enormous, overhanging both sides of her bed. Sandra knew it was only a matter of time before they'd have to move Alice to an even larger throne, and at her size, it was becoming a dicey prospect. At her weight, even with help the nurse wasn't sure if Alice could move, and she was only getting fatter by the day. Her butt cheeks and love handles were so huge that even her massive belly couldn't cover them, and the suffering skin holding in that ungodly quantity of fat resembled nothing so much as a road map of Utah stretched over an overstuffed bag of gravel.

Her thighs were separate entities only in the loosest sense of the word. Even Sandra with her sizable weight gain was smaller around the waist then Alice's significantly larger thighs. Her fat stuffed pelvis, or "gunt" to use the somewhat inappropriate slang, had inflated larger then a basketball. Both her thighs and pelvis, however, were well hidden under Alice's unbelievably huge belly, leaving only a sliver of her thighs protruding from the sides of that mass of blubber.

Her knees could only be found by locating the dimples that divided her leg fat, and even these were starting to fill in as her body grew ever more rotund. Her calves outsized Sandra's thighs, and even her feet were rounding out as Alice's body struggled to find more places to store her unbelievable quantities of lard.

The sheer scale of Alice's belly, the thickness and depth of her rolls, and the fact that they were growing by the day all added up to one thing; namely, that one of Sandra's core duties, keeping her charge clean, was getting unbearably difficult. Sandra required the help of a lot of increasingly long-handled tools to scrub out Alice's deepest crevices, crease being too small a word in her mind. Her belly gave the nurse no end of trouble, and there were many days that Sandra could barely shift it. More and more frequently, the nurse was finding herself a panting, sweaty mess by the time she was done cleaning the unnaturally huge woman, and she was quite certain she'd very soon need to bring in some extra staff to help her deal with her charge.

The thought that part of her problem stemmed from her own increasing mass never entered her mind. She was also rather hesitant about bringing another couple of people in. Although she knew she needed the help, and honestly should get Alice to a hospital, this was frankly the best job she'd ever had. She was paid very well for doing practically no work, save getting Fattie Cakes more food, and was loathe to lose that.

"Besides," she thought, "she's remarkably healthy for a woman her size. Save for slightly high blood pressure and needing some additional vitamins, she's doing stunningly well."

Alice's gorging was accompanied by loud, hoggish grunting, her body slick with sweat despite her a/c pumping at max, her arm fat creasing to the point of contortion as she forced herself to surmount the sheer obstacle her body had become, all in her desperate need to feed herself. She strained against her twin enemies, her mass and gravity, not caring how much harder this would be tomorrow as she continued her marathon eating session.

The thought of what she was doing to her health, or what her family and friends might say, or the fact that she was panting and sweating like she'd just finished a day of track and field from merely eating, meant absolutely nothing to her. In fact, there was only one reason she stopped eating.

Her hand closed around the last six cookies in the tin.

She stuffed all six into her mouth at once, a process made more difficult as her arm fat bunched up and tried to limit the action, and her wobbly cheeks caught on the edges of the cookies. Alice pushed the empty tins off her belly and looked around, her piggish eyes desperately seeking out her next course as she chewed her final cookies. She saw Sandra standing there with those two wonderfully big boxes of donuts, and reached out her gargantuan arms to receive them. She was barely able to raise them high enough, and their anvil-heavy bags of fat remained inert on her belly, only jiggling slightly at what was, for Alice, an excessively huge maneuver.

"Ah, perfect timing. I was worried I was going to start wasting away. Thanks, Sandra!"

Sandra cleared her throat before she spoke.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Eternal Ultra-sized BBW Alice?

choices: Alice calls Melissa
Melissa visits Alice
And now for something completely different
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Alice blinked, confused for a second by a response that didn't result in food brought within arm's reach. She recovered quickly from her initial surprise.

"Gordge? Geez, I haven't heard from them in awhile. What'd they want?"

Sandra decided to tell Alice about the phone call rather then merely getting her more food. She might have been enamored with her job, perhaps even criminally negligent with regards to her charge's health and well being, but she wasn't totally irresponsible.

"... you know, when I think about it like that, I really sound like kind of a bitch."

Sandra mentally shook her head as she replied to Alice's query. "They were phoning to see if you were planning to come back into work, and made it rather clear that, if you didn't at least make an effort to come in, your employment would be terminated."

"You could have just said fired," Alice said as she patted her belly, causing the lardy flesh to wetly ripple, indicating to Sandra that she should hand those donuts over. Preferably right now.

Sandra placed the boxes of pastries on her greatly expanded belly, making sure that they were placed where they wouldn't slide out of her extremely limited reach. Drooling, Alice started pushing donuts into her mouth as Sandra said, "I was trying to be delicate, Miss."

" Fair. *chew, swallow* So- *bite, chew* -what'd you tell them?"

"Just that I would talk to you, and that either you or I would call them back with your response."

Eating another couple of pastries before responding, Alice swallowed an obscenely large mouthful before answering. "Did you mention I probably weigh over a thousand pounds and can't even walk?"

"I did," Sandra told her, watching as she made her way through the box at an impressive pace, even with the conversation distracting her. It seemed Alice had picked up at least one talent from her time at Gordge Inc.

Alice, currently eating a boston creme, swallowed it nearly whole in her haste to answer. She tried to wipe off the creme that had smeared on her fat cheeks and large chins, but her arms were so large she could barely able get her hands to her mouth, and could only manage a cursory cleaning of her swollen features. "Thank you," Alice said as Sandra wiped her face with a napkin. "You told them that, and they still expect me to go in!? Seriously!? How would they propose I do that!?"

"They didn't say, Miss."

"UUUUUUUUURRRRRRPPPPP!" Alice, despite herself, let out an impressive belch as she finished off the first box. She pushed it to the floor, and opened the second. She blushed a little in embarrassment, usually trying to keep the worst of her excesses behind closed doors, which was a little silly with the woman who washed her bloated, naked form. "Excuse me. Well, there's no way I'll be going to work ever again. 'Come in to work' my foot. Just how," Alice questioned as she pushed a bear claw into her mouth.

Sandra made a quick mental note to get her some more food right away, as at her current pace, Alice would be out in the very near future. "Should I call and tell them you quit, then, or do you want to?"

Alice was already starting to slide back into two handing her food. "Neither. *bite, chew, swallow* Just let them fire me. It's easier to apply for E.I. when you're fired rather then quit. *bite, chew, swallow* These are really good. We got anymore?"

"Afraid that's the last of them."

"Ah, that's a shame," Alice said as she finished off the second box in record time. Adding the second container to the growing pile of garbage on her floor, she attempted to rub the spilled sugar off her belly. Unfortunately, it only stuck in the sweat, causing her to create something of a sticky mess on her cavernous gut. Sandra went to a nearby cart which had been loaded high with a large amount of delectables. Grabbing a large pizza box, she placed it on Alice's belly, amazed that even with her bed at a 30° angle, her huge stomach managed to rise to her nose height.

"Thanks." Alice began to dig into her pizza with gusto, the previous conversation nearly forgotten. Sandra, meanwhile, began to clean all the empties off the floor. "What are we having for lunch, anyway?"

The fact that Alice regarded all she'd eaten so far as a preamble to her actual meal didn't even phase Sandra anymore. "One of your fans, Sidmeister69xxx, placed an order for Chinese to arrive at 12:00. Didn't say what he ordered, only that it should be enough to fill you up. He did request you film it for the channel."

"Of course he did." Alice kept eating her pizza, wiping any drops a grease off herself and bringing her fingers to her mouth. She sucked her digits dry, refusing to waste single calorie. She was beginning to pant harder, the effort of dividing her limited energy between eating and talking leaving her more winded then usual. "Well, we should probably set up the camera, then. No need to disappoint them. *bite, chew, swallow* Do we have any pie left? Or cookies. I'd take cookies."

******

After getting her horrifically obese charge another pizza and opening a box of Oreo's for her, as Alice no longer had the fine finger control for even that simple task, Sandra made her way to the kitchen. Alice had a 2 liter bottle of coke on the table set just below her head height with a long straw. Having emptied it into her bottomless gullet, Sandra went to grab her a new one.

She couldn't help but wonder about Alice as she grabbed a new one from the fridge. "How many calories is she consuming everyday? 50,000? A hundred? Maybe more?"

She grabbed a pumpkin pie from the fridge while she had the door open. As she slathered it in a thick layer of whipped cream, she thought, "I wonder how much she even weighs? Seriously, how much fatter can she even get?"

The hypocrisy of that thought was totally lost on Sandra as a seam on her pants gave way under the growing pressure of her own expanding tush.

******

Alice, meanwhile kept stuffing her face on her throne. Every now and again, a small, nearly imperceptible creak invaded the silence of her room.

Well, silent except for the sounds of the gigantic fatty stuffing herself as much as possible in the center of the room. Grunts of exertion as she fought against her overwhelming large fatty protuberances mixed with the sounds of her panting as she pushed her air supply to its limits, refusing to slow her caloric intake long enough to even catch her breath. The end result was a sound not unlike a pig feeding at its trough, a simile that Alice felt was all too apt for her at this time.

"God, I'm such a fat fucking pig. Screw whale, I'm just a living blob. I'm so hungry all the time, and I just want more food. No one's ever been as fat as me. Even Mel at her biggest was way smaller then this. I'm literally too fucking fat to walk, but God damn it, I'm so, so hungry."

Thoughts of her best friend made Alice pause for a second, though she kept eating even through her moment. Alice had all but cut contact with everyone she knew, friend or family, after her weight left her bed-bound. At this moment, she couldn't help but miss Melissa, as the two hadn't talked in nearly seven or eight months.

"It'd be so nice to see her again, but I don't know if I could stand her to see me like this. What would I even say?" The slight creak once more invaded her private thoughts. "And I really hope that's just the bed giving out and not the floor."

Alice's hands hit the bottom of her most recent culinary conquest. Unbelieving of even herself, she cried out, "Sandra! Could you bring me some more pizza!?"
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: "You had a phone call from Gordge."

choices: Alice is too embarrassed
"S-sure, I guess. Let her in..."
And now for something completely different
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Alice rubbed her gut as best she could, which is to say, not very well at all. Her sore stomach, packed drum tight with enough Chinese food to feed a family thrice over, was buried under such a deep layer of blubber that what little pressure her fat-engorged arms could muster had no chance of helping her poor belly.

Sidmeister69xxx, whoever he was, had managed a nearly impossible feat: Alice was stuffed painfully full, and for an exceedingly rare moment, actually didn't feel like stuffing her face with whatever was on hand.

This isn't to say Sandra wasn't preparing for the next feast, however. Moments like this were few and far between, and never lasted long in the wake of Alice's bottomless appetite. She was taking a moment to clean both the room and her charge, and was currently cleaning the remaining containers off the floor.

"Ugh," Alice softly groaned. "I think I ate too much, even for me."

"Nonsense. You just don't remember what it's like being full," Sandra replied as she carried out the last bag of empties.

Alice could only groan once more to an empty room.

The rotund nurse came back with a pail of warm, soapy water and a sponge. She wiped the surface food and sweat stains off Alice, drying the soft, jiggly flesh with the towel she had thrown over her shoulder. Normally the immense blonde was quite ticklish, and she'd be wobbling like a sea of gelatin as she tried to hold back her laughter. For right now, though, it was all Alice could do to stay awake.

She held her fingers up so Sandra could wipe them off, only managing to raise them a few scant inches. As the nurse cleaned her face, she moved Alice's cheeks and chins as she needed to make sure she didn't miss a spot. As she wiped off Alice's lips, she said, "There, that's better. You just rest now, Miss Gellar. I'll get everything cleaned up out here."

Alice nodded and leaned back to take a nap. Well, mentally at least, her vastly overfed frame having left her in a perpetual position of rest for some time.

As Sandra left the room, Alice closed her ice-blue eyes. Her ineffectual hands once more ran across her blubbery belly and lardy breasts. She thought about how unbelievably fat she already was. She thought about the enormous quantity of greasy, calorie-rich food packing her belly. She thought about how much she'd already eaten today. About how much more she was going to eat today, and about how much fatter it was all going to make her. She thought about her sister, and how Stephanie would react if she saw what Alice had become.

If she knew that tomorrow, her sister would eat even more and get even fatter.

"Oh God, I'm already drooling just thinking about eating."

Secure in the knowledge that Sandra wouldn't be coming back right away, Alice felt comfortable enough to release a bit of gas she'd been holding in. A long, muffled "pppppffffffffftttttttt!" sounded out, buried deep within her vast, growing empire of fat. One unexpected consequence of her size that Alice had had to get used to was that her opulent, heaving rolls loved to trap her gas and release it at random intervals. Her body had basically turned into a hellish dutch oven, cooking harmless bum-burps into something the Germans would have used in the trenches of World War One. Alice could only hope that whatever part of her was blocking the methane's exit would shift and allow it to vacate the premises before Sandra came back.

"Well, as much as I hate to say it, she has dealt with far worse from me," Alice thought with some embarrassment. She felt a familiar bass rumble echo from her deeply buried stomach. The last truly powerful organ in her body was already hard at work, breaking down this huge boulder of calories and opening up space for Alice to add even more. Alice rubbed her belly once again as her mouth dealt with the unusual sensation of not-chewing.

As she contemplated the unbelievably heavy weight in her stomach, Alice slowly drifted off to sleep. As she at last nodded off, one final thought passed through her mind.

"God damn it, why does this have to feel so good?"

******

Sandra closed the apartment door behind her after she returned from throwing out the trash. Making her way into the small office, she booted up Alice's computer and looked through the long list of pre-ordered meals her fans had already purchased for her.

"A twenty piece bucket of chicken, with two salads, a family sized fries with gravy, and two three piece meals. That seems like the winner," she thought as she placed the order.

Alice had a stream later on today, during which her fans would be able to purchase her pizza which she'd then eat for her paying audience. Despite this, Sandra knew from prior experience that Fattie Cakes would wake up starving after only a couple hours, so she needed to make sure she had a meal on hand for the gargantuan glutton.

"I should probably get something for myself." That thought was interrupted as the door buzzer sounded off. Sandra frowned as she looked to the door.

"That's way too fast for the food. Who could that be?"

******

"Miss? Miss Gellar? Miss, wake up."

"Huh?" Alice awoke slowly as she became aware of Sandra gently shaking her shoulder fat. "Is it already time for the stream?"

"No, Miss," Sandra said as Alice yawned. The obese cutie stretched out as best she could, which at her size basically amounted to some light popping from her fingers and her arm fat briefly taking on some unusual creases. "There's someone here to see you. A woman by the name of Melissa."

Alice's eyes went wide as she felt her heart drop into her stomach. Her belly, grossly misinterpreting her brain's signals, growled in hunger and made ready for another impressive deluge of calories.

"Shall I let her in?"
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Melissa comes a'knockin; What to do?

choices: "Yes, let's do it!"
"No, I can't."
"Well, maybe..."
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Alice wasn't sure what made her let Melissa in, as she really, REALLY didn't want her to see what she'd become. But she'd been terribly lonely with only Sandra for company, and for her best friend to show up quite literally moments after she'd been thinking about talking to her again? It was too much to be just a coincidence.

"Just... just give me a moment. A-and let her know, you know," Alice stuttered a bit. "Just warn her about me. You know? At least try to make her ready for this."

"Of course, Miss." Sandra nodded, and went out to get Melissa. Alice took several deep breaths. She could feel her heart pounding in her chest, her nerves firing on all cylinders. What would Melissa say when she saw her? Why hadn't she come to her before now? Why now? Why had she come to visit a fat-ass like her? Would she be mean about this? She'd been fat too, though not like this. A friend wouldn't just come here to photograph this and laugh, right? Were they even friends at this point?

Alice felt ready to cry. "Why did I make myself so fat!?"

As the door to her room started to open, Alice closed her eyes, too scared to see Melissa's reaction. And so, the first thing she heard was Mel's voice.

"Oh, wow. Holy. I mean, Jesus. Alice? Um, are you okay, girl?"

The gargantuan blonde felt her eyes beginning to tear up. "No, Mel. I'm really not. That was a really stupid question."

Melissa winced, though Al didn't see it. "Yeah, that was. Sorry, I really didn't know what to say."

"D-don't worry about it, Mel. I know how big I am," she answered as she unconsciously rubbed her massive belly rolls. The ones she could reach, at least.

Melissa stepped forward and placed her hand on Alice's. "Al, could you please open your eyes?"

"I don't want to. I don't want to see your face when you look at me. I don't want to see you disgusted by me, or hate me, or whatever."

"I'm not disgusted by you, Al, and I definitely don't hate you. Never have."

"Then why didn't you come before!?" Alice opened her eyes as she gave that outburst. She found herself looking into Melissa's face, and true to her word, there wasn't a hint of disgust in her features. She didn't seem to have changed at all from Easter to Alice's eyes. She'd been lighter then Al then, and seemed to be holding the course, which only made her feel worse.

In truth, Melissa's weight loss had begun to reverse slightly. While she was still lighter then she'd been this time last year, holiday snacking had added to Melissa's waist line. Her hips had widened and her belly was drooping lower then it had been a few months ago, but this was far more noticeable to the girls in the office then it was to Al, as they'd watched her build back up to about 450 pounds. It certainly didn't help that, compared to herself, Alice could define everyone as skinny.

"When I texted you, you said you dealing with some stuff, but would be fine! You told me not to come! What was I supposed to do, just barge in!?"

"I, I don't know, alright! I really don't know! I was just so hungry and ate until I disappeared and I missed you, okay! I missed you, and wanted you here, but I didn't want you to see me like this, so I just sat alone and ate more and got even fatter, and I kept hoping someone, anyone, would come here, and then even my therapist left me and all I could do was eat and eat and eat, and-!"

"Al, Al! Calm down, okay, just calm down!" Melissa rubbed Alice's hand as the bigger girl sobbed, tears falling freely down her face. Melissa hugged her as best as she could. It took her quite awhile to start calming down.

"Sorry, *sniff* sorry, I just-" "It's okay, Al, it's okay"

Once she calmed down a little, Melissa said, "You feeling any better, Alice?"

She giggled a little. "Not really, but a little bit. Thanks."

"You don't need to thank me. I'm sorry I didn't come sooner."

Between sniffles, Alice asked, "So what made you come now?"

Mel sighed, as she really hadn't been looking forward to this conversation. "Well, I take it you haven't heard much from the office."

"I know I'll be fired soon, if that's what you mean. I didn't even think I was still on the paperwork, to be honest."

"You are, for now at least. Courtney basically gave a cut-off of New Years before you're canned and replaced with Jessica."

Alice frowned a bit. "I mean, it's not like this is a shock or anything. But I gave Courtney more credit for intelligence than this. Seriously, I'm too fucking fat to walk. What does she expect me to do, learn to hover? Honest to God, what a stupid, heartless cow. Well, she can send me a pink slip. It doesn't matter at this point."

Melissa winced. "Um, there's one thing that does."

"What?"

"Courtney cut off your paid leave in late October. And once your final termination goes through, you're not covered under the company's mental health portion of our HMO. In short, those checks will stop, too."

Alice gulped as she took in that information. She had of course noticed when her paid leave ended, but rather then figure out why, had instead chosen to deal with her stress by eating even more. The cam site had more then made up for her loss of revenue, however, so she'd figured everything was fine. But her medical checks were a significant portion of her income, and if those stopped as well...

"Can she even do that!?" Alice asked, a tinge of panic noticeable in her voice.

"Unfortunately, yes. It's in the employee contract we all signed. I tried to find a way around that, but no dice. I'd have to unionize the entire workplace and force a strike before I could get that changed."

"But I need that money! I can't afford to live without it!"

"Hey, I did the best I could do, okay!? It wasn't easy to find out what I did without arousing suspicion. I have to chum up with Jessie, and be polite with Courtney, then ask funky questions of HR and hope nothing gets back to anyone." Melissa winced again. "And, I should probably tell you, but there's a few rumors about you going around the office."

Alice gave a grim chuckle. Patting her belly, she said, "I bet those girls are just loving this."

"Not as many as you might think, but some, yeah. Also, when they talked smack about you, I didn't defend you as much as I should've. And I may have joined in a couple times. Just something like, 'Wow, Mel, you're so skinny,' 'Oh, just trying to avoid winding up like someone we all know.' That sort of thing. I'm so sorry, Allie."

Alice wanted to be mad at Mel, but looking at her tearful face, couldn't bring herself to angry with her best friend. "It's okay, Melissa. I know, it's just office politics b.s."

It was kind of weird how their roles had reversed, Alice thought. From Mel comforting the immobile blob, now it was the blob comforting her. It could almost strike her as funny, except for one rather major worry.

"Mel, I... I don't know what to do. The channel's doing well, but I need that money. Even if I did nothing, I'd be broke in a month. I, I just don't know."

"Channel?"

"Long story."

Melissa raised an eyebrow, but ignored her curiosity for now. "That's actually part of the reason I came here. Al, I want you to move in with me."

Alice blinked in confusion for a moment. "Wait, what?"

"You heard me. I want you to move in with me. You can't stay here. Even if you could afford the rent, you're too big for this apartment. If something happened to you, there's no way to get you the help you'd need fast enough. Also, that bed has been creaking since I walked in here, and even with that nurse helping, there's no zero chance you'd get out of that wreckage and into a new one. And honestly, you're already almost too big to fit through those French doors. Another month as you've been going, and you probably won't, so it really is now or never."

Alice was still a little hesitant. "But Mel, your place isn't any better."

"Actually, I moved into a house a couple months ago. The mortgage was less than my rent, so I said to hell with it and bought the place. It's a big ranch style house with an absolutely huge two car garage. The doors are 10x10; you would literally have to be the size of a whale not to fit in there."

"... A garage."

"Okay, yeah, I know it sounds bad, but the previous guy spent a lot of time making the place into some kind of ultimate man cave. It's got tiled floors, the walls are dry walled and painted, it's well insulated, there's a ton of vents, so heat and a/c aren't a worry. Also, he left this monster of a TV there. Thing has to have, like, a 65 inch screen, and even has a Bose sound system. There's some den furniture too, but we can rearrange that once we get you inside. And there's no basement to worry about either. The whole thing is sitting on a big, reinforced concrete pad."

Alice gave a somewhat sad little smirk at that. She grabbed the closest fatty part of her body, which was her gigantic, lardy breasts. She gave them the best shake she could, making the adipose clogged tissue jiggle like a wet, gelatinous sea for a few seconds. "Worried I was going to fall through the floor?"

"Not really," Mel said. She wasn't lying either. "But I knew you were."

Alice was still unconvinced. "I don't know, Mel. Are you sure you want to live with someone as stupidly fat as me?"

"Nah, babe. I don't want to move in with some gigantic fat ass. I want to move in with you. Just you. Alice. The loveliest woman I've ever known, and my best friend. So, what do you say? Shall we make this happen or what?"

"Even if I get fatter?"

"Even if you get WAY fatter."

"Well, when you put it like that..."
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: "S-sure, I guess. Let her in..."

choices: Settling in
Actually, Alice is hungry again
And now for something completely different
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
"... let's do it!"

"Wait, seriously? It was that easy? I had this whole convincing argument ready to go and everything."

Alice chuckled a bit. "Oh, you can use those anytime. Melissa, I just... thank you. If you hadn't been here..."

"Hey, hey, hey, don't be like that. I don't deserve that much credit. If I did, I'd have been here a lot sooner, and you wouldn't have had to face any of this alone. Not saying I'd have been able to help, but I'd at least have been there. Well, physically. Might have been playing on my phone."

Alice rolled her eyes and sighed. "Couple sentences too far there, Mel."

"I know," Mel said, giggling. "Alright, how soon do you think Sandra can have everything ready to go?"

"I don't think we should make her pack all my stuff by herself. That seems kind of rude."

"Yeah, no shit. I meant the important stuff, like you; a lot of the rest we can just leave to the movers. And to be honest, your living room set is kind of junk, so I'm just going to have them pitch the lot."

Alice flinched as she remembered how her ever-expanding ass had outgrown and destroyed every piece of furniture in her apartment, one piece at a time. "Yeah, that's probably a good call."

"Now, as for getting you out of here..." Melissa walked to the east side of Al's bedroom. Pulling back the curtain, she saw that the French Doors she noticed earlier opened onto a small, ground-level patio area. Though Alice didn't say anything, even 5-600 pounds ago, she'd been too embarrassed to use the provided outdoor space, worried about making a spectacle of herself. "Oh, perfect. I was worried we'd have to take down some railings or something."

"Or cut out a wall," Mel thought, though she kept that to herself.

As she closed the curtain and turned around, she asked Alice, "I gotta know. Why on earth do you have your a/c on in December? It's freezing in here!"

Alice shrugged as best she could. "I overheat really easily, so Sandra leaves it on for me. I'm, well, you know, kind of well-insulated."

Mel blushed a little at her faux pas. "Ah, right. Should have guessed that. Sorry. Still, at least it means we won't really have to worry about you taking a chill from here to the truck, or the truck to my house. Anyway, they can get pretty close from the street, so loading you on shouldn't be too difficult. And if you aren't too set on any particular timetable, we could probably get you moved this weekend. My Christmas holidays start on Friday, and I don't know when the moving companies break for the season. Actually, yeah, this Friday would be perfect. Sure, there'll be more traffic, but nobody will be at home, so we'd be able to move you without an audience."

"Speaking of an audience, what about the movers? Won't they be a little leery of me?" Alice asked as she unconsciously rubbed her morbidly obese frame.

"Don't worry. These guys do discretion. If you add a big enough tip, they'd probably help you hide a body."

"I'm not sure that's really comforting," Alice thought.

If Melissa noticed her discomfort, she didn't give any sign, being too busy with the minutiae of prepping for a rather big move. "Now, as for your stuff, we can probably just..."

******

Despite the distractions at work, Melissa powered through the move with remarkable energy. For someone who was once the fattest, laziest woman in the office, unwilling to exert a single ounce of energy unless there was food for her at the end of it, she had everything planned and executed like a military operation. Douglas MacArthur couldn't have planned a better op then Mel did with this move.

Within two days, Alice could hear the sounds of movers emptying the other rooms of broken furniture and her stuff. Her landlord, who as it turned out was currently on vacation in Hawaii, had been informed of her leaving. Her utilities had been cancelled, and her mail was switched over. Everything went along smoothly, and all too soon, it was Friday.

Alice hadn't been looking forward to this day. No matter what, she was about to be a spectacle for a whole bunch of people, and she really didn't like the sound of that. Though she'd done her darnedest to keep it hidden from Melissa, she'd been stress eating pretty heavily for the last week. And now, with a belly packed with food, the dreaded day was upon her.

A quiet knock sounded from her door, and she heard Mel behind it. "Alice, you ready for this?"

Al shifted her weight a little, though the only visible reaction was a wiggling of her toes. She gave an experimental tug of the sheet that Sandra and Mel had helped her put on to try and save her some decency. It didn't do anything to hide how fat she was, although it did keep her naughty bits hidden. "Though my belly by itself does a pretty fine job of that for everything down south."

"As ready as I'll ever be."

"Okay, here we come," Melissa said, opening the door wide. She was followed in by Sandra and almost a dozen workmen. The general reaction was exactly what she expected- a mix of disgust, amazement, and disbelief was written on every face. Still, Mel had been right about their discretion. No cameras were snapping photos or shooting videos, nor were there any snide cracks. With a few words from their foreman, the workers had assembled around her bed while Sandra went to stand by the doors. Melissa took position with the movers, eager to lend a hand to move Alice.

It took a fair bit of grunting, but at long last, her medical bed began to move. It was slow going, though they did pick up speed as they went along. As the wheeled bed passed the threshold and into the light, Alice saw the sun directly for the first time in a matter of months. It was a lot brighter then she remembered, and her attempt to cover her eyes was laughable, her arms bloated to near-uselessness and far too fat to reach her forehead.

As she passed through the threshold, she felt her widened rear press into both halves of the door frame, and Alice blushed at the thought that she'd quite literally outgrown such a big opening. She felt a pair of hands, one on each side of her ass, push her flabby rear in to allow her to fit out of the door. It proved a success, and with the second attempt, she was out.

One thing Alice noticed, both during the loading process and again while driving down the road, was just how unbelievably jiggly she was. Every little bump had her body sloshing like a bowl of Jello, and the ripples seemed to love passing through her whole core. This was the first time she'd driven (or been driven, rather) anywhere since she'd hit such a massive size, and she really was not enjoying the experience. Matters were made even worse by the fact that she'd eaten such a huge lunch, even by her standards. Frankly, she was hoping she didn't throw up.

Melissa was riding in the back of the truck with her, and Alice struck up a conversation to distract herself from the gelatin wars taking place in her grossly oversized body. "How much further to your place?"

"Our place. And not too much. We've already been on the road for thirty-odd minutes."

Another pothole sent another wave through Alice's trembling lard, and she groaned softly at the uncomfortable sensation. "So, you never said where you heard about these guys."

"I was watching an episode of 60 minutes, and- oh good, we're here."

Alice never had time to ask her "wait, what!?" as the truck pulled to a sudden stop. She was once more blinded as they opened the back. She got a good look at Mel's house as they rolled her up the driveway. It was a good sized place, with blue siding, white trim, and a bright red front door. As they rolled her up to the garage door, she saw that Melissa certainly hadn't been lying about this place. The garage doors were absolutely huge, and even a pair of Alice's would have been able to comfortably exit one. And the interior was perhaps even nicer then described. Even a lot of her stuff was already here, though it was mostly in boxes piled on the floor.

Despite to cold temperatures, the workers were panting and sweating as they rolled Alice through the ultra-wide door, and they let out a collected sigh of relief when Melissa said, "Right there's perfect."

Once the wheels of the medical bed were locked, Melissa cut them a check and closed the garage door behind them. Once the door was firmly shut and locked, she turned to Alice with a big smile on her face. The blob-girl smiled as well, genuinely happy for the first time in a long time.

"Welcome home, Alice," Mel said. "And Merry Christmas."
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Merry Christmas and Welcome Home, Alice

choices: An Alice and Melissa Christmas
Back in the office post-holidays
And now for something completely different
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
"You too, Mel," Alice said. She was grateful that what had been a very tiring day was over. Although she hadn't done anything to help move her enormously bloated body, her atrophied muscles still had the audacity to feel tired and sore. However, as she was about to find out, though was one more step to be taken.

"Okay, Sandra, grab that end and let's roll it over."

Frowning, Alice tried to turn her head towards the other two, but couldn't see from her position. She thought about asking one of them to prop her bed up and let her get a better look, but heard the sound of wheels rapidly approaching her. As the two rolled the device into view, Alice's eyes widened a little.

"Where on earth did you get a bariatric crane from?"

"I know a guy," Mel said as the two lined it up over Alice's bed, not offering any further details. "We'll be right back."

Another bout of squeaking followed, and this time they rolled their prize into her view range. It was easily the largest medical bed she'd ever seen. It clearly had a lot of weight to it, as the two women were breathing pretty heavily as they pushed it into position.

"Okay, Al," Melissa said as she wiped the sweat off her brow. "The plan is pretty straight forward. We'll lift you up with the crane, move out the old bed, and set you on the new one. And that should be that. Sound good?"

Alice, already tired and worried about how they'd manage to move her gargantuan body, said, "I don't know, Mel. Are you sure that thing'll lift me?"

"Unless you weigh over 4800 pounds, it'll take it. This one's a little beefier then the average unit. And that bed can take up to 6,000. Trust me, this'll work like a charm."

"Um, is this really necessary? Like, you know, right now? We just got here, and there's only two of you."

"Hey, Alice, trust me. I'm not going to let anything happen to either you or us. And you can't see what the two of us can. If we don't deal with this now, it'll get be a whole lot worse in the near future."

What Alice couldn't see was the sorry state of her current seat. Her frame supports were starting to develop some pretty severe bends, and Mel had been legitimately worried during the move as with each wobble of Alice's fat, the bed was letting out another awful creak. It'd survived, but Mel really wasn't sure how much life was left to the suffering medical device. She was pretty damn close to saying this was happening, whether she liked it or not.

Alice bit her lip. She was still rather nervous, but she also knew Mel wouldn't have been pushing like this without a reason. "Okay, just... just be careful, okay?"

"Don't worry, we will." And with that, Sandra and Mel set to work making Alice ready for her brief trip to the sky. It was a difficult task, to say the least. The material of the crane had to be slid under under the massive blonde one inch at a time, and seemed to have a particular knack for getting caught on her various anvil-heavy rolls. Sandra and Mel had to take it in turns as to whether they were the one trying to feed the material under her, or the one straining to lift Alice's fatty frame up a scant hair to allow any further access.

Though Mel didn't say anything aloud, she was a little taken aback by just how much give Alice's body had. Her body's fat rolls were so soft that they were surprisingly hard to grip without pinching the corpulent cutie, causing her to give a small gasp of pain. Mel wasn't even sure how far down she'd have to go to find the woman under all this blubber.

It came as something of a shock when they managed to get the material fully under Alice. Making sure it was evenly divided between both sides of her, the two nurses hooked it up the crane mechanism proper. "Alright Alice, you ready?"

"Uh, sure, I guess."

With a loud grinding sound, the crane slowly but surely lifted her. True to Mel's word, the device showed no signs of struggling with this considerable load Alice must have been. She felt a tight, uncomfortable sensation as her more distant pockets of lard drooped under the pull of gravity for the first time in quite awhile. Still, it was far from unbearable, but she definitely didn't like the feeling of being off a solid surface. It may have only been a few feet off the ground, but at her weight, Alice was under no illusion how bad even a small fall could potentially be.

Compared to getting Alice loaded up, swapping out the beds went remarkably quickly, and she was lowered into the new one in a matter of moments.

"Okay, I'll admit it is actually really nice not to feel my butt falling off my bed," Alice said, avoiding admitting that she meant both sides simultaneously.

Mel wiped some sweat from her brow. She pulled Alice's hair out from behind her flabby shoulders so she wasn't laying on it as she replied, "I'll bet. This one also has a few more features then your old one. It's designed to breathe a lot better, has full tilt controls, and we can even set it up with an emergency button if you want. Tilt your head forward a bit."

As Alice tilted her head forward, pushing her real chin into her fatty ones, her treacherous belly let out a deep, rumbling growl. Alice blushed as Mel smirked. She said, "And once we get the old bed out of here, I think we should do something for supper. Delivery pizza work for you?

Alice went a little redder as her stomach growled once more. "Yeah, food might be a good idea."

Alice ran her chubby sausage fingers over her thick layers of blubber, her blue eyes looking over her new home. She saw just how bent the frame of her old bed was, but refused to say anything about it even as her heart dropped into her stomach. "Every time I start to relax, something has to remind me how fat I am, doesn't it?"

When Melissa got back, Alice said, "Mel, thanks again for letting me stay here. Could you just, you know, not tell anyone I'm staying here? Like, at the office. I don't care about the rumors, but I really don't want them to know what's actually going on with me."

"Yeah, I can keep it under my hat for now," Mel said as she opened the take-out menu. "So, what do you want?"
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: A new throne for the royal tush

choices: While Christina sticks to her diet, Jessica and Melissa go drinking - and eating
Courtney has to go on a business trip to corporate.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
While winter was still around after the new year, the holidays had finally gone. Besides the winter, however, the weight accrued from the fattening feasts of the holiday season remained as well.

Christina wobbled her way breathily from her office to the break room. She rubbed at her knees - she was surely somewhere over 500, but her stomach was in that range where it's enjoying its golden age of singularity - but tellingly close to being a great fold of fat in its own right as the fat folds on her great, wide, lardy back lined her sides, from her upper back to her love handles. Her great stomach solidly lay over her crotch, its very lower regions dangling and jiggling in front of her taxed, fattened legs. Christina panted intensely. What made her walk so much more difficult?

The answer could be found in the first objective she aimed for in the break room; the donuts. While the tasty holiday varieties had switched out for the more mundane varieties, these still fattened just as much. Melissa, Jessica and Victoria sat in the break room, munching away at their own waistline-widening treats. "Hey, Christie." spoke Melissa through a mouth of Cruller. "Hey...Mel.." panted Christina. "Phew...I don't know...Feels like an...eternity..." Before Christina could finish catching her breath, Victoria asked the question. "What does?" "Walking here from my office." finished Christina, taking a breath after the sentence.
