Victoria herself hadn't escaped the holiday gains. Her rear and legs had especially widened - she wore a new set of turquoise pants bought in her new, expanded size. Her belly hadn't gone without its own gains, naturally, but Victoria's love handles which expanded with her hips were more of a threat to her shirts. "Yeah, I been feeling the same. Maybe it's something to do with all that eating over the holidays." Christina sighed. "Yeahhh, probably." She gazed down at her gut. Somewhere in the back of her mind, it panged that she had, a short time ago, been much smaller. "Like, I'm probably gonna do what I can to cut down. But I don't know if I can -diet- anymore, ya know?" Melissa nodded. "Yeah... It's hard for me to get back on track after the holidays." Melissa's old gut began to put its foot in the door as her old blouse stretched in a desperate gamble to hold back Melissa's grown stomach. "I keep trying to remind myself to get back to the gym, but it's hard - still pretty cold." It was always the temperatuare that was the reason why, and not her growing laziness.

Of course, Jessica was growing to outshine the rest of the office in her gluttony and lethargy. Her red blouse with its flowers of gold was bursting at each possible opening with Jessica's gut which was on the verge of surpassing her knees while sitting, just short of being level with her kneecaps. Her gut wasn't quite the size of Christina's, to say nothing of Alice, but it was still considerable and its expansion gave her a bit of physical grief, but clearly not mental grief. "I don't get dieting, you know? Like, yeah, clothes are nice to have, but why bother starving yourself when you can just buy new, better clothes?" Melissa and Victoria chuckled, giving a hearty "Amen, sister!" Christina leaned on the counter, rubbing her stomach self-consciously. "I mean, I don't know. It's getting a bit much - it's hard to walk, and I don't want to have to be waited on to go take a crap." Victoria and Jessica gave a little chuckle. Melissa joined in half-heartedly. A brief silence followed, broken again by Christina's voice. "I might try to relax on eating so much. Like, the holidays are nice, but.. I don't know. It's starting to get boring." Jessica spoke up. "I mean, you do you, girl. More donuts for me." As if to prove the point, great, fattened Jessica took another donut while finishing her current treat and washing it down with a gulp of coffee.

As the time to get back to work came, Christina struggled upward, but failed her first attempt. "Uh, hey, Jess, could you give me a hand?" she inquired. Jess looked quizzically. "Hmm? With what?" Christina sighed and explained, "I can't get up, can you help me up?" Jessica nodded and with a bit of effort, she also shoved herself up, stretching before going to help Christie. With Jessica as a crutch beneath her left arm and her right focusing on getting up, Christina ascended from her seat. "Whoo! Thanks, Jess." She gave Jessica a pat on her great, blubbery back, perforated with rolls of fat which jiggled on Christina's pat.

The difficulty in getting up concerned Christina. She had seen Alice the last time anyone but Melissa had seen her, and the concept of being immobile frankly scared her. She valued her physical independence, and she did not want the fate that Alice now faced - confined to a bed and an oxygen tank for years. She grew a determination in the face of this fate - she was going to stick to her resolution.

At least, that's what she told herself.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: The Office settles down.

choices: Sandra's increasing poundage is an issue - she's hard pressed to care for Alice.
The office gets more inquisitive about Alice's condition to Mel.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
"Alright, folks, we'll be back after this quick break." spoke Marni's radio-carried voice over the Gordge breakroom. Jessica and Melissa munched on their lunches - respectively, a grilled cheese with a cookie and a bag of chips - with a few donuts, to be sure - and a burger with a medium fry, and a medium coke. "Aww. Was just getting good with that story about the bear in her backyard." spoke Melissa's voice. "Yeah," spoke Christina through a mouthful of Caesar Salad.

Christina was frustratingly stuck to her diet. She had glomped onto online claims about the benefits of Keto - or to be more brief, focusing on eating less carbohydrates. Normally, Christina would consider really any diet short of just sticking to baked chips too extreme, but Alice's worsening health and mobility had truly shocked her. It had been a few weeks - and she'd dropped a good twenty pounds. All water weight from cutting most of the sodium out of her diet - but it didn't fail to impress the girls. "I just can't get over how good you are at that." spoke Victoria. "Good at what?" asked Christina. "Sticking to that diet. You've lost how much already?" Christina blushed and spoke proudly, "Oh, uh, twenty pounds. I'm back down to 482. I'm telling you, keto's great. I figured out how to make Keto pizza which is a quarter of the calories of normal pizza!"

Jessica chortled, jiggling as she did so. "Yeah - tell me when it tastes as good." Christina bit her tongue, stopping her mouth. Though the heights of holiday gluttony were temporarily gone, that did not mean Jessica hadn't stopped gaining. She herself had put on a good ten pounds by the February after the new year, not hurt in this aspect by the strictness of Christina's diet. Jessica swore that her blouse had shrunk in the wash, but it was clearly on its very last legs. It was almost anxiety-inducing to watch Jessica breathe - every single shallow breath of the lard laden woman's great, heaving gut seemed prone to rip out a button. She guessed that the brunette was either at weight parity with her, or just below - somewhat terrifying, as Jessica had just come in 5 months ago, and had gained nearly 60-70 pounds in that time. Christina couldn't hold back just one snipe. "Certainly will. You really ought to try it." Jessica chuckled. "Nah - I'll stick with the real deal." Christina rolled her eyes and dug back into her caesar salad. "Your loss." For the moment, she could swear that the change of pace in what she ate was actually refreshing.

As the workplace came to closing time, Jessica gave off a small yip of terror as a small series of 'snaps' came from her office. As the rest of the office shuffled bloatedly out into the hallway, Melissa glanced at the sight of Jessica's fat, pale, heaving gut exposed bare, dangling towards the floor and between her knees, rubbing her calves as her red-gold blouse hung open, exposing her ill-fitting red bra which held up her breasts. All of the buttons had popped out, and laid in front of the bent-over obese woman. "Need some help, Jess?" The sweating, half-naked fat woman nodded breathlessly. Melissa helped pick them up and held them. She meant to ask Jessica if she wanted to borrow a dress jacket, but the small whale of a woman was already jiggling towards an elevator. Melissa watched, but followed her. "You'll need to change for our bar-hop tonight." Jessica beamed. "Oh, yeah. You know I've got my new big girl dress for tonight. Probably made for a real woman like me." Her very public wobble out to the parking lot was met with a lot of whispering, even for Gordge. Though fatness was more or less encouraged, it was still a business. Jessica barely missed one snipe which was overheard by many - "I didn't know employees over 500 pounds didn't need to wear clothes." While she wasn't literally there - it was nearing the mark to say that she could be mistaken for 500.

The two blimps pulled up to Miko's Bar and Grill about 6, hugging each other in the parking lot. Melissa wore a black blouse, whose buttons struggled to maintain their fattened owner. Melissa hadn't quite gotten out of the holiday mentality, and she still hadn't gotten back to the gym or on her old routine, and it was showing. She was just a pound or two ahead of Jessica, whose burgundy dress was not as loose-fitting as she had sold it - still clinging to each fat fold in her great, blubbery back. "Hey girly!" spoke Jessica. "Let's get fucked up!"

The two waddled in as a hockey match was on - their local team, the Rollers were on against the Rock City Giants. The bar was full of cheering and yelling as one of their players shoved a man in a teal Giants jersey aside and smacked the puck home for a goal. Jessica and Melissa wobbled up to the bar, aloof of the snickers and stares of a few pairs of fresh college graduate sorority sisters, giggling at the absurdly fat pair. One especially inebriated one could barely control her voice. "Do-Doesn't she know that, that, that dress doesn..n't fit? She'sss a little too fat for that." The increasingly drunk booth giggled, drowned out by mostly by the screams, and Melissa's order as she struggled to sit properly on the high stool with her great wideness. "One Moscow Mule." Jessica beamed. "Can I get an Old Fashioned? Oh, and a basket of Mozzarella sticks." The overtaxed and blubbery man of a bartender nodded and spoke. "Comin' right up for youse."

The atmosphere was thick with the smell of alcohol and excitement as Jessica leaned in to ask Melissa a question, "How's Alice been doing? Have you seen her lately?" Melissa had to quickly gauge how honest to be - this was a hard question for her. She wanted to try to save Alice's reputation, as a friend - but she also wanted to be truthful to Jessica - for friendship's sake. She found a middle road. "Oh, uh, I've seen her lately - she needed some help getting up." Jessica nodded. "How big is she now?" "Uhh," stalled Melissa, "Bigger, definitely - she has somebody helping her out now. But she's a nice girl - name's Sandra. She's a big girl - bigger than Christie." Jessica chuckled as the bartender came back around and spoke. "Anything else I can gets for youse?" Melissa spoke. "Yeah - let's get 24 wings, half Garlic Parm, half hot." The bartender nodded and placed the drinks and hot, delicious-smelling Mozzarella sticks down.

The two blubbery women chatted away as best as they could - but Melissa ensured to move the topic to the game. She wanted to reveal as little about Alice's true, worsening condition as she could. The mozzarella sticks depleted quickly, and the Bartender was able to serve the two another round of alcohol, two beers. The two got around to ordering two more as the wings arrived, swiftly delivered. Their speech began slurring and concentration became harder. They cheered that bit more enthusiastically. Eventually, after the two finished their twelve wings each, they had another pair of beers. The game had pulled to a stop, but they were in no mood to stop celebrating.

Things became blurry.. Somewhere to Melissa's right, she heard a rip. Jessica gave a drunken chuckle - a rip had opened in the front of her brand new dress. "Whoopsh.." spoke Jessica. "Guess I- Gu-Guess I'm full." The bartender chimed in, "Youse got that right." Jessica giggled and slapped her partially exposed belly. The bartender chuckled.

By the end of the night, the two ladies needed the bouncer, a few unfortunate wait staff, and the bartender to drag them to their taxi, which needed to break out its belt extenders for the two great, fat, women. The night was one which Jessica and Melissa would talk about for weeks - one which solidified their relationship for a while to come.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Day and Night.

choices: While Melissa is gaining, Christina is losing. The same can't be said for Jess.
Sandra gets called in to her 'home' hospital about her weight.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
While Christina's response to Alice's drastic change in condition was to try to go the opposite way in an extreme way, Sandra seemed to have learned no lesson at all as she panted her way from the front door to Alice's garage lair.

The blonde, obese mirror of who Alice was had become more and more like her patient as the holidays turned into February and March. Her massive stomach which dangled downward now continued its race outward, sideways, and downward as it began hampering her movement, and her thighs and arms which had taken an extra blow from the past round of gains had made her blue nurses' outfit stretch. Her waist, about 63 inches before the holidays, was now 70. Odd as it was as a nurse, she did not step on a scale, and she did not hear criticism much as her "office" had moved to Melissa's kitchen. If one had to guess, she could be guesstimated at the upper 400's, but it was plain by what she snuck into Alice's orders that she would not stay there.

Her steady stream of fattening appetizers between meals, and her actual meals themselves, though, still paled in comparison to what Alice's 'normal' amount of food. An actual norm was establishing itself - it was as though the voices of Alice's demons were finally being quieted under the sound of the oxygen tank which allowed her struggling lungs to distribute air to a 1000 pound body. Her massive appetite had been curbed as her demons petered out slowly, and as a result of her decreased intake, she had lost about 7 pounds as the year had ground on due to the metabolism needed to sustain such a massive size. However, she was still not close to losing any large amount of weight - not that it seemed that the monument to obesity that was Alice could lose weight at this point. But for where Alice was in terms of her appetite, it still seemed a miracle that she could achieve anything like a balance in eating.

The acceptance that Melissa gave off was therapeutic in that aspect.Melissa's increasing poundage as the year creeped from the dying days of winter into the pale dawn before spring, however, was not exactly enticing a life change in Alice.

The only thing that might seem to help that in Alice was the fact that Sandra's ballooning waist hindered her ability to continue feeding Alice the volume she had grown used to as a 'minimum' as she struggled with her eating disorder. Alice watched a discovery channel show as she allowed her lunch to digest, only to feel a familiar grumble in her stomach. "Sandra." she spoke. Sandra gave a drowsy "Hmm?" in reply. "Uhh, I'm feeling a little hungry. Could you order some take-out from Guo Min's? Tell him I want the General Tso's chicken with a side of egg rolls. Sandra nodded and attempted to stand up, but was hindered by her weight. Her arm strength had suffered as well as her weight increased - she struggled to get out of her chair after the 'exhausting' exertion to retrieve Alice's lunch from the door. "G'mme a sec..." She panted and huffed, giving it another shove, finally lurching forward, a glistening of sweat lining her forehead. "Phew." She waddled out the door and to the phone.

It was about that time that Melissa waddled in, about as winded from the walk from her driveway through the door. "Oh, heySandra.." she spoke. She took a breath and called to Alice. "Hey Al!" Alice called heartily back. "Mel! How was work?" Melissa unbuttoned her dress jacket and hung it in her closet, releasing the great strain on the taxed buttons. "Oh, not bad, the workload's starting to pick up so we can get profits up for mid-year." Melissa's trips to Miko's had become more frequent after their last excursion, and the toll of the liquid calories of the alcohol and the fried, fatty food of Niko's grill really began to show. The dress jacket had begun to give its last effort, and Melissa strained to even get the pressed buttons to move to the hole. "C'mon, damnit... stupid jacket must've shrunk in the wash. I'll have to get it up-sized." Revealed below was her white dress-blouse, skin-tight and fighting to contain Melissa's increasing vastness, which was achieving just around Sandra's old size. Her fitting for the blouse last week had given her waist size as 59, but she'd easily put on another inch since then - the blouse was going from well-filled to struggling.

To avoid confronting such blatant evidence that her routine was fading away and that she was on track to gain her old pounds back, she changed into sweatpants and a 5XL shirt - Men's, of course - women's sizes were getting a bit too small for comfy clothes. She grabbed a bag of chips and plopped her massive rear-end onto her couch.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Sandra's unlearned lessons.

choices: Alice and Mel's Big Fat Life
To diet, or not to diet
And now for something completely different
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
"I suspect you know why you're here?"

"N-no, I'm afraid I haven't the foggiest." Sandra rubbed her hands nervously. She was seated before not only her direct superior at the hospital, Head Nurse MacDiarmid, but also his superiors, doctors Elizabeth Smith and Malcolm Fidler. The fact that all three of them were present for this meeting had Sandra scared beyond words, as this couldn't mean anything good.

"Initially, this meeting was just going to be the two of us regarding your lack of regular status reports. In particular, the fact that your charge changed her address and the fact that you failed to notify the hospital."

"I meant to, but I-"

MacDiarmid cut her off. "I wasn't finished. Then there's the number of unusual expense claims, or rather the lack thereof."

Doctor Smith added her two cents at this point. Pushing her wire-framed glasses up her nose, she brushed a blonde hair out of her eye and said, "However, the reason we're here is because of the state you came in after all this time. Namely, the fact that you've blown up like a balloon."

Sandra rubbed her enlarged belly at the accusation. "That's hardly fair, Miss. I've always been a bit heavy, and you can't discriminate against me on those grounds."

Unfortunately for Sandra, Elizabeth was prepared for just such a response. "It's not discrimination if your physical capabilities are not up to the task of aiding in the care of your charge. I watched you walk across the parking lot, and you took four breaks on the way in. You then sat in the waiting area to catch your breath."

"Well, yes, but-"

"For nearly twenty minutes."

"But, you see, Miss, I-"

"When did you last weigh yourself, Sandra? Or do any sort of exercise?"

"It... has been awhile, I'll admit."

"I figured." The blonde doctor scribbled something on the pad in her hands. "I'm scheduling you for a full physical in order to assess whether or not you can still carry out your duties. The simple fact is that you need to get back into some kind of shape, and soon. If there was a medical emergency right now, you'd be more of a hindrance than a help in your current state, and that is totally unacceptable in a home-stay nurse. We'll speak more after your physical."

Sandra simply nodded, and rose to follow Doctor Fidler to the examination room. Already, she was trying to think of a way to get out of this terrible situation she found herself in.

******

"Jesus. 462 pounds, eh? How exactly did you fail to notice the scale of your gain before now?"

Sandra rubbed her hands together as she answered. "I did notice a bit, Miss, but I didn't think it was as bad as this. I was so busy taking care of Alice Gellar that I failed to appreciate the scale of the problem until it was too late."

Doctor Smith turned a page in the folder in front of her. "She's bedridden, as per your reports. How would you rate the difficulty of her care, on a scale of 1 to 10?"

"A 7 or an 8, I think. She doesn't need intensive care, but she does require someone constantly present to attend to her needs. This made it rather difficult to attend to my own, Miss."

"Doctor," Elizabeth corrected her. "Would you be able to better care for your patient and yourself with additional help?"

Sandra mentally smiled, equal parts happy and amazed that her plan was working. "Yes, Doctor."

Doctor Smith started writing in the file as she said, "Alright. I'm assigning two additional nurses under you to aid in Miss Gellar's care. This will ease the burden placed upon your shoulders. However, this is not an excuse to ignore what brought you here today. While I can only recommend losing weight, you still need to meet the minimum qualifications for Home-stay. If your physical abilities haven't improved in six months, you will be pulled off duty until such time that they have. Understood?"

"Yes, Ma'am," Sandra said as she got up to leave. "I can't believe I survived that!"

******

So what happens next?

Option 1:

Three nurses, two fit and one not, are better able to get food to Alice then just one out-of-shape nurse. Combined with her slowing metabolism, Alice begins to rapidly balloon once more. Though it is admittedly a little hard to tell with a woman that massive...

(A/N: Please do not harm Alice or make her suffer unduly. I have a happy ending in mind for her, but the road to get there is going to see her get rather huge first.)

As for her room mate, between work and after-hours binging, Melissa is beginning to pack on the pounds again in a big way. She's also been joining Alice in the garage frequently to eat and watch movies, and is inadvertently benefiting from the nurses as well.

Sandra, meanwhile, is a big "what do?" She knows she needs to get in better shape. Does she stick to her guns and shed some pounds, or fail and fail hard?

Option 2:

Back at the office, Jessica is growing by leaps and bounds, but what about Christina? Is her developing mobility issues and memories of Alice enough to make her stick to her diet, or is she already starting to backslide?

Option 3:

Say it with me now: And now for something completely different
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Sandra's Supersized Situation

choices: Cut to Jessica and Christina at kickboxing. Jessica struggles HARD.
Alice has a problem - her sister's trying to find her.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
A matter of a few months and more than a few pounds seemed to pass.

Christina grew a new appreciation for coffee - she had read that it helped suppress appetite. On the downside, she was drinking it progressively more than she had before, and it became almost second - nature to reach for the dark, black drink. At first it gave her the jitters, but she was growing used to increasing amounts of caffeine. This technique and her steadfast dieting had done her weight wonders - she was dropping the pounds so fast that she could hardly keep her clothes in size - she had eschewed her old beige blouse and gold skirt for a black and white dress which showcased her slimmed figure. Her love handles had shrunk significantly, her tree-trunk legs had similarly shrank, and the same could certainly be said of her stomach.

She had dropped another fifteen pounds. Still good progress, but Christina couldn't help but feel slightly dissapointed at how her weight loss was slowing down. Additionally, Keto was getting to be a bit rigorous - she was sure to do her research and double-checked on the RIGHT way to do it. But had she gotten it right? Along with these doubts, cravings began to sneak back in, and she found herself dreaming about the break room donuts. She responded to recalling this thought now by taking another sip of her coffee. Of course, this wasn't the only craving that was calling her - she always used to love the Ultimate Meats pizza from her local pizza delivery place, Uncle Giovanni's. The crust was always almost buttery, with pepperoni, and bacon, and sausage, and beef...

Damn it, her mouth was watering. She wiped her mouth and drank more coffee, as if to drown the thought. To try to properly drown it, she finished her cup and waited a second. The thoughts began to leave as she converted the caffeine into hand speed. The heavy dosing of coffee was leading to an improved output from Christina, and she was already pretty brilliant at moving her workload forward. While the future of her diet was becoming uncertain, it had held so far, and being down

Of course, the exact opposite could be said for Jessica. She was as social as ever, sitting in the break room and talking with Victoria and Mel. Of course, being social in the Gordge offices meant eating. Melissa had put on another good 10 pounds at least and was up from around the mid 450's to the high 460's, maybe even 470. Of course, she was dwarfed by Jessica. She seemed to get fatter every single day. While Christina had lost 15 pounds, Jessica had put on 20, and was officially into the 500's, and Jessica had the curse of perpetually looking 20 pounds fatter than she was. Her stomach still held out from being double, but her 4 rolls had grown to 5 as a small mini-fold between her two thickest ones respectively on her upper back and one above her ass. Her red-gold blouse had long gone into the trash, replaced by a fairly bland white blouse with far too many X's in the XL. At the moment, most of the shirt was stable, save for Jessica's mammoth gut eternally protruding and stretching the fabric at her stoutest point.

But, of course, Jessica wasn't worrying about it. She was enjoying talking to Melissa about one of their latest excursions. "I don't remember doing that." said Melissa after swallowing a bite of donut. "Hoe, I've got the damn photo~-" "Show me, show me." Jessica chuckled. "Alright, here, gimme a second.." She shoved up and did her best to heave her mass up. She raised herself up, slowly - there was a lot of mass to heave up - thirty seconds on, however, Jessica managed to get up with difficulty, causing beads of sweat to drip down her brow as she wobbled over to Melissa. It may have been the fact that Jessica had never really had a "fit phase," but her fat always seemed especially loose and jiggly as her stomach jiggled in waves to the beat of her heavy footfalls. She showed off the photo of Melissa stripping her blouse off while standing on a table, which had just cracked in half as Melissa's bloated form had stood atop it in the photograph. "Oh, shit, I really did break that table!" chuckled Melissa. Her expanded gut shook with delight as her hands rested subconsciously on them.

Christina walked in with a mug of coffee and her lunch - a Tupperware bin filled with disgustingly healthy Keto baked ziti using specially bought pasta made from cauliflower. Christina subconsciously flared her nostrils and quietly snorted when she bit into the cauliflower pasta. She'd heard about the supposedly wonderful taste of the vegetable, but its frequency in "clean Keto" recipes were frankly pissing her off. "Hey, Christie." spoke Jessica. "Hey, Jess." Melissa chimed in, "How's the diet going?" "Pretty well, Pretty well." said Christina. "I'm starting a kickboxing class tomorrow - the old Gym routine is getting a bit stale, and I heard kickboxing can really whip you into shape." Christina worded her phrase very carefully - she was partially becoming more frustrated with her ever-expanding co-workers as she focused on getting healthy, subconsciously trying to pin her cravings on them. If I don't straight up ask them, they'll become just like Alice, thought Christina. "You really ought to think about joining me." Jessica sighed and spoke. "Uh... Hell, when is it?" Christina's face perked up. "Uh, it's tomorrow, at eight." Jessica shrugged. "Eh, hell, why not. Been getting a little stir-crazy anyways." Melissa shrugged and spoke. "I'll pass." Christina's eyes darted to Melissa's stomach as she thought, You really need it. Christina didn't say this - she still wanted to stay Melissa's friend and there was no shorter path to losing that than outright calling her fat - but she thought she could get away with just staring at Melissa with a glance that said the same thing. "What?" asked Melissa." Christie's eyes visibly moved to Melissa's large stomach, then back to her face. "Oh, get out, I've been good recently." Christina shrugged. "Alright, if you say so." Melissa scoffed indignantly. "What's that supposed to mean?" Christina shrugged. "I don't know, what is it supposed to mean?" Melissa's eyes narrowed with anger. "I'm fine, I've lost a lot of weight." Christina couldn't hold her frustration back any longer, "Lost as in, past tense. Now you're gaining it back." Jessica sighed and spoke up. "Christie, don't - " Melissa's eyes widened more in shock. "Bullshit, no I haven't.." her words trailed off as her crossed arms rested on her stomach. She heaved herself up and stomped off.

Christina sighed and turned to Jessica. "I didn't mean to say that." Jessica shrugged. "I mean, it's whatever, she has put on a bit of weight, but like, you shouldn't get so on her about it. Especially with me in the room." Christina turned to Jessica. "Oh, girl, don't get so hard on yourself." Jessica spoke honestly, calmly, and bluntly. "No, but it's true. I'm fat. Like, really fat. I'm just fine with it." Christina was somewhat shocked by this honesty. Jessica chuckled. "What, you thought I wouldn't notice? I have a scale at home. I'm just happy with being fat." "But how do you just deal with everything that comes with it?" asked Christina. "I've been getting big for the past few years since I got here, and I just... I don't know, getting so big...How do you ignore everyone?" Jessica nodded. "I just realize that they're judging me based off of what they've been raised in. It's a societal bias - like, when airplane seats are designed for someone half my size and I have to buy two seats. That's what I mean. People get told you can't be fat and happy - well, hell, I'm happy, and I'm getting fatter all the time." Christina nodded. Something inside her really ticked with this statement.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Pounds go up, Pounds go down.

choices: Accept the call
Decline the call
Pretend it's a wrong number
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
After her third trip to the kitchen, Callie was really starting to rethink her career choice.

When she'd gone to nursing school, she'd thought she'd be making a difference. Helping people with serious health problems; aiding returning a child to health; helping ease the burden of lost loved ones.

She never thought she'd be helping a living blob get even bigger.

Callie also hadn't expected she'd have to sign for so many deliveries. Her patient, Alice Gellar, seemed to have quite the following online, and she'd set up a system for her fan base to send groceries to her house. And there was a ton of food being delivered.

Callie rubbed her back as she put the last package on the counter. She brushed a long strand of her red hair behind her left ear as she thought, "If I hadn't seen how much she can eat, I'd really be starting to worry about all this going to waste."

Callie and her coworker, Jennie, were the new nurses sent to aid Sandra in taking care of Alice. So far, Callie was quite happy working with Jennie. The short young woman was a hard worker with a bubbly personality, and her face was often lit with a bright smile, which seemed all the brighter when contrasted with her caramel complexion.

Her opinions of Sandra weren't quite as rosy. She seemed eager to drop as much of the workload on her two underlings as she could, and it often took threats of calls to the hospital to make her hold up her end.

For right now, at least, the three had managed to come up with a working system, with the nurses taking the different roles in turns.

One would be based in the kitchen and also had duties monitoring the front door. This nurse would sign for the endless stream of fatty foods, organize it into the cupboards, and cook the few things that weren't ready to eat out of the package. This was Callie's day for these duties.

One would be running between the garage and kitchen, which was admittedly a very short walk, funneling food and other needed items into Her Lardness' bottomless maw. Jennie currently had this role, and was in fact rolling her cart into the kitchen to reload.

Callie raised her one eyebrow. "Already?"

Jennie merely shrugged. "You know what she's like."

"I know, I know. But still, Jesus. How can she eat so much?"

"Practice," Jennie giggled as she grabbed a couple pizza boxes and a bag of burgers.

Callie only sighed. In truth, she had nothing against Alice. She and Jennie had found her to be one of, if not the, nicest person they'd ever known. Still, she was already so huge, and nothing she was doing right now was helping that.

Callie shook her head as she passed Jennie a box of cookies and a six pack of coke. "I suspect she'll want dessert and something to drink as well."

******

The third duty roster went to the nurse dealing with Alice directly, which today was Sandra. This nurse monitored her well being, opened packages, passed her things, and other such things. This was the nurse who was primarily responsible for keeping her clean, although the three had very quickly realized that was a two person job minimum, and Alice was well on her way to making it all three.

The blonde behemoth had gotten a lot fatter over the last few months.

Though it wasn't currently possible to get exact numbers, there was no doubt that Alice's weight had risen in a big way, and would only continue to do so if she kept eating at her current pace. The sound of Alice's chewing made a steady backdrop of noise, and Jennie didn't even notice it anymore as she rolled the cart in.

Alice's cheeks jiggled merrily as she happily chewed, and her huge triple chin spread across her lardy collarbone. Her arms had expanded in girth as well, going from turkeys to whole hogs. The largest rolls on her arms now stretched so far from her bones that they remained inert and only jiggled slightly despite the fact that her arms (much like her jaws) were in constant motion.

Below the neck, however, was where her gain was most impressive.

Her breasts were unbelievably huge, each individually able to outweigh a normal person. Between them and her dome-like belly, her once vast shelf of flesh had finally grown too large to be useful as such. With their sheer mass, had it not been for her gargantuan belly, they would have eventually forced their way to the bed far, far below.

Her gut, though, was something else entirely. Her four belly rolls had thickened and widened immensely, and had been joined by an equally massive fifth. Her knees had first disappeared into their own fat, and now her belly had expanded forward to leave them forever a mystery to everyone, save when her nurses had to shift her fat for cleaning. Even with her bed at maximum tilt, Alice's face was barely able to peer over her enormous middle features. Her belly and bust was rising further into her view by the day, though Alice was so far too embarrassed to ask anyone to raise the TV to a better height.

Alice's ass and thighs were certainly not about to let her pretender of a belly take the title of the biggest around, however. Her butt cheeks by themselves probably outweighed even the largest of her three nurses, and though they hadn't yet reached the edges of her bed, it seemed only a matter of time before they did so. Her fatty thighs and calves had maintained pace, leaving almost no gap between her splayed out limbs for her belly to sink to the mattress.

As Alice finished the last of the doughnuts in her hands, she licked her fingers clean as a massive rumble echoed from deep within her titanic amount of fat, signalling her endless hunger. "How hasn't she plateaued yet?" Jennie thought as she pushed the cart alongside the beached whale's resting place.

"How fat is she, even? 1100? 1200? More? How much fatter can she actually get?"

Such questions would have to wait, as Callie came in with a phone.

"Hey Alice, there's someone calling for you? Doesn't sound like a fanboy."

Alice accepted the first burger from Jennie with a quick thanks. "Who is it?"

She almost choked on her first bite as Callie said, "She says her name is Stephanie, and claims to be your sister."

(A/N: Sorry if this is a little rushed. I've an early day at work tomorrow, and this was taking way longer to write then I'd thought it would.)
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Alice's "Big" Reveal?

choices: Christina and Jessica do the kickboxing - Jessica struggles extraordinarily.
Stephanie is determined to find Alice - can she stay hidden forever?
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Alice frantically waved her hand. She had NO desire to talk to Stephanie - Stephanie had seemingly lost her mind when she had discovered Alice was over 500 pounds. Alice was now around double that size - so fat that she could not care for herself in any way at all. And now Stephanie was trying to touch base with Alice, after her demons had taken hold and fattened her to the size of an industrial-sized sack of lard. "No, uh, no thank you." She wolfed down the rest of the burger, stressing over this revelation. Callie spoke over the phone "Uh, sorry, she doesn't want to speak to you right now. Thank you for calling!" Some indistinct rushed protests were quickly silenced by the ending of the call, and the hanging up of the phone.

Melissa entered the house, carrying two great bags of fast food. She went with the first into the garage and handed it to Alice. "Hey, Al." Melissa handed the great elephantine woman her bag of fast food. The black-haired woman had been eating with an increased intensity tonight, after since Christina blew up at her in the office. The argument over her weight made her think about the scale in her closet, subconsciously, worrying - Is Christina right? Am I getting fatter? Alice replied - "Hey, Mel. Thanks - really appreciate it. How's the office?" Melissa angrily shook her head. "Christina's been a bitch. She's been on this diet and now she's got that whole "Fat girl who's losing weight" thing - she bitched me out and said I was gaining weight." Alice sighed. "That's sad to hear - I always liked Christie." She took a breath from her oxygen tubes and spoke. "Steph tried to call me today - told the nurses to hang up on her." Melissa opened her bag and started munching on a fistful of fries. "God, not her. She was unbearable. Don't tell me she's gonna try to come up here again?" Alice quavered slightly as she replied, "I really hope not. Then again, I don't know what she could do to me. I can't even get up, so she can't take me to the gym anymore."

Melissa munched on the first of her double bacon cheeseburgers as she spoke, "Heh. Build a wall around your house, maybe." Alice chuckled. "I always wanted a castle. I told you when I was little, I wanted my dad to do that? Build a big stone wall around the house so we'd have a castle?" Melissa smiled as she shook her head. "No, I never knew that - that's a real mood though. Like, I'm a queen, bitch, you peasants shouldn't come NEAR me." Alice's great mountain of fat rose and fell as she laughed, as did Melissa's moderate hill of fat which rode atop her growing thighs which strained her pants, having already dug a hole through in the inner thigh of the pants. Her D breasts sat atop her gut, up from her old C.

Afterward, Melissa brought herself to the couch to dig in to her great, fattening feast of another double cheeseburger and her two orders of fries - one large, one small. She dug through the food and her drink hungrily, having changed into her looser black shirt - though the old Pajama shirt was starting to get less loose and tighten as her belly began peeking out from the bottom, just above her grey sweatpants. After finishing her meal and as nighttime closed in, Melissa couldn't stave off the curiosity - How much DO i weigh? She had to find out. She opened her closet and stepped onto the ready electric scale, which was white - browning slightly at the glassy pressure plate which was dusting over. Melissa waited the requisite 5 seconds, holding still, then stepping off.

The glowing blue display read out: 487.5 pounds. Melissa was shocked: Christina had told the truth - she was certainly getting fatter. But what to do about it? Part of her wanted to get back on track of losing weight - but she had gone so far from where she was, could she even go back now? These questions plagued the fat woman as she laid down for a night of sleep. Her dreams were troubled - she had traded places with Alice - she was just as massive, barely able to see past her own fat. Standing at her bedside was her mother - fairly standard for her nightmares, berating her for her weight - but not with her usual bitchy, angry tone. This one was almost with a bereaved, mourning tone. She was speaking in the past tense - that was odd as well. What the hell did any of this mean?
Melissa thought on this, and the larger question of her largeness as she woke up the next morning.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Giving the slip.

choices: Jenna invites the office on a paid cruise and vacation - fattening follows.
Melissa gets a visitor at the office - Stephanie, and she's gotten out of shape.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
The evening was quite humid, and Christina could truly feel the comparative heat of the summer night in her grey tee shirt and shorts. The still bubbery woman's fat jiggled significantly less, but her tank top still struggled to hold her slightly more firm bulk, which was still considerable. She stood in sharp contrast to the rest of the toned, even the fairly chunkier women. She was still somewhere around 75 inches on her belly, which was dwarfed by the normally brunette Jessica waiting for her on the sidewalk by at least ten inches. Jessica's hair was now a shade brighter than blood red, stretching just above her shoulders.. Christina's eyes widened. "Jessiee! I love what you did with your hair!" Jessica smiled. "Thanks - I figured it was time to do something new with it. I wanted to go red for a while. Matches my new boxing gloves!"

Jessica's great, jiggling mass of fat was far more exposed in her pink tank top and overtaxed white leggings which showcased the trunks of fat that were her legs, her knees struggling to remain visible below the mass of her fat thighs and especially her stomach. The bottom of her fat sideways-boulder of a stomach hung out a good three inches from the bottom as she moved in what seemed like a great wobble towards the door labeled in big yellow letters bordered in white: "Hi-Impact Kickboxing Gym and Fitness Center." The steady stream of mainly female attendees raced ahead of the two blubbery females. Looks were cast backward, mostly at Jessica which told of surprise and slight patronisation- looking at her with some look of pride that she had managed to escape her lethargy to come here and work out. There was at least one look of disgust followed by a brief whisper into her friend's ear.

Jessica stared directly through the looks, mostly undeterred, until they had gotten through the doors to an orange-walled reception room. The comfortable-looking black leather couches lining the walls were lined with a mixture of beefy-looking men and lean, trim women - save two. One brunette woman there was quite tall - five foot nine, her form muscled to the nines, and she was missing her right leg below the knee, replaced by a metal prosthetic. She carried herself like an army vet. The second instructor could not have been more different. She was a five foot three butterball, still quite below Christina in weight, but still quite fat. She stood out among the instructors, just as much as the old vet. Most of the students simply showed their cards and were greeted with a nod or a curt "Hey, Clara - Danaa, welcome back." The receptionist's eyes passed over Jessica and Christina and she spoke, "Hiii, welcome to Hi-Impact, you here for the eight o'clock class?" Christina and Jessica both nodded. "Goood, you'll be in room Eleven. Amanda's gonna be your teacher." Both Christina and Jessica shared the same thought out loud after they paid for the class: "I hope Amanda's the fat one."

They trudged down the hallway, Jessica beginning to get out of breath from walking further. Christina patted her back reassuringly, her hand finding its home on Jessica's fat, roll-filled back. They eventually got to room eleven. There was a single great mirror lining the front and sides of the red-walled room forming a semi-circle. At the back were the collected belongings of the other attendees. Sharing the room with Jess and Christina were a motley assortment of different people - a few of the larger folks who came in with them, but still many of the thinner crowd were with them. Eventually, the door opened and in walked the tall, muscled amputee woman. She carried her bag up to the front and gently set it down next to the radio. She spoke to a few of the people up front, away from about the middle where Jess and Christina were. They looked at each other with concern. Eventually, the woman spoke up - her voice surprised the two by how high it was, somewhere in a low soprano. "Hey, guys, My name's Amanda and I'm here to do this kickboxing class with you guys! 'Cause if I can do it.." she lifted up her prosthetic leg, a chuckle came over the crowd. "Then you guys can do it!"

She took out her phone and, in a matter of moments, the speaker was playing some medium-paced music with a thick bass that reverberated about the room. "Thaat's more like it. Get us all in the rhythm. If you've been with us for a while - like Samantha and Alex," she indicated two lean women in the front, both blonde, one trim, one slightly chubby in build. "Then you know how this will go. If you're a beginner, just stick with it, you'll be fine. Do your best to keep up with the intensity. If you're sweating, that's how you're meant to be doing, that's good. Take it down if you need to, but as a rule, you should be struggling."

Then it began with a few loud commands and instructions. They began with some jabs, left, right, right, left. Christina focused in on keeping her form while Jessica mimicked the moves Amanda was doing. She kept her back straight, making her gut stick out more than usual as her tank-top rode up to the midway of her belly button. Everyone glided through this easily for the next ten seconds until Amanda picked up her voice while performing the jabs alongside the class. "Alright - let's pick up the pace, you should be jabbing a bit faster." Jessica was sweating now, though that was fairly normal. Christina was keeping her pace somewhat easily. They carried on for the next minute or so, and then Amanda called out, "Okay, good, good. Now let's mix it up a bit- bounce a bit while you jab." She demonstrated - it was a kind of small jump from side to side. Christina began struggling with keeping herself coordinated - all her weight throwing itself around made her stop a few times and catch her breath, or re-coordinate. Jessica positively shook the floor as she bounced about, both with her blubber and with her feet. She was worse at coordinating her bounces, managing to catch herself a few times. Amanda stopped by and asked, "Are you alright?" Jessica nodded wearily. "Well, don't go too crazy - but try to keep jabbing. You're not trying to jump - you're just lightly bouncing, side to side, side to side."

Jessica toned down her jumps to proper bounces, but by the time the next few minutes passed, she was barely standing on her two feet. "Alright, guys, let's do something else. If someone's trying to hit you in the head, your best bet is to move your head. This is called a bob, a nice simple move. Let's try it while practicing a simple front-kick, make sure you've got plenty of space in front of you." Christina focused in on ducking her head, imagining a thick blow coming from in front of her. She instinctively did the same when she heard a thick 'Thud' from her right. Looking to make sure she didn't imagine it, she saw the porcine form of red-headed Jess lying face-first on the floor, motionless. "Oh my god, Jess!" she cried. The class stopped and Amanda hurried over, her face intensifying. She managed to roll Jessica over with some effort, and she listened in through Jessica's sweat-soaked tank top. Her face was uncertain. "Is it a heart attack?" asked Christina. Amanda reached for the AED and exposed Jessica's great, fat, heaving chest to apply the white electrodes. Terror coursed through everyone in the room. Jessica came to in pain as the machine spoke, "Arrhythmia detected. Administering shock." After a shock, Jessica's pain subsided and Amanda helped her up. Amanda spoke, "Well, good thing she's alright. But we don't want to take any chances. You guys can go - she definitely should, at least. Please take it easy."

The two waddled out of the room, somberly. "Thank god Amanda knew how to use that thing." spoke Jessica. Christina nodded. "Yeah. I guess you took it a little too intensely." Jessica nodded. "Yeah- guess I'm just a bit too big to work out." Christina sighed. She wanted to tell her that she shouldn't give up precisely because of what had just happened - but she was simply relieved that Jessica was alright. For now, at least.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Fatigued Fatty Fighters.

choices: While gordge gorges, how is Alice doing?
The company gorges. Can Christina contain herself?
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
The summer was waning into August, and it was was becoming clear that the office workers had done little but eat their summer away, save only Christina. While Jessica had been physically unable to do even one session of kickboxing, Christina was able to, and the resulting calorie deficit over the next month helped Christina drop 10 pounds. By contrast, the rest of the office seemed to be eating themselves into higher and higher sizes. Jessica, disregarding the fact that she was becoming horrifically unfit, had gained a good twelve - she was now very close to 525 pounds, well over a quarter ton of obesity. Her red-dyed hair had grown out a bit, now gently sitting on her shoulders as she bit into a donut. Melissa had grown subconsciously wary of her weight - but this did not translate into Christina's dedication to losing weight, which now waned as she strained to keep to her rigid eating plan. Melissa had only gained two pounds, Jessica taking the award far and away as the fattest member of the office in record time.

Victoria's gluttony could not keep pace with the rest of the group - she had gained a measly five pounds, mainly in her trunk-like legs and fat hips, her comparatively minimal gut as a secondary accessory to her larger bust and lower quarters, an appendage of fat that was dwarfed by her sideways expansion, an abnormality in this office of mainly belly-centric gainers. She dawdled as she grazed on her donut as Jessica regaled the story of her trial by fire at Hi-Impact. "Wow, that's so scary! I hope you're alright." Jessica chuckled, shaking her gargantuan gut which heroically resisted forming a double belly. "Oh, yeah, I'm fine. They had to give me a shock, but i'm good." Christina's face drew tight, concerned. "Don't you think you should see a doctor?" Jessica scoffed. "Yeah, you mean the guys who think that everything's because of my weight? I mean - it was, but it was really just because I exerted myself too hard." Christina held off - she had already pissed off Melissa, she didn't want to distance Jessica from her. Of course, in her mind, she was practically shouting Are you fucking serious?

The discussion trailed off into celebrity talk until Courtney strode into view. She had kept her gains well and truly at bay - she was hovering now around 480, greatly reduced in size from the last time the gang had seen her. Quite plainly, this was due to the mysterious treadmill-desk. "Heyyy, Courtney!" spoke the gang. Courtney chuckled as she took a breath from the still-laborious journey. "Hey, guys. You'll never believe who I just talked to and what she wants." "Who?" asked the group. "Jenna." spoke Courtney, as she stepped aside, and the great blonde stepped in front of the party, ever-laboriously. Her bulk could not have been more contrasting of Courtney. She had to be over 700 pounds, and every part of her seemed to be pumped with fat. Her legs stood like great pillars which grew fatter at the top, all indistinct beneath a great carpet-roll of bulging fat. Her gut entirely hid her thighs which by all context given by her fat legs joined a few inches above where her knees may or may not have been. She was not quite the quivering blob that was Alice, however - to Christina and especially Melissa, her fat seemed absolutely dwarfed by the fatness that was Alice. However, this did not inherently make Jenna skinny - she was still something akin to a walking whale. "Heyy, guys!" she breathily spoke, taking a breath for the sentence to come. "I bought you guys cruise tickets, starting tomorrow!" She shifted on her cane, which made itself known as it clacked. It became plain how she managed to get up the hallway, a task which was already difficult even for the skinniest member of the office, Christina. It was a harrowing look into a possible future for the office workers. It provoked an instant contrast between the comparatively trim Christina and the blubbery, hamlike Jenna.

The news of the incoming vacation gave the group cause to cheer, blowing the brief crossroads out of sight. Jenna waited for the cheers to die down as she spoke, "It'll go for two weeks, it has a pool, an arcade, and, best of all, a buffet." A second, louder cheer issued forth from everyone - to her own surprise, even from Christina.
The announcement had given rise to questions, first from Melissa. "So, how has corporate been?" Jenna chuckled, taking another deep breath which swelled her already massive gut. "Uh, it's been good. Stressful, but good. And I guess you can tell how I deal with stress," she added with a smirk as she gave her belly a firm pat. The great hill of fat shook slightly with the pressure.

The next day, the party met at the seaport, bustling with cargo traffic, and the great multi-decked cruise ship which sat at dock before them. The host of heavy women stood sweating in the august sun and under their own bulk, dressed not in their usual work blouses but in more loose mumu clothing, even Christina. Christina had begun to lower herself into a mentality of toe-dipping - she'd reward herself, but caution herself against excess. "Here she is - the Ocean's Jollil..." spoke Jenna, stumbling and taking a breath, wiping her brow with a lardy forearm. "Tide's Repose" Jessica raised a brow. "Repose?" "Rest, relaxation." replied Jenna. "Good adjectives for what we're gonna be doing here. Enjoy yourselves!" Jessica turned to Christina and winked. Christina nodded.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: For old times' sake.

choices: At the food court, Mel and Steph get into one of their "competitions".
Alice hates being a third wheel after all! At least binge-eating always helps.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Mel, of course, didn't miss a beat. Especially after Stephanie's momentary look of confusion was quickly replaced by her trademark shit-eating grin.

Mel's smile was just as wide. "That's cute, 'Lesser Alice' (Alice had secretly become less fond of Mel's playful nickname for her sister ever since it began to take on its double meaning). There are easier ways of telling me I look different with my hair short, just sayin."

"Yea," began Alice, "I guess the last time you s-"

"I'm only teasin you, beautiful person," Stephanie casually interjected. Stepping forward, she stood her carry on up on its own next to Alice and cheerfully embraced the bovine brunette in a fleshy but loving embrace.

Or at least tried to.

Although only the 'second' fattest girl at the airport that day, Mel's jutting, swollen stomach completely prohibited Steph from doing more than leaning into the shorter girl's bosom and sinking her manicured hands into Melissa's thick, squishy upper arms. Likewise, Melissa was growing so ponderously fat these days she had trouble reaching her arms all that far past her massive belly.

"And I guess you have changed a little in other ways, sweetie," Stephanie added with a wink, lightly patting the protruding tummy keeping her at arm's length.

"Ugh tell me about it," Alice attempted again, shifting impatiently this time (she had been standing for what felt like fifteen minutes now!), "I think I might have put on some-"

"Tsk- guilty, girl," said Melissa animatedly, completely ignoring Alice. "But you know how it is when you get a call."

"From who?!" Alice blurted out maybe a little too loudly, eager not to be left behind as the two fell into their usual synchronized banter.

"From," Steph turned and said in a deep-voiced, poor attempt at an Austrian accent, "Da Hungerrr!!!" Both Stephanie and Melissa burst into uproarious laughter, clearly on the other end of some inside joke that Alice would never have the context to understand. She could only stand there and chuckle weakly.

Even Mel had to silently take note at how much she jiggled lately when she laughed. Or when she did anything nowadays, really. Mel, always one to prioritize comfort over conformity, had finally surrendered to the sartorial demands of her bulging tummy and now took to buttoning her slacks under her belly instead of over, her surging belly fat finally proving too much to contain in even her biggest pairs of jeans. In her skin-tight baby blue t-shirt, Melissa's heaving, single-tiered stomach quivered and wobbled with as much enthusiasm as she had, catching up with her old friend. And kinda accidentally ignoring her best one.

"But you're one to talk about about hunger, Freakazoid (Mel's other passionate nickname for Alice's baby sister. Two? Alice didn't even have one!). I haven't seen you put anything in your mouth in like 5 whole minutes," the obese, short-haired beauty said as her much, much leaner friend reached into her hoodie pocket. "How are you not passed out?"

Stephanie grinned sheepishly as she pulled out what she had been storing in her pocket. "You just had to say that right as I was getting these," she said, revealing two rather impressive king-sized candy bars and quickly demolishing one.

"What the hell are-" Melissa began, but it was Alice's turn to interrupt this time.

"You brought Yeng bars?!" She exclaimed, This time definitely too loud.

"Mmhmm" her little sister softly cooed. "I brought a whole suitcase of big sis's favorite snack all the way from home," she continued. "Sort of my way of making up for that shitty Christmas present," she added with an apologetic look before stepping over to give Alice a big hug. Finally. "You were always so upset about your weight when you came home, I thought it's what you wanted. I didn't even think about what it meant until after I sent it."

"Oh," Alice blushed. "It's fine. I mean, I'm the one complaining about my weight all the time so I know you were only meaning well," she said. Her mouth was slowly creasing into a smile but her eyes stayed glued to that second Yeng bar the entire time. Sure, Alice wasn't necessarily famished or anything, but she hadn't had any comfort food in like forever. And with all the standing and waiting and.. reunioning it wasn't long before-

Ghrrrrllllllll

"Ugh," Alice huffed, breaking the hug to look down at the noisy culprit- her stomach. At least, she assumed it was. Generally a safe assumption to make.

"No no, that would be me. Stephanie said, patting her toned, flat stomach as it let off another impressive rumble, loud enough to be heard over the general bustle and hum of airport activity. This only elicited another giggle as she turned back wistfully in the direction of the air plane she had flown in on. "The meal on the plane was like an hour and a half ago and they only let me have like 3 of them. Which is bullshit, I know they have more back there," she growled more to herself than to the two enormous co-workers, sourly recalling earlier events of the day. To be fair, the older man in the seat next to her had been kind enough to give her his in-flight meal on top of the other ones when he had seen the hurt look in her eye and heard the audible complaints from her stomach. But that was forever ago, she thought to herself, and it still wasn't enough!

"But, like, seriously," she snapped out of her reverie, "I really want food cuz I haven't eaten anything since the plane," she said, quickly scarfing down the second of the candy bars even more quickly than the first. Alice could only moan inwardly as her heart sank.

"Like I said," Melissa restated, flowing seamlessly back into their A and B only conversation now that the family moment had passed, "how are you not passed out?"

"Oh my God, 'How are you still hungry? How come you're not a million pounds? Where does it all go?'," Stephanie snickered, going through the usual questions before Melissa could have a chance to fire them off. "Everyone in my family's just blessed, dude. TLC even wanted to do like, one of those sitcoms about us. My mom's skinny, our little brother is skinny, I think Allie here is the only one in the family who got the appetite half but not the metabolism half." She leaned over onto her sister's soft saddlebags and gave a hearty laugh before giving Alice a big pinch on her puffy cheek. "I guess I don't have to feel bad about sending you that diet book after all- you clearly didn't use it for anything!"

"Haha, nice one," Mel added with another belly-shaling guffaw. All this movement was causing her shirt to ride up, exposing the massive, wobbly ball of fat to anyone making their way from Arrivals.

"Yea, super funny." Alice contributed with another weak attempt at a smile.

Well, the obvious truth was that it was anything but funny to Alice, but she kept that to herself. Poor sweet Alice hated to come off as the jealous type, especially because Stephanie was such a sweetheart too and would be absolutely devastated if she ever felt for a second that strong, wise big sis would ever not be there for her goofy little sister. But, well, it just wasn't fair.

Being the only one not blessed with The Flash's metabolism meant that the former cheerleader had had to spend her entire childhood denying herself and her unnaturally amplified appetite. But not Stephanie. Stephanie just ate. And ate. And ATE.

The girl must have swallowed a vortex when she was a baby, Alice surmised. Sure, it made little sense, but so did a size 4 who could, on any ordinary day, put away enough food in one buffet sitting to leave even Melissa in a food coma. And she had proven so time and time again in their de facto "eating competitions", the foundation that Melissa and Stephanie's peculiar friendship/rivalry was built on.

And that only made Alice all the more jealous! But Mel could hardly be blamed for being swept up by Steph's natural charisma and tried to do her best to assert that Alice was 'first bestie' when she could remember to. Hence playful nicknames like "Lesser Alice".

Still, nothing could change that Steph had the charm, Steph had the looks, Steph had the metabolism.. And, subsequently, Alice inwardly fumed, the body to go with it! Alice had tried (almost) her whole life to stay thin and what did she have to show for it? She was just over 500 pounds! And, more importantly, Alice was 500 pounds and hungry. All this inward fuming and fussing was NOT helping her aforementioned "blessed" appetite. Her gut, of course, made its grievances loudly known to the other two similarly "endowed" girls. Stephanie's stomach responded by reinforcing its earlier message and Melissa's vastly larger belly offered an equally vocal statement as well. Stephanie, completely clueless to her obese idol's inner monologue, now stood up on her own and gave Alice's now-partially exposed tummy a healthy pat.

"I know I don't need to ask big sister if she's hungry too," Stephanie said, her immensely fattened sibling's double-tiered belly now rumbling to match hers in volume and intensity. "We are related, after all," she smiled, giving Alice another hug and giving her soft, bare lower belly roll a firm jiggle.

Alice smiled back.

'Maybe this won't be too awful,' she thought, her mind momentarily at ease as it drifted on to thoughts of an alleged suitcase stuffed to the brim with Yeng bars.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Steph and Mel: Accomplices in Appetite

choices: "I think it's time we put you on a diet, big girl."
"Really, what's wrong?"
"Don't you think you're getting kinda... fat?"
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
“—I’m gonna be real right now, I had such a crush on the red M&M when I was a kid. I had this little stuffed one that I would kiss every night and snuggle with…” Cass was absolutely hysterical, her laughter was actually interfering with the feed on her mic, “I don’t know why—I wouldn’t even eat the red M&M’s out of the packaging… I was a weird kid, okay?!”

“Oh my god that’s precious.” Marni’s deep laughter slowly faded, “I’ve known you for… years and I have NEVER in my life EVER heard this story!”

Melissa lumbered clumsily onto the sales floor, her fat swaddled arms spread out in front of her at an angle in an attempt to maintain balance. As her fat gut sloshed lazily from side to side, her tree trunk legs struggling to so much as keep her going, it occasionally collided with the fleshy but comparatively smaller obesity of her best friend Alice. The super-sized blonde woman braced her elephantine acquaintance with one chubby hand placed against Melissa’s sweaty padding of back fat as she lurched hungrily towards the donut that her friend held out for her.

“Just a little bit further, Mel.” Alice smiled as her big dumb stomach of a coworker took yet another floor-shaking step towards her desk. It would only be a matter of time before they managed to get there safe and sound, and the workday could begin…

“You don’t… have to…” Melissa panted objectively, her eyes still locked squarely on the donut, “I’m not some… some kind of… of…”

“Donutaholic?” Alice piqued an eyebrow

“Yeah…” Melissa puttered, huffing and puffing like an old steam engine, “Stop… stop being such a bitch!”

Melissa was more frustrated by the prospect of the object of her affection being routinely yanked away from her pitiful reach. She was getting so fat these days, her arms so heavy and weak, that she could barely swat at the sweet little treat that Alice was bribing her with. Despite her protests, the corners of her mouth were moist with saliva and her greedy gut growled with the fury of a beast being denied its patronage.

Ever since Courtney’s changes to the office, some had taken to them better than others. Most of the women around had put on weight, yes, but none had done so with quite the same gusto as Melissa. She was always a lazy glutton, yes, but ever since the changes implemented into the Gordge building, she had really gone into overdrive. All she would do is eat, eat, and eat some more until quitting time. Then she’d go out with Alice or Christina or Vicky and they’d eat and eat and eat and then she’d go home and eat and eat and eat…

Melissa collapsed into her office chair. It had been Jenna’s before she left. Her pillowy face was red and glistened with sweat, but her bovine brown eyes managed to light up as Alice tossed her the single donut that had so motivated her this morning.

“I’m really starting to worry about you, hun.” Alice frowned as her veritable mountain of a bestie wolfed down the pastry with the same ease one might reserve for breathing or drinking water, “Are you… okay?”

“No…” Melissa panted, “I’m exhausted.”

That was Alice’s point entirely. In just a few months, Melissa had become this massive woman, completely obsessed with keeping that greedy gut of hers fed! Now, Alice was in no room to really lead the discussion, but her friend could barely get in and out of the doors at Gordge anymore! It wasn’t healthy!

“Mel, sweetie?” Alice lowered her voice and placed one hand on her friend’s most reachable asset—her giant stomach that sagged towards the floor...
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Massive Melissa Makes it Big!

choices: As Christina and Melissa happily indulge, Alice struggles to drop the pounds.
Alice get's a membership to another gym.
What about that night at the weigh in?
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
“I think we might have to put you on a diet, big girl.” Alice teased.

“Oh I’ll have you know that I’m already on a diet, big girl.” Melissa said with some sass.

Alice was a bit surprised by that response. “Really? And what diet is that?”

“It’s called the eat whatever the hell I want diet.” Alice immediately rolled her eyes as she giggled at her own naivety. Just then Christina happened to waddle by.

“Hey gals, what’s so funny?” The large glasses-wearing blonde said while rubbing her belly, stuffed from a rich and generous trip to the breakroom.

“Alice is being rude.”

“When is Alice ever rude?”

“I was not trying to be mean! I just think it would be a good idea for her to go on a diet, that’s all.” As Alice said this Melissa seemingly pulled a candy bar out of thin air and shoved it past her lips, making sure to swallow before she blurted out a response.

“Well when did you become a nutritionist? Should I call you Doctor Alice now?”

“I’m just trying to be a good friend!”

“Melissa has a point.” It wasn’t easy for Christina to pick a side here. As much as she valued her friendship with Alice, she had also gotten pretty friendly with the raven haired butterball recently. Part of what she liked about Melissa was that she was basically the ultimate enabling fat friend. She was always down for a chance to eat. In an office full of gluttonous fatties, there as no one more culinarily permissive than Melissa. In fact, the more embarrassingly indulgent the request, the better. Of course, Christina wasn’t one to show restraint around food herself, but when she was with Melissa it was like they were on a hedonistic expedition to let themselves go as much as possible.

“Hmm…” Alice paused to gather her thoughts. “What if we went on a diet together!” She said with a kind smile.

Melissa had two more candy bars shoved into her chocolate stained cheeks. She simply looked up at Alice and shook her head. “Nhh nhh.”

“I have an idea that might solve this situation.” Christina said, grinning with cleverness. “What about a wager? If alice can lose… 20 pounds in the next 3 months, than Melissa has to go on a diet. And if she can’t… uhhhh,”

“If she can’t she has buy me dinner for a whole week.” Melissa said.

“20 pounds… but in 4 months.” Alice counter-offered. Melissa gave a cocky smirk.

“Fine.”

“Ooooh this is fun. I’ll be the referee. We can do the official weigh in tonight!” Christina giggled with giddy. Alice nervously gulped at the thought of stepping on a scale.
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: A Weighty Wager

choices: Melissa takes Christina under her wing, and they BOTH become eating machines
Trying to get a rise out of Alice, Melissa's gluttony goes to dangerous heights
Alice's Hard Work Pays off. Double or Nothing?
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
“Do you want to get Tapas tonight?” Christina asked, putting on her jacket while waiting for Melissa to catch up. It was 5 o’clock and that meant quitting time. And for Christina and Melissa, that meant dinner time. Christina draped her arm around the edge of Alice’s cubical while she waited on her slowly waddling companion.

         “I want Tapas, AND Outback AND to hit up that Mexican place with the bar tonight.” Melissa boasted, patting her belly. Ever since she took on this stupid bet, it seemed like Melissa relished her lifestyle of indulgence more than ever, ESPECIALLY when Alice was around.

         Christina just giggled. “You’re incorrigible. What about you, Alice?” Christina leaned her head over her coworker’s wall, she was still trying to finish up some work, while also trying to eat a Buddha bowl. She looked stressed, and rushed. To Christina, that meant she needed a night out. “You want to join us for Tapas, Outback AND Mexican tonight?”

         “No...Thanks Chris...but I have to get to the gym tonight.” She said. She sounded almost depressed about it. Like someone died.

         “What?! But it’s Friday girl, you need to relax!” Christina couldn’t image hitting up the gym, nevermind dieting on Friday. “You need a cheat day, right?”

         “A diet doesn’t actually work like that, Christina. There’s no cheat days. It’s a complete change in the way you eat and your lifestyle--” Alice started to explain.

         “Forget her, Christina!” Melissa said, heading off already. “That just means there will be more for us!”

         Christina shrugged. “Sorry, Alice. Maybe next time!”
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Everybody's Gorging for the Weekend

choices: With her gym membership expired, Victoria goes out with Christina and Mel.
Christy can't take this!—she needs to get Melissa and Alice to call the bet off!
Melissa's a bad influence—in four short months, Christina's a regular mini-Mel!
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Alice and Melissa rarely disagreed on much of anything. Ever since they had started working together, they’d pretty much been inseparable! So when Alice out and out said that she thought Melissa was getting too fat for her own good, neither of them really knew how to respond.

Alice was honestly worried about her friend—she couldn’t just sit idly by and watch Melissa eat herself round until she was the fattest woman in the office. What kind of friend would she be, then? This bet was a compromise; an attempt at reasoning with her increasingly greedy coworker and best friend. But it still steamed her green beans to know that Melissa wasn’t taking this seriously, and wouldn’t. Alice could have lost a hundred pounds (she wished!) and Melissa would still scoff at the idea of limiting herself. On not eating out every night and not eating until she was ready to burst at every meal.

Meanwhile, Melissa was just as tossed about it. Here Alice was, her best friend and she had the gall to say that she was getting too fat? Who does that? Besides, Alice wasn’t any skinnier than she was. She was always going on about health and fitness, like she wasn’t a big blonde hippo! All Melissa wanted to do was have fun and live a little (or a lot) and it was a pretty low blow for Alice to suggest putting her on a diet. She was a grown woman—she could do what she wanted!

And so, as their weight wager waged, the two found themselves in quite the awkward situation—for the first time in their friendship, they couldn’t hang out with each other!

It wasn’t like Alice could hang out with Melissa if she was trying to lose weight—there was absolutely no hope of that happening.

And as Alice retreated from Melissa—even if, ultimately, it was for her own good—Melissa couldn’t help but fill the role of “passive-but-willing enabler” with someone else in her life…

***


“So I was thinking that we’d hit up that Mexican place again.” Melissa said in a nonplussed sort of way as she scarfed down her second lunch of the day, “And then maybe we’d go to that new Applebee’s that opened up?”

“Sounds good to me.” Christina scarfed down her jelly donut, “You sure you won’t wanna come back to my place?”

“Puh-lease, Christy, your place is teeny.” Melissa snorted, “Oh, hey, maybe we could hit up the bar tonight?”

“After Mexican?”

“After Applebee’s.” Melissa corrected as she unwrapped another gyro from the sandwich shop down the street, “They’ve got this Endless Wings deal on Tuesday nights.”

“Aw jeez, I don’t know…”

Even though she had become quite the glutton during her tenure at Gordge, that sounded like a lot. Even to Christina, the woman who had more than tripled her body weight in two-thirds as many years, Melissa’s plans seemed excessive…

“Come on, Christina, what do you expect me to do?” Melissa huffed, her jowls quivering, “Go by myself?”

“I mean…” Christina looked down at her second lunch of the day—she’d be hungry again later anyway—“Alright, that sounds fun. Girl’s Night Out, right?”

***


“Don’t be such a bitch, Christina.” Melissa rolled her eyes as she plucked the menu from her friend’s hand, “She’ll have what I’m having.”

“Mel, I don’t know…” Christina burped, “After Tapas, I don’t think I’m up to—”

“You’ll be fine. Trust me, I’ve seen how you eat.” Melissa snorted, “Besides, after that show you put on last night? You don’t have any more reason to hold back on me. That was so impressive!”

“You… really think so?” Christina smiled weakly, her stomach gurgling beneath her sweater, “I’m still pretty full…”

“Well yeah, you practically cleaned the place out.” Melissa’s incredible bulk shifted and sloshed as she leaned towards for her drink, “We’ll get you a drink or something. That’ll make you feel better.”

“I… I don’t know…”

“Hey waiter—” the rotund restauranteur shouted across the floor, “Two Long Island Iced Teas!”

***


“See? This is why we don’t go over to your place!”

Melissa kicked and squirmed, but it was no use. Her ample waistline and ridiculous hips had gotten her wedged into the doorway to Christina’s apartment. Her vast white belly, stretching her flowery flowy tent of a dress to the point of visibility, was too wide at the flanks. Once she’d pushed past the first few steps and it had hurt, Melissa knew that she ought to have stopped—but the promise of pizza was too inviting, and they’d already ordered it!

“I’ll call my landlord.” Christina answered, calm and collected, as she whipped out her cell phone.

“Christy, wait.”

“Yeah?”

“Do you think you could…” Melissa smacked her lips, her eyes locked on the kitchen counter, “Feed me some of that pizza?”

“What?” Christina almost laughed, “Melissa, you’re stuck in my doorway!”

“Yeah well my arms are behind me and I’m really hungry!” the great girth of gal whined petulantly, “It’s just… it’s right there and I’m so… I can’t… I need it!”

“Alright, alright…” Melissa grabbed the greasiest, cheesiest slice she could find in the first box and carried it over to her friend.

She lowered it into her mouth, much to Melissa’s delight. The belly-heavy behemoth moaned throatily as Christina fed her bite after bite, careful not to get her fingers too close to Melissa’s maw…

“Jeez, how much can you fit in there?” Christina asked idly as she pat the bloated bubble of blubbery belly that was wedged in her doorway, “How are you still hungry?”

“Y…Yeah…” Melissa puffed, her eyes glassy and her cheeks rosy, “Call your landloard and… hfff… maybe get me another slice?”
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: Passive, Enabling, and Enormous!

choices: The three women let their appetites run wild
the next day at work Christina and Vicky fondly recount their epic binge
Meanwhile, Alice tries to work out. It's even harder than she expected!
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.content:
Victoria was not happy about having to let her gym membership expire. There was just no way she could afford it anymore. But on the plus side she found herself with a lot more time to hang out with her friends and have fun then go to the gym like she’d been doing for the last year or so. Victoria was content to let herself go a bit after keeping to her strict regiment of… well… mostly just slurping down smoothies and getting massages, but still she more than deserved the opportunity to indulge her appetite and relax some more.

Or at least that’s what the big blubbery Italian girl told herself.
