So when Christina offered that Vicky join Melissa and herself for dinner tonight, she happily accepted.

They first met up after work at a bar for drinks… and of course Melissa ordered some appetizers too.

“Oh my god! that’s so goooood.” Victoria practically moaned in a nasally voice as she devoured whatever these greasy fried cheese balls that Melissa ordered were. She washed it all down with a gulp of her sugary cocktail.

“Yep, URRP only thing is that the portions are so small. Lets get seconds before Christina shows up.” Melissa said having already cleaned the entire plate in front of her. She now was trying to get the bartenders attention while simultaneously slurping the last of her margarita.

Melissa and Vicky were quite a sight sitting next to each other at the bar. Both young women had parked their massive bodies across two backless stools. Their enormously ripe and overly plump butts bulged on display behind them, as the four stools were completely enveloped by their vast, pillowy, and well-padded bottoms. Two greedy swollen bellies generously hugged the rounded edge of the bar. Their immense meaty midsections bulged out to strain the large tops, which both girls had artfully adjusted to emphasize their bountiful abundance of cleavage.

Just then Christina waddled her big blubbery belly up to the bar. “Heeyyy babes. Wait are you getting started without me?” she joked with fake surprise. With a cute little whimper Christina managed to haul her luscious rump up onto a bar stool.

“There you are Christy!” Victoria said, giving her coworker and friend an awkward hug as their gelatinously fluffy fat rolls embraced one another more than their arms did.

“We didn’t save you any but I ordered more just a minute ago.” Melissa said.

“So now that we’re all here can we talk about where we’re like, going?” Victoria asked with a piggish desire in her eyes.

“Personally, I have been craving tacos from Juan Gringo’s all day.” Mel said with a rub of her belly.

“Wait did you see not see what my last Instagram post? The BurgerBus is back!” Christina said.

“NO. WAY.”

“Seriously?!?”

“Yes and they have a new milkshake truck parked right next to them!”

“Well that definitely can’t be missed.”

“Damn I was really hoping to get sushi at Café Yoshi.” Victoria said.

“Don’t worry Vicky, the nights only just started.”
1311122122111212211222111112211212111111.title: The three not very little pigs

choices: Alice falls in love with the shakes and goes to the gym every day.
Two moths later, the shakes have dont big changes to Alice.
1311122122111212211222111112212.content:
Finally! The premium membership was hers!

Now she would enjoy all the comforts the gym had to offer.She wanted to try the massage and , why not?, the bulk up shakes VIctoria was always drinking. As se thought about all this Vicky called her to arrange going to the gym together. When they arrived she went straight to the shake counter.

"Alice came on, you have to try one of these" she said as she ordered the first one of the day.

"Well one wouldn't hurt would it?" Alice thought , "uh, okay i will try one, just because you are always bugging me about them''. She aproached the girl behind the counter,
"one strawberry shake please" she said. When she got the shake we took a small sip just to try it. It was damn delicious! "why didnt i start drinking them earlier! Viky! you should have pressed me harder to get one, i dont believe i was missing this for so long!".

"Ha! i know what you are talkig about, aren't the just great?"

"Totally!"

Soon she had downed tree more shakes and her belly was so full it ached. SHE then desided it was time to go home and sleep so that she could get back the enegry to hit the gym again tomorrow."Now i have to keep in shape" she thought...
1311122122111212211222111112212.title: Alice finally gets her premium membership

choices: That weekend, Melissa hits the gym with Alice.
A few months later, Alice is really showing results! She's on the right track!
13111221221112122112221111122121.content:
The magical hour of 11:30 had struck the car, and no sooner had the half-hour been struck than Melissa and Christina had waddled into the break room. They retrieved their greasy lunches of cold pizza and leftover burgers than Alice walked into the room. "Afternoon, Al!" Alice smiled a gentle smile and spoke. "Hey, Melissa! Hey Christie!" Christina's face had grown some substantial chub, as the rest of her had filled out. She didn't quite look fat enough to be obese, but she looked to be approaching the higher limits of being overweight. She couldn't be less than 170 Pounds.

However, something had struck them about Alice.

Usually, her figure seemed to stay the same or increase ever so slightly, fluctuating a few pounds around 300. But as of the past few weeks, they could tell her stomach had been actually receding. Her losses were noticeable as she removed her lunch of a chicken sandwich and a salad out from the fridge, as well as a shake. She plopped her still considerable mass onto one of the chairs. "Man, all these reports make me hungry." Melissa replied "Amen to that, sister. These corporate bigwigs, I swear. The only thing that makes this place standable is you girls and Jenna." She stuffed a slice of her pizza into her mouth. Christina nodded as she continued into her leftovers from the drive-through. Alice continued. "Yeah. That's why I love going to the gym. Great release for exercise." Melissa spoke. "We can tell, look at you! Skinny minnie!" Alice looked down at herself in awe. "Well, now that you mention it, I guess I have made some progress!" Melissa was taken a bit aback. "Some progress? Your belly is so much smaller now! By summertime you'll have your beach body and we'll still looked like beached whales!" Alice shrugged. "Well, all you have to do is save for the premium!" Melissa shook her head. "With the amount I spend on my weekends out? Get out of here. I pay my mortgage as it is, and I save up for my kid's college. Maybe you could see about taking me sometime, though?" Alice nodded. "Sure thing! Maybe this weekend?" Melissa spoke. "Well, maybe. I'll text you after work, kay?" Alice smiled. "Sure thing, girlie!" The herd of fatties ate their lunches and, once consumed, they sat for a bit, chatting over coffee until they figured the bosses would notice they weren't at their desks.
13111221221112122112221111122121.title: Lifestyle Changes

choices: She scarfs down the cake. The fitness craze is extinguished.
She throws the cake away. The fitness craze goes on!
She decides to hand the cake over to Jenna.
131112212211121221122211111221212.content:
Within the span of 4 months, Alice had gone from 280-ish to 250. Her stomach was no longer rolling out in the vast expanse it once was, but it had pulled to a still considerable size as compared to someone of normal weight. Something new was also present: Muscle definition. Her shoulders and her legs were still meaty, padded with fat, but there was a new rigidness to them, a hardness which had not existed there before.

With this, she became an enviable person to the rest of the office. To many, this resulted in similar results, radiating out from Alice's office: More and more of the blubbery women of Gordge had suddenly stopped going out and coming back with fast food and other greasy products, but a sudden, real health craze had hit the offices. Rumor had it that even Jenna was slowly replacing some of her foods with healthier, leaner alternatives.

With envy, however, also came despise. Courtney and Melissa sat at break, eating from fast food bags from around the corner. They recieved judging glances from those who had fallen in with Alice's new fad, the new, slowly slimming co-workers who went to and fro with salads and paninis. Melissa spoke. "I don't know. Alice used to be cool, but, I don't even know now." Courtney interjected. "When was the last time we even talked to her?" Melissa replied. "Uh, like, two months ago, when we asked her out to lunch?" Courtney nodded. "See, that's what I'm talking about. I think we need to find some way, some way to get her back to herself." Melissa nodded. "We need to get her off this so we can have our Alice back! I know what I can do." Melissa got up from her chair, which gave a groan of relief, and waddled away, while Courtney shrugged and passively sipped on her coffee. By the time Melissa returned with a large chocolate cake, Courtney and most of the workers were at their desks. Melissa peeked into Alice's office, and saw that she was away. Seeing this as her moment, Melissa put the cake on her desk, and slipped back to her office.

Alice returned from the restroom, a relaxing break from the usual routine of work, when she saw the Cake. This twisted her and shook her. On one hand, she wanted it. She rationalized it in many different ways. She deserved it! One cake couldn't hurt. One bad day doesn't equal a ruined diet! Right? But then her shame started competing for space in her head. She should feel ashamed of herself! Does she want to ruin her good work! If she gives in to this, this opens the way for her diet and her new lifestyle to be ruined. She wanted it. But she hated it. She wanted to have the cake, but she wanted also to stay away from that feeling of outgrowing clothes she had bought a week ago and hating herself for it.

After much internal debate..
131112212211121221122211111221212.title: Results and Influence

choices: After work, Alice heads to the Pizzeria.
Alice has a change of heart. She blows them off for the Gym, she's back at it!
On the way to the Pizzeria, Alice sees someone particularly attractive...
1311122122111212211222111112212121.content:
She gave in and took the top off the cake, going to top off her coffee before diving in. She sighed, at first a little dissapointed in herself. She sulked back to her office, and dug into the Cake. Slowly, however, her depression waned. The cake was theraputic in a way. She managed between eating slices of cake and managing the reports and quarterlies. She was about halfway done with the cake by the time the 2:50 Coffee rush came, she had topped her coffee off before-hand, however, so she avoided it.

It, however, did not avoid her. One by one, the fitness devotees glanced the leader of their fitness revolution cheating on her diet, not in a minor way, but in a big, big way. Their willpower was sapped, and the donuts which, before, were creature comforts to the few holdouts on that floor, were touched by them. The fitness movement, in that hour, had died. Alice, of course, had not noticed her rebellion dying out. She was too busy focusing on the cake.

By the time 4:30 rolled around, the cake was done, and her button-up shirt was about to burst at the seams. Melissa peeked into the scene, and she could tell. Alice's diet was defeated. She leaned in. "Hey, Al!" Alice sighed, no longer ashamed and now unabashed about her gluttony and the death of her diet. "Hey, Melissa!" Melissa chimed. "Hey, me and Courtney were planning to go out to that pizzeria on 4th Avenue. You wanna come tonight?" Alice nodded. "Sure. Give me a moment, I need to get some coffee and a donut."
1311122122111212211222111112212121.title: Snuffed like a Candle.

choices: Later everyone is chatting in the breakroom
Marni invites Christina to lunch
131112212211121221122211111222.content:
Christina looked over to see popular local radio host, Marni sitting on the tile bench. At least she thought it was her. She had seen Marni a few times in the premium member facilities. It had been a while though.

“Marni?”

“Hey you’re the one that won the membership on our show! You’re… uh, Chris… uh,”

“Christina.” She replied

“YES! It’s been a while, you look er… different.” Marni said. Christina thought the same. Marni was huge! She remembered her being really big but not as massive as this. She looks bigger then Melissa! Christina thought. Marni’s gut spilled over her thighs and hung several inches over the edge of the bench. Her bikini bottom wasn’t even visible as her crotch was covered in the cascading rolls of doughy flab. The absurdly thick leg fat seemed to actually be hanging low around her buried thigh bones. Even though she was sitting on it you could still see her wide butt struggling to fit on the thin (at least for someone the size of Marni) bench. Well it’s not like I’ve been keeping my figure intact either.

“My coworkers freaked out when I told them I met you.” Christina said sitting next to Marni. “We listen to you and Cass every day in the office.”

“Really? Where do you work?” Marni asked.

“Gordge,”

“Are you in charge of the gift baskets?!?” Marni said with excitement.

“Uhh… no.” Christina said with a puzzled tone.

“Oh… well that’s still nice I guess.” Marni said. They both went silent for a bit.

“I just found out my membership expired today.” Christina said. Having heard Marni’s voice almost every day she felt weirdly comfortable opening up to her.

“Are you going to renew it?” Marni asked.

“I want to… I really want to so badly, but I can’t afford it.” Christina sighed. “There’s no way I could possibly pay $100 a week… or even a month.”

“I’m dealing with something similar as well.” Marni said. She had dropped the peppy energetic tone she used for the radio. “Me and Cass were offered a TV deal yesterday, to do a morning chat show.”

A TV show? Alice’s head would explode if she were here right now.

“How is that similar?” Christina asked.

“Well… The studio would only do it if I lost some weight.” Marni said.

“So are you?” Christina asked.

“HAH No freakin’ way!” Marni cackled. Her chins jiggling. “No contract is gonna turn me into some salad muncher.”

“Wow so the deal’s off? What did Cass think?”

“Cass was pissed but she’s never gonna leave my side.” Marni said. “Anyways the point is that you can’t have everything you want. I want a tv show but I can’t. You want a premium membership but you can’t. You’ve just got to make do with what you’ve got.” This was certainly not what Christina wanted to hear but she saw Marni’s point.
131112212211121221122211111222.title: Marni's Wisdom

choices: I REALLY want that membership
The conversation continues.
1311122122111212211222111112222.content:
Noticing that her realistic advice had brought Christina down even more, Marni decided to cheer her up with her favorite activity. "Hey, after we're done here why don't we go out and get something to eat?"

"Oh my gosh, sure!" Christina instantly replied, still a little starstruck. Sure bumping into Marni was something she could expect these days, but Marni actually inviting her to go out and do something was new. Given how long it took Christina to make friends and feel acknowledged in a small pool of office workers, having a celebrity specifically ask for her to do something with her felt amazing. Marni, perhaps projecting a little, saw it another way.

"Sounds like you're pretty hungry." She chuckled, rubbing her belly. Christina had to admit, after the stress of discovering her premium membership was up, eating just about everything she could sounded tempting. A drink might not hurt either.

"Sure, sure." She said with a nod. "But not just yet. This is going to be my last day in here for a while, I better enjoy it."

"You enjoy it," Marni said with a nod "I'm going to get one of those smoothies."

***


After Christina was properly pampered, sweated, and practically begged by the staff to leave, and Marni had laboriously made it though the process of getting changed (not that it was all that easy for Christina these days) they started turning to the question of Dinner. By now Christina really was hungry, and Marni seemed starved. She couldn't stop rubbing her enormous belly in anticipation, like it was a great beast she had to soothe.

"I know you're tight for cash." Marni began "So why don't we go for Ten Dragons? They have the best dumplings...and fried rice...." Marni closed her eyes and looked like she was doing an impression of Christina when they first met. Fortunately, before Christina could get too weirded out, her eyes opened wide and she started again "and the second best part...they have a buffet. So you can get a meal cheap."

"Oh...great." Christina said uncertainly. She felt one of her own lovehandles nervously. She imagined the very idea of going to an All-You-Can-Eat-Buffet with Marni had added an inch to her waist. On the other hand, she didn't have many options. Even Taco Bell could tally up to be a painful purchase for her these days, and it wasn't like she was going to pass up this opportunity. Besides, today was a special occasion, even if it wasn't Marni offering. She deserved to indulge. "That'll be great" She said, with more enthusiasm.

***


Christina thought she had seen it all working for Gordge industries. Working alongside Victoria, Melissa and most of all, Jenna, when she was around, she'd thought she'd all ready witnessed the limits of human gluttony. She was wrong.

The women she worked with were fat, but they were coddled, and sluggish. They ate at a pace that wasn't refined, but lacked any urgency. They were just as guilty of sloth as they were of gluttony.

Not so with Marni. Though her increasing weight had slowed her pep down on air a tad, it was clear she still had loads of it at the dinner table. She loaded up her plate with little care for what she was grabbing, chatting away with Christina as she did, until it was loaded so high Christina was worried Marni had forgotten what she was doing. Once both of them were convinced it couldn't handle another grain of rice without spilling on the floor, Marni took the plate back to their table and in a tradition familiar to Christina, gorged in silence.

Well, silence wasn't quite the right word. Marni was far too busy to talk while she was eating, but she certainly made a lot of noise. She chewed, slurped and happily groaned her way through 10 plates of dinner without even slowing down. The orchestra of appetite finished with a crescendo as Marni let out a belch so loud it caused Christina to skiddishly duck her head, in case the roof came down or the manager kick them out. In the awkward silence that filled the restaurant in the aftermath, Marni licked her lips a few times and asked "Have you thought about what I told you earlier?"

"About?" Christina asked, her train of thought totally interrupted by Marni's shameless display.

"How you can't have everything you want?"

"Oh, right." Christina said, glumly. "I guess I should just give up thinking about that sauna."

"You did not understand me at all." Marni informed her bluntly.

"Oh, well..." Christina started awkwardly.

"You going to finish that?" Marni interrupted her, pointing at Christina's fourth plate of Chinese. Christina shook her head and handed it over.

"You thought the point of the story was I couldn't have a TV show and should just accept it." She said, lifting the plate so she could literally shovel rice into her mouth. "It wasn't. *umf* I could have the TV show...but I'd rather have this, and enjoy it." She said, finishing the plate while lost in thought. Meanwhile, Christina was really taking in what Marni was saying for the fist time. "The problem isn't that you can't have that membership. The question is, what do you really want most right now?"
1311122122111212211222111112222.title: Marni invites Christina to lunch

choices: "Sure, no big deal! Consider it a gift from a new friend."
"Sure! I mean, you'll have to do something for me in return, but..."
13111221221112122112221111122221.content:
"...unfortunately...a membership really IS literally what I want most. I wish I had another answer, but I don't. I just want the membership."

"Hm. Well, then, if that's all you want, then there we have it.There's no getting around it, no escaping the need. So, then it's a question of, what would you do for it?"

"Anything!"

"Anything?"

"Er...well, I mean, within reason."

"Oh, of course, we're only talking about within REASON! We're all reasonable here at this table, aren't we? I know we've only met a few times, but I feel like I can relate to you...maybe not to your somewhat meager eating habits, but I sense a hunger and gumption in you that makes me feel we're kindred spirits. So, tell you what: I'LL take care of your continued membership. Don't worry a thing about it, I'll pay for and arrange the whole thing, you can keep being a member as long as you want."

Christina's euphoria at this news was delayed and distracted by confusion and a dash of doubt that life, and Marni, could be so kind.
"But...really? Are you sure?"
13111221221112122112221111122221.title: No escaping the need

choices: Christina will have to think this over
Christina could stand to work longer hours.
13111221221112122112221111122222.content:
"Okay, it's a little taboo, but what are you making right now. Be honest with me." Marni asked, not hesitating or tiptoeing around that issue. It took Christina of balance a little bit.

"Well...I love it at Gordge industries...but..." She started, feeling a little bad sharing it. "9 Dollars an hours."

"Ouch." Marni responded.

"Yeah..." Christina agreed sheepishly. "But they're a really nice place to work."

"Okay, so KISS has a clerical opening. I don't know the exact details of what you'd be doing, but I'm sure you'd be great at it." Marni said, her confidence born out of trust in Christina, and the thought that how hard could it be. "And I know it pays better than that. Not much better, mind you, but enough to make a hundred dollar difference a month. I'm sure if I recommended you, you'd be a shoe in."

"But I'm happy where I'm working." Christina mumbled.

"Hey, like said." Marni said, struggling to her feet to grab a new plate. "It's about what you really want." She held out her hands to mimic weighing a scale. "Gym membership, office membership...though now that I think about it, there is a third option."

"There is?" Christina asked, looking hopeful.

"You could try working weekends."
13111221221112122112221111122222.title: The conversation continues.

choices: Alice and Courtney have advice for Christina
Victoria tries to eat away her woes.
131112212211121221122211111222221.content:
At lunch the next day, Christina was quieter then usual. Vicki was happy to fill up the space in the conversation by gushing about her new premium membership. 'Filling up space' was becoming a realy talent for Victoria lately, as her butt hung over the edge of the foodcourt bench far enough people actually had to step around it when they past behind her.

You could be forgiven for thinking that Christina was just sullen about her reversal of fortune. But no, Christina had forgotten all about that since last night. Her new job offer weighed heavily on her mind. The year she'd spent with Gordge had been wonderful, but stressful, and this was yet another crisis that she just didn't want to deal with anymore. So she ate, and ate, and hoped with enough food in her, there'd be no more room for this stress inside her. Her plans were interrupted though, when Victoria actually tried to get an answer out of Christina.

"So what do you think Chris? Chris? Chrissy?" Victoria asked, growing impatient.

"It's rude to ignore her like that." Alice noted, thinking Christina was annoyed at Victoria, and feeling a little tired of hearing about the gym herself.

"I'm sorry, what was the question?" Christina asked, slightly confused.

"I asked if you had any idea when you'd be getting your gym membership back." Victoria huffed.

"Oh...about that," Christina mumbled, figuring this was as good a time to unload as she was going to get. "I got a new job offer."

"What?!" Victoria gasped, nearly losing balance on her precariously perched posterior. Alice didn't say anything, but she certainly sat up and took notice.

"I met with Marnie last night at the gym, and we got tlaking and...she offered me a job at the radio station. It pays better then Gordge, so I was thinking if I took it, I could, you know, afford the gym ever month."

"Oh my god, Christina, I thought you liked it here at Gordge?" Vicki said, clearly hurt.

"I do! I do Vicki! It's just, you know, the money!"

"I thought your friends would matter more then money!"

That was enough for Alice, who saw this only going from bad to worse. She stood up laboriously which got her two friends attention "Vicki, why don't you come with me, and I'll get you some Ice Cream or something, and Christina, can we talk about this later?"

Christina nodded glummly, while Victoria stormed off, eager to glut herself on Ice Cream.
131112212211121221122211111222221.title: Later, at lunch...

choices: The three get some lunch after finishing their work
free choice
13111222.content:
Christina was asked to come in on Saturday to help Melissa and Alice with something. She wasn’t really excited to do it but being a newbie still she wasn’t really in a position to say no. She was a bit nervous for some reason. She really liked Alice and Melissa, but she knew they had their own thing going on with them being best friends.

She walked into the office to see Melissa sitting by herself.
“Hey Christie, Alice should be here any minute.” Melissa said.

“Okay cool.” Christina said as she sat down next to her. She noticed that Melissa seemed grumpy, like she was annoyed by something. Melissa was fidgeting in her seat causing her blubbery body to jiggle.

“Are you alright? It seems like something is bothering you.” She asked Melissa.

“Ugh… Alice is supposed to be bringing doughnuts for us but she’s like 15 minutes late.” Melissa groaned. She rubbed her massive belly. “I haven’t eaten anything since breakfast which was… 30 minutes ago!” Christina was a little surprised. She knew Melissa was a big eater but she hadn’t seen how desperately addicted she was. Now that she thought about it, Melissa really never stops eating. Even when she walked by her desk she always had something in her mouth.

“I knew I should have brought something with me, damn it.” Melissa said. Christina looked at Melissa. She was like a huge whining baby. Her enormous belly rolls filled her entire lap. She was fat all over. Her thighs were thick and full, her breasts were large and plump, her hips were wide, her arms were doughy, her face was chubby and soft. But they were hardly noticeable compared to her monstrous gut. Both physically and mentally Melissa was dominated by her belly.

“Sorry I’m late.” Alice said as she waddled into the room. Indeed she was carrying several boxes of what surely was pastries of some sort. She dropped the boxes on the table and landed heavily in her seat. She was completely out of breath.

“I need to eat first.” Melissa said as she laid her eyes on the pastries. Alice just nodded in agreement.

“Hey Christina… *huff* here’s yours.” Alice said as she slid one of the boxes across the table to her. Christina was about to say something but paused as Melissa and Alice ripped open the boxes and started to stuff their faces. The two best friends didn’t even look up as they shoved food in their mouths. Christina was a little disturbed by their piggish act of gluttony. Alice must have been starving as well by the way she desperately gorged. Christina wasn’t very surprised to see Melissa eat with so little restraint. She was however taken aback by Alice’s equal level of feasting.

She really liked Alice (who didn’t?). She was so nice and pretty. Her jiggling fat spread elegantly throughout her body. Christina had never equated Alice to be a glutton like Melissa, Jenna, and Courtney. But watching Alice mindlessly eat, she for once saw the indulgent beast that was hidden by her polite, bubbly, gracious personality. In fact Christina had never really paid attention to just how fat she was. Maybe it was because Alice wasn’t as big as Courtney, Jenna, and even Melissa, that Christy never noticed how plump and obese she had become.
13111222.title: Corpulent coworkers

choices: Christie's getting really popular around the office!
Christie just can't seem to find the time to exercise with all this work!
131112221.content:
Christina walked into the tiny cafe, feeling completely at home in its surroundings.

It was a little pretentious, college students and hipsters skittered about the floor like cockroaches, but she paid them no mind. There was a distinct smell of coffee and caramel floating in the air, and the skinny barista in the green apron was handing out plastic cups the size of footballs. Some new-agey stuff filtered in through the radio, but the volume was reasonable. There were windows on either of the walls that faced the road, giving just about everyone a view of the people walking the streets and…

“Hey, that’s the gym!” Christina said excitedly, taking a few steps closer to the window, “I knew this place looked familiar.”

Alice and Melissa shuffled in, both left breathless from the twenty feet walk it took to get inside. They’d suggested the place, and said that it was a favorite outing for everyone in the office—kindly informing Christina that all of Vicky’s coffee runs had come from none other than this specialized little iced-coffee heaven.

“You guys wanna head over there after we’re done?” Christina asked eagerly, maybe still trying to justify her rather lacking workout from three days ago and the half-dozen donuts she’d scarfed down after breakfast…

Melissa did a double take before a wry smile crossed her lips, obviously the big-bellied brunette was doing her best to hold back some throaty laughter.

“Yeah, I don’t think so.” She said with a snort as she waddled her way to a booth, “Come on Al, let’s jog, right?”

Alice laughed politely before turning to her svelter counterpart for the day, her soft eyes telling a silent apology on behalf of her rather uncouth compadre.

As the three women seated themselves, a lanky teen who couldn’t have been but barely legal came over and too, their order, smacking her gum uninterestedly as Alice and Melissa rattled off a long list of café items and muffins. By the time the millennial girl had turned to Christina, she’d been forced to flip the order pad to a new sheet…

“I-I’ll just have a muffin.” Christina said self-consciously, almost sorry for the girl with the nose ring as she shuffled back behind the counter.

“Well she was rude.” Melissa said a little too loudly

“I’ll say.” Christina said with a curl of her nose, “If you’re not a people person, just stick to making coffee. Right?”

“So right.” Melissa said with a slurp of her frappe, “Her loss. Alice is a good tipper.”

***


“Oh my God, this is so good.” Christina said wide-eyed as she choked down her muffin, “Why havent’ you guys ever taken me here before?! This is like the best muffin ever!”

Alice laughed that geeky little giggle she had, her cheeks bunching up into rosy little bunches as her mouth made them dimple.

“Well I’m glad you like it.” She said with a smile, “We usually get something little here before heading somewhere else. It’s a little expensive, but I think we can manage a little treat every now and again.”

Melissa nodded, unable to answer with her mouth’s capacity capped out on krulers. She had hardly ordered a little treat—more like something Christina would have called a very expensive lunch for two—but Alice didn’t seem to mind.

“So, Christy.” Alice began, “How’d you like your first real taste of work? I know Courtney has you do her stuff all the time, but you’ll probably get put on accounting and sales rep with me and Melissa. Do you think you can handle it?”

“Oh I think so.” Christie said with another bite of her muffin, “Mellissa let me handle the KISS102.5 account, and I think I just bought us a butt-ton of advertising.”

“Really?” Alice said before taking a slurp of her coffee, “That’s great! You better not tell Jenna you did it though. She wasn’t too happy we called in a rookie to help us do our jobs…”

“Oh Jenna can suck it.” Melissa said, having finally swallowed, “She found an extra $200 in our advertising and puts it all towards commercial development. So for like, the next six months we’re getting commercials that aren’t just the CEO narrating what Gordge does and had enough left over to increase the care packages from bi-weekly to weekly! I’d say the newbie did pretty good for her first shot.”

“Wow.” Alice said with a smile that wasn’t unlike the kind you’d give a child who passed her first spelling test, “That’s so great Christie, Jenna’s getting onto us all the time about how we don’t ever have any money for commercials. Maybe you have what it takes to be one of the girls after all, huh?”

Christie looked at Alice’s belly as it enveloped a part of the booth, her heavy breathing making her whole body rise and fall. Melissa looked up at her with stuffed cheeks, little crumbs caught in the corners of her mouth…

“Th-Thaaaanks…” the little blonde girl said with a forced smile, “I, uh… don’t know what to say.”

“Hey, Melissa and I were going to head over to Carrie’s house—you know Carrie, right?—for dinner. You wanna come with?”

Christina looked down at her lonesome muffin, half-eaten on her plate as she caught sight of her modest belly in the peripheral vision. She was suddenly overcome with guilt over her latest dietary slip...

“N-No thanks, I think I’m gonna hit up the gym…” she said apologetically, “But, uh, you can tell her I said hi.”

"Suit yourself, Gym's closed on Saturdays." Melissa burped, "And we're your ride home."

"Melissa, don't be mean."

Christina pondered for a moment...

"So... is Carrie's cooking as good as I remember it from the Christmas party?"
131112221.title: Cafe doesn't mean Cafeteria

choices: Christie continues to pack it on, unaware that she's getting really big!
Christie recognizes that she's getting bigger...but what's a girl to do?
1311122211.content:
Christina's calendar was constantly full. During work days, she was assigned tasks by just about everyone, and so she worked with Alice, Melissa, Victoria, and Jenna on a variety of tasks, and she had proven excellent in her work in every regard. As she grew ever invaluable to the function of the group, she was included not only in work activities, but more of the social ones as well.

This newfound popularity was associated with major lifestyle changes. She took snack breaks with the girls, ate with them in the food court daily, and partied with them on weekends. Exercise occurred sparingly, usually during episodes of extreme guilt over some dietary indiscretion. This wasn't happening very often anymore, though, because the lines between gluttony and daily routine were becoming ever more blurry. It was normal to eat five or six donuts in a sitting, right? Alice ate them a dozen at a time. A second double cheeseburger at lunch? That would just be getting started for Melissa. Christina's perspective on what was normal and abnormal was rapidly changing as she did her best to keep up with the onslaught of work and food that she faced each day. This had made it easier to accept the changes that were occurring in her body as well. She didn't have a gut - Jenna's belly was so big that she couldn't see her feet! Fat? She was by far the skinniest girl she knew!

Back in the real world, though, Christina was getting to be a plumper. Double chin, Double D's, double dress size from a 4 to an 8.
1311122211.title: Christie's getting really popular around th...

choices: Her friends notice Christina's gain
Christina isn't the only one gaining in the office
13111222111.content:
And so Christina became chubby. Unfortunately she was so caught up in her gluttony and her friends that she had little awareness of her increasing size.

A button popped off her shirt letting her belly peak out more. Christina didn’t think much of it. Around the office button popping was just something that happened often after a big meal. She rubbed her stuffed belly in her lap. It didn’t use to sit in her lap. She didn’t think about that though. Instead she looked next to her at Melissa and Courtney. The two women’s bellies were spilling over their chairs. She admired all her empty lap space.

“I guess not everyone is naturally thin.” She thought with a smirk. She might not have thought that if she saw how big her gut was becoming as it slowly pushed further over her thighs. But when she looked down all she could see was her blossoming breasts hiding her belly from view. And boy were they looking big. Christie finally had that well defined cleavage with her plump boobs just barely touching. She wasn’t all that concerned with her appearance but these brief moments when she admired her (perceived) beauty and fitness gave her a confidence that stopped her from second guessing her recent feats of gluttony.

Christina never thought about calories or portions. She hadn’t weighed herself in some time. If she did she might be shocked to find she weighed 190 pounds… for now, at least.
13111222111.title: Christie continues to pack it on

choices: Vickie and Christie "work out".
Vickie decides Christie's going to be bigger than her, sooner rather than later.
131112221111.content:
Courtney snacked on a Bundt cake as Christina made her way out of the office to run an errand one afternoon.

"How does she stay so skinny?" Courtney asked Victoria.

"Well, we do go to the gym together." Victoria replied, sucking down a soda. "But do you really think she's skinny? I think she's getting kind of fat."

"I'm glad you noticed too." Alice said between bites of ice cream. "She's really porking up lately."

"Yeah, if she gets any bigger, that blouse isn't going to stay buttoned." Melissa added, just in time to have a button pop on her own overtaxed top.

"I think you're all crazy." Courtney said. "We look like a bunch of whales compared to Christie."

"I work out just as hard as Christie does, and I'm nearly as thin." Victoria replied in defiant denial. "I'm in beautiful shape, and just because she happens to be a little bit smaller is no reason..."

With that, Victoria's chair collapsed beneath her, and she fell to the floor, spilling her soda onto her shirt in the process.

"Another one bites the dust." Melissa commented, grabbing a cupcake from a tray on her desk.

With that, Christina re-entered the office with a candy bar in hand.

"Vickie, are you OK?" She asked with genuine concern.

"She was just showing us one of the workout moves that she's been doing at the gym." Courtney chuckled.

"Let me help you up." Christina said to Victoria, but when she bent down, a tearing noise was heard, and she promptly straightened.

"Oh dear, I've ripped my skirt." Christie said, blushing and holding the damaged garment.

Jenna entered to find Victoria on the floor covered in Mountain Dew and Christina holding a candy bar in one hand and her torn skirt in the other.

"Do I even want to know?" Jenna asked, smiling. "Why don't the two of you take the rest of the day off to address your wardrobe malfunctions."

"Thanks, Jenna." Victoria said.

"Yeah, thanks!" Christina added.

As they left, Victoria asked, "Wanna hit the gym?"

"And I'll have another meal... Yes, with all the extras... I want a large soda with this one... Yes, that's it I think."

This wasn't the first time the fast food workers served the Gordge employees, so they weren't as baffled by the size of their orders. The four big girls had each ordered more food than two people would usually get, all getting double meals to get twice as much soda and extras. The service was in fact quite smooth, and soon the girls' lunches were ready.

Taking their seats at a booth (none of them wanted to risk a "chair accident"), the girls hardly had time to get comfortable before they began to gobble down their meals.

Melissa was enjoying herself fully as she scarfed down the first of her several burgers. Alice was a little less able to appreciate her food. She was looking at Christina's lunch, trying to hide her concern and failing completely. Her stack of burgers, fries and soda was as big as Alice's, and Christina seemed like she didn't even notice (or care about) it. Surely Victoria had also noticed? Looking over at her other friend, Victoria seemed as lost in her food as Melissa, greedily stuffing her face with fries and mouthfuls of burger.

"Hey Christie-", Alice said awkwardly quietly, almost whispering. "Are you... Are you really going to eat all that?"

"Sure!" Christina said, smiling happily as she took another gulp at her first soda. "I've had bigger meals. Did you order too little, or what?"

"I guess... I mean, no. It's nothing", said Alice. With the way Melissa and Victoria were gorging themselves right next to her, Alice had a hard time convincing herself to worry about Christina's meal.

"O-uurp!" Christina began to respond, but couldn't hold down a belch. The other girls giggled for a moment, Christina blushing a little and covering her mouth with her hand. Christina stood in front of the mirror in pure disbelief and shock. It was like some sort of fat veil had been lifted, and now every pound on her gigantic body was completely exposed and clear to her. She observed herself in the mirror, almost looking as if she was about to cry at the fact she didn’t even completely fit in the mirror. As she was feeling her large stomach and all it’s new (well New to her) flab she thought to herself...

“How could I let this happen, how could I get so..so FAT.”
She turned around and cringed at the size of her huge ass. “ ehh my perfect ass, it was so trim and firm and now look at it, it’s huge and flabby and it wobbles when I move ehhh” Christina started to tear up.
“I’m so fat. I miss my hot, thin body” she cried.

After that Christina decided she would do everything she could to get her hot perfect body back. But it proved harder than she thought...

For the first couple of months, due to her new found awareness of her current weight, she started to notice how much she struggled with, what used to be simple and easy tasks for her when she was thin. She notice how she always used the elevator instead of the stairs, which at the start of her job was her main way of getting from floor to floor. She notice how she had to cram her now large ass into her chair just to fit in it and how the bars at the sides dug into her waist. She notice how difficult walking had become and how quickly she became out of breath, as well as how difficult it was to move around, without knocking things over with her huge mass.

This made it very difficult for Christina to lose weight as it took her quite a bit to get used to her new blubber and this made it challenging to exercise. The gym had become like hell on earth for Christina, all the judgy looks for all the other women as she tried to lose weight and all the little demeaning whispers around the gym “OMG. Do you see that girl over there, I swear down I saw like a year ago in this same gym and I’m telling you she used to be skinny. God she got fat.”
Also dieting had become a new challenge for her. Giving up on her most favourite foods proved impossible. All day she spent craving some delicious foods and dying to just eat a burger. And this lead to snacking... lots and lots of snacking. She would bargain with herself saying things like “one donut won’t hurt” or “I’ve been the gym so I can treat myself today” but as time went on, one soon became two which soon became four and so on, ultimately leading to the inevitable outcome....

13111222111112221112122112.content:
"I can't believe they got a pool! How the heck did we miss this?" Christina said, slowly making her way across the hallway with Victoria on her tail.

"Oh I'm sorry, I mean, I didn't get a chance to notice because you totally stopped coming to the gym with me", Victoria complained, before taking yet another sweet, chocolatey bite off of what she insisted was just another healthy 'energy bar'.

"I stopped coming because you stopped going, Victoria", Christina sassily replied, nudging the fat, malleable flesh of Victoria's flank with her own equally fat and malleable elbow.

"Yeah, but like, you stopped going too, Christy", Victoria muttered in response, feebly swatting her free hand at Christina's elbow to protect herself from her friend's prodding.

Christina shrugged at the response, turning her head around and letting go of a sigh.

"...I still can't believe they got a frickin' pool."


The two incredibly hefty women were currently waddling their way to the gym's indoor swimming pool area in their swimsuits, causing quite the commotion in the hallways. Of course, the two of them were totally unable to process how every other gymgoer who as much as glanced in their direction stopped to stare in shock. The sight before the judgemental gymgoers was completely outrageous to them, and stunned, silent faces appeared wherever Victoria and Christina showed up on their way to the pool.

Christina had dressed for the occasion in a very, very revealing bikini that didn't leave anything to the imagination of the flabbergasted gymgoers. With each swing of either of her thick thighs, her drooping middle was struck and her gargantuan heaps of fat flopped upwards before settling back down again. Every inch of her girth, from the thickest of her belly rolls to the most minute, hard-to-reach flap of fat jiggled along with her motions, now that there was barely a strip of clothing left to hold back her tonnage. Two monstrous sacks of breast flesh were crushing the poor cups of her bikini top, pouring out the sides of it and really stretching out the thin straps that were digging deep ridges into her chest, back and shoulders. Further down, the waistband of her bikini bottom was buried under an bulging roll of flab hanging from her middle, making her look almost naked, and her backside wasn't much better, as the immense dimensions of Christina's posterior by far eclipsed the pesky little bit of fabric that was meant to cover her rear.

Victoria wasn't one to be outdone, and her choice of outfit was just as skimpy as Christina's. Vicky's doubly tiered voluptuous stomach and wide, doughy love handles were completely out in the open, and her bikini bottom was little more than a few strings hugging the olive expanse they were supposed to cover. Viewed from the back, most of her bikini bottom was in the process of wedging itself into the deep gorge between the two bulbous halves of Victoria's vast, overgrown ass, letting every single inch of thick, dimpled blubber hang out in full view of everyone around.

The girls were absolutely breaking every single dress code and rule of decency imaginable, but none of them would note the stares they got from every passer-by as anything other than jealousy and desire. They were eating up every bit of attention they were getting and none of them felt the least bit insecure as they finally arrived at their destination, the door leading to the swimming pool.

With a huff and a shove from her doughy elbow, Christina pushed open the door. As Christina and then Victoria squeezed themselves through the opening into the room, the girls were hit by a wave of warmth and the sight of the rectangular swimming pool that took up most of the space in front of them.

However, they were surprised to find that the pool and the whole area around it didn't have a single person present. The rest of the gym had been bustling with activity, but this room was totally deserted. A few drips and shrinking puddles near the pool indicated that someone had in fact been here not too long ago, but for now the room was clean and empty.

The door closed behind Victoria and Christina, muffling the cacophony of blaring music, exercise machines and strained grunts they had been hearing outside. Without the bustle of the rest of the gym, the pool area became almost unnervingly calm, the droning sound of the lights overhead and the gentle rippling of moving water making itself heard in the otherwise absolute silence.

"It's empty", Christina stated flatly, her voice echoing as she looked around the room.

"I don't know, maybe we shouldn't be in here, what if they're cleaning or something?" Victoria hissed, as if speaking too loudly might alert a hidden janitor to their presence.

The girls hesitated. They huddled together for a moment, taking a little time to consider what to do next.
13111222111112221112122112.title: Going to the pool

choices: They leave the gym
They are confronted outside of the pool area
131112221111122211121221121.content:
"...Oh, screw it. If they're gonna chase us out, I'm getting in while I have the chance", Christina finally asserted. She threw her towel onto one of the nearby benches and approached the pool. Victoria held still for a moment, stuffing the rest of her snack into her mouth, quickly chewing and swallowing, before dropping her own towel onto the ground.

"Watch this, Christy", Victoria called out to Christina, brushing through her long hair once before spreading her feet into a wide stance. She fished her flimsy bikini bottom out from between her bare butt cheeks, before rubbing her hands over her hefty hips for a moment. A look of concentration took hold of her face, and she squinted her eyes at the pool a few steps in front of her.

Then, with a sudden swing of her rearmost leg, she brought her immense bulk into forward motion. Her arms wobbling wildly along with her legs, she power-waddled to the edge of the pool. At the edge, Victoria bent her knees, and sprung into the air!

Victoria threw her arms forward and tried to bend her body downwards towards the pool beneath her. One moment she was looking like an obese seagull diving for fish, somehow elegant in her own way. But she twisted awkwardly, losing her balance and tumbling gracelessly for a second before having the whole length of her body smashing violently through the water's surface.

The sudden splash created by Victoria's plunge reverberated across the pool area, and a huge torrent of water was launched into the room. The wave blasted Christina all over the front of her body like a water hose set to full power, sending her staggering backwards and splashing onto the floor behind her all the way to the entry door.

The torrent stopped as suddenly as it had started and left a dripping wet mess in its wake. Christina shook her head and rubbed her eyes, attempting to recover from the blast of water. Meanwhile, Victoria's sputtering head appeared at the water's surface.

"Geez that stung kinda hard...", Victoria mumbled to herself, just as Christina came back to her senses. With the entire front side of her body having already been painfully splashed, Christina gingerly made her way over to the little ladder at the side of the pool, uneventfully lowering her incredibly plump frame into the comfortably warm water.

"Hah, I knew you wouldn't be able to match that dive", Victoria said with a smug smile as her friend's poofy chest and shoulders submerged into the water.

"You caused a frickin' tsunami, Vicky. It almost knocked me on my butt over there!" Christina retorted, taking the chance to splash a little water at her friend's face in return. Victoria raised an arm, but she was too slow, and was left sputtering again as the water struck her face.

"Like, not my fault - it's called diving, there's gonna be a little splash", Victoria huffed callously, clearly having failed to notice the massive displacement of water she had just caused.

"Yeah, but that tidal wave wasn't a little splash", Christina remarked, rolling her eyes at her oblivious friend.

After a moment of adjusting themselves, Christina and Victoria began to tentatively make their way around the pool. Since they were all alone in the room, they could goof off all they liked. They playfully splashed each other with water and chased each other back and forth across the length of the pool, giggling all the while like a pair of kids.

Regardless of their playful approach, swimming around was definitely strenuous enough to wear out the girls, as their lack of visits to the gym had not done any favours to the physique of either of them. Their movement through the water gradually slowed down, but their play defied their aching muscles for a while longer. They breathlessly kept chasing each other back and forth, until one of the girls just couldn't take it any more.

"Ugh, my arms..." Victoria grunted after one too many chases across the pool. "Ugh, my legs... I'm totally taking a break."

Victoria pedalled to the edge of the pool, taking her arms out of the water and putting her hands on the solid ground next to her. She proceeded to try to heave her whole body straight out of the water using her arms, a movement that wasn't really possible at her size, especially not considering the weary state of her weak muscles. The best she could do was to half-beach herself onto the edge of the pool, but she couldn't quite pull herself up, and the sharp edge of the pool dug painfully into her plush middle.

In the end she was forced to slip back into the water, but rather than giving up, Victoria instead moved on to an even more outlandish attempt at acrobatics. She attempted to heft one of her legs over the edge of the pool, so that she could simply roll out of the water onto the floor. Of course Victoria's legs were heavy, rotund piles of lard, and such a manoeuvre was absolutely not feasible for her. Although she struggled and became increasingly flustered by her failed attempts at throwing her ungainly legs over the edge, she couldn't get anywhere close to climbing out of the water.

Finally admitting defeat, Victoria took the easier route of clambering over the ladder out of the water. As her body emerged from the pool, little drops of water began dripping from under her copious girth, quickly forming a little pond beneath her as she wearily waddled over to her towel and collapsed with a loud, wet thud onto a nearby bench.

Christina followed her friend up the ladder, her own body having become quite sore as well. She felt surprisingly heavy and sluggish out of the water, and she slowly plodded back to where she'd put down her own towel.

"Oh my god, I feel like this was the first time I've swum in years... How did you like it Vicky?", Christina wheezed between heavy breaths as she wiped the water off of her bulbous curves, one drooping and dripping body part at a time.

"Phew, it was fun I guess, but it's way tougher than I remember", Victoria responded, her slick, shiny limbs still dripping slowly onto the floor next to her feet. "Although, the best part is getting to put on this for a change", she chuckled, grabbing both cups of her bikini top and fondling the undersides of her meaty breasts for a moment. Christina let that particular comment pass by without responding.

In the warm room the girls quickly dried out well enough, though large puddles still led like trails from the pool to the benches where they were seated. Curiously, not a single person had made their way to the swimming pool during the time Christina and Victoria had been there, apart from the two of them the room was as empty as they had found it.

"So d'ya wanna get out of here or what?" Christina asked when her body had dried enough that the heat in the room was starting to feel stifling, rather than pleasant.

"Yeah, let's just go before the janitor arrives or whatever", Victoria said, scrambling to haul her weighty frame back on her feet.

13113.content:
"That poor little thing." Alice said in the break room later that day while snacking on some brownies. "Did you see her? She knows she doesn't fit in, but she's not sure what to do."

Courtney disagreed. "She knows. She just doesn't want to."

"Well, I think we need to help her." Victoria said.

"Yeah." Alice agreed, slurping down her second milkshake of the break. "We should help her."

Melissa chimed in. "It won't be hard to do. That little twig would get bigger if she just started to join us for a break a day."

"So it's settled, then." Victoria said.

Jenna lumbered in at that moment. "What's settled?"

"We need to make Christina a bigger part of the team." Alice answered.

"I was thinking that same thing." Jenna offered. "Has anyone seen a red velvet cake?"

"Oops." Courtney muttered, brushing red crumbs from her globular belly.

"That's OK, Courtney." Jenna said. "We're going to have a meeting this afternoon to offer Christina a bigger role in the organization. I'll make sure there's plenty of cake."

An hour later, the girls were gathered around the conference room table. The seat at the end was left for Christina. At every seat, each of the girls' favorite foods were piled high.

Jenna addressed the group while they gorged themselves: "So you see, ladies, our business is expanding, and we need to find the right person to help it grow."

Christina had butterflies in her stomach. Could this be her big chance?

Jenna winked at Victoria.

"How about Christina?" Victoria asked.

"I don't know." Jenna answered. "Christina, are you ready for an opportunity like this?"

"I'll try." Christina replied meekly.

"No." Jenna scolded. "I need more than that."

"Like what?" Christina asked.

"Show me that you're committed!" Jenna barked. "Eat this cake!"

Jenna slid a red velvet cake across the table while the others watched in anticipation. They snacked on their own goodies as though they had popcorn at a movie theater, giant tubs of popcorn drowned in butter and covered in chocolate.

Christina was still full from lunch, but she knew that she had to do this. At first it was going down on pure adrenaline, but then the task in front of her started to unfold. She made it through the first 3/4 before the taste started to make her sick. The girls encouraged her on with every bite, and that kept her going until the last piece. At that point, blind ambition took over. She was going to make it here, by God! She was going to do whatever it took, eat all of the cake, be the biggest star in this company!

And with that, it was gone. The women roared their approval, and knew that they would be seeing big things from little Christina, but none of them could know just how big.

131131.content:
Christina was a classic, controlling, straight A perfectionist. From her meticulously groomed hair to her spotless grade point average, she wanted everything in her life to be immaculate.

Ambition had led her to this job. She saw how well the company was doing, but once she interviewed, she saw nothing but upward mobility. This place was being run by a bunch of bovine women who were lazy and slow. She was certain that her looks and sharp behavior would lead her quickly to the top. Her first couple of months had confused her. Status seemed to be directly proportional to weight here. The lunch and meeting had confirmed this suspicion, and it became clear to her what she needed to do. Other than Jenna, the boss, these heifers were simply self-indulgent cows without direction. That their weight translated to position was a concept that was lost on them - getting fat was just something that was happening to them.

Well, she knew now, and she had two choices: stay lean and look for another job, or use all of her discipline and ambition to rapidly rise to the top here. No other company would have such a simple promotion process, but was it worth being so fat that getting out of a chair would become exercise? She ultimately knew that she could be a millionaire by age 30 in this company if she applied herself properly. She could hire people to carry her around when she became the boss. This hunger for control was too much to overcome.

Christina studied and laid out a plan. She'd have to start slowly, get her body used to things. It would only take another 500 calories per day to add a pound per week. These women dropped 500 calories worth of crumbs each day. That would be a good goal to start, she thought, but if she chose her foods wisely, she felt certain that she could accelerate the process and gain 3 pounds per week. Once her body was used to the extra food, she'd ramp it up. As she planned, she dreamt of herself getting bigger and bigger. How would she carry it, she wondered. She'd never possessed any extra weight. Would it go to her boobs, her belly, her butt? Eventually, she thought, she'd be so gigantic that it wouldn't matter.
131131.title: Turns out that Christina's really competitive.

choices: The other girls get jealous.

1311311.content:
Christina made a trip to the local supplement store, where she picked up a container of "Bulk-eeze" weight gain powder. Three milkshakes per day with Bulk-eeze would give her 3,000 calories if she ate nothing else. Nutritional facts were committed to memory: cake donuts had more calories than glazed, cinnamon buns have more calories than donuts, a fried chicken sandwich has more calories than a hamburger if you add cheese and mayonnaise.

Armed with knowledge and her powder, she faced the next day with enthusiasm. She carefully selected her meals and filled in the gaps with milkshakes. This did not go unnoticed by her coworkers, who universally encouraged her when they saw her drinking milkshakes at her desk. By the end of the day, she had consumed 5,000 calories, and she was uncomfortable. She felt bloated and as she lay in bed, she was hot and sweating as her body's rapid metabolism attempted to eliminate the extra calories. By the end of a week, she had added 3 pounds. By the end of two weeks, it was 5, but she was starting to be more comfortable with the volume, so she cut herself some slack for missing her goal weight by a pound. At a month, she had added 11 pounds and she was no longer sweating through her nights. She was a little behind schedule at this point, but she knew things were getting easier, so she showed patience.

It was rewarded over the next month, as she was able to begin to add extra snacks with the girls in the morning and afternoon. She couldn't come close to matching Alice or Courtney's gluttonous behavior, but she knew that she was adding another 1,000 calories per day to her diet, and what's more, she was enjoying it. The food was incredibly good, and she was finding it easier and easier to take just one more donut at Jenna's behest, or share another brownie with Victoria. Like them, she was preoccupied with food now, but she maintained a focus that they lacked - this was a means to an end.

With her metabolism effectively waylaid, the second month saw bigger gains. 4 pounds in the first week, 5 in the second, and 6 in each of the last 2. 32 pounds in 2 months, bringing her to around 150. She was still the skinniest girl in the office by far, but she noticed the changes. It turned out that she accumulated most of her weight in her belly and boobs, with a little extra making it's way to the area below the waist. Her coworkers hardly noticed, but she had started to receive compliments on her healthy appearance. She had enjoyed the added inches on her bust and had begun to dress in a way that accentuated her bigger breasts.

Month 3 brought 25 more pounds, and an increasing appetite. She was starting to count her coworkers' calories, and it became a game for her to eat a little bit more than Melissa or try to match Courtney. By month 4, she was eating nearly 8,000 calories per day. Jenna increasingly commented on the high quality of her work as she approached and blew past 200 pounds in the 3rd week of the month. She was now getting big enough to catch her coworkers attention as her boobs had ballooned to DDs and her once flat stomach became rounder and rounder.

"Another milkshake, Courtney?" Victoria asked.

"Buuuuurrrrp!" Courtney belched. "Do you even have to ask?"

"Can you get one for me too?" Alice requested.

"And me!" Melissa added.

"Of course!" Victoria said cheerily as she filled cups at the milkshake machine in the break room. "I don't want anyone to go hungry."

That would not likely be a problem, as the girls continued to eat even as they waited for their shakes.

Jenna was trying to do the same thing, making certain that her young star kept adding to her portfolio. She wanted to tell her to take more breaks, but Christina was driven, and it was hard to get her to take all of the breaks offered during the day. To say that the weight was just there wouldn't be accurate though, as those same tops were beginning to ride up on her growing gut. Her entire body was adding a thick layer of fat from her chubby cheeks to her thunder thighs. She wore it well, remaining as well-dressed and groomed as she could for someone getting so fat so fast.

Her boobs were like a pair of ripe watermelons, perched on top of her medicine ball belly. Each of her thighs was as big around as she had been just a few months earlier. Each day, they brought more, awed by her transformation, waiting to see if and when she would stop her rapid expansion and remarkable productivity.

This thought of victory was cut short by a flash of her goal, Jenna's position.
If size ruled at Gorge then Jenna was proof of it. What had Christina heard when she arrived? Was she 500 pounds? 510? Whatever that number was it was in the past now, Christina's gaining to her 500-pound titan status had taken about 11 months now, and Jenna had certainly not been dieting in that time.

"She might be 550 by now, who knows, higher? I need to step up my game, make sure there is no doubt in anyone's mind who is the fattest" Christina thought to herself as she sat in her apartment, absentmindedly fondling her squishy belly. "Before I formulate plan though..."

*Beep beep beep*

"Hello? I would like to place an order please. How many? How many pizzas can your delivery-boy carry?"

Setting her phone off dial and switching it to note-taking Christina started running the numbers. At her size it took alot more calories and food to keep her weight stable, let along increase it, she would need some serious weight gain shakes, and lots of it.

13113112111.content:
"So no *munch* experience in being an assistant?"

"Ummm, more like...no experience full stop..."

This was Christina's 5th person today, she eyed the prospective candidate up and down, taking in her trim figure and polite stance as a positive. But her hint of a tattoo peeking out of her wrist collar and thick, tall blood-red Mohawk and massive spiked goth-boots screamed *unprofessional*. Not to mention she was straight out of college with no jobs to her name.

"*gulp* Talia was it?"

"Wa-wa...wait, I will be right back!" Talia stammered as she shot off like a scolded cat.

Christina sat dumbfounded, she had never seen someone simply dash off mid-interview.

A few minutes passed and Talia returned. "I saw blueberry and Chocolate, but I didn't know which to grab so I got both" she hurriedly explained stretching her arms at full length with her gift boxes of donuts.

"T-h-a-n-k-y-o-u" Christina was slow in reaching over and accepting the gift, struck dumb by Thalia's quick thinking.

"Yeah sure. I can bring croissants, bagels, cheesecakes, brownies, muffins, even a wedding cake if you gave me something to carry it in"

"In that cawth *gulp*"

Alice and Melissa went to the food court downstairs. They ordered their large meals and sat at a table.

“This second lunch is so great. It’s just what I need at this time of the day.”

“I know right? Now though (chewing) I think… there should be a brunch at like ten.” Melissa said.

“Definitely. I actually saw an article that said *munch* that you’re actually *chew* supposed to eat *gulp* like 5 or 6 meals a day.” Alice said.

“That would mean Jenna is like the healthiest person ever, right?” Melissa said. They both laughed.

“That’s so mean, but so funny.” Alice said. “Seriously though, I think it’s actually true. Something about getting enough energy throughout the day, you need more meals.” Alice said. She didn’t really read the whole article but liked how it supported her unhealthy eating habits.

“It probably is true. People have said I eat too much my whole life, and I say I’m pretty healthy. I don’t have diabetes, I haven’t had a heart attack, my doctor says I’m obese, I’m doing pretty well.” Melissa said.
