“No, I’m pretty sure obese is fine. It’s morbidly obese that means you’re unhealthy.” Melissa said. Alice decided not to correct her.
The girls gabbed and gorged until lunch was over. They heaved their heavy guts back to their desks where they continued to stuff themselves with fatty foods.
1321.title: Melissa and Alice's big lunch

choices: Alice and Melissa's lunch is intruded upon by another employee at Gordge...
Melissa has to get up... but she can't. She's too full and fat!
Alice and Melissa aren't the only huge ones at Gordge...
13211.content:
It wasn’t like they were trying to gain weight.

It just sort of… happened.

What with all the newfangled fixtures that Jenna kept pumping into the office, each one designed to reward everyone’s hard work and good morale, it was inevitable that some people were going to begin to get a little attached to all the new perks that came with being a Gordge employee. But as business seemed to pick up, and the company made more money, there wasn’t much need to look backwards—no need to correct those little feelings of entitlement without proper performance. And the better the company did, the better the perks became. Everyone developed a vice.

Victoria had her new computers.

Courtney had new temps to torture.

Christina had her Starbucks coffee machine.

But Alice and Melissa? They had the break room. The entirety of it. The fridges, the smoothie makers, the blenders and the snack machines, just about anything that Jenna could cram into that rapidly cramping section of the building was fuel to the fire for those two. Not to mention the minifridges underneath their desks, the complimentary donuts every morning, and their own lack of booming social lives; suffice it to say that Gordge’s philanthropy was beginning to take a toll on both of the already overfed office drones…

***


”Alright guys, let’s get everybody in a good mood for lunch with today’s Foodie Friday—easily my favorite part of the week.” a deep, though distinctively feminine voice flooded the breakroom through the PA system, ”This one comes from favorite foodie Alice Gellar—love all those submissions, girl!—who suggested that I try the vanilla sheet cake from Quaker Bakers. Let’s see if she hits the mark again, shall we?”

“You know Cass… I don’t think most people consider a sheet cake—a whole sheet cake—to be lunch material.” another, decidedly lighter pitched voice spoke, “I’m starting to think that this whole Foodie Friday thing is just an excuse for you to get to pig out.”

”Oh what do you know, Marni.” Cass said through a mouthful of (what was presumably) cake, ”Ya party pooper.”

Inside the breakroom, two humongous hills of women sat plopped onto the reinforced seats that surrounded the circular tables. On one side, an overly bloated brunette easily big enough to be two or three women sat with her nose deep into an already almost empty box of pizza. On the other, a blimpy blonde as wide as most women were tall choked down cruller after cruller from the sole survivor of the earlier onslaught that had been breakfast at Gordge industries.

Their meals were mostly silent, given the intense amount of concentration that each one had to dedicate to their meals in order to feel mostly satisfied with the enormous amounts of food that they shoveled down into their stomachs, but there was still a feeling of great camaraderie between them. Despite the fact that neither of them could so much as wrap their arms around themselves anymore, much less each other, the two of them had never felt closer.

“When did Marni become such a pill?” Melissa puffed briefly as she glanced up from her meal, her breathing heavy from exertion, “I thought she was… rrrrrrp… the fun one?”

Melissa had grown into a true hog over the many months since Jenna’s initial aspirations of revamping the office had taken place. Due to the enormously enabling systems set in place, she and her friends were allowed to stuff themselves to their hearts content without much payment or second thought. Her willpower already weak, Melissa had done a wonderful job of ballooning herself into the outer regions of mobility. She was spectacularly belly-heavy, with a great swollen sack of a stomach that hung heavily in front of her whenever she walked. It spread her knees and legs apart even now, as she sat on the padded bench of the break room. She had put on a decent amount of weight in her already ample rear—enough to keep her well-padded wherever she chose to sit—but her breasts were rather small for a woman of her epic proportions. She had squeezed herself into the biggest blouse she owned, and her tailor-made khakis were beginning to cut into the equator of her gut once more. A few more lunches, just a few, and she would need to go see him again.

“Right?” Alice burbled through a mouthful of crème and sugar, “Remember when we used to hate Cass?”

Alice had grown similarly to her friend—though she was much more top heavy comparatively. Her great chest rose and fell like a fleshy empire, heaving up and down with every belabored breath the overweight worker could manage. Her face had widened and softened supremely, as had her now pillow-like arms, to the point where even her wrist had been absorbed by a stray roll of encompassing fat. She could barely reach beyond her chest at this point, given its superiority and the severe curve of her belly. Crossing her arms was, at this point, completely out of the question. Alice was far too fat to do much of anything, including see in front of herself. She usually fell behind one of her friends so that they could guide her, in addition to the fact that she was just not nearly as swift as she used to be.

They spent much of their days in the break room, binging and dishing about various things between bites or bouts of fullness, and get very little accomplished before heading home—usually with dinner as a segway between the two destinations.

“Oh I know, I used to hate her so much.” Melissa said cattily, her chins wobbling with every word, “But now Marni… you know, with how much she bitches at Cass lately, is starting to get on my shit list.”

“Ugh, I know.” Alice agreed readily with a chuckle, sending a ripple into her vast chest, “I mean, Fitness Friday was kinda cool way back when, but Foodie Friday is so much more fun.”

As they ate, filling the breakroom with the symphony that was their chewing munching and swallowing, the PA system followed in kind.

“I’m just saying Cass, it’s been an awful long time since you’ve seen your feet.” Marni teased over the intercom, ”Maybe just limit your lunches to a pound cake for a while, huh?

”Marni, the whole point of Foodie Friday is for a judgement free lunch experience.” Cass said with playful defensiveness through a mouthful of cake, ”Feelin’ pretty judged right now.”

Alice and Melissa stuffed themselves eagerly, the effects of their spectacular meals barely holding any weight against the potential stretchy capacity of their own overfed stomachs. Melissa in particular, without Alice’s penchant for things like “guilt” and “maybe I shouldn’t” and “my sister’s coming to visit” had blossomed into a truly great beast of a gut. She was an impressive specimen, completely unrepentant in filling the vast void of her belly with anything and everything she could find.

“Hey, watch it!” Alice spat as she slapped the back of her friend’s hand, forcing her to drop a pilfered pastry, “Those are mine!”

“Sorry.” Melissa said weakly, her eyes still locked on the treat, “You know how I get.”

“Yeah, hungry.” Alice plucked up her cruller, “Honestly, you’re such a piggy sometimes.”

On the other side, Alice had gone the other route with her rampant obesity. While she was mostly content in her lifestyle of eating and growing, she had plenty of times where she realized the end result of her new hobby. She wasn’t able to dissuade herself from eating any more, of course—in fact, all the extra stress caused her to eat more if anything—but she was the more remorseful between the two of them. It had always been that way, so it shouldn’t be much of a surprise that a few extra hundred pounds or so had done little to change that.

”Seriously Cass? You’re not even gonna save any for me?” Marni whined, ”I didn’t get anything last Foodie Friday either. Or the Friday before that! Throw me a bone, girl!”

”Hey, this is Foodie Friday with Cass.” Cass barked declaratively, ”You have Marni on the Street Mondays, I have Foodie Fridays. I don’t go out and bug people on the side of the road with you, do I?”

”Could probably use the exercise…” Marni grumbled

”What was that?”

“Mm… yeah.” Melissa smacked her lips, wrapping her chubby fingers around yet another slice of pizza, “What do you want for Lunch #2? Quiznos?”

“You know… I could actually go for a pound cake right about now…” Alice licked her lips greedily, “Maybe I’ll phone up Quaker Bakers…”
13211.title: Super-Sized Sweeties Squeezed into the Break Room

choices: Christina—the intern turned blimptern after hanging out with Alice and Mel!
Courtney—the only woman on staff who could give these two a match in size!
Vicky—the ditzy secretary who doesn't realize what bad influences they are!
132113.content:
Sooner than either woman would have surely liked, a soft tone interrupted the inane radio chatter of Cass and Marni to signal that the first lunch period of the day had come to an abrupt close. Alice and Melissa let out two matching moans as both colossal women struggled to come to terms with the fact that they would have to wait another three hours before either of them could adequately recharge. Setting aside their disappointment, the two women turned their energies to rising under their own power.

It was becoming a monumental effort, considering their ever climbing weights. Both Melissa and Alice had become so completely consumed with stuffing themselves that they had hardly worked in an adequate upper body strength regimen. Both women were totally ill-fit to lift their flabby bodies under their own power without expending herculean amounts of effort on their parts—something that was becoming harder and harder to do with almost every passing day. Melissa’s mighty meaty arms quivered as she struggled to push herself up from the table, while Alice rocked on her bloated cheeks in an attempt to gain enough momentum to launch herself upwards. The break room was a duet of husky grunts and labored puffs as both super-sized sows clamored to their feet and left the break room in a single-file line of two.

Their expansion around the office was nothing short of noticeable. In an office environment where almost everyone was putting on weight, it seemed that Alice and Melissa had perfected the art form. Many considered them to be the biggest women in the office—and they weren’t that far off from the truth. The cubicle aisles shook as both women trotted down at an awkward and uneasy pace, rattling knickknacks and personal decorations on everyone within range’s desks, their pathetic gasps for air filling the floor as they struggled to get themselves back to their desks.

Melissa led the way, her big belly bobbing in front of her by a considerable amount. She had grown so belly-heavy that she was forced to lean back whenever she walked, lending her a very pregnant appearance. She swung her arms blindly as she shuffled her fat feet across the floor, hoping to keep the momentum going so that she might make it back to her tiny little cubicle and to the mini-fridge inside. Meanwhile, behind her, Alice fought against the belligerent bouncing of her bazongas as they danced in timing with the gait of her gut. Both elephantine women had their own issues to face, but it certainly didn’t help that most of the women on the floor were actively ignoring them…

Not to be mean, of course. It was just…

Well, Alice and Melissa had let themselves go. To the point where almost everything they did revolved around eating. Anyone kind or naïve enough to agree to a lunch date with the two of them would surly live to regret their decision when they left feeling three times as full as they ought to have been. Those two just… ate. And ate and ate! And they made so many runs to the snack machines and they always brought someone something back… it wasn’t like they were doing it to be mean—but it was so hard to stay trim around such enormous women!

“Hey guys!” a voice called out from them deep in the neighborhood of cubicles, “Over here! I wanted to talk to you about where we should all go for second lunch!”

The sound of the familiar tone struck a chord with both women, their heads perking up and their pitiful pace beginning to pick up slightly.

It had been the voice of their third of the groups, the only woman in the office who was willing to hang out with such toxic influences anymore. It was the voice of…

1323.content:
Alice, Melissa, and Courtney all met up at a local bar. They spent the whole night eating and drinking. Finally at about 12 30 they all came back to Alice’s place to crash for the night, since they were all way too drunk to drive home. The trio stumbled there way into her apartment Melissa and Courtney sat down while Alice got food.

“Hey… How funny was it when Alice ripped her…. Her jeans.” Melissa said, laughing like a true drunk.

“Yeaaaah. Oh my god you could hear it from across the room.” Courtney chuckled. What was about to take place was a rare conversation. It would certainly never take place if it weren’t for the power of alcohol. Anyway, Alice came back into the room with snack food.

“I got snaaaaaaaacks… Whats so funny?” Alice said as she plopped down into her seat.

“Were talking about you bursting… your pants.” Melissa said. All three gigantic women were laughing now.

“Don’t laugh… *chuckle* at my fat.” Alice giggled.

“Fat! You’re not fat! I’m fat.” Courtney said. The laughter kept growing.

“Sorry guys. But I think we’re all *burp* I think we’re all fat.” Melissa said, still uncontrollably laughing.

“Yeah I think your right, we’re all fatties.” Courtney said.

“Courtney I think you may be the biggest one here.”

“I know I’m so fat guys.” She said grabbing her big belly.

“*snort* How’d we *cackle* How’d we get so fat?” Alice joked. The laughter died out. There was a long moment of silence. The three large women each reflecting on what was just a rhetorical question. Having a moment of thought that drunkenness tends to cause. How did they get so fat?

“This is kind of personal, but how much… how much do you guys weigh?” Alice asked.

“At least 400… I’m not even sure I can see the numbers on the scale.” Courtney said. There was a quiet laughter that quickly died out.

“I don’t know. I’m probably getting close to 390, at this point.” Melissa said. Alice was a little surprised by how big her friends were. She wondered if she’d
end up like them.

“I’m only like 330 right now.” Alice said. “I wonder if I’ll ever be as big as you guys. I still have moments where I try to stop eating as much. That’s why I never gained as fast as you guys.”

“Like who cares if you get as big as us. 300, 400, what the difference.” Melissa said bluntly.

“Yeah. You’re just delaying the inevitable. Why restrict yourself. Just enjoy it.” Courtney said.

“You guys are making way to much sense.” Alice chuckled.

“C’mon, A join us. You know your belly wants to.” Melissa said. The laughter finally returned.

“Yeah, Join us. Join us. Joins us.” Courtney and Melissa chanted. Alice was laughing hysterically. While neither of the girls would remember any of this conversation, the ideas were planted in Alice’s mind.
1323.title: Girls night out

choices: As the week goes on, Alice is having some wardrobe malfunctions

13231.content:
Over next few days, Alice had been eating steadily more than she usually did. Seems like the drunk encouragement she received was well placed and firmly rooted into her subconscious. Alice had yet to feel these effects herself, though Melissa and everyone else didn't seem to notice either....at least not yet.

Currently, Alice was at her desk, filing away some old documents and assignments while she took a few calls. she leaned back in her chair, one hand resting on her belly as the other fed her doughnuts. Today seemed like a rather slow day, as she didn't have many clients, so she made her way back into the breakroom where she found Melissa and Courtney, leaning against the counters and snacking.

"Hey girls" Alice said, bending over and raiding the fridge, her large, wide rear sticking up in the air.

"Hey Al, it's a really slow day, huh?" Melissa greeted, sipping a can of soda.

"Oh isn't it though? It feels like we should be really laid back though." Courtney chimed in, scarfing down a twinkie.

Alice heaved herself upright, a large amount of snack cakes in one arm, and a soda in the other. She sat down in one of the chair across from the other two.

"Yes, it's a laid back day, but it's just so boring!" Melissa said, punctuating her sentence with a light burp.

"Yeah it is" Courtney said with a yawn, leaning more heavily on the counter, her belly jutting even further outwards, her shirt ridding up.

Alice was busy listening while she snacked on numerous candy and chips. She took a quick swig of her soda. "mmm, you know, it may be a slow day, but at least we can have a bit of a break from our usual work."

Melissa finished off her soda "I suppose you're *uuurrrp* right."

So things continued like this, very lazily as the day went forward.
13231.title: Alice's eating picks up the pace

132311.content:
As it turned out, Alice didn’t just have a slow day she had a slow week and was probably going to have a slow few months. After losing a few important clients Alice’s workload reduced dramatically. Alice was a naturally hard worker. She didn’t mind the challenge of a heavy workload. She used to work late almost every other day. With the large decrease in work Alice’s workday changed a lot. She had a lot of time to goof off at her desk. She started to hang out a lot more after work now that she wasn’t working late. All of this culminated to an increase in Alice’s consumption. She started eating all the time. She adopted the same habits as Melissa and Courtney. She was starting to become lazier.

“Hey girlsh, I’m shtarting tah *burp* like not having sho mush work.” Alice said with a mouthful of snacks. She had been snacking all day. It was really showing. As she sat in the break room with Melissa and Courtney she continued to stuff herself. Her gut was barely contained by her shirt. There were large gaps between her shirt buttons. She clearly looked larger than ever before.

“Yeah treat yourself.” Courtney agreed.

“Totally,” Alice said. “Feel more comfortable.” She said. She reached down to unbutton her bottom shirt button. It was tough due to the pressure of her engorged middle. She finally let the button lose. Alice felt a brief moment relief until she heard POP POP POP! The other three bottom buttons flew off as her big belly surged outward. Her whole body jiggled as the buttons flew across the room.

Alice had ultimately decided that a vacation at home would be much better than traveling somewhere far; So, she did just that. Alice went home that day and immediately changed out of her tight, uncomfortable work clothes and into some more comfortable garments. She then proceeded to lay in her reclining chair, relax, watch some movies, and gorge. This continued well into the night, as Alice could now sleep in in the mornings for a while, and, she was definately going to enjoy herself from this point on.

Alice continued to enjoy herself in much the same way; she'd stay at home, be lazy and eat. Considering she didn't have any work to do, she got quite lazy and lethargic over time as well. Though, just to switch things around, the bulging beauty would often eat out with Courtney and Melissa over the weekends, or whenever they got off work. Her heaving hooters always seemed like they would burst out of her top at any moment, and at least few inches of creamy belly flesh was on display at all times, her shirts riding up on her expanding stomach. 13231121.title: Alice stays at home

choices: the new "fun" Alice doesn't work as hard, but eats twice as much!
Alice's new outlook raises some eyebrows around the office.
132311211.content:
As Alice’s vacation days slowly petered out, the frequency with which she made contact with the outside world followed suit. While after-work outings and some barhopping on the weekends with Courtney and Melissa were normally common occurrences in Alice’s cute little datebook, mustering up anything more laborious than a text message was slowly becoming an incredible feat for their absentee coworker. It seemed as though that the fewer days left remaining in her impromptu vacation, the more Alice worked at not working.

Finally the night had come—Alice’s month of absolute abdication and lethargy had ticked down ‘til only twelve measly hours remained until she was expected to clock back in at eight ‘o’ clock in the morning. Despite the haste with which she gleefully forgot her responsibilities, Alice had managed to send a few text messages to Melissa over the course of her day (which began promptly at eleven forty-one in the morning, thank you!) inviting both her and Courtney over for dinner and a drink.

Both of her big buddies arrived promptly at eight, give or take the few minutes it took for either of them to haul their overfed keisters from their respective vehicles. Courtney was still dressed from the work-day, a long flowing tent of a dress with an unflattering though festive floral design that made her look like a big Vera Bradley themed blimp and a half-jacket that compressed around her hammish upper-arms. Melissa had dressed down for the occasion, never the one to waste a moment in getting comfortable, and had managed to find her stretchiest sweats and a t-shirt that almost kind’ve fit properly. Her big belly hung further down than Courtney’s, her shorter stature making her look proportionately bulkier, and despite her lighter size Melissa’s waddle was far more pronounced.

They were accosted by a young thing in a Pizza Hut uniform, a balancing a teetering stack of matching boxes awkwardly on Alice’s doorstep. Apparently she’d already paid, but the young woman was having some trouble with the door…

“Oh we’ll be taking those!” Melissa said wolfishly as she snatched the top half of the pile from the delivery girl, “We’re headed inside anyway… mm, is that Mushroom?”

“Have a good night, sweetie!” Courtney was equally as incorrigible, her own hungry grin matched dimple for dimple with Melissa’s as she removed the remaining boxes, “I sure hope Alice tipped you!”

Courtney lumbered over to the door while Melissa popped open the topmost of her boxes, the bigger of the two women knocking daintily while the shorter eagerly lowered a thick slice of cheese sauce and mushroom into her mouth.

“I said it’s open!” came an irritated expectant tone from inside Alice’s house, “You can come in!”

Courtney raised a chubby finger to her full pink lips as she shushed Melissa, signaling that they were going to go in and surprise her. Melissa giggled thickly, still chewing on her first slice while steam rose from the top of the box. Courtney twisted the handle to Alice’s front door and wriggled her way inside. Courtney’s impressive immensity meant she and doorways weren’t exactly on the same side. Her flaring thighs and mountainous lovehandles scraped the sides of Alice’s doorway, Melissa faring no better. At this rate, Courtney thought idly, she would soon have to turn sideways like she did at the bar. Twin tremors of heavy footsteps shook the room as the two hoggish hotties clogged the hallway, slowly making their way towards Alice’s living room.

“Yeah, you can just leave them there on that little table…urRRUp… I’ll get ‘em.” Courtney recognized Alice’s voice from the hallway, “Thanks a ton.”

Melissa kept giggling, so Courtney had to shush her again. Courtney’s padded elbow meeting Melissa’s airbag of a belly didn’t seem to slow her pizza intake, the big-bellied brunette was already on her second slice after only a few steps into Alice’s house. It wasn’t like they really had to try and hide their heavy footsteps; Alice had the TV up really loud. Even still, Courtney and Melissa attempted to keep up the illusion. The two overfed employees slowly descended into the den of their truant third party, and were mildly surprised by what they saw—

Over the course of her month away from work, Alice had apparently been hard at work enjoying herself. She looked as well-rested as she was fed; Alice had easily put on another thirty pounds in her time off. Alice had never looked so content with herself, lounging around in her pajamas while simultaneously pouring out of them. The creamy ocean of her stomach swelled over and onto her lap despite the width with which she kept her legs apart, the smile of pale flesh that rode up against the lower-most of her stomach folds only served to make her look larger. Her pajama bottoms squeezed the life out of her flabby legs, which eclipsed the seat of her well-worn armchair in an inky-black thickness. Her chubby feet were kicked up on the footrest, unable to cross over the other due to their swollen size, with one chubby elbow resting on the arm with a big can of Coors between her fingers. In the other, the remote. And on her belly, a plate of cookies—the crumbs dotting the great white surface of her marshmallowy body.

“Aww! You had cookies?!” Melissa whined childishly, “No fair!”

Alice’s big blue eyes widened at the sound of her friend’s voice, and her big body went immediately into a quiver as she jiggled in excitement.

“Hey guys!” Alice’s voice had grown somewhat huskier in her time of abdication but that did little to dull her genuine excitement, “I’m sorry I thought you were the Pizza girl… Melissa! You couldn’t even wait ‘til you got in the door?!”

“Whu?!” Melissa barked back, the cheesey mush in her mouth restored as she took yet another bite, “Yo doh ish my fuvrit”

“Ugh, c’mere!” Alice beckoned with a wave of her chubby hand, “Gimme a hug!”

Courtney and Melissa exchanged hugs with the bigger Alice, the difficulty with which the three of them found in wrapping their girths around the other was only increased by Alice’s stalwart refusal to rise under her own power. The boxes of pizza were divvied up as each girl took their seat in Alice’s living room—Courtney taking one half of the couch while Melissa took the other in an ill-advised attempt at seating all three girls. The correct idea would have been to have the lighter of the two sit on the couch while Courtney took the chair, but Alice didn’t exactly look too keen on giving up her spot—especially not now that there were pizza boxes warming the crest of her impressive belly.

“Mmm…” Alice purred thickly as she wiggled her chubby fingers, licking her lips at the sight of a whole pizza pie just for her, “Oh…mm… lemme just…” the big couch potato blonde downed the rest of her beer and grabbed at the unopened can on the table by her chair—what remained of a twelve pack of 18oz Coors Light sat as a mostly empty cardboard box chairside. Alice cracked it open with a husky Melissa-esque chuckle before taking a big greedy gulp.

“UrrrRRUP!” Alice let out another big burp before giving a half-hearted little tug on her too-small tee, “Ahhh… s’the stuff.”

“Alice!” Courtney’s mouth hung agape with amusement and confusion at her friend, “I thought you hated beer!”

“I did!” the vacationing vegetable said with a hearty appreciation for her pizza, “But it’s an acquired taste—plus it goes super great with pizza!”

“I have been saying that for years” Melissa agreed heartily as she got tossed a can by Alice, “Been needing that since 5 ‘o’ clock.”

Courtney watched as Alice intensely devoured the pizza before her, the close proximity from her belly-tray to her mouth meant that not so much as a drop of cheese was wasted. She would lower it decadently into her mouth with her otherwise useless arms, causing her shirt to ride up again, and chew with loud appreciation for tasty it was. She would take a large slurp of Coors between every other bite or so, a girl of her size with a stomach as full as hers was could easily handle another beer. Apparently she’d spent the last month building up her tolerance. Alice had finished a pizza and a beer before Melissa could finish either of hers. Courtney watched warily as her friend quickly dispatched another box of pizza, an eager glint in her greedy eye

“See, aren’t you glad I talked you into using those vacation days?” Melissa inquired as she ignored the movie and focused solely on the food in front of her, “I wish I could lay around all day and get paid for it!”

“I know s’been great.” Alice said thickly before stuffing another slice into her mouth, “It just sucks that I have to go back to work tomorrow. I need a vacation from my vacation.”

“Oh yeah, it must be terrible getting to lay around all day Al.” Courtney half-teased, “Maybe getting back to the office will do you some good, Al. We’ve all missed you.”

“Yeah, I’ve been enjoying myself so much I kinda forgot all about you guys.” Alice joked with a hearty laugh, clearly just a bit tipsy, “Still, y’think Jenna might be mad if I called in sick?” Alice dove back into her pizza, her head lowered into the box as she resumed stuffing her face

“Uuugh… work suuucks…”
132311211.title: Alice the All-Consuming Abdicator

choices: Alice's new lifestyle is having some adverse effects on her environment...
The girls go out to eat to this place Alice heard about later that night.
Alice isn't holding back anymore. And that means her mouth, too!
1323112111.content:
After about thirty non-consecutive work days of having an extra three hundred pounds of wiggle room in Gordge’s breakroom, the sudden reintroduction of Alice’s ampleness was felt by all those involved.

For one month exactly, Melissa and Courtney had grown rather accustomed to having their lunch table all to themselves. It was a large round thing not unlike the women who most frequently occupied it, and it could be shared between three women of their overall size rather snugly. Once they had convinced Alice to take advantage of her vacation time, the two sizeable sweeties noticed an immediate abundance of elbow room in the latter corner of their little table in the breakroom. Over time this extra room came to mean slightly larger portions between them, leading to some slightly extra amounts of Melissa and Courtney.

Now that Alice had returned however, noticeably larger than when she’d left, the two chair-squashing sows were beginning to feel comparatively cramped.

Alone, Alice’s extravagant meal took up plenty of room on their table. It wrapped around the oozing inlet of her belly, forming a semicircular pattern based around what was within her reach. The main issue being that Courtney and Melissa’s meals were laid out in a similar fashion; Alice’s entrees and sides encroached very noticeably within her friends’, where it did not outright overtake them. In all the confusion of everyone laying out their meals for the day, combined with a haphazard layout and a sizeable appetite clouding her better judgement and memory, Alice may or may not have outright taken a few dishes from her friends. All in all Alice’s lunch was a spectacular smorgasbord of takeout meals, a veritable Borg of logos and wrappers, one that rivaled and outclassed Melissa and Courtney’s meals respectively.

“Jesus, Al.” Courtney snorted as she watched her returned friend snack heartily into some delivered pasta, having given up trying to find her tiny dish of macaroni, “Think you got enough food? You know Jenna gives us two hours for lunch.”

“What?” Alice asked defensively, referring to her massive spread, “I only got the pasta because it came with the pizza and the breadsticks!”

“Then why did you get two?” Courtney pointed to the pepperoni pizzas, baker’s dozen of breadsticks, and the fettucinni alfredo to go with her current course of the chicken

“I had a light breakfast.” Alice concluded definitively with a bite onto her fork

Alice’s breakfast had not been light, even by the Gordge standard of measurement. Melissa had been there first hand to witness it—the battle of the bakery, as Alice stuffed herself with what probably amounted to about two boxes of Dunkin’ Donuts and a decent sized pot of coffee. While that wasn’t exactly unusual for someone who worked at Gordge, Alice probably shouldn’t have been as eager as she was to scarf down those whole pizzas. And all that pasta. Or those breadsticks.

“Oh lighten up, will ya Courtney?” Melissa pat her friend on the back while she stuck her slender pink tongue out at her HR rep, “Alice is just takin’ our advice and living a little—isn’t that right, Al?”

“That’s right.” Alice said with a smile, skewering herself some pasta, “You said it yourself Courtney.”

“I did.” She rolled her eyes and let out a puff of disgruntled air, “I did say that.”

“And it’s been the best advice I’ve ever gotten.” Alice said giddily as she loomed over her mid-day feast, “Just let go. Eat what I want, when I want. Do what I want, when I want. It’s just so… freeing. Y’know?”
1323112111.title: Abdicated Alice

choices: Try to squeeze through the gate.
Walk to other end of the building.
Something else.
133.content:
At noon the sound of massive hunger pangs ripping through the cavernous stomachs, rang through the office like a lunch bell.

As the entire office prepared to go to lunch a choir of groans and could hear as numerous desk chairs creak with relief as hundreds of pounds of gluttonous office blimps, struggling to lift their wide inflated rears. Christina watched as her coworkers slowly waddle their way out of the office reminding her of the Macy’s Thanksgiving Day parade. After exiting the office they entered the elevator 2 at a time. This was because A: they didn't want to exceed the elevators weight limit, and B: there wasn't enough room for three women of so much thick rolling fat.

Once in the lobby Jenna lend the parade of flesh (and Christina) out of the lobby of the building, her massive gut swaying as she went...until she felt her massive gut run into the handicap security gate that usually opens when she leaves the building.

The group was stood stunned as Jenna waddle backwards and tried to waddle forward to make the gate open.

No luck.

After the second attempt, Jenna, yelled to get the security guard that seems under qualified “How can I help?"

"This gate will not open!"

"Sorry, mam but it is broke." The guard said in a sigh. "The repairman should be here this afternoon. Just use the other gates in the meantime."

"Seriously! You can't see that I am too big to fit in those." she said jiggled her gut to make the point.

"Well there is always the entrance on the other side of the building." he said sighing, and walk back to his desk.
133.title: Jenna gets stuck

choices: That night Jenna and others have dinner together
Jenna has changed over the years
The other girls gossip about Jenna
1331.content:
“Ma’am I’m sure you won’t have any problem with the other gates nearby,” The man said. Jenna was visibly angry and he didn’t want to deal with her attitude. The door that he was referring to was smaller than the double door main entrance (that was broken), but it was still a completely suitably sized doorway. He had a hard time believing anyone couldn’t fit through it.

“You don’t think I’ll have a problem? Well fine I’ll just try to use the other gate, then it’ll be you who has a problem!” Jenna said. She wasn't yelling at him but she made it clear she was angry. Her employees begged for her to just use the entrance on the other side of the building. “Nope, this guy says I won’t have a problem!” She waddled over to the smaller exit. She turned sideways and shuffled through the door. Pushing the door open with her blubbery hip. Soon her belly made contact with one side of the doorway while her fat butt brushed against the other side. Her massive fat rolls started to smother the doorframe. Her pace slowed until she could no longer push through the exit. Her wide 500 pound body stuck a couple feet outside of the building.

“I err… Think there’s *gasp* a problem.” Jenna said.

“Oh my god she’s stuck,” Courtney said.

“Please help her!” Alice said to the security guard. He rushed over to Jenna, as did the other girls.

“You can’t fit a round peg in a square whole.” Melissa said snarkily.

Jenna had grown into a round ball of fat. She was once just a young chubby young office rookie, now she was a corporate blimp. The man first daintily pressed against her blubbery side, but realized it would take a lot more than that to move this wedged whale. He leaned into Jen’s wall of flab. He sunk into the deep layers of bulging flesh. She had more padding than a mattress.

No progress was made until finally a janitor walked by. The other girls recruited him to help out their friend. Jenna was definitely large enough for both men to lean against. Slowly Jenna’s immense body oozed through the doorway. After many grunts and groans Jenna was finally squeezed through the door. The sweaty butterball stumbled as she was released from the clutches of the frame. An audience had built up inside as people waiting to exit the building witnessed the ridiculous sight. The small crowd applauded as the big blob of blubber made it outside of the building.
1331.title: Tight fit

choices: Jenna goes to a cheap, greasy buffet
Jenna goes to a classy steakhouse
Jenna gets a call from corporate
13312.content:
Jenna's... incident at the security gate was only the most obvious result of years of overeating and laziness. Jenna had always been a bit chubby, but since coming to the office, her waistline had exploded with fat. The sedentary lifestyle and cushy salary had certainly allowed Jenna to expand her portions, wardrobe, and body without so much as noticing. And as she rose in the corporate ladder and her income increased, Jenna was able to stuff herself fuller and fuller with rich foods.

Yet Jenna's body was not the only thing that had changed as she ascended in ranking. Jenna had grown lazy and spoiled, accustomed to a certain standard of treatment which many in the office would have never conceived of. Despite taking nearly all credit for office tasks, Jenna increasingly delegated even the simplest of labors to her employees, mostly taking on tasks that entailed travel, eating (and lots of it), or at least sitting on her dumpy ass. She became more and more bossy with her employees and especially lower-status workers at the building. Last year, an intern had spent their entire summer busing food from restaurants to Jenna's desk, feeding the sow and pandering to her increasingly gluttonous demands.

"Hmmmmffff, I'll see to it that those guards are replaced! They'll regret making my day difficult!" growled Jenna to herself as she left the building.

Her stomach growled loudly, no doubt upset by its recent compression.

"But first, lunch." Jenna remembered the various venues near the office and thought about where she might like to go. Despite her wealth and love of food, she was not very discerning and ate McDonald's with as much gusto as fine steak. Quantity over quality.
13312.title: Jenna's Indulgence

choices: Jenna is right on time to get back to work
Jenna is late for an important meeting!
Jenna feels a gurgling in her stomach
133121.content:
Jenna decided she needed some comfort food and rest after her traumatic experience at the security gate, so she went alone to her old favorite, Billy's all-you-can-eat Buffet. Billy's was not exactly known as a fine dining establishment, but it had all manner of starchy, fried, and greasy American fare at a mere $8 per person.

At the buffet, Jenna skipped the mediocre vegetable section and immediately loaded a plate with brisket, mashed potatoes, and sliders. She got a large glass of coke without ice (why water down the sweet drink) and sat down at her usual spot, a booth with a lot of "leg room" (for Jenna, stomach room) that was probably intended for handicapped people.

She bit into her beefy course and rejoiced as the fatty juices rolled onto her tongue. She knew this lunch would be a long one and she dug right in. Yet the first plate did not fill Jenna's cavernous stomach -- on the contrary, it made her more hungry for the heavy comfort foods at the buffet. She rocked herself up and waddled back to the buffet line for more. She didn't notice a dribble of beef juice that left a mark on her blouse. After another plate, she was out of control.

Ribs, fried chicken, meatloaf and fries slid down Jenna's gullet as condiments splattered her shirt and skirt. Jenna entered a haze as she shovelled three, four, five plates into her mouth while only getting up for additional portions. Her heavy, apron-like stomach filled with food and gas as she slammed back coca-cola. The syrupy drink poured down her jowls and double chin, avoiding her dark hair which was tied into a ponytail. Jenna grunted and wheezed as she glutted herself. She lost herself in the sheer quantity of what she was eating.

Waiters and patrons of the establishment stared at the obese businesswoman making a pig of herself in the booth. To be sure, the wait staff had seen Jenna several times now, but was never quite prepared for her indulgent visitations. They stared as her stomach inflated, pushing the limits of her blouse and already-unbuttoned jacket. In their mind's eyes they could see her . Jenna didn't notice, or if she did, she revelled all the more in the attention the wait staff and patrons were giving her. They could see all of her -- her power, her wealth, her sheer size -- on display. They could recognize that Jenna was a woman who was in control -- not only at work, but of the wait staff here and indeed the entire establishment.

Jenna finished her eight plate -- consisting entirely of fried chicken wings -- and swung back her seventh glass of coke. With a loud belch she realized she was finally full. Surveying the damage, Jenna slapped her stuffed stomach (seemingly not noticing the grease and syrup on her shirt) and rubbed it, letting out another burp or two. Realizing she had to get back to work, Jenna rocked her body to build momentum and checked her watch...
133121.title: All Jenna Can Eat

choices: Skip to dinner
One month later...
Jenna has an important appointment
1331211.content:
Jenna rocked her engorged body out of the booth and headed back to the office. To her satisfaction, the handicapped security gate was fixed and she could get back to her office with only a slight brush against the gate on either side. Still, she made a mental note to contact the head of security and the building's landlord. Neither the guard on duty nor any of Jenna's employees dared comment on the stains covering her blouse and jacket.

Checking her schedule, Jenna realized she didn't have to do anything in the afternoon, so she just sat at her desk browsing Facebook. She reached into a drawer and pulled out two "party size" boxes of candy, having quickly forgot her fullness. As the hours wore on until closing time she munched on the candy, finishing the second bag with just five minutes left on the clock. Chocolate joined the shiny layer of grease and condiments on her jowls. If she noticed that these "party size" packages were 1,800 calories each, she didn't care.

Jenna got up from her reinforced chair and headed towards the elevator. "Nice work today, everybody. Be on time tomorrow." She didn't see Courtney roll her eyes at her perpetually-late boss's hypocricy.
1331211.title: A lazy afternoon

choices: Give them hell
Go to the office, she’s late enough (and the other girls have grown too)
13312112.content:
Jenna scratched her belly as she wrestled between staying in bed and working today. Man it had been getting hard to reach her navel as of late.

          The she remembered she completely polished off every food item in her house yesterday night in a particularly large binge. She had planned to treat herself with a large breakfast, considering her regular ones were enough to feeds family of 5 or 6 you can imagine just the obscene size of her binge.

          Regardless, her stomach growled, begging for more. So she hurried to get ready and driving to the nearest buffet. When she entered and payed Jenna heard a few remarks, not all negative mind you, but she didn’t care about that. Jenna wanted to stuff herself and be on time.

          After an hour of intense gorging Jenna shuffled her plump feet to the handicapped security gate. Her thighs hit her adipose apron of a belly on each step.

          Her tummy made contact with the sides to f the gate. Already a tight, she squeezed forward until her hips and love handles finally met the gate, jamming her in place.

“Ugh, just how hard can it be to widen a gate?! I asked them to widen the damn entrance almost a month ago!” Jenna looked around and saw a familiar British guard.

“Are you blind?! Help me through! It’s not my fault this stupid gate can’t handle a real woman.”

His eyes just twitched before he said with a smile “Of course, Ma’am. I’ll be sure to notify my boss so this hopefully won’t happen again.”

Jenna extended her arms forward, her wrists barely ahead of furthest part of her tummy. “Finally you’re learning to treat a lady George. Now, pull me out of this thing!”

          After 10 minutes of struggle Jenna was free, though her blue dress now sorted a few tears on her wide hips and ballooning love handles. Wether she noticed or even cared who knows.

Panting hard the guard said “Bloody hell, sigh. I’ll be sure to talk to my boss. Something like should never happen!”

Jenna panting after putting no effort whatsoever said “My hero. That’s real cute, but you won’t get anywhere, you’re just a guard, George.” She Lagunes and waddled past him.

But before disappearing deeper into the building she said “You’re not wrong though, this should not happen, like ever. I’ll give them hell for this.”

          He half smiled with an eyebrow raised. Not really sure how to feel about the interaction with the whale from the upper floors.
13312112.title: Deja vu

choices: Courtney's morning
Jenna has some trouble around the office
13313.content:
The next day went as usual. The large door had been fixed and Jenna had no trouble getting to her desk. The event was still fresh in everyone’s mind though and it had caused a bit of a stir around the office.

“I mean, how much could she possibly weigh?” Melissa said.

“She is soooo big. She’s got to be like 400 pounds right?” Victoria said. Courtney gave her a look.

“Well I weigh 400 pounds so maybe try again.” Courtney said.

“Wait… so she could be like… 500 pounds?” Christina said in shock. At 140 pounds, 500 was a weight that she couldn’t comprehend.

“Probably.” Alice said. There was a long pause as the girls soaked in the realization. “You know there was a woman that was here a while ago that apparently got to 600.”

“You mean Jessica? Yeah she’s Jenna’s boss now, I think.” Courtney said.

“How did she get so fat? I mean 500 pounds… That’s like… crazy.” Victoria said a little dumbfounded.

“Well apparently she was just a chubby young thing out of college when she started working here.” Courtney said. Everyone was gathered around Courtney desperate to hear the story of Jen’s immense weight gain. “She was as big as you are Vicky.”

“What? No way.” Melissa said.

“Way. You’ve all seen her eat. After ten years her appetite took a toll on her.” Courtney said. Victoria was a little spooked that Jen used to look like her. They might not have known it but all of the girls at the office were destined to reach at least 500 pounds. Jenna was a sign of their future at the office.
13313.title: 500 pounds?

choices: a few months later and Courtney is gaining like crazy
free choice
133131.content:
It wasn’t necessarily a bad sign either. Jenna loved working at the office. She was happier than ever. And so was Courtney. Courtney was probably the only one who knew Jenna’s current state was foreshadowing of what was to come. She had been at the office for the longest besides Jenna. She had seen many coworkers come into the office. Some skinny, some thick, and fat, but after a while they all became blimps. Courtney accepted her fat fate. As long as she kept living the office lifestyle she was fine with being fat.

The only thing she didn’t like about the office lifestyle was going to and from the office. Courtney was not a morning person, nor was she a moving person, so mornings were tough for her.

Courtney woke up and made herself some coffee. She picked out a shirt and pants to wear to work. The shirt sleeves went on easily. Courtney went to button her shirt but realized that her enormous swollen breasts blocked her vision. She went over to the mirror. Courtney looked at her big bloated belly hanging over her panties and crotch. She buttoned her shirt together as she looked in the mirror. Her shirt stretched around the large circumference of her belly rolls. She struggled to pull her pants up. As she tried to grab her pants from the ground her stacks of belly fat blocked her from bending down. She barely managed to snag her pants and pull them up. The further she pulled her pants up the harder it got. Courtney’s thick blubbery thighs had swollen to fill out her pants. As the pants slid over her thighs they struggled to reach past her flabby butt. After a long battle she finally got her pants on. She got her things for work and waddled outside. She dropped her obese body into the front seat. On her drive to work she stopped to get breakfast at McDonalds. She went through the drive through. Courtney rattled off a massive breakfast order. She placed the large pile of food on the passenger seat. As she sat in traffic she shoveled food in her mouth. She gorged on greasy fast food breakfast. As she drove closer to the office she decided to stop for another breakfast. She drove into the Burger King drive thru and got another huge breakfast. She pulled into the office building parking lot. She ate her second breakfast in her car in the parking lot. Courtney filled herself full of fatty breakfast foods. When she finished her morning feast she loosened her belt buckle and took off her seat belt. The overfed porker struggled to lift herself from her seat. Her fat bloated gut sat heavily on her lap. Slowly she jiggled her blubbery body out of her car and onto her feet. She slowly waddled into the building and into the elevator. She breathed heavily as she heaved her bulging fat. Years of sitting at her desk left her with almost zero strength and endurance. She waddled into the office and towards her desk. As she moved her enormous butt bounced and wobbled and her flabby hips gyrated. Finally Courtney made it to her desk. Her heavy frame crashed into her wide desk chair. She breathed a sigh of relief as she rested her 400 pounds in the overtaxed chair.
133131.title: Courtney's morning

choices: She pulls out snacks. "We have some business to work on here."
While she drones on, Jenna starts having second thoughts.
133132.content:
Jenna sat back in her chair, leaning back, resting her hand on her immense, rolling belly. She toyed with a snickers bar she held before her face, and then ripped the black paper from it, devouring it while mimicking Godzilla. "Raaawr!" she spoke before she chomped into the long chocolatey bar, getting chocolate splatter on her cheeks. She giggled, and wiped the chocolate from her cheeks.

The phone beeped in its long tone, and Jessica's voice emitted. "Hey, uh, Jen. Could you come up to my office for a sec?" Jenna picked up, and spoke. "Uh, sure. See ya there, Ma'am." She hung up afterwards, and heaved herself up to the best of her ability, giving out a grunt. She then trudged towards the elevators, and moved to press the up button. And then she saw it.

The note on the elevator read: "Elevator on this floor up is out of service. Please use stairs."

No, no, there was no way, this elevator HAD to work. Did they not understand that the elevators tortured her and her fat and happy employees? She had ran it over and over with the lunkhead maintenance idiots could have POSSIBLY let this elevator fail. She tried to keep pressing the button.

It did not light up, nor did she hear the whirring.

Her overtaxed, atherosclerosis-ridden heart sank like the titanic. This meant one thing: She would have to do -That-. That which she loathed. That which she saw as the enemy. That which she would dare not do voluntarily.

She would have to use the stairs.

She turned to the daunting single flight, and gulped. She had to get up there, because Jessica would never even think to move down. She never moved anymore. She had pretty much literally made her house in the office due to her lethargy, and absolute lack of will to move so much as one hallway.

Jenna began her intrepid trek upwards, her mental emphasis on the size of the stairs overly much making it so that she panted by the fourth step. Her buttoned shirt strained as her gut heaved downwards, and Jenna began leaking sweat at a rapid rate. By the time she'd reached the halfway point, the sweat was falling at a machine gun-like rate from her forehead and hair, leaving almost a full-on trail of sweat behind her as she panted and huffed, and continued her trek up the stairs. She had reached the 3/4ths point, and the sweat began pouring out almost, especially from her chest, soaking her skin-tight buttoned shirt's chest.

She saw the golden end, and surged on towards it, and as she reached it, she fell to her hands and knees, hearing a *RRRRIP* from behind. She had not the energy to get up and continue on, so she simply lay there in a pool of sweat, panting and huffing, and wheezing as though she'd just tried insanity. As she slowly regained her energy, she stood herself up, her entire shirt drowned in sweat, and her forehead beaming with the evidence of her trek upstairs. As she finally entered Jessica's office, she got a good look at her.

The brunette was like a pile of living lard: Her stomach may have been hidden behind the desk, but her breasts were not, large blobs of pure fat jiggling about in her shirt. Her second chin had been fed a good amount of that fat, dangling down and hiding a good three quarters of her neck. Her blubbery, fat face showed inquisitiveness. "Jen, what happened?" Jenna spoke through her pants. "Elevator..*pant*..Out..*pant*...Of..*pant*...Order..*Wheeze*"

Jessica spoke. "Shucks, sorry about that Jen. I'll make sure somebody down in maintenance hears about this." She waved her hand. "But, anyways..."
133132.title: Stairs, Buttons, and Chairs.

choices: Get down to business
Free choice
1331321.content:
“... let me get some the cake.”

Her mighty meaty arms quivered as she struggled to push herself up from the desk.

She waddled over to a mini fridge she had standing on a table in the corner.

She was spectacularly belly-heavy, with a great swollen boulder of a stomach that hung heavily in front of her whenever she walked. Her shirt clung tightly around it, but it rode up allowing her big overfed belly to poke out and bounced with each step.

Her stretch pants were to cutting into the equator of her gut, creating the largest muffin she ever seen. It was packed with her tree trunk sized

She had grown so belly-heavy that she was forced to lean back whenever she walked, creating a very pregnant appearance.

13432.content:
It goes without saying that Jenna's changes to the office were just as much for her sake as it was for the others. But what if her personal interest in said changes ran a little deeper than just wanting convenience and comfort?

For example, what if Jenna is unhappy with how fat she's become? Maybe she tried several times in the past to lose weight, only to fall back on her bad habits every time. Maybe this burned her up inside. And maybe she decided that if she's going to balloon up, so will everyone else.

Then again, it could be the other way around. Jenna's spent quite a few years getting fat at Gordge, after all. Plenty of time for her to discover a love for not just her own fat, but other women's as well. And just like in business, bigger is always better.

Or maybe neither of these things are a factor and you'd rather have a different situation.

her crew—Jenna is gonna be the BEST. BOSS. EVER. to the BIGGEST. STAFF. EVER.
134322.content:
Jenna had worked her way up the ranks of her local branch at Gordge, and at only 32 her hard work and perseverance had been rewarded by being promoted to acting Branch Manager. She'd shaken just the right hands and kissed just the right butts to get this job, but her job titles hadn't been the only thing to change about her over the years.

Everyone who worked at Gordge would get fat at some point. All of Jenna's seniors were chubby, and some of them were much more than that. It was the office lifestyle, she supposed, and the few incentives that the company offered to actually get employees off of their butts and out from behind their desks every once in a while. Plus with all the catered lunches, the easy access to all the local restaurants around them... this particular Gordge branch really lived up to its name. In no time, Jenna was rocking the office bod like the best of them. Muffin top, tight blouses, skirts stretched tight across her thighs. But instead of moaning about it, or trying (usually in vain) to change it, Jenna leaned hard into the lifestyle.

She loved being fat. Watching herself plump up and up, out of skirts, popping out of shirts, all of it correlating to her success in this stupid office. The more time she spent at work, the bigger she seemed to get. By the time her second chin had fully come in, she was out of internship and into a full-time position taking phone calls for Gordge. And that was only the beginning. As Jenna got bigger and bigger, she only felt more powerful in her position—it was a badge of seniority, it made her feel so big and powerful, and most importantly, it was hot.

Around the time she cracked three hundred pounds, Jenna really started to notice just how quickly everyone around her seemed to chub up too. The interns would sport potbellies in no time under her watch, and her work friends would always complain about her being a bad influence. Even as the chairs creaked beneath them and dress code violations went up a good 20% in her department, no one seemed able to shake off those pesky pounds and inches that stuck fast to their waistlines.

And that was when Jenna discovered another important thing about herself—watching other people get fat was even pretty hot.

From that day forward, Jenna was as incorrigible as could be. Just as eager to stuff herself as she was to watch others pork out, Jenna's sexual fascination with fat, the overlap between her sense of size and her sense of power, and the ability to chip away at any poor unsuspecting intern's resolve was just her real, honest to God kink. She loved being the Big Boss. Equal emphasis on both words, naturally.

And now that she was in charge of her entire branch, no one was safe.

Over the years, she'd befriended plenty of girls around the office. She'd worked with most of them at least as their Branch Manager, if not going back even further than that. And she'd been playing the slow, steady game of seeing how round she could help her coworkers get even before her promotion. Now that she was in charge, she'd made sure to make plenty of adjustments to help things along...

Alice waddled out of the break room belly-first, her back arched as her stomach bobbed obediently in front of her. It peeked out from underneath her biggest pink blouse, creamy flesh rippling with her awkward hulking steps. She was one of Jenna's favorite little projects—a former cheerleader, blown up into a regular chair squasher. Nearing four hundred pounds at just twenty-seven, Alice's pretty face was buried underneath so much chub that you would have never believed she'd ever been on Varsity Squad. She pat her doughy gut heartily, a contented smile on her serene face as the events and contents of her second thirty minute break bubbled into a cute little burp.

Melissa, Alice's best friend and fellow bad influence, wobbled out behind her. Even larger than Alice by a good fifty pounds, Melissa was even more belly-heavy than her big blonde friend, with a cute little curly brown hairdo that made her look all that more enormous. A fatty through and through, even before Jenna got ahold of her, Melissa was about as lazy as they came around here. Her biggest concern was always when her next break was and, thanks to Jenna, that was one less thing she had to worry about. Greedy, lazy, and as indulgent as a girl could get, Melissa had literally only gotten hired because of the potential that Jenna saw in having a girl like her around the office and what it could do for "morale".

Victoria and Christina were two works in the making. Twiggy little things that had come fresh off of the recruitment lot. Vicky was this trashy Italian bombshell that Jenna couldn't wait to watch squeeze her way through the doorway and Christina was... okay, she supposed. A bit mousy, not very talkative. She'd worked with plenty of people who quit before they got too big, and something told her that Christina was one of those. Although, she had been wrong before...

Case in point, Courtney. They'd started work around the same time and, ten years in, they'd kept each other's pace. She was the only woman in this whole building who knew how to eat like Jenna could, and it showed. The two of them, together, weighed a collective half ton of woman. It was one of the main reasons Jenna had never fired her—she liked having another big girl around like her. Her hands off approach to dieting even as she reached a quarter ton was... pleasant. Even if it went against company protocol, she and Courtney still remained very close. They were frequent buffet buddies, and Courtney often confided to Jenna about things relating to her size, unaware of just how much Jenna enjoyed these little talks...

Grinding on the vibrating head of her "massage" chair (custom ordered to her specifications, and none the wiser) Jenna took shallow breaths as she watched her gaggle of girthy gals plod around the office. All of these cows had no idea what was in store for them, now that she was in charge. They were all going to get so fat... so fat...

"So... so fat..." Jenna panted, her chins creasing and sweat rolling down her brow, catching in the folds around her neck "Fuck... fucking huge..."

As Jenna gnawed on her bottom lip and her mind grew cloudy with lust, she knew what her first order as the Branch Manager would be. Her eyes narrowed in on...
134322.title: The Office Fatty AU Where Jenna Likes Fat Chicks

choices: A Patrogionnis never quits! Tina already has a few ideas on how to catch up...
“Screw that! Jenna wants Fat Vicki, I’ll give her Fat Vicki!”
1343222.content:
Christina walked down the street in an angry huff. It had happened again! She knew it had.

As she stomped her way along the sidewalk, the cool autumn breeze bit at her bare neck, reminding her that scarf season had hastily returned in the past month or so. But Tina Patrogionnis had a much bigger concern. Much, much bigger.

Jenna's voice spoke as clearly in Tina's mind as it had earlier in the day.

"Oh, Victoria! You haven't finished ALL of the bear claws I gave you already, have you?" Jenna had cooed, not loudly but more than loud enough to make sure at least exactly one other person heard. "It's no wonder, I've always seen so much productivity out of you!"

Christina's brow furrowed as she blanched inwardly. Both being relative newbies, she had always felt a sort of sense of rivalry towards Victoria. Nothing major... it was just, well...

Why was Vicki so <i>good<i/> at her job? The girl was a total ditz, a typical North Jersey Italian airhead who should have only been good at swiping daddy's credit card and whining her way out of responsibilities. But Victoria was an organizational pro. Whether it stemmed from years and years of pouring over shopping catalogues or from being just a little bit one-dimensional herself, or a combination of the two, Victoria left Christina in the dust when it came to quickly sorting through and reorganizing client accounts, finding quicker methods to distribute orders and parcels and had even revamped the entire inventory system. So why the hell was Jenna praising her for bear claws?

"Like yea, they were really good," Victoria had licked her lips before she continued, "but I also reorganized the Stockton portfolio and ordered the Fuentes Files- "

"Oh and you're an angel for those too dear," Jenna cut off quickly. "I'm just shocked you have the time with all the extra minutes you spend snacking in the break room."

Victoria's face had almost turned red, if not for her olive complexion. "Umm, well-" she started, looking off to the side as if avoiding eye contact could help her save face. But Jenna was swift to interject once more.

"So, naturally, I extended your lunch by an extra half hour," she smiled.

Christina had nearly spit out her coffee at this. She was being rewarded for snacking?!? It was bad enough that Tina could hardly keep up with her de facto rival’s efficiency, apparently she couldn’t even keep up with Vicki’s appetite. And it was... oddly apparent which one Jenna prioritized.

Plus, to be honest, with the way Victoria’s thighs had been thickening lately, she really didn’t look like she needed extra lunch. Or the extra platter of assorted pastries Jenna had brought with her and laid so surreptitiously in front of her “hard-working” secretary.

"But what I just don't understand, honey," Jenna continued, Vicki now rapt with attention, "is how you get any eati- I mean, work done in this cramped piece of crap," she wriggled the back of Victoria's office chair as she spoke. "Someone's due for an upgrade."

'Cramped? It's the same size as mine,' Christina thought. 'Vicki's ass is just too big for it.' Indeed, Victoria in the past few weeks had been plumping up more and more below the waist as Jenna continuously showered her with equal parts pastry and praise.

"Something a bit more... stylish, perhaps?" Jenna finished, sidling out from in front of what she had been hiding behind her.

In truth, with how massive their ever-eager boss was, it had been completely eclipsed from Tina's view. The "it" in question was, in fact, a... A. A BRAND. FUCKING. NEW. OFFICE CHAIR!?!?

"Like, ohh shit!" Victoria exclaimed, temporarily forgetting her office etiquette. She let out something between a grunt and a squeal as she lurched out of her current office chair and pushed it out of her cubicle, nearly tipping it over in her excitement.

“We had to make sure the seat was half a foot wider,” Jenna said. It’s a bit spacious, but I’m sure you’ll... ahem, grow into it in no time.” It was hard to miss the literal drool dripping from the corner of Jenna’s mouth as she waddled away, but Vicki seemed far too preoccupied at the moment.

She sat down on her newer, more-comfortable-than-Tina's office chair.

“Oh, no armrests, thank God,” Christina heard Vicki mutter. This was bullshit! Tina worked hard too! “I wonder what I'll do with my extra-long lunch today," Vicki continued, her mind wandering off as she reached for another treat, a Danish this time. What was the point of extending her food breaks if she was just going to snack at her desk all day anyway?!

Yes. It was obvious that Jenna was playing favorites. And that there was one trait in particular that seemed to earn Jenna's favor more than anything else... Of course, Tina knew that she was in absolutely no position to do anything other than either buy into it or let Victoria blow all the way up to Courtney status while she settled for second fiddle, maybe even help plump Vicki up some more out of spite, but, the question was, which?
1343222.title: Mediterranean Beef
