Focus her feeding on Victoria - and make Christina eat MORE competitively.
13432221.content:
The competition was on.

Christina racked her brain as she walked the aisles of her favorite supermarket that weekend - she had eaten with wild abandon at every opportunity - stopping at gas stations for pastries, salty snacks, donuts, and nearly anything she could eat, but Christina had begun to already run out of ideas. Of course, she was enjoying the indulgence, but it was a drastic shift - she was working hard to squeeze in extra calories, but it was feeling somewhat exhausting.

'God, how do they just pilot through the amount of food that they do?' She thought. Courtney and Jenna began to seem like raw eating machines - Christina had always had a slim appetite, preferring to munch away at small amounts of food that were just enough to fill her up, even through the usually fattening days of college. But this was a drastic escalation in eating - one that required more than just hard work to pad her slender frame. A pang of guilt shot through her mind - was this job worth her waistline? She pulled up her phone and did a cursory search - to her dismay, nowhere was hiring at the starting pay that Gordge provided. The only way up was to follow the pack.

Christina paused in a deserted aisle - no raw amount of brute force eating would avail her for long. She had to use her brain to truly increase her gains. That was when she considered what was ahead of her - the dairy section. It was then that she remembered something her clique of skinny friends used to quip about. Portly Sierra Windon from her old high school had gotten drastically fatter towards the end of high school, shooting up from the 190's to the 240's, and it had a lot to do with the diner around the corner. She could always be seen with a chocolate milkshake with her usual order of large fries and a double cheeseburger. This now a tool - a tool that would get her that higher salary at the cost of a few measly pounds.

Christina walked out of that store with a great cart full of chocolate syrup, milk, and chocolate ice cream, not to mention with a metric boatload of cheap fattening frozen pizzas. That was the good thing about getting fatter - it could be cheaper than staying skinny if you played your cards right. And with the idea to fill up on milkshakes, Christina had hit a full house - over the next week, she had easily began noticing her gains, thanks to switching to a higher calorie pastry-based breakfast, the pizza, and especially her secret weapon - a milkshake with dinner and a milkshake for dessert. She felt more stuffed than she ever had before - but the drastic uptick in calories began to show already. Her dress jacket had begun struggling to keep in her expanding waist, breast, and thighs - her gains at least for now had spread out across her body, giving the clear visual sign that she was beginning to gain weight at a rapid rate. Not content with the slight gain that her old plan would have induced, she had gained at least 5 pounds that week - but the watchful eye of Jenna estimated it more at 10 with how drastically Christina Patrogionnis was falling into her trap.

Jenna stroked her thighs at this realization - how stick-thin Christina was beginning to become thicker. The debate now was only a matter of degrees and how best to get more results. She could try to speed along Christina, but that might spread her efforts too thin - Victoria's gains had been admirable, but she required delicate guidance along the path of fatness. The alternative to directly subsidizing Christina's gains, of course, was to foster a desire for MORE gains - to feed the successful source of competition, and to funnel more food down Vicky's throat. This ran the risk of dissuading Christina from trying to fatten herself and going the way Jenna feared she would go - out the door, and on a diet. Jenna's sexual arousal grew as the decision neared, but she eventually had to make her choice.
13432221.title: Christina buys in.

choices: Jenna focuses on keeping BOTH pairs gaining. She invites Alice on a date!
Jenna focuses on fattening Christina and Victoria while Alice attempts to diet.
134322212.content:
Jenna had to cool herself before she climaxed in her office - she still had work to do and it would not do to soak her skirt while there was still a full workday ahead. She would feed Victoria to bursting - and keep Christina close.

Lunch came later that month, and blubbery Alice and Melissa were sitting in the break room, respectively wearing a dark red button-up blouse on top of black work pants and a stretchy blue blouse on top of a white skirt. Melissa was eating a Burger Box from Alvi's Drive-Thru, a sloppy, greasy concoction with a large fry and a pile of meat, bacon, and cheese that might be called a burger if the buns weren't struggling as hard as they were under the fat woman's grip. Melissa looked over at Alice's lunch - around 5 boiled eggs with a ham sandwich. "What's up with the rabbit food, Al?" Alice gulped down half of one of her boiled eggs. "This red blouse is one of my favorites - and you can see it's getting pretty tight. I'm trying to calm it down with all the crazy eating." Melissa chuckled and shook her head. "Crazy is relative - for instance, eating a plain ham sandwich with just ham and lettuce with boiled eggs sounds crazy to me." Alice shook her head. "I've always been pretty crazy - speaking of which, feel like hitting up Blue Door for some drinks tomorrow night?"

Melissa had not gotten a chance to answer before Christina entered the room. She was a little later than normal. "Hey, guys." Melissa turned and spoke. "Hey, Christie. Good timing. Want to hit Blue Door with Al and I on Friday night?" Christina nodded. "Oh, yeah. That sounds like fun." She took a moment to set her things down, grab her food from the fridge - a chocolate shake and a Philly cheesesteak with fries. She sighed deeply. "Yeahh~, Jenna's kept Vicky and I in meetings, and Vicky had to stay longer than me." Alice asked inquisitively, "Any clue why?" Christina sneered and spoke. "Well, the freshly delivered pizza and cannolis might have had something to do with it. I think she's taking Vicky under her wing." Melissa hummed. "Well, lucky Vick. Not so lucky for her pants size." Christina shrugged. "Maybe she is getting bigger - but at least she's doing it and getting paid more for it. She's been driving that big new station wagon around, and it shines like a diamond." She tensely ate a few piecs of her sandwich and a fistful of fries and rested her head in her hands while Alice spoke. "Yeah, around here, Christie, weight generally means higher status. Might suck to have to buy new pairs of pants around here, but the weight comes with pay bonuses with all the time you spend both eating and working." Christina rubbed her temple and spoke. "I get that, but I've been trying to keep up with all of it, but I have barely even been recognized by Jen. Like, I can eat for my paycheck, but I want to actually see a reward for it." She brought her head around to look at Alice, her face filled with annoyance. "If I just eat like a hog and get no recognition in return, I'm just going to wind up with bigger pants and not enough money to buy more."

After this, coincidentally, Victoria walked past the break room, patting her ever-more taut gut. It was clear that Jenna's efforts were proving fruitful - she had easily gained twenty pounds! The gains in such a short time were staggering - Victoria's walk was becoming more of a waddle than it already was, and her hips which had previously passed for merely plump were being pumped fatter with what seemed like each 'meeting' that Jenna had brought her into. The italian bombshell was beginning to be lit, and with some more prodding, she might explode. Christina grumbled after she had passed. She had still not found anything to match Gordge's starting pay and still stuck to her fattening diet, but she was starting to question the wisdom of fattening herself like a prize hog for no reward.

However, it did not go unnoticed. Quietly after lunch had wrapped up and Christina went back to her office with a mug of coffee, Alice whispered to Melissa, "Tina's starting to look like a gordge girl - I can tell her 'diet' is starting to pay off." Melissa nodded in agreement.

And Jenna was also starting to notice - before, she had barely felt anything sexually for Christina as she was - she only felt aroused by the potential of a fatter Christina. She was getting somewhat chubby now - but this was just the beginning of the road. But Jenna was also beginning to notice Alice's efforts to slow or, most tragically, reverse her gains. It was like watching two rabbits run towards a fork in the road, and Jenna had to think and think hard if she wanted to try to keep both gaining. But that would require dancing a delicate line between continuing to fatten both Christina and Victoria while additionally prodding Alice to see if Alice was amenable to female love, as dating often comes with frequent food dates - and even if Alice didn't appreciate the romance, she would appreciate the food. Alternatively, Alice was still considerably large - Christina and Victoria had a long way to go. She could let Alice burn a little fat if she was even aiming to or capable of doing that while focusing on giving Christina and Victoria more mass.
134322212.title: Fattening Rivalries

choices: "Want me to walk you to your car?"—Jenna breaks company policy & makes her move
"We should do this more often."—Jenna keeps it clean for now
1343222121.content:
“Thanks again for inviting me out tonight, Jenna.”

Jenna clutched her enormous fleshy thighs together, squirming beneath all of her extra weight as her coworker flashed that pretty white smile of hers. She’d been watching Alice plump up and up and up from afar for years, but sitting this close to her really gave her an excuse to try and find the former cheerleader buried underneath all that blubber.

“Don’t think anything of it.” Jenna said in a breathy voice, downing another glass of water to help her cool down, “I’m just so happy you decided to come.”

Alice had come to the office all prettied up for the evening. What that meant, Jenna had no idea. She’d asked her longtime coworker if she wanted to get a drink on Monday, so she’d had all week to prepare. Jenna had been eating herself sick with anticipation of how tonight could go—moreso than usual anyway. Seeing Alice like this, in her prettiest blue blouse (a semi-transparent fabric with solid flowers dotting across her avalanche of a body) and squeezed into what had to have been new khakis (Jenna kept a close watch on whenever her herd of heifers needed some new sizes!), Jenna was having a hard time keeping herself under control.

“Well I’m sorry I was late…” Alice ran her big blue eyes, deftly across her billowing belly as it rolled onto the table before reaching for the menu, “I had some… car trouble.”

Alice’s “car trouble” had been well documented in her employee file. Everyone had seen her waddle out to the parking lot and have to wriggle her way into the car seat—she wasn’t fooling anyone by giving it a nonindicative name. Alice was getting to big for her CRV, almost as fast as Melissa or Courtney before her.

“It’s okay, I already ordered for us.” Jenna said with a smile, taking the menu from her coworker

“I can see.” Alice laughed politely—what a spread she’d been welcomed to!

It was something of an office tradition to begin every venture to the Blue Door with boneless wings. If Alice had to guess, at least twenty of her extra pounds were just her retaining batter and sauces. Jenna must have heard about it from Courtney and Melissa because there were so many of them—four plates of sampler platters!

Despite her vow to be good and to not embarrass herself in front of her boss, her mouth couldn’t help but water…

“So you like wings, huh?” she asked, plump lips moist with desire, “Did you already order the drinks?”

“Well, I mean, this is just the appetizer.” Jenna purred, her lips all the same, “After all, us gals have a certain standard of figure to keep up.”

“Oh Jenna, I don’t know—”

“Aht!” Jenna corrected with one extended, sausage-thick finger, “Not another word. Just enjoy yourself.”

To punctuate her point, Jenna plucked a particularly juicy wing from the centermost pile and popped it into her mouth. She let out a low “mmmm” as the sweety-sour sauce tickled her tongue.

“Well…” Alice gulped, trying hard not to think about having to replace another set of khakis, “If you say so. You are my boss…”

“None of that tonight.” Jenna corrected again, with a little orange splash on her lips, “Just us girls tonight—deal?”

Alice smiled.

“Deal.” She agreed readily

“Good—now hurry up. The entrees should be coming out any minute…”

***


What set Alice apart, at least to Jenna’s well-trained eyes, was that she tried to pretend that this wasn’t who she was.

Sure, way back when, Alice used to be a cheerleader or whatever. She wasn’t like Courtney, who’d always been a little porky, or Mel who was just an unabashed pig. But Jenna had seen it come out enough to know that this was who Alice was meant to be—a great big fat girl, just like the rest of them. Maybe more than the rest of them.

Two women of such substantial size could easily have cleared their table of wings. And given their proclivity towards packing away all things tasty, the regulars didn’t raise an eyebrow at Jenna and Alice having put away five plates of wings between them. They were big women, and the folks from Gordge were some of their best customers. This was more or less pretty normal for them.

But if she hadn’t been a few drinks in, Alice would have paled at the thought of Jenna doubling their entrée order. And on a whim! She just took the waitress aside, slipped her a twenty as a tip, and told her to bring out two more of everything! Full up on chicken and fruity cocktails, Alice’s turgid tummy was already a little stuffed.

But as Jenna so readily insisted, it was a special occasion—how often did she get to go out with her boss? And how often was it free?

“Ohhhh… I couldn’t…” Alice hiccuped, her large body convulsing in a wobbling ripple, “I’ve been so good lately…”

“Boo—come on, it’ll be our little secret.” Jenna, emboldened by her many (many) drinks, gave a saucy little wink, “I won’t tell anyone.”

“O-kay…” Alice lamented, letting out a stream of air from the tight little “o” of her mouth, “Lemme just…”

And in a move right out of Jenna’s wet dreams, Alice fumbled with the clasp on her bottoms. Lifting up her heavy top tier of her belly, the beluga blonde unfastened her khakis and lowered the zipper. She seemed to expand right before Jenna’s hoggish eyes—impressive dollop of milky white mass surging forward and claiming that much more of the booth.

It even rolled onto the table a little bit!

“That’s better.” Alice said with a drunk little giggle, patting her tummy appreciatively, “I guess it’s not a night at the Blue Door until I have to make some room!”

Warm sticky cum trickled into Jenna’s panties. She’d never seen this side of Alice before, but God she loved to see her let her hair down. Or her belly out, as it were. As she lusted over her coworker letting loose, blushing from her perpetually rosy apples all the way down to her swaddling chipmunk cheeks, Jenna clutched at a handful of her own belly blubber out of instinct. Pinching herself, hard she struggled to keep herself in control.

“You do this a lot?” Jenna pried, her face red hot with lust (luckily, it just looked like she was feeling her liquor a little hard)

“Oh, yeah, me and Courtney and Melissa come here all the time.” Alice was oblivious to the tension that Jenna was feeling, far far more preoccupied with whatever was placed in front of her, “I swear, sometimes I think those two are trying to fatten me up.”

“Oh?” Jenna asked weakly, feeling like a dam for an ocean as she ate feverishly to help satisfy her lust, “Y-You think they’d do that?”

“No, no, it’s just a joke. “Alice tittered pleasantly, her belly bouncing with laughter as she took a big girl bite into another burger, “They just like to tease me about how big I’ve gotten lately.”

Talk about a tease—Alice used her free hand to poke one chubby finger deep into her fluffy side rolls. Jenna’s eyes nearly popped out of her head. Munch, chew, crunch. It was all she could do not to cum right then and there!

“Ugh, I need to diet but…” Alice gave a silly, tipsy, longing sigh to her burger before taking a bite, “Well, you know how hard it is to control yourself in the office.”

“I do.” Jenna burped, “Temptation is everywhere.”

As the night rolled on and the table was steadily cleared, a herculean effort managed by the wait staff and the weighty walruses rolled up to the booth, both women ate themselves to increasing roundness. Alice out of unleashed gluttony, and Jenna in an attempt to satisfy the “fat” and “sex” wires that had been crossed long ago in her calorie-crusted brain. Watching Alice pig out—really pig out, had been a work of art. One that had left the big blonde beached in the booth!

“I’m… stuffed…” Alice whined, “I—URP—overdid it…”

Jenna did her best to hide the arousal and excitement in her eyes, the manic twinkle that looked every inch of poor Alice up and down. Stuffed to the gills, her belly round and plopped up on the table in front of her, the prim and proper former cheerleader looked like every inch the greedy glutton that Jenna liked to imagine her to be in her wildest, wettest fantasies.

Jenna had only ever gotten a glimpse of Alice’s carnal side once or twice in the office. Watching her pig out on donuts in the break room, or scarf down some tasty snacks. Then there were the office lunches, but she’d never gone all out like she had tonight. Not like this. Alice had been hiding a monster appetite underneath all that blonde hair, big eyes, and naif façade.

Tonight confirmed that Alice was every inch the hog that her coworkers were… maybe even more of one.

And now that she’d seen it, Jenna needed more…
1343222121.title: Dinner With the Boss

choices: "Okay... what was... that?" Alice is not down for the large lady lovin'

13432221211.content:
Seeing the two of them toddling out into the parking lot was quite a sight.

Bellies bulging, hanging low as their thick legs kicked to the side in an attempt to shuffle their sloggy girths across the pavement. Their arms swinging from side to side in hopes of maintaining a pathetic momentum. Poor Alice was so out of shape and she’d managed to go toe to toe with her boss—her gut domed outwards as she arched her back, her food baby waddle augmenting her already awkward gait.

“Thanks for walking me to my car, Jenna.” Alice puffed, “I feel like a pig.”

“You kind of look like one too.”

“Stoooop…”

Her breathing shallow, Alice ran a hand up the surface of her stomach. Pink and swollen, unfurled by her khakis and barely restrained by her blouse, Alice looked miserable. She winced at the touch and let out a burp.

“I know we’re all kind of ‘fat friendly’ but I really don’t want to have to buy another wardrobe before the year’s out.” Alice frowned tightly, “And if Melissa doesn’t stop calling me Jenna Junior… oh…”

“I’m going to pretend I didn’t hear that one.”

She had to. The thought of Alice with an extra hundred pounds on her drove her wild. Alice at her size was the tip of the iceberg! Hidden behind the veneer of a boss trying to fit in with her coworker, Jenna was steaming, just begging for release. She’d had an entire dinner’s worth of foreplay, and she needed to get some satisfaction!

“Here’s me.” Alice puffed, “Lemme just… oh…”

Kicking one pillar of pillowy pudge up as high as she could get it to go, Alice struggled against the weight of her full belly as she tried to sit in her car. The sizable vehicle noticeably groaned with the added strain of almost a quarter ton of woman, plus everything she’d eaten for dinner. It dipped to one side dangerously low—Jenna grabbed her by the hand in hopes of steadying her and the car a little easier.

“Thanks.” She gasped, “Now… lemme… oof…”

No matter how she struggled, Alice’s belly touched the steering wheel. She was due for a new car literally any day now. Seeing that Cheshire smile of pale belly blubber eek out from underneath her blouse to tickle her steering wheel…

“Jenna?” Alice asked, breaking her boss’s concentration, “I need… a favor.”

“Hm?” Jenna had bitten her bottom lip to the point of blood, “What’s that?”

“Can you…squish my belly in?” Alice was bright pink, “Just a little, so that it’s under the steering wheel?”

Jenna felt her panties dampen as she processed the request. Her hands were on Alice’s stomach. Feeling actual, factual flab. It was warm and soft, the heat from Alice’s big body and her dinner ran up Jenna’s hand and sent goosebumps climbing up her gigantic arm.

“Ooh… that feels… kinda nice.” Alice mumbled as Jenna wrestled her belly blubber, “Ooh… God… I had too much to drink”

A low moan escaped the still tispy office whale as Jenna’s hand ran up and down the surface of her stomach. It had been packed tight behind the wheel—Jenna doubted that it would be going anywhere. As she traced the soft pink stretch marks that had faded into her ivory immensity, Jenna ran a hand up Alice’s lovehandle—she winced

“Cold!” she squeaked, “J-Jenna, what are you—”

Jenna shushed her coworker with a kiss—holding Alice’s limp heavy body with one arm while she pressed their lips together, keeping pace with her free hand as she fondled all of Alice’s exposed belly flesh.

As they parted, a moment of silence stood between them before Alice finally said…
13432221211.title: Jenna and Alice, Sitting in a Lot...

With a hot new affair to keep her busy, Jennas attention turns squarely to Alice
Free Choice
134322212112.content:
Alice had never kissed a girl before—outside of a drunken night back in high school after the varsity game.

But back then, it didn’t feel very real. Like, it was just something that people did. Now that she was almost in her thirties, having had her fair share (okay, less than her fair share) of sexual experiences, Alice liked to think that she knew what those big girl, grown up feelings were.

But even drunk, she did not know that she’d ever have been okay with her boss Jenna making out with her in the parking lot.

“Don’t…” she found herself saying, grabbing at Jenna’s hand, “Don’t stop…”

She pulled Jenna’s enormousness by the wrist back into the driver seat of the car. Her hand gripped firmly around her monster-sized spare tire as their lips locked again. Sensual moans filled the car as questionable feelings rose from deep within the enormousness that was Alice Gellar.

“You want to stay here for a while?” Jenna asked breathlessly between kisses, “Maybe have a private meeting?”

“Oh god yes.” The undersexed marshmallow whimpered, “Fuck yes.”

She wasn’t quite sure what it was—there were so many factors that, whether she liked to admit it or not, Alice was aroused by that night. There was the alcohol, for starters. She hadn’t gotten that drunk in a while. Then there was all of the food… Alice would be lying if she said that food wasn’t an aphrodisiac. Eating was the closest thing she’d had to a relationship since she’d started working at Gordge. And then there was her own questionable feelings about her size. Feeling Jenna’s weight against hers, playing with her stomach should have grossed her out but…

Well, things got pretty hot and heavy that night.

Emphasis on the heavy.

And with Jenna, the answer was always immediate gratification.

And while Jenna would, at times, be haunted by the whale that could have been, she had to tell herself that it was ultimately for the best.

After all—that meant that there was that much more room for her staff to grow into, given the opportunity.

“Yeah, Alice.” Melissa snorted, cheeks dimpling as she nudged her friend in one of her meaty side rolls as she munched on the last donut, “Who does that?”

The blimping blonde could only giggling vapidly in response to the gentle ribbing that her friend had given her. Being that a similar ritual happened after hours (and sometimes on the clock) with her boss and secret paramour, Jenna, Alice was beginning to have difficulty uncrossing the wires between teasing and teasing…

13432221211221111.content:
In order to keep everyone happy, both officially and off the books, Jenna had pulled a couple of strings to get Maria hired on full-time, rather than as an intern.

She had made the (compelling) argument to her superiors that it was the purgatorial status of “intern” that had helped chase away their last prospective hire, Christina. As the fiscal year had just begun, risky financial maneuvers were on the table, as well as the need to start this year off right. Being down one woman and potentially passing on another who had promising numbers from a similar field in another company would have been shooting her office in the foot—that is, if any one of her girls could get a good enough angle to hold the gun. Maria was officially given the same title as everyone else, but Jenna had her working in a conjoined cubicle with her superior chair-squasher, Alice Gellar.

Ostensibly, it was so that the more experienced employee could run Maria through the ropes. Jenna might have had her skip the intern stage, but Maria still needed to know how to do her job, after all.

But in practice, the “temporary” arrangement would last as long as possible. Maria wasn’t being trained to do Christina’s job; she was being trained to do Christina and Alice’s job.

Well, not entirely. The fact of the matter was that Alice’s workload would be systematically divvied out across the office in small amounts. Enough that it wasn’t really noticeable. But if someone did complain, Jenna had her “training duty” excuse ready at the hip.

They’d get used to the extra workload in no time. It was just a couple of extra keystrokes. More rippling movements to jiggle through their flabby arms. A little longer with their bellies pressed up against the keyboard. They would hardly notice, if given the right incentive to stay put at their workspaces.

After all—Alice had more important things to do.

“Oh wow Alice—issat all fer me?”

Alice’s head piqued up at her name, ripping her from the insipid desire to stuff herself walking down the aisleway. Her cheeks bounced softly as she came to a standstill, hugging her haul close in both hands and smushing various crinkling packages into her sizable chest. She held her food close, feeling her heart skip a beat.

“Oh no, no no.” Alice laughed a little, husky and out of breath from her walk to the vending machine, “These, um… this is just a little snack.”

“Little, huh?” Maria snorted, “That looks more like lunch ta me!”

“Um… if you want, I can go get you something?” Alice’s porky fingers were already tearing at the end of the clear plastic packaging, her face folding at the chins as she hunkered over her swollen chest “Mrmphm… you know… in a minute.”

“Nah, I’m tryin’ ta cut back.” Maria pat her plump belly derisively, “I’m really startin’ t’pack it on, y’know?”

“I do…” Alice ran her hand up the side of her stomach, sneaking a sly little squeeze of her fleshy white flank as it poured out from underneath her blouse, “I’m getting so fat lately…”

The word sounded differently now. Ever since she and Jenna had become… whatever they were, Alice felt the word “fat” for long moments after it left her lips. The hiss of the ‘f’, the click of the ‘t’, and the weight that hung from her waist. The width of her hips and the heaviness of her full stomach as Jenna went down, down, down…

“Yeah, well, all them snacks might have somethin’ t’do with it.” Maria snorted, “Ugh, I wish I looked as good as you do. You look so good for a woman ‘a’ your size.”

“Oh Maria…” Alice purred, a dreamy expression locked on her face as she came to rest one hand on her robbable, traceable stomach, “I think you’re gonna fit in just fine around here…”

***


Date nights between the two of them had to be done in secrecy. Jenna and Alice’s relationship was directly against the Gordge code of conduct—and even if it wasn’t, it had nepotism written all over it. Jenna hires a new employee, sticks her under Alice, and lets her new office squeeze toy get away with doing jack shit all day while the newbie pulls her (ample) weight throughout the day? That was an open and shut case, for sure.

Luckily, Jenna’s UberEats guy could keep a secret—it just so happened that he was Alice’s too.

“You’re getting so fucking fat.” Jenna said breathlessly as she floundered on top of her lover’s stomach, “Do you do anything all day but eat?”

The two of them were far too out of shape to pleasure each other with the vigor that they would have liked. Jenna’s passion was outweighed by her need to constantly take a break. But what she could do was talk. Jenna loved to talk. Almost as much as she loved to play with the supple, swollen shape of her secret chair squashing couch potato.

“N-No, I don’t…” Alice gasped, her blue eyes rolled into the back of her pretty blonde head as she clung to either side of her belly, “I just sit and eat all day.”

“It shows~” Alice’s boss grunted, her pathetic muscles flexing as she hefted up the upper tier of Alice’s stomach, “Look at this gut!”

“I know-w-w…” Alice shuddered, struggling to touch herself, “I’m getting so fat for you.”

“Not fucking fast enough.” Jenna got her second wind, using it to heft herself on top of Alice’s leg and grind deep into the dimpled dough of her mile-wide thigh, “I want you bigger—I want you fatter.”

“I… I…” Alice mewled, shuddering as Jenna’s chubby but surprisingly deft fingers slid between her lips, “N-nuhhh…”

The feeling of Jenna’s weight crushing Alice’s own—their stomachs stuffed heavy beyond all measure. Alice alone had eaten more tonight than she had in the whole day of sitting back and letting Maria do all of her work. Her fat belly was round and taut, pink with pain and pleasure as Jenna steadied her massive self with one hand pressing deep into Alice’s sandbag stomach.

“You’re gonna be popping out of my hand-me-downs before you know it, chubs.” Jenna’s authoritative, commanding voice echoed in Alice’s mind, “We’re gonna make you the fattest girl in the office.”

“B-Buh…” Alice protested weakly behind glazed eyes, her rational side succumbing to the intense pleasure that was the fantasy that Jenna painted for her, “Uh… I… I…”

On some level, Alice knew that it wasn’t a practical fantasy. Jenna was spoiling her rotten, feeding her enough every time they went out that she felt like she was going to pop. And on top of that, now she was doing nothing at work but stuffing her fat face.

But on another… it felt so good to let go. To eat as much as she wanted. To have someone want her for the big, fat pig that she’d become. That (maybe) she’d always been.

Alice was so confused as to what she really wanted—but became less so with every one of her date nights with Jenna.

A near half-ton of woman wobbling on top would send Jenna’s reinforced bed shaking worryingly as the legs began to bend that night. Jenna had gotten it initially with the intention of, perhaps, breaking it beneath her own bulk.

And at any other point, to anyone else, this would trigger an imminent desire to lose weight. But to Alice, this was heaven on earth - she loved the feeling of becoming fatter, and it was truly becoming a passion for her. At night, sometimes, Jenna would stroke Alice's mammoth gut, rubbing it and massaging it. "God, it's so huge... It's gonna be bigger than mine soon..." It was becoming increasingly clear to everyone in the office—even the new addition, Maria—that Alice was getting too big.

In a normal place of work, this might have been some cause for concern. After all, these women spend so many hours a day together—they liked to think of themselves as friends! Even if they could be a bit underhanded, sneaky, or downright hypocritical when it came to the open discussion of other people’s weight. Alice’s quick ascension up the weight class, zooming past “Mel” and right into “Jenna” territory, would have raised plenty of eyebrows and perhaps called for an intervention. A call to action, or at least a Come-to-Jesus with their worryingly widening coworker.

But in a place like Gordge—where it was every woman for herself, at least in a dietary sense—Alice’s incredible size soon became just another topic to talk about at the water cooler. Or rather, in their particular case, in the break room, over donuts. After all, a second spared to judge someone else was a second spent ignoring their own rapidly widening waistlines.

There were talks about her being put on work-at-home leave—disability, in layman’s terms. She was simply too fat to work. Even Jenna, their boss, could get around without the amount of trouble that Alice did. Her pretty face and features buried underneath hundreds of pounds of excess fat, she was hardly as used to being the size of a small elephant than the small elephant would be at her job!

But until then, she would still be at work (doing whatever work she did, anyway) and she had become increasingly hot towards being the hot topic.

“I’m really starting to worry about you, girl.” Melissa frowned as she watched Alice’s stomach sag towards the floor, “I know we all like to take it easy on the dieting but… have you seen yourself?”

Alice could only pant in response. Jenna’s fat talk had helped condition her to the acceptance of her size. She liked it when other people talked about how fat she was getting. She loved it. Even if she didn’t fully understand why. She was hooked on the sensation of being Jenna’s fat, greedy piglet. She felt a familiar spasm deep, deep beneath her incredible thighs as Mel talked to her plainly about her weight.

“I know… I’m such a whale.” She used one hand—buried beneath the desk—to jiggle her triply-rolled stomach as deftly as she could, “I… I’ve really let myself go…”

“I’m just saying Al—I like to have fun as much as the next girl, but…” Melissa grimaced, “How long until you can even fit through the doors, you know?”

Alice nearly fucking came right then and there. Jenna had often teased her with the idea of getting rounder than she was tall—getting so big around the belly that she no longer fit through the front doors of the Gordge office. She welcomed it. She craved it. She was logically quivering in her boots about it, but the rampant id that had taken control of her subconscious told her that she needed more, more stimulation!

“You think I’ll really get that fat?” she whispered in a husky voice, “Y’think I’ll… I’ll…”

Alice didn’t hear whatever she said—or what Melissa said, for that matter—as she did her best to orgasm in as total a silence as she could manage.

“Oh God, Melissa would make such a great little cow.”

Jenna had brought up the topic while hand feeding Alice crème filled donuts. The interruption of her motion—rather, the inclusion of Mel in their little fantasy—made Alice snort and spit wildly in disbelief. The smaller woman—though only marginally—could only smile as she watched the downright immobile blob that was her former cheerleader sexpot wriggle and write in jealousy and anger.

“You think so?” she asked, her tone a bit more worried than she would have liked, “Because, umm… I… ufff… I ….”

God, she was too fat to form a coherent thought. Alice had been spoiled endlessly by Jenna’s tutelage, bringing her deeper and deeper into the fold of immediate gratification that she’d always wanted. Alice was a greedy girl at heart, extending to both food and sexual desires. It was what had gotten her where she was before Jenna had taken her under her wing, feeding her until she was too fat to buckle her car-seat, until she was so big she could barely waddle around the office anymore. Hearing Jenna even mention that Mel might be able to muscle in on her territory made Alice uncomfortable. And hungry.

“Don’t worry, baby—you’ll always be my prize piglet.” Jenna cooed as Alice mooed in distress, “It’s just… don’t you think it’d be a little fun to watch Mel get supersized?”

Alice’s fat-clogged gears turned slowly. Mel was already super-sized. In fact, she’d stayed at (more or less) the same weight that she’d been since Alice’s gain had really started to take hold. In her eyes, more Melissa might have meant less attention for her—and she so loved finally feeling satisfied after years of abstinence. Years of eating her feelings. Now that she could eat and cum to her heart’s content, sinking deeper into desires that she’d never known she’d had, she felt a little… threatened.

“You’ll always be the biggest girl in the office.” Jenna purred, stroking Alice’s stomach as it domed high, high, above her head, “At least if I have anything to say about it.”

“Not as big as me.” Alice made her belly dance slowly, heavily between her hands. Hundreds of pounds of subcutaneous fat jiggled and swayed with Alice’s belabored motions, bounding and bouncing up and down in a slow hypnotic routine.

“yeah.” Alice bucked at the thought of Jenna and her compared to those twigs, “I’d like that…”

They all looked forward to it every year, they never missed it!

So when Alice said that she was going to skip it, everyone was more than a little worried.

Not that skipping a meal wouldn’t have done that woman some good.

“I know, I can’t believe it!” Melissa said in a hushed voice, “Did you know this?”

“Look at my face—tell me I knew this.” Courtney said in a shocked voice, “I mean Alice is… Alice! I have a hard time believing she even has sexual thoughts… you know, that aren’t about food.”

The logistics just weren’t there. Everyone knew Alice’s business—not because Alice was a particurly open book (which she was, but not by her own merit) but because everyone loved to shove their noses into her business. If Courtney didn’t know… then nobody knew.

“Is that why she’s been getting so…” Courtney grimaced, “Fat lately?”

“I mean, comfort weight is a thing…” Melissa shrugged her meaty shoulders

“Yeah, but Mel, Alice is…” Courtney took a long sigh—she was getting to be mighty huge these days too, and it felt pretty shitty to talk about Alice like this—“…I mean, she can barely get out of her car anymore, Mel.”

“Maybe she’s dating someone who’s… into that?” Mel suggested, “You remember when she was dating Dan, she started getting into sports?”

“And John, the pastry chef.” Courtney counted on her stumpy sausage finger, “That’s when she started to pack it on in the first place.”

Alice’s naif, love-hungry attitude towards relationships had always spelled out disaster. It was one of the main reasons she could never keep down a relationship! The poor thing had no willpower either, and she was so easily impressionable. If she really liked someone, well… her friends had been her biggest encouragers and bad influences way back when, and helped “pork up the new girl” until she was a good ol’ Gordge girl at heart.

Melissa and Courtney couldn’t convince themselves otherwise that Alice had gone and gotten so fat for a new boyfriend—who could make her feel wanted in an entirely new and visceral way.

***


“You’re gonna call in sick.” Jenna panted hoarsely as she came up for air, “You’re not gonna come back to work after lunch.”

Alice moaned in response as the vibrator went to town on her fat clit. Jenna kneaded and squeezed her biscuit dough body between plump nubby fingers, squeezing a finger in the space leftover in the nape of Alice’s lips left under their special wand. She kissed her girlfriend’s inner thigh, running her fat little potato feet up and down Alice’s wobbling leg.

Alice’s apartment had been trashed in the span of their lunch together—even after Jenna had started paying for a maid to help Alice out around the house, all it would take was one food and sex fueled frenzy to get her bedroom wrecked again. Fast food containers and jugs and bottles and wrappers and what have you were strewn about the room carelessly; their contents split (about 30:70) between the two of them.

Alice struggled to breathe—her throaty whale song was her bellowing in pain and pleasure as her stomach threatened to burst underneath the pressure that Jenna had loaded into it over the past three consecutive nights. Even Alice’s digestive system couldn’t keep up.

“Fuckfuckfuckokayokay” Alice panted, her face squinched tight as she felt another orgasm coming, “Sofuckingfullbaby”

“You’re so fucking full.” Jenna marveled at Alice’s mountainous middle

“I’m so full.” Alice parroted with a manic enthusiasm, wheezing, “So fat.”

“You’re sooo fat.” Jenna purred as she ran a hand up Alice’s taut stomach as its doming shape collapsed under the heavy weight of its surrounding fat, “And after your little half day you’re gonna eat all weekend.”

“All weekend.” Alice panted, “Just eat and eat and eat.”

“Who’s my fatty?”

“I-I-I’m your f-f-fatty~” Alice bit her fat pink tongue as lolled out during a particularly big bucking orgasm. Her beady blue eyes rolling into the back of her head as she climaxed, her whole body shivering and quivering in bovine bliss.

Jenna pushed her crotch against one of Alice’s saddlebag thigh rolls, leaving it slick. She bit into one of Alice’s saucer nipples and watched her the fattest woman in her office squirm underneath her own weight as it pinned her down to the bed.

In a perfect world, they’d all be like this—Melissa, Courtney, Vicky, the lot of them.

So eager and willing to fatten themselves up. So eager to be touched.

Jenna had spend plenty of nights thinking about the possibilities. Not necessarily an “instead of Alice” situation, but the What If’s and the “toos” tantalized her endlessly. On nights when she couldn’t sleep, her own wand and these particular thoughts would put her right to bed.

Perhaps—the ever-powerful id that ruled her mind whispered—these fantasies wouldn’t be so idle, after a little while…

The tan woman took out a notebook and read out loud. "So, she's put on like 100 pounds over this past year, and before this, she put on, like, 150 over the past 5-7." Melissa nodded. Can also be associated with a desire to see said partner gain weight. More extreme forms take the form of desiring the partner to become immobile, or suffer health problems as a result of their obesity." Victoria's mouth gaped open. "Oh my gawwwwwd! That sounds awful!" Stephanie panted, stepping off her elliptical. Her black laborador padded into the room and the blonde-haired, thin sister of Alice scratched behind its ears. "Aww, yess, mama just got done working out." And such exercise was a necessity - if the fate of her sister was to be avoided. Alice had become a whispering-stock back home, and the talk of gossip among the circle of women who chose to stay in her hometown of Ginswood. The high school cheerleader blown up far past a slight padding that age often brought them into the realm of morbid obesity. "I knew that she was gonna blow up like a house as soon as she was off the squad," Steph had said to an old classmate who she still hung with, "She'd eat for supper on the weekend two whole calzones, while the rest of us would share off of one pizza." She suddenly got another call - Melissa, her phone told her. Oh, that fat sow friend of Alice's, she thought. She picked up the phone and put on her fake, friendly face. "Heyyy, Melissa, is it?" Melissa nodded and spoke up, "Uh, yeah. Hi, How are you doing?" Stephanie spoke, "Oh, good, just got off the elliptical. How about you?" Melissa chuckled, "Uh, not on an elliptical." Stephanie chuckled and spoke, "Oh, yeah, yeah. You really should try it - it makes you so happy, and healthy-" She went on, but Melissa pulled on a cigarette. She hated that she had to do this, but it was a step closer to getting her friend back. Eventually, Stephanie got back around to a topic she cared about - "I don't know if Alice and her new girlfriend have even SEEN an elliptical." It was such a shocker that Melissa almost dropped the cigarette out of her mouth. Melissa spoke up, "Yeah - has she told you who it is?" Stephanie shook her head and spoke through the phone, "Uh-uh - not a piece. Whoever it is, they must be some degenerate. Making a woman fatten up like that, they must be some freak. It's unnatural, I've seen the facebook pictures that your company has tagged her in, and my GAWD, she's blowing up into a blimp! She must be eating everything in sight, I'd hate to have my lunch in that fridge of yours!" Melissa took another pull on the cigarette, making it glow in the darkness and exhaling the smoke through her lips. As much as she wanted to, she tried not to hang up - Stephanie might let something slip.

Part of Melissa felt at home with this kind of toxic gossip - it is that dark part of a person that revels in something so perverse as ripping someone apart without the danger of confrontation that rests even within the saints of the world. She couldn't help but build a rapport. "Yeah, you must know I'm a big woman myself, and seeing how bloated Alice has been getting recently, it's got ME cutting back - as much as I really can in this office, anyways." Stephanie hurmed, then spoke, "Yeahh, the last time I saw her, she was pretty big, but I don't know if she'll bother to come home for thanksgiving this year - she'll probably have another meeting buffet that she tells me about. That's a bad influence, that is - uncontrolled eating, whenever you want - it's not good for you." Melissa started to take another pull, but then she realized. The meeting had always had a LOT of snacks, sure, but NEVER a buffet. "Huh - a buffet, you say? Must be some meeting, they usually just offer a few snacks at our meetings." Stephanie retorted, "Oh, Alice has told me that she blames "Those dang mandatory meetings and the catered buffets." So what, only she gets them?" Melissa shrugged. "Uh, must be - hey, I've got to go, I've got to get home - I've got friends waiting for me there." Click, the phone call ended.

What the hell? So that makes a lot more sense - not only was someone in the higher command responsible for this, but they were able to fatten Alice specifically at work! It made so much sense now - the only issue was finding out who was scheduling these meetings. The girls would bounce back and forth sometimes - interdepartmental meetings, talking to region managers, holding their own meetings - she had to find an accomplice where it counted.

134322212112211111121121.content:
As Maria sat eating her third cream cheese croissant of the day, she couldn't help but think God, this office rocks!

The redhead had been putting on weight nearly every week at the office. Her diet barely lasted a day in Jenna's realm, where fattening foods seemed to rain from the sky. Her naturally piggish tendencies were not just encouraged, but especially recently, seemed to be given a jetpack and pointed skyward. As a case in point, Jenna appeared shortly after, speaking up, "Hey, Mary, heads up!" Maria looked up and just in time managed to clumsily catch a party-sized bag of chips, "Aw, thanks, Jen!" Maria, being a huge fan of any form of Carbohydrate, ripped the bag open, not minding the fact that she was already consuming a cream cheese croissant.

The combined feeding of Jenna and her own piggish desires had done considerable damage to Maria's waistline and hips, causing her to widen and her gut to grow outward. Her old white blouse had gone to the closet where all of Maria's clothes went that, in her own mind, are gonna fit me fine after I just get done treating myself for a bit, I'll get back on my diet eventually. Of course, Alice, Jenna, and Melissa all had such a closet - and none of them had lost any weight in a long time. In addition, she had effectively abandoned pants at work - none of them could button, but Maria was not panicking over these gains. Now she wore a teal blouse and a white skirt - a size up and designed to hide Maria's ever-fattening legs and hips. A few days ago this upsizing fit just fine, but Maria was conveniently ignoring the fact that it was starting to get fairly tight nearly any time she stuffed herself. It was not a coincidence that this described most of her time at work.

Though encouraged to gluttony, Maria was still just as pleased to work both for her own workload and Alice's. The fattening blonde, at this point, had begun to abandon the pretense of working - she clocked in and out, and that was the extent of her exhausting workload - the rest of her "work" was nothing but eating nearly everything that Jenna brought her - in addition to going to Jenna's "meetings." She breathlessly plodded over to Maria and spoke up, "Hey, Maria, I'm going for another meeting." Maria scarcely had to know who the meeting was with - it was with Jenna, and Maria knew that these meetings were little more than disguises for Jenna feeding Alice.

Maria continued on through her workday - log Alice's meeting with Jenna, log Alice getting back just before lunch, network a bit - before she knew it, her stomach was growling for its lunch, not happy with its already substantial snack. Before Maria could get up, Melissa appeared in her office. Victoria wasn't the only one noticing Melissa's gains, and Maria couldn't help but think, God, Mel is putting some on too. Good to know I'm not alone. "Hey, Mel, Whassup?" Melissa spoke up, "Oh, I was just grabbing some lunch to bring back - I figured you'd love some of this." She put down a container from Maggio's which smelled wonderfully of Alfredo. Maria moaned in delight, speaking, "Awh, thank ya's, I was wantin' some! Thank ya's!" Melissa continued this process - slowly feeding up Maria over the next few days, dropping goodwill gifts by. Maria began gaining massively as a result - in the span of that week, she had put four inches on her hips, and two inches on her gut - Melissa began to feel a pang of guilt for Maria's ballooning gains, but this was all for the good of the office.

If Maria could put up with the gains, and Melissa managed to get closer to her, she'd be able to save the office from immobility. If not, she'd sacrifice precious time - time that added pounds to Melissa's waist, time that made Alice more an increasingly obese, unhealthy blob. At the same time though, Jenna was eager to bring Maria to her own side, a topic she broached to Alice over a "meeting."

"Babe, you been seeing that redhead balloon up?" Alice nodded, "Yeah, Maria's been a godsend for my gains - I've been getting fucking huge now." Alice was dead on the money - her mass had to be coming up towards 600, and her mass was becoming indescribably huge - her gut was overlapping her knees, something neither Courtney or Jenna had achieved yet, and Jenna rubbed her thighs at this fact. "Yeah...She has, babe.. You're fatter than me now, for sure." Alice was ecstatic at this - "You really think so?" She was so happy to be larger than Jenna! Not that she had a gaining rivalry with her boss - but it had been a goal of hers for a while now to overtake the boss in size. "Yeah," said Jenna, "You've been a good piggy, a real good piggy." Alice certainly acted the part - she now was no longer content with thirds - going on to fourth plates at these in-house buffet lunches. Jenna fondled Alice's growing, multiplying rolls - the woman looked like an exploded silo of biscuit dough, her folds leaking out throughout her sides, her great gut like a mountainside of fat rolling down to her knees. Alice moaned erotically at Jenna's touch. The great, fat, blonde leaned back - her gut sloshed back and forth before settling over her vagina, and her fat thighs jiggled freely and spoke, "Feed me, Jenny, Feed me and fuck me..." Jenna obliged Alice of both requests - feeding the great baleen of a woman. Pleasuring the wall of fat that was Alice Gellar was beginning to be harder at this stage, especially if feeding was involved. "Piggy," commanded Jenna, "Hold up your fat gut so I can fuck you." Alice did as Jenna commanded, and Jenna discovered how immensely wet Alice was with her own fingers.

The fact that Alice was obviously larger than Jenna was becoming a do-or-die moment for Melissa. Time was of the essence, and the days had gone by - she determined to bring the subject up to Maria at her usual lunch delivery. The burgeoning redhead was happy to see Melissa's arrival, but Melissa held back the food. "Well, c'mon, what's holdin' ya's," asked Maria. "Uh, just this one thing. You've noticed Alice has been getting way too big recently, right?" Maria nodded, "Yeahhh, I've been gettin' kinda' uncomfortable with it - I must not be alone." Melissa nodded and spoke, "Well, I've been doing some detective work, and we could help her if we know who she's meeting with. Do ya' happen to know who she meets with all the time, around lunch?"

Maria thought for a moment and spoke,

1343222121122111111211211.content:
"Lunchtime? Oh, that's her usual time with Jenna."

Maria thought little of telling Mel the truth - she didn't know about half of the things Melissa had uncovered. She just thought Alice was getting particularly big - uncomfortably big. She was the last woman to judge anyone else's weight - but she had limits, and the speed at which Alice was gaining put Maria off. She couldn't see why Melissa's face grew so shocked, so stunned.

Of course, for Melissa, it was the final piece in the puzzle that was Alice's skyrocketing weight. Of course it was Jenna! That added a completely different undertone to everything that had happened since her coming to power - that was why she increased their access to donuts, that was why she gave interns the job of hauling deliveries up to them, that explained why she had taken the culture of fattening up to eleven! It was to feed her own fetish! It was so she could have a first-hand view of her fetish objects - and she had gotten so close to Alice that she had turned her worktime into a time of fetishized hedonism!

"Thanks a TON, Mary. Oh my god. That explains a lot." Mary quizzically took the bribe of food from Melissa. "Explains what?" Melissa sighed and spoke, realizing now what had been done to her friend. "Jenna's into feeding - she likes fattening people up, she gets off on it. And the rumors have been floating around that Alice has gotten into a new relationship." Maria's eyes blew up in size - "Nooo.. Nooo! What!?" She was repulsed by the idea - fat was a happy little accident, but this fetishized it! She thought it was normal to get pretty fat, even Melissa's size, just by overeating - but purposeful stuffing crossed a line for her! "That's crazy, Jenna can't do that!" Melissa nodded her head. "Yeah, she can't, it's literally against company policy basically anywhere."

"So what do we do?" "We submit a formal complaint to HR, get Jenna replaced, and try to get Al back. We get promoted for informing on her, and we get Alice back to a more normal size." Of course, Melissa didn't mean to make Alice skinny again - that was absurd, and would never hold. She meant to get Alice back in the ballpark of the 300's - back to herself, the Alice that seemed comparatively tiny by comparison, the Alice that Melissa needed to balance herself, the Alice that wasn't some suit's sex toy. The genuine and organic Al that she missed.

The next act took some courage - Melissa walked over towards HR, a difficult deviation to make from the path to her office. She had to go to the elevator, a trek for the blimp of a woman, then go down a floor - walk to the compliants desk,and take a form. All of this was done with her head over her shoulder. She was afraid what would happen to her if Jenna caught her here. The obese boss rarely, if ever, left her desk or the meeting room to feed herself or Alice, but Melissa had the paranoia only someone on this kind of a whistleblowing mission could have. She couldn't just go back to her desk with this, though - she needed a cover.

Maria and Alice saw Melissa waddling back to her desk with a box smelling of peanut sauce. "Mmm, Mel, ordering from Zheng's?" The fat Brunette smiled and nodded, "Yup!" The blonde and the redhead were clueless about the paper Melissa had hidden behind the bag which she shuffled to the side. She filled it out while she stuffed her face with the order of shrimp noodles - a girl has to keep her figure, after all.

The journey to deposit the form was just as fraught with peril. As if to make Melissa's paranoia worse, she saw the form of Jenna waddling towards her. Was she going to catch her? Was this going to be it for her? She thought of other places to work after Jenna fired her, which she had to after seeing her with the form -

Thankfully, the rest of the pack waddled out - save for Alice and Jenna, who waddled to the meeting room with everyone's backs turned, or so they thought. The bombshell that the report would unleash would set the office well and truly on fire.

13432221211221111112112111.content:
I can't believe I got sold out like this, thought the great fat creature that was Jenna, waiting in her office.

An anonymous employee had filed a report. She had figured that others were talking about her and Alice, but she thought that with how accommodating she had been, heads would be turned. Reprimands, notifications of inquiry, and worst of them all, the corporate investigators.

These suits were about as fat as you'd expect one from Gordge to be, but they had the presence in a room of an inquisitor for a guilty woman like Jenna. The endless questions were painfully repetitive and each one went worse for her than the last. It didn't help that she lied through her teeth every time she gave an answer, "No, I did not have sexual relations with Alice Gellar. I did not have private sexual encounters on corporate property." Every little thing she kept denying.

But they kept finding proof. Reciepts, booked meeting rooms.

She sat in her chair as the delegation of fat suit-wearing men and women wobbled in - a bald Asian man, as round as he was tall - a bearded and bespectacled White man with a thinning hairline who was just somewhat smaller, and a black woman who was somewhere 30 pounds south of Melissa. These three had been in and out of her office, and they sat down in a line in front of Jenna.

"Gregory, Tim, Masha. What can I help you with today," asked Jenna with barely masked contempt. The Asian man spoke up in a smooth baritone voice, raising his head as he did so and shaking his neck roll, "We're here to get some answers." The bearded man pulled something from a briefcase. A folder. He opened it and began speaking in a mid-ranged voice with a southern twang, "These images were recov'rd from Room 302," he said, pushing over an image. It was a chair under a blacklight. Some fluid stains were present, smudged - with a rag-pattern. "Care to explain what this is?"

How the fuck did they find that? Jenna cleaned that chair! She cleaned it rigorously! She was dumbfounded for a moment - "Uh.. That's.." The moment hung like death in the room - a silence she tried to break in her throat, but there was some wall stopping her.

Her mind spoke out in thought, They've got me and I can't bullshit my way out of this.

"It's vaginal discharge," spoke Masha in a lawyerly tone, "And it matches DNA samples from both you and miss Gellar." Jenna spoke up in fury and fire, "Okay, I did it. I fed her and fucked her for a year or two, she was my employee, I was her boss. Enough of this shit, what's going to happen now."

Gregory withdrew from his jacket pocket a pink letter. "You are hereby dismissed from Gordge Enterprises Incorporated, effective tomorrow."

That day, the news exploded like a nuclear shockwave. Everyone talked, "Holy shit, that's why she ordered the free donuts," was the general line. One fat mid-level worker held herself defensively in a break-room, "She used us as sex objects... What the fuck, what kind of a sick bitch..."

It was a whole event at five - everyone held back to watch Jenna waddle out. She huffed and puffed past a gauntlet of people, the normally proud strut she displayed that jiggled her massive legs was gone and replaced by a defeated waddle, her thighs glued together in their slow march out of Gordge.

She turned and looked at the glass tower. Gordge was now behind her, and her career here had ended in disgrace. Did she regret it?

Partly. She only regretted that she got caught. She didn't regret how fat she had made everyone, not one bit. Alice had blown up to gargantuan proportions - fatter than her by the end of their time together. But now she didn't know what would become of the blubbery whale of a woman, or herself.
****
Alice was shocked also - shocked and ashamed. She had finally discovered a new side of herself! She had gone beyond accepting her size and had gotten to loving its every growth, every expansion - but now the object of her love was gone.

She was quite morose in the days following Jenna's firing - downcast, her eyes turned down. Melissa, to her credit, was always a shoulder for her to cry on. "Girl, it'll be alright... Jenna was using you for her own kicks, she used all of us." Alice sobbed, catching her words in her throat for a moment - speaking up through a choked sob, "Y-You think she was? She was using me? Was she?" Alice wasn't sure that was true - was she being used?

Was she fucking up her body for someone who wasn't even that into her? No, there's no way that could be true. She loved getting fatter!

At least she thought she did.

The aftermath was quite obvious - the provided donuts began to dry up. "What the fuck, there's like, no donuts in here," complained Alice that morning at the mere two boxes that were present. Melissa spoke up, "Well, things change, I guess. Sometimes for the better."

Alice powered through her workload as best as she could, but her stomach was used to such a constant stream of food! She needed it like a drug, she got up and waddled breathlessly to Melissa's office, and spoke through sweat and exhaustion, "D'ya got anysnacks for m'," she asked, Melissa shook her head, "No, sorry, I don't have any to spare, girl." Alice grunted in frustration. Her stomach was growling at her, so much... As lunch rolled around, her thoughuts turned to Tommy's Pit, the local Barbecue Buffet with all the good southern food helpings - fried chicken, pulled pork, decadent desserts.

But then she thought of the possibility that Jenna had just used her. Part of breaking with that was pulling back on her appetite - coming back to reality. She was becoming more conscious of just how huge she had gotten, and she was beginning to regain her shame in the days following. She could barely move, she could barely fit through many doors - she knew in her returning rational mind that she ought to pull back to her old eating habits, before Jenna got involved.

But the latter only came to mind as she walked through the great, wide doors of the buffet. She chastised herself, I'm so addicted to food! I can't stop eating!" She went up and sated her hunger. Fried chicken, macaroni and cheese, fried potatoes, it was all so good! It all tasted so great! But her mind couldn't stop chastising her, her mind was at war with itself.

As she got back to the office, she examined herself. She had gone far beyond letting herself go - where her old self was laid somewhere out of reach of her great, flabby hands - she couldn't reach it just yet.

The day after, she came to the office with a bowl of chicken caesar salad. Vicky couldn't help but remark on it, "Ooh, so healthy today, Al!" Alice nodded proudly, "Yep. I'm gonna do it - I'm gonna shed some weight. At least get back to 300." But as the workday rolled past, she couldn't shake the memory of tastes - tastes she had taken for granted. Chocolate. Creamy, sugary treats... pasta... all now forbidden and out of reach. She had resolved to cook more at home, and had done so for breakfast.

But lunch was the hardest. The chicken wasn't even fried - it was bland, grilled chicken. It was certainly different from what had become so blase, and that made it bearable - but it was hard to forget how it compared to the fried chicken at the buffet. The fried chicken that Jenna used to bring in. It was so boring in comparison!
