134322212112211111121121111.content:
Alice tried to throw herself into the regimen she had planned for herself - cereal and sometimes a sausage for breakfast, black coffee only, a chicken salad for lunch, and a sandwich for supper.

For a woman who had grown accustomed to stuffing herself at every single possible occasion and gorging herself to oblivion, it was like being tortured every second of every day. It didn't help that she was practically the only one on such a strict diet. A few of the other girls were dabbling in eating less - Maria had a bean fajita for lunch with a meager helping of tortilla chips. "Yeah, Jenna was so bad for my waist. I'm gonna try to drop some of these pounds she gave me." Victoria commiserated with her over her hamburger steak with mashed potatoes, "Mhm, same, girlfriend. Like, I can barely move, and it's so annoying."

Melissa and Courtney made no such attempts to shed weight. They seemed to be not moving up into new weight classes like Jenna tried to push them to, but their gains were still coming, slowly but steadily. Melissa's clothes didn't require the constant tailoring they used to, but they weren't getting any looser.

Alice had plenty of the same issues - she had begun to barely fit in her car anymore. Had Jenna stayed for a few more months, it would have been inevitably that Alice would have been homebound. Some part of Alice's mind tried to paint her a rosy picture of it - being cosy at home instead of force-feeding herself the same chicken salad for lunch, every single day. It was hard to eject this thought, to remind herself that, in fact, she would have eaten herself to immobility at that point. Even if that part of her brain romanticized the act of getting fatter, it still shuddered at a complete loss of mobility. Alice was, after all, still a human being. Her rejection of raw sexual desire gave her some determination.

But God Almighty, that determination was fading in the face of how unimaginative she was with her diet-dishes. That friday, she stared resentfully into her half-full chicken salad. She could NOT finish it. Not for fullness, but for hate of this dish. She never wanted to touch a chicken salad again. She felt a padded, fatty hand on her shoulder. Looking up, it was Melissa. She asked with a donut in hand, "Having issues with that diet, girl?" Alice sighed and nodded, cradling her head in her hands. "How the hell can people do this? I can't eat this monotonous shit day in, day out! It's literally always the same and I hate it. I hate it so much." Melissa rubbed her shoulder and bit into the donut. She handed one to Alice, and spoke up. "You know, you CAN eat other shtuff beshides.." She took a moment to gulp down her donut, "chicken salad on a diet, right? As long as it fits in your budget."

Alice scrambled for the donut, eating it ravenously. "Mhm... Mh... Mh...." she moaned while consuming it. Melissa rubbed her shoulder. The visceral touch while eating - it was too familiar of Jenna, and Alice hadn't completely bought into the idea that she was being maniuplated. It soothed her. She had to remind herself that it was, in fact, Melissa rubbing her shoulder and not Jenna, who was about to feed her another whole pizza. "Thankyou..." she said breathlessly to the woman. Melissa spoke up, "No problem. Just don't be like this with food - because you know that if you restrict yourself like this, you'll go right back to eating everything in sight."

This was something of a relief, though how Alice would take this remained to be seen. Would this loosening of her strictures make her diet more sustainable, and lead to more long-term loss, or would this open the flood gates to her old habit of overeating?
134322212112211111121121111.title: Big Girl, Less Food, More Problems.

choices: Without intervention Alice only gets bigger—she eventually gets too fat to work
Jenna attempts to throw Melissa off the scent—in her own patent way, of course
Free Choice
1343222121122111111211212.content:
For as long as she’d been working at Gordge, Maria had never been made to feel like an outsider.

Ever since day one, she’d been invited to be “one of the girls”—something that had never truly come to pass even after some years at her old job. Everyone was super nice and had done a great job of helping her get acquainted to what had at first been a daunting workload. They’d introduced her to the best bars and restaurants in town, and everyone was always so nice about helping her out wherever they could. Victoria was always nice for office gossip, Melissa was so helpful with her “do’s and don’ts” in clientele, and Maria had been blatantly transparent about sucking up to Courtney ever since she got put in charge of organizing the mid-morning donut runs.

But the two women who had been the most adamant about making sure that she’d found her niche in her new workspace had been Ms. Jenna and Alice—the best boss and cubicle mate a girl like Maria could ask for.

Sure, Alice was lazy. Maria was no fool—she had caught on some time ago that she was pulling Alice’s weight around the office. But she was always so nice and so sweet, she couldn’t help but do it anyway. And she always had the best snacks—sharing an office with Alice alone was probably what was crossing X’s onto Maria’s pant sizes these days! And Jenna had not only let her skip the intern stage of employment, but was also very vocal about her performance around the office.

Everyone around the office were Maria’s gal pals, for sure…

But something about tattling on two of her favorite co-workers kicking their feet up once or twice a day, every day, after everything that they’d done for her seemed… wrong somehow. Like, it wouldn’t have made her any better than that Christina girl that everyone bitched about. Lord knows what those women actually did in there for all those hours, but…

Alice was her friend, for sure—and Ms. Jenna had been the best boss she’d ever had! Maria wasn’t about to risk becoming the new Tina by spilling tea on the wrong blouse.

“I’m sorry, Mel—m’afraid I don’t.” She offered weakly, “I, uh… wish I could be of more help.”

Melissa’s fat face frowned, creasing at the dimples as her round chin bunched at the collar of her blouse. Reeling her fattening bribe back in, Maria’s regret compounded with a little extra immediate gratification literally drawing away from her, back into the nook of Melissa’s fleshy arm fat.

“Ugh.” she grumbled in defeat, rustling the bag of chips as she tore them open with three expertly trained sausage fingers, “I mean… are you sure? Because I can’t for the life of me figure out what Alice does around here…”

Maria squirmed in her seat as she watched Melissa snack in frustration. The barrel-built brunette shifted awkwardly on her feet as she stood in front of the comparatively svelte yankee, unable to truly appreciate what she had intended to be a bribe as her distress over Alice’s increasing size percolated.

“I mean… you and me both.” Maria laughed, little tummy wobbling a little as she stared at Melissa’s chips, “Um… do you mind if I…?”

“Hmm? Oh, sure.” Melissa offered her a handful, “Do you think you could ask around for me? Try and find out who she’s meeting with all the time? I’m just worried about her, y’know?”

“You got it.” Maria smiled, lips lightly dusted, “Sorry I couldn’t be of more help.”

And watching her waddle away, Maria almost felt bad about lying to her friend. After all, Melissa was only worried about Alice. They all were, on some level. Most of the gossip around the office was about her these days—just betting on how long she’d be able to keep her job. If rumors were to be believed, she barely spent time with anyone outside of work anymore. Just this mysterious lover that everyone kept insisting that she had. But a woman that big certainly couldn’t have many secrets, could she? If Alice had a boyfriend… Maria would know. After all, they told each other everything. They shared an office, for Christ’s sake!

No, Maria had done the right thing. Maria had no business sharing her secrets—after all, Alice was probably her best friend at Gordge.

And if all of the extra snacks Alice started sending her way after she’d told her what happened were any indication, Alice felt the same way about her.
1343222121122111111211212.title: Cover It Up

choices: Alice's absence in the office and presence on the payroll gets attention - HR's.
Alice's absence in the office means more donuts for the rest!
13432221211221111112112121.content:
With almost any morning, the routine, by necessity, must begin with the person getting out of bed.

It is such a simple physical act to so many people - just turn over, pull themselves up, stand up. It's usually mentally that the act becomes a challenge.

To some, the act can be physically challenging due to missing limbs - unfortunate accidents whether congenital or the kind of raw tragedy that alters a person.

But for Alice Gellar on April 22nd, it was because of the two years preceding that morning which were full of endless, hedonistic stuffing. The blonde attempted to roll over, but her first attempt was a failure - she could barely get part over part of one of her thighs - immense things that were as wide as an adult's forearm. She barely succeeded afterwards - an exertion which left her sweating. She barely stopped herself from laying back down because of her exhaustion - having to half-raise herself back up, a difficult task because of her withered abdominal muscles.

After Melissa's attempt to stop Alice Gellar's gain by uncovering her feeder, Alice had all the time, and all the resources in the world at her disposal. Nightly feasts that were deliberately aimed at fattening her to absurd and obscene proportions - desserts, greasy foods, junk food at what was technically her job but not her true "work-" her gut now was over 90 inches wide, not far away from 100.

And it would be this same gut that would lead to the second part - the immense fat entity that was Alice attempted to stand. Her legs were entirely not close to the task. They were far from overtaxed from prior work - their overtaxing was almost absolutely due to her own greed, her own desire - the sheer mass of fat that hung on her huge frame. If it were merely her legs that were fat, however, she'd be able to stand - but the greatest mass of her mass was in her torso, and it kept her down. It was a surreal feeling to Alice - she commanded her body to stand up, to get up from the bed. She felt her body attempting the feat, but it bore no fruit - nothing was happening.

She sweated - her heart raced more than it normally did. She was getting this sweaty just from trying to stand up! She got barely a centimeter up - but her muscles could take no more. She collapsed backward onto her bed. She reached over for her phone - another immense effort, she was drenched in sweat and her heart begged for her to stop moving, as she spoke into the phone. Jenna picked up. "Yeah, babe, what's up?" "Uh... Jen... I can't..." She took a gasp of breath, necessary due to the weight of her fat on her lungs, "get out of bed... Needy'rhelp...."

Jenna could almost orgasm right now. "That is literally the sexiest thing I have ever heard. I'm on my way." Up, as fast as the also immense form of Jenna would allow - out, to her car, to Alice's home. She used her key, walked in, and saw it. The sweating, breathless, obese form of Alice Gellar, the cheerleader who had officially eaten herself to immobility. "Ya did it, sweetie," said Jenna, "I knew you had it in you." Alice chuckled and jiggled her immense gut. "Tell the truth, so did I... I just needed your help. But this feels like it's gonna be longer than a few days.. how the hell am I gonna work?" Jenna giggled, "Babe, you know I'm literally the boss of this branch, right? I can just give you Home-Work status. " Alice's eyes grew like beachballs - "Oh my god. That's incredible!"

In the office, the rumor spread like wildfire. "I kinda saw it comin'," said Victoria, "She was gettin' so big, I saw her get stuck in a door the other day! Honest ta' god! I had ta' shove 'er out!" The consequences of Alice's greed for the wider office would make themselves clear within the month.
13432221211221111112112121.title: The obese bed-bound blonde.

choices: Alice is gone, but not forgotten—now Jenna has her all to herself
Alice is having second thoughts—but she just can't stop eating!
134322212112211111121121212.content:
Not long after the revelation that Alice had gotten too fat to come to work, Jenna had made a formal announcement on the matter.

She had called a formal assembly of the staff, allegedly, so that they could discuss the matter with tact and professionalism. The Gordge crew were tightly knit, and tended to react poorly to being kept out of the loop. Alice had been one of them for so long now that it almost felt like a memorial service, as if she had died instead of being relegated to working from home. In practice, it was even more similar than a group of Alice's closest friends come to discuss her absence—plenty of folks who had worked with her for years shared testimonials about how much they would miss her smiling face and bubbly optimism. In truth, they were already incorrectly remembering their now-homebound friend as who she had been some time ago.

As her secret relationship with Jenna urged her towards the darkest parts of herself, her positive attributes had become buried underneath hundreds of extra pounds and a consuming need for more with a matching disregard for others' opinions. She hadn't been the bright, chipper eager beaver of the office that Maria and Courtney had painted her as for quite some time; by the time she'd left and for quite a while before, Alice had been little more than a huffing and puffing fixture in the office with a pitiful workload. She was more like an office lamp that Jenna could feed, fondle, and fuck than the light that her friends had painted her as. In truth, if Jenna hadn't manipulated the paperwork so that half of Maria's workload went under Alice's belt, she would have been fired a long, long time ago.

The meeting was, for all intents and purposes, an excuse to gather everyone up together for an hour or two of the workday for a catered meal in Alice's honor. It wasn't often that Jenna got to see with her own two eyes just how much everyone was sizing up these days for comparison. Any excuse that she could have to get them all squeezed into one room, sagging guts brushing against as they splayed between squat stances and thick legs, her whole staff huffing in puffing as they shifted on their fattened feet...Jenna got the shivers just thinking about it.

To many of those who had been working with her closely, her absence would be felt the greatest. That was what Jenna was counting on.

In bringing up old memories, leaning hard into the past to drudge up some sympathy, Jenna was hoping to elicit some emotional reactions from her staff. Because when her staff got emotional, they ate. And when they ate, they ate to excess. Giving these fatties an excuse to stuff themselves was one thing, but to really play up the great loss that was having Alice in the workplace and get them all riled up and sentimental was the endgame here.

Hearing their wide bodies make the bench seating in the break room creak and groan as it faced maximum capacity, watching their fat bellies bay up to the tables like whales to she shore, it was easily the best Tuesday that Jenna could have ever asked for. She'd stocked the break room with all of Alice's favorite treats (there were still quite a lot in the backlog to get through anyway) and told everyone to eat up. She'd even broken company regulations and brought in some champagne as a show of what a good, personable boss she was, and passed everyone a glass. Placing a tiny, delicate glass between each and every set of chubby fingers that held themselves out...

All the while, Alice was taking notes—mentally shaping up who would be the "new Alice".
134322212112211111121121212.title: Alice's Going Away Party

choices: Jenna has her cake & eats it too—she has Alice at home and a new project at work
Alice needs a full-time caretaker—Jenna sees to it that Alice gets only the best
1343222121122111111211212121.content:
It had taken a rented gurney to get Alice out of her apartment.

True to her manipulative form, Jenna had been planting the seeds for their initial cohabitation for a while now. Teasing Alice about how fat she was getting, and how she'd have so much of an easier time if she just stayed with her, and how nobody would get in trouble if nobody else found out, had slowly whittled down Alice's already pathetic resistance. Somewhere deep inside, the Old Alice was just too much of a goody-two-shoes to shack up with her boss, despite everything else that they had been doing.

Perhaps it was a deep, deep sense of resistance? Like she knew that, once she moved in with Jenna, that there would be no going back. Either in their relationship or everything else that had changed since they started hooking up. The outer Alice, greedy, lazy, and spoiled as she was, was still holding back in respect to the inner Alice.

Either way, once it dawned on her that she was too fat to even get up in the morning, much less take care of herself, Alice finally gave into Jenna's suggestion that they live together. She didn't have much of a choice—there was no way that she could afford an attendant to help her do things like get dressed, keep the house clean, and feed the cat and her rent. Not to mention food, utilities... Alice ate up money almost as quickly as she ate up everything else at her size!

But with Jenna's salary and her own...

Even still, she'd had to give Prissy to Maria.

Her back to the headboard of her new bed in Jenna's house (no apartment=less stairs), Alice took a moment to marvel at the sheer size that was just all of her. She took up the whole Queen sized bed, by herself! Fuck, she basically was a Queen sized bed. So soft and white—"and fun to bounce on" as Jenna would have probably put it. She and Jenna were collectively too big to snuggle together anymore. All there was now was food and sex, food and sex, groping and kissing and...and jiggling...

Alice used to, in her more lucid moments, have concerns about what her relationship with Jenna was doing to her. How much she was eating, how fat she was getting. How little of her life actually existed outside of her relationship with Jenna. She hadn't been out to the bar or to a restaurant with Mel or Courtney in months—she'd been too fat to get there reliably, and Jenna had always come whistling anyway. She hadn't talked to her sister in... years. Was it years now? As in, plural?

Alice squeezed the top fold of her stomach, a nervous habit picked up at some point between massive and monolithic. A small, almost child-like expression flashed across her face as a pathetic little squirming sound eeked out from deep inside her. These four walls that she had been moved into were going to be her only... everything for... for...

Alice dared not say it out loud, but the thought was there: "the rest of my life"

In a brief moment, Alice managed to regret every bite that had taken her this far. She quickly tacked on "or until they move me!" to her monologue, but even still... now she was something so large as that she had to be moved. Like a piece of furniture, or a house. God, she felt like a house...

"M-Maybe I-I should..."

It was, however, the swan song of Alice's inner sense of reason and consequence. As familiar smells of pizza and takeout piqued the interest of her nose, her thoughts of remorse quickly melted away. Her mouth began to water, and her soft pink lips began to smack as Jenna delivered—from her office, the first of what were promised in the note line to be many courses to come.

And as a deep, greedy sound overcame the softness of the Old Alice's whimpering, Alice began to knead her stomach with an unbridled lust for more.

"Door's open!" she commanded, "Bring it to the back!"
1343222121122111111211212121.title: Alice is gone, and too far gone at that.

choices: Melissa—she's still asking questions about Alice - bury it under food!
Vicky—girl's dumb as a post - she'll barely notice being "new Alice"!
Maria—because damn can that girl get fat - she's a natural!
13432221211221111112112121211.content:
For all intents and purposes, Alice Gellar had dropped off the face of the Earth. The good part about working from home was that, despite the fact that you no longer actually worked in the building, you still had the option of interacting with the staff. Sure you weren't supposed to text on the job, but everyone did it. Everyone except Alice.

For that matter, there were no e-mails, no Skype calls... no communication of any kind!

It was as if Alice's "going away party" was every bit the memorial that all of her friends and coworkers had seen it as. Alice had all but vanished, cutting ties with everyone with whom she worked with for years. People were beginning to float her actual, factual death. After all, at her size, it wasn't impossible to believe that she'd suffered some kind of illness related to obesity. They might not have liked to think about it, but...

"No no, Alice is still doing just fine." Jenna would laugh and joke, double chins jiggling as she sat behind her desk, "She's just... hard at work! I get her reports all the time."

And that much was a half-truth. About half of Maria's workload still went into Alice's "done" pile so that Jenna could keep up the charade that her live-in landwhale actually did her job, but she was going to have to start filing the serial numbers off of someone else's assignments too if she wanted to keep up the charade that Alice was even more productive from home than she was at the office. Anything to keep that heifer eating, growing, hungry...

Alice answer a text message every now and then - crew thinks you're dead.

do u wan me to tpe or eat
bcs i cant do both

Jenna bit her bottom lip as she looked at the attachment—a profile shot of her bedbound hog of a girlfriend eating her way through the third course of lunch. It was hard to argue with a stance like that, knowing what they'd get to do when they were alone together. Alice was too fat for sex (at least, sex that Jenna's pitiful stamina could endure—lifting all that blubber was hard!) but as soon as they got in the special supplies that she'd ordered off of Amazon...

Jenna shuddered deeply, griding into the massage head of her office chair.

Fuck. Fuck fuck fuck.

Without Alice around, Jenna had little to no sexual release anymore. She'd built up years of tolerance to her own sex drive, and all it had taken was getting a big fat sexpot for her to go under like a tin can underneath one of her butt cheeks. Jenna was a woman obsessed with growth, and Alice had been the growing-est girl that had ever waddled through those doors!

Jenna was a woman built around a strange mixture of immediate and delayed gratification—she needed to have her special projects. The whole reason she worked at this shitty job was because of the opportunities it provided her to satisfy her lust for fatty flesh!

She needed a new project... or she felt that she just might explode!
13432221211221111112112121211.title: Jenna has her cake & eats it too—she has Alic...

choices: Melissa dives into Jenna's introduced coping mechanism - she piles on the pounds
Speaking of Alice, what's this special package?
134322212112211111121121212111.content:
Melissa's frustration had reached a nexus in recent days. She had hoped to find some way to get back in touch with Alice. Maybe her long-dormant social media pages would turn something up, but - not even a block in reply to her messages. Her texts went unanswered. Nobody would collaborate with her digging, and it frustrated her.

Almost as a response of fate, Melissa looked up to a bag of fast food on her desk.

Her fat-cradled head turned upward to see the hovering, obese form of Jenna, looming over her.

"I figured you deserved a treat - Alice working from home and all, you guys have been putting in a lot of extra work." Melissa began to shake her head and speak, "Thanks, Jen, but I've already eaten l-" Jenna interrupted, "Consider it a big snack then! A gift from me." She took something out and brandished it.

It was a double-double - two patties, with two helpings of bacon. While Alice had her sweet tooth, Melissa had a love for almost anything fattening and greasy - but these took the cake. "Oh, that's like cheating," said Melissa. She broke her taboo and began diving into the meaty sandwich. "You know I've been tryna avoid theshe."

Jen chuckled and spoke up, "Then all the better for a treat!"

And as such she continued to focus on Melissa. Of course, this wasn't to the exclusion of Maria - she had gotten up to 45 inches on her waist easily, but her face had already begun forming a fold of fat below her chin as her double-chin began turning into a thick flap of fat. However, of course, she continued entertaining a modicum of restraint. She'd eat a bag of high-calorie fast food, but she wouldn't stack dessert on top of that. Usually. She'd grab two donuts, sometimes three, but she'd stop there. Usually.

But the difference was, Melissa might connect some dots. From what she had heard, she had gotten pretty close before - if she was allowed to exert her energy on things that weren't work or eating, she might uncover the steamy and unprofessional truth.

And that could not happen. So she got moved up on the priority of hogs to fatten. It didn't hurt her case that Melissa was a nice, even gainer of weight. Alice was nice, but it was like any gainer knows at a buffet - you have to get variety. Belly gainers were nice, but Jen wanted a taste of the juicy form that was Melissa.

And deliciously glorious it was. Her gut was a good fifteen inches wider than Maria's, but that was far from her only benefit. Her thighs and hips, immense with fat, strained every bottom of every kind that Mel ever wore, but especially pants. Her breasts strained every top that she wore, alongside her belly, and her ankles had merged with her calves to form great, fat cankles.

Melissa was already a very fat woman, but Jenna was intent on turning her into an outright wad of lard, a la Alice.
134322212112211111121121212111.title: Less questions, more food.

choices: Alice focuses more on feeding Jenna - the pounds pile on.
Alice focuses on fattening some of her fellow co-workers - especially Mel.
134322212112211112.content:
A few weeks on, as spring had given way to fall, Alice's new gains were truly becoming revealing. Jenna's old hand-me-downs, about fifty pounds ago rather loose, were now becoming snug. The buttons were still servicing their master, but the assault of the blubber below was not one they could stop. Her face was constantly coated in sweat from being outside at all, let alone walking outside - an old pleasure of hers that she still periodically did every other week, but it had become more and more difficult with her increasing weight that had now surpassed even Melissa and perhaps even Courtney - becoming definitively the second-fattest in the office, only not the fattest by the virtue that she occasionally took a walk and said no to the second box of donuts.

Granted, Alice was controlling herself well, though she still munched on donuts at a bit of a high rate, she was able to occasionally reign it in and eat medium-sized lunches. At least I'm not double-fisting 'em. That was genuinely tempting for Alice to do. But she had begun to feel the physical toll of her increasing weight. Her heart was constantly working overtime to furnish her ever-expanding body with blood. Her lungs were burning from even her simple waddles to and from the break room, and produced a pant from nearly every little action. Her legs were taxed with every movement. It was damned tempting to ignore their cries and eat on, to eat herself into immobility. She could have others take care of her - serve her while she just ate and ate. The voice that used to be so so small was now a constant bark, pleading for her to give into her growing sensual urge. It sounded suspiciously like Jenna's sometimes - "Come on - just a few more plates. Break your old record. You're a hot, fat, obese woman...Don't you love the feeling of each new pound?"

But Alice was not quite at the stage of eating with full abandon. She was still scared of getting to the stage where she'd need help with every little thing - she still treasured at least her partial remaining independence. Immobility was still scary to the half-ton woman, though she came closer to it with her gains. Additionally, having seen Jenna naked, she knew that she was beginning to come up on Jenna's weight level - and that scared her. The massive woman was barely 50 pounds heavier than her - held back mainly by her taxing strolls around to Alice's office to ogle the butterball blonde.

Alice was able to channel that voice into other things, however. That friday, the pair met at Jenna's house - watching some cheesy action movie or other. "This is so dumb," remarked Jenna, "If the dude's some CIA-trained operative, why the hell does he run around into the bad guy's guns and get hit like that?" The main character wriggled around over-dramatically. Faintly from the television, his next line as he held his faux-wound - "Shit... I'm wounded bad..." triggered Alice - "In what world do you start as many sentences with the word "Shit" as this guy? Not one person I know does that." Jenna chuckled. "I do that - but only when it's around you." Alice winked and jiggled one of her multiple rolls at Jenna. "I could say the same for you, babe. If we're going to do this, can we switch roles this time?" Jenna raised a brow. "Alright." She assumed the position, lounging on the burgundy sofa. This was one thing that Jenna did not want to break - it was a beautiful sofa, reinforced against Jenna's 550+ pound body. It struggled with a load of 1,000 pounds, but still worked better than anything that was not a concrete slab to hold such pressure as the weight of these two mounds of lard.

Alice picked up the two slices of pizza - famously from Martelli's lesser known pizza place. The only reason the small shop stayed open was that it was next to a string of college dive bars, and sold cheap, massive slices of pizza from its 30 inch pies. And Alice had bought two. Even Jenna had to remark, "Jesus al-mighty, it's like an alien space ship." The seemingly world-encompassing pizzas took up the entire rest of the living room when Alice brought them in. This was a taxing task to be sure, and Alice panted and wiped the sweat from her forehead. "This ought to help you out, piggy. Now lay back and let mommy do her work."

The sight of massive Jenna laying back was one to behold. It was like a set of rolling mountains, bare of trees just as she began to de-clothe herself. She took up the whole of the width of the couch on her side, every inch of fat spreading out. Her gut lay bare and jiggling, a good platform for Alice to lean her fat arms on. Jenna's mouth let out a tiny amount of air from the pressure. "Ooo... That feels good.." Alice managed to take one massive slice, the length of her nearly 30 inch fatty forearm and a fair bit wider, and fold it - feeding this folded slice tip-first into Jenna's waiting maw. Her face seemed far fatter when it was waiting for food - likely a picture of her future as she bit down into the folded slice. Alice relentlessly pushed forward as Jenna opened for another bite, barely chewing the first. "Mmm.." moaned Jenna at the ecstasy of the food. The slice was beautifully greasy and meat-laden. The rest of the slice went faster than a normal human being would think possible until they saw Jenna's massive, waiting, fat mouth.

Alice reached for the next slice. "Mm-hmm. And there's double that coming up here." She folded the next slice, only to grab a second slice! She was using black-magic sorcery's fat cousin and Jenna's mouth watered as her eyes hungrily tracked the food approaching her mouth. Alice drew it back at the last moment, as it approached Jenna's mouth. Jenna's brows furrowed, offended at the withdrawal of food. "You bitch," she spoke with a joking tone. She was immediately assaulted with the double-slice, this evil mechanism of obesity. To any sane person, the sight of the two piles of poundage eating such greasy, fattening food would make them redouble their dieting efforts. But to Jenna, it was the sexiest feeling imaginable- the idea that once-innocent little Alice had now fattened herself to the degree that she was barely 50 pounds short of Jenna's weight. To Alice, too, this was a dangerous pushing of her boundaries. She loved both the act of feeding and being fed, and in this moment, as the pizza still lasted and Jenna finished the double-slice, she picked up four more slices, a feat of hand grip, and formed two double-slices, handing one to Jenna. "Feed me this one." Jenna cackled. "I knew you couldn't resist being fed." Alice smiled. "Definitely not," as the double-slice slid into her mouth and she bit down. She was already questioning whether she could keep up the feeding routine and still hold firm to her self-control. She had to find someone to channel this gluttony into - soon.
134322212112211112.title: Work to be done, and snacks to be eaten.

choices: Alice launches her campaign against Melissa's waistline!
Alice can't focus on just Melissa—Maria needs love too!
Between Alice and Jenna, the whole office gets enormous!
1343222121122111122.content:
In her preoccupation with her perversions, Jenna had never made it difficult to gain weight in the Gordge offices.

In fact, the higher up she climbed up the precariously creaking corporate ladder the more she worked to undermine the waistlines of those around her, as well as the audacity of those who would attempt to contain them. As discussed at length before, Jenna loved watching people get fat. The only thing she loved more was having an active hand in sabotaging their diets, and watching their willpowers crumble into fleshy bloated piles of soft fat. She had been the undoing of plenty during her time as office manager, and no doubt her reign would only continue.

“You could shave his upper lip and he’d probably drop, like, twenty pounds.”

“No way, his mustache is—“

It was here that a figure came between the two, if only for a moment. It had a distinct walk, a slow hobble that was signature to the tall high heels that only one woman in the office wore. Barely there for two blinks of an eye, it had been Victoria heading back to her desk. They had seen her go by about five minutes ago, apparently she was just now getting back. However, she was gone just like that.

“—so hot, if he ever shaved I’d buy him a new one at Party City until it grew back.”

There was a pause as Alice seemed to watch Victoria walking away, all but hanging her short brown locks out her cubicle as she did so. She turned back to Melissa, seeming distraught, as she let her eyes linger to her right for just a moment longer before asking, as if greatly intrigued by the seemingly every-day action:

“Was that Victoria?”

“I’ll bet, I heard her coming all the way from the break room.” Melissa griped with an eye roll, “Those loud high heels clacking on the floor… you’d think she’d just wear flats like the rest of us.”

“No, I mean, she had like, an armful of food!” Alice stressed ‘armful’ by holding out her thick forearms like she were holding a football

“So what, she’s always eating.” Melissa said, unaware of her hypocrisy, “Seriously, half the time she answers the phone with pop-tart in her mouth. What’s the big deal?”

“I-I mean… look, you know how much food she gets in a day?” Alice asked, leaning against her stomach slightly as she attempted to hone the conversation between the two, “She had, like, all of that.”

“Really?” Melissa asked with a raised eyebrow, “You’d think little Miss Guido would at least pretend to look like she’s working…”

Sure enough, far away from them by now, Vicky walked down the aisle with notable difficulty. On one hand (or, rather both), she precariously balanced the large amount of snack food she had garnered from her most recent trip to the vending machine. With her free hand, an open package of strawberry pop tarts was held by two fingers as she ravenously chomped on both tarts at a time. Her mouth opened wide, little brown flakes dotting the corners of her lips.

Behind her, two large cheeks bobbed awkwardly beneath her tight black skirt. She had put on some weight since joining the work force, this being the Italian girl’s first internship and stepping stone into completing her business degree. She had gone from a somewhat thick girl with a bad spray tan to a downright porker, months of idle snacking at her desk had put at least fifty pounds on Victoria’s supple shape—a big belly stuck out behind her while her overpumped rump grazed the ends of the cubicles she passed.

She didn’t stop to say hello to anybody, she was far too engrossed in stuffing her face. Her cheeks bulged outwards, filled with “breakfast” as she passed row after row of coworker, eventually making it back to her front desk. She simply spread her goods across the surface and wriggled her way into her increasingly tight office chair before resuming her food fest.

“Geeze, that’s not like her at all…” Alice said, somewhat concerned

“How so?” Melissa asked arbitrarily, “She’s always stuffing her face.”

“Well yeah, but…” Alice pursed her lips, “Still, something might be wrong.”

1351.content:
“C’mon Melissa, there got to be something wrong.” Alice said.

“What? What could be wrong with her?” Melissa said. She preferred to sit back and gossip behind a person’s back as opposed to “actually caring about someone,” as Alice often did.

“I don’t know, but she’s a coworker, us girls look out for each other.” Alice said. Melissa rolled her eyes.

“I just ate a lot, do we have to do it now?” Melissa whined.

“Come on, get up.” Alice said. The two flabby friends slowly lifted their overfed bodies out of their overtaxed desk chairs. Melissa and Alice groaned and grunted as they struggled to get their bodies upright. Their large breakfasts made their heavy bloated bellies hard to shift around. They slowly waddled over to Victoria’s desk. The two fatties were out of breath as they reached Victoria at the front of the office. Vicky’s was sitting on her big butt, snacking on some twinkies.

“What are you gonna say to her?” Melissa whispered to Alice. It was a good question. It would be rude for Alice to just ask her why she’s getting so fat.

“I’ll pretend it’s a survey for everyone at the office.” Alice said. She turned towards Victoria.

“Hey guys, what’s up?” Victoria said.

“Hey Vick, I’ve got some questions for you for a survey. Everyone at the office has to do it.” Alice said.

“Ugh, yeah sure. Ask away.” Victoria said. She was pretty gullible so she didn’t bat an eye at Alice’s fake survey.

“First question: how often do you exercise?” Alice asked.

“Uhm… never I guess. I hate getting sweaty, working out sucks.” Victoria said.

“Okay, in what ways do you try to eat healthy?” Alice asked.

“Try to eat healthy? I don’t think about whether I’m eating healthy or not. I just eat what I want when I want it.” Victoria said.

“Do you monitor what you eat at all?” Alice asked.

“No, I’m only like 23.” Victoria said. Alice was a bit confused as how “I’m only 23” was a valid reason.

“Okay, have you gained weight in the last year?” Alice asked.

“Hmmm… I’m not sure. I haven’t weighed myself in so long.” Victoria said. The answer was obviously yes.

“So yes or no? What’s your best guess?” Alice asked.

“Can you just put ‘I don’t know’?” Victoria asked.

“Ugh, yeah sure.” Alice said. “Thanks for taking the survey.”

“No problem!” Victoria said. Alice and Melissa walked back to their desks. Alice was flabbergasted by Vicky’s naïve attitude towards her weight.

“See, there wasn’t anything wrong with her.” Melissa said.

“A doctor would disagree.” Alice said.

“Well, it’s not like mine or your answers would be any different.” Melissa said.

“I-I guess so.” Alice said.

Victoria sat down at her desk. She dropped her junk food all over her desk. She had recently increased her food consumption. Jenna walked by Victoria’s desk. Her whale of a boss was exhausted. She was rarely seen walking around the office due to her being so lazy and fat. She stopped to lean on Victoria’s desk. Jen was breathing heavily and sweating.

“Jenna, are you alright?” Victoria asked.

“Yeah I *gasp* can’t *pant* believe how large *wheeze* this office is.” Jen said, complaining about the mere 20 yards she’d walked. The reason she was making her trip around the office was to see how her changes to the office were going. Jenna wanted the office to cater perfectly to women like herself.

“So how do you like the office now?” Jen asked.

“I love it. I've got all the food I’d want! Also the Milkshake machine is great.” Victoria said. Jenna liked Victoria a lot so she made sure Vicky was treated well. That meant her desk was stocked with food. Jen looked Victoria up and down. She had a recently developed double chin. There was no doubt she had gained weight recently. Her shirt was missing several buttons and her big pudgy belly was pushing the remaining buttons to their limit. Even her arms looked packed in to her shirt sleeves. She really seems to have embraced the culture of the office. She’s looking better than ever! Jen thought to herself. Victoria also looked Jenna up and down. She was the fattest person Vicky had ever seen! Her boobs were larger than Vicky’s butt. I like Jenna but wow is she big! You’ll never see me looking like that. Vicky thought. If only she knew.

“Oh, here.” Victoria said, handing Jenna the twinkie. She was a little embarrassed for Jenna. Jenna couldn't care less though as she quickly shoved the twinkie passed her chubby cheeks. Jenna then walked back to her office.

Jenna saw some of herself in Victoria. This made her want to coddle Victoria as an employee. She wanted Victoria to be well fed and comfortable. She made her job as easy as possible. Victoria saw no problem with this. She liked making her boss happy, and all she had to do was eat and occasionally answer the phone. And if she ever had a problem Jenna would get it fixed. 13523.content:
Anyone working at Gordge for long enough learned to appreciate those long lunch breaks that Jenna had worked so hard to provide her girls with. Under their previous employer Hilda, a woman of almost equal girth to Jenna, everyone in the office had been afforded with an hour-long lunch break. However under Jenna, an extra thirty minutes had been added with the addition of lunch being moved back an hour, plus an extra thirty minutes at three ‘o’ clock in the afternoon.

The first break, being the longest, was the one where everyone usually flocked to their cars to go grab lunch off-site. But the second break, being a measly thirty minutes, barely left anyone enough time to whet their appetites, let alone fill their bellies. So instead of leaving, the girls would all loiter around the office like whales wading through the water.

Mellissa would usually go smoke while Alice waited on her to come back, where both women would join Courtney in the employee lounge while Christina made a coffee run. The only one who never seemed to indulge in this little commodity was, surprisingly enough, Victoria—who opted to sit at the phone in solitude while she played Candy Crush Saga.

It was just after Christina had returned from her coffee run, everyone else already crowding the break room as she came through the doorway.

“Okay, I’ve got everyone’s coffee here…” Christina squeaked as she handled the cups with care, delivering one to each corpulent cutie one by one.

“Thanks, hun.” Mellissa said off-handedly before diving back into the topic at hand, “So anyway, she’s totally getting fat, right? It’s not just me?”

“No, I think it’s you too.” Courtney jabbed as her subordinate handed her a frappe, “But you’re not wrong, Vicky’s gonna get big really quick if she keeps all of… that up.”

As the svelte girl handed Alice the last cup, the supple sweetheart the only one to thank her sincerely, Christina sat at the table opposite Mellissa. One of the many un(?)fortunate things about being the designated punching bag around the office was that Christina often missed these little juicy bits. As much as she didn’t like gossip, it was fun listening to other women be mean to other women behind their backs. Just like in high school…

“Who?” she inquired, “And what?”

Alice clicked her tongue in a matronly manner, “Don’t encourage them, Christie.” She chided, “they’re just talking about Victoria behind her back again, even though they don’t have any room to talk.”

“Well excuse me for noticing!” Mellissa cried half-defensively from her seat adjacent to Alice, “I’m well aware of every extra pound on my body, but Vicky prances around here like she’s Christina’s size!” the surly smoker gestured towards the intern for emphasis, “It’s distracting is all.”

“How big do you think she’ll get before she wises up and stops stuffing her face?” Courtney asked deviously from the other table, “I’m giving her another week before she, like, accidentally eats her hair or something and flips out.”

“Eats her hair?”

“You know what I meant!”

“What, you don’t think she can do this forever?” Mellissa asked with a greedy gulp of iced coffee, “She’ll pork up all the way ‘til Christmas at least. Then she’ll plateau. That’s what happened to me.”

“Guys, we shouldn’t talk about Vicky like that.” Alice scolded, still seated, “I mean, we all have weight problems here. We should be trying to help her, not making fun of her and betting how much weight she’ll put on!”

A slight pause as Alice’s message sunk in…

“I think she can at least get as big as Jenna.” Christina piped up, moreso for attention than an actual opinion on the matter, “Or at least, as big as Jenna is now.”

“Wow, high hopes.” Courtney added as she grabbed for a donut

“Yeah, she’s like the biggest woman I’ve ever seen!”

Alice could only remorsefully as she hung her head low, fearing for the fate of her friends’ morality as they hypocritically mocked their friend and co-worker. Still, she knew that the three of them were right. They all knew they were right, in fact the only person who didn’t seem to understand just how right they all were was Victoria herself.

The truth was that Vicky was going to get huge, and very quickly if she kept at the pace she had been going for the past week or so…

“Bet it sucks to be back here again,” Melissa said.

“Oh my god, Alice. You won’t believe how big Vicky is!” Melissa said with a grin.

“Ugh… Ugh… It was… it was good.” Alice stammered.

“Oh… cool.” Victoria said, still chewing food.

“All she does all day is just eat. I’m not sure if she actually even works here. Every once in a while she answers the phone but she is just always eating.” Courtney said.

“Look Alice, Her butt is even bigger than yours is!” Melissa joked.

Jenna’s was bigger than everyone’s but she was excluded from such competitions.

“Oh, stop it. She’s still smaller than both of you.” Alice said. It was true. She had not surpassed Melissa and Courtney’s level of obesity. However she definitely now outweighed Alice, which was quite an accomplishment.

“Yeah but still…” Courtney said.

Victoria had indeed undergone an incredible gain. She was at least 370 pounds. All day every day for a few months she was a nonstop glutton. There wasn’t a minute at work where her mouth was empty, and boy did it show. She had reached a level of fatness that was rarely seen outside of the office (It’s actually the norm in the office). It was only a few months ago that she was just a young 23 year old, at a measly 250 pounds. Now she’s already a heavy hitter. No one in the office had come close to being her size at just 23. What used to be just a chubby belly was now three big rolls of fat stacked like the Michelin man. Instead of just some chubby cheeks, she now had a huge double chin and a big fat neck. Her arms, once covered in a small layer of fat, now had big bags of fat that jiggled and hung off her bones. Her butt, which used to be two big round balls of chubbiness was now two MASSIVE slabs of wobbling flesh. Her breasts and thighs, which used to be just thick and juicy, were now so large that they were constantly in an embrace. If her Bra were like an actual cup of liquid, it would be filled to the brim. Anywhere that was once plump and covered in a simple layer of flesh now had creases and rolls and bags of hanging blubber.

Possibly the craziest thing about Victoria’s gain was that it wasn’t even over.

The office gossip surrounding Victoria was at its peak. Each time she came in the office, she seemed even fatter. Most of the office either chuckled at her sight or was horrified that she might break some furniture. Alice was starting to shift from one of the gossipers to one of the worried coworkers. Victoria was putting on weight at such a fast pace and it didn't seem like it was slowing down. Alice was sure she'd plateau at some point, but in came a 380 pound Victoria the other day and broke her belt after eating one too many snacks. Of course Victoria blamed it on shoddy craftsmanship and continued to plow through her bag of chips.

Alice wanted to help Victoria without calling out her weight gain. Since Victoria still lived in a state of delusion in regards to her weight, Alice needed to be a bit more subtle. Alice got her inspiration after watching Victoria hit up the milkshake machine a few times during the work day.

"That's it!" Alice said to herself aloud. "I'll buy her some diet shake powder. The ones that suppress your appetite. That way she won't eat nearly as much!"

Alice ran off to the vitamin store after work to get her plan in motion. She walked the aisles until she found large tubs of powder. She did her research, looking carefully for the right powder to cut down on Victoria's ravenous hunger.

Before Alice could make her choice, she got a call from her best friend.

"Marie! What's up? We haven't talked in awhile" said Alice over the phone. "WHAT? NOOO WAY? NOOO! WAY!!"

Alice became preoccupied by Marie's story and in the process accidentally grabbed the weight gain powder instead. She didn't even double check at the counter as the clerk gave her a funny look. On the way out, Alice removed the label so as not to make it obvious to Victoria what she was doing. If she just paid enough attention to what she was doing and less on Marie she could have avoided a big mistake.

-------

"What's this?" said Victoria staring at an unlabeled black plastic container on her desk.

"It's a gift!" said Alice. "I recently tried some new milkshake mix and thought of you. Really thought you would enjoy it!"

"Aww, Alice! You didn't have to do that!"

"It's nothing. Now remember. Don't share that with anyone. That is yours."

"Woah it's a really big....and...heavy tub! That's a lot of powder. I better watch out or I'll get fat off this stuff!

"Not that you have to worry about your weight, but it's actually really low in calories. It's like some kind of magic elixir."

--------

Victoria tried her first shake and loved it. In fact she immediately went back for a second helping after her first. Alice felt accomplished, but little did she know what was to happen next.

"Come on pants! You...fit...earlier this week! I just bought you!" said Victoria to herself as she struggled to button her dress pants. On Monday this week, Victoria bought a new pair of dress pants that actually were kind of swimming on her. But by Friday, she struggled to get her rear end into those pants. Victoria blamed it on her dryer shrinking her clothes (which was happening a lot lately she noted).


It was painfully obvious that the weight gain shakes had impacted Victoria in a serious way. She walked into work that day with an unbuttoned pair of dress pants and a tight sweater to cover up her wardrobe mishap.

135231222.content:
Victoria thumbed over the screen of her smartphone while the other hand fed a donut into her mouth. She had just arrived at her desk and had grabbed a few 'get her day started right' donuts. On her phone though she was checking her bank account. Her rent was due in a few days and she was just barely going to able to afford it. "But how am I going to buy new clothes over the weekend? The dryer just destroyed my last decent work skirt." She said to herself as no one else was around.

As her thoughts turned inward she continued her donut conquest, but now with both hands as she had freed the other one up. 'Maybe I can get a second job, a little gig to do after work. You know, just for a little shopping money.'

By lunch time Victoria had secured a great after work job, and shared the good news with her co-worker Alice. Victoria had poured a thick milkshake and was adding in a generous amount of he weight gain powder Alice had supplied her with. "Well since I have a shopping addiction I thought a second job would be great. So tonight I'm starting as a cashier at the Heavenly Sweet Bake shop next to here."

"Really?" Alice said with a very hesitant tone. Working at a bakery could only do worse things for Victoria's waistline, and she hadn't been getting any smaller like Alice had hoped.

"Yeah it will be great. People are always buying stuff there for the office anyway, I could probably get them a discount. And it will be so close I won't even have to walk very far." Alice was very nervous about this idea, but let it slide, she couldn't tell Victoria what to do.

So that night came and Victoria had her first shift at the bakery. It went smoothly and she learned a lot. Thankfully the job wasn't too hard because she had become quite lazy since starting her cushy office job. At the end of the night her trainer, a chubby girl who was probably still in high school, turned to Victoria and asked, "You wanna take any of these left overs home?" Victoria looked at the semi-full case of sweets and replied.

"You mean I can have any of this stuff that's here?"

"Yeah." The young girl said. "We trash it all at the end of the night so it's made fresh the next day, feel free to eat all you want to take anything that is left home." Victoria didn't have to be told twice. She ate several sweets, and carried home as many as she could, including a three layer cake covered in chocolate that someone had ordered but never picked up. Victoria ate it all, and continued this routine every time she worked. She always asked for extra closing shifts so she could eat all the baked goods she wanted.

All this snacking along with her full time snacking at her desk job only did more to inflate her waistline and the readout on the scale.

Now pushing 442 pounds, Victoria was pushing the limits of the bakery's uniform. The manager mentioned to Victoria that they were "out of options" and that she would need to bring in her own clothes. Because of the messy nature of the job (and one of the last things that still fit), Victoria decided to go with a pair of grey sweatpants. These pants didn't leave much to the imagination. I really shouldn't Victoria thought to herself. I'm so full I can barely move. And yet she was already pulling the cake out of the glass case before she could finish her thought.

"Oh no!!" screamed Victoria. The cake now laid on the floor, mostly intact.

Well...it did fall but most of it still looks good...no! I can't eat anymore. I'm sooo full. Well...I don't want this to go to waste.

RIIIIIIIP

By now this was a familiar feeling. In fact it helped loosen some of the tightness which gave her some more room for food. Plus now she had a good excuse to go out shopping.

Even though the rest of the office, even the thinner moderates who usually didn't partake in the blubber politics of the office, were gaining, victoria's weight was skyrocketing at a rapid pace, a violent, sudden increase in her weight.

But, of course, someone had to tell her. Of course, it wouldn't be an office member. You don't just tell someone they're fat, especially at Gordge, unless you wanted them taken down a notch. Fatness was power. If you weren't fat, then promotions were like rain in the desert.

And if that was true, then Stephanie Links was the Sahara. She had been a sorority girl, the typical thin blonde. She had managed to get through freshman year without a single pound gained, and even after college, she managed to avoid any weight gain. She was a brand new hire, and even with all the temptations that Gordge offered, she gained barely a single pound. So THAT'S how this place works. She saw a golden opportunity, an elevator to success. All she would have to do would be eat like a whale, and she could practically be corporate. Her plan had solidified like instant concrete, so she picked out a soda, and a bag of cheetos, and went back to her desk to begin her highway to obesity.

Meanwhile, as Victoria sat down at her desk, her uniform, which was quite snug recently, gave off a loud Shhhhhkt! Victoria looked about and she saw: At the cusp of her expansive stomach, there was a tear, through which her stomach hung out as if her shirt were open. Buttons lie on her desk and the floor, and black material lay about as if her clothes exploded off. This meant she would have to go see the Company-hired tailor. With the aid of the desk, she stood up and waddled to his office.

"Mmhmm." spoke the tailor as his measuring tape fit to the last portion of Victoria, her expansive stomach. His "measuring tape" had to be cobbled together out of two normal tapes, her stomach coming out to about 80 inches. "Well, miss Victoria, I don't exactly know how to tell you this, but, our company doesn't make uniforms to fit someone of your size. She stared on in disbelief. "Well, can't you tailor one?" The pencil-moustached tailor shook his head. "Well, no. There are certain regulations about how the company logo should be displayed, and if your uniform would be made to that size, the logo would have to be distorted. Simply put, you'd have to lose some weight to fit into the uniform. You'll be given 5 months paid leave,and if you're not down to a tailorable size before those 5 months are up, then the company will have to let you loose."

135232.content:
Unbeknownst to the remaining denizens of the corporate cage, the woman that they so eagerly discussed was not quite as absent as they had assumed.

For outside the door, cheeks pressed deeply into the wall, stood the very Victoria that they stabbed so easily in the back. Her spine curved against the white walls, despite her best attempts at adjacency, and her head turned ever so slightly into the doorway. She could hear every word that the other women had said about her—and it was quite shocking to say the least.

They weren’t exactly close or anything, she never really hung out with anyone outside of work. Mellissa and Alice were pretty tight, Courtney wasn’t really into the bar scene, and Christina was too uptight. But even still, she never would have expected for them to make such rude remarks about her weight…

One chubby brown hand traced the outline of her swollen side, inwardly measuring what felt like a mile-long stretch of taught tanned skin. She was aware that she had gained some weight working at Gordge, especially in the past few months, but… well it wasn’t like any of them had any room to talk! They were all easily some of the fattest women Vicky had ever seen!

…Except for Christina.

But whatever! Either way, women who weigh at least three-hundred pounds apiece should have no room to talk crap about someone like her—who, at best was just a little… thick! Thicker than usual! It was after the holidays, everyone picks up a few extra pounds and inches after the holidays passed right?

Still, even as she coached herself into her comfort zone, one hand slowly came to rest on her bulging pot-belly. With two fingers, she pinched her meaty lovehandle and found that it had actually joined into her waistline…

Her plump lower lip stuck out and formed a pout, the growling in her stomach completely ignored in favor of some well-earned wallowing in self-depreciation.

They wouldn’t be laughing when they all put on another fifty pounds by Easter! And Vicky knew they would—there wasn’t an ounce of self-control between any of them! She’d show them, one way or the other!

***


Something of a strange coincidence occurred the very next day, if you can believe that.

It seemed that Alice, the only woman fluent in German and not interested in counting Vicky’s calories for her, had been selected by Jessica—their CEO—to visit the Munich branch of Gordge. For some reason or another, Alice nor Jenna could really remember why, the bottom-heavy brunette was to be relocated for six months so as to monitor their company’s German sibling.

It wasn’t like she was too terribly important around the office, really just handling some clients and doing the billing, but apparently those Rosetta Stone discs had really paid off in the long run after all.

Having always wanted to travel abroad, the swollen sweetheart accepted the offer eagerly and with little deliberation. Christina was to be hired officially to take her place (much to Courtney’s dismay as she had grown quite attached to the idea of having her own personal errand-girl) and Mellissa promised to take care of her apartment while her friend was gone.

It wasn’t surprising that, in the mess of things, Alice ultimately forgot all about voracious Victoria and her ballooning belt line. That conversation in the break-room evaporated by bed that night, she’d hardly remembered it by the next morning before all this started.

So it was impossible for her to predict the great change in store for Victoria, as well as the rest of the office that would take place in her long absence…
135232.title: Vicky's Vengance

1352321.content:
Victoria had many tricks up her sleeve for her revenge on her coworkers. But perhaps the biggest factor in Victoria’s revenge wasn’t even her own doing. Alice who was supposed to be out of the office on a business trip had to back out at the last moment due to passport issues. In order to save the company from taking a big hit, Jenna went on the trip instead. This left the office with no one in charge. Technically Courtney was supposed to take over in a situation like this but while she was a good worker, she was no leader and so the office was without authority. This caused productivity to drop tremendously. Without Jenna able to sign off on decisions very little work was done. The office became like in grade school class when a clueless substitute showed up. This gave Victoria plenty of time to exact revenge.

Victoria’s first move was to leave tons of food in the office kitchen and break room. She entered the office early in the morning and left cakes and cookies and pasta all over the break room. The kitchen was already full of food anyway but it tended to get emptied before the first lunch break due to the tremendous appetites of the employees. Victoria made it so that food was always available.

Another trick up Victorias sleeve was that she was in charge of distributing mail around the office. She started giving her coworkers food with their packages and mail saying the food was from a client of the company that was a food vendor.

She also brought in large quantities of food saying that they were for Jenna but that the rest of the office could have them in Jenna’s absence. It wasn’t that hard to believe since Jenna definitely had friends in the food business.

Another of Victorias strategies was to give some of her own food to the rest of the office. Jenna had Vicky’s desk stocked full of snacks (as were everyone elses). Since Victoria was also trying to lose weight she would ask if other people wanted her food instead. She would say “Oh Melissa, do you want these doughnuts? I don’t like jelly filling.” She always came up with some thing else other than that she was trying to lose weight so that they wouldn’t get suspicious.

Victoria also had tried to hang out with her co workers more. Taking them out to lunch, talking with them during breaks, even having dinner with them after work. This allowed her to influence their eating habits more. Bringing them to all you can eat buffets, bringing them food to eat during breaks (which were a lot longer without Jenna around).

She even verbally encouraged them to eat more, often saying “that’s all your ordering?” or “I’m still hungry. Why don’t we have one more course?” She also gave them compliments on how good they looked. She would say “Have you lost weight recently?” or “You’re looking better than ever!” This gave them a false sense of security about their weight. Making them think that they weren’t gaining that much weight at all. It stopped them from noticing the effects of Victorias revenge, while also making them much more likely to eat more.

There were even more one time things that Victoria did for her revenge, but they were too specific to explain. Either way you looked at it Melissa, Courtney, Alice, and Christina were in for a surprise.
1352321.title: Vicky's revenge

choices: There's more, next week everyone Christie's stress-eating hits new heights...
Hey, how's Jenna doing in Germany by the way?
13523212.content:
And so it was Vicky’s voracious appetite for vengeance was whetted, along with the appetites of her fellow employees. Through the use of a helpful web page she’d found on the internet during her countless hours of inactivity (at work, no less) Vicky was finding more and more ways to influence the eating habits of those around her.

The trick was, Vicky had found, to look up weight loss guides that dealt with psychology and do the opposite. One guide told her that you could trick your brain into feeling fuller if you ate your meal on a larger plate, so the very next day the bottom-heavy secretary went out and replaced all the paper plates in the break room with ones that were the same color, but noticeably smaller. Another said that if a dieter thought about eating unhealthy food while eating better, the hacked outcome would result in weight loss. So, as a precaution, every time she ate with her co-workers, she would talk about diets she had researched that involved leafy greens and healthy foods. Just to be safe.

And lots of others, while she was at it. No soft lighting because it affected the sensors in the brain somehow. When Vicky invited them out, she would only take them to restaurants with fluorescent bulbs flickering overhead. When bringing food from home, she would pile bigger portions on the smaller plates. Vicky had even gone so far as to stay up late some nights and home-make complicated recipes from her Nana’s cookbook (the overconsumption of such cookery a major source of self-esteem issues for her in childhood!)

The results were… predictable.

One Thursday morning at the office, just past nine ‘o’ clock, everyone sans Jenna was working as diligently as their overstuffed little fingers would allow them to. Courtney in the back was teaching Jenna’s temporary replacement how to sign into the company account for the fifteenth time, Christie was working herself ragged to do Courtney’s work while she was otherwise occupied, and Alice was handling the Zimmerman account—rather than enjoying a nice trip across the pond due to an expired passport.

She sat at her computer screen, wide eyes reflecting yet another complaint from her ficklest of customers, while she idly lifted a chip to her mouth. She took a half-bite, little crumbs dotting the corners of her mouth, while she worked diligently. With every keystroke, Alice’s doughy upperarms quivered wildly. At every movement she made, in fact, her body shook like soft ivory gelatin. However the quaking and quivering reverberating in her stomach and spreading slowly throughout her rippling mass was not her doing.

Heavy footsteps shook the floor beneath her as Melissa returned from her trek to the company break room. As per usual, her friend’s mighty bobbing belly was the first thing that peered past the opening of her tiny office. In her flabby arms were an absolute armful of snacks and treats, at least one of every variety that the black box in the break room could provide. Alice pursed her lips and raised her eyebrows as she heard Melissa struggle to sit, no doubt her friend’s overconsumption over the past few days was beginning to catch up with her.

“Hey…” Melissa wheezed, Alice could hear her struggling to open up her own bag of chips, “Al, you gotta go check out the break room.”

Alice pushed herself away from the desk and swiveled around, her girth swaying ever so slightly with the force of the action. She looked to Melissa, who had two cans of Dr. Pepper nestled snugly between her heaving hooters.

“Is that where you got all that from?” Alice asked incredulously as she scoped the magnificence of Melissa’s meal, “Mel, I thought you were saving up for that treadmill?”

Melissa pssh’awwed at the notion, little yellow crumbs spewing slightly in Alice’s direction

“Like I’d actually pay for all of this!” Melissa said in a half-whisper, “The vending machine’s open, like wide open! I think when that guy in the little brown shorts came to refill it (Mm! those brown shorts!) he forgot to close it or something.”

“Melissa…” Alice chastised, putting her hands on her lovehandles sternly, “That’s stealing.”

“It’s lucky is what I call it.” Melissa said greedily before tipping the bag over her head and allowing several chips to cascade down onto her tongue, “Sh’the besht thing thatsh happened to me all week!”

Alice sighed, shaking her head for the sake of her gluttonous friend. She was heavy, very heavy mind you, but at least she tried to do something about it (once in a while… every now and then…maybe…). She had talked with Melissa just yesterday about dieting over lunch, even Vicky had gotten really into the discussion! But as soon as someone presented unlimited free access to the vending machine, Melissa’s mind went right to how much she could grab before anyone else could…

What’s worse was that things seemed to be falling apart around here left and right with Jenna gone to Germany. First the soda machine broke, then the freezer shorted out and everyone had to eat everything in there before it went bad, and now the vending machine was just open for everyone to stick their greedy little fingers in. Jenna should never have left…

Suddenly a loud BANG! Caught her attention, causing the bottom-heavy brunette to duck instinctively towards the computer. It seemed everyone did, the collective groan of overloaded office chairs could be heard all around the office. After a moment of silence, everyone regained their senses. Alice looked behind her, towards her cubicle wall, to find a little button wedged tightly around a crack…

Alice turned around to see Melissa, grinning abashedly. One of the gaps on her blouse had widened exponentially, allowing a big circle of her belly to be seen by all…

“Hehe…” she giggled nervously, “S-Sorry Al…”
13523212.title: Corpulent Corporate Calamity

135232121.content: Christina wasn’t as easy to fatten as Alice, Melissa, and Courtney. Lucky for Victoria, it became much easier after Jenna left. Due to Jenna’s absence Christina was officially hired and made Courtney’s unofficial apprentice/secretary. A more appropriate term would be that she was Courtney’s bitch. Courtney promptly dumped all her work on Christina. This made Christina, who was already a very high strung person, incredibly stressed. All that stress caused Christina to eat. Usually a very healthy eater, she had found comfort in eating sugary, fatty, and greasy food. This was bad news for Christina since her mentor, Courtney always had food nearby (she also always had food in her mouth, on her shirt, in her pocket, in her stomach, in her car, on her desk, in her desk, under her desk, in her bag, in her purse, in her dreams, and on her mind). Victoria, who was clearly smarter than anyone had estimated, caught on to this development in Christina’s psyche. Victoria figured out that as long as she brought up work in conversation with Christina, she would start to eat. Victoria just needed to have food available close by. Just a “so how’s that assignment coming?” would set Christina off on a binge. Victoria watched with delight as each time Christina started to eat more and more. The first stress induced binge involved only 2 doughnuts. As Victoria exploited Christina’s weakness over and over again her appetite increased as well. 2 doughnuts became three, and then three doughnuts became 2 doughnuts and 2 twinkies, etc. needless to say the results of such binges started to show.

1352321211.content:
As people started their breaks, employees filtered into the break room. Courtney waddled in first. Her huge gut hanging lower than ever before. She sat down on two chairs now that her butt required it. Then Melissa came along with a box of doughnuts. Next came Alice who’s gut was completely exposed by her shirt which was missing several buttons. She plopped herself down on the chair with a heavy thud.

“Wow Alice. Gained weight much?” Melissa said with a smirk on her fat face. Alice spread her legs apart to give space for her tremendous naked double belly.

“You have too.” Alice said. Melissa had definitely also gained. The two friends were absolutely exploding out of their clothes.

“You know who’s gained weight? Christy!” Melissa said.

“I know she-“ just then Victoria entered the room.

“Do you guys want something from the fridge?” Victoria asked. She knew her coworkers were much more willing to eat when it was delivered to them.

“Yeah. Hand me those twinkies on the counter.” Courtney said.

“Nah I got doughnuts.” Melissa said.

“Oh and Alice I found this box of cookies with your name on it.”

“Really where?” Alice asked.

“Oh just in a cabinet somewhere. You probably just forgot about them.” Victoria said. She handed the box to Alice. She sat down next to Courtney. Vicky
watched the three bloated women stuff themselves.

“So what’re you guys talking about,” Victoria asked.

“Chrishty getting fat.” Melissa said with a doughnut in her mouth.

“Oh yeah she definitely gained some.” Victoria said.

“She’s a total blimp.” Courtney added. Adjusting her huge bottom on the two chairs she used to sit.

“Yeah I don’t know how she let herself go like that.” Melissa said. Just then a button flew off her shirt and her gut pushed forward. “Oops,” she said, shoving another doughnut into her mouth.

“Melissa I think that’s a sign that your in no position to *burp* criticize anyone’s weight,” Alice said.

“Well she has definitely started eating more.” Victoria added.

“Yeah Alice even you can admit she’s gained a lot.” Courtney said.

“Well… She does seem a lot *CRASH*” Mid-sentence Alice fell to the ground as her chair gave way under her tremendous bottom and gut. Alice’s flabby body jiggled violently.

“HAHAHA Alice. I told you, you gained weight!” Melissa cackled.

“You did too!” Alice said, angry and embarrassed. She flopped around on the floor like a beached whale.

“Well at least I didn’t break a *CRASH*” Melissa’s chair crumpled under her heavy gut. Melissa dropped to the floor with a THUD. The two women squirmed on the floor. Finally Alice quit trying to lift herself and just started to eat the rest of her cookies as she lay on the floor.
