choices: Jenna returns to find that the office has gone through some BIG changes...
Somehow, Vicky's plan backfires...
13523212111.content:
As the days became weeks, and the weeks became months, Jenna’s much-anticipated return Stateside was rapidly approaching. According to the company newsletter, Jenna’s style of employee motivation had done wonders for Gordge overseas. Gordge’s German sister branch had increased productivity, so much so that they were receiving a well-visit from the owner herself as a reward for their miraculous turn in productivity.

The American branch, however, was not faring quite so well.

With Jenna gone and her laughably incompetent replacement barely able to pluck the strings on what was once a fine corporate machine, productivity had certainly gone down Stateside. Though, truthfully, only so much of it was the fault of incompetent leadership. The blame had to settle on some unwillingness to work lower on the totem pole, just as those who were unwilling had settled into a life of ease and halfassery. And pawning their work onto Christie and Alice.

Yes, it was true, Melissa and Courtney weren’t very good at their jobs if someone wasn’t hovering over their shoulders. They would take breaks, extend their normal breaks, sometimes take little naps at their desks after a long day of not doing much of anything. Fortunately for them, Alice was too much of a goody-two-shoes to let the whole company suffer for her friends’ lethargy, and Christie was a real pushover who was eager to prove herself.

So Melissa would spend her whole day at her desk idly twiddling her thumbs while she attempted to make conversation with Alice. When she wasn’t goofing off, Melissa could usually be found in the break room. It was practically her office now, and it showed in her rapidly expanding figure as well as her sharp decrease in wearable attire.

“Phmumum…” Melissa managed through a mouthful of spicy Doritos, her new office chair already on its absolute last legs of support

“What?” Alice asked, not looking from her computer screen as she balanced (Melissa’s) books on one of their more important accounts, “You know I can’t hear you when you… Melissa, are you still eating those Doritos?”

The brunette beluga took a big swig of Coke before her response, her mouth ill-equipped to deal with the subtle spiciness of her latest in a long line of snacks

“No, this is a new bag.” She said smarmily

“Melissa, you know that I—“

“Hey, ease off.” Melissa answered somewhat testily, “I don’t want to hear about how much I eat today, I’ve had a rough morning.”

“Jeeze, sorry…” Alice almost whispered, turning back to her computer screen. She paused before continuing, “You wanna talk about it?”

“Doh…” she said huskily though another mouthful of orange chips, readjusting her belly beneath her blouse and leaving little orange fingerprints on the taut surface of her tent-like attire.

What Melissa didn’t want to talk about was the fact that her planetary paunch was finally too big for her to drive to work anymore. For weeks now, and indeed since she’d started working at Gordge all those years ago, she’d been scooting the seat back farther and farther. And even last week she had been able to deal with the rough steering wheel brushing against her belly. But finally it had happened—she was actually too big to make any necessary turns!

There was another pause, filled only with the sound of Alice’s deceptively swift fingers typing away at the keyboard. Melissa looked up, a pout on her porcine face, and asked

“I think I’m gonna go car shopping later today… you wanna come?”

“I can’t.” Alice said apologetically, “I promised Courtney I’d stay after and handle the Wallaby account.” At Melissa’s utter dismay, Alice began to backpedal, “B-But I’m sure you could take Vicky! I don’t think she’s doing anything later today.”

“Yeah, I guess…” Melissa said sadly, “You wanna meet up with us later for dinner if we go out?”

“You always go out.” Alice smiled, “Sure, if I’m not too busy we’ll all go eat together.”

Which was true. Every time Vicky was around the office girls, they always seemed to be eating. More than usual. Usual being relative to the last time that they had eaten, actually. The bottom-heavy secretary had done a wonderful job rewiring her employees so that they were constantly snacking. They could, and often did, get back from one of their great gorges in the food court at the mall and go right to the break room for a snack.

And their appetites were only getting more and more intense as the office failed to accommodate such unabashed gluttony and lack of restraint. Swivel chairs snapped in two if ladies weren’t careful with how they sat, and Courtney had personally requested that the vendor company for their snack machines come twice a week instead of every Monday. Alice and Mel could no longer enter the double doors simultaneously, as they were wont to do, and Courtney could barely squeeze through the doorway to the break room!

To Vicky, it was karmatic justice at its finest.
13523212111.title: Vicky's Victory

135232121111.content:
Jenna finally had arrived back from her trip to Germany. She was quite a few pounds heavier than when she left. As she entered the office she walked by Victoria. She hadn’t seemed to change much other than maybe a few more extra pounds. She then waddled to her office and sat at her desk. She heard someone enter her office. She looked up to see it was Christina. At least she thought it was Christina. This person had a belly and D cups. Her thighs touched and even jiggled a bit!
“Hey Jenna just wanted to say welcome back!” Christina said. She then went back to work.

A few minutes later loud footsteps were heard approaching Jenna’s office. Alice stood in the entrance to Jenna’s office as she struggled to fit through the doorway. Alice’s 420 pound body just barely made it into the office. Alice’s big fleshy hips were as wide as Jen’s desk and the two wobbling pillows of blubber she called a butt were the size of some sofa cushions. Literally the world’s biggest sweetheart, Alice finally had the belly of a morbidly obese person. Once just a chubby persons belly, Alice’s flabby gut had grown into a trio of mighty blubber rolls. Another shocking development in Alice’s overfed appearance was her massive boobs. Alice always had great boobs (through thin and thick) but WOW were they bigger than ever. Her chest was a perfect slab of jiggling soft flesh, divided by the incredibly long crease that was her cleavage. Her massive breasts bounced and rippled, resting on her large belly like a flabby throne. Jenna wasn’t even sure what she actually said she just stared at her body. Alice then left and went back to her desk.

More time went by and then Courtney walked into Jenna’s office. Or at least she tried to. She tried to enter through the door sideways. But her thick middle was too big. Eventually after a lot of work she slid through the entrance. Jenna was again taken aback by the appearance of her employee. Courtney was absolutely enormous at about 480 pounds. Courtney was nearing Jenna’s level of fatness. A level of fatness where folds just appeared everywhere. Bone and joint had been buried in many layers of fat. Looking at Courtney you couldn’t even tell where her spine ended and her legs began. There were just large slabs of fat rubbing against other bags of fat. Her organs were protected by an almost cartoonishly thick casing of gelatinous blubber. Even If you dug your hands into Courtney’s many creases and folds you’d never find any evidence of a rib cage. Courtney left, barely, and went back to her desk.

The last person to enter Jenna’s office that day was Melissa. After seeing the other employees of the office already Jenna was a bit more prepared for Melissa’s appearance than with the other girls. However when Jenna looked up to the figure standing before her desk, her jaw dropped. Everything about Melissa’s appearance was piggish. She couldn’t of been less than 500 hundred pound. Melissa was literally pouring out of her clothes. All the gelatinous fat she had once been able to cram in her pants had now overflowed. Her enormous middle spilled over the front of her pants. Her bottom belly roll hung like a doughy curtain over her private parts. The top half of her body was simply swollen. The top of her overfed gut looked puffy and bloated as it was crushed by her two completely swollen blobs of fat that were her breasts. They could barely be classified as boobs since they had become so smothered in fat. Melissa wasn’t so much wearing her shirt as much as the shirt was barely hanging on her bulges of fat. The shirt looked like open curtains at a theater. And if her shirt was the curtains than her belly was the stage. Almost every inch of Melissa’s creamy white belly flesh was on display. As Melissa turned around to exit Jen’s office, Jenna caught a glimpse of Melissa’s bulging backside. Her two inflated cheeks completely filled out the back of her pants. A good 4 inches of her deep crack showed over the top of her pants. Her butt had managed to have something like a muffin top effect as her pants dug into the enormous blob of fat that was her backside. As Melissa went back to her desk Jenna’s mouth agape at the sight of the new Melissa.

choices: Disheartened by her failure, Vicky lets herself go and gains even more.
Frustrated by failure, Vicky focuses her revenge fattening on Alice!
135232121112.content:
"Aahhh" Vicky let out a loud sigh as she unbuttoned her work slacks. She leaned back in her extra-wide-yet-undersized swivel chair and smiled, drumming one hand on her free belly and the other reaching for a chocolate and peanut butter smoothie, her fourth of the morning so far. Victoria rationalized that she was going to need the energy for the grueling day ahead of her. In the past couple months of scheming, Victoria had been taking a much more active role in fattening her co-workers. Courtney and Melissa were always game for a good meal but Alice and Christina often needed a little encouragement or just a little push to convince them to get that next serving at the buffet. Vicky had become exceptionally skilled at sweet-talking Alice into not feeling guilty for not stopping at three desserts or at coaxing Christina into making her next cheeseburger a triple instead of a double. Of course, Vicky was eating pretty much the same portions as everyone else when they went out to eat or binged in the break room, but she had to keep everything looking natural, right?

The problem started to develop when the girls all stopped eating at the same time.

Some days, Alice and Melissa would take their lunch break together followed by Courtney then Christina, other days Christina would bring a big lunch then still want to go out to eat after Courtney had already gotten back from the buffet, other days Melissa would order out for the office without realizing Alice and Christina had already brought leftovers from First Lunch.

And Victoria bore witness to all of it. The girls were already so used to seeing Victoria gorge right alongside them with every meal, always making sure it seemed like the obscene amount of food they put away each sitting wasn't the slightest bit unnatural, so it made sense to ask her if she was free. After all, the supersized secretary was actually just a little overqualified for her job, so she rarely had much left to actually do except eat to begin with.

"Hey Vicky!" Courtney would say from across the office. "I'm going to Juan Gringo's for Second Lunch. You coming this time?" Naturally, if Courtney hadn't been so overwhelmingly distracted by the rumbling from her belly, she would notice Victoria already elbow deep in homemade lasagna and macaroni salad with Christina, numerous scattered chicken bones and crumbled sandwich wrappers serving as the only remaining testament to the first half of the sizeable meal that left poor Christina cradling her pooching stomach in a mixture of discomfort and satisfaction.

"You go ahead," Christina would try to say, "I'm so stuffed."

"No way girl! You're barely eating anything today," Vicky would coo softly, serving the two of them another portion of lasagna and macaroni. "And Mommy just loves that you're in love with her cooking!" Christina would groan deeply, adjust her work slacks and resolutely pick her fork back up. At this point, Christie didn't even bother arguing.

"Yes or no, babe?" Victoria would hear.

"Yea, let me finish up with Tina and then we can go pick up Alice. I think she said she wanted to go out too."

And that slowly became the new office routine. Vicky would be sure to breeze through her morning work routine as quickly as possible to hunker down and get ready for what she was now inwardly calling the "lunch gauntlet", three or four hours of almost back to back meals where Vicky "supervised" the individual girls' portion sizes and gave them dieting advice or hot tips on new restaurants.

Normally, Victoria would be concerned about eating three or four super heavy lunches a day, but she knew she had to play the part to avoid any suspicion. And she had to eat just as much as they did at each separate outing so as to not make the girls feel self-conscious about their portion sizes, especially Alice.

"Ha, Alice," she sneered. The quiet blonde hadn't been nearly as harsh in her criticisms of her increasingly corpulent colleague, but Victoria was hardly one to discriminate. Vicky loved seeing what all the extra weight was doing to Alice's already overblown hourglass. "Biggest ass in the office?" Vicky smirked to no one in particular, remembering that rude comment but not who said it. "Not for long, honey."

It was Alice's ample ass that made her a particular target for the porcine plotter. Already extremely top-heavy, with a sizeable belly to boot, it seemed like Alice's recent surge in size had predominantly gone southward. Alice's hips absolutely poured out of any chair she sat on, armrests being completely out of the question. Hips so wide Alice might soon get stuck if she tried to waddled into the break room without turning sideways. Yes, Alice waddled now. With thighs so fat forcing her to widen the arcs of her footsteps, the former fit cheerleader could only shuffle along as fast as she could swing one jiggling, chafing thigh past another.

Alice was ballooning in size, having even surpassed Melissa in weight, no small feat indeed, and teetering somewhere in the high 400s meant she was inching closer in size to Courtney or even Jenna before she left!

Victoria couldn't have been happier, and it might have been that happiness that led to her being distracted. See, Victoria herself had needed the armrests removed from her swivel chair too even though it was one of Jenna's extras. But on the day that that happened, Vicky had gotten so frustrated that she took Melissa to an all-you-can-eat burger buffet and hadn't left until Melissa had put away enough beef to leave herself in a food coma.

And on the day months prior where Vicky herself had gotten stuck in the break room door frame, she had decided to drown her sorrows by drowning Alice in cake and ice cream, then quickly put the event out of her mind and simply grew accustomed to turning sideways.

Victoria herself was already quite familiar with the sensation of chafing on her thighs, and had far slower and more plodding waddle than Alice. Melissa might have needed to buy a new car to accommodate her gigantic, rippling middle, but Victoria had finally needed to splurge for one with a strong suspension and plenty of room for her hips.

Vicky finished the rest of her smoothie then began the arduous task of standing up from her chair. It sure had been getting rather difficult lately, she noted. It was about time to round up a couple of the girls for first lunch. With a quick rock back and forth, she heaved herself upright with an unladylike grunt and braced her desk for support. Then she glacially navigated herself from behind the front desk and set off at her uneasy slow pace.

Walking was getting exhausting lately. Vicky trudged along at the pace of a snail, wobbling past unoccupied cubicles towards the break room. Reaching the door and finding the room empty, she momentarily leaned against the frame to catch her breath. Then, she turned sideways and began her teetering, awkward unbalanced shuffle. Only to find herself stuck. That was new.

Vicky looked down with surprise. Her fat, fluffy belly was pressed tight against one end of the door frame and her massive, bulging left butt cheek oozed over the other. Vicky frowned and pushed herself harder with a grunt. Damnit, she thought, I thought Courtney had gotten the stupid doorframe widened!

In fact, Courtney had. It was the same day Vicky and Alice had gone out shopping for looser work pants. The same pants she had left unbuttoned now. Vicky had humorously remarked that the shade of her pants were the same as the office chair she had been using at the time. The same office chair that had snapped under Victoria's weight weeks ago.

"Vicky? Uh oh, Honey. You okay there?"

Speak of the devil, Vicky thought, her mood officially less than pleasant.

"Courtney!" she angled her head toward her friend and huffed, " I thought you said you were getting the door to the break room widened."

"Umm, I did, babe, was the belly-heavy belle's reply. "Remember? We talked about how cute some of the construction guys were.." Courtney rubbed the top of her stomach absentmindedly. Vicky being stuck in the doorway was an immediate obstruction to her casserole and that meant heaving her out was the morbidly obese manager's immediate priority.

"Then why do I have like, no space? Omigosh how does anybody else fit through here!?"

"We all fit fine ever since," Courtney mused, calmly scratching her second chin. "Well, Alice's hips still brush the sides a little bit, but at least she doesn't have to turn sidew-" Courtney quickly looked her beleaguered coworker up and down. "Well, at least she fits," she quickly concluded.

"Everyone else still fits? Even Alice?" Vicky said, more to herself than to her colleague. Now it was time for Vicky to look Courtney up and down. The woman was massive, anyone could see that. She was the reason the doors had even originally been widened in the first place, and, since then, she certainly hadn't stopped widening herself. But Courtney and everyone could squeeze through just fine? That didn't make any sense.

And that's when the realization hit Victoria with all the force of a massively obese woman crashing to the ground after settling down on an overburdened swivel chair. The reason why Courtney, Alice and even Melissa always made sure to remember to invite Vicky to lunch or bring her back something if they went without her. The reason why Alice simply politely smiled, nodded and kept her head down any time Vicky slipped her some "pro" diet advice. The reason why Christina always felt okay with having another slice if Vicky was having two.

Because all of them, even Courtney, felt figuratively and literally overshadowed by Victoria's increasing mass. Completely consumed with watching the other girls fatten up themselves, Vicky had become the fattest girl in the office.
135232121112.title: Hips Don't Lie

choices: Excluding Tina, Jenna returns to find herself the "skinny girl" in the office!
Alice and Vicky are developing some serious mobility issues..
1352321211121.content:
Victoria gave up shortly after that. With just a few months left before Jenna's return the irate Italian had given up on fattening up anyone else in the office and resigned herself to listlessly munching the majority of her time between meals away, silently fuming about her predicament.

"It's their fault I'm so huge!" she had said to herself. "First those hypocrites tease me about getting fat, then I completely fuck up my diet trying to get them to fatten up some more," she thought, deflecting blame like only a millennial could. "And now I'm like, super super fat and they're probably just going to be even bigger assholes about it."

Only, time showed that Victoria was wrong. As the next few months lulled on by, no mean or hateful comments surfaced behind Vicky's back. The girls still all invited Vicky to lunch or ate together when they could, they all gossiped together about how big Jenna might be when she got back from Germany, they all shared their diet and weight struggles together when chatting in the break room. It seemed that what had honestly started as manipulation on Victoria's part had actually blossomed into friendships simply from the amount of time the girls spent hanging and gorging together. Now that she was off of her fattening kick, Victoria was spending the same amount of time with her co-workers but actually beginning to enjoy herself.

And the mean comments never came. Victoria was still the biggest girl in the office, but it was more fun to include her in talking about Jenna than it was to talk about her behind her back; nobody wanted to hurt her feelings. In a shocking display of inner maturity, Victoria began to think that her co-workers' cattiness towards her in the past might have had a lot more to do with how distant and sometimes outright cold she was toward them. With Victoria finally becoming fast friends with her employees, they'd never dream of upsetting their increasingly corpulent secretary. And as a result, Victoria almost felt bad for trying to fatten up her coworkers in the first place. Almost.

It wasn't like Vicky hadn't payed the price. After submitting a request to have the break room door widened again, she'd lumbered off at the end of the day to see about her sartorial problems and had, as usual, put the whole event of getting stuck behind her. This continued to be the routine for Victoria. Having hypercharged the appetites of the other girls in the office, Vicky was paying the consequences now as she found herself constantly being surrounded by food, constantly being asked out to eat, constantly being brought extra helpings and leftovers from concerned colleagues. She wasn't quite aware of this herself, but she ate quite a bit more than anyone in the office, and that was certainly saying something. Vicky may have thrown in the towel with getting her new girlfriends to gain weight, but they hardly needed the help anymore.

In the last half year or so, each office girl had undergone a rather shocking horizontal growth spurt. Christina had kissed the 200s goodbye some time ago and was poised to start knocking on 400's door any day now. She now cradled a quite considerable belly, particularly whenever she had eaten a large meal. Said belly may have been large, constantly jiggling and protruding wherever she went, but it still had absolutely nothing on Melissa's.

The bubbly brunette had only gotten more bubble-shaped as time passed. Her great, wobbly orb of a stomach filled out the entirety of her lap and was finally beginning to overtake her knees when she sat down. It stuck out obscenely far in front of her, sagging down heavily when she stood and jiggling constantly as it slapped against her thighs when she walked. The thighs in question didn't hold a candle to Alice's or Vicky's, not yet, but there was more than enough girth to cause Melissa to have trouble with pants even when she left her enormous belly untucked and the zipper undone. That was hardly an issue for Mel, though. Always one to prioritize comfort over anything else, Melissa was content to sit back and let her massive midsection dominate her appearance. Nobody could blame the girl whenever she popped a button on a recently purchased blouse since few people could fathom how she even buttoned her blouses anymore; Melissa was clearly starting to have difficulty reaching past her belly. Being one of the shorter girls in the office meant that, even though she was a few dozen pounds lighter than Courtney, she had the widest waist in the office. Not that the other belly-heavy babe wasn't giving her some serious competition, though.

Courtney was becoming so shockingly obese that even Jenna pre-Germany paled to her in size. Her heavy, two-tiered tummy absorbed so many of the bovine brunette's caloric intake that it actually managed to distract from the enormous, fantastically heavy breasts that rested on top of the upper roll. Courtney had to be close to 600 pounds now. However, bottom-heavy hourglass Alice had surpassed "close to" some time ago.

If Vicky had shown any particular fervency towards thickening Alice, it certainly showed. Alice had left the 600 pound mark in the dust recently, and didn't seem to be slowing down one bit. She had continued to bottom out with her weight gain, leading to stupendously wide hips and an ass that jutted so far away from her that she was actually taller than Courtney when the two of them sat down. Fatter than she had ever been in her life, Alice's hips cleared a wide, wide berth for her wherever she went, whether it be the Fatburger counter for another discount family meal or the food court at the mall after a wardrobe adjustment.

Of course, those hips completely and utterly paled in comparison to Victoria's.

Nobody else in the office had grown like Victoria had in the past several months. Being both fatter than anyone else in the office and more proportionally bottom-heavy than even Alice was, The ultrasized Italian bombshell took up a LOT of space whenever she needed to sit down, which was often. Dainty, plump feet and thick, meaty calves exploded into impractically thick thighs that had no hope of separating from each other no matter how wide a stance Vicky took. Each leg must have had a greater circumference than a beer keg at their thickest point and the ass that they supported was simply breathtaking.

Like oversized twin yoga balls, Vicky's giant, unbelievably fat ass extended so far behind her that, even when turned sideways she was still wider than Melissa or Courtney at the hips. Victoria had no hope of fitting into any slacks that weren't custom made, and had just as much luck with attempting to wear dresses. Dresses rode up her titanic thighs, hugging her absurdly wide hips and leaving Victoria's monumental bubble butt free to jiggle as much as it pleased as she waddled from her desk to the break room or to the vending machine and back.

Sure, G cups were certainly nothing to scoff at, and Victoria's double belly may have been looking more and more like Courtney's each day, particularly after a very "fulfilling" lunch break, but nothing compared Victoria's incredible ass and, with the rate it was growing, few things probably ever would. Not even Alice's mighty, jutting rear needed as sturdy and wide a sitting space as the supersized secretary. Victoria's outstanding, bench-bending butt had no hope fitting through any standard doorway, sideways or not, and her ridiculously wide hips stuck out just a little bit farther than her thick love handles with every passing day.

Poor Vicky was closing in on 700 pounds, and if the strain her hips were putting on her outfit were any indication of things to come, she didn't seem to show much sign of stopping.
1352321211121.title: No Food Like Comfort Food

choices: Oh but she can. Jenna returns, six months of Vicky's scheming later...
Victoria has her coworkers outgrowing the office.
1352321212.content:
It was only a matter of time until these subtle psychoactive modifications began to take their toll on the well-fed ladies of Gordge Incorporated even in the absence f their scheming secretary. The hardships of picking up the slack where Jenna had left off was hard enough (moreso on some than others). Jenna’s absence had certainly caused a vacuum effect in the workload around the office, as her replacement was hardly up to par with what everyone had become accustomed to.

“Can you believe her?” Courtney guffawed audibly as she leaned onto the counter, her backfat spilling onto the clean countertop, “Actually suggesting that I work through my three ‘o’ clock break so I can get some assignment done.”

Christina, always seated nearby, hung her head low between her hands at her mentor’s mentioning of the assignment in question. She could only grumble under her breath as the whopping woman easily snacked on a jelly-filled donut.

The peculiar way with which the colossal Courtney tended to half-sit on the countertop in the breakroom was somewhat understandable for a woman of her size. She was big, and being so big naturally meant that she was quite heavy. Her feet often got tired with her standing for any period of time, so it was only natural for her to seek solace from actually supporting her own great girth. However today, as it had for the past few days or so, Courtney’s gut seemed to hang just a little bit lower. Her second chin just a bit fuller, and her cheeks a bit rounder. Her blouses, well-tailored for a woman of her size as always, seemed to be fitting snugger across her general expanse.

And it was no wonder, this had been her fourth donut in fifteen minutes. On top of lunch, where she and the girls had gone to the food court. And then there was before that, where she’d come in to acquire her usual breakfast of no less than seven items from the vending machine. To say nothing of how quickly her stash of junk was diminishing from her desk…

“Yeah, I don’t like her either.” Melissa added as she scarfed down a honeybun, “She said that I shouldn’t eat when I have customers on the line. I mean, I know that, it was like a one time thing! Seriously, get off my ass.”

Alice idly reached into the box of donuts, claiming at least one before Melissa and Courtney managed to go through them all (again…) She grabbed two, an apple-filled one, her personal favorite, and then a crème filled one that was particularly plump. She eyed it for a second, squeezing it a little before determining its contents. As she herself was not a big fan of crème-filled donuts, and she’d rather have someone other than Courtney eat one, she quietly turned to Christie.

“Hey Christie, do you like crème-filled donuts?” she asked kindly as the scrawny ex-intern picked lifelessly at her salad, “I mean, they’re almost gone and I know how you—“

“God yes” Christie answered emphatically, snatching the donut from Alice’s chubby hands and stuffing nearly half the whole thing in her mouth, “Sho shtreshed out lately.”

Alice watched as the mousey mentee tore her meal apart with an intensity she hadn’t seen since Melissa or Courtney after losing an important client. After she finished the first one, which wasn’t long, Christie actually reached into the box and pulled out two more for herself and put them on top of her salad.

“Sorry…” she apologized genuinely, “It’s just… God, I didn’t know working here was going to be so tough on my nerves.”

“Well it’s not.” Alice answered with a smile, “at least, not for everyone. We all know Courtney works you too hard.”

Christie rolled her eyes, “Way too hard…” she said with a huff, “I just don’t understand why we don’t put Vicky on duty with us. I mean, we hardly ever get phone calls, everything’s done by e-mail. You’d think that Jenna would have put her on computers with us.”

Alice exhaled grievously, “I know, I know, but that’s just how it works in the real world hun.” She said softly, “Tell you what, why don’t you come out to eat with me and the girls tonight? Vicky actually showed us a really great buffet—“

“The one on Main?” Christie half-answered, “I know that one. We went there last week.”

“Did you like it?”

“Oh I loved it.” She answered with a smile, “Maybe once Ms. Jenna gets back we can all go together. Something tells me she’d like it there.”

“Something tells me she’s already been there and cleaned the place out.” Alice answered wryly, “She’s actually not allowed to eat lunch at some of the restaurants around here anymore.”

“Wow, that’s crazy.” Christie said with a little whistle, “But I believe it.”

“All I believe—“ Melissa chimed in, having heard bits and pieces between her conversation with Courtney, “Is that while she’s off in Germany, everyone over here suddenly loses their minds.” She said with a huff, “I say we stick her with all the work she pawned off on us.”

“You should be happy, considering how much you like to flirt with our clients.” Courtney said with a slurp of her coffee

“Sh-Shut up!”

“Anyway, all I can say is…” Courtney stifled a burp, one hand going to stroke her bloated midsection as its many many contents churned violently inside, “Jenna can’t come back soon enough…”

Jenna wasn’t the biggest fan of travel (or movement for that matter). She did however want the company to do well, which made her trip to Germany worth the uncomfortableness of traveling. Jenna waited at her gate. She managed to eat 4 snickers bars before the boarding of the plane started. She walked up to the airline employees near the plane entrance and handed over her ticket. The three workers stared wide eyed at Jenna’s 500+ pound body. One of them even let out a sigh.

“One moment ma’am.” The airline worker said, still holding Jenna’s ticket. She turned around and whispered something to an employee behind her. The employee then jogged through the gate into the plane. The female worker then handed Jenna her ticket. “Have a nice flight.”
Jenna, a bit confused by what just happened, waddled her way into the plane. She was hopeful that this would be a good flight for her because she got the company to get her into business class. As she walked to her seat her wide hips rubbed against the two rows of aisle seats. She finally made it to her seat. She was exhausted as she put he bags down. She couldn’t believe how small the seats were in business class. She sat down with a heavy thud. after everyone had been seated The flight attendants checked for seat belts. As Jenna fidgeted with her seat belt, which barely got around her hips, a flight attendant asked her “do you need any help, miss?”

“Yeah, I err… need an extender for my seat belt.” Jenna said. The Flight attendant returned with the extender. “I actually need you to put in on for me.” Jenna said realizing her gut was way to big around for her to attach the extender.

“Ugh sure miss.” The attendant said timidly. She attached the extender to one side. She pulled it around Jennas doughy middle. The extender barely got past her belly button. “Actually, miss. You’re gonna need another extender.” The flight attendant said. She fetched another extender. She came back and attached the other extender to the other side of the seat belt. As she pulled the two extenders together she dug her hands into Jenna’s flabby flesh. They just managed to click together around jennas mass.

141.content: Gordge Enterprises was founded in 1943. It has risen to international success. Gordge was founded on a very unusual philosophy. From its founding, Gordge enterprises has had fat female employees. This was mostly due to Gordge’s first employees being housewives who had to find a job while their husbands were at war. For some reason in those early years of the company the employees always seemed to gain weight. This was probably due to the sedentary lifestyle of the office worker as well as Stephanie Gordge’s (The founder of Gordge Enterprises) insistence on having fresh doughnuts at every meeting (she was quite the landwhale herself). At first this unusual trend of weight gain in their employees was just considered an unimportant coincidence but eventually it became ingrained in the company’s identity. There became an unwritten rule in the company that “a Gordge Employee should be fat” and “a fat employee is a good employee.” Rarely are these traditions discussed openly, in fact only the higher ups at Gordge are fully aware that they exist. However, despite the majority of Gordge employees being completely oblivious to Gordge’s weird tradition of fat employees, The higher ups at Gordge made sure to keep the tradition going. This leads us to Lauren Gordge, the current CEO of Gordge Enterprises. Being an actual member of Gordge family she saw nothing wrong with the “gorging at Gordge” and considered it a vital part of the company. Despite the rather conspiring and dubious nature of this tradition, Lauren was the farthest thing from an evil conspirer. Lauren just wants what’s best for the company and for some reason (mostly cause it was what her parents always told her) that meant employees needed to gain weight. Lauren herself wasn’t even that fat for a Gordge Employee, let alone a CEO. It was only 18 months ago that she had inherited the position of CEO from her mother. Lauren has a lot to prove as CEO. Her mother was 57 and over 650 pounds when she retired after 25 years as CEO. Now Lauren is just 24 and a measly 250 pounds in her first year and a half as a CEO. She had a long way to go to fill her mother’s shoes. But Lauren was eager and ambitious, she wasn’t going to live in her mother’s shadow.

143.content:
Jessica sat at her desk, typing up various reports and filling out documents with her pen. Soon though she was done with all the work she'd had to do that day. Admittedly it was quite a slow day today...

She leaned back in her chair heavily, stretching; this motion caused her light blue blouse to ride up a bit, showing off a few inches of pale, soft belly flab for all to see. 

"Ahhh~ what to do, what to do..." she wondered as a hand idly rubbed her massive tummy. She had really put on weight ever since getting promoted to the corporate branch, now easily 420lbs. 

Eventually, the hefty brunette thought to go to the break room for some relaxation and company, so she heaved her incredibly bulky frame from her chair, and waddled into the employee lounge, a bit out of breath. 

After a year in corporate so far, Jess had finally learned just how big she'd gotten, and (somewhat begrudgingly at first) accepted it. She still sometimes wished that she weren't quite so fat, but she did at least try her best to stay at her current weight. 

As she entered the room, hips brushing the doorway slightly, she saw that Holly was currently taking a break as well. She smiled to herself a bit, thinking that thankfully she wasn't the biggest employee in the office. 

"Hey Holly" she said cheerfully as she grabbed a soda from the fridge. "How're you?" 

"Oh hi Jess. I'm fine and you?" 

So the two got to talking, making friendly conversation and idle chatter, getting to know each other better in the process.
143.title: Jessica

choices: Jessica tries to cut back on the sweets
Jessica gives up immediately on losing weight
free choice
1433.content:
Jessica had become more and more aware of how big she was getting since joining the corporate offices. She was putting on even more weight than usual in her new workplace. This new self-awareness caused Jessica to have some concern over how fat she was. At her latest check up with her doctor she was a little startled to hear her say 423 pounds. Jessica figured it was about time she did something about her weight problem.

“I just need to get back under 400 pounds, then who knows, maybe I could get back to 250! I’m sure it will be easy. It’s just 24 pounds, I could put that much on in a month, how hard should it be to lose that much? I’ll just cut down on my eating and then hit the gym. I got this.” Jessica thought to herself. She waddled into the tall skyscraper where her office was.

“In fact here’s my first step to losing weight. I’m gonna take the stairs.” Jessica thought to herself. Her office was on the fifth floor. Five flights of stairs would’ve been a hard climb for Jessica a whole 150 pounds ago, but she was feeling a rush of confidence this morning and was ready to take on a challenge.

She swallowed the last of her doughnut and sucked down her coffee as she approached the stairs. She was already sweating a bit from the short walk into the building. The doughy blimp put her hand the rail as she stood at the bottom of the staircase. She lifted her hefty leg up onto the first stair. Her massive belly oozed on top of her bloated thigh as her fat rolls sloshed and oozed around her crotch and waist. She slowly heaved her other plump juicy leg up. Her numerous layers and folds of doughy flesh rubbed and squished against each other awkwardly. The helpless, obese Jessica exhaled heavily as she reached the second stair.

“That *pant* wasn’t so *gasp* hard.” Jessica said. She continued to slowly lug her overfed frame up the stairs. She exerted all her force as the panting butterball hauled herself step by step. Her enormous hips took up one whole side of stairway forcing people to only use the left side of the stairs. Jessica hadn’t physically tried so hard in years. The lazy whale had gone out of her way to avoid any unnecessary exertion for far too long and she was feeling it. Jess was glistening with sweat as she made her way slowly. She stopped and leaned over as she was gasping for breath.

“Hey are you okay, miss?” A man said as he walked by the bloated breathless blimp that was Jessica. She could barely spit any words out but she waved her hand to signal for him to go on his way.

“Alright.” The guy said as he continued his walk.

“Wow this is some workout, I haven’t sweated this hard since high school.” Jessica thought to herself. “I think I’ll just stop on this floor and use the elevator.” Jessica finally composed herself. She turned around to realize she had only made it halfway up the first flight of stairs. What felt like Jessica’s greatest physical feat in years was climbing up just 8 stairs.

“Well it’s a good start, might as well just go back down though.” She waddled back down the half flight of stairs and used the first floor elevator.
1433.title: Jess tries to lose weight

choices: Jess "diets" but still ends up eating tons of junk food
Jess quits her diet very quickly.
14331.content:
Jessica’s first initiative in losing weight was to eat healthier. The corporate offices were practically booby-trapped with fattening food. Jessica needed to stop going for every opportunity she had to eat in the office.

When she got to her desk in the morning she looked at the numerous snacks on her desk. Everyone in corporate had snacks placed on their desk at the beginning of the day. Jessica picked up a pastry.
“Well I did get all that exercise taking the stairs today. That was exhausting. I’m sure it won’t hurt to eat some.” Jessica said. She ate all the food on her desk. She took every opportunity to eat that she could find. She would say she deserves it because she took the stairs.

The next day she decided that it would be better to start her diet next week instead of starting it in the middle of this week.
“I’ll can really pig out this week since it’s the last week before my diet.” She said to herself. She ate more food than ever.

So the next Monday she decided to start her diet.
“Oh man. I’m just so busy today I’ll start my diet tomorrow.” Jess said.

The next day she said that she should just start her diet next week since she’s so busy. Meanwhile she continued to eat more than ever since it was the last days before her diet started.

Then on the next week Jessica decided to start her diet Monday.
“I am feeling pretty sick today. Gonna have to start the diet tomorrow. Or next week actually so I have some time to fully recover.” Jess told herself.

So another week passed. Jess decided she was too busy though so again, a week passed by. But next week was a holiday so another week passed. The week after she felt like she needed to do some more research on dieting. So she waited another week.

Finally after 6 weeks she decided to start her diet. Unfortunately in those six weeks she had gained 40 pounds. She had gotten all the way up to 460 pounds. Her blubbery belly rolls had gotten even bigger and her thick gelatinous legs moved even slower. So how did her diet even go?
14331.title: Jessica tries to cut back on the sweets

143311.content:
Even with cutting back on sweets, Jessica still ate enough junk food and meals to feed a small family. 

Currently she was in the break room with Holly and Emily, sitting in a armless lounge chair. Her expansive, plush hips and butt spreading out and hanging off the sides. Her equally bulbous belly engulfing her lap, sagging off the lip of the chair.  

"Hey Jess, you want some of these donuts? There's a few left." Emily asked politely as she thrust the box in her coworker's direction.

The bloated cute blob struggled as her immense overfed body only sunk deeper into the strained sofa cushions. She started to breath heavily as sweat dripped. Jess was such a butterball she had beached herself on the sofa. Her immense gut sat on her lap like an anchor. Jessica that her favorite show was on.

“Why hasn't it gotten here yet?” Emily whined while rubbing her growling belly.

“It’s almost 9:30 so it should be here any minute.” Jess said. Just then a custodian entered rolling in a very large cardboard box. He moved the box off of the rolling cart and immediately every employee in the break room swiveled their head to stare at the large package. The custodian paused as he looked around at the deep gazes around him.

“I’ll just leave the box open for y’all.” He said. He took out a box cutter and started to open the top. All the while he heard a chorus of grunts, creaks, and groans as the 15 or so incredibly obese employees stood up and surrounded the box. He paused nervously and slowly cut open the last of the tape. He started to pull open the box and was met with dozens of chubby arms grabbing furiously at the stacks of Porky’s pastries. In a minute or so the box was completely empty and the employees started tearing open the packages of pastries.

Jess and Emily walked back to their desks.

“Aw I only got some butterballs, jelly rolls, aaand… and a box of honey buns.” Jess said, examining what Porky’s Pastry’s she managed to get her hands on for the morning.

“Hmm… I’ll give you my doughy folds and muffin tops for your butterballs.” Emily offered.

“Hello ladies.” Holly said as Jess and Emily waddled by her desk.

“Hey, Holly… Hey where’d you get those?” Jess asked. Holly was holding a box of half eaten Porky’s and shoving pastries in her mouth.

“Yeah we didn’t see you in the break room just now.” Emily said.

“Brought these babies from home. I actually have a little stockpile under my desk.” Holly moved her enormous bulk to reveal a stack of boxes under her desk. “Just don’t tell anyone. Can’t have anyone stealing them hehe.” Holly laughed.

“Can’t believe I didn’t think of that. Although I can never find these in grocery store.” Jess said.

“Yeah Holly, where did you find them outside of the office?” Emily said.

“Hah I’m not telling you guys, or anyone in this office for that matter. They would be out of stock by the end of the day!” Holly said.

“Boo, you suck. Although you’re probably right. These things never seem to last long around here.” Jess said.

“Anyway, I’d like to get to my desk so I can stop holding these and start eating them. C’mon Jess, we can just stalk her after work to find where she’s getting them.” Emily said as they walked back to their desks.

“Hey I heard that!” Holly said. Em and Jess giggled.

As soon as Jess lowered her blubbery body in to her seat she started tearing open the boxes of pastries. With one hand slowly tapping away at her keyboard she started voraciously stuffing herself with the rich pastries. They were so delicious, Jess started to moan and purr as they slid down her throat.

After about a half an hour all three boxes were empty. Jess felt very full. Something about these pastries filled her up so much. That’s not to say she regretted eating all three boxes. They tasted so good that it was totally worth it. The only thing she regretted was eating them so fast. She was going to have to wait until 12 for more. She did this every time. She told herself she would take her time so that she could enjoy them more and not have to wait forever for more, but after the first pastry it was almost impossible to stop herself. She devoured them without hesitation. She was left rubbing her giant stuffed gut. Despite feeling so full she still craved more.

She always seemed to run out of pastries just before she satiated her desires. She licked her lips making sure there wasn’t a single drop of icing left. She looked down at the crumbs that were left on soft chest. She pinched at one or two and dropped them in her mouth. She could barely taste the miniscule remnants. She instinctively picked up her two enormous flabby breasts and brought them to her face so she could lick up the remaining crumbs. Mmm they tasted good as they dissolved on her tongue. She then snapped out of her hunger trance. Oh god, she hoped no one saw her do that.
1433111111121111.title: Porky Cravings

choices: Lauren puts a stop to porky's sponsorship
free choice
14331111111211111.content:
Lauren was making her way to her office early one morning only to find that the majority of her employees who were already there were gorging on Porky's snacks. Now normally this wouln't be cause for concern, since every heavyset gal would multitask with eating and doing work. Right then though, it seemed they were all completely and intensely focused on cramming the filling sweets into their bulging bellies. Lauren took note of this, but quickly put it out of her head as she took the elevator up to her office.

"Seems like these new pastries have gotten everyone into a gorging tizzy" she said as she sat down. The chubby young CEO of Gordge began filling out documents and signing off on company requests.

Soon though, she heard a loud knock on the door.

"Come in"

A moment afterwards, Lauren's secretary came waddling in. Amy, Her 300+ pound secretary entered her office.

“I’ve got *munch* Rebecca’s weekly *burp* report. It’sh not sho good *gulp*.” Amy said. She handed over the thick packet, and quickly dove her hand back into the box of pastries she had under her left arm, for another treat. Lauren quickly scanned the document. She didn’t need to fully read it know it was bad. Productivity had really taken a dive the last three weeks and it seemed to only be getting worse.

“Ugh… this is crazy. You would’ve thought everyone went on vacation, judging on these charts. How is this happening?” Lauren asked in frustration. She rubbed her temples and had a strenuous look on her face. Amy continued stuffing her face and pretended to rack her brain for an answer. Being just a secretary she didn’t really know or care about it. Lauren wasn’t really expecting a good answer anyway. She liked Amy, but she knew her secretary’s only real skills were handing over documents, answering phone calls, and eating, which was all that her job required.

“Hmmm… I *burp*, hehe shcushe me, I don’t *gulp* know.” Amy said, shoveling another pastry in her mouth. Lauren just stared as she pigged out in front of her boss. Amy probably should have left by now, but she was too caught up in gorging herself to realize it. Boy she looks bigger than usual. Lauren thought. Amy had recently ballooned up to 350 pounds. Her belly apron hung over the front of her skirt and her small sweater exposed most of her bottom belly roll. Her skirt pinched around her flabby middle forming a thick muffintop. Her doughy love handles (also peeking out from under her sweater) sat atop her wide and round hips. Amy wiped her pudgy fingers on her clothed belly. A dark chocolate stain appeared right near the apex of her blubbery gut. Right above the smudge was a clear outline of where her two thick spare tires met and formed her billowing double belly. Her pink bra could be seen through the straining fabric of her top. This was the person you saw before entering my office? Lauren rolled her eyes. She liked Amy but it was a wonder what she would be doing if she couldn’t answer phones or use a printer.

“Argh… do you know when the next order of Porky’s comes in?” Amy asked.

“Uhhh… Now that’s not my job really.” Lauren said.

“Well could you like make whoever’s it is order a more?” Amy said.

“Is it really that big of a deal?”

“Yeaah! This stuff is more valuable than gold around here.” Amy pointed to the empty pastry box. That’s when it hit Lauren. It had to be Porky’s causing this!

(written by Clutch and Firechar)
14331111111211111.title: EPIDEMIC

choices: The next week, the newbie arrives and Jessica takes her under her flabby wing
Jessica and Holly decide to go on a road trip, visiting every buffet in town
143311111112111111.content:
Lauren had to put a stop to the constant gorging of Porkys Pastries that had brought the office to a halt. It wasnt the most popular decision amongst her employees, but it had to be done. She had secretly been lowering the number of shipments the corporate office received over a couple months. The protests and groans of the employees died out after they were finally weaned off the strangely addictive treats.

Gordge made a complete recovery with just some extra weight to show for it.

After the whole thing died down, Jessica, Holly, and Emily were lounging in the break room discussing the whole thing.

"You know, it kinda sucks the pastries are gone..." Jess lamented as she took a sip of her sweet iced tea.

Holly pat her friend on her flabby back comfortingly and smiled.

"Hey, it's probably a good thing they're gone; just imagine, if we kept eating them we wouldn't be able to fit in our cubicles anymore!"

At this both Jessica and Emily laughed, their bulging bellies jiggling against their strained shirts. Everyone in the offices had been noticeably climbing higher and higher in weight ever since Porky's addictive treats were introduced.

"Yeah, I guess you're right." Jess giggled.

"I know, I've really been packing it on lately. Just last week I had to schedule an appointment with George to take out my pants, and now look at my shirt!" Emily pointed out her straining buttons.

"Mmmph, Yeah we've all been rounding out a bit." Holly interjected as she finished a spoonful of yogurt. "Oooh hey! Did you girls hear about the new hire? I remember Lauren saying she'd be here sometime next week."

"Oh cool. Least now we'll have a new face around here." Emily said excitedly.

"Ooh I volunteer showing her around and getting her adjusted!" Jessica giddily said.

"Alright Jess, we'll let you be the welcome commitee." Holly teased.
143311111112111111.title: Lauren puts a stop to porky's sponsorship

choices: Julia goes to lunch with Jess, Holly and Emily.
Julia starts to become great friends with Jess.
1433111111121111111.content:
“So, yeah, in a little bit we’ll go to lunch.” Jessica said to Julia, the new hire. They sat in the extra-large cubicle they would now be sharing.

“Oh great, I’m staarrving.” Julia replied.

“Well if you’re hungry now just grab a snickers or something.” Jessica said, pulling open a desk drawer revealing a large stash of candy and junk food. “Or I think theres still a couple doughnuts in here.” Jess picked up the almost empty doughnut box off her keyboard.

“Wow, yes please!” Julia said.

Julia was not only new to the corporate offices, she had never worked for Gordge before. At her previous workplace, eating food on the job was frowned upon. But it seemed that things were different at Gordge.

Jessica looked over Julia as she dug into a twinkie she had taken from the drawer. She was fairly fat. Around 300 pounds. She carried it well though, primarily in her belly and bottom. Pretty much all over she had a thick layer of flab. Except for her face which looked rather pretty and slim comparatively, though she still had a soft neck and jawline. She looked to be a bit experienced with her size, judging by the way she dressed. She was very well groomed and was very smartly dressed in proper fitting clothes. Jess wish she could dress like that but her waistline was expanding so much she was constantly playing catch up. But Julia managed to look downright beautiful despite her fat. Jess probably would’ve been intimidated by Julia if she weren’t so damn bubbly.
1433111111121111111.title: the newbie

choices: Meet the Head of Porky's
free choice
143311111112111112.content:
If the Porky's orders were what was causing the slowdown, then the would need to be stopped; simple as that. Lauren couldn't have her company collapsing into insolvency because the staff was too busy stuffing butter and sugar into their faces to get any work done.

She got on the phone immediately. The first thing to do was to figure out who arranged the deal in the first place. It hadn't been her, but that wasn't unusual. Lauren's HR and Finance departments occasionally undertook initiatives to boost the morale of the employees. Amy might not know who set the Gordge deal up, but somebody must have. She sighed and called her finance chief.

"Sam, it's Lauren. How are you? Look, I'm wondering about this partnership with Porky's."
"Aren't they just the greatest? I just finished a box of butterballs. Oh my god, you have got to order more." Lauren wasn't sure, but she thought she heard a stifled burp on the end of the line.

"Actually, Sam, I just wanted to ask you to send me the file on our partnership with them. Did you set the deal up, or was it someone in your office?
"Ummm... I'll have to check on that. I didn't set it up. I thought HR did. Let me get back to you."

The accountant was nothing if not efficient. Within five minutes, an email had arrived with info on their contact at Porky Paige's, who happened to be the owner of the company, a one Ms. O'Connor. She also sent a spreadsheet documenting the history of the deal, a scan of the contract between the two firms, and a postscript requesting Lauren ask for some extra butterballs in future shipments. Must have been Sam's favourite.

Lauren frowned. If neither her HR people, nor her finance people had made the deal with Porky Paige, who had? Glancing at her calendar, she was reminded of her packed schedule for the day. She didn't have time to run in circles through the company bureaucracy figuring out who had stamped the contract. And siccing Amy on it - Amy, who was now blind to nearly any information that didn't directly relate to something she could put in her mouth - well, that would be as good as useless.

She'd figure out the deal's origin afterward. For now, the priority was cancelling it, recouping Gordge's money if possible - she'd have to look t the contract language on that - but at least freeing her employees from this pernicious, bloating, fattening influence.

She grunted as she got up. Standing seemed to get harder every day, despite her only being 34 years old. Her belly, once just a slight bulge but now more of a gut, was tightly constrained in her size 20 skirt. Her entire body shifted as she walked, a fluid, shimmying shake that most of her employees also exhibited. Back in her college years, when she was under 105 pounds soaking wet, she couldn't have imagined that nearly every part of her body, from her calves to her double chin, would one day jiggle at her slightest movement On the other hand, she also could not have imagined she'd run a major firm before 40; life was full of surprises.

The secretary at Porky Paige's was, if anything, fatter than Lauren's secretary Amy. She was seated between a desk and the wall, and Lauren was frankly quite surprised she had managed to squeeze her round hips back there. Lauren couldn't be sure, but she guessed the woman to be nearing the four hundred pound mark, most of it concentrated in her lower half. Even from above the desk, she could see the sides corpulent hips rolling out over the edges of the armless chair.

The young woman stopped slurping on a cup of something covered in whipped cream and said, cheerfully, "Welcome to Porky Paige's! Where the only thing better than the first bite... is the second one." How many times had she spoken that lame slogan, and yet she still managed to chirp it as if there was nothing she'd rather say. Paige, if there was a Paige, clearly knew how to hire.

After confirming her appointment, the secretary heaved herself out of the chair. Sliding out of her little spot involved turning her body sideways and squeezing between the chair and wall. It looked just as tough as Lauren had imagined, though it didn't seem to phase the secretary. She just shrugged, gave a dimpled smile, and said "hazards of working for the best baked goods company in the city!"

She led Lauren through a door, back into the Porky Paige offices. Her butt cheeks churned against each other, too big for her enormous black skirt, as she waddled back through the office corridor. It looked like it was nearly time to upgrade her wardrobe, at least the lower half. 20 feet later, a noticeable sheen of sweat on the girl's face and a slight gasp in her voice, she opened the door to a small meeting room and promised that Ms. O'Connor would be right in. "If you want anything to eat," she added, "help yourself to some of the treats! They're fresh." She grabbed three donuts herself, stacking them one atop the other, turned, and began her arduous hike back down the hall. Lauren could hear her breathing heavily the entire way.

The meeting room had a standard wooden conference table with a standard black phone and a standard office whiteboard on the standard beige walls. What was decidedly not standard were the boxes - maybe ten in all - each packed with sweet-smelling treats. Lauren sat down in one of the four chairs, noticing that it was the same large armless model the secretary sat on. It was very comfortable.
143311111112111112.title: Go to Porky's HQ to Sort this Out

choices: Double the Deliveries!
free choice
1433111111121111121.content:
It had been five hours since Lauren had eaten a modest 3-bagel breakfast. At the time, she had congratulated herself on not following it up with 3 donuts, as she did more and more often these days but now she wished she hadn't been so reserved. Ms. O'Connor came in at that moment, her hand extended. They shook, and Lauren sized the woman up.

She was in her early forties, or maybe a bit younger. It was, Lauren thought, hard to tell with someone so fat. The woman was enormous, 500 pounds if she was an ounce. She was dressed in a red sweater big enough to be a tent and in slacks that would have been loose on Gordge's fattest employee. When she sat down, she groaned quietly and the chair groaned loudly. Far too fat to fold her legs, with a belly that prevented her from leaning forward, she just sat back and rested her hands on her stomach.

Their introductions were interrupted by Lauren's own stomach, which grumbled loudly to announce its irritation with what seemed to be famine conditions. Ms. Connor smiled warmly and slid one of the boxes closer to the hungry CEO.

"Hey, I know how it is. You're busy running a company, and you never have time to get a proper meal. Before you know it, you're half-starved." She patted her stomach, which sloshed and jiggled in response. Ms. O'Connor lowered her voice and smiled conspiratorially "I just polished off a box of these myself - honey buns, we call them on the labels, but I just call them delicious."

Lauren looked at the array of golden-brown treats in the box before her, chose a particularly appealing specimen, and took a large bite. The flakey pastry yielded easily to her teeth, and was somehow both airy and incredibly rich. "Wow," she said after wolfing the rest of the little cake down, "they really are good. Is everything you make so good?"

"Oh, absolutely," Ms. O'Connor nodded, then ran her hands lightly along the parts of her fat body she could reach. "I sample every batch myself, as you can probably see from my generous figure." Lauren couldn't tell whether that was joke, so decided to get right to the subject at hand.

"As you're well aware, you have been supplying Gordge with baked goods for the last months. I came here today in the hopes... in the hopes... that..." she was suddenly, and uncharacteristically, losing her train of thought. Normally, she was a hard-driving, no-nonsense negotiator. That's how she had climbed to the top of Gordge's chubby corporate ladder. Yet now, in front of this rotund, smiling baker, she couldn't seem to put together a sentence.

She was rescued from her stumbling by a beep from the previously unobtrusive phone on the conference room desk. "Ms. O'Connor?" It was the secretary she'd met on the way in. "Sorry to disturb you while you're in your meeting, but there's a matter that requires your immediate attention."

Ms. O'Connor apologized profusely, swore that this would never happened again, especially while meeting with the CEO of their valued partner firm, that it must be an emergency, and then stepped out, her lumbering footfalls thudding down the hall.

As soon as the door clicked shut, and before she consciously realized what she was doing, Lauren had another honeybun in her hand and smile on her face. Five minutes passed, or 7 honeybuns, depending on how you wanted to measure the time. Lauren's belly, well acquainted with snacking, was nonetheless beginning to groan under the load of surprisingly heavy snacks.

"Sorry again," Ms. O'Connor said as she came back in. "School called about my son... fight on the playground. You know how boys are." Lauren didn't but she nodded, gulping down the rest of her honeybun."

Ms. O'Connor sat back down, much to the conference chair's disappointment, and tented her fingers on her belly. "Look, i know why you came down here today. I get it. I know we haven't been providing you as much product as you want... your girls talk the delivery guy's ear off with requests every time he is over there."

Ms. O'Connor paused, then looked Lauren right in the eye very seriously. "Please understand that no relationship is more important to us than our relationship with Gordge. Your snack contract funded us through our difficult startup phase. It's so hard to get a business off the ground. But now that we're underway... well, heck, how about we double our daily deliveries to you. Just as a way to say "thank you" from one partner to another."

Lauren was torn. Part of her wanted to laugh in the woman's face; she had misinterpreted the point of this meeting so badly. The problem was definitely not that the pastry deliveries to Gordge were too small, whatever her hungry employees might say. It was that the pastries were coming at all, turning her staff into bloated parodies of young women who couldn't work ten minutes without a snack break.

The other part of her... the part connected to her sugar-coated tongue and her round, warm, very full tummy, was already imagining overflowing honeybun boxes stacked between her desk phone and her computer. To come in every morning and find that waiting for her... it was too appealing to ignore. Perhaps, if she thought about it, she could come up with a way to get her staff back on track, while keeping the food. Use it as an incentive, maybe?

The two parts of her fought, very briefly. It was barely a contest. She licked her lips, and extended her hand. "Ms. O'Connor, you got yourself a deal."
1433111111121111121.title: Meet the Head of Porky's

choices: Holly receives nearly all the treats after their performance review
The Porky's treats a divided pretty evenly between the girls
14331111111211111211.content:
Amy blabbed almost immediately after receiving the documents confirming the new snack delivery arrangements. Twice the normal deliveries! The entire office was abuzz and salivating, dreaming of truckloads of treats being delivered to them personally, possibly by very handsome delivery men.

Before her girls could short circuit their keyboards with drool, Lauren announced her new incentive program.

Memorandum

To: All Gordge Office Staff

From: CEO Lauren Smitt

As you may be aware, our company has recently renegotiated the snack concession with Porky's Pastries. Gordge will now be receiving twice as much in our daily shipments.

Because of the office-wide popularity of these snacks, our senior leadership has determined that this is an ideal opportunity for a performance-based reward for our most productive associates. The supplementary Porky's pastries that we will receive in the new agreement will be allotted based on employees' productivity ratings at their weekly performance review with their direct supervisors.

As always, thank you all for your continued hard work on behalf of Gordge.

"Can you believe this?" Emily said with as much indignation as someone with a mouthful of Porky's muffintops could muster. She was standing next to Jess's desk, having just read the CEO's memo. She was the lightest of the three friends, but had by this point sunk so far into a morass of hedonism that she was just as gluttonous as her larger sisters. Even with a box of muffintops in her hand, she was already thinking about how to get her hands on more pastries in the future. "They're going to rank us and use that to decide who gets the Porky's pastries! Isn't there some kind of clause in our contract about them not being to withhold employee snacks?" Her 3 chins quivered, though it was unclear whether that was from agitation or from vigorous chewing.

Jess looked up from her computer lazily, the only way she seemed to do anything these days. Since rounding the five hundred pound mark, she had found herself slowing down in almost all aspects of her life as every task became a monumental challenge. It was harder to walk, harder to bend, even harder to motivate herself to roll her massive body out of bed in the morning. "I don't really think," she said gently, "that the hiring managers paid much attention to the snacks and treats subsection of our contract when we signed on."

Holly, listening from two desks over, waved her hand dismissively. "I don't know about you girls, but I already know I'll be getting plenty of those pastries. Hell, I'm the best worker this place has."

"No fair," Emily squeaked, "you've been working here longer than we have! And you already have Porky's you buy yourself on some kind of secret black market. You don't get to take these, too."

"Don't worry, Emily. When they give all the pastries to me, I won't forget the little people like you and Jess. I'll be sure to let you watch me eat them," Holly said.

"You bitch!" Emily seemed genuinely angry for a moment, but it faded quickly and by the next sentence, she was giggling cutely. "You wouldn't.

"I will. I'll lean my ass back and just drop them into my mouth, like a queen being fed grapes."

To demonstrate, she leaned back in her chair and kicked her feet up onto the desk, or she tried to, anyway. The last fifty pounds had completely eliminated any remaining physical fitness from the obese Holly. Her anatomy was no longer something most physiologists would recognize. What little muscle she had was completely buried under a thick layer of rolling fat, soft and supple. Even her toes, little sausages packed into pink pumps, had outgrown the toe ring she wore for years.

Her belly had taken the most damage in the last growth spurt, though. When sitting, it formed three main rolls, the biggest being the bottom one, which covered her lap entirely in soft flesh. It was now so big that, when she thought nobody was looking, she untucked it from her work pants to leave it hanging over her belt. That was so much more comfortable than keeping it cooped up inside pants that were, more often than not, a few sizes too small.

Between her fat belly resting on top of her thighs and the weak flabbiness of her short legs themselves, she didn't have a prayer of lifting her feet onto the desk. It was nearly 3 feet off the ground! She was able to lean back in her chair, but when she tried to put her legs up on the desk, all she accomplished was setting her body to jiggling and releasing an involuntary girlish grunt.

Irked by the snafu in her little performance, she tried again. This attempt started out more successfully; by shifting her cumbersome weight to the left, she was able to free her right leg from under her belly. She fought against the sloshing indolence of a body totally unaccustomed to movement, and managed to hoist her right leg nearly onto the desk, hooking the toe of her shoe onto the edge of the desk.

She sat there a moment, looking ridiculous, feeling her exhausted leg shake. Neither Emily nore Jess could tell whether she would actually have the will to force the rest of her foot up, but before her will could give out, her pants did.

Even high quality, custom-tailored slacks have a limit, and her chic black pants had found theirs. Seams, stretched by a cargo well beyond their capacity, then strained by her sudden movement, surrendered, and tore loudly. The pants split up the back of her right leg, all the way to her ass. Cellulite-covered ivory skin wobbled into the open and quickly developed goosebumps in the air-conditioned office.

A moment of silence followed, then Emily and Jess burst out laughing at their friend. Holly didn't laugh, but she didn't cry, either. This was not the first time she'd busted her pants, and she knew it wouldn't be the last. Especially once she got her hands on her share of the new Porky's deliveries.
14331111111211111211.title: Incentivizing the Staff

choices: Jessica gets new clothes
Jessica and Holly are enormous buddies
14331111112.content:
After a weekend of extreme gorging and laziness, Jessica found herself in some trouble. Having recently embraced her enormous size and incredibly piggish attitude, Jess had turned off every notion of restraint in her food craving brain. Jessica had eaten nonstop all weekend. It was one of the best weekend’s she’d had in a long time. Unfortunately she had some regrets the following Monday.

Her work attire was already pretty small on her to begin with but this past week had pushed her over the top.

“Whew, that was close.” Jess said. She had managed to make it to her desk with her clothing still intact. She looked over her strained outfit. Her shirt buttons had enormous gaps between them as her bloated belly and breasts pushed against the fabric. There was still a ring of flesh that was revealed between her shirt and skirt. Jessica really struggled to look over her massive body. She had gotten so large.

That’s when a friendly face walked by.

“Oh hey Emily.” Jess said. Emily waddled over to Jessica’s cubicle.

“Hey Jess how’s life going post diet?” Emily asked.

“Oh great. Although my clothes are hanging on for dear life.” Jess said.

“Yeah, me too. I think I’ve put on a few, these buttons have been getting pretty tight.” Emily said. She definitely looked bigger. She had gained 40+ pounds since working at corporate. Pretty soon she would reach 400 pounds.

“I’ve put on some weight but I’m not complaining. And as long as I stay in this seat my clothes will live to die another day.” Jess said.

“Well unfortunately we have a meeting in a few minutes. Sorry to burst you bubble.” Emily said. Jess had totally forgot about the weekly Monday meeting.

“Oh well, I think I can make it through one meeting.” Jess said with a tinge of doubt.

“Well it’s in a few minutes, you need a hand?” Emily asked. She extended a hand towards Jess. Jessica leaned her heavy gut forward. Grabbing Emily’s hands she pulled herself up.

“Careful.” Jessica said. Her clothes groaned and tiny rips could be heard as her extra wide butt lifted out of her seat. A button popped off as her great bottom belly roll fell over her thighs.

“Boy she wasn’t joking about her clothes.” Emily thought to herself. Finally Jess’s morbidly obese body was upright.

They made their way through the rather expansive corporate office to one of the many conference rooms. Jess and Emily were out of breath as they waddled through the cubicles. Jessica’s skirt started to ride down her hefty plump butt. All over her stitching started to become undone.

Eventually they made it to the meeting. They weren’t late but most of the people were already in their seats at the large meeting table. As big as Jess had become she hardly stuck out among the high ranking corporate employees at the meeting. Jessica was even dwarfed by some of the massive mounds of blubber in the room. Everywhere enormous overfed women gorged themselves on doughnuts as they lowered their obese hefty bulks into strained seats.

The meeting went on as usual. Jess didn’t say much. However she did treat herself to a few doughnuts. There were tons all over the table for the gluttonous employees. Jessica swallowed doughnut after doughnut. All of a sudden another button popped off. Jessica froze. She got a few glances but the meeting never stopped. Buttons popping were a pretty common occurrence around the office.

“I should probably stop eating. I don’t want to burst another one.” She told herself. But then her piggish desires overtook her. She continued to wolf down doughnuts at a startling rate. No one paid much attention though. Jess emptied a whole platter. Her already bulging belly bloated bigger and bigger. She didn’t notice the dangerously tight feeling of her shirt as she was caught up in her epic doughnut feast.

Finally she was asked a question.

“Jess what do you think of that?” Lauren, the CEO, asked her.

“Ugh…” Jess looked up from her doughnuts to see everyone waiting for her response. She swallowed the doughnut in her mouth. PING! PING! PING! PING! Every last button flew off her shirt. Jess’s enormous doughnut filled gut surged over the edge of her chair. Some people gasped, and some giggled. A few of the larger veterans smiled seeing the younger overfed employee taking such a liking to the Gordge philosophy.

Either way, Jessica’s bloated stacks of belly fat and huge flabby breasts (at least she wore a bra) were exposed to everyone at the meeting. Jessica turned red with embarrassment.

“Ugh I’m going to excuse myself.” Jessica said. She lifted her overstuffed body. An enormous tear was made down her skirt as she stood up. Everyone catching a glimpse of her exposed bottom as she waddled out of the room. Jessica ended up getting the rest of the day off.
14331111112.title: embarrassing accident

choices: Pizza feast!
At work two weeks later. Jess is even BIGGER
1433111112.content:
After finally deciding to quit trying to lose weight, Jess truly embraced the glutton inside her with wide open arms. Day after day she would constantly be cramming her gut with as much food as she could get her hands on. Her co-workers were happy to aid and abet their massively obese friend fully adapt to her new lifestyle and went out of their way to ease Jessica’s workload and keep her as glutted and sedentary as possible. As such, Jess absolutely exploded in size, gaining over 60 pounds in a single month, becoming so incredibly massive that any shirt became nearly an unbearable burden. Her home attire thus devolved into solely a bra-and-sweatpants getup that left her truly gargantuan belly bare for the entire world to see. Though all of Jess was getting permanently too much to handle, her big bulging belly was the particularly lucky recipient of the new pounds of blubber, and its massive, warm, permanently overgorged mass was something that Jess took growing pride in. Jess had found an amazing talent in overeating, and she cultivated it assiduously with constant practice.

Every weekend was an especially rich time for Jess and her stupendous stomach, as she would make a point to constantly gorge, glut and stuff herself into stupefaction for as long as she could keep her eyes open.
