Distinct mealtimes were unnecessary, as Jess would just feast for hours upon end until she was too dopey and food-drunk to do anything but giggle and rub her overfilled stomach in congratulations at yet another job well done. On a certain sunday evening, we find Jess in just such a lethargic and drowsy position. Hiccupping gently, Jess giggled and softly patted the mountain of soft blubber and listened to her stomach’s struggling digestion of yet another massive feast: “Sigh...HIC...what a good day of eating...HIC...I feel so relaxed now! I guess this...HIC...constant eating is really my thing...HIC!! I can fit so much food into my stomHIC, hehehe it makes me happy...HIC.” She idly crammed her umpteenth donut into her mouth and sighed contentedly. This was the life. Now all she needed was to wait for the pizza delivery guy to arrive with her order. MMM, 10 pizzas all for me she thought greedily, rubbing her stuffed stomach. This was going to be rich!
1433111112.title: a month later

choices: Lunch!
Another few weeks of this!
14331111122.content:
Two more weeks passed in such enjoyable fashion with very predictable results. Jessica was an utter slave to her massive appetite and lust for gorging, glutting and cramming her cavernous stomach with as much food as she possibly could reach. Her capacity for feasting seemed endless, and there seemed to be no such thing as enough food to completely fill her mammoth gut. Understandably, Jessica grew at a steady clip, clocking in at just over 570 pounds by the beginning of week six of her unhinged gluttony. Her huge single belly exploded from her frame and was beginning to pour over her knees when Jess sat in a chair. It was Jess’s favorite part of her massively fat body, and she was beginning to enjoy watching it grow larger and larger with each passing food-filled day.

This particular monday morning Jess had just managed to make her way to her office cubicle, and completely out of breath, collapsed on the floor with a muffled slosh. She had really outdone herself on Sunday and was still rather gorged from all her eating. Panting heavily, she gently rubbed the top shelf of her gut with one hand while the other was rummaging through an drawer, pulling out twinkies, ho-hos, candy bars, and whatever else Jess had stashed in there. Happily eating, Jess futilely pulled her tank-top over her giant glob of blubbery belly. No button-down shirts could hope to fit across her impossibly wide middle, but Gordge made exceptions for their larger employees, but even so, Jessica’s mighty belly proved impossible to decently cover.

Just then, Emily waddled into Jess’s office, bearing a large pound cake. She blinked a few times at seeing Jess and her enormous gut sprawled out on the floor, but swiftly regained composure: “Hey Jess! How you doing? How was your weekend?”
Jess swallowed a huge mouthful of food and smiled happily: “*pant* Hey Emily! I had a great weekend! *URP* Lots and lots and LOTS of food! Hehehe, oh gosh I ate SO MUCH yesterday I even surprised myself!” Jess smiled and crammed her mouth with more sweets after patting her giant gut contentedly.

Emily shook her head knowingly: “You’ve really taken to this whole eating whatever you want thing, huh? Well I brought you some cake, and don’t forget the breakfast spread in the breakroom today.” Jess looked up, surprised, and patted the top of her bulbous belly eagerly. “URRP, Thanks, Em, that’ll be wonderful. I can’t wait *URP*” With that, she all but inhaled the rest of her food and practically crammed the pound cake into her mouth whole, and slowly but surely rocked herself upwards and made her jiggly way to the breakroom.

Two hours later she barely stumbled back into her cubicle, closed the door, and collapsed with a shattering thud and *GLOP* The spread was meant for an office 3 times the size of Gordge, and Jessica had easily glutted herself on half of it. Moaning in pleasure and difficulty, Jess patted her gigantically swollen stomach happily, a dazed and content smile plastered across her fat face:
“HIC...HIC...ohhh mann what a feast...I’m...HICC HICC...getting so hugeee...heheheheHICC..I wonder what’s for lunch...URRPPP”
14331111122.title: At work two weeks later. Jess is even BIGGER

choices: Jessica decides that maybe getting a personal trainer/dietician could help
Jess decides dieting and exercise is too much work
14331112.content:
Now that Jessica had decided to go on a diet, she had also decided to try working out. She was at home one day in some form fitting yoga pants and an admittedly too small tanktop. The 500+ lbs woman looked a bit ridiculous as she stretched before her workout.

Jess' doughy, pale belly rolls hung out of her top and over the waistband of her yoga pants, down to her knees and stuck out at least a couple feet in front of her. Her wide, equally massive butt stuck out just as much behind her as her gut did in front. The beluga-sized brunnette huffed and puffed slightly as she stood up straight after feebly attempting to reach her chubby feet.

"Ok Jess...*pant* l-let's do *pant* this!" She said confidently to herself as she flipped the tv to the exercise channel.

On the tv it showed a thin, well toned man and woman as they cheerily called out and demonstrated various exercise techniques. Not even halfway through the 30 minutes of the program Jessica was out of breath, sweating, and red-faced from her tiring exertion.

"Phew...*huff* ooh boy...*huff* *pant*...ugh...*pant*...I n-need to r-rest...*wheeze* a moment..." she huffed as she plopped on the couch exhaustedly, belly and breasts rising in time with her deep, gulping breaths.
14331112.title: See Jess Sweat, See Jess Jiggle

choices: "I'm sorry, you're beyond repair. I can't help you."
"It'll be hard. But I'll try."
143311121.content:
Jess looked through the phone book, her sweat staining the page as it dripped from her hair. The blubbery woman looked about: This exercise stuff was nearly impossible alone, but maybe with someone who was into this whole fitness stuff could help. She finally pointed her blubbery finger to the number labeled "Jennifer Lasdowne: Weight Loss Dietician and Fitness Instructor." She picked up the phone and, still panting and huffing, spoke to her.

"Uhh...Hi...Yeah, this is Jessica Rhodes. I'm trying to lose weight...And I need a...Dietician...Uh...Three would be good....Okay, bye."

At 3 PM, the thin blonde entered the room after rapping at the door. Jessica was still in her ill-fitting grey tank top which she had rolled up to allow her gargantuan, pale stomach to roll out, effectively turning it into a sports bra.

The blonde woman spoke "Hi, Jessica!" The brunette smiled and replied. Hello, miss...Jennifer?" Jennifer smiled, giving her answer. "Yeah, I'm Jennifer. Let's have a seat, get started."

The blonde was Jessica's complete antithesis: She not only had a flat stomach, but she even had rather defined abs. She crossed her legs as she sat on the comfortable couch, whereas Jessica simply sat down.

Jennifer opened up. "So, Jessica, tell me about your usual diet." "Well, before I went on this diet, on a usual workday, I'd start off with... A breakfast burrito, two hash browns, a mocha and a hotcake platter." The dietician wrote it down. "Mmmhmm, and what do you eat now?"
Jessica recounted. "Well...I eat..A breakfast burrito, two hash browns, coffee with milk and cream, and a hotcake platter."

The dietician spoke. "So you just cut out the sugar?" Jessica nodded. "Well, kinda..Yeah." "Well, that's nice, but that's not a diet, that's just cutting out the sugar. Tell me about your exercise routine." "Uhhhhh, today's my first time exercising. Ever." The dietician was taken completely aback. "Ever? Counting P.E?" Jessica nodded. "I always came to it, but never did anything."

The Dietician carefully deliberated, and spoke.
143311121.title: Damage Control.

choices: Finds another dietician/personal trainer, but they only help b/c they're an FA
Gives up, and talks to her friends about the whole ordeal.
1433111211.content:
"I'm sorry, you're beyond repair. I can't help you. A person your size has a very, very slim chance of losing a substantial amount of weight and keeping it off through dieting and exercising alone. If I were you Jessica, I'd seriously consider either lapband or liposuction surgery." Jennifer said as she stood up and shook her head sadly.

"No Jennifer wait I really need your help; I can't do this by myself I-" Jess started to plead her case but was cut off.

"Jessica..." The thin woman sighed, "if you seriously wanted to lose weight you should have done something hundreds of pounds ago. Im sorry, but thank you for your time." With that statement, the dietician left.

Jessica was left sitting on her couch, frantic and almost in tears. She just couldn't believe her rotten luck. With her plump hands she began searching the phonebook once more, mumbling her thoughts.

"I can't BELIEVE her! 'Dietician and Personal Trainer' my fat ass! She probably isn't even liscensed...I thought personal trainers would have dealt with people like me, I've certainly seen them help worse cases!"

She continues flipping through the pages until she...
1433111211.title: "I'm sorry, you're beyond repair. I...

choices: They start by going over Jess' diet
They start by heading to the gym and having Jess go through some exercises
1433111212.content:
"It'll be tricky, but I'm willing to try if you are, Jessica." Jennifer said, nodding towards her client.

Jessica simply smiled and said "Oh, thank you! You have no idea how much this means to me."

"Alright well...lets get started!"
1433111212.title: "It'll be hard. But I'll try."

choices: Jess agrees, Jennifer moves in
Jess wants one last large meal, Jennifer joins
14331112121.content:
They started by going over what Jess ate in a typical day, and Jennifer was shocked. How can someone eat this much? Jennifer thought as Jessica went over the multiple servings of food that she ate every meal. After a while of Jess going on, Jennifer started typing things into her computer, and printed out something for Jess to look at.

"Sorry Jess, I know this is drastic, but this is how much you will have to cut down to if you want any shot at losing some of your weight." Jennifer replied.

Jess looked it over, Daily calorie count 1,500 ....Dinner: low calorie soup and garden salad As Jess thought about it, she realized she was probably averaging this per meal, and thought it was a little drastic.

"Do I really need to cut this much out?"

"Absolutely, if you want to do this, we are going to need to get used to reduced serving sizes."

Jess didn't know if that was something that she could ever get used it.

"Do I have any other options?" Jess asked.

"Well, there is one. You could retain me as a live in trainer. While you are at work, I would go to my other clients, but I would live in your house for around a year while I help you eat a healthy diet and live an active lifestyle."

Jess knew she could afford it, but did she want this fitness guru in her house with her. always watching what she ate?
14331112121.title: They start by going over Jess' diet

choices: Stuff her face while Jessica's out
Throw away the food
143311121211.content:
Jessica mulled it over. She really dreaded the aspect of having this health nut in her home, but she dreaded, even more, the aspect of getting any bigger. She was tired and if it meant giving Jennifer a try, she'd shoot. "Sure!" she said. Jennifer's face beamed with bright new energy. "Great! My old place was kind of a dump anyways." They exchanged details, and Jessica drove back to her place.

Jessica untangled her massive body from the seatbelt and her car, and walked inside her apartment building. Jessica fumbled with her keys in her sausage fingers as she breathily huffed from the exertion of merely walking from her car to her first-story apartment. Since Jessica was never a slim girl, she had made this calculation ahead of time, but as she'd gotten more obese, it mattered less and less, because her exhaustion always became more and more with each passing pound. She eventually keyed her lock and got in. She trudged in, having to slide her lardy frame in sideways due to her extending fat, and shut the door behind her, and pulled herself to a seat.

A short while later, a knock came to the door. She rose with a struggle and opened the door to see Jennifer standing in the doorway. "Hey, Jessica!" she said in her higher-toned voice. Jessica extended her hand and shook Jennifer's hand. "Heyy, Jennifer!" Jennifer walked into the apartment and looked around. "Wow, you've got some good taste!" spoke Jennifer, as she paused, looking at a fairly tasteful mirror. She nodded in approval. "Thaanks!" replied Jessica, "I bought a lot of this stuff. When I'm not spending money on food, I can buy some pretty good furniture." Jennifer nodded. "Mmm. Speaking of food, uh, mind if I take a look at what you've got?" Jessica nodded. "Sure." Here it comes. thought Jessica. A moment of dread washed over her.

Jennifer opened the fridge. Oh my god. was her first thought. Jessica's fridge nearly gave her a heart attack by proxy. All she saw was cholesterol after cholesterol, salt upon salt. Jessica's nutrition was out of wack in several kinds of ways and it nearly made Jennifer have a fit. "Wow, this is, uh.." She withdrew an econo-size tub of vanilla bean ice cream. "...not good." Jessica's face flushed red. Jennifer eventually finished taking out eighty percent of Jessica's foodstuffs. "Alright, roomie, let me just set my stuff down and I'll run out and grab you some nice, wholesome food." Jennifer set down her bags in the corner and ran out, shutting the door behind her.

Temptation rushed across Jessica's face. The writing was on the wall. She knew what Jen was doing for her was for the best, but her hunger overcame her. Additionally, the food was simply sitting on the counter, un-eaten. As the conflict in her mind ended, she decided to...
143311121211.title: The New Roomie

choices: Jessica's diet plans are ruined by her co-workers.
The next day, Jennifer takes Jess to the gym.
1433111212111.content:
Jessica's mind, even in this time of her supposed turn-around, was still consumed by ravenous hunger. She dove into the pre-packaged foods first. She mostly ate out but her apartment was full of junk food, and she wasted no time in ripping apart the bags of chips and crackers. She shoved piles of food down her gullet. Her mind ceased rational thought and turned to pure gluttony and ravenous consumption. She consumed so rapidly that at one point she could not use her hands to eat fast enough, simply up-ending the family-sized bags of potato chips and entire cartons of crackers into her waiting, hungry maw. Any unfortunate casualties that fell to the floor were grazed upon by Jessica, like an actual cow.

The salty snacks had finished, but Jessica saw the sweets. The exertion of consuming the salty food had given her a glistening of "fat sweats," but she could power through this for the bon-bons and cookies on the counter. She opened up the cookies first, double-fisting cookies down her throat. The sweets especially began to hit the spot. Jessica always had a fierce sweet tooth. She eventually got through the chocolate chip, leaving large smears of chocolate on the corners of her mouth, and she munched through the candy-crusted cookies. These were always Jessica's favorites among cookies in particular, and her face showed it, almost orgasmic as she consumed the boxes. The very large boxes took longer to eat, but Jessica's hunger could not be stopped by such petty things as food volume. She eventually finished these and she took another trip to the counter. She was getting annoyed by the fact of having to move, so she simply took the remaining food stocks in a great stack in her arms and waddled breathily back to her chair. She pulled to a stop and spread the treats on her lap. The first victims of her hunger were the bon-bons, glazed with bright white cream. Jessica shoved them in by twos and threes, and she was able to drive through these in minutes. The remainder were many, many assortments of sweets, cakes of many kinds, cinnamon buns, and she consumed the remainder of these within the hour.

In fact, Jessica had finished the last box and cast down the last box, and leaned back, panting from the exhaustion of the feast she had just consumed and sweating profusely, the light glisten of her forehead having gone to a drenching of sweat across her face, wetting the collar of her shirt, just as Jennifer returned. Her arms were laden with bags, as she paused amidst a greeting. She was dazzled, she had only been out for an hour and maybe a little more, and the countertop was empty, all its contents now emptied before Jessica. The morbidly obese woman had sunk into a sofa seat and leaned back, her head craning over towards Jennifer. The room was silent as Jessica's face flushed. Jennifer could only utter a "What?" Her brain was absolutely fried. The rest of her words slowly began to trail out. "I... don't understand... I thought you wanted to lose weight..." Jessica had no words, only breathless panting, her maw hanging open and her taut, full stomach hanging out in front of her and dangerously close to the knees of her lardy legs. "I come back here, and you're stuffing your face...This is not good." She took a deep breath, and sighed as she let it out as Jessica's face reflected a recognization of what she'd just done. The only words she could mutter were "Sorry..." Jennifer replied, "It'll be alright, we'll work on it. At least you got rid of all of the junk!" Jennifer began to chuckle. She put up the groceries and took out a piece of paper, showing it to the guilty glutton.

"Okay, so for breakfast we have a selection of any of this..." Jennifer motioned to what appeared to be a diet plan she'd held before Jessica. "Granola, toast, turkey sausage, egg whites...." She went on. The plan called for Jessica to cut out any of the sinful snacks at work, and take meal-preps made by Jennifer at home, and Jennifer would prepare something for dinner. Jessica submissively nodded. The guilt of being caught red-handed had subdued her. The rest of the day went by, and Jennifer prepared a healthy, very light salad-based supper. Jessica poked and prodded at first, but slowly began to eat. She did eventually finish the salad, which actually had some nice blueberries and other additions by Jennifer that made it not simply a bowl of leaves.
1433111212111.title: Jessica's Guilty Feast and diet futures.

choices: Jennifer notices that Jessica isn't losing weight, and intervenes.
Alice gets promoted. The gang begins trying to fatten her back up.
14331112121111.content:
"Thanks, guys!" Jessica replied as Holly and Emily handed her the box of donuts at one of their many coffee breaks. It had been a week since her roomie took her new place and Jessica had tried to resist the pressures at the office to gorge with her friends, but that lasted exactly one day. It was Wednesday, and she was now back into the fold, gorging on par with the rest. As Jess chomped through one donut, Emily spoke. "So, Jess. How's the whole new roomie thing going?" Jessica swallowed the remainder of the donut and spoke up. "It's okay. Jennifer really stays on my back, but I think she'll be good for me." Holly rolled her eyes as she sipped her coffee, nearly pale with creamer and milk. "You know all those so-called "nutritionists" are full of shit, right? One week they say something's good, the next they say it'll kill you. Just eat what you want." Jessica shrugged. "Like, I know what you mean, but I really don't want to get any bigger. Plus she lives in with me now. I can't just stop dieting." Emily grabbed a donut for herself and munched on it, then spoke up. "Well, like, just send her packing. It's your place. She doesn't have to live there." Jessica nodded as she almost subconsciously shoved another donut into her mouth.

The box, and another, were polished off. Lunch came about and Jessica pulled out her tupperware full of salad. She took out her fork and ate. No matter what the food was, Jessica could eat it mechanically. She hadn't gotten anywhere close to full, though. She leaned back and sighed in mixed sadness and dissapointment. Man, she thought, I wish I had some pizza.

Almost as an answering call from heaven, Emily and Holly walked in with three boxes of pizza. "Hey, Jess! I know you didn't forget it was pizza day!" Jessica smiled broadly. "Oh, you know I remembered!" She did as close as she could to leap up from her seat and take a box and set it down in front of her. She opened it. By this point the motivation that had driven her to half-heartedly diet was absolutely diminished before Jessica's endless appetite, and she piledrove through the pizza, stopping only occasionally to join in on the gossip of the coven. "I heard Alice is getting promoted." spoke Holly. Jessica's eyes lit up. Alice was always a bit tame for her taste. Emily's eyes turned to a mixture of disgust and dissapointment. "Ugh. Her. She always rubbed me the wrong way, always so, "Oooh, I can't eat thaat, I'm trying to lose weiiight..." She shook her head. "Friggin' goody-two shoes." Jessica furrowed her eyebrows and spoke up. "She's a good girl. Better girl than me. I heard she's been doing good and lost a lot of weight." Holly nodded. "Yeah. Don't be mad at Alice just cause she's got some willpower, Emily." Emily chuckled. "Whatever. I think people should enjoy themselves." By the end of lunchtime, all three had finished off their pizzas and polished off a good half of a family-sized bag of chips and a few cans of soda.
14331112121111.title: Steps Backwards

choices: The meeting comes, and of course there's a lot of food. Temptations abound.
143311121211111.content:
Jessica waddled back into the door. It was Friday, and Emily had brought in burgers. She entered the apartment in her Button-up blouse and black pants that were ripped at her thighs in many places and the flesh poked through the holes, jiggling with each step. Sitting inside was Jennifer, on the sofa-seat. Jessica walked in and waved. "Hey, Jen." Jennifer waved back and stood. "Hey, Jess. So, uhm, if it's alright, I'd like to talk to you about something." Jessica nodded. "Sure, go ahead." Jennifer spoke on in a solemn tone. "So, it's been about two weeks, and I haven't noticed any real progress. Of course, I might be wrong, which is why I'd like to just check." Jessica gave off a sigh. "Uh, sure."

Jennifer went into the bathroom and took out the scale and set it down. Jessica stepped on it, her heart became filled with dread. The scale gave off a few beeps. Jennifer bent over to read them. She sighed in turn. "512 pounds." Jessica sighed and pulled herself to a seat. Jennifer spoke up. "You put on six pounds in two weeks. I gave you a diet program, and by now you should be six less. Jessica cradled her head by her chins in her hands. "Like, I try. I eat the meals you pack! I don't get it." Jennifer spoke up. "I know why. It's because you're eating more. You're still eating those snacks." Jessica grunted. She wanted to deny it, but the extra pounds spoke louder. Jennifer continued, "Now, I can't follow you to work. I can't eat better -for you-. You've got to do this for yourself. For now, I can think of only one way to try to motivate you." Jessica picked up her head with a sense of dread and fear. Jennifer clapped from the bedroom. As she flicked the lights on in that room, a treadmill became visible.

Jessica was clutching the handrails for dear life. She was on four-speed, but for her, it felt like the machine was about to rip her legs off. Jennifer barked from behind her. "You've only burned one large fry off, and you've had two." It had been thirty minutes and Jessica's skin-tight tank top was absolutely drenched. It felt like her lungs were on fire. It felt like the worst form of torture. "You can't outrun a bad diet. Do you get that now?" Jessica mumbled something to the affirmative. Jennifer lowered the speed to two. "Good. Now do another ten minutes." Jessica nearly tumbled to the track had it not been for the handrails which she gripped for dear life. She panted and took the massive water bottle gifted to her by Jennifer as a move-in gift, and nearly upended the entire container into her thirsty throat. Ten minutes later she was off the treadmill. She swayed back and forth and each step felt like it were on rubber legs. Jennifer sighed. "I didn't mean to torture you, but you understand? You can't just burn off everything you eat. If you just eat what I put down, you won't need to burn off a single meal."

That weekend, Jessica was whipped into line with Jennifer's program. Surprisingly enough, Jennifer had salads and granola on demand for snacks, and these somehow managed to keep Jessica full. She even got on the treadmill and she felt like she didn't hate it. But her mind as she laid down kept going back to work. In the night, away from Jennifer's judging gaze, Jessica thought of work and the treats it brought. But the next morning she awoke to the sound of sizzling meat. She smelled it and she recognized it right away as she heard the tick of a stove shutting off. Jennifer had plates set out with bacon, pancakes, and eggs. "Morning, Jess! I made breakfast." Jessica was shocked. "Uh-Morning." Jennifer set a cup of coffee up for Jessica and handed it to her as the blubbery woman sipped. "I realized I'd been a little harsh, so I figured I'd reward you for your good work this weekend." Jessica looked with wonder. "Well..thanks! I appreciate it!" The two eat and it was almost like a barrier broke. They spoke like actual human beings rather than patient to doctor. Eventually the two finished and Jessica pulled on her work clothes. "I'll be back. I'll try to be good." Jennifer waved. "Bye! Have a good day!" Jessica walked out and got in her car, and drove to work.

Jessica took her usual park in the front row. It was an unspoken tradition that corporate workers and the fatter members of the office parked there, and interns who didn't observe it quickly found themselves on the recieving end of a yelling by one of the hog-like higher-ups, and out of the office. Jessica entered the lobby and the first thing she noticed in the ritzy lobby of the corporate building was the massive line stretching around the corner for the elevator. She stood in the line for a few seconds before something popped in from the back of her mind. Shit, the meeting! A meeting had been scheduled for that day, and it was only in an hour. The elevator was notoriously slow, in no small part due to the weight it carried. She knew there was only one option, and she tried to avoid it when possible. She stepped out of line, and headed up the stairs.

Jess found herself with a throng of the thin, young interns who were obviously new arrivals and a few of the unfortunate fat souls like her who were forced to trudge up. She trudged up past a woman of gentler face who seemed to be having no trouble. Jess had passed her off as an intern until a voice emerged. "Hey, Jessica!" Jessica turned to the voice. "Huh?" She looked into the face of the woman, and it took her a second until she recognized the basic features. It was Alice. "Alice!" spoke Jessica, as she struggled up the stairs. "Holy shit, you've lost a lot of weight!" Alice chuckled. "I could tell, when you hardly recognized me!" Jessica huffed out a reply, "Yeah. How did you ever manage it? 'Specially around...." She took a moment to gasp in some breath as she passed the first floor. "...Mel and the rest.." Alice nodded, keeping up effortlessly. "It was hard at first, but I found that the trick was mostly to keep my own mouth full all the time with healthier stuff. Plus, Mel's a natural pig." Jessica chuckled. "You got that right. She'd fit right into corporate.." She cast a glance down to her stomach, and put a hand on it as she trudged up. Alice patted Jessica on the back. "Aww, it's alright! Heck, if I'm not careful, I might be right up there with you." Jessica raised her brows. "Huh?" Alice followed up rapidly. "Didn't you hear? I got promoted!" As they reached the next inter-floor level, Jess stopped and bear-hugged Alice. "No way! Congratulations!" Alice hugged back, but she patted Jess on the back. "Thanks, babe, but you're kinda..." Jessica looked and noticed that she had accidentally buried Alice in her blubbery stomach. "Whoops, sorry." Alice chuckled. "It's alright!"

The two arrived at the corporate floor. Emily and Holly stood about sipping coffee and eating assorted candies and sweets. They turned about to Alice and Jessica, Jessica absolutely knackered and sweating profusely. "Heyyy! You must be Alice!" The chunky Emily shook Alice's hand first, then the absolutely blubbery Holly shook it next. Alice spoke. "Yup! And you guys are?" Emily spoke up. "I'm Emily." "Hi, I'm Holly." "Nice to meet you two!"
143311121211111.title: Confrontation at Home, and surprises at work.

choices: Jess stays with the program, but Alice starts gaining again.
Jessica and Alice both fall off the wagon, and plump up.
1433111212111111.content:
Eventually the blubbery trio entered the meeting room. As they entered, Alice drew many stares. There were even hushed whispers into others' ears. Alice pulled herself into a seat beside Jessica, whose buttons strained as she pulled herself to a seat, and her white shirt pulled as tight as the skin of a drum, every fold and fat roll exposed through the fabric, including her extensive belly which would have rubbed against the arms of her seat, but in the vastness of the Corporate meeting room, the armchairs were different, more accomodating for the variety of blubbery individuals, some of whom were real veterans, and barely fit in the chairs. Jessica's eyes searched the table as her chubby compadres took their seats. There was a spread of food, with everything from pizza and donuts to bowls of chips and candy.

The door opened and in walked the CEO, Lauren. It was almost anti-climatic for her to walk in, as she was hardly fat for an employee, let alone for a corporate. She didn't even look above 300 pounds. "Sorry I'm late," she spoke. "Caught up in the elevator line." She pulled herself briskly to her seat and rolled up. She sat down the binder and spoke up. "So, before we get started, I'd like to welcome our new addition. Everyone welcome Alice!" The room gave a round of applause, and then Lauren turned to her. "Just as a little cursory, uh, piece of custom, don't worry about taking anything from the spread here, we can always get more." Alice nodded. "Thank you, ma'am." Then the business began, long words about business figures, marketing campaigns. Jessica shifted uneasily in her seat. The presence of the snacks, everything that Jessica could desire and more. It was a cruel form of torture.

Jessica's capacious stomach rumbled. Her stomach hadn't yet fully adapted to the diet program, and she was unsure if it ever would. Jessica tried to shift her focus away, sipping on her mug of coffee. It helped keep her awake and her stomach stopped rumbling for a second and also helped keep her awake through Lauren and the higher-ups' quicker conversation. But it could only do so much for her blubbery stomach. She rubbed her blubbery thighs which gripped tight against her khaki dress pants in an attempt to distract herself from her hunger, but no matter what she did, the hunger always came back. She leaned on the table and tried to pay closer attention to what Lauren was saying. "...So what you're saying is, our quarterly earnings aren't growing fast as expected?" Nope, nothing interesting. But it was something to do. She listened in to the conversation, all about quarterly earnings, and rates, and marketshares. She'd learned all of this in school, but she couldn't care at the moment. The pizza's siren call became strong. In this moment of crisis, she had to rely on Alice. She looked, and Alice was steady. She wasn't eating, but she was obviously just as tempted as Jess. Jessica was slightly comforted, but she had to keep finding tactics. She grabbed her coffee mug and drank a long draught, then put it back down.

"Everybody else, your thoughts?" Jessica had just finished and put down her mug. She'd caught enough of what Lauren had said throughout the meeting to know that she'd been talking about to understand that Lauren was talking about the market share, and how to improve its growth. She pieced together in a moment what ought to be done. "Well, personally, I'd just say, we've been doing enough marketing. We have to do a closer look at the actual products on the ground. If we do some surveys and reward people who do them with, like, vouchers, we'll get a lot of good publicity,and we'll get honest feedback so we can make ground improvements. Generate our own hype from the bottom-up." Jessica might have been a glutton, but she was certainly nobody's fool. Lauren raised a brow and nodded. "Sounds solid. Any alternatives?" No voices were raised in opposition. "Thank you, Jessica. I'll take that as consideration. And with that I think we're going for lunch. Thank you, everyone, for your input." Everyone got up and Jessica hurried to her planned lunch and stuffed her face with the brown rice, chicken, and beans with some peppers thrown in. It was a big container. Jessica had resisted temptation, for now.

As the week went on...
1433111212111111.title: The Meeting.

choices: Jessica indulges that night. Her weight loss begins to slow.
Jessica sheds some pounds a bit too quickly for the gang..
14331112121111111.content:
As the next few weeks went on, Jessica was able to contain, at least temporarily, her ravenous hunger for fatty food. She found other things to do, or excuses. "Oh, sorry, I'd love some donuts, but I'm full from lunch." Additionally, she got some extra steps in at the office by volunteering to carry any necessary paperwork. She still labored through this effort, but she was showing almost uncharacteristic self-restraint and endurance, if only because she changed what she stuffed herself with. This was the linchpin of her diet strategy; lettuce. Whenever another meeting came about, or her co-workers were about to come in with lunch, second lunch, or one of the many snack runs they went on, she'd be busy munching on a bowl of random greens. In fact, Jessica began to show signs of improvement with normal movement, something she avoided like the plague and that pained her greatly. She huffed slightly more quiet as she became used to the movement. Of course, the blubbery mammoth was still exhausted by anything beyond slow plodding through the hallways of the offices, but she made movements. One could even swear her usually strained sleeves which contained her lardy arms, and the cloth around her buttons on the crest of her great singular stomach began to lax.

However, the snacks that used to go to Jessica were not simply being abandoned or being consumed by Holly and Emily. They turned their efforts toward Alice. By this point, unfortunately for Alice's waistline, she had let her guard down. First it began with an occasional donut or two at coffee. Then it carried on to accepting a few of the snacks that used to go to Jessica. She hadn't quite gotten back to the days that had gotten her to 350 pounds, and she kept active. But the pounds began to show. Her re-slendered physique began to soften. It started as a bulge re-emerging at the very bottom of her shirt, her arms softening and coming closer to the edges of the sleeves. One button became tighter. Alice didn't notice. But this complacency in her diet built as Alice focused less on losing weight, and more on fitting into the new environment. This wasn't lost on Holly and Emily, as they sat at coffee with Jessica as Alice was in Lauren's office upstairs. "Alice is starting to look like a Gordge girl again." spoke Holly as she munched through a mouthful of jelly donut. "Mhm." spoke Jessica. Emily spoke after a sip of coffee. "Yeah. It's probably just as well that you're passing up on our snacks. Alice needs some meat on her bones." Jessica chuckled. "It's funny to even think that she got this small. She'd play so innocent downstairs but hog out right up there with me and Mel." Holly nodded. "It's always the nice ones. They turn into such pigs when they drop the whole 'shame' act." Alice entered and gave a groan as she trudged to the Coffee machine. "Sometimes I hate dealing with Lauren. She's SUUUCH a killjoy." Emily nodded. "Yah, she's eternally on everyone's nerves. You try to give her the time of day, she assumes you're there to tell her somebody's trying to elbow in on our marketing." Alice nodded as she put a long stream of creamer into her coffee and stirred it. "Tell me about it." There was a pause of silence as she finished and turned around and pulled up a seat next to Jessica, rubbing the beginning of her reborn spare tire against one of Jessica's great fat rolls.

Alice sipped her Coffee. "You're looking nice, Jess, you've been doing good on that weight loss program." Jessica's face brightened. "Aww! You mean it?" Alice gave a muffled "Mm-Hmm." through a donut.

At home, Jessica re-entered the apartment. "Heyy, Jen!" she happily chirped at Jennifer. Jennifer smiled back at her from her position on the couch. "Heyy, Jess!" She got up and hugged as far around Jessica's great stomach as she could. "How did work go?" Jessica put up her things and began to change into a tee-shirt and sweatpants. "It went good! I've been avoiding the snacks." "Yaass! You've been doing super good. I think I can actually see you getting smaller." Jessica spoke up. "Thanks! Everyone's been saying that." Jennifer spoke up. "In fact, maybe step on the scale! I think you've made some progress!" Jessica nodded. "Alright." She waddled into the bathroom and stood on the Electronic scale. It took a few moments and Jennifer bent down. "Four-ninety-nine! You've lost twelve pounds!" Jessica could have jumped for joy. "Oh my gosh! Yesss!" Jennifer raised her hand, and gave Jessica a High-Five. "Now let's go slay this workout!" The two went off to the gym. Jessica did better than she normally did on the elliptical that night, and even lifted a bit. But in the back of her head, a dangerous thought reared itself. "I think I deserve a reward."
14331112121111111.title: Alice begins to backslide.

choices: Jessica figures that she's still doing well, and lets go at work.
Jennifer discovers Jessica hogging out in secret, but is turned on.
143311121211111111.content:
"One more, you got this, Jess!" Jessica eked out one final rep on the squat rack. She only squatted 50 for the moment, but it was a lot for Jess. Her legs burned from all the exertion but she pushed with one final grunt. She let the bar fall onto a notch in the rack and high-fived Jen. "Yess, girl! You killed it!" The muscled, thin woman walked next to the shorter blimp of a woman to the Lockers. Jessica's mind had made an as-of-yet unspoken decision, she did deserve a reward. And she knew just how she'd get it. She pulled off her clothes to reveal her true, naked, jiggling and blubbery form, covered with rolls at her side covered with sweat as she prepared to shower.

After she put her lounging clothes back on, and walked out with her gym bag, she walked to her car. "I'll be a little late getting back, by the way. I'm gonna stop for ciggies." Jennifer raised a brow. "Okay... I didn't know you smoked." Jess put her gym bag into her car. "I do it at work." Jennifer shrugged. She herself put a few cigs back whenever she went to the bar. "Alright. See you back at the apartment." Jessica stepped into her car and labored to pull her seatbelt across her stomach. It was only slightly easier than before; she was still nearly 500 pounds. She drove herself to a local gas station and after filling up her car she walked up to the counter. "Two packs of Billy Jack Menthols." The mid-aged woman turned about and fetched them. She scanned them in and also scanned in the multitudes of snack foods this whale was checking out, and a two liter of soda. Damn, she really don't need all that. She's big enough as she is, thought the cashier. "Thanks!" waved the blubbery woman as she walked out and sat down into the seat of her car.

She pulled out her lighter and attempted to spark it. She hadn't used it in a while, and her sausage-like thumb gave her trouble. Finally she produced a flame and lit a cigarette. She decided she'd have to be somewhat convincing that she was getting cigarettes. She took a long drag and coughed a long cough before then put the lit cigarette into the ashtray to smolder for a moment as she opened up a cheese pastry. She shoved it into her mouth and munched. She moaned orgasmically, she had almost forgotten the glories of this fatty food. In a moment she'd munched through her pastry, and took a drag from her cig again. She was able to hold in her cough as she took a second drag opening her other pastry packet. She continued this cycle, putting her cigarette back when she went to bite into her "little" reward. She blew through this fairly quickly and ripped open a bag of chips. She munched ravenously in handfuls, and only occasionally stopped to drink from her two-liter, straight from the bottle. She continued on, smoking and eating. An alarm began to sound in the back of her mind. What if I'm out too long, and she comes looking for me? That alarmed Jess. She didn't want to be on the receiving end of another lecture. She hurriedly huffed down the rest of this bag, until she realized she'd bought too many snacks to simply blow through in one go. It was a shame to waste all of it. So instead, she hid the bag in the foot of the passenger, and continued smoking her cig. Her apartment complex had a smoking ban, and she had to finish it before she got back, which she did, and stubbed out in her ashtray.

As she returned and discovered Jennifer was not yet home, she hurried back out and grabbed her snacks. She huffed as she speed-walked back in, and hid the bag under her bed. Jennifer was none the wiser the rest of the night while Jessica munched on her chips.

Jessica's weight loss began to slow, slowing from her major loss of several pounds in a few weeks to about a pound a week at most. She still did her walking and activity at the office, and still stayed away from the many snacks of her coworkers while at the office. But when at home, and when Jennifer was asleep, Jessica began having more "rewards." And conveniently, whenever she ran out of cigarettes, for Jessica began smoking just enough to keep up the ruse that she was a smoker, her junk stash would replenish, and in fact, grow.

In the meantime, Alice in these next three weeks continued growing. Her other buttons began tightening. Her breasts began straining hard against her shirt, and her arms became flabbier as she indulged more and more in her co-workers' habits. She'd stopped packing pre-planned lunches, and joined Holly and Emmy for lunch, joining them with their greasy, fatty foods. And as they themselves steadily grew, Holly having reached the 500 mark just that third week, so did Alice grow. Her small spare tire was joined by a larger belly in general, thicker thighs, and a slowly more fattened face, her cheeks growing in size, not quite sprouting a double-chin yet, but the beginnings of it formed in the shape of some flab below the jaw and on the neck.
143311121211111111.title: Just a little reward.

choices: Meanwhile, back home, Jennifer finds Jessica's stash. She eats it.
Alice has some clothing issues.
1433111212111111111.content:
Jessica sat taking coffee with Holly, Alice, and Emily. Alice had grown even more, but still had not gotten a new shirt. Her buttons were under near-constant strain, and she wore a Jacket. She munched mindlessly into her fifth donut of the break as she turned her head to Jessica, who was joining her. "Hey, Jess, I thought you weren't allowed to eat those?"

Jessica had figured her incremental weight loss was a good sign, and she figured she could relax a bit. She had good habits now, so she could afford to join back in on her co-workers activities. "I've been doing good. I deserve a little break." She munched through a donut, her sixth, and reached for another one. "Besides, I thought -you- weren't allowed to eat those?" Alice replied quickly in a defensive tone. "Whaddaya mean? I'm fine." She took a bite of her donut, and spoke through a mouthful. "I'm the healthiesht pershon in thish offish." She swallowed. Her double chin had begun to return in the few weeks following, and her ever-extending belly began to show through gaps in the buttons, and her belly began to leave its prior perch, no longer content to curtail itself, growing once again into a pot belly, and growing thicker every week, second-fastest being her breasts. Jessica's buttons had begun to strain again in their old fashion, and her shirt had actually seemed to grow tighter than before she began this program with Jennifer. Her relationships at the office, however, had been less cold and isolated due to her resumption of the favored social activity: eating. She had, in fact, joined the office lunches again, eating her packed lunch on top of whatever everyone else brought in.

Jessica blew through a few more donuts and spoke up. "I'm gonna go smoke." She left for the smoking room on the floor, installed for the comfort of the hefty smokers of the office. And, of course, with her went several bags of snacks and sweets. She stuck a cigarette in her mouth, lit up, sucked and then blew out some smoke as she set aside the lit tobacco and bit deeply into a long cheese pastry. For Jessica, the ever-more-frequent smoking breaks were all paired with snacks. Thus, as she deepened her ruse and growing addiction of smoking, she reversed her losses of late. She blew through the cigarette over the course of a few pastries, and eventually finished it.

As the blubbery woman smoked and ate, Alice and the co-workers gossiped at coffee. "I don't like how much she's been smoking recently." spoke Alice. Holly nodded. "Seriously. She smells like shit now. Reminds me of my dad. Did nothing but smoke all damn day." Emily leaned forward after a gulp of coffee and a donut. "Like, plus she's been blimping up recently." Holly nodded heartily. "Oh, yeah. Like, just a few weeks ago she was looking thinner. Now she looks like she's actually getting bigger than before." Alice leant forward, joining the gang. "Plus she's getting so tired now. She can hardly walk down the hall now. She has to stop every few seconds." The conversation was cut short as Alice walked back in, brushing crumbs off of her overstrained button-up and smelling deeply of tobacco smoke. They sat about and drank a bit more coffee.

Eventually they got back to their desks. Jessica squeezed into her chair. This had become more difficult of recently. Damn chairs, acting up again. She tip-typed on her keyboard as she worked, powered by the coffee she had consumed on her break. She was not one to shift her work, Jessica, though she might be an unhealthy smoking glutton, was not one to slack off at work. Part of this, however, was due to the fact that she kept focused at work through food. As she'd gotten addicted to smoking, all her runs on the gas station resulted in more cigarettes, as well as more food. She munched through several large bags of chips a day at her workstation, and numerous varieties of sweets. As she glutted herself and worked through uncounted time, her shirt-buttons grew tighter and tighter, to the point where her blouse became almost drum-tight.

Eventually, a cigarette craving struck her and she attempted to get up. The tight arms of the chair did not budge. "Damn it, something is WRONG with these arms." Jessica attempted to shove the arms back with her massive, meaty, ham-like arms, only causing these fat arms to jiggle, and her thick brown pony-tail to shake back and forth. A loud 'CRACK!' resounded, and her steel chair snapped like a twig. She collapsed with a massive 'THUD!'

She stood up and brushed herself off. "Man, these chairs suck." she muttered to herself as she retrieved a cigarette and breathily plodded towards the smoking room.
1433111212111111111.title: Jessica lets go.

choices: Alice does damage control, and it's worse than she thought.
How's Jennifer doing with Jessica's new gains?
14331112121111111112.content:
Alice listened as Jessica breathily plodded past her office. She shook her head as she bit into a chocolate eclair. Man, Jess has gotten pretty big. Someone's got to say something, she thought as she crammed the chocolate pastry into her flabby cheeks. The irony was absolutely lost on her as she completely finished the eclair and rested her flabby arms on her desk again and continued typing away.

She scratched at an itch in her side, her cherry red fingernails scratching across her grey flowery-patterned button-up blouse which screamed at every inch of fabric. Deep grooves cut into Alice's flabbier side. She became acutely aware that this shirt had fit her better once upon a time, but she was aloof of the cause. The washer really has shrunk this shirt. I gotta get it fixed, thought Alice. She idle-mindedly reached for a family-sized bag of chips and ripped it open and munched handfuls as she tip-typed at her keyboard. At every handful, the buttons that rode her swelling breast and her ever-growing belly which now teased just above her crotch strained and protested. Alice hardly felt this disturbance, only thinking of the report she was typing on. She rested her head on her elbow, accentuating her growing flab below her chin which grew carefully into a reborn double-chin as she sipped her coffee and thought of how to continue from her current position.

She reached into the bag ever deeper and grabbed a fistful of chips and shoved it into her mouth, munching the crisps, causing the exposed gaps of flesh between her buttons to grow more obvious. Alice rolled her head as she resumed her typing. Alice reached deeper inside, finding that her mindless grazing was depleting the chips at a rapid rate. She took the bag and up-ended it into her mouth, and finished her mug of coffee. She reached almost instinctively into her mini-fridge for a can of cola, which she popped open and began drinking. Before this, her blouse had been near the breaking point, but as she drank more cola and finished the large bag of chips, her buttons finally gave way with loud snaps combined with the ripping of the fabric attached to the shanks of the buttons which flew right before Alice, onto her keyboard. She gasped and inspected the damage. "Oh, my god!" she spoke to herself.

Alice had shirts shrink in the wash before, but this made her suspect that there was more than laundry tricks at play. She planted her face in her hands at the possibility that she was getting fatter again. She'd worked very hard to lose the weight, and here it was, coming back. As the sound of Jessica plodding down the hallway, her panting audible even from Alice's office, Alice held her shirt together as Jessica rested in Alice's doorway and looked. "Damn, Alice.." she spoke, taking a breather between this and her next statement, " You alright?" Alice flushed red as she spoke. "I don't know... Some buttons popped off... You don't got any spares, do ya?" Jessica scratched her head. "Uh, no. I can lend you my suit jacket...if you'll give it back." Jessica spoke, ending her sentence with a pant. Alice nodded. "That'll work." Jessica thudded off and reappeared a moment later with a suit jacket which she wrapped around Alice, who put it on and buttoned it with ease. It was very baggy, and Alice could button all of them with absolute ease. "Thanks, Jess! You're a life saver!" Alice hugged Jessica, being impacted with the smell of cigarettes. Jessica hugged back. "Don't worry about it!" Alice walked out and drove home. She had some damage control to do.
14331112121111111112.title: Alice has some Clothing issues.

choices: Jennifer finds Jessica's food stash. She quits and leaves.
Jessica gives up smoking, but binges instead, and her weight skyrockets.
143311121211111111122.content:
Jessica sweatily plodded into the spacious apartment, which had gotten a bit more comfortable with Jessica's corporate pay. Jen turned her slender form from its seated position on the couch toward Jessica as she entered. "Jessi!" She sprung up and kissed Jess on her blubbery cheek. Jessica hugged back. "Heyy, Jen! How's things been?" Jessica asked through her panting demeanor. "Pretty good, saw a client that had a lot of progress today." Jessica nodded in return. Jen turned her eyes to Jess's fat rolls that lined her back. Something's not right, thought Jen. Jessica was obviously gaining weight, but she couldn't make the connection. Where were these new pounds coming from?

Jennifer walked over to the stove and began cooking some rice and chicken. "I'll make some dinner while you relax. Work was alright?" The possibility entered Jennifer's mind that Jessica was likely back to eating the fattening office snacks.

"Yeah. Alice is gaining her weight back. Had to lend her my dress jacket." Jen gave a "Hm," as she brought the rice to a boil and set the chicken to bake. "Doesn't sound good. Maybe you might tell her to give me a call." Jessica walked into her bedroom and began changing out of her tight work shirt. "I'll give it a thought. She ought have it under control. She always was good at losing weight."

Jennifer gave the statement some space. I can't avoid it. thought Jen. She spoke up as Jess entered the room again in some sweats and a tee shirt, oversized about fifty pounds ago but tighter now. "By the way, not trying to be a bitch, but you look like you're getting bigger again. Be honest, have you been eating the snacks again?" Jessica sighed. She thought this question was coming. "Yeah...I know that I oughta stay away but the temptation is hard." Jennifer spoke up more reassuringly. "Well, don't worry about it, I know you can overpower them. Just remind yourself to pack your own healthier ones!" Jessica nodded. "Ooh, that's a good idea. I'll do it." Jennifer followed up with a reproachive tone, "And try to stop smoking. It's worse than if you kept getting bigger." Jessica sighed. "I guess." The two ate. Jessica smiled as they ate. "This is good, thanks."

The two polished off dinner and Jennifer took Jessica to the gym afterward. Jessica's blubbery form jiggled as she pulled and pushed the sticks of the elliptical back and forth, but she seemed to struggle. "C'mon, Jess, you got this," said Jen from the elliptical beside. It was only ten minutes in, and Jessica seemed to be doing worse than before. She was only ten minutes in but her skin-tight tank top which exposed her several rolls and clung to her massive, bouncing stomach and breasts was soaking in sweat. She climbed off five minutes later. "You can finish this, Jess, c'mon, get back up!" exclaimed Jen, but Jess plodded off. Jen sighed and left with her. Over the car ride back, Jen lectured. "You can't get better if you give up when it's hard." She went on, but Jessica was despondent the whole way.
143311121211111111122.title: Jen gets suspicious.

choices: Jessica drowns her sorrows in food and gives up all dieting. Her waist explodes.
Jessica tries one more time with Jennifer.
1433111212111111111221.content:
The next day, Jess had left for Work. Jennifer was on the couch answering a call, and became slightly restless as she spoke. As an active woman, she was never accustomed to being an absolute couch potato. She found herself sitting a bit more than she'd liked recently, but she stayed on her feet enough to keep her well-sculpted physique. She paced towards Jessica's bedroom as she spoke. "Oh, no no no, that's fine. I wouldn't mind coming back to the office tomorrow. New client?" She allowed her fellow practitioner to speak as she paced further. As she walked about and stood, she realized she wasn't going to walk much further. She began to step towards the Treadmill so she could walk infinitely as she spoke. The conversation continued for quite some time as Jennifer continued discussing events with her co-practitioner at her office until the talk inevitably ended. She stepped off the treadmill, just to see a wrapper protruding from under Jessica's bed. Jennifer's brain ticked, Is that what I think it is?

Indeed, it was a wrapper for a snack cake. And she caught a glimpse of something larger beneath the bed. The something turned out to be many somethings, Jessica's junk food cache. Jennifer sighed. "Oh my GOD," she spoke. "I can not BELIEVE this cow." She tried not to speak like that about her clients, but frankly, Jennifer's brain was at its breaking point with Jessica. She'd tried everything with her, she'd balanced tough love with nurture, but neither could fix Jessica. Jennifer continued yanking the fattening junk food out. No wonder Jessica's progress seemed to leap backward since she started smoking, she'd used it as a cover to get these snacks! "This dumb fat cow! I'm done with this, I'm done, I'm done." Jennifer literally threw up her hands and gathered her things, save for the Treadmill. That was Jessica's, only it was in storage before, where it would likely go again. Jennifer scrabbled a note, planted it on the coffee table, and left.

Jessica returned to the Apartment complex. The day had been a productive one, if slightly draining. She was sure she'd made some good progress on the deadline coming up and on top of that the co-workers had bought pizza. Alice in particular had partaken, and she showed that she was well on her way to surpassing her old appetite. At that moment, an oddity was noticed by Jessica-Jen's car wasn't there, at an hour when she was almost guaranteed to be. Jessica parked her car. The worst possibility began to form in her mind. Oh, no, please.

Jessica entered her apartment, and it was exactly as she feared. All of Jennifer's things, her laptop, her health magazines, her gym bag, all were gone, and all that remained in her place was a note on the coffee table in front of Jessica's comfortable beige couch. Jessica breathily picked up the note, the act of bending down strained her over-stressed white button-up blouse which exposed gaps between the buttons, and was perfectly skin-tight, exposing every one of her rolls and her rolling single gut which rose and fell with her rapid breaths. The note read, "Jessica; I give up. I discovered your stash of snacks under your bed. I only help people that want help." Jessica turned to her bedroom, and all of her stashed snacks sat on her bed. She wailed as she ran to them, her hope of salvation from her weight had gone. The motivation faded away as the tears rolled down her face. She munched into the pile of snacks, ripping the packaging with her teeth and raking food into her mouth straight from the bed. As the pile shrunk, her kneeling position became uncomfortable on her taxed knees which had to bear every pound of her blubbery body. She brought herself to a laying position on her bed facing the pile of snacks, as she dug her face in and ate like a hog from a trough. She hardly heard her buttons pop off and rattle against the floor, she hardly felt her shirt dangle freely towards the bed. She didn't consciously bring herself to sleep, but instead found her exhahusted, sweaty head inside the pile of wrappers with no power left in her immensely obese, whale-like body to withdraw it.

When Jessica awoke, she found herself buried in a pile of snacks. Her first gasping breath brought a piece of plastic from the wrapping into her throat, which she violently coughed out, shaking her flabby body and her second chin which jiggled violently at the assault by the foreign object. She looked at her blouse, which was torn and shredded by her binge. Enough food which would have lasted anyone a month had lasted a night. Jessica groggily brought herself up and searched for anything which would fit. She searched for her pants. Nothing would fit, no button would button. She gave up on the dress pants and tried to pull on one of her dress skirts, a black one. It went smoothly up her cankles and her blubbery leg rolls until it hit her larded thighs, thick with fat. Jessica yanked and yanked, the last pull of her strength barely getting the skirt past her thighs which released it with a violent ripple of flesh, already jiggling from the exertion Jessica gave to try to pull them up. Jessica sat and panted, sweating intensely just from this minor stress. She realized the skirt was not even all the way up onto her stomach as it was supposed to be and attempted to pull it up further. This was too much for the skirt as it ripped. Jessica screamed and pounded her bed. She violently shook her own stomach. "Why the fuck did I ever have to listen to you!?? WHY!??" She violently tried to run on the treadmill, she felt she had to punish her stomach for the ruin it had inflicted on her, jiggling it intensely. Her lungs already taxed from her new smoking habit and the bout with her clothes were having none of it, and she barely went a breathy, panting minute before she collapsed on the treadmill. The treadmill lacked the power to drag her off of it on her supine position on the tread, as she simply lay on the treadmill. She groaned and pulled herself up. She wiped her tears, pulled on a looser, non-button blouse which still exposed the bottom portion of her stomach and some elastic waistband pants, and plodded on her way.
1433111212111111111221.title: Jennifer's Limit.

choices: By Christmas about 4 months later, Jess hasn't slowed down.
Jessica is sent on a business trip to a corporate partner with thinner workers.
14331112121111111112211.content:
It was lunch-time at the corporate lunch-room of Gordge. Alice wore her new shirt which was still slightly loose as she munched on a bacon cheeseburger from a local fast food joint. They heard the thud of feet plodding towards the room and in walked Jessica with three boxes of pizza. The rest looked at her. "Well, seems like someone's hungry!" piped up Alice. Jessica sighed. "Yeah..." Holly's face, plumper as of late, frowned at Jessica's voice. "Aww, what's wrong pumpkin?" Jessica sat down and ripped open a box of pizza. "My dietician gave up on me, so I guess I've given up." She stacked two slices of meat lover's pizza and ate them as one slice, half of them gone in one bite. Emily patted Jess on her meaty back, sending a jiggle across her blubbery upper back. "Aww. Well, don't get so down about it! She was a bitch anyway. Dieticians generally are." Holly hummed in confirmation. "Plus, now you can eat whatever you want!" Jessica powered through two more slices, then replied. "Yeah, you guys are right... Food always has helped calm me down.."

Jessica munched through the remainder of the pizza as the rest continued their own lunch, and then without a second thought, she opened the second box and continued munching. Emily reached her blubbery arm for the box of donuts habitually on the table. "Here, have some donuts, darling! I got some new ones today, Jelly, and Boston Creme.." Jessica nodded as she blew through two more slices and grabbed two donuts and bit through them in two bites. She nodded. "Thanks for the support, guys.." Before lunch had ended, she'd ploughed through all three boxes and half of the box of donuts, with room left for a cheese danish, and as habit a cigarette, but with all the constant eating she barely had the breath to take a pull, but it was a habit, and she had to finish it.

When Jessica had left for her cheese danish and cigarette, Emily spoke up quickly. "Jess is kinda scaring me, like, seriously. I can understand comfort eating, it's how I got to where I am today, but three pizzas?" Alice nodded. "Seriously, it can't be good for her. Think we should say something?" Holly shook her head. "This'll die down in about a week. And if it doesn't, who cares? We're all pigs here anyways." Emily sipped some coffee. "Well, maybe you are, Holls." She sent a sausage-like finger into Holly's blubbery double- stomach which strained her button-less shirt. Holly had been expanding quite significantly, and she looked to be at least 580 if not in the 600's. Holly rubbed the stinging jab. "Hey, fatass, you're not any skinnier." She sent a vicious elbow into Emily's also capacious gut, taking the wind out of the about 500-pound blimp. Alice stood up. "Now, now, calm down, this is a break room not a fight club! What's wrong with you guys?" Emily took her breaths back in while Holly aggressively munched a donut. After another, she sighed and spoke. "Sorry. I just... don't like when people get like that about my weight." Emily grunted and finished the box of dounts just before the group adjourned to go back to work.
14331112121111111112211.title: Jessica gives up.

choices: Jessica arrives the next day at Dynamo. She gets more looks.
Jessica goes out on the town, and gathers some attention.
143311121211111111122112.content:
Jessica sat munching breathily through a family-sized pack of chips as though it were a small snack bag while she tick-typed. Her new heights in hoggish eating had slowed her work-pace, and this had come into consideration as Jessica had a knock on the door. She looked up to see the fat, red-haired form of Lauren Gordge. She was more plump than her past appearance at the meeting, some 30 or 40 pounds more than before, just short of the 300 pound mark if possibly just on it. "Heyy, Jessica" she spoke, "How's your day been?" Jessica turned to Lauren, just in time to see her slide a snack cake onto her desk. Jessica smiled. "Hey, Miss Gordge, it's been pretty good, gotten those reports done and some correspondences sent to those guys in Seattle, Dynamo?" Lauren nodded, accentuating her smooth double-chin. "Yeah, Dynamo Inc. Funny you mention them, we need someone to go there and sit in on a board meeting, and I was thinking you." Jessica smiled and replied "That sounds great, when's the meeting?" as she unwrapped the snack cake and nearly inhaled it at the speed she consumed it. "Uh, it's on the twenty-third, so about three days. We're covering your ticket, so after work today, your ticket will be ready for tomorrow at nine in the morning." Jessica nodded, "Sounds good, thank you!" Jessica turned back. She heard a rustling. As Lauren left, she'd left another snack cake on Jessica's desk, which she finished about as quickly as before.

The next day dawned. Jessica had a light breakfast of four bacon, egg, and cheese biscuits, with two large orders of hash browns, which she scarfed down as she drove in her increasingly tight blouse. It had been about two weeks since Jennifer had left, and Jessica had bought a new shirt in a larger size the day after her first day back. It was fairly loose when she bought it, but now more of it had become taut. The sides still billowed out as they tucked into Jessica's ever-tightening pants, from which her thighs made the seams strain at their vastness, especially when she sat down. Her stomach expanded and bulged as she rabidly chomped her biscuits, guzzled her coffee and munched her hash browns.

By the time she'd parked in the airport lot, finished her food and her coffee, her buttons began to show some strain. Thankfully for the longevity of her shirt, when she stood up, the fabric relaxed some, but the evidence of her "light" breakfast was still evident through her white blouse neatly tucked into her pants, and her expanding stomach protruding from her tight white shirt made her look like a white blob. She focused on breathily plodding towards the terminal. She began to notice a great deal of stares directed her way. She tried to ignore them, but eventually she began to wish she had stayed with Jennifer's program. Jesus, I'm a whale. she thought to herself as she glanced at the center of attention: Her bloated stomach and her breasts. Jessica sighed as she entered the terminal and went through security. She paused after passing the tall scanner. "Ma'am, you've been selected for a more extensive search." spoke the female agent. She was thin and blonde, and reminded her of Alice before she started re-gaining her weight. She consented, she didn't want to miss her flight. She bore as the hand of the agent patted across her body, creating ripples across her fat. She felt more eyes on her as she regretted doing the search in public, but eventually nothing was found. As Jess walked away, the Agent bit her lip as she looked. Damn, she's cute. the agent thought.

Eventually Jessica found herself waddling onto her flight. She squeezed, quite literally into her window seat in First Class past an old man who looked ready to hop onto the golf course. The old man glanced at her stomach. He leaned over. "Y'know, that ain't good for ya. You ought lose some weight." Jessica nervously chuckled. "Y-Yeah, I ought to." "Yeah, what with all the heart disease an' joint probl'ms y'have with that while you're young, y'ought to save some of that for later." He chuckled after that. Jessica leaned onto her seat and set her bag under the seat in front of her. Eventually the usual talk came over the intercoms about buckling the seatbelt, and Jessica attempted to stretch the belt across her stomach. She got to just above and to the left of her belly button. She tugged and tugged but there was no more fabric to the belt. She sighed. She would need more help. She would need the belt extender, the clear bell to the plane that an obese person was on the plane and so much of a whale that they couldn't fit the belt around their massive stomach.

As if the rest of today's parade of humiliation wasn't enough.

Jessica stretched up a lardy arm and waved. A flight attendant stopped by and leaned in. "Yes, what seems to be the problem, ma'am?" a fairly chunky female flight attendant spoke. "Uh, yes, I need help putting the belt in." Jessica demonstrated, trying to pull the belt around her mountainous belly in vain. The chubby attendant nodded, "Yes ma'am, I've got you." She leaned down, straining her already tight blue uniform, and grabbed a belt extender. The seats around her directed their eyes to Jessica, then away. The attendant fastened in the extender and then pulled the belt down, buckling it in, though she had to give the extender a bit of slack to meet the buckle. She stood up and then walked away.

Soon, the plane was taxiing down the runway to the final strip. Jessica gripped the armrests. She had never been one for flights, but driving from the east coast to the west was an arduous task for even the most seasoned driver that there was no time for. One reason for this dislike was the very occurrance that came upon Jess, as the plane sped forward like a galloping stallion. Jessica's already overtaxed heart raced as she gritted her teeth and trembled, giving a jiggle across her body. Then there came the lifting sensation as the plane's wings gathered air beneath them, and lifted from the ground. Jessica's heart slowed as the plane climbed and eventually reached cruising altitude. Jessica waited for the snack cart to come by. She bought a bag of M&M's and a coke to gnosh on, without criticism from the old man who was fast asleep. Jessica had a reprieve at this juncture at least. After munching and finishing her coke, she fell asleep on the comfort of her blubbery shoulder and bicep.


When Jessica awoke, the plane had pulled into the terminal, and the old man had already left. She waddled off the plane and out into the terminal. First things first, she waddled to a burger joint inside the terminal, grabbed a large combo and an extra order of fries, and consumed it with voracity. That power nap took a lot out of her. Afterwards, she took a rental car to her hotel, got up to her room, and watched some TV.
143311121211111111122112.title: The start of a blubbery business trip.

choices: Jessica gets rewarded, but the Physical comes with a catch.
Alice has a wake-up call.
1433111212111111111221121.content:
Jessica awoke bleary-eyed to her alarm. She groaned and pulled herself up from the bed. She rubbed some sleep from her eyes as she dismissed her phone alarm, reading the time. It read "6:44". Jessica hurried to her suitcase and pulled out a better-looking suit, but one that was from the last time she bought clothes, back when Jennifer was still in her apartment. Just by looking at her shirt she knew it was going to be an uphill battle. She sighed, pulled the sleeves on, and buttoned the wrist-buttons. A bit hard due to her lardier forearms, but doable. She focused to the next challenge, and sucked in her massive, rolling gut as much as she could. She pulled her buttons together, but one by one the task became more difficult, from hard, to ridiculous. Hard were the buttons in the valley below her breasts and above her belly, and even harder was her collar-button. She held her breath and pulled hard, and her collar finally buttoned. Breathing became a bit more difficult, but possible. Then came the next challenge. There was no sucking in to be done for her breast button, and it proved difficult. She pulled three seperate times, each time drawing more breath, inducing more sweat, and creating more difficulty, but with one surge of effort, the button slid into the hole and held its position against much resistance. Then came the greatest challenge, the one button she had not tackled; the button on the crest of her belly. She sucked in, she pulled, but nearly nothing would bring the button to within more than an inch of the hole. Her blubbery arms strained. Jessica knew she didn't have much time, city traffic was rough, and it was a long drive to Dynamo. She determined one last time to pull the button into the hole in spite of her lard. She had to do it, so she pulled one last time. She pulled, there were only centimeters between the button and the hole. She stretched the hole. There was a bit of a rip then from the fabric below the hole itself, but with that last sweat-filled, panting effort, the button met the hole, with only the loss of a few centimeters of fabric. After this she pulled on the skirt with a great struggle at her thighs, and by some miracle, fit the skirt around her spare tire, covering the bottom of her strained shirt. Every item of her clothing seemed like it begged to be let loose, and Jessica became very aware of her recent decadence due to the tight, digging nature of these clothes. To attempt to cover this up, she pulled on her dress jacket, and gave up on buttoning the jacket, it would only make her seem more like the fat cow that she knew she was.

Jessica went downstairs and grabbed a plate of food and a cup of coffee. This would have to suffice, the meeting was at eleven, and if this city was anything like Gordge's home offices, this would be a pain to drive in. She scarfed down her food like a wolf, unbeknownst to her, to the amusement of several in the breakfast area. A few women whispered to each other a ways behind her about the whale in front of them in one of the worst-fitting suits they had ever seen. Whenever Jessica got up, they could see every fat roll, every centimeter of her blubber, every inch of strained fabric which screamed desperately to escape. Jess focused on none of this. She focused on inhaling the food and coffee in front of her. She would have to let this be her breakfast, as her schedule had her leaving the hotel a few minutes from now. She got up and threw away her empty plate and refilled her cup with some coffee, put a lid on it,and waddled out to her rental car with the files within. She then pulled out and headed to the roads. Her GPS led her through the streets, and the traffic wasn't the worst she'd seen, actually bringing her to the tall 10 story glass office building labeled 'DYNAMO INVESTMENT' and its accompanying subterranean parking garage.

After she pulled her car into a spot and waddled towards the elevator, she recognized a sign on the elevator: "NOTICE: FOR USE OF DISABLED INDIVIDUALS ONLY." There was some smaller text, which read, "Attention! Keeping in mind those less able and conveniencing them, Dynamo Inc requires that employees and individuals utilizing Dynamo facilities with no motor impairments use the stairs." A green label stood below, with a white turbine, the symbol of Dynamo, against a green apple, with the words in bold: "DYNAMO HEALTHY LIVING INITIATIVES." Jessica groaned and trudged up the stairs. She trudged up the stairs, she was on sublevel 4, and the ground floor was 4 flights up.

Jessica steeled herself. She was truly about to pay the price for her fat lifestyle.

Her eyes blurred with sweat and her breath grew hard. She had done only two flights, but it felt like two hundred. Her legs burned as she powered on. She wasn't about to commit a faux-pas in the presence of a potential contract partner, however. She would sooner deal with Jennifer's regime again than come back home with nothing in hand. So she powered on, committed to doing what she came here to do. Eventually, she finally hit the ground floor. She was dazed and exhausted, and her lungs burned with exhaustion. Her feet had gone numb, but she got out of the garage. She took a moment and gathered her appearance. Her hair was set by her hairspray, and only a few rogue agents needed setting in place. She entered the lobby, looking like an absurdly fat penguin in her waddling gait and her full-to-bursting suit. She attracted some looks that were more than an acknowledgement of her existence, including the Receptionist. Jessica waddled up, took a deep breath on her approach and spoke. "Hii, I'm here from Gordge, Jessica." The receptionist nodded. "Alright, lemme see.. Jessica... Ooh, here you are!" she spoke up after thumbing a page or two through the page of persons. She looked up at Jessica. "Here you are. Third floor meeting room, thirty minutes." Jessica nodded. "Thank you." The receptionist watched Jessica waddle on her way. Whispers were had in the lobby, even some quiet snickers. Jessica paused before trying to get up the stairs. She took some deep breaths. This would be the last great exertion. She looked up and saw some inspiration. Maybe it was the thought of Lauren giving her that twenty-five percent comission from the deal. Maybe it was the thought of having no more stairs to deal with today. But she powered up after her lungs ceased burning, and pushed on. For a moment after completing the first floor, it was almost like she was back into her exercise routine days.

That was, until she got onto the next set. Then it was back to hating every second of this.

Jessica finally got up to the third floor. The top of her collar was wet with sweat, but she pulled out a napkin, and dabbed it off, along with the rest of the sweat on her face. She wasn't about to screw this up by looking like a slob. To that end she also struggled to pull her suit buttons into place. It was hard, but accomplishable. However, it came with a price; A few of the suits around the tall, brown-haired man that Jessica recognized from an email from Lauren as being James MacDowsen, the CEO of Dynamo. He turned to her. "Ah, so you must be the representative from Gordge. Miss Rhodes?" Jessica extended her hand to the suave brown-haired man. "Yes, Jessica Rhodes. Pleasure to meet you, mister MacDowsen." The man shook her hand, and the two sides entered the meeting room.

Coffee was served and Jessica opened.
