"As has been stated prior in correspondence, we are in agreement that both of us would benefit from mutual contracts, but we were informed that you wanted to, so to say, work some kinks out." A thin, raven-haired woman who seemed like a much thinner version of Holly in her 40's spoke up. "Yes, it's mostly in terms of public relations." Jessica couldn't help but feel as though the woman was looking at her with a judging stare. "You know our reputation as a company that puts health first. We've instituted policies that encourage a healthy environment, thus why we have our employees take the stairs, we also prohibit them from bringing in food from unhealthy establishments, including some 'red light' foods that are not tolerated in our breakrooms. Your company has a certain reputation which seems to be the polar opposite, and although we do not want to force policy change on you, we would like a promise of some kind of action about the situation." The woman sat. Jessica noticed her looking directly at one of her suit buttons which barely held in place. Jessica thought quickly on her feet. "We understand your concerns, but do understand, Gordge's policies are longstanding, and if we take such measures, you'd understand that wouldn't be feasable without some corresponding action freeing up your employees. These kinds of partnerships are built off of parity, not dominance." turned to her at the end of the sentence. "This is absolutely true, but still, do understand that we aren't going to change our hard policy and we aren't sacrificing our image. This parity you speak of, it's gotta come in a compromise. So how's this for a compromise; we ditch the red light food policy, if once a year physicals are brought in for Gordge, first one up front." Jessica figured this was the closest she could come without driving Dynamo off. "Sounds good to me. I'll communicate this to Miss Gordge." The two sides stood up, and the blimpish Jess shook MacDowsen's hand. The deal was sealed, with only some minor negotiations to be had.
1433111212111111111221121.title: Trials and Tribulations for Jessica.

choices: Jessica tries to quit smoking to meet the quota.
Jessica tries to lose weight to meet the quota.
14331112121111111112211211.content:
Jessica sat triumphant in the break room with the gang surrounding her, back pats going all around and a new indulgence in the donut box: Chocolate-filled chocolate donuts. Alice picked one out and spoke before cramming it into her mouth. "Congratulations on that commission, Jess. Everyone's saying nothing but good things about you!" The whole corporate sphere was in a jubilant mood. Alice's cheeks puffed up as she munched the donut. She seemed as if she were just short of being back to her 300 pound self, but Jessica was too excited to care. "Thanksh!" she said through a full mouth, "But I gotta tell ya." She took a pause to swallow her chocolate mouthful, wiping some residue off the corner of her mouth. "This place I had to go to, hell. No elevators open for use unless you were in a wheelchair or a walker. All. Stairs." A groan came up from the group. "Oh my god. That sounds horrible." said Holly. She was sitting a ways away from Emily, further than usual by about two spaces. Emily nearly spoke up afterwards, but something stayed her tongue. She took out her phone as Alice spoke up.

"Yeah, and Lauren says she's planning a big party wednesday next week." Both Jess and Holly joined in an 'Ooooh.' Emily gasped and groaned. "Oh, my GOOOOOOOOD." Holly briskly replied in an annoyed and sharp tone. "What?" Emily's brows furrowed as her head turned towards Holly, but then swung onward to the rest of the group. "We've got a physical on Thursday after. Office-wide, mandatory." Everyone joined in a collective groan of annoyance. "Wait, it gets worse. There's a caveat to this too. Anyone who meets, like, some criteria or whatever is going to get sent on five month paid administrative leave, and if they don't improve by the time they get back, they're out!" Jessica spoke up in outrage. "What!? That's bullshit! I can't believe this, they're threatening to fire us!?" Alice's face turned to despair. "I don't understand, what the hell? This is out of nowhere, I can't remember the last time we had a physical!"

The stress mounted and the gang dispersed to go back to work. The sound of stress eating echoed down the hall, wrappers opening and cans of soda cracking open. The last physical came when someone had been rushed to the hospital for passing out going up the steps, and it had been a long time ago. The office was in a period when many of the old guard had begun to reach their peak weights, and were still in. This scared especially Holly, who opened packets at a rapid rate. This scared the ever-loving hell out of her. Nobody knew what criteria would be looked for to threaten their positions here. All they knew was that tomorrow, blubbery heads would roll.

The lobby was filled with the sweating, anxious, blubbery forms of the workers of Gordge. These types of crackdowns very rarely came, and many not involved in corporate were anxious. Some rumored that Gordge was going to start bringing in treadmill desks. Some said that these were going to be mandatory. A lot of rumor got thrown around. But eventually the line stretched around to a group of impromptu cubicles set up with medical personnel going back and forth, names being called to come forth and enter the cubicles and exit 30 minutes later, reactions varied, some were ecstatic, some were terrified, some were apathetic.

Soon came Jessica's turn. She entered and was met by an old stone-faced man, wrinkled and worn with a bald spot at the top of his head. His voice was low, full of bass, but rose and fell. "Alright, take a seat there." Jessica hated doctors. She was obviously very anxious. She bit her lip, as the thought of a cigarette came to her. Soon the Doctor came with a barrage of questions as he ambled about and set up a scale, got out a blood pressure sleeve, and arranged his pen and paper to write, pausing his tasks after Jessica's reply. "Do you smoke?" the old man asked. Jessica sighed. "Yes." She couldn't lie. She had a cigarette beforehand, and smelled obviously of it. "Do you have a family history of Heart Disease, Diabetes, or High Blood Pressure?" Jessica thought back. She had an aunt who died when Jessica came out of college of heart disease, but beyond that not much. "No." The doctor continued scribbling. "Do you get thirty or more minutes of exercise a day, or one hundred and fifty a week?" Jessica sighed. "No." The doctor scribbled and then moved to fit the sleeve around Jessica's arm. "Hold your arm still." Jessica murmured an affirmative. This proved to her always to be a difficulty, suspending her blubbery arm which barely fit the sleeve in mid air as the arm fat on the underside of her arms jiggled and protested against the constricting sleeve. Soon the doctor began squeezing the ball attached. The sleeve seemed to choke Jessica's arm, and eventually the Doctor checked the number. He sighed and scribbled something on his paper. Jessica couldn't see the number, but the Doctor's expression became more morose than before, which was somehow possible.

"Stand up and step onto the scale." Jessica did so and stood on the scale. The number dialed back and forth and soon announced robotically, "Five hundred and forty six point six pounds." Jessica emitted a "Damn." aloud. The doctor scribbled again and then spoke. "Sit back down and take deep breaths." He withdrew his stethoscope and listened in. Jessica's heart beat hard as the doctor listened, but Jessica thought nothing of her heart rate. The doctor scribbled it and checked for a vein to draw blood from. He grunted in annoyance as he searched hard to find a vein, palpitating. Eventually he had to resort to using a tourniquet to make a thin blue vein make itself apparent. Jessica turned her head. She could deal with the prick of needles, but she hated seeing them go in. After a moment, the doctor withdrew the needle and band-aided Jessica's needle mark, and removed the tourniquet. He spoke up as Jessica stood. "I'm going to tell you, even before your blood work comes back, I think I can say just by your heart rate and your blood pressure, you're already far below what's required in those slots. If your cholesterol is any higher than average, you'll have to go on that five month paid leave. I'd advise losing weight and stopping smoking, because both of those things are ruining your health, just looking at your heart rate, blood pressure, and weight alone. For weight loss, may I suggest my good compatriot Jennifer Lasdowne? She's had great success even in this same office."

Jessica waddled out with a copy of her physical. She had been on the disregarding side of the spectrum in terms of caring for her weight and health, but looking at the numbers compared to the scale provided on the paper, she became deeply worried. She was unsure about trying Jennifer again, but also unsure about trying to quit her cigarette habit. As expected, her bloodwork came in and her cholesterol was far above average. Jessica was on the way out when Lauren Gordge's form passed her office, and stopped. "So, Jess, I heard that you've got to go on that five month leave. I gotta say, I love the work you do for this company, but you've got to be around to do more. We need you, Jess. You don't need to turn into Jillian Michaels or anything, just get healthy. Your numbers scare me." Jessica sighed and nodded. Lauren patted Jessica on her meaty torso. "Hell, I ought to get healthier myself. You might come back to a thinner me, in fact." Jessica left. She would not see the office again for another five months, and as she arrived home, her mind pondered her options.
14331112121111111112211211.title: Physical Peril

choices: Jessica keeps going, and she's much thinner after five months.
Jessica fails to keep it up, and she gets fired after five months.
143311121211111111122112112.content:
Jessica took a deep breath after she had gotten home. She really didn't want to have to deal with Jennifer again, but she also really didn't know how she was going to make it without her cushy corporate position. She picked up the phone and called the number. A feeling of apprehension and slight dread came into her head as the phone dialed. Soon, a voice came up. "Hello, offices of Lasdowne and Mazowitz, Weight Management Specialists, how can I help?" Jessica spoke up. "Hey, this is Jessica Rhodes, I'd like to speak to Jennifer Lasdowne about a weight loss program." The receptionist spoke up. "Sure thing, please hold." Jessica spent a few moments on hold, some generic digitized version of a pop song playing over the phone. Soon, Jennifer's voice came over the phone. "Hello, this is Jennifer Lasdowne. How can I help you?" Jessica spoke up. "Hi, Jen, it's me, Jess. I'd like to ask about resuming that weight loss program." Jennifer spoke up. "Oh, sure, sure. I'd be okay with that. Same thing as before, the live-in or do you want a more hands-off approach?" Jessica spoke up. "The live-in, please."

Jennifer had arrived at the parking lot and strolled briskly towards Jessica's apartment. It had been a while since she'd done the live-in. She still remembered the debacle that was Jessica's prior attempt, but she'd forgiven her for that long ago. She approached Jessica's door and knocked. Jessica opened up. It became blatantly obvious that Jessica not only had not tried to continue on without her, but had gone nearly in the opposite direction, her blubbery body looked even fatter. "Heyy, Jessica." Jennifer spoke. Jessica nodded in reply and spoke up, "Hi, Jen." Jessica stood aside. The thin, brown-haired form of Jennifer passed Jessica's hulking fat form and entered. She checked about. Things looked like they had before she had come the first time. There were pizza boxes in one corner and bags of junk food in the trash can. "So, what's happened since I left?" Jessica spoke up, taking a deep breath beforehand. "Uh, I sealed an agreement with another company, part of it was physicals, once a year every year with the caveat that anyone who had particularly bad health had to be sent out for five months to fix it. If I don't fix my health issues in five months, by the time I get back, I'm fired." Jennifer nodded. "Oh. Well, don't worry, now you don't have to worry about the office snacks! But really, I'm sorry about the health issues. I -am- also a certified medical doctor besides just specializing in diet. I can help you keep track of that stuff." Jessica sighed. Jennifer stood up and looked in the pantry. Jessica spoke up as Jennifer peeked. "Oh, I figured I'd do the shopping before you got here. Just check up behind me." And Jen did. Jessica had done fairly well. Her pantry was stocked with some good choices. Jennifer nodded. "This is great! You did a good job. Heck, if you just keep shopping like this and ignore the snacks at the office, you can do pretty well at losing weight!" Jessica smiled. Jennifer turned to her and spoke up. "So, first things first, let's see how you do at working out."

Oh no, here we go again, Jessica thought.

Jessica panted and groaned as she trudged on legs of lard. She was only walking but she had gotten worse, much worse since the gym-going days of Jennifer's first time. To her credit, she'd been walking for fifteen minutes but her lungs were burning by this point and her legs were wobbling as she walked and her massive belly which covered the tops of her thighs jiggled and bounced in the constricting nylon tank top. Jennifer turned the Treadmill down to one, and let Jessica trudge for a minute before Jessica put her legs on the sides as the treadmill slid to a stop on her own. "Alright, so you've got a way to go, but you've got this." Jessica was just thankful she wasn't being chewed out, and thankful that her burning lungs could breathe again. She took a long gulp of water to relieve her burning innards and to calm her racing, pounding heart which concerned her more after the physical.

Within the first month, Jessica was doing swimmingly. Jennifer's diet plan didn't starve her, nor did it gorge her. She ate when she was hungry, just on things that were healthier. Her exercise capacity improved, but she watched her heart rate. With the dangers she was alerted to, she didn't want to overdo it, and neither did Jen. But this didn't mean Jen let her drag her feet. Jessica was pushed as far as she could be pushed within reason. Within the first month, at its end, she had lost about twenty pounds, but Jennifer told her that this was not a permanent loss and that she had to continue pushing herself. She had some distance to go.
143311121211111111122112112.title: Jessica tries again.

choices: Jessica continues losing weight, but the Holidays come around.
Jennifer starts trying to sabotage and seduce Jessica.
1433111212111111111221121121.content:
The receptionist at gordge had been checking in many of the five month-ers who had health bad enough to be sent out for five months. Miss Holly from Corporate, a massive blob of a woman who could got out of breath waddling past had to be thrown out after being told that she hadn't improved enough, and that she was fired. A familiar brunette walked into the lobby. The receptionist took a second, but recognized it as Jessica. "Jessica! Good to see you! You look so skinny!" Jessica smiled broadly. When she last weighed in, she was down to 477. "Thanks! My dietician has done WONDERS for me." The receptionist flipped through a book and spoke to Jessica. "Well, hook me up with her. I'm getting sick of getting winded getting back to my car." Jess passed the receptionist. She'd enjoyed this new part of herself being discovered and wondered if it might be worth it to just keep going, to get back to her old 350 when she first started, or to get even smaller than that. She went for the stairs, she figured she was really going to put herself through her paces. She trudged up the stairwell. While she was certainly more fit, climbing those stairs still took a lot out of her, her still considerable belly jiggling in its shirt as it hung just over her crotch, close to being perky again. Her rolls and her still quite fat arms jiggled as she went up. Eventually she had to switch to the handrail and slow down before she hit the fifth floor. She was quite winded, but before, she would have been unable to do this at all.

Jessica walked through the hallway, passing Alice's office. She peeked in and waved at Alice. "Hey, Al!" Alice got up and charged Jess, hugging her hard. "Jess! Oh my god, you've lost a lot of weight! Did you start talking to Jennifer again?" Jessica nodded hard. "Uh-huh! She's worked miracles with me, I swear it's this office and especially Holly." Alice shook her head. "Oh, did you hear? Holly's out. She couldn't get any better over the break." Jess shook her head. "Damn, that's a big shame. She was fun to have around. Who's gonna replace her?"

Jessica took in Alice's figure as she replied. Alice was roughly the same size as she was before, maybe a little smaller. "So, how did you go? Did they have to send you off?" Alice shook her head. "Nope. I got the good genes. I tried my hand at losing weight while I was still working, but it's so hard with all the snacks around here!" Jessica nodded. "For real." Alice perked up. "Ooh, you wanna work out after work?" Jess perked up similarly. "Sure! That'd be great!" The two parted and went about their workday.

The day was filled with congratulations around the office, but Emily seemed fairly content with things. She was larger than when Jessica was last at the office. She seemed to be around the 530's. Jessica stayed away from the excess of snacks, but was unable to stay away completely. She had a few donuts here and there. And her cigarette habit had not gone away, she still took breaks, she only refrained from her usual debaucherous gorging while smoking. Lauren poked her head into Jessica's office as closing time came about. "Hey, Jess! Thought I'd pop by!" She entered the doorway in full. She had certainly not lost weight, she had gained most certainly. It became obvious that the meetings took a toll on Lauren's waistline and she seemed to be ballooning towards what Jessica started at the office at, 350 pounds. Her suit was strained especially around the hips, as Lauren's thighs and hips were her gaining areas. This gave her a lot of problems with doorways as Jessica soon discovered. "Hey, Miss Gordge!" Lauren spoke up. "So, uh, I'd just like to say, you're staying, miss Lasdowne let me know about your progress and you're in the clear. Keep it up! Oh, uh, I might need you to stay around overtime tomorrow. Big meeting, I need you to stay behind and write up on it to some subsidiaries in Texas." Jessica nodded. "Can do." Lauren waved good-bye and shimmied sideways through the door and trudged down the hallway.

Jessica, Jennifer and Alice all pulled and pushed the sticks of the Elliptical trainers. Alice was behind a bit, and Jessica slowed herself to keep pace. Alice wheezed at Jess. "Oh, Don't... Worry... Don't slow down be...because of me.." She chugged some water and tried to labor on, but it became obvious Alice was quite out of it. Jessica was feeling the burn too, but she'd been working at it for five months. Jen worked between them and turned to Alice. "You got this, don't try to burn yourself out. Listen to your body." Alice nodded and kept at a steady pace. Jessica's stomach was significantly larger, but she had learned how to navigate it. It was difficult but possible, she had learned. The two porkers and the trainer kept pace. After about thirty minutes, all three got off. Alice had pushed herself to her limits, and Jessica wasn't far behind. Both of them were still fairly large.

Jennifer led them towards the squat racks. "Aight, Jess, let's see if you bust that big behind tonight." Jess finger-gunned at Jen. "You bet your little ass I will." She gripped the bar and set her feet apart. She checked the weight: She was lifting some 100-odd pounds on her tightening but still blubbery rear-quarters. The folds that used to threaten to merge with Jessica's cankles had begun to shrink back into the back of the thigh with her loss. She lifted the bar off the rack, and the two watched. Jessica's flesh jiggled involuntarily as she placed the bar on the back of her neck and brought her massive, fat torso downwards between her knees. She pushed herself back up, then back down. The first few were no sweat, but as she got towards 10 her size began to show. Her belly and thighs intensified in their jiggling, clearly due to Jessica beginning to reach the edge of her endurance. Jennifer found the motion somewhat hypnotizing, that it was almost like watching the jiggling of jello, and somewhat satisfying. She pushed through it, and finished the set out strong. She stepped away and guzzled her water as smaller Alice stepped towards the bar. She lowered the weight to 50 and pushed through a set herself. She herself jiggled through, and towards the last few reps, she found herself pushing hard breaths through her lips. "Come on! You got this! Finish the set!" encouraged Jen as she spotted Alice. Alice was able to bring the bar up to the rack and stepped away. Jennifer couldn't resist. She patted Alice on the lower back. This sent her side-rolls and her rolling potbelly jiggling. Jen felt almost aroused by this.
1433111212111111111221121121.title: Jessica returns to the office.

choices: Jessica heads home for Thanksgiving to pig out.
14331112121111111112211211211.content:
Jessica's ever-slimming form entered the lobby on a cold November day in her thick woolen suit jacket from her heavier 546 pound days. She was certainly thinner even than she had been a few months before when she had returned from her five-month hiatus, but not quite in the 300's, just about where she'd started her second year at Corporate. She trudged up the steps after giving a curt wave to the receptionist and got up to the fifth floor, her still large if smaller stomach jiggling as she went up. The sheer movement of her blubber still took some extra breath out of Jessica, but her improvements in Cardio had given her a hand. In fact, by the time she'd gotten to her fifth-floor office, she'd had only a sheen of sweat across her forehead.

Jessica peeked into Alice's office, giving a wave to the blonde co-worker in her white button-up which had grown a little looser with each passing month. She'd stayed with Jen and Jessica's workout programs, and was obviously making some changes in diet, but her losses weren't as rapid as Jessica's, and the reason was present in the donut in her hand that she idle-mindedly munched as she worked. Alice turned her eyes to Jessica and waved. "Morning, Jess!" Jess waved back. "Morning, Al. Know what Lauren's got planned?" Alice shrugged. "I heard something about a bonus, the usual big Christmas party and maybe a week off for Thanksgiving, and that's about it." Jess nodded, "Hope the thanksgiving thing's right. That's right around the corner." Jessica and Alice both weren't quite dreading Thanksgiving. They figured that these few occasions of indulgence couldn't hurt as long as they kept themselves straight.

The pack worked until it was time for their usual coffee break at about 10. Jessica, Alice, and Emily's blubbered form grabbed mugs, filled them, and sat. Jessica simply sipped her coffee while Alice daintily munched at a donut, and Emily unabashedly inhaled donuts nearly by the handful. Her weight gain had seemed to speed up if anything, and she'd become quieter around the office in general. Her blouse was exploding at the seams, each roll making itself apparent as she sped upward in terms of scale. She seemed to be on the higher end of the 500's, if not already 600, which was in fact quite possible by looking at the dark-brown haired increasingly fat creature. Emily was becoming the slightly lighter-haired equivalent of Holly. Jessica turned to Emily. "You know, Alice and I are eating better and working out. You don't have to wait until the new year to try to try to get thinner." Emily grunted as she replied by eating another donut, then spoke after swallowing. "I'm too fat for that shit, girl." Alice shook her head. "No, really, you're not. You never are." Emily gave no reply, only continuing to eat. "Why not this week, come to the Gym with Alice and I after work." Silence resumed its dominance over the break room. Jessica shrugged and grabbed a donut and joined Alice in munching on a donut.

In a moment, a new head popped in. One fresh and unrecognized. The soft-faced bleach blonde walked nervously in. "Hiii, my name's Kaitlyn. This is Corporate, right?" The group turned their eyes to the relatively svelte 250 pounder, only a little smaller than Alice. Alice turned to her. "Uh, yeah, this is Corporate. I'm Alice." spoke the still hefty blonde as she stood and shook the newcomer's hand. She turned to the comparatively massive brown-haired compatriot. "This is Jessica." Jessica performed the same maneuver, and as she did this, Alice motioned to the elephant in the room, the much larger and more hoggish dark-brown haired woman with her double-belly and multiple rolls, who seemed to explode out of her blouse. Emily nodded. "And this is Emily." Kaitlyn nodded at her. "Well, it's nice to meet all of you!" She grabbed a mug of coffee and sat down with the group.

As the week rolled on towards its conclusion, Gordge's employees brought in more food than ever, and Kaitlyn joined this tradition, not having been part of Jessica and Alice's attempts to slim down. Sugar cookies, pastries, and some of the first candy canes of the season. Alice and Jessica figured they'd partake, but only a little. They wouldn't exactly hog out.

Not yet.
14331112121111111112211211211.title: A New Face as the Holidays beckon.

choices: The office Christmas party comes around. Jessica pigs out again.
Skip to after the holidays, and Jessica hasn't stopped. Jen doesn't mind.
143311121211111111122112112111.content:
Jessica's drive was long and hard as she pushed her relatively ritzy red car down a road dotted on either side by strip malls and fast food joints towards her relative's house. She avoided long drives when she could, but her relatives were just close enough to not justify the expense of a plane ticket. Jessica's relatives lived in mid-Virginia, a decent drive from Gordge HQ that would be much more expensive. While her grandparents were much deeper in the south, her parents did some work loosely related to the government and were closer to the Mason-Dixon line, but still with a few of those southern traditions. Especially large portions of high-calorie food, one of the tenets of life with her mother. However, she had plenty of relatives she knew that would be there that would not nearly be as far gone as Jess in terms of weight. Even with the high-calorie lifestyle, most of her other relatives had not been nearly as fat as Jessica had been on many of the past Thanksgivings. The last time, she'd had so many lectures. She'd welcomed the fact that she would likely FINALLY receive praise as opposed to censure for what she'd done.

At least, she hoped. In reality, she was more jubilant about what she was guaranteed: partaking in the time-honored American tradition of gorging herself insane for a day and disregarding the consequences.

Soon, Jessica arrived at the little burb between the various in-fill of northern Virginia that contained the house of the Rhodes family. She could spot it a mile away as she drove down familiar streets with old high-school dramas that played out as she drove by. There was the bus stop where Shelly, one of the popular girls on her bus threw a twinkie at her. She tried to shut the memories out. There was a reason that she moved much further up north and into a more anonymous environment.

In a moment she pulled to a park on the curb in front of the two-story light orange house that belonged to her Parents. She unbuckled her seatbelt and pulled it all the way around her mound of a stomach. She proceeded to wiggle her way out of her car towards the house. There were several other cars pulled in, but the one she recognized was the faded blue sedan belonging to her parents. She rang the doorbell and waited, remembering the good memories attached to the house. She had to admit, there was some longing for the halcyon days attached to the house, hot home-cooked food made fresh from the kitchen and fun days out to the beaches a ways out east.

In a moment, a gray-haired woman opened the door and looked up at her with an opening smile. "Heyy, baby!" It was Jessica's mother. "Hey~, Mom!" Jessica hugged her arms around her mother's slightly large form, but her mother struggled to reach all the way around Jessica. Her hands ended up on her love handles, she patted as she hugged. Jessica's fat jiggled beneath the baby blue blouse that she wore. The older woman stepped aside. "Come on in, come on in!" Jessica's mother's hair was long, down to her shoulders, and not yet entirely gray, still some vibrant veins of red beneath the greying mantle. She shuffled on towards the table where multitudes of Jessica's relatives were. Especially dreaded, however, was the gaze from her cousin, Melinda, from Tampa. Melinda had become insuffrable in the past years, making a long preachy speech about how Jessica ought to lose weight. And that gaze fell upon Jessica, but not with the usual fire it carried. It still had some of the judgement there, but it carried surprise in the raising of brows. Jessica wasn't dumb, and could nearly hear her thinking Damn, she's actually lost weight. Jessica wanted to smirk, but she couldn't reveal her hand just yet. The proverbial flop was yet to come with the hogging out.

Thankfully, she would not be alone. Even trim and slim Melinda couldn't resist hogging out with the best of them.

Soon, the turkey came out, as did the fresh, fragrant rolls and the many, many other servings. A collective sigh of relief came from the table. It was as though the angels of heaven had descended in the form of an old lady with great gifts of food. The family paused only for Jessica's mother to stop and say a short grace, and then the eating began. Jessica reached in and stabbed off a few slices of turkey, a few rolls from the great pan of rolls, dished a mound of mashed potatoes as large as her stomach onto her plate and enough gravy to bury them. No space in the kitchen was wanting, and there was food on all fronts to be sampled, tasted, and partaken of.

Jessica dove in with her fork and brought some mashed potatoes to her mouth, munching. She hummed in delight as conversation ensued about work-related issues. Jessica's plate had quite a pile to go through with turkey, rolls, butter beans and corn, but Jessica ate on. She paused only to speak briefly in a conversation about work issues, speaking after swallowing a mound of mashed potatoes, but focused always on the food. Her cheeks still knew the motion of puffing up from their already blubbery state to accept a mouthful of food, complementing her double-chin to make her seem much fatter than she truly was. Her stomach began to extend from its normal position behind the rather flowy dress and just above the midpoint of her thighs to just forward of that, growing ever toward her knees. Her blouse that flowed at the beginning of this meal began to greet and rest on the stomach that came out to greet it and demand more fabric, reducing the flowiness of the fabric as the mega-plate began to diminish. Melinda spoke up in a lull of conversation. "Hey, Jessica, I noticed that you've shrunk a LOT from last Thanksgiving, what's your secret?" Jessica swallowed her mouthful of food. "Oh. I've got a live-in dietician, Jennifer Lasdowne. She helps me with a lot, eating better, working out. Sometimes you really do need that extra push." Melinda nodded. "Well, it sounds good. I can't wait to see how little you get next year, you'll be so tiny!" Jessica chuckled. "Yep, just wait, I'll be right up there with you next time I come down to Florida. I might finally get back into a two-piece!" Jessica dug into her plate further, with one of the last chunks of corn and some turkey on her fork, her mother spoke up. "Now, now, honey, you know you can always wear whatever you want. You're always beautiful." Jessica smiled as she swallowed. "Aww, thanks, Mom. If only I could find a man that thought the same!" The rest of the table gave a chuckle as Jessica dove back in.

The plates kept coming and the flowiness of the blouse became less and less. Seconds. Thirds. Jessica began to truly show the reason why her mother cooked so much for these meals. The rest were on desserts and coffee now, but Jessica kept plowing through. Melinda chuckled as Jessica returned with her third plate. "Well, we might see you get right back to last thanksgiving at this rate!" Jessica's mother lightly slapped her on her elbow. "Hush up! She can eat as much as she wants." Melinda rubbed her elbow and muttered a sorry, but gave a glance to Jessica's blouse. As Jessica finished her fourth plate and went back for dessert, the blouse that was outright flowy was packed to the brim, and began to ride up to show a bloated stomach and curtail to Jessica's rolls. Jessica pulled to a seat with her pie a la mode and polished it off slowly. Even this weighty woman only had so much room.

The conversation carried on as the late afternoon menaced, as more family members began to leave. Melinda had Jessica off to one corner and spoke to her quietly. "Now, I know that you've done well. But don't let the holiday season get to your head, girl. I don't wanna see you like last thanksgiving back here next year, big as a blimp like you were." Jessica shrugged, exposing one of her belly rolls as her blouse struggled to cover anything near Jessica's belly button. "I'll be fine."

When Jessica had got back to the apartment, she was alone. Jennifer had left, she had to keep up with the influx of patients associated with holiday weight at the office. Jessica slacked with Gym appointments and Alice began to do the same, replacing appointments at the Gym with appointments with Christmas treats at the bakeries and high-calorie holiday coffee drinks. The progress that Jessica had begun to make over October began to fade under a wave of holiday food and drinks, and the pounds previously shed began to return.
143311121211111111122112112111.title: The Holidays begin.

choices: The new year comes around, and Jessica hasn't slowed down.
Jennifer comes back after the holidays, she's started plumping up herself.
1433111212111111111221121121111.content:
The Gordge employees arrived at the grand meeting hall where they usually held company-wide lectures, meetings, or orientation for new interns or employees. The forms of the office workers had softened and expanded over the holiday break, and Christmas was always an opportunity for gorging, feasting, and showing the capacity of these blubberier forms. Corporate, rank and file, all were able to mingle in common piggish glee.

Standing in conversation near the finger foods and snack table were Alice and Kaitlyn. "So, where did you go to school?" asked the hefty blonde form of Alice. Her button-up had become quite strained as the holidays rolled on, and the greatest trap for Alice were the holiday milkshakes at her favored fast food joints, along with the usual high-calorie holiday coffee drinks. She stuffed herself with a bear claw pastry from the baked goods. Kaitlyn shrugged and spoke, "UCLA. I'm gonna be honest, I wasn't the best student. I was more interested in the bars." Alice gave a hearty chuckle. "Girl, same. I passed because I was sweet on my chubby-chaser professor." Kaitlyn chuckled. "Really? All mine only ever gave me were funny looks when I would bring a snack to class."

The door opened to reveal the true star of the night: Jessica. Gossip had been spreading around the office about how badly the holidays were hitting Jessica's weight loss, she looked at least ten to fifteen pounds heavier already made quite apparent in the new snugness of her dress. This dress was one she wore at a formal function in October, and it fit very well. By this point, Jessica's stomach attempted to escape from its skintight confines as it began to sag back down towards Jessica's crotch with the telltale thickness at the very base of the stomach. Additionally, the sleeves of the dress fought to hold the line against Jessica's bulging arm fat that pushed hard to be free and jiggled with each step due to the pressure of the smooth linens of the dress. Additionally, the previously conservative neckline was now showing the top of Jessica's cleavage due to the expansion of Jessica's breasts with her new poundage. Kaitlyn spoke. "Ooh, here comes Jess." Jess waddled by and waved at Alice and Kaitlyn. "Hey, Al! Hey, Kait!" The fat trio hugged in a mass of fat that quivered in a common impact, but none of them could reach around the other due to each others' size. The trio released each other with a chuckle that was partially of the joy of meeting friends at the holiday and the joyous atmosphere generated by the office party. The other part was to help them regain their breath after the impact on their stomachs. Alice patted Jessica as the group parted from each other. "Jess, how ya been?" Jessica smiled, accentuating her chubby cheeks and nodded. "Pretty damn good, been enjoying myself this Christmas! Speaking of which, we gotta hit Diego's on New Years'." Alice gave a point at Jessica and spoke. "Already got you beat, they've been running their BOGO this holiday." Kaitlyn's eyes lit up. "Shit, they've got a BOGO on beer?"

The group grew silent as the main courses of the night came out. It was glorious, great platters of fried turkey, burgers, fries, sweets, pizza, and so many more treats. The horde of blubbery beasts that cluttered the floor swarmed, but first among them was Jessica, who nearly bowled over poor Kaitlyn. Kaitlyn rubbed her arm which was unfortunate enough to have been caught in the whale-like creature's onslaught, "Damn, that girl loves her food." The rest followed suit. The commendable staffers who carried the food never slacked under the endless barrage of fat creatures, but Jessica was prolific, up and down the line stacking a plate higher and higher with food. She got two, in fact, chock full with pizza, fries and turkey. The pizza took up a deal of room and if she'd tried to fit a burger on the pile, she would have toppled her piles. She waddled back to the table and immediately dug into the food. The restraint that existed in the months prior, if it had ever truly existed, had died. Jessica ignored any speech and drowned everyone out as she attacked her food with a voracity that made it seem as though she hadn't eaten today, or even in weeks. In fact, it was simply a portion of Jessica's brain that had lain dormant since the doctor's visit that re-awoke, and possibly something beyond that. The rest of the table was about shocked as Jessica absolutely demolished the plates of food while the rest of them spoke. It was a gluttony that even most gordge employees didn't display. Of course, the rest were indulging, but Jessica had nearly turned it into an art form. The table spoke on family issues, as Alice spoke up with a remark, "Oh, and of course I got the talk again back home. Mom never leaves me alone about it. "You've gotten even bigger! You were doing so good!" It really drives me up the wall." Kaitlyn spoke up through the unmistakable sound of Jessica mindlessly pigging out. "Girl, I know, I know." The sound of panting and near-choking came out. Alice turned to Jessica and patted her on her quite meaty back. "Breathe, girl, breathe!" Jessica raised her head up from the primal binge and panted. She was nearly out of breath and sweating profusely from the sheer power-eating she was doing. Jessica then wiped her brow and dove back into the food. Alice dismissively waved at Jessica. There was something driving her to eat and Alice wasn't challenging that power. She simply got up and got herself a second plate, where in a moment, Jess got up and got thirds and forths.

Jessica continued powering through the food, even as the rest began to settle down and talk, and some of the early leavers began to depart for the holidays. Jessica even kept eating until Alice and Kaitlyn left, Kaitlyn had sorely overdone it and Alice's stomach was so packed that she had to lean on much lardier Emily to even waddle. But Jessica kept powering through. Her dress had every inch full to bursting, her stomach hanging out and protruding far in front of her, rubbing against the table. She turned back, panting and covered in sweat, and tried to pull herself up. Her dress had enough. The stomach gave way first, creating a great tear which exposed Jessica's navel and her jiggling, quivering mound of fat beneath her dress. She continued waddling as though in a trance to the last dregs. The worried attendants called in Security as Jessica literally shoveled the last bits of food present into her mouth. This was the very last straw for her dress, which ripped wide, exposing her panties and bra. The security men, buff as such men had to be in an environment of heavyweights, dragged Jessica off to an office, put a robe on her, and escorted her to her car so she could drive home. It was no use, and she was in a food coma. She had to be taken home in a squad car and her car towed back home.

As the christmas season came, Jessica didn't slow down, but only sped up. Her appetite soared as she passed christmas dinner and went onwards, and with no sign of Jennifer to be found, Jessica re-stocked her fridge with her old favorites, frozen pizza and soda, but she took a special loving to eating takeout over the holidays.
1433111212111111111221121121111.title: The Office Party.

choices: Next week, Jessica calls back.
June rolls around, and Jessica, Emily and Kaitlyn have ballooned up.
14331112121111111112211211211111.content:
Jessica pulled her blouse back below the bottom of her ever-expanding stomach as she munched on a pastry and sipped at a chocolate mocha. While it was late January and many of the office workers had gotten back into their routines, Jessica's appetite seemed to have not understood that the holiday binging was over. Jessica continued to tell herself that she'd get back on track any day now, and this was just a bit of a holiday reward.

As the Coffee break rolled around, Jessica came into the room. Emily had rolled on accumulating her poundage. Her gluttony had merely increased from the Holidays, and her constantly-stuffed stomach seemed to be expanding exponentially by the week. It had been three weeks since the new year, and her button-up blouse rode up far above her belly button, and the bottom of her seemingly endless stomach jiggled as Emily gave it a solid pat after downing three donuts. "Good girl." Jessica turned to Emily. "The donuts have been really good recently, haven't they?" Emily nodded. "Mhm. I think it's a new contract. Some new bakery in town." Jessica nodded. "I'll have to make a run myself."

She turned to Alice, who was picking at some oatmeal-raisin cookies. "Have some donuts, Al!" Alice shook her head. "Uh-uh. I'm trying to lose those holiday pounds. Like I thought you said you would be doing by now?" Jessica dismissively waved. "It's just some holiday fun. I'll get around to it." Alice gave a quizzical glance at the bottom of Jessica's great mound of a stomach which stopped just above her knees again, as it began to peek out from its ill-fitting home in Jessica's blouse. Alice distinctly remembered that before the Holidays, said stomach stopped several inches shorter than it did now. It was a moot point, Alice sighed and returned to her cookies. Jessica spoke up through a donut as she tracked Alice's eyes. "What?" Alice turned to Jessica and spoke up. "Uh, your shirt's riding up." Jessica grunted. "Again? Damnit. This thing sucks." Alice shrugged. She never was one to nag people about their weight endlessly. Such activities were for people like her mother who never let up on her, especially when holiday meals came about.

As the coffee break came to an end and Jessica returned to her office for an endless round of snacking mixed in with working. Jessica's indulgence and "reward" extended to her lunch break. She figured she'd treat herself a bit further and leaned into the office break room. "I'll be back, going on lunch break to that Italian place, Dennito's." Massively fat Emily waved a jiggling arm. "See ya!" she said through a mouthful of fries.

Jessica pulled into the parking lot and waddled in, greeted by a fairly chubby young hostess, about college-aged. "Hi, table for one." she spoke. The young hostess nodded. "Gotcha." She couldn't help but glance at Jessica's girth, which did not even fully fit into her bursting button-up. She turned about and quickly walked to a booth. The young thing, though hefty herself, wanted to see this mass of blubber fit into it, or if she even could. She set down a menu. "Your waitress will be with you shortly." Jessica nodded and spoke. "Thank you." She began squeezing into the booth, a very tight fit as her great stomach began flowing anywhere it could to try to find space. Jessica's breathing became difficult with the great obstacle of wood blocking her stomach's expansion for breathing. She found herself reducing herself to a pant, as anything else was impossible, and this constant in and out breathing motion of short breaths caused her stomach to rise and fall endlessly and rapidly.

The chubby young hostess couldn't help but stare from a darker corner of the restaurant. It was amusing to watch, like slapping jello. This elephant of a woman was struggling to breathe in the enclosed space. Soon the waitress, a mid-aged woman with dull blonde hair came by. "Hii, my name's Amanda, I'll be your server. What would you like to drink?" Jessica turned to her and spoke through labored breaths. "Pinot Noir, please.." The woman nodded. "And do you know what you want to eat yet?" Jessica looked through her menu. "Give me a second." The woman nodded and went about to the wine shelf. Holy shit, why did Dana try to fit this blob into a booth? thought the server. The hostess, to Amanda seemed to have some kind of turn-on for seeing fat women squeeze themselves into tight spaces. Or she was a sadist. Either would seem to fit Dana, who loved watching the Gordge employees from nearby stuff themselves silly, then come to their rescue with some lubricant to pop them out. The pleasure never seemed overtly sexual, but more the pleasure of a student working dedicatedly on a project, the pleasure of building a bench from scratch.

When Amanda had returned and set the glass of wine before the panting blob of mass that was Jessica, she spoke. "Are we ready to order?" Jessica nodded. "Yeah, think I'll have your....French Chicken on Linguine...Oh, and some Tiramisu and Espresso..." The waitress nodded. "Gotcha."

The hostess watched Jessica stuff herself silly. Dennito's portions were large, especially large, but this hog seemed to not be able to get enough. She stuffed herself with three baskets of bread and soaked them in the olive oil. It seemed to the hostess as if this woman was deliberately trying to stuff herself, and each morsel brought her breaths quicker. Finally the bowl of pasta with chicken, all in a creamy white sauce came out, along with the coffee and tiramisu. Jessica's mind raced. Oh shit, can I finish all this? "Enjoy your meal, Ma'am." spoke Amanda with a bit of a judging glare. This woman really didn't need all this food. Jessica determined that this food was simply too delicious, at least in appearance, to not try to finish it all. Besides, she'd been training her stomach for the past while to fit more food, if subconciously through her indulgence.

Jessica gave it her all. She slurped long noodles from the bowl and stuffed her cheeks with the bits of delicious, juicy chicken. The food was all so delicious. Her stomach ceased its protestations and allowed itself to expand with each bite. The only issue came when Jessica got about halfway through, eating the food through panting breath. Her stomach had continued to physically expand to make room for the food, but began to run out of places to go. Her diaphragm had to expand somewhere, and its pathways began to be blocked. Jessica kept eating, though her breaths came faster and harder.

The panting, sweating hog gobbling down her food, her blouse becoming harder pressed to contain -any- of her blubber became such an amusing and pleasing sight to Dana. Amanda walked by her as the Restaurant began to empty, the calm before the dinner rush in two hours. "I don't think the olive oil or butter is going to work with that one." Dana grinned wide and spoke. "I know. I think she might need the Fire Department." The hoggish brunette plowed through her oily, buttery pasta and visibly enjoyed every inhaled bite. She leaned back, as a quick 'Snap' sounded itself from the booth. Amanda and Dana covered their mouths. "Oop!" emitted from Jessica's mouth. The waiting continued. Would she try to even retrieve the lost button?

She seemed to ignore the departed button and dove right into her Tiramisu and espresso. So it was true. This woman was an absolute hog! Dana schemed and plotted. Mayhaps she ought to look into getting to know her better, getting this hog even fatter? She had never had a pet project like this before. The closest she had was her roommate a semester back, a young athletic soccer player who she fattened up until she had lost her scholarship. A bit cold-hearted, true, but the fattest she ever got the soccer player was barely into the 190's from her slender 130. This would be a whole other ballgame.

Jessica struggled to squeeze out, but she found she was stuck. Her cheeks flushed red hot with embarassment. Dana came by. "Is there anything I can get you today, Ma'am?" Jessica shook her head. "Uh.. If it's not too much trouble, can you help me out of here?" Dana smiled broadly. "Sure!" She reached and tried to pull Jessica out. No good, the butterball was jammed in tight. She fetched some olive oil. "I think we'll have to try lubrication." Jessica waved her hand rapidly. "Yes, yes, just get me out of here, please." A feisty fatty. Dana took the oil and dabbed it on Jessica's exposed stomach through her nearly open shirt, and tried to slide Jessica out. Jessica made it nearly all the way out, but snagged on the very edge. Jessica gave a heave and a shove through her sweat and with that last exertion, she finally got out of the booth. Her great, massive stomach rolled out for the wait staff to see. "Do you need anything to cover up with, Ma'am?" politely asked Dana. Jessica nodded. "Yeah, uh, please."

Jessica offered her debit card to the chubby young hostess. "Thank you so much for helping me with that issue." Dana waved her hand. "Oh, it's nothing." She hastily scribbled her number on the back of the customer's copy of the reciept as she swiped Jessica's card. She hoped to get a call soon.
14331112121111111112211211211111.title: Back to Work

choices: Jessica, Alice, and Jennifer go on a cruise. They put on some weight.
Jessica spends her vacation time checking back on Dana.
143311121211111111122112112111112.content:
The sweltering, fat form of Jessica waddled into her office covered in sweat from the summer heat. She'd spent the past five months continuing her "temporary" indulgences, only bemoaning the fact that the delightful holiday treats were gone, and she had to make due with other treats that were just as calorie-filled and bad for her waistline. This last portion was made blatantly obvious by the fact that she had to get her shirt tailored no less than three times over the past five months. Her button-up blouse had made her reconsider even wearing any more of them, as every single one of them was skin-tight, the buttons constantly popped off, and her stomach was practically visible through the gaps between her buttons and her twin rolls on her flanks jiggled with every movement, as her mammoth stomach rose and fall. The gossipers reckoned Jessica was right back where she'd started before she took six months off to lose weight, at around the 546 she'd started off at.

As coffee time rolled about in the office, Jessica panted at the exertion of shoving herself up. Something felt off recently but she couldn't put a finger on it as she breathily waddled into the break room, greeted by the slimmed form of Alice, and the fattened forms of Emily and Kaitlyn. Emily was very large before the break, but now she took up about half the table with her pure girth. She was just 600 pounds as the new year rang in, but at this halfway mark of the year, it seemed as if the wad of fat had shot far past the 600 mark. She had brought in masses of snacks of her own, and it seemed as if there were not a moment she was not eating. If it were up to guessing, she seemed to be about in the 650's to the 660's. She hardly moved these days except for to the break room, to her office, and to the elevator which creaked more and more with every passing day.

Kaitlyn's gains had not been nearly as drastic. She still ate plenty, but her appetite still seemed to be dwarfed by her colleagues. She had managed a mere 30 pounds since Christmas, but she was making her way up. Her mere spare tire met by a small slope had thickened to a full pot belly, but especially visible in her gains were her hips and her thighs, growing into a pear-shaped woman as she crept towards 300. She sipped away at a calorie-rich coffee drink and spoke up. "Did you hear? Lauren stopped the physical exams." Emily cooed. "Yess! I don't have to see that creepy old bastard again." Jessica gave a "Woohoo!" at this pronouncement, and followed it, "Yes! That's awesome!" Alice shrugged. She had gotten ever smaller since new years'. It seemed as though the blonde had lost 40 pounds, and she was right back to her old conscious self. Her shirt at first seemed to fit better, and "Ooh, that's good. I gotta admit, there was something really creepy about that dude. Like, his voice maybe?" In the back of her mind, she wanted to tell them that maybe they needed that physical, but she figured it was a moot point. She'd adopted a live-and-let-live approach to the weight of her co-workers. If they wanted to lose weight, they'd come with her to the gym after work. She thought of this, and turned to Jessica's blubbery form. "Hey, Jess, want to come to the Gym with me after work?" Jessica mulled it over and nodded. "Sure. I'll give it a go, want me to grab Jen?" Alice nodded. "Uh-huh, she was super helpful last time."

Jennifer looked at her companions as they worked at the Treadmill. Alice's thick but slimming form seemed to be performing far better than Jessica, who panted and struggled to simply walk along the belt. Jennifer would occasionally turn to her and speak up. "Turn it up, Jess, you can handle it!" Jessica would handle it, but Jennifer caught herself staring at Jessica's stomach as it jiggled and bounced in its vast, fat form. It was like hypnosis, and there was something more there, an arousal that Jennifer recognized, if only slightly. She loved how the vast stomach and the twin, vast rolls in Jessica's form rose and fell rapidly and shook mightily as Jessica jogged along. She had to get a feel, but be subtle about it. She reached across and turned the speed down just in time to catch one of Jessica's rolls, barely held back in its mightly fleshy nature in Jessica's skintight tank top. Jessica was too exhausted to remove herself immediately, and plenty of sweat accumulated on Jennifer's hand. "Oop, sorry, saw you struggling a bit too much." Jessica nodded. "Thanks, Jen, you always know what's best." Jennifer turned to Alice. "You know, Jess has been doing good financially, and both of us have saved up enough for a down payment for a House. I think you'd be a good influence, wanna come?" Alice nodded eagerly. "Sure! My apartment's rent's been kinda high, haven't been able to save much."

Finally. She'd be able to fatten this one. Jennifer began to come to terms with what she was. She loved doing this, she loved seeing these women's forms expand and fatten.

The cardio wound down and the fat women took time to drink water. Now came a part Jen had been waiting for, she would get them to deadlift. The belts had this tendancy to make obese women's stomachs poof up beautifully, and she could only imagine the wonders it would do for Jessica's stomach. Jessica put on the belt, and had to bind it at the very last hole for it to fit, and at that it was very snug, her massive stomach was smashed against the belt and stuck out every which way. Jessica grabbed the bar, and Jen assumed the spotting position, supporting Jessica's grip on the bar with her left hand and putting her right hand on Jessica's fat lower back, giving it a solid pat. The fat jiggled on her lower back, and it pleased Jennifer mightily. Jessica struggled and groaned to lift the heavy bar up, but she managed to do it, picking it up, then lowering it with a clatter. Jennifer patted Jessica's fat lower back again. "Great job!"
143311121211111111122112112111112.title: Fat Summertime.

choices: The three buy a house, and Jennifer gets to fattening them.
Emily starts having mobility issues.
1433111212111111111221121121111121.content:
Jessica scratched an itch beneath one of her rolls, somewhat hidden behind a flowy Mumu garment which draped over her ever-expanding belly. She'd accrued a few weeks of Vacation time, and booked a two-week cruise on the Merigold Maiden ship, a favorite among Gordge workers. Beside her strode her slimmer companions, making her the "fat friend' on several levels. While Alice was still fat, her drop to the 240's had her within range of return to her old self, when she'd just reached corporate. Her stomach was only comparatively a mild pot belly, a gentle but still fairly thick and still fairly flabby slope down to her sweatpants. Alice spoke up. "Oooh, I can't wait. This is that Carribean cruise?" Jessica eagerly nodded her head. "Yes, and more importantly, it has a buffet!" Jennifer and Alice both cooed. While Jennifer was a slim girl, she could still appreciate a splurge now and then "Yessss! It's been so long since I've seen a buffet." Jessica chuckled, and spoke up. "Well, you'll be around one all the time here!" She sent a finger into Jennifer's flat stomach, which gave a very slight wiggle. "Might help you put some meat on your bones." Jennifer chuckled. "It probably will. Maybe you could donate some of yours." She nudged Jessica's great, hefty mound of a rolling, fat stomach, giving a massive jiggle. Jessica smiled. "Wish I could, that'd be nice."

Alice said nothing, though she thought Yeah, it would. She still worried about her ever-fattening friend and how oblivious she was to the fact that she was supposed to be on a diet. Her mind stopped just short of the question of why Jennifer wasn't intervening in Jessica's obvious weight gain when they came upon the Buffet. The trio stared in awe. It was a glorious sight. There was pizza, fried food of many varieties, a salad bar laden with rich sauces, and an absolutely beautiful dessert bar. It was heaven."Oh my GAWD!" spoke Jessica. The three got drinks, put them at a table, and wandered off to the buffet bar. By the time they'd come back, Jennifer had come back with a salad dripping with ranch, far more than she'd ever recommend as a nutritionist. But this was a vacation, a buffet. She was supposed to go crazy. So that's just what she did. Jessica had gotten what could be very loosely referred to as a salad if salad included fried chicken, cold cuts, and perhaps a bed of lettuce, all buried in creamy italian sauce. Alice had gotten something similar with many nuts floating on the ocean of sauce on top. Jennifer's eyes went wide. Jessica spotted and spoke. "Yep. Welcome to fat girl salads." Alice laughed loudly.

The trio eventually waddled back to their rooms. They were absolutely packed to bursting with food, and even Jessica's mumu became challenged at the task of holding Jessica's massive tight stomach as she collapsed onto the couch, which amazingly did not collapse under her weight due to the fact that it was bolted to the floor. "Oooooh, who let us eat that much?" groaned Alice, as she rubbed her painfully distended stomach which was about double the size it normally was. Jennifer's stomach was attempting to break free of its constraints within her jean shorts, straining the button. "Oh, god... Oh, god..." she mumbled. "You guys... Really bad influence..." The group had absolutely broken the bank, even by Jessica's standards. Jennifer tried her best to keep pace, but she was trying to maintain herself while Jessica and Alice were on thirds, and then fourths. Alice gave up just before fifths, and Jessica had only then felt she was ready for a dedicated plate for dessert.

Merely a few hours later, they grazed on bags of chips.

A week later they'd pulled into Jamaica. A young snack-shack worker swabbing the counter of his desk looked up to see two fat american women with a thinner female. The blonde one seemed absolutely skinny compared to the brown-haired Jessica, her stomach was attempting to explode out of her shorts, rolling over the waistband and covering her crotch. He had to turn his eyes to the woman's very, very fat face, with thick flabby jowls and a double-chin that nearly turned into a triple chin near the bottom. "Hiii. I'll have a chocolate milkshake and, a, uhm..Chocolate chip cookie." It was so stereotypically american that the boy nearly broke out laughing but he simply said "Right, that it?" Blonde, fat Alice spoke up. "I'll have a cherry coke and a bag of chips." The thin one spoke up. "I'll have a chocolate milkshake and... Do you have hershey's?" The teen nodded. "Then I'll take that." He handed them their food and spoke in his light Jamaican accent. "Your shakes will be up shortly." He turned about and began blending the shakes while the blubbery trio waddled to their spot a ways away.

Jessica and Alice's foreheads were thick with sweat in the sweltering heat of the Carribean sun, a heat that even the ocean breeze couldn't cool. Eventually, the teen had prepared their milkshakes, and called for them. Jessica struggled and attempted to pull her vast, fat body up, but she simply turned to Jennifer. "Babe, can you get it for me?" Jennifer chuckled and spoke. "Sure thing." She jogged over to the shack and picked up the shakes, paid the teen with a twenty, and jogged back over to the towels with the milkshakes. She slid to her towel and handed the chocolate milkshake over to the blubbery, obese form of Jessica. "Here y'go." She then sipped on her own and bit on her chocolate bar. The trio lay in silence in the presence of the tropical glory they were in. Jennifer leaned back and caressed her stomach. It occurred to her that her normally firm stomach had grown slightly larger and flabbier but she had simply accepted it. She was on vacation. It was almost expected. It felt nice to just let go for a while. Alice and Jessica turned to each other and smiled. It was the beauty of being with a friend in a wonderous place. Jessica sipped her chocolate shake and spoke. "This is just..." Alice nodded. "Wow, yeah. It's perfect." They drank in the moment like they drank in their calorie-packed shakes. It was a beautiful scene for the three. Time seemed to drift away as they made small talk and spent time staring into the distance. Eventually, however, it was time to leave and they got back on the boat after spending some time swimming about. Jessica struggled in the water due to her sheer weight, and she attracted many, many ogles, especially from Jennifer when her back was turned.

When the ship eventually pulled back into port, the three had certainly come back with extra pounds. They spent every single meal at the buffet, and snacked inbetween on calorie-laden snacks. Even Jennifer had come back with a protruding stomach and thicker breasts, and Alice's well-fitting shirts now began to become more snug again.
1433111212111111111221121121111121.title: A Caloric Cruise

choices: Alice and Jessica get even fatter as more donuts get freed up and Jen feeds them
Jessica tries to quit smoking. She becomes even more of a glutton.
14331112121111111112211211211111212.content:
The brown-haired mass of fat that was Emily sat at her chair, half-typing, half jamming cookies into her mouth. Her workday was a blur of constant food, and anyone trying to keep track of it all would quickly give up if anyone was insane to attempt such a thing. She heard footsteps down the hall as she brushed some cookie crumbs off of her massive stomach which fought for its freedom from the constraining shirt that on nearly anyone else, even in this office, would be very loose. Soon passing her door were the forms of Jessica, Emily and Kaitlyn, all clearly more plump from their cruise vacation. Emily took a breath and spoke. "Heyy, guys!" Jessica turned around and smiled, causing her great double-chin to fold forward. "Heyyy, Em!" Emily continued typing. "How was the cruise?" Jessica took a glance at Emily. The two weeks away had seemed to only inflate Emily's gain, there being nobody else to take her precious doughnuts. She gained quickly normally by her sheer intake of food, but she had to have gained nearly thirty pounds in only two weeks. It was shocking even for Jessica. "It was good, it was good! You would have loved it, they had a full buffet and everything!" Emily moaned in ecstasy at the thought. "Ooooh, girl you know I'm on board for that."

As Jessica dissapeared from view, Emily returned to consuming food. She felt a bit betrayed that she would have no more exclusive access to the donut box. She would need some boxes of her own, or need them only as much as a woman of her sheer girth would. It was more ravenous, exponential greed that grew with the size of her stomach. Emily glanced back at her screen, she did remember sometimes that this was not an all-you-can eat buffet of donuts but in fact a workplace. Her report on quarterly earnings since their partnership with Dynamo was about done, but unsureness touched her mind as she glanced at it. If she just sent it to Lauren like this, would it be presentable? Was it the correct format? Only one way to check, go nextdoor to Kaitlyn or Jess. Probably Jess, she was the workaholic of this gluttonous part of the office. Emily prepared for the endeavour. She only did it about twice a day now but she tried to get herself out of her chair, but no results were forthcoming.

Emily was confused. Her legs and arms seemed as if they had just glitched. She tried again. Her fat-covered legs refused the second attempt, and the joke that was Emily's upper body strength wasn't so funny when she tried to use it to get up. She took a deep breath and tried again, this time leaning on the table, a difficult feat to perform, especially with her massive stomach in the equation, but by the time she'd exerted herself to simply lean, she tried to push herself up, but her arms were only about strong enough to open a door and bring food to her ever-fattening jowls, and she was huffing just from mounting her own stomach with her upper body. She leaned back and groaned. She couldn't understand the simple logic that the whale of a woman had eaten herself to the point that she couldn't even get out of a chair. She wondered why, not seeing the problem that was directly in front of her. She surrendered for a moment and went to her donuts. The report could wait, but the krollers waiting in the box couldn't, at least while her legs were being weird. She brought the spiraling circles of sweetness to her mouth, her jowls inflating as she crammed two into her waiting maw at a time. Her overfed cheeks puffed up as she munched. She felt a pang of sadness coming that she was simply coping with her gluttony by eating.

She quieted this issue by simply eating more krollers, every forward and backward lean bringing her chair closer to collapse. Her naescent woes were buried in sugary confections, soon she found the entire box to be empty. She remembered her mini-fridge was full of cokes, she reached back to retrieve one. This proved to be the last straw for her ever-abused chair, which gave a 'Crack' as she leant back. She gave a wail as she fell backwards, and the weight of a rapidly-falling 700 pound woman made the column below the chair seat crack in half, as her seat and the rolling support separated in two.

A loud 'Crash' resounded, a crash that every employee in the building heard, and an unfortunate intern on the fourth floor, directly below Emily's office felt drywall sprinkle her hair as she ran from behind the copier she was trying to retrieve a set of memoranda from. Jessica sprung up and hurried with amazing speed, making her stomach sway from side to side, to Emily's office. The bloated woman could be seen even behind her desk, flat on her back, her sheer mass visible just over the desk. She groaned as Jessica came around. "Em? Em!?" Jessica's eyes were met by the sight of Emily, her shirt ripped to pieces from a mixture of being overpressed by an overly full stomach and the sudden strain of the fall. Emily groaned in pain. Jessica shouted. "Can we get some help here? Emily just fell!" Jessica leant down and spoke. "Emily? You okay? Em?" Emily looked at Jessica, in a daze. Was she awake? Yes, yes she was. "I...Dunno.." She could barely speak, the fall had knocked the wind from her lungs, an already pressed department as every movement became more difficult with Emily's exponentially increasing size. Jessica tried to help up Emily. It was impossible for her alone. She was still fairly strong from her training with Jen, but she couldn't lift a 700 pound woman on her own. Alice came rushing in and began helping. "Emily, you okay girlie?" Jessica turned to her. "I don't know, have Kait get the medics. She might be hurt." The two fat women assisting the mass of blubber up were, thankfully for Emily, fairly strong. Jessica and Alice had to sweat like they had not done in a month or two but Emily was just on her feet. The two huffed and puffed at the exertion of getting the fat woman on her feet. Emily steadied herself.

Soon the medics came in and helped Emily to the doctor's office. As the morbidly obese woman was carted off, Jessica and Alice saw apparent a crack in the concrete floor, apparent through a tear in the fabric caused by the friction of the fat woman's fall. "Jesus almighty..." muttered Jessica. Alice turned to her. "Emily cracked the floor?" Jessica nodded. The two women didn't need to follow up the statement. The conclusion was obvious. The building had been designed with obese women in mind, and if Em was able to injure even this, then she was getting far too fat indeed. "Call maintenance too. I don't trust that crack." By the end of the week, Emily had been diagnosed with a concussion and given a permanent dispensation to work from home. Emily would not be seen at the office again, and it was general knowledge that she had become bed-bound by her gluttony.
14331112121111111112211211211111212.title: Emily

choices: Lauren worries about Jessica's rapid gains. She asks Jessica to slow it down.
Jess and Alice get sent off to Dynamo to negotiate again.
143311121211111111122112112111112121.content:
Jessica's eyes peeled open at the curtains. She turned her head toward her clock. It read in digital red numbers that had a glow "6:00" as it blared an alarm out. Jessica groaned and shifted to smack the 'snooze button with her lardy arm. She stared into the darkness and pondered whether it was worth getting up this morning. She shrugged, she knew if she didn't at least try she'd just fall back asleep. She rolled over and gave a groan at the exertion, pulled on some pajamas and turned on her light, waddling ponderously into the kitchen to grab a cup of Coffee. She encountered the slightly plump form of Jennifer, who had gained some weight since the trio had moved to the house. She smiled over her mug. "Hey, morning Jess!" Jessica smiled. "Morning, Jen." Jessica took in her coffee as she shuffled towards the table. It had been nearly constant that Jennifer already had a massive breakfast ready whenever Alice and Jess had awoken, whole platters of bacon, pancakes, sausage, eggs, oatmeal-or grits, if they were feeling country-ish. Jessica pulled herself to a seat and began to hurl bacon and sausage down her throat and sawing away at pancakes. She tilted her head up to look at Jennifer while she sipped her coffee. Jennifer's once-toned stomach had given way to a paunch that made her shirt ride up just so much--it was clear she was gaining some weight, that she wasn't immune to what she was doing to Jessica and Alice.

What she was doing, however, was amazingly effective. In the two months Jessica had been with Jennifer, she had to have gained at least fifty pounds, maybe sixty or seventy. Her stomach had gained inch after inch and Jessica had noticed, but she had given up. Jennifer had become more than just another tool for weight loss, she was a fixture of Jessica's home. She was a friend. Especially effective in transforming Jessica's waistline was swapping out the normally healthy meals of rice and chicken for frozen pizzas, massive amounts of home deep-fried food, and sweets. It played into Jessica's key weaknesses and it made her inflate out of control. She was about the size Emily had been just 8 months ago, an apple-shaped blob of fat, which made her look even fatter than Emily with her sheer gut.

Alice came downstairs and hurried to the table. "Oooh, breakfast, why didn't you call me?" she spoke. She was almost unrecognizable compared to how she had been two months ago. While Jessica's gains were somewhat slowed owing to her higher metabolism due to her sheer size, Alice had no such issues. Her stomach, breasts, and thighs had ballooned massively for such a short period, and she had to have gained 100 pounds at least. She was back to where she had been and quickly climbing past. "Hey, Al!" called both Jen and Jess. Jen was munching on some bacon and a few links of sausage. She enjoyed watching her piggies eat every morsel she put down, and balloon. She loved seeing every pound come on. It was like building a house, a steady progress that came from her sheer efforts. She also enjoyed letting herself go to some degree. She liked not caring about what she ate, and she'd made enough money that she could afford to take a break from her practice for a while.

Eventually, Jennifer's piggies had to go to work. "Take care, girls! Food'll be waiting!" Jessica and Alice waved. "Can't wait! See ya!" Jennifer smirked as she watched her human balloons of fat jiggle off, especially Jessica's new back fat on her torso, and her additional third roll which especially jiggled just above her ass-crack. It was so pleasing to see her creations jiggle to work.

The two at the office consumed exponentially more donuts than before. Emily might be gone, but her deliveries were still arriving, and the two lardy ladies were not ones to let perfectly good donuts go to waste. While Jennifer was great to blame for many of their new pounds, the sheer volume of donuts they were consuming was a great part. Kaitlyn had joined in and started getting her own box delivered while the other two plowed through two boxes at least. Kaitlyn looked with wide eyes. "Darn, you guys are on a whole other level!" Jessica simply nodded as she casually inhaled a donut into her lardening jowls. Her face seemed significantly fatter than Emily's ever was, and that combining with her physically blimp-like appearance made her seem like a literal whale. Kaitlyn had put on a good thirty pounds and she was easily approaching the 400-pound mark, her weight gain shifting a bit to her breasts and giving her just that much of an hourglass appearance. Her stomach was still fairly generous but not nearly as massive as Alice's, let alone the mammoth gut that belonged to Jessica.
143311121211111111122112112111112121.title: Rapid Expansion

choices: ..by accepting Jessica's decision and helping her lose weight.
..by refusing to let Jessica try to diet, and resolved to feed her even more.
1433111212111111111221121121111121211.content:
Lauren Gordge sat at her office, tip-typing at her keyboard. It was one of the few moments in the day when she wasn't moving. She had in fact slimmed greatly over the past few months, not out of choice, but out of the sheer fact that she moved so much and ate so little due to the fact that was her work schedule. In fact, her pot belly had begun to shrink to the point where her once great stomach was flattening, and if she kept up these habits, she'd be legitimately thin by anyone's standards. The form of one of the board members, Dana Massaglio, a fairly chubby woman with black hair hung in the doorway. "Heyy, Lauren." She slyly slid a coffee cake onto the CEO's desk as the red-headed, thick woman turned her head. "Hmm? Oh, hey, Dana. Thanks." The redhead unwrapped the cake and munched into it as Dana spoke. "So, Jessica's been absolutely blowing up recently." Lauren hummed through a full mouth before she swallowed and spoke, "Yeah, she has. I've heard she hardly moves, she's getting to be like Emily used to be before she had her accident and had to work from home full-time." Dana nodded. "Yeah. Emily never did much, but Jessica has real potential, she sealed the deal with Dynamo last year, and she can pull some real moves around here. I don't know if we can just have her hog her way into immobility like we let Emily do." Lauren nodded. "Mmm. Yeah, I do see your point. I think I'll have a sit-down with 'er, chat, get her to try to slow it down or at least keep where she is." Dana nodded and spoke. "Gotcha. And take care of yourself, girl! You're wasting away!" Lauren chuckled. "I'll try, but I just stay so busy, what with the Dynamo stuff and the new contract negotiations with those guys outta Charlotte." Dana gave a wave and turned about. Lauren sighed. She never liked doing this but she only had to do this in serious cases where an employee had real potential and was wasting their potential as businesspeople.

Jessica was in a mixture of inhaling food and typing at her desk. She hadn't gotten up all day, even for break she had elected to stay in her office because as of late, she simply got too winded waddling across the hall. Suddenly, her phone began to ring. She reached to pick it up. "Hello?" Lauren's voice came over the phone. "Yeaah, Hey Jess, this is Lauren. Could you come up here? I've got to talk to you about something." "Sure thing." Jessica hung up and groaned. She'd have to walk all the way to the elevator again. She pulled herself up with a great effort. her mammoth stomach scraping past the arms of her chair that grew ever tighter with each day as the bulk of woman jiggled her way towards the elevator. She panted as she continued down the hallway. This walk didn't use to take as long, and Jessica was questioning why she felt so tired. She figured it was because she didn't get up to get her extra cup of coffee like she usually did. She made a mental note to get a coffee machine for her own office.
