She finally made it to the elevator, and she was absolutely knackered. Her heart was pounding at an alarming rate and she was gasping for breath. She slammed the "10" that was for the 10th floor, the Executive office. She took a breather before she trudged down the hall, being extraordinarily loud as she pounded her way towards the end of the hallway.

The slender, red-headed form of Lauren walked up towards Jessica. She could hear her wheezing from her office and thought to her herself, Jesus, Jessica's actually gotten that fat? "I gotcha," she spoke, giving her arm to Jessica as she leaned on it. "Thanksboss.." Jessica mumbled out as she stumbled along with Lauren's help. Lauren sat Jessica down in two chairs put together. "Have a seat, Jess." Jessica sat down and panted for breath. Lauren leaned on her desk and spoke up. "Now, Jess, you've been a great asset to this company. Your star's been rising and when Amanda retires, I have half a mind to appoint you as Head of Public Relations." Jessica's weary mind picked up at this. Head of PR was as good as heir to VP, third-in-line to the entire company. "But, there's a problem." Lauren's eyes stared directly into Jessica's. "You've been gaining at an alarming rate, and normally we don't say anything about this, but it's impacting your work and especially your potential to go and do business abroad for us. It's a problem, and if you want that position, and if you want to stay in corporate, I'd advise halting your gains, and cutting back about a hundred pounds. If you continue gaining and cannot get around, we'll have no option but to cut you back from corporate and make you work from home." Jessica nodded. "Understood perfectly." She really, really wanted that Head PR position, but it would be hard to cut back on the food.

Jessica and Alice had gotten back home and entered to a table full of food with Jennifer standing in front. "Hey, guys! Welcome back! Have a seat, I made fried chicken!" And had she ever. There had to have been two, three trays of it, french fries, mozzarella sticks, macaroni and cheese, rolls and everything. "Oooh!" peeked up Alice, who rushed over to the food. Jessica had a moment of awakening. Hadn't she gotten Jennifer to help her lose weight in the first place? It seemed as though recently she'd done nothing but gain weight. Of course, her misgivings weren't enough to suppress her rampant hunger. Half in a trance she waddled to the table next to Alice. There was a mental disconnect as she absolutely demolished half a tray of chicken by herself. Her mind seemed to be telling her, "No, no, stop, you have to lose weight to get that position, you can't do that while eating all this food!" But her stomach seemed to be demanding it, she kept eating through her misgivings. Her shirt grew drum-tight as the meal came close to a conclusion, just before Jennifer brought out food. Jessica's face involuntarily turned to elation. The sheer sight of dessert temporarily placated her misgivings. Okay, she could have this indulgence before she got started. As she dug through a third of the cake, another third going to Alice and the last third going to Jen herself, Jessica's shirt gave way, ripping right down the middle.

After dinner had finished, she waddled up to Jennifer and explained the situation to her. Jennifer responded...
1433111212111111111221121121111121211.title: Jessica gets a sit-down.

choices: Lauren doesn't care any more about Jessica's gains, and Jennifer gets feeding.
Jess has to travel to Atlanta. She enjoys some southern cooking.
14331112121111111112211211211111212111.content:
Jennifer sighed. It seemed her little piggy was going back on her. "That sounds absurd. Why do you need to lose weight to get the position?" "Well, I've been having trouble getting around, and Lauren says I've got to be able to move around to be a head of PR." Jennifer sighed. She really wanted to see Jessica swell up to absurd proportions, but she understood that work came first. Plus, Jessica would be able to move around less if she got Vice President. "Well, I'll help you out." Alice groaned. "Girl, you do realize this means I'm going to be the size of a house if you stop eating all this food?" Jennifer turned her head to Alice. "Only if you want to be." Alice raised a brow, and chuckled. "I guess I could keep eating like this while we have the food to do it. But next grocery run, please get less food. Unless you plan to join the obese girl club." Jessica semi-whispered so that Alice could also hear. "Doo iiiit..." All three chuckled at it. It was a good joke.

Jessica's forehead choked with sweat as she stretched sideways. "Hooold that pose. Hoold it. Feel the burn." Jessica's entire lower stomach was exposed by the move. "Why is this... so hard..." Jennifer poked at her belly. "That's why, girlie. Don't worry, keep at it. I know you can lose some of this." Jessica nodded. "True, I guess.." Jennifer was still unable to really contain herself in terms of fondling Jessica's flab, but she was always able to hide it well. Such an opportunity opened up as Jessica performed warrior pose, but her thick coating of sweat entering her eyes had her leg a bit shorter than it should be, and her arms were a bit too low. Jennifer turned and spoke up. "No, no, no.." she bent over and gripped Jessica's tree-trunk thigh and cankle on her right leg. She couldn't help but give it a bit of a jiggle as she nudged it forward, and she did the same with the underarm fat of her arms. "Thanks." spoke Jessica. "No problem!"

Office work had more movement involved, and at the same time, Jessica was able to build more of a rapport, because more of her walking was to Lauren's office. As the month went on, she couldn't help but notice Lauren had been re-gaining weight, and moving less. The talk around the break room was that Lauren was finally starting to look like a Gordge girl again. In the break room, Jessica had gone back to stuffing herself with lettuce, with a donut here and there, but it was more than made up for by her constant walking and stretches with Jennifer.

By the end of the month, Alice had absorbed close to every pound Jessica had lost. That food supply was lasting a bit longer than everyone had thought, but Alice seemed not to notice the nearly 40 extra pounds. Kaitlyn, too, at the office seemed to be hovering towards the 400 mark, her massive rear-end, thighs, and belly absorbing a great deal of the fat entering. She was turning into a real ball of blubber, an orb reminescent of Jessica when she'd joined corporate, save with a smaller stomach.

By the end of the month, Jessica had the Head of PR. She'd entered the corporate section only to find a massive chocolate cake, pizza, and great deals of donuts. "Surprise!" shouted Kaitlyn and Alice. Jess grabbed her chest, the surprise was a shock. "You guyys!" she spoke. "I appreciate the food, but don't scare me like that! You nearly gave me a heart attack!" "Sorry, girlie, we just thought we'd give you a good 'ole treat for your going away!" Jessica had some apprehensions, but her inherent fat girl spoke up; "It's a treat. Treat yourself."

So Jess did what she loved, she treated herself. The three munched on pizza, but Jess chomped on the chocolate cake. It was rich, sweet to the taste. "Mmmm! This is better than sex." Kaitlyn bubbled as she swallowed some pizza. "Thaanks! I made it." Jess spoke up. "For real? Probably for the best that I don't live with you, I'd balloon up faster than I did when Jen was feeding me." Alice chuckled. "So girlie, what do you think it's gonna be like up there?" Jessica shrugged. "I've heard they have a legit buffet up there. If that's true, I hope Lauren doesn't expect me to stay mobile." Kaitlyn cackled. Alice spoke up. "Girl, sneak me up there one day. I gotta get at that if it's true." By the time the gorge was true, Kaitlyn's stomach was full to bursting, but Alice and Jessica needed some more to fill up. "How do you guys have so much room?" Alice and Jessica gave a response as both smacked their immense guts, making both stomachs quake.
14331112121111111112211211211111212111.title: Jessica gets back on the wagon.

choices: Lauren wants a new ad campaign. The extra workload packs on the pounds.
The holidays roll around again, and Jessica has an awkward time at home.
143311121211111111122112112111112121111.content:
Jessica paced into the hallway of the top suits. These were the hallways of power, full of clout and the might of inter-company politics, and the weight of it was in the air. Towards the end of the hallway was Lauren Gordge, the ever-expanding CEO. She had been gaining hard in the month Jessica had been losing, and her once svelte figure was now thick with fat. "Hey, Lauren!" spoke Jessica, who extended her arms. Lauren accepted the hug and hugged back as far as she could reach around Jessica's nigh-endless stomach. Though she was back down to 650 pounds, that didn't mean Jessica was suddenly a twig. "Jessi! Welcome to the big-time!" Jessica looked about in awe. "Over here, lemme show you your office." Lauren led the obese woman to her office. A bronze name-plate was at the doorway. "Ooh, it's got my name on it n' everything!" Lauren chuckled, "I know, it's so cool, isn't it?" She stepped into the room as Jessica's eyes scanned it, save for the fat, red-headed form of Lauren Gordge and her thick thighs and breasts, with a supple stomach to support them. It was a massive room compared to her old office. There were book-cases, an end-table with an expensive-looking coffee machine on it, besides a basket of creamer, and at the center, a great mahogany desk, shining in the fluorescent light. Jessica's jaw hung open, and Lauren chuckled. "For real, it's a shock, isn't it?" Jessica choked out something to the affirmative, but she was simply stunned. "Ooh, lemme show you the best perk. Over here." Jessica followed the plump form of Lauren to what seemed to be a closet. The door opened, betraying its true thickness as it slowly swung open and lit up from within. Within, as Jessica stood in the wide doorframe, were shelves and shelves of snacks, food, drinks, with cubby-holes for miscellaneous items below. It dawned on Jessica; it was a walk-in refrigerator. A breathy "Holy Shit" parted from Jessica's lips. "For real. These are the perks here. And you can enjoy them, too. That weight loss stuff was just to see if you were dedicated enough to the company, and your dedication is here." Jessica took a moment to process everything, then replied. "Well, that's... That's good! Is there -any- limit, or..." Lauren spoke up. "Just try to be mobile." Jessica nodded. "Understood."

The tour came to the luxurious break-room. There was a whole kitchen, a bar, and a table with several swine-like women sitting at it, chewing away at donuts. "Ladies, meet the new head of PR!" The group stood up. From left to right, there was a blonde with a hawk-like nose on an immensely fat face, with a second and nascent third chin, and jowls to match, her largest compartment being her breasts and belly, her legs being comparative twigs. "Jess, meet Dana, HR department." The immensely fat woman nodded. Next were a pair of brunettes, but while one was a great pear, with fat hips wide enough to seem like challenges to even the wide doorframes of these upper echelons, the other was an all-around gainer, fat on every part of her body, with green eyes that shone from her fattened face that still seemed svelte compared to Dana. "Anne and Mary, Purchasing and Finance." The two spoke up. "Pleased to meet you." While pear-like Anne had a melodious voice, Mary's voice was low and gravelly. The final woman was a strawberry blonde that was willow-thin by Gordge standards. "And this is Shannon, Production and my VP. She doesn't play by our rules." Shannon chuckled and in her happy but slow voice spoke, "No, not necessarily."

The day seemed to end quickly, as the move took up most of Jessica's day. There wasn't much to do that day either way, but she was able to get some snacking with the board done. Shannon, true to character, snacked on a salad and towards the end of the day peeked into Jessica's office. "Hey, Jess, I'm headed to the Gym after work. Wanna join in?" Jess chuckled. "Not today, but maybe sometime." Shannon giggled. "That's more committment than the rest have given me!" Jessica drove her way home, feeling powerful, arriving with Alice at the house.

The two entered the dining room to find several spreads of pizza. "Oooh!" cooed Alice. Jennifer was smiling at the end of the table. "I thought I'd make some treats, to celebrate Jess' promotion!" Jess chuckled. "Thank you, Jen!" She felt like saying "It's not necessary," but it was moot. She felt like celebrating and pizza was just in today's lexicon. Jennifer gave her usual stare at Alice and Jessica as they stuffed themselves. It was especially pleasing, and there was something in Jessica's celebratory stuffing that told Jennifer that she was coming back to her hoggish ways.

There was certainly way to test. Jennifer had made a double-chocolate cake with chocolate chips crowining it, and she was keeping it concealed for a time after supper. It certainly would have to wait today, because both Alice and Jessica were rubbing their stuffed stomachs and groaning. "Ooooh...those months of dieting must have gotten me soft... I don't know how I ate it all.." Alice mumbled something, but couldn't be heard over her panting. Both of them were wracked with the fat sweats, and Alice proceeded to pass out in her chair, resting her head on her double-chin, and Jessica stumbled to her room, gripping the walls for dear life. It was the kind of fullness that only came along once in a while for Jessica, even in this den of gluttony. She sat in her room and rubbed her stomach, when she heard a few taps at her door. She rolled herself right-side up and trudged to the door and opened it. It was a chocolate cake, an absurdly rich one. She picked it up without a second thought, and sat it on her bed. She figured that she wasn't concerned with losing weight anymore, her "diet" was over, and she could relax again. It was a slow process of picking at it, letting the food digest, then going back at it. When Jen peeked in next, Jessica had passed out on top of the plate where the cake formerly was, her face and chins covered in chocolate.
143311121211111111122112112111112121111.title: Introductions.

choices: Jessica goes out with the office girls to the italian restaurant. Dana's back.
Jessica gets a knock at the door one day; It's Melinda.
1433111212111111111221121121111121211112.content:
Jessica rubbed at her stomach as she made her way down the street in her large SUV. She'd come to terms with her ever-expanding waistline, and had upgraded to a larger car. And expand her waistline indeed did. In the 3 months from promotion to turkey-time in November, Jessica had ballooned up to 720. Her stomach was rubbing against the steering wheel even with the seat all the way back, as far as it could go. Eventually she saw the house she recognized as home, and pulled in. She groaned. She remembered her cousin would likely be here, and she was giving Jessica grief when she was 100 pounds smaller last year. She could only imagine the torment she would go through this year, even from her other relatives.

She grunted and groaned, but eventually managed to jiggle her way out of the car. She waddled towards the door, huffing as she hefted her lardy, fat legs towards the doorframe. The porch-boards creaked tenuously under her mass, but she rang the doorbell. Her mother's graying form answered the door. "Jessieee!" She answered and wrapped her arms around Jessica, or more accurately, her massive stomach. "Hey, mom!" Jessica huffed out as she hugged her mother's also enlarged form. "Come iiin!" Her mother spoke, but she couldn't hide her surprise at Jessica's massive gain. Jessica noticed, and she noticed similar looks on the face of every family member in the large living room. There were hushed whispers on the fringes, and Jessica knew the topic; her weight.

But then the heavenly smell wafted in from the kitchen. Jessica wandered towards the table as her mother beckoned, giving two loud claps and bellowing, "Alright, y'all! Come get your plates!" Jessica was at the head of the line, she seemed to forget about the blatant ogling that occurred by every member. She even heard a male voice, a distant uncle of hers, she thought she could pick out, "Damn, that girl was way smaller last year. What the hell happened?" followed by a harsh "Hush, Doug." Jessica had packed her plate, proceeding over every tray until she could fit no more, and waddled back. There was only a minor problem: her girth was too wide to pass alongside the throng of relatives. They waited for a moment as Jessica tried to squeeze past, with a few "'Scuse me's" and "Pardons" but the family members packed to the walls. Jessica was a sight to behold in her shirt of indeterminate size that was still tight as a balloon, with a bit of stomach still sticking out at the bottom. Her sheer mass defied understanding and space, and her sheer girth became apparent as she dominated the entrance to the dining room. Her nephew Lynne was pressed directly against the other side of the doorframe by her sheer width, which was in fact wider than most furniture in the house, even the old grand armoire that Mama Donna swore was from their great ancestor so-and-so.

Eventually, Jessica had made it to her seat. She pulled it out and pulled in, but her stomach spilled over onto the table, just short of her plate, and into the laps of those beside her. They scooched left and right, making Jessica stand out. And by Jessica's sheer bad luck, she was seated directly across from Cousin Melinda. "Before y'all dig in," interrupted Mama Donna's voice, "we need to say grace, who's got it?" A young buck of a man, some distant cousin with brown hair spoke up. "I got it." The table clasped their hands, and some bowed their heads. Jessica clasped her hands out of respect but the office life hadn't kept her in touch with the christian faith of her mother. Her eyes were open, and they looked down at first, at the table. Her stomach roared in eagerness as the brown-haired man spoke about "blessing the food to their bodies and their bodies to thy service." Almost perfectly timed, Jessica looked up, and met the baleful amber-eyed gaze of Melinda, with the furor of olden days before last thanksgiving. The message was exact and unmistakable. 'You got fat,' and it came about just as the 'Amen' washed over the table.

Jessica dug into her food, a bit unnerved and slowed by the death-stare of Melinda. It didn't take Melinda long until a lull in conversation over Politics to speak up. "Dang, Jess, you been practicing?" Lynne spoke up. "Yeah, I didn't want to say anything, but I nearly didn't recognize you. You really ought to watch what you eat." Jessica chuckled. "It's hard, with all the food at the office. They try to fatten me up, I swear," she spoke before digging into a heap of peas and mashed potatoes. "I don't think it's just from work, darling." spoke Melinda. "You were doing real good. What happened that made you quit?" Jessica shrugged. Melinda pressed, "Well, I agree with Lynne. You ought to get back on that diet, get back in touch with that Dietician. I got half a mind to move up there with you and kick you into shape, try the South Beach diet. It's really good. Helped me drop last year's winter weight." Jessica was about to politely refuse, when her Aunt Mary spoke up next to her, a thin, brown-haired woman. "Yeah, darling. Plus all that extra weight is really bad for your heart, you know. It'll kill ya, darling. You should listen to Linda." Jessica mumbled a half-hearted "I'll think about it."

The feast carried on for a bit, and she had gone back for her usual fourths, then fifths. It was the sixth plate that reignited the conversation about dieting. "Hon, do you need all that food?" spoke up Mary. Jessica grunted in response and dug in. Jessica felt a sharp jab in her hefty side, causing a jiggle to ripple through her stomach. "Honey, I wasn't kidding about what I said earlier. You need to stop eating all that, it's killing you. Hand your plate to Ally." Jessica shook her head. "I got my sixth plate, I'm eating it." Melinda chuckled. "Yeah, but it's totally just the workplace, right, Jess?" Jess groaned. "Please, Linda, stop talking about it." Jessica was sweating not only from the exertion of eating, but also from the heat of the argument. "I know I'm fat, I don't need you reminding me." Melinda spoke up promptly. "Well obviously you don't! You eat like you're starving to death, but it's just the opposite, you're eating yourself to death, honey. You gotta drop that weight, darling." Jessica shot a look of fire. "Shut UP!" Mamma Donna spoke up. "Now, that's enough! Quit that yelling, both of you! We're at the table!"

Jessica groaned. This was the reason why she dreaded going home for thanksgiving.
1433111212111111111221121121111121211112.title: Home Humiliation

choices: Jessica speaks up. "Sure thing." They meet that weekend.
Jessica turns her down, and things stabilize for a while.
1433111212111111111221121121111121211112.content:
Dana the Waitress was sweating from exertion, wiping her brow and scarfing down some leftover pizza from a table who had walked out at lunch. She couldn't understand what kind of human beings would walk out on a perfectly good pizza.

It was times like these when Dana wished that whale from last year would come back, the absolutely massive woman who had to be at least five hundred pounds. It was a rare kind of rush that Dana felt once in a while, because very often she'd see that type come in once at a peak weight, ordering all the right things, then come back ordering salads, and health foods, drinking water instead of soda, cutting down on that beautiful stomach. It was enough to make a heifer hunter like Dana cry.

By the time the clock had hit six, it was a bit faster but still fairly slow. It was a Wednesday, and pretty slow even for the dinner rush. Dana hardly had to move her lofty rear-end as customers came in and left. But towards ten-past, the door opened and the huffing of Gordge employees came in. These fatsos were usually the haunts of the buffets, but the floor actually shook as the brunette Jessica came in, leaning on the pack of obese women, nearly forming a human blob of sweat and blubber. Dana's nipples hardened. Holy SHIT, is that the one? she thought. She saw the eyes through fattened jowls, so immense and fat and slick with sweat from the mere act of slow waddling, but by her eyes and the set of her fat face, it truly was the one she had remembered with a pack of other horridly obese women. The others would make a dietician faint, but Jessica's absolutely stunning stomach would make a fitness instructor keel over. It dumbstruck Dana as she was on desk duty, her jaw literally came open for a moment. It was perfect, so massive and spherical. It was so large it was covering Jessica's knees, and her waddle was so slow a snail would seem like a sprinter, the rest of the pack except the one anomaly, the slim and trim caboose, weren't much better.

Jessica attempted to speak. "Hey...W'veg't...." She took a moment to pant. She seemed like she was about to pass out. Dana let the blob huff. It was so arousing that it was absurd. Jessica swatted a bead of sweat that began to fall from her hair, and wiped her forehead. "Uh..Six.." Dana nodded, and spoke up. "A'right, follow me please!" She grabbed six menus and walked over to an area between the booths and tables. She knew especially the brunette wouldn't be able to get in, but she wanted to see if she would go for it. "Table or booth?" Jessica spoke up. "Definitely a table."

A pang of dissapointment. Dana wanted to see the orb of fat try to squeeze in, but she laid the menus on a six-seater table. "Here you go! Your waiter will be right with you."

Dana spent the slow evening staring at the table. It was like seeing a ballet of constant food. Appetizers of fried cheese sticks and clams by the tray-fulls, what could generously be called salads were it not for the masses of bacon, ranch, and cheese on top of what was hopefully lettuce, and entire pitchers of soda, as mere starters. It was the sexiest thing Dana had seen in her life. The strawberry blonde was the least fun out of the bunch: her salad was genuine enough and she only got a water, but the rest of the herd ate and ate. Great globs of ranch rolling down their vast double-chins, melted cheese lining their lips, the constantly expanding jowls that stretched ever more to recieve massive mouthfuls of food. This was only the appetizer, but this was enough to feed an apartment block.

This paled in comparison to the main course. Double-servings of the infamously massive bowls of carbonara, chicken parmesan, dishes of lasagna as "sides," and the most sinfully creamy bowls of alfredo pasta that had ever been made. Jessica's clothing was more like a hospital gown nowadays, due to her sheer size, but around her stomach it was eternally stretched thin. There may have been double-digits, dana surmised there had to be, in front of that XL, and it was still absolutely mind-bogglingly tight. It, like the clothing of the others, soon began stretching with the vast stomachs and spare tires of the gang. Jessica's massively fat face, beaded with sweat from the exertion of moving her arms to eat, jjiggled as she talked and joked with her corporate friends. It was a good night out for her, but better for Dana. Jessica's face became dotted by the cream of the pasta, the red sauce of the lasagna. Shannon perked up. "Jess, you've got sauce on your face. Jessica raised her napkin to her face, dotting off sauce and sweat. "Thanks, Shannon."

The evening eventually came to a close. As the hoggish six dined on coffee and dessert, one of the waitresses came up to Dana and whispered. "Will these fat bitches leave? It's nearly nine, we should be closing soon." Dana smiled. "Aw, come on, Amanda, you know how I feel about babes like this." The woman shook her head and walked out. "I'm going for my fucking smoke break." Dana chuckled. "Go and have your ciggy. I'm having enough fun right here."

The pack began waddling out talking and laughing as the clock ticked on past nine. Dana walked up to Jessica as she was taking a second longer than the pack. "Hey, uh, didn't you come in her a while back?" Jessica took a second to breathe from the exertion of pulling on her coat. "Huh? Oh, yeah... I did. I think I remember you...Dana, isn't it?" She nodded. "And you're...Jessica, right?" Jessica nodded. "Uh-huh." Dana spoke. "Well, uh, I-I don't know if you swing this way, but I think you're just stunning, and I'd love to take you out to eat sometime."
1433111212111111111221121121111121211112.title: Booths and Blubbery Babes

choices: The work week goes on.
1433111212111111111221121121111121211112.content:
Jessica's heart was pounding on that Friday night, and not just because she was waddling across a parking lot. Her vast-bellied form waddled beside the short but thick form of Dana the Waitress. They had met at the restaurant, and it was a strange feeling. Jessica didn't feel like there was anything here except a curiosity. She hadn't really messed around with women, but things were going downhill in regards to her prospects with men. The only looks she got were shocked and puzzled stares. She felt as though she should take what she could get. Her mind was racing so rapidly. What did any of this mean? Was this a relationship? Was this just the testing of the waters? Her mind raced so fast she barely noticed she was so horridly out of breath and sweaty that she nearly stumbled. Dana's firm hold on her arm kept her grounded. She came to in earnest, doubled over and panting hard. "Damn, babe, I'll give you a second. Sorry, you okay?" Jessica spoke breathily through pants. "M'good...jus'....tired." The sight was absolutely perfect to Dana. This absolute whale who was such a fat ass that her stomach blocked her legs' full range of motions was doubled over panting from a simple walk, with every roll on her side on perfect display through the skin-tight top that would be a tent on anyone smaller, and the collar of it was already soaked in sweat.

For Jessica it was not attractive. Her heart was pounding from the taxing walk across the parking lot with her stomach blocking her legs from moving properly plus the fact that she looked like an unfit whale to her date, the only one she'd had in a few years. She felt like an idiot. "Sorry, sorry, sorry.." she spoke as she brought herself upright and wiped the sweat. Dana chuckled and patted her lardy back, "It's okay! It's okay! Don't worry about it!" Dana let her hand rest on Jessica's back fat. It was sweaty under the cloth, and for that moment, Dana wished Jessica were topless, so that she could properly fondle the roll. However, they were in public, and Dana wasn't that much of a perv that she'd pull a stunt like that in public. The two proceeded into the buffet, and she was greeted by a thin asian-looking woman. The woman seemed quite obviously shocked by Jessica's massive stomach and horrifyingly fat body. "Helloo! Two?" the woman said in a thick accent. Her eyes jerked away, trying to lock on to Dana. "Yep!" spoke Dana. "Greaaaat. Follow me please." the woman replied, and she showed them to a table. Dana couldn't help but be pleased. She didn't even ask, she knew. The smirk was present on her face, and she pulled out Jessica's chair for her. "Thanks, hon." mumbled Jessica as she took Dana's arm and sat down with the support Dana provided. Dana sat down opposite her. The hostess spoke. "Your waitress will be right with you." She walked away and into a small nave with drink machines and utensil holders. Dana could faintly hear some foreign language being spoken. Chinese, Korean, Japanese, these distinctions weren't there for her. She was no linguist, but she could tell that the two were talking about something absurd, something shocking.

She connected the dots, but she didn't care their opinion on her favored little pig. She was just interested in seeing how much this fat babe could eat. She turned around and grinned. "You want me to get your plate for you?" Jessica smiled. "Sure thing. You want a coke, right?" Dana nodded. "If you please." Dana walked off and filled Jessica's plate to bursting. She figured by Jessica's sheer size that she could handle the sheer amount of food on this plate. By the time she had gotten back with four plates, two plates for Jessica and two for herself, balancing two plates per hand, the drinks had arrived. Jessica was stunned. "How are you doing that?" Dana chuckled. "You learn a lot of stuff as a waitress. How to put up with bullshit, how to hold boiling-hot plates, and how to balance four of them on two hands. I did this with double the number of plates once, ya know!" Jessica chuckled. "And apparently you learn how to fill every part of a plate. I thought I was good at stacking buffet plates. You sure you aren't secretly two-hundred pounds heavier?" Both of them giggled. Dana spoke up as she watched Jessica stuff her face, smearing peanut oil and teriyaki sauce on her immensely fat face. "If I eat like you, I just might be, babe." Jessica looked over at Dana. She usually recieved these comments in derision. She decided, though, that Dana wasn't here to get her into Weight Watchers, judging by the fact that she'd packed her plate with so many calorie-laden treats, carbs, and fried meats that it was clear of her intentions. Jessica decided to play along a bit, and winked at Dana. Dana giggled semi-flirtingly. Jessica felt comfortable. Maybe this was going to be a good evening.

It was certainly a fulfilling evening. Jessica'd eaten beyond Dana's expectations. Dana had expected Jessica to make it five plates before quitting. However, Jessica made it seven, seven plates of General Tso's, Lo Mein and more than a few Chinese Donuts hidden inside. Her top had rolled up to reveal an absolutely full to bursting gut. The staff were openly staring and quipping to one another. It was absurd to all inside, there were even a few phones that came out. Jessica's forehead was absolutely swamped with sweat from the exhaustion and her taut, massive stomach stood as tall as a balloon, the top barely covering her breasts. Dana finally paid the bill while speaking to her. "Damn, hon! I thought I was full. You good?" Jessica mumbled "No, no..Need...help..." Dana got up and tried to pull Jessica up by her flabby arms. No dice, even with Jessica shoving upwards onto the table. Jessica couldn't move by the virtue of how much she had eaten. The staff rarely had to resort to this measure, but they wheeled out a mechanized wheelchair, and a team of waiters and waitresses hauled the horridly obese woman into the chair, and tucked her endless rolling gut under the steering wheel. Jessica was in such a daze by the sheer volume of food processing in her gut she could barely steer. Dana had to steer the cart for her. By the time Dana had gotten Jessica to her car and loaded her in with the grunts of the staff, with more than one muffled groans. One said out loud, "Why does she have to be so big?" Jessica's seat-belt couldn't buckle normally, and even with the seatbelt extender, the belt could barely fit around Jessica's mammoth gut, which heaved and fell as Jessica's eyes were nearly rolling back into her head, and her top was getting soaked with sweat. The staff waved goodbye as Dana drove away.

The two had gotten down the road. Jessica had finally recovered her breath, until finally she said. "Would you mind...taking me back to...your house?" Dana smirked. "Sure thing!" The two arrived at Dana's place. It was a small, one-story place, in a cheaper neighborhood, but it seemed like it would do. Dana unbuckled Jessica's seatbelt and opened her door for her, giving her an arm to let her out. "Thanks, babe.." Dana gave the blimp a crutch to move on, hearing every shaky, heavy breath Jessica uttered with every step. It seemed painfully slow, but for Dana it was sexual in every second. The fat, bloated babe was struggling with the basic task of walking, and the only thing that could be more attractive was what followed after Dana helped Jessica across the threshold of the porch and her door. Jessica was drenched in sweat and giving off quiet "Ow's" and "So fulll..." Dana brought Jessica to her bedroom and helped her on. Jessica took her time, and the bed, used to the lighter weight of Dana, screeched in protest and pain as the ball of lard was laid on it. 1433111212111111111221121121111121211112.content:
Jessica munched on a snack cake as she tip-typed her way through work. Her cut in mobility as of recently had allowed her to focus on work, and it had showed. She was active in responding to and sending e-mails, at least, and this was noticed by the upper echelons. Shannon leaned in at one particular conversation over break, speaking up. "Jess might be bigger than all of us, but that girl can certainly work. Did you know she's already secured Lauren three new commitments as contractors?" Dana and Mary cooed. "Really?" Spoke Mary. "That's astounding, we oughta treat her!" Shannon rolled her eyes. Like Jessica needed any treats. "Nah, though Lauren's certainly keeping her eyes open."

The holidays had brought the gift of poundage. Dana's belly had expanded even further, and her middle button had popped off a day back, and at this point, she'd ignored it and hoped the shirt would hold a bit longer. Mary's thighs and stomach had taken the brunt of the holiday pounds and she had rubbed at her tightening blouse. "I do wish she'd come and hang with us at breaks. That's the only downside to her working so damn hard."

Jessica was, of course, enmeshed in work. Memos, e-mails, following up, and of course, working on her snack cake and coffee supply. She had obtained a bit more of a sweet tooth as of recently, and her family-sized bags of chips had atrophied from unuse. Of course, this doesn't mean Jessica was watching her weight-though her concerns had grown as her mobility had shrunk. As she prepared to heed nature's call, she reached for her perscribed cane- doctor's orders for her lack of mobility- with diet and exercise. She pushed up, and the cane obliged, helping her up with the additional aid of the table. She waddled down the hall, thunking. Her eyes looked at her stomach as she huffed and puffed and strained at the effort of moving. Damn, this is just a walk down the hall. This is ridiculous. she thought. Maybe some time with Shannon would do her some good. Of course, she wasn't going to go whole-hog weight loss.. maybe just a few sessions of yoga a week or something.

Her mind turned to Dana, the waitress. She'd called her last night and talked a bit. The waitress was shaping out to be very amiable, and companion-like. She was growing fond of her, and felt a longing for another night like Tuesday. The weekend was coming up, she might spend a bit of time with Dana.

At home, things were proceeding as usual. Alice had hit a plateau at 500, as she was far too active to become a blob like Jess. But she was still a large woman, with a massive stomach, larger than Jessica's in former days. Jennifer was truly feeling the effects of her own poison, though- she had reached nearly 250 pounds,the once svelte dietician now a fat woman like her old clients. Her spare tire was especially conspicuous, below her thickening stomach, and her thighs and breasts were fattening as well at a secondary but still admirable weight. Jessica's weight was climbing slower these days, approaching the mere 730's, compared to her metoric gains of earlier.

"No way, girl. You should dump his ass."

The gang was talking in the break room, over donuts and coffee. Dana spoke up. "I know, but it's so hard because he treats me so nice otherwise. Besides, it's just a stupid little comment." Mary spoke up. "He told you to order a salad! That's basically calling you fat!" Dana shrugged, as a thunderous sound emerged from the room beside. It was the sound of the slow-shuffling of thunderous feet. It was the sound of Jessica performing a rare and arduous task: moving. The group raised their brows as Jessica walked in. "Hey, girls!" she spoke, followed by a gasp for breath as she grabbed a mug and filled it with coffee. "Jessica!" spoke Shannon. "What're you doing in here?" Jessica turned to her. "Thought I'd shuffle on in here just to talk."

Jessica filled her mug with coffee. Though her weight was starting to plateau, she was still massive. She was wider from side to side than the refrigerator she was grabbing creamer from, and her great gut made it so she had to stand nearly two feet back from the door as she opened it, and her shirt was still very, very tight, skin-tight. It was one of her very last wearable shirts before she broke into what were more or less hospital gowns. Jessica's two-foot standing range had to grow to three when sitting as she pulled up with her mug of coffee, sipping at it. "I had to get away from the computer for a second, these idiots at Dynamo are making me want to tear my hair out." Shannon hummed in agreement, "I feel you. They're ridiculous, it's like they don't understand corporate etiquette, let alone basic manners."

They sat for a while, jawing away until Jessica rubbed at her stomach. "Hey, Shannon, mind if I join you at the gym today?" Shannon lit up. "Sure!" Dana chuckled. "Damn, are you even the real Jessica anymore?" Jessica chuckled. "No, I'm a Russian spy." The group joined her in a good giggle.

Jessica entered the Gym with Shannon's willow-thin form. She felt like everyone was watching her, and she noticed a few eyes dip from the machines. A muscular man on the treadmill glanced before focusing on his run afterwards, a girl who was about Jennifer's size gazed from the ellipticals for a moment before focusing back on her machine. "So, like, what are we gonna do?" Shannon looked about. "Not trying to be a bitch, but I think you're too big for the machines. We could do some stretches, though!" Jessica spoke up. "Sure thing, hated those damn machines anyway."

Jessica was dressed in one of her only remaining workout outfits, and it was chokingly tight. Every breath was apparent through the 5XL top that looked like it would rip any second from the strain. Her five back-fat rolls jiggled with each step and her arms, which were like butterball turkeys at the bicep shook with each movement as Jessica followed Shannon to an aerobics section. A contraption was before her next to a great open space of mats, with various kettlebells and step-boxes around. The contraption consisted of several long nylon ropes draping down from a frame with attached chin-up bars, and on either end were punching bags and great, thick lengths of rope. Shannon led Jessica to the punching bags. "This is always fun." Shannon took up position next to Jessica. "You know how to punch, right?" Jessica grinned. "Girl, I went through High School. Fat bitches like me gotta learn how to fight. Hell yes, I do!" Shannon nodded, and the two got to punching. Jessica found her old reliable hook, jab-jab easy at first, but this was far more belabored than the hard-fought task of walking. The extreme amounts of fat on her arms slowed her punches, and while Shannon kept up a quick patter of jabs and a few hard hooks, Jessica quickly slowed. Sweat flooded her sight, after barely a few seconds of punching. After barely a minute, her punching had devolved into soft pats of the bag with her knuckles. "Ohmgod..." muttered Jess. She hung onto the bag, panting and covered in sweat.

"You good girl?" asked Shannon. "Nobreath..." mumbled Jessica. "Cantbreathe.." she mumbled. "Sit down, girl, have a seat." spoke Shannon. It was barely a minute, but Shannon remembered Jessica was quite the big girl, by this time, THE biggest in the office. She couldn't help but marvel how absolutely blubbery Jessica was everywhere as she pulled herself to a seat on a creaking bench meant for someone far smaller than her. Her collar was the epicenter of her sweat, blossoming out from there.

As the week went on, Jessica got better. From a few seconds of punching to a minute, to a few. She found herself more mobile, and more nimble. This was more clear as Jessica spent a night with Dana. They were in their usual pattern of a passionate bout of oral- Dana the Waiter's delicate tongue entering Jessica's plump pussy, as Jessica returned the favor from below. Dana felt Jessica's hands caressing her thick, perk tits. Jessica withdrew her mouth. As the bout ended, Dana spoke up as she rubbed and cuddled Jessica's blubbery form. "You're less sweaty than usual, babe. You been working out on me or something?" Jessica chuckled. "Just so I can be able to move without having a heart attack." Dana rubbed Jessica's belly and groaned. "I don't want it to shriiink..." Jessica rubbed her hand. "It won't shrink much. Don't worry. I'll still be your piggy, I just need to be able to walk."

Besides, I think Alice is too skinny still." Alice was in a hard food-coma, and she wasn't coming out anytime soon. Jennifer shook her head. "Look, you're just trying to give into these for a promotion. You can get it still, just keep trying to work hard!" Jessica groaned and crossed her arms. Jennifer walked off.

Jessica breathily trudged to her room. She sweated intensely from the short walk to her room, and it only helped alarm her more. God, how fat am I? She determined to know. She went to the Bathroom, and pulled out the electric scale that spoke aloud. She stopped being able to see past her gut a long time ago. She stood on it, and it announced electronically: "Six-Hundred-And-Eighty-Nine-Pounds." Jessica gasped and stepped back, grasping at her chest. It was so sheerly devastating. 689? She was going to be 700 soon, she was officially fatter than Emily had gotten. She ran out in a panic to her room and crawled onto her bed and began to sob. She was hopeless now. Her stomach quaked as she disregarded the contours of her obese body and shoved sheer volumes of fattening snack foods into her mouth. The next morning, she came to the table with Alice. It seemed as though Jennifer was on hyper mode. There wasn't an inch of clear space on the table, only food. Alice spoke up. Her stomach was now leaving its perch above the waistband of her pants, and sitting down, the button on her pants struggled to stay on, and she was sprouting a growing paunch which exposed her belly button, and rode just above her waistband.

Lauren rubbed at her straining suit. She could feel herself getting fatter, but she didn't really care. She figured she ought to let go for a while, but this was a conversation of lower echelons in her mind. Higher up was a brewing decision about Jessica. If she fired Jessica, she likely wouldn't improve, only get fatter and lazier. This rapid of a turnaround was too much to simply reverse overnight.

There's no reforming her, thought Lauren. I gave her time to do that already. It's time for Jess to go.

Jess was spending her usual lazy afternoon in her office, consuming a box of donuts. Jelly was especially her favorite, but it was messy, and it often got on her chins. The fat, lazy whale of a woman was caught in this practice by the chubbier form of Lauren Gordge. "Hey, uh, Jess." Jessica turned to her in slight embarassment. She was in her natural state, and her stomach was hanging out above her lap for the world to see. "Oh, Hey, Lauren!" she spoke. Lauren walked towards the desk. "Look, girl, I really hate to do this. But your productivity has...." Lauren realized that Jessica was munching on a jelly donut while she was speaking. She gave a sigh. "...Decreased, noticeably." In the back of her mind, she ruminated. You know, maybe I ought not let myself go THAT far. Jessica frowned. "I don't know what you mean! I got that communique out yesterday!" Lauren cut in briskly. "After I assigned it to you a week ago. You haven't been communicating, you take days to reply." Lauren shrugged. "And the cause is obvious." Jessica sighed. Lauren sadly put a small pink envelope on Jessica's desk. "Sorry, girlie." Jessica stuttered to no particular word. She was shocked. She had been doing so well! "B-b-b-b-but... No, please! I'll do better, I swear!" Lauren shook her head. "I gave you plenty of time but you're obviously not getting any better. Best of luck to you, don't show up tomorrow. Sorry."

Lauren briskly walked away. Jessica took the pink envelope, and struggled to stand. Sweat emerged from her brow as she struggled to tuck her fat folds past the arms of the chair. She was also panting from the stress. Fired? It had been so long since Jess didn't have a job. She had no clue what was next. She eventually pried her fat from the arms of the chair, but she was out of breath from the endeavor, with her great, rolling gut flowing onto the arms of the chair. She committed to getting up and stood up with a great heave of her mass and stood, even sweatier than when she'd begun. She grabbed her donuts, her salty snacks, her absolute vast troves of food. She was taking it all home and going to stuff herself with it. What the hell was there to do now? What was there? She hyperventilated harder, her vision became blurred as tears streamed down her face. She stumbled out into the hall with her vast trove of things. She stumbled to the elevator and when the door shut, she sobbed the entire way to the parking lot, to her car, and then back home.

The first Jennifer knew somethign was wrong was when the door burst open with Jessica carrying a great deal of snacks and a few small cardboard boxes which she haphazardly hurled onto the couch as she dropped and began stuffing her face and drowning her tears in food. "Baby, what's wrong?" Jessica mumbled through a full mouth, but Jen couldn't tell what she was saying. "Speak clearer, babe, you're not making sense. Jessica swallowed, her fat jowls shrinking slightly. "I got fired..." She took three panting huffs and continued, "'Cause I'm a fat piece of shit..." She dove back into her food. Jennifer patted her on the back. "It's okay, baby...You'll find another job... You're not a fat piece of shit..." Jess was inconsolable, though. The best Jen could do for her was add fuel to the fire and shove more food into the pile. By the time Alice came home with a big bag of fast food, Jessica was still munching. Jennifer had funnelled a great deal of snacks onto the pile, and Jessica was covered in the infamous "fat sweats" from the exertion of consuming the ever-growing pile of food. "Babe, I heard what happened at work. I'm so sorry. I'm going to try to help you out." Jennifer patted Alice on her flabby arm. Alice simply left the food and went to get something to snack on, she hardly took the time to breathe, she hardly took the time to wipe sweat from her forehead as it gathered and dripped down her collar. Her already overtaxed clothes ripped apart but Jess didn't care. She just kept eating. She felt a tiredness at the back of her mind, but she didn't care. All she cared about was drowning her woes in food. If she never felt worse and simply exploded she wouldn't care.

Jennifer and Alice were eating dinner at the table when they heard a soft 'thud' from the other room. They ran in and checked on Alice. She was clammy and sweating like she'd just ran a marathon. The food pile was only down to a small mat of food on the coffee table, but there was still some left. She was out, cold, but awoke in a few moments. "Jess, you okay? Girl?" Jessica mumbled something to the affirmative and reached for some more food but groaned in pain as she cradled her massive gut. "Too full.. Too full.. It hurts..." "Okay, girl, okay, we'll take it away.." Jessica smacked Jennifer's hand with force, leaving a red mark. "NO!" she screamed in a scream of desparation that shook the room. Jennifer withdrew the offending hand and wove it in pain. They left her sitting on the sweat-stained couch, gasping for breath from the exertion and the fullness. The stomach was hot and taut to the touch, which looked nearly impossible for its size, but it was true. Jessica stared into the ceiling as she struggled to breathe from her sheer mass and the absolute exertion she had made. The shortness of breath and the sheer fullness of her stomach kept her from sleeping that night, and she was short of breath the entirity of the next day.

Jessica never truly recovered from the shame of being fired for getting too lazy and fat for the fat office. She couldn't find a job anywhere, and she was certain it was due to her weight but she was in no position to resist the feeding charms of Jennifer, nor her stable income and the nice house they lived in. Alice eventually stabilized at around 600, learning an example from Jessica. The days became a long, indistinct blur of eating. Eventually, Jessica became unable to move, slowly outgrowing mobility by her sheer mass. The rest of Jessica's life was spent in one long, endless feast in her industrial bed, and to be a tale that was regaled about the upper echelons of Gordge for some time, that there was indeed a limit to how lazy and fat one could get at the office, and it existed in Jessica. There would occasionally be one or two of the upper echelons who ended up suffering the same fate, but never one so egregiously lazy and fat as Jessica.

In this phase, Jessica's actual weight became a purely academic endeavor, unable to be weighed due to the simple fact that she couldn't stand up. Her stomach was one giant, endless mass that blocked her vision, and as time went on, crushed downwards onto her lungs. Breath was a war fought every second against the endless rolling fat that Jessica had accrued through associating with Jen, and partaking in the ceaseless gorging with her and Alice, a war that would eventually require the assistance of oxygen tanks. Her crippling addiction to ever-increasing amounts of food had brought on this vegetative state of life where time was intangible, a concept that escaped her when every second was occupied with sleeping or eating. This would be the rest of Jessica's life, an existence dedicated solely to gluttony.

143312.content:
Jessica's resolve for her diet came from a very real place. Most folks with a sedentary job would start thinking of cutting back in the early stages of weight gain when they may be only a little pudgy after a tight squeeze with the uniforms pinching a small muffin top or padded out bottoms.

But for Jess, being a 460 pound fatty would prove that trying to whip her obese frame into any semblance of normality would be a task easier said then done.

The first day of her diet was almost over before it started, with the brunette instinctively reaching for a jumbo box of double glazed doughnuts located on the kitchen counter of her home so early that she hadn't even gotten dressed yet, only being clad in a hilariously undersized pair of pink bra and panties. Cutting deeply into her meaty breast and hip blubber like a fillet.

But as her drowsiness tapered off, she realized that doughnuts would mean an early end to her healthier plan. She glumly put the box in the trash can before glancing to the wall clock hung on the left side. It displaying 07:35.

"Crap! I'm gonna be late!" She mentally noted as she waddled to her bedroom. A healthy breakfast would have to wait until she got to the office.

**************************************************************************** ******************

With a last push to the front door, Jessica had made it with two minutes to spare. In her haste she realized that the pair of pants she grabbed may of been an older pair as it dug wayyy too deeply in between her tire-thick belly rolls, causing great discomfort. The only feeling that Jess found even more painful was the rumbling titan of her stomach.

Due to her delaying her diet for six weeks, Jessica never had a proper grace period to ease herself into it. A problem quickly discovered was found as the bulging office worker was depriving her gullet of the fatty foods it had grown accustomed to having shovelled in it at an almost constant rate had come back to bite her big. She had to find a source of food that could shut her tummy up while not exceding her daily calorie intake.

All Jessica had known at Gorge about the food available was it's pension to establish a vending machine in pretty much every department. Only problem being all of them only having candy bars that resembled computer keyboards, potato chip bags rivalling school bags in size and enough soda to fill a family pool to the top.

Jessica began to really regret not eating anything before. Even a completely plain doughnut was a nutritious feast compared to the calorie bombs offered in work. But she had to hold out, all Jess could do to resist temptation to trundle her way to the machine in the back and going to town on all the chocolates she could buy was work away at her desk, ignoring the ever present creaking of her chair and not think about food at all.

For the rest of the morning, Jess was ravenous mess who glugged bottles of water.(One of the few "Healthy" options from the vending machines.) in an attempted to calm the storm of her stomach's demands.

But, it was 11:55, almost lunch break. Jessica could stop by the nearby corner store and pick up something she could eat that wouldn't destroy her diet in an instant. Even she was surprised by her willpower to make it thus far.

Although, that would be challenged when Jessica, who was hefting herself out of her woefully under-sized chair, the armrests lodged onto her blankets of thigh flab, was interrupted by...

14332.content:
As Jessica stood in the elevator, she began to catch her breath. She fanned herself with one hand and dug into her laptop bag for something to help quiet her hungry, doughy belly. Her gut began to grumble more and more as she ascended the tall office building. "It must be the stairs making me this hungry. I suppose... Maybe it wouldn't hurt to reward myself for doing such a good job. It was at that moment that Jessica's eyes lit up; a smile appearing on her face as she had finally found the snack from her laptop bag. Upon reaching the top floor, the gentle ring of the elevator sounded as the doors to the carriage slid open.

Anybody looking in this direction would see Jessica, no longer fanning herself, instead busied her left hand with holding a wrapped king sized Butterfinger which she had picked up on the way to work; the other hand returning to a bag of full sized snickers that she brought from home (just in case she got peckish later in the day) which was cradled softly between her quivering upper arm fat and elephantine belly. At least one wrapper could be seen peeking out from the pocket of her strained slacks, chocolate smears faintly gilding the black fabric as it bounced and wobbled to the rhythm of her gait. Continuing on the path to her desk, she peeled the gold-yellow and blue wrapper away from the candy bar, and heaved a sigh. The discomfort of her walk was the primary reason for the exhale, but the feeling of satisfaction that came with a well-earned reward as delicious as this seemed to add a huff of contentment to the end of the sigh.

As the hefty office employee trundled nearer to her desk, Emily, one of her co-workers, greeted her in between finishing the butterfinger and reaching for her next treat, catching her with her mouth empty.

"Hey there Jess!" Emily waved a fat-swaddled arm to her heavier co-worker as she brought a chocolate-filled glazed eclair to her delicate, smiling mouth. Jess responded, "Hi..*huff*..Holly" she paused, leaning heavily on the desk of her co-worker to tear apart the wrapper of the fourth chocolate confection she'd rewarded herself this morning. As she leaned on the desk, her lowermost belly roll drooped heavily within the confines of her somewhat ill-fitting pants. moving further up her rolling torso the top roll of flab strained and overwhelmed her creaking waistband. Her breasts and arm fat billowed onto the flat hard surface of the desk, jiggling as she worked the wrapper down the candy confection. "Mmmmm, I love snickers bars." Emily said through a mouthful of eclair; taking time to swipe the gob of chocolate frosting from her lip, and promptly returning it to her mouth. She continued "Ooh! and I haven't been able to put down these doughnuts either! I think there's something in the water here, or maybe it's the vitamins I've been taking, or the altitude or whatever, but I have been so hungry lately."

With an air of experience, Jess interjected, "You should try their cinnamon rolls, they're divine!" She hummed happily and began to rub the side of her now hungry belly; a glazed look returning to her eye as she brought the snickers to her mouth again and resumed her chewing. The memory of "Porky's Three Pound Pan" Cinnamon Rolls combined with the chocolate melting on her tongue and the waft of the fried pastries sitting on Emily's desk seemed to distract the grazing corpulent corporate worker. Her full mouth restricted her further correspondence to grunts of approval and agreement. Jessica would catch snippets of what Emily was saying. She would go on for a while about this restaurant or that, and how rarely she'd have opportunity to eat out at a restaurant before she moved here to the city and the corporate offices; about how nice the option of delivery was, and how she was just thrilled about her new corporate card.

"Well, I suppose I won't keep talking your ear off, Jess, have a good day." Emily finished. "I'll see you around." Jessica responded as she turned to finish the journey to her desk. After a short pause, Emily called out "Want to get lunch with me sometime? I mean, I feel a little silly knowing more restaurants than I do people to go to them with, and I just thought..."

Turning to face Emily caused the ocean of flab around Jess's middle to slosh, only coming to a rest when she began to say...

How's she been? 1451.content:
...I'm sorry, what?

Look, I was trying to find the option for Corporate. Which means that I was looking for the option wherein every woman in the company's higher echelons all get extremely fat for some reason. Possibly, the company even has a history of women getting fatter mostly in proportion to the rank within the company.

So, in that case, an office drone at a smalltown branch might get hired as a slim, conventionally attractive woman. The head of that local branch would, apparently by coincidence, be an ssbbw. And the people working in the main office in New York are all at least very chubby.

Even people who are hired usually seem to end up, somehow conforming to the proportional fatness of their place within the company. Slim women are still hired, but they end surrounded by heavier women, and a culture of fatter people being more important, until it feels normal. They stop questioning it and start to allow themselves to get fat, until they match the size of their colleagues.

With promotion comes more money, but also a bigger office, on a higher floor, with fatter coworkers and more constant access to junk-food. The slim, conventionally attractive woman who was an office drone at the New York head office might, one day, be joining the board of directors. But, if that is the case, along the way she will probably:

Join the company thin, but quickly find herself surrounded by very, very chubby women, until the morning that she forgets to care about her bathroom scales telling her that she's hit the 200lbs mark.

Get promoted, and put in an office in a higher floor, with an expenses budget for business lunches every day. She starts taking business lunches at least twice a day, because it just seems to be how everybody wants to meet. She barely has time to check her weight, which the scales telling her that she's up to 300lbs now.

Get promoted again, thanks to her many successful client meetings, getting a much bigger salary, a much bigger office on a higher floor, and a much bigger expense budget. Seeing how the real pro's do it on her new floor, she starts having her business lunches brought to her fancy office, so that she can fit in more meetings per day. If she had time to care what her bathroom scales said, she still wouldn't be able to find out. Partly because she couldn't see the numbers anymore past her waist, but mostly because her scales only went up to 350lbs, not 450lbs like she is.

Get promoted again, because she's impressed some very important people. She gets a new office, bigger and better, with easy access to the luxury free buffet. She even gets her own personal assistant who is actually disturbingly thin when she starts (actually, she's 200lbs) which soon changes as she indulges often enough at the buffet with her new boss to get quite chubby (actually, she gains 100lbs). Our main character also gains little weight, but she pays little attention to irrelevant details, like "650lbs". She is finding it increasingly hard to get to work, however. That's why she's trying to work towards the built-in apartment offices on the top floors.

Get promoted again, joining the live-in board of directors, with her own, huge office-apartment. They have video-conference for meetings, so she doesn't actually even need to leave to do any work. There is even a service elevator for take-out deliveries so that she can have a decent amount of food brought to her while she's in the meeting. Her personal assistant (now weighing 450lbs) is actually the one to fetch the food trolley, to pick up the take-out. In fact, most days, the main character only moved from the bedroom, to the living room for conference calls, but she soon realised that the other board members were taking the meetings from their beds. She started doing the same thing. Now she doesn't leave her bed. Although she no longer has any idea what her weight is (900lbs), she acknowledges that she couldn't get out of bed anymore if she tried. Luckily, her personal assistant has moved in and she hired a live-in nurse for the two of them. The nurse is worryingly skinny (200lbs, actually) but they'll soon have her eating better...

151.content:
8:55, cars start pulling into the parking lot. Another day at the office was about to begin. Jenna looked out the window from the 6th floor of the building. She watched as her employees were arriving to start the day.

“Good morning Courtney!” Alice shouted as she pulled into a parking space.

“You too, Alice.” Courtney responded. Alice turned her car off.

“Uh oh,” Alice squeaked as she opened her door.

“What is it?” Melissa said from the passenger seat. The two friends frequently carpooled to and from work.

“I can’t unbuckle my seat belt.” Alice said sheepishly. Alice’s big flabby bottom had buried the end of the seat belt under her obese body.

“Again? *sigh* Fine lean over and I’ll do it.” Melissa said. Victoria’s car entered the lot. She was blasting her car radio. She pulled into the spot next to Alice and Melissa.

“TEENAGE DREAM, THE WAY YOU TURN ME ON, I CAN’T SLEEP-“ Victoria sang along until she turned her car off.

“Good morning, Vicky” Alice said as she closed her car door.

“Hey Al,” Victoria responded. Fast food wrappers fell on the ground as the young fatty opened her car door.

As Alice and Melissa reached the entrance to the building they ran into Christina.

“Good morning Christina.” Alice said politely.

“Yeah what’s up rook.” Melissa said with an attitude. Christy rolled her eyes at Melissa’s comment.

“She’s just cranky,” Alice said to Christy. Christina went up the stairs to the office. Alice and Melissa then entered the elevator.

“Why do you have to call her that?” Alice said in the elevator. “She’s only in her first few weeks working here. You should give her a break.”

“Sorry, I just hate Mondays.” Melissa said.

The elevator doors opened and they walked to the office.

“Two minutes late, ladies.” Jenna shouted from her desk as Alice and Melissa waddled through the office. There were too loud thuds as the two blubbery employees plopped on to their abused desk chairs. The day had officially started.

***

“Mmm, these are good doughnuts.” Courtney said as she scarfed them down at her desk. Each employee was greeted every morning with a box of doughnuts on their desk.

“Yeah, I’m sure.” Christina replied. Being new she was hesitant to embrace the fattening lifestyle of her coworkers.

“Try one, they’re seriously good.” Courtney said. Christina looked up at Courtney. Her 400 pound coworker sat like a ball of fat at her desk. Courtney’s big chubby arm was shoving doughnuts into her mouth. She looked like a gluttonous pig as the box of doughnuts rested on her massive, overfed gut. Pale blubber was visible between the buttons of her tight shirt. Her swollen breast jiggled as she wiped the crumbs off her big soft cleavage.

“Ughhh… fine.” Christina said.

***

It quickly became time to have the regular Monday meeting. Jenna slowly walked out of her private office.

“Meeting time.” She announced. Everyone in the office walked into the conference room for the meeting. Everyone was seated at the long table with Jenna at the end. In the middle of the table were numerous platters of pastries as well as two pots of coffee (with large amounts of sugar and cream). Within 30 seconds half the pastries had been snatched by greedy overfed hands. The business issues were covered first. Checking up on how assignments were going, discussing new clients, going over the schedule for the week, not very interesting stuff. After the business topics it was on to the issues within the branch.

“Okay so I upped the daily order of doughnuts.” Jenna said. The room applauded.

“Will it be two boxes per person?” Melissa asked. Everyone in the office (accept Christina) ate enough pastries a day to fill probably four boxes of doughnuts anyway but it was always a bit sweeter when it was freely provided by the company.

“Yes, also there is a new Chinese food place in the food court downstairs. You guys get the same discounts there as with the rest of the food court.” Jenna said. As Jenna searched through her papers there was a symphony of chewing, crunching, drinking, gulping, unwrapping as well as belts being loosened, fabric ripping slightly, buttons being undone, and as the obese employees shifted their massive bodies the chairs shrieked and groaned. Melissa reached across the table for another pastry. It was the last coffee cake on the platter and was on the opposite side from Melissa. She pulled herself in closer but still couldn’t reach it. She wanted to lean over table but her big fat gut pressed against the hard edge of the table. She tried to lift herself out of her chair so she could reach across but her heavy overfed frame was too much for her too lift for more than an instance. Luckily Christina noticed the event and pushed the pastry closer to Melissa.

“Alright listen cause this is important. There’s a new service store thingy on the 4th floor that is from the company.” Jenna said.

“From Gordge?” Alice said.

“Yes. It’s called Employee Comfort Services, and it’s basically an area you can go to for any number of problems. They have a tailoring section where you can go if you need new or patched up clothes. If you need a bigger chair you can go there for new one. If you have any requests or issues just go see them and they’ll help you deal with it.” Jenna said.

“That sounds great.” Courtney said. All the employees were excited about it. Finally the meeting was over and it was time for the first break of the day.

***

“So are we gonna use my car until you get a new one?” Melissa asked Alice in the break room.

“What do you mean?” Alice responded.

“Alice you can barely fit in the driver’s seat!” Melissa said.

“Oh yeah. I can’t believe I need a new car.” Alice said in a dejected manner.

“New car? Why do you need a new car?” Courtney asked as she entered the break room.

“The driver’s seat is too small and I always end up sitting on the belt buckle.” Alice said.

“It’s because it’s Japanese. Those Japanese cars aren’t made for Americans.” Courtney said.

“Yeah it’s like they’ve never heard of fat people before. Like, big is normal now.” Melissa said.

“I know, right. Although I have gotten pretty big recently.” Alice said. They all sat around eating junk food and talking about whatever. Quickly though the break was over and it was back to work.

***

As Courtney sat at her desk she had one hand using the computer and one hand feeding her. It was a veteran skill that comes from years of practice. Courtney’s big gut was the outcome of years and years of avoiding exercise and eating tons of sugary greasy food. Courtney leaned forward in her chair so that she could reach past her big blubbery middle. Her thick bottom roll of fat hung over the edge of her chair as her massive belly sat between her round plump thighs. The poor desk chair could barely handle Courtney size. The chair was supposed to be for a fat person. It was made stronger and larger than your average chair, but the chair was not meant for someone as gargantuan as Courtney. Courtney was beyond fat. She was a blimp. Not only had her weight exceeded the suggested limit of the chair, her body had literally outgrown the chair. Courtney’s abundant flab was overflowing in the seat. Her big round hips were swallowing the pitiful armrests. She could barely fit her overfed butt on to the seat. As Courtney leaned forward in the chair her blubbery legs and belly slipped more and more off the chair. Courtney made an attempt to coral her flab back into the chair. She leaned her bulk back and pulled her gut up. As she leaned back the chair let out a cry as the parts started to come a part. A series of pops and groans were let out as the chair crumbled under the immense manatee. The whole office shook as Courtney crashed to the floor. Courtney’s mound of fat jiggled until her coworkers came over.

“Are *pant* you okay?” Alice said, out of breath from jumping out of her chair.

“Yeah I’m fine. I don’t think the chair is gonna make it though.” Courtney joked.

“Christina help her up.” Alice said. Courtney stuck her two arms in the air. Alice and Christina pulled but couldn’t move her an inch. Courtney sat on the floor like a beached whale. The only one fit person in the office was Christina but she was hardly strong enough to budge Courtney. Finally they got everyone in the office pulling Courtney up. Slowly Courtney started to rise off the floor. Eventually Courtney finally could stand.
